chapter.verse: Wa ḏ lkitab n ȓejḏuḏ n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ, wenni iǧan zi ddurriṯ n Dawed ḏ Brahim.
Brahim ijja-d Isḥaq. Isḥaq ijja-d Yaƹqub. Yaƹqub ijja-d Yahuḏa ḏ ayṯmas.
Yahuḏa ijja-d Faris ḏ Zaraḥ ak ṯemɣarṯ nnes Ṯamra. Faris ijja-d Ḥaṣrun. Ḥaṣrun ijja-d Aram.
Aram ijja-d Ƹaminadab. Ƹaminadab ijja-d Nassun. Nassun ijja-d Salmun.
Salmun ijja-d Buƹazza ak ṯemɣarṯ nnes Riḥab. Buƹazza ijja-d Ƹubayd ak ṯemɣarṯ nnes Raƹuṯ. Ƹubayd ijja-d Yassa.
Yassa ijja-d Dawed azeǧiḏ. Dawed azeǧiḏ ijja-d Suliman zi ṯenni tuɣa iǧan ḏ ṯamɣarṯ n Uryaḥ.
Suliman ijja-d Raḥubƹam. Raḥubƹam ijja-d Abiya. Abiya ijja-d Asa.
Asa ijja-d Yahucafaṭ. Yahucafaṭ ijja-d Yuram. Yuram ijja-d Ƹuzzaya.
Ƹuzzaya ijja-d Yuṯam. Yuṯam ijja-d Aḥaz. Aḥaz ijja-d Ḥisqi.
Ḥisqi ijja-d Manassa. Manassa ijja-d Amun. Amun ijja-d Yuciya.
Yuciya ijja-d Yakunya ḏ ayṯmas ḏi ȓweqṯ nni wami twasufɣen ɣar Babil.
Menbaƹd i ȓweqṯ nni wami twasufɣen ɣar Babil, Yakunya ijja-d Cƹaltihil. Cƹaltihil ijja-d Zarubbabil.
Zarubbabil ijja-d Abihud. Abihud ijja-d Lyaqim. Lyaqim ijja-d Ƹazur.
Ƹazur ijja-d Ṣaduq. Ṣaduq ijja-d Axim. Axim ijja-d Alyud.
Alyud ijja-d Lƹizar. Lƹizar ijja-d Mattan. Mattan ijja-d Yaƹqub.
Yaƹqub ijja-d Yusef aryaz n Maryam nettaṯ iy d ijjin Ƹisa ig itwasemman s Lmasiḥ.
Ḏinni arbeƹṭac n lʼajyal zi Brahim ɣar Dawed. Zi Dawed ḥetta wami twasufɣen ɣar Babil arbeƹṭac n lʼajyal. Zeg wami twasufɣen ɣar Babil ḥetta wami d ixȓeq Lmasiḥ arbeƹṭac n lʼajyal.
Fa mammec iy d ixȓeq Ƹisa Lmasiḥ. Yemmas Maryam tuɣa ṯegga lxuṭuba ak Yusef. Menbaƹd qbeȓ ma aḏ meȓcen jarasen ṯeysi aƹeddis zi Arruḥ iqeddsen.
Yusef anexḍab nnes, nican ig iǧa. War ixes ca axas iḍȓeq ddiƹaya, irezzu aḏas iǧef s ṯnufra.

Walakin wami itfekkar ḏi ṯmesȓayṯ nni, ṯbedd-d xas ijjen n lmalaʼika ḏi ṯirjiṯ ṯenna-as: "A Yusef a mmis n Ayṯ-Dawed, war teggweḏ ca aḏ tiȓi Maryam ḏ ṯamɣarṯ nnec. Aqa zi Arruḥ iqeddsen iy zi ṯeysi aƹeddis.
Aqa aḏ d tejj ijjen n uḥenjir aṯ ṯsemmiḏ Ƹisa ȓaḥeqqac netta iy ɣa isnejmen ȓqum nnes zi ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nsen."
Qa ḏ manaya marra ig iweqƹen ḥima aḏ ikemmeȓ wawaȓ iy inna Siḏi Arebbi i nnabi Icaƹya ḏeg yijjen n zman:
<Aqa ṯaƹzriṯ aḏ teysi aƹeddis, aḏ tejj ijjen n uḥenjir aḏas semman Immanwil.> (Ȓmaƹna nnes: Arebbi aqaṯ akiḏneɣ.)
Wami d ifaq Yusef zeg yiḍeṣ igga min ḏas ṯenna lmalaʼika n Siḏi Arebbi, yuwi-d ṯamɣarṯ nnes.
Walakin war ɣares iqarreb ca aȓ wami d ṯejja mmis. Ṯumma isemma-ṯ igga-as Ƹisa.
Wami d ixȓeq Ƹisa ḏeg ubilaj n Bayt Laḥm ḏi ṯmurṯ n Yahuḏiya ḏi ȓweqṯ n uzeǧiḏ Hirudus, usin-d can yiwḏan zeg yinni iqqaren lƹilem n yiṯran zi ccarq ɣar ṯendint n Lquds.
Nnan: "Mani iǧa uḥenjir nni iy d ixeȓqen aḏ yiȓi ḏ azeǧiḏ n Ayṯ-Israʼil? Aqa neẓra iṯri nnes ḏi ccarq, qa nusa-d aḏas nsejjeḏ."
Wami isȓa uzeǧiḏ Hirudus manaya, ixeyyeq iysi ijjen n umnus ḏ ameqqran netta ḏ imezḏaɣ n Lquds.
Ismun marra arruyas n ȓfuqaha n Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏ imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa isseqsa-ṯen inna-asen: "Mani d ɣa ixȓeq Lmasiḥ?"
Arrin xas nnan-as: "Ḏi Bayt Laḥm ḏi ṯmurṯ n Yahuḏiya, mammec yura nnabi Mixa ḏeg yijjen n zman:
Arebbi inna: <Uȓa ḏ cem, a Bayt Laḥm ḏi ṯmurṯ n Yahuḏiya, war ṯeǧiḏ bu ḏ ṯamezyant jar ṯneddam n Yahuḏiya. Zzayem iy d ɣa iffeɣ ijjen n lḥakem iy ɣa inedhen ccaƹb inu n Ayṯ-Israʼil.>"
Ȓexddenni iȓaɣa-yasen-d uzeǧiḏ Hirudus s ṯnufra i yinni iqqaren lƹilem n yiṯran, isseqsa-ṯen issen zzaysen meȓmi tuɣa d imeḍhar yiṯri-ya.
Ssenni issekk-iṯen ɣar Bayt Laḥm inna-asen: "Ruḥem ḏinni rzum mliḥ x uḥenjir nni. Xmi ṯ ɣa ṯafem, ƹeȓmem-ayi bac aḏ raḥeɣ uȓa ḏ nec aḏas sejjḏeɣ."
Sȓin min inna uzeǧiḏ, kkaren ruḥen ḏinni. Iṯri nni iy ẓrin ḏi ccarq iggur ɣar zzaṯ. Wami yuweḍ yiṯri nni, ibedd ḏeg ujenna ɣar mani iǧa uḥenjir nni.
Wami ẓrin iṯri nni farḥen aṭṭas.
Uḏfen ṯaddarṯ nni, ufin aḥenjir nni ak yemmas Maryam, wḍan x ifadden nsen sejjḏen-as. Kksen-d ȓeknuz nsen, iƹni ddheb ḏ tbaxur lluban ḏ yijjen n ȓḥajeṯ ḏ tufuḥ qqaren-as murr, ucin-as-ṯen ḏ lhadiyaṯ.
Iƹȓem-asen Arebbi ḏi ṯirjiṯ inna-asen war teƹqibem ca ɣar uzeǧiḏ Hirudus. Ṣafi kkaren ḏewȓen ɣar ṯmurṯ nsen x yijjen n ubriḏ nneɣni.

Wami uyuren yiwḏan nni iqqaren lƹilem n yiṯran, ṯbedd-d ijjen n lmalaʼika n Siḏi Arebbi ḏi ṯirjiṯ ɣar Yusef ṯenna-as: "Kkar ysi aḥenjir ḏ yemmas arweȓ ɣar Miṣra, zeḏɣem ḏinni aȓ ḏac ɣa iniɣ ḏweȓ-d. Aqa azeǧiḏ Hirudus irezzu x uḥenjir-a bac aṯ ineɣ."
Ikkar Yusef yuyur s ǧiȓeṯ ɣar Miṣra yuwi aḥenjir nni ḏ yemmas akiḏes.
Iqqim ḏinni ḥetta aȓ wami immuṯ Hirudus. Qaƹ manaya iwqeƹ ḥima aḏ ikemmeȓ wawaȓ ig inna Siḏi Arebbi i nnabi umi qqaren Hucaƹ ḏeg yijjen n zman: <Qa ȓaɣiɣ-d i Mmi bac aḏ d iffeɣ zi Miṣra.>

Wami d yarra ȓexbar Hirudus belli yinni iqqaren lƹilem n yiṯran cemṯen-ṯ, iƹeṣṣeb aṭṭas iɣḍeb. Issekk bac aḏ ineɣ iḥenjiren nni marra ḏi Bayt Laḥm ḏ nnawaḥi nnes iy ɣar ṯeǧa qell zi ƹamayen. Manaya ƹlaḥsab ȓweqṯ iy ḏasen d imeḍhar yiṯri nni i yinni iqqaren lƹilem n yiṯran.
Ȓexddenni ikemmeȓ wawaȓ nni iy inna Siḏi Arebbi i nnabi umi qqaren Irmiya ḏeg yijjen n zman:
<Ṯɣuyyiṯ tesȓan-as zi dcar n Rama, ḏ imeṭṭawen ḏ waṭṭas n lḥuzen, ḏ Ayṯ-Raḥil ig itrun x ṯarwa nsen, war xsen aṯen iƹezza ḥadd x ṯarwa nsen immuṯen.>
Wami immuṯ uzeǧiḏ Hirudus ṯbedd-d ijjen n lmalaʼika n Siḏi Arebbi ɣar Yusef ḏi ṯirjiṯ ḏi Miṣra.
Ṯenna-as: "Kkar ƹqeb, awi akiḏec aḥenjir-a ḏ yemmas ɣar ṯmurṯ n Ayṯ-Israʼil, aqa yinni ixsen aḏ nɣen aḥenjir-a qa mmuṯen."
Ssenni ikkar Yusef yuwi akiḏes aḥenjir nni ḏ yemmas iḏweȓ ɣar ṯmurṯ nnes n Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Walakin wami isȓa belli azeǧiḏ Arxilawus ixȓef babas Hirudus ḏi ȓeḥkam n Yahuḏiya, iggweḏ aḏ iraḥ ḏinni. Siḏi Arebbi iƹȓem-as-d ƹaweḏ ḏeg yijjen n ṯirjiṯ, ikkar iruḥ ɣar jjiheṯ n ṯmurṯ n Ljalil.
Izḏeɣ ḏeg yijjen n ubilaj qqaren-as Naṣira ḥima aḏ ikemmeȓ wawaȓ nni iy inna Siḏi Arebbi i lʼanbiya ḏeg yijjen n zman: <Aqa aḏas semman Naṣiri.>
Ḏi ȓweqṯ nni imeḍhar-d Yaḥya, itṭehhar i yiwḏan s waman itbeccar-iṯen ḏi ȓexȓa n Yahuḏiya.
Iqqar-asen: "Tubem, aqa yuḏes-d ȓmulk n ujenna."
X Yaḥya ig inna nnabi umi qqaren Icaƹya ḏeg yijjen n zman: <Ṯmijja tȓaɣa ḏi ȓexȓa ṯeqqar: Swejḏeṯ abriḏ i Siḏi Arebbi, ggem ibriḏen nnes nican.>
Yaḥya arruḍ nnes xeḏmen-ṯ s cƹar n uȓɣem, x nneṣṣ nnes ijjen n uḥezzam n yiȓem. Itett ṯmurɣi ḏ ṯamment ṯaḥurrect.
Tasen-d ɣares imezḏaɣ n ṯendint n Lquds ḏ yinni n Yahuḏiya amen-ṯekmaȓ ḏ marra yinni iy d innḍen i yiɣzar n Lʼurdun.
Teƹtarafen s ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nsen, Yaḥya itṭehhar-iṯen s waman ḏeg yiɣzar n Lʼurdun.

Walakin wami iẓra Yaḥya belli aṭṭas n ȓfuqaha ḏ ifarrisiyen ḏ iṣadduqiyen tasen-d ɣares ḥima aṯen iṭehhar s waman inna-asen: "Ya ṯarwa n ifiɣeran, wi ḏawem iƹeȓmen aḏ tarewȓem zi lɣaḍab n Siḏi Arebbi iy d ɣa yasen?
Meȓa ṯtubem ḏ ṣṣaḥ, ggeṯ ȓexḏayem ṯiṣebḥanin.
Maci aḏ tinim ḏi nnefs nwem qa neccin ḏ ṯarwa n Brahim u ṣafi. Meȓa ixes Arebbi ṯarwa n Brahim, ataf aḏ iysi izra-ya aṯen yarr ḏ ṯarwa n Brahim!
Aqa caqur iwjeḏ ḥima aḏ iqess iẓewran n ȓcejjur. Mkuȓ ṯacejjarṯ iy war itirwen ca min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan ataf aḏ twaqess aḏ tmenḍar ḏi ṯmessi.

Nec tṭehhareɣ-kenniw s waman bac aḏ tubem, walakin wenni iy d ɣa yasen menbaƹd i nec, netta ijheḏ xafi. War sḏihiǧeɣ ca aḏas ysiɣ uȓa ḏ ṯisiȓa nnes. Netta akenniw iṭehhar s Arruḥ iqeddsen ḏ yiȓesawen n ṯmessi.
Ɣares ṯazzarṯ ḏeg ufus ḥima aḏ izuzzar ṯaffa nnes qaƹ, aḏ ismun ṯiḥebba n yirḏan aṯent igg ḏi ṯesrafṯ. Min war ineffƹen ca aṯ issecmeḍ ḏi ṯmessi iy war ixessin ƹemmarṣ."
Ssenni yusa-d Ƹisa zi ṯmurṯ n Ljalil ɣar yiɣzar n Lʼurdun bac aṯ iṭehhar Yaḥya s waman.
Walakin Yaḥya yugi inna-as: "Nec itxeṣṣa cek iy ḏayi ɣa iṭehharen, u cek ṯusiḏ-d ɣari?"
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-as: "Ɣir qbeȓ ȓexxu, ḏ manaya ig iǧan nican ḥima aḏ ikemmeȓ marra min ixes Siḏi Arebbi." Uca iqbeȓ Yaḥya.
Wami itwaṭehhar Ƹisa iffeɣ-d ȓexddenni zeg waman nni. Aqa inurzem-as-d ujenna iẓra Arruḥ n Arebbi ihewwa-d igga am yijjen n ṯeḏbirṯ ṯmars-d xas.
Ssenni iȓaɣa-d ijjen n ṣṣut zeg ujenna inna-d: "Wa ḏ Memmi iƹizzen, nec farrḥeɣ zzayes."
Ssenni Arruḥ nni n Arebbi yuwi Ƹisa ɣar ȓexȓa ḥima aṯ ijarreb Ibȓis.
Wami iẓumm Ƹisa arbeƹin yum jar ǧiyaȓi ḏ wussan yusa-as-d jjuƹ.
Ikkar wenni itjarraben iqarreb-d ɣar Ƹisa inna-as: "Meȓa cek ḏ Mmis n Arebbi, ini-yasen i yizra-ya aḏ ḏewȓen ḏ aɣrum."
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-as: "Lla, Lkitab iqqar: <Bnaḏem war itƹic ca s uɣrum waha, itƹic s mkuȓ awaȓ ig iqqar Arebbi.>"
Ssenni Ibȓis yuwi Ƹisa ɣar ṯendint n Lquds, isiȓi-ṯ x ṯqiccat n ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant.
Inna-as: "Cek meȓa ḏ Mmis n Arebbi ngez ssanita ɣar ṯmurṯ. Aqa Lkitab iqqar: <Qa Arebbi aḏ iweṣṣa bac ac ḥḍant lmalaʼikaṯ nnes. Ac ysint x ifassen nsent bac war ṯeȓqifeḏ uȓa ḏ ij uzru s uḍar nnec.>"
Inna-as Ƹisa: "Lla, Lkitab iqqar: <War tjarrab ca Siḏi Arebbi nnec.>"
Ssenni Ibȓis yuwi Ƹisa ɣar ṯqiccat n yijjen n uḏrar yuƹȓa aṭṭas. Ismeḍhar-as-d marra lmemlakaṯ n ddunect-a ḏ ṯuṣubḥant nsent.
Inna-as: "Aḏac uceɣ marra ṯina meȓa ṯewḍiḏ x ifadden nnec ṯsejjḏeḏ-ayi."
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-as: "Ruḥ, beƹƹeḏ-ayi a Cciṭan. Aqa Lkitab iqqar: <Sejjeḏ i Siḏi Arebbi nnec, ƹbeḏ-iṯ netta waḥḏes.>"
Ssenni ibeƹƹeḏ xas Ibȓis. Usint-id lmalaʼikaṯ bḏant tsexxarent x Ƹisa.
Wami isȓa Ƹisa belli Yaḥya aqa itwaḥebbes, iƹqeb ɣar Naṣira ɣar ṯmurṯ n Ljalil.
Walakin war iqqim ca ḏi Naṣira, iruḥ aḏ izḏeɣ ḏeg yijjen n ubilaj qqaren-as Kafernaḥum ig iǧan x ṭṭarf n ȓebḥar n Ljalil, jjiheṯ n ṯmurṯ n Zafulun ḏ Naftali.
Amenni ikemmeȓ wawaȓ nni iy inna Siḏi Arebbi i nnabi umi qqaren Icaƹya ḏeg yijjen n zman:
<Ṯamurṯ n Zafulun ḏ ṯmurṯ n Naftali, ṯinni umi qqaren ṯamurṯ n Ljalil, x ubriḏ n ȓebḥar ḏi ccarq n yiɣzar n Lʼurdun, mani iy zeddɣen uȓa ḏ yinni war iǧin zi Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Ccaƹb-a iy izeddɣen ḏi ṯaǧest, aḏ iẓer ṯfawṯ ḏ ṯameqqrant. Yina izeddɣen ḏi ṯaǧest n ȓmewṯ aḏasen d imeḍhar nnur.>
Zi ssenni ibḏa Ƹisa itbeccar iqqar-asen: "Tubeṯ, aqa yuḏes-d ȓmulk n ujenna."
Iggur Ƹisa x cceṭṭ n ȓebḥar n Ljalil, yufa ḏinni ṯnayen n iḥeǧaqen n iseȓman niṯni ḏ awmaṯen. Ijjen qqaren-as Simƹan tȓaɣan-as s Buṭrus, akiḏes umas qqaren-as Andrus. Neṭṭaren ṯracca ḏi ȓebḥar.
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Ḏfarem-ayi-d, aqa ȓexxu iy kenniw ɣa arreɣ ḏ iḥeǧaqen n yiwḏan."
Ȓexddenni semḥen ḏi ṯracciwin nsen ḏfaren-ṯ.

Iƹḏu aɣiȓin, yufa ṯnayen n wawmaṯen nneɣni, ijjen qqaren-as Yaƹqub ijjen qqaren-as Yuḥanna. Niṯni ḏ ṯarwa n yijjen n uryaz umi qqaren Zabadi. Aqaṯen ḏi ṯɣarrabut ak babaṯsen ƹeddȓen ṯiracciwin nsen. Iȓaɣa-yasen-d Ƹisa,
ḏeg umcan semḥen ḏi ṯɣarrabut nsen ḏ babaṯsen ḏfaren Ƹisa.
Iggur Ƹisa ḏi lʼiqlim n Ljalil marra, iseȓmaḏ ḏi ṯemziḏawin n Ayṯ-Israʼil itbeccar-iṯen s Lʼinjil n ȓmulk n Arebbi isgenfa marra ȓehȓacaṯ ḏ ddiƹan n ddat ḏeg yiwḏan.
Iffeɣ ȓexbar nnes ḏi Surya amen-ṯekmaȓ. Tawin-d ɣares marra yinni iheȓcen tƹeddaben s lʼanwaƹ n ȓehȓacaṯ ḏ ȓeḥȓiqaṯ, mkuȓ imaryaḥen ḏ imejnunen ḏ inecrufen netta isgenfa-ṯen.
Ḏfaren Ƹisa aṭṭas n ȓɣaci zi Ljalil ḏ lʼiqlim umi qqaren Dikaplis ḏ ṯendint n Lquds ḏ Yahuḏiya ḏ jjiheṯ n ccarq n yiɣzar n Lʼurdun.
Wami iẓra qaƹ ȓɣaci nni, yuȓi ɣar uḏrar iqqim usin-d ɣares imeḥḍaren nnes.
Ibḏa iseȓmaḏ-iṯen inna-asen:
"Ssaƹḏ nsen i yinni iǧan ḏ ȓmusakin ḏeg arruḥ nsen, aqa ȓmulk ujenna i niṯni.
Ssaƹḏ nsen i yinni itrun, aqa aḏ twacejjƹen.
Ssaƹḏ nsen i yinni iǧan ḏ drawec, aqa aḏ warṯen ddunect.
Ssaƹḏ nsen i yinni iǧuzen iffuḏen ɣar min iǧan nican, ȓaḥeqqac niṯni aḏ jjawnen.
Ssaƹḏ nsen i yinni ireḥḥmen, aqa aṯen irḥem Arebbi uȓa ḏ niṯni.
Ssaƹḏ nsen i yinni ɣar iǧa wuȓ ḏ acemȓaȓ, aqa aḏ ẓren Arebbi.
Ssaƹḏ nsen i yinni iṣeǧḥen iwḏan, aqa niṯni aṯen semman amecnaw ṯarwa n Arebbi.
Ssaƹḏ nsen i yinni itwaƹeddaben x ssabab n min iǧan nican, aqa ȓmulk n ujenna i niṯni.
Ssaƹḏ nwem meȓa tzawaren-kenniw, ƹeddben-kenniw, niɣ nnan ḏaywem ȓƹib s ixarriqen x ssabab inu.
Ḍeḥceṯ, farḥeṯ. Aqa ɣarwem ijjen n lʼajar ḏ ameqqran ḏeg ujenna ȓaḥeqqac amenni iy twaƹeddben lʼanbiya tuɣa iǧan qbeȓ nwem.
Ḏ kenniw iy iǧan ḏ ȓemȓeḥ ṯaṣebḥant n ṯmurṯ. Walakin meȓa iruḥ-as lmaḏaq nnes, mamc ḏas ɣa negg aḏas ṯiḏ narr? Ataf war ṯṣeǧaḥ i walu, ɣir at nḍaren ɣar barra waha axas ƹeffsen yiwḏan.
Kenniw ḏ ṯfawṯ n ddunect. Ijjen n ṯendint iy iǧan x uḏrar war ṯzemmar aḏ teqqim ṯnuffar.
Iwḏan war sreqqin ca ȓqendiȓ ḥima axas qeȓben aqnuc; Lla, teggen-ṯ x ȓmarfaƹ ḥima aḏasen yuc ṯfawṯ i marra ug iǧan ḏi ṯeddarṯ.
Ammu, jjeṯ ȓqendiȓ nwem iceƹƹeȓ i yiwḏan ḥima aḏ ẓren ȓexḏayem nwem ṯiṣebḥanin aḏ ḥemḏen Babaṯwem iǧan ḏeg ujenna.
War tfekkareṯ ca belli usiɣ-d bac aḏ qḍiɣ x Ccariƹa n Musa niɣ x min nnan lʼanbiya; Lla, war d usiɣ ca axasen qḍiɣ, usiɣ-d bac aḏ kemmȓeɣ x wawaȓ nsen.
Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: War itekkes ijjen n ȓḥarf niɣ ḏ ijjen n ṯneqqiṭ zi ccariƹa aȓ ɣa itwakkes ujenna ḏ ṯmurṯ aȓ ɣa itwakemmeȓ kuȓci.

Marra uw ɣa iḥarfen ijjen n ȓuṣiyeṯ ḏ ṯamezyant zi ccariƹa, ssenni aḏ iseȓmeḏ i yiwḏan x min itegg netta, ataf aḏ yiȓi ḏ amezyan s waṭṭas ḏi ȓmulk ujenna. Walakin wenni ɣa iṭaƹen i ccariƹa igga zzayes, ssenni aḏ iseȓmeḏ i yiwḏan aḏ ggen am netta, ataf aḏ yiȓi ḏ ameqqran s waṭṭas ḏi ȓmulk ujenna.
Aqa qqareɣ-awem: Meȓa war ṯṭiƹim ca i min iqqar Arebbi ktar zi min teggen imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa ḏ ȓḥizeb n ifarrisiyen, ataf ƹemmarṣ aḏ taḏfem ȓmulk ujenna.
Aqa ṯesȓim ḏi Lkitab belli itwanna-yasen i ȓejḏuḏ nwem: War neqq ca, aqa marra wenni iy ɣa inɣen ḥadd ataf aḏ itwaḥkem.

Walakin nec qqareɣ-awem: Marra uw ɣa iƹaṣben x wumas ataf aḏ itwaḥkem. Wenni ɣa yinin i wumas: Ay aɣyuȓ, ataf aḏ itwaḥkem ḏi lmaḥkama ṯameqqrant. Ḏ wenni ɣa yinin i wumas: Ay afɣuȓ, ataf isḏaheǧ aḏ iraḥ ɣar ṯmessi n jahennama.
Meȓa ṯruḥeḏ aḏ tqeddmeḏ dbiḥeṯ i Arebbi uca ṯfekkareḏ ijjen n wumac ixeyyeq xac,
ejj dbiḥeṯ nni ḏinni ɣar ȓmeḏbaḥ, ruḥ ḏ amezwaru aḏ tṣeȓḥeḏ ak wumac. Ƹaḏ iy d ɣa ṯḏewȓeḏ aḏ tqeddmeḏ dbiḥeṯ nnec i Arebbi.

Meȓa ithem-icek ca ḥadd menbaƹd uwin-ac-d lʼistidƹa ḥima akiḏes ṯraḥeḏ ɣar lmaḥkama, ƹḏeȓ akiḏes ḏeɣya ḏeg ubriḏ bac war c isiwwiḍ ca ɣar ȓqaḍi, ȓqaḍi nni aḏ iʼamar amxazni, amxazni nni ac inḍar ḏi ȓeḥbes.
Aqa tesȓiḏ ȓḥaqq: War ssenni d teffɣeḏ ca aȓ ɣa ṯxeǧseḏ ṣuldi aneggaru.
Ṯesȓim ḏi Lkitab belli itwanna ḏeg yijjen n zman: War zenna ca.
Walakin nec qqareɣ-awem: Marra wenni ixezzaren ɣar can ṯemɣarṯ s wuȓ nnes, ataf itwaḥsab izna.
Meȓa ṯiṭṭ nnec ṯafusiṯ tsebbab-ac ḏi can ȓefḍiḥeṯ, qȓeƹ-it zaƹma nḍar-it xak. Ḥsen i cek aḏ texsareḏ ijjen n ṭṭarf zi ddat nnec zi meȓa ṯmenḍar ddat nnec amen-ṯekmaȓ ḏi jahennama.
Meȓa fus nnec afusi itsebbab-ac ḏi can ȓefḍiḥeṯ, qess-iṯ zaƹma nḍar-iṯ xak. Ḥsen i cek aḏ texsareḏ ijjen n ṭṭarf zi ddat nnec zi meȓa ṯruḥ ddat nnec amen-ṯekmaȓ ḏi jahennama.
Aqa itwanna ḏeg yijjen n zman ḏi Lkitab ƹaweḏ: Wenni ɣa iǧfen i ṯemɣarṯ nnes, ataf aḏas yuc ṯabrat nnes.
Walakin nec qqareɣ-awem: Marra wenni ɣa iǧfen i ṯemɣarṯ nnes, nettaṯ war ṯezni ca, ataf itarra-t ṯezna iƹni meȓa ṯƹaweḏ ȓemȓac. Wenni iy ɣa imeȓcen ak ṯenni iǧfen, ataf izna.
Aqa ṯesȓim ḏi Lkitab ƹaweḏ belli itwanna i ȓejḏuḏ nwem: Qa war txalaf bu ṯjaǧiṯ nnec, kemmeȓ ṯjaǧiṯ nnec iy ṯejjuǧeḏ zzaṯ i Siḏi Arebbi.
Walakin nec qqareɣ-awem: War tjaǧam ca ƹemmarṣ: waxxa s ujenna ȓaḥeqqac netta ḏ lƹarc n Arebbi;
uȓa s ṯmurṯ ȓaḥeqqac xas itmarsen iḍaren nnes; waxxa s ṯendint n Lquds ȓaḥeqqac nettaṯ ḏ ṯandint n Uzeǧiḏ ameqqran.
War tjaǧa bu s uzeǧif nnec, ȓaḥeqqac war ṯzemmareḏ ca aḏ tarreḏ can n uzuṭṭu ḏ acemȓaȓ niɣ ḏ abercan.
Aḏ yiȓi wawaȓ nwem wah niɣ lla. Marra min ɣa ṯinim ḏ zzyada, ataf aẓwer nnes zi Cciṭan.
Aqa ṯesȓim ḏi Lkitab min itwannan ḏeg yijjen n zman: Wenni ɣa ikksen ṯiṭṭ i can yijjen, ataf aḏas kksen ṯiṭṭ. Wenni ɣa ikksen ṯiɣmest i can yijjen, ataf aḏas kksen ṯiɣmest.
Walakin nec qqareɣ-awem: War tƹarraḍem ca i wenni iǧan ḏ aƹeffan. Wenni c ɣa iseqqȓen ɣar uɣembub jjiheṯ ṯafusiṯ ḏewwaȓ-as jjiheṯ nneɣni.
Wenni ixsen ac yawi ɣar craƹ ḥima aḏac yawi ṯaqmijat, uc-as uȓa ḏ azeǧab nnec.
Meȓa can yijjen zi ȓmexzen igga xak bezzez aḏ teysiḏ ȓeḥmeȓ ijjen n kilumit, ysi-ṯ cek ṯnayen kilumit.
Wenni ḏac ɣa ittaren can ṯmesȓayṯ, uc-as-t. Wenni d ɣa yasen ɣarek irezzu aḏ irḍeȓ war ṯ tarra ca ixwa.
Aqa ṯesȓim ḏi Lkitab min itwannan ḏeg yijjen n zman: Aḏ texseḏ ajjar nnec, aḏ tƹiffeḏ ȓaƹḏu nnec.
Walakin qqareɣ-awem nec: Xseṯ ȓƹaḏyan nwem, ttareṯ i Arebbi x yinni kenniw itƹeddaben,
ḥima aḏ tiȓim ḏ ṯarwa n Babaṯwem iy iǧan ḏeg ujenna. Ȓaḥeqqac itsummur-d ṯfuct x yinni iṣebḥanen ḏ yinni iƹeffanen. Iticc anẓar i yinni iteggen ȓxir ḏ yinni iteggen ccarr.
Meȓa kenniw texsem ɣir yinni iy kenniw itexsen, man lʼajar iy ɣarwem kenniw? Ma war iǧi amenni iy teggen uȓa ḏ iƹeccaren?
Meȓa tseǧamem ɣir x imeddukaȓ nwem, iwa min teggem ḏ zzyada? Aqa uȓa ḏ ȓkuffar teggen manaya!
Iȓiṯ nican qaƹ, amecnaw mamc iǧa Babaṯwem ḏeg ujenna.
Ɣarwem aḏ teggem ȓxir zzaṯ i yiwḏan ḥima akenniw ẓren, ataf war ɣarwem itiȓi bu lʼajar zi Babaṯwem iǧan ḏeg ujenna.

Ƹlaḥsab manaya, xmi ɣa ṯṣeddqeḏ i can n yijjen, war zzayes tberraḥ ca ḏi ȓbuq amecnaw mammec teggen lmunafiqin ḏi ṯemziḏawin ḏ znaqi bac azzaysen semɣaren yiwḏan. Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: War ɣarsen itiȓi bu lʼajar.
Walakin cek xmi ɣa ṯṣeddqeḏ i can n yijjen, itxeṣṣa fus nnec aẓeȓmaḍ war itessen min iticc fus afusi nnec.
Ḥima ṣṣaḏaqa nnec aḏ twagg s ṯnufra. Ḏ Babac Arebbi ig iẓerren min itwaggen s ṯnufra ataf aḏac yuc lʼajar.
Xmi ɣa ṯeẓẓaǧem, war tiȓim ca am lmunafiqin iy texsen aḏ ẓẓaǧen amen bedden ḏi ṯemziḏawin ḏ ṯɣemmura n znaqi ḥima aṯen ẓren yiwḏan. Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: War ɣarsen itiȓi bu lʼajar.
Walakin cek xmi ɣa ṯeẓẓaǧeḏ, aḏef ɣar uxxam nnec qqen xak ṯawwarṯ, ẓẓaǧ i Babac iǧan mani war ṯ itwiȓi ḥadd. Babac ig iẓerren min itwaggen s ṯnufra ataf ac ijaza.
War tẓaǧam ca s wawaȓen war ɣarsen bu ȓmaƹna amecnaw mammec teggen ȓegnus. Ḥessben meȓa qqaren awaȓen aṭṭas, ataf Arebbi aḏasen istajeb.
Lla, war teggem ca am niṯni ȓaḥeqqac Arebbi issen min ṯeḥḏajem qbeȓ ma ḏas t ṯettarem.
Ha mammec iy ɣa ṯeẓẓaǧem: A Babaṯneɣ iǧan ḏeg ujenna, ḏ ameqqran ig iǧa yisem nnec.
Aḏ d yas ȓmulk nnec, aḏ ggen ȓxaḍar nnec ḏi ṯmurṯ, mamc teggen ḏeg ujenna.
Uc-aneɣ kuȓ nhar aɣrum iy ɣa neḥḏaj.
Ɣfar-aneɣ ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nneɣ i neccin, mammec nsemmeḥ i yinni iy kiḏneɣ ixeṭṭan.
War ḏaneɣ tegg ca ḏi ȓemḥayen, senjem-aneɣ zi ccarr. {Ȓaḥeqqac ȓmulk iǧan nnec, ḏ ṯizemmar, ḏ lƹaḍama i cek i ȓebda. Amin.}
Meȓa ṯsemmḥem i yiwḏan ḏeg uxeṭṭi nni iy kiḏwem ixeṭṭan, ataf Babaṯwem iǧan ḏeg ujenna uȓa ḏ netta aḏawem iɣfar.
Meȓa war ṯsemmḥem ca i yiwḏan ḏeg uxeṭṭi nni iy kiḏwem ixeṭṭan, ataf Babaṯwem uȓa ḏ netta war ḏawem iɣeffar ca x ddnub nwem.
Xmi ɣa ṯẓummem, war teggem ca amecnaw mammec teggen lmunafiqin. Txeyyaqen ḥima marra iwḏan aṯen ssnen belli ẓummen. Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Ataf war ɣarsen itiȓi bu lʼajar.
Walakin cek xmi ɣa ṯẓummeḏ, sireḏ aɣembub nnec mceḍ acewwaf nnec,
ḥima iwḏan war tessnen ca qa cek ṯẓummeḏ. Walakin Siḏi Arebbi iy iǧan mani war ṯ itwiȓi ḥadd, netta ig issnen. U Siḏi Arebbi ig iẓerren min itwaggen s ṯnufra ataf ac ijaza.
War snuffureṯ ca ȓkenz nwem ḏi ddunect-a mani yarecca tettent-ṯ ṯkeccawin ḏ mani ǧan iceffaren ccaṯen nqabeṯ tacaren-ṯ.
Walakin snuffareṯ ȓkenz nwem ḏeg ujenna mani war yarecci ca war ṯ tettent ca ṯkeccawin ḏ mani war ǧin ca iceffaren ccaṯen nqabeṯ tacaren-ṯ.
Aqa mani iǧa ȓkenz nnec, ḏinni iy ɣa yiȓi wuȓ nnec.
Ṯiṭṭawin am ṯfawṯ i ṯuḏarṯ nnec. Meȓa ɣarek ṯiṭṭawin ṣeḥḥant, ataf aɣarek ṯiȓi ṯfawṯ marra ḏi ṯuḏarṯ nnec.
Walakin meȓa ṯiṭṭawin nnec war ǧint ca mliḥ, ataf marra ṯuḏarṯ nnec aḏayes ṯiȓi ṯaǧest. Meȓa ṯfawṯ iy ḏayec ṯeḏwer ḏ ṯaǧest, cḥaȓ ḏ ṯubbarcent iy tiȓi ḏ ṯaǧest nni iy ḏayec.

War izemmar can yijjen aḏ yiȓi ḏ axeddam ɣar ṯnayen n siyaḏis. Mayemmi? Ima ijjen aṯ iƹiff, ijjen aṯ ixes. Niɣ ijjen aḏayes iṭṭef, ijjen aṯ iḥeggar. Aḏ txeḏmem i Arebbi niɣ aḏ txeḏmem i ȓewsex n ddunect-a, war iǧi bu s ṯnayen.

X manaya aḏawem iniɣ: War kessim ca s umnus i ṯuḏarṯ nwem ƹlaḥsab min ɣa ṯeccem niɣ ḏ min ɣa ṯeswem niɣ ḏ arruḍ iy ɣa ṯeḥḏajem i ddat nwem. Minzi ṯuḏarṯ-a tseggwa ktar zi macca. Ddat-a tseggwa ktar zeg warruḍ.
Xzareṯ mliḥ ɣar yijḍaḍ ujenna. War zerrƹen, war mejjaren, war xezznen ḏi ṯesȓafin. Walakin Babaṯwem iy iǧan ḏeg ujenna iy ḏasen iticcen aḏ ccen. Kenniw, ma war tseggwim ca aṭṭas s waṭṭas x yijḍaḍ?
Ug izemmaren zzaywem aḏ yarni s umnus nnes ɣir ṯsaƹƹat waha ḏi ȓƹumur nnes?
Mayemmi ṯkessim amnus i warruḍ? Xzareṯ ḏi nwar n ȓexȓa mammec igga, war yarebbeȓ war itxeyyiḍ.
Qqareɣ-awem nec: Uȓa ḏ azeǧiḏ Suliman mecḥaȓ ɣares ḏ agȓa war izemmar ca aḏ yareḍ ca n warruḍ igga am nwar-a wanita.
Meȓa Arebbi iticc arruḍ zaƹma i arbiƹ n ȓexȓa ig iǧan nhara aḏ iḥareq ṯiwecca ḏeg ufarran, ma war itegg akiḏwem kenniw ktar? Ḏaywem lʼiman nwem ḏ uqlil.
War kessiṯ bu s umnus aḏ tinim, min ɣa necc? Niɣ ḏ min ɣa nsew? Niɣ ḏ min ɣa nareḍ ḏ arruḍ?
Marra manaya rezzun-ṯ ȓegnus. Aqa Babaṯwem iǧan ḏeg ujenna issen belli teḥḏajim ṯimesȓayin-a.
Rezzuṯ ḏ amezwaru x ȓmulk n Arebbi ḏ ṯuḏarṯ ig iǧan nican, ssenni ṯimesȓayin-a marra aḏawem marnint.
War kessiṯ bu s umnus i min ɣa iweqƹen ṯiwecca, aqa ṯiwecca aḏ iysi nniṯ s umnus i yixef nnes. Ȓhemm iy d imeḍehharen nhar nni aḏ ikfa nhar nni.
War tƹeyyabem ḥadd ḥima war kenniw itƹeyyib ca Arebbi.
Mammec ɣa ṯƹeyybem amenni i kenniw iy ɣa iƹeyyeb Arebbi. Ȓaƹbar nni iy ṯsexḏamem ḏ wenni iy kiḏwem ɣa isexḏem Arebbi.
Mayemmi tseḥqareḏ cwayt n uȓum ig iǧan ḏi ṯiṭṭ n wumac, cek tettuḏ akeccuḍ ig iǧan ḏi ṯiṭṭ nnec?
Mammec teggeḏ ṯzeƹƹmeḏ aḏ tiniḏ i wumac: Ejj-ayi aḏac d kkseɣ ȓum-a ig iǧan ḏi ṯiṭṭ nnec, cek ƹaḏ tejjiḏ akeccuḍ ḏi ṯiṭṭ nnec?
A lmunafiq, kkes ḏ amezwaru akeccuḍ zi ṯiṭṭ nnec. Ƹaḏ iy ɣa ṯetwaȓiḏ mliḥ ḥima aḏ tekkseḏ ȓum zi ṯiṭṭ n wumac.
War ticceṯ ca min iqeddsen n Arebbi i iqzinen ḥima war ɣarwem d teƹqiben akenniw mezzqen. War neṭṭareṯ ca jjuwhar nwem zzaṯ i yiȓfan ḥima war xasen ƹeffsen ca.
Ttarem, ataf aḏawem immuc. Rezzum, ataf aḏ tafem. Sqerqubem, ataf aḏawem rezmen.
Minzi marra wenni ɣa ittaren aḏas immuc. Wenni ɣa irzun aḏ yaf. Wenni ɣa isqerqben aḏas ṯnurzem ṯewwarṯ.
Meȓa can yijjen zzaywem ittar-as mmis aɣrum, ma aḏas yuc azru ḏeg umcan n uɣrum nni? Lla!
Meȓa ittar-as asȓem, ma aḏas yuc fiɣer? Lla!
Meȓa kenniw ḏ iƹeffanen ṯessnem aḏ tucem i ṯarwa nwem min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan, ataf Babaṯwem ig iǧan ḏeg ujenna itegg ktar. Iticc min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan i yinni ḏas ṯ itettaren.
Ggeṯ i yiwḏan min ṯexsem aḏawem ggen. Manaya ḏ ȓmaƹna n Ccariƹa n Musa ḏ ttaƹalim n lʼanbiya.
Aḏfeṯ zi ṯewwarṯ iḥṣaren minzi ṯawwarṯ nni itawin ɣar jahennama ṯiriw aṭṭas, abriḏ nnes isheȓ. Aṭṭas iy zzayes iƹeddun.
Walakin ṯawwarṯ iḥṣaren ḏ ubriḏ iqesḥen niṯni tawin ɣar ṯuḏarṯ. Ḏrus iy ɣa iƹḏun ssenni.
Ḥḍam ixef nwem zeg yinni itarran ixef nsen ḏ lʼanbiya. Tasen-d ɣarwem am can n iḥuȓiyen walakin ḏeg wuȓawen nsen ḏ uccanen iwƹaren.
Aṯen ṯessnem s ȓefƹayeȓ nsen. Ma zemmaren yiwḏan aḏ ȓeqḏen ṯazarṯ zeg isennanen, niɣ aḏ kksen aḍiȓ zi ṯzeggwarṯ?
Ṯacejjarṯ ṯaṣebḥant tarew min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan. Ṯacejjarṯ ṯaƹeffant tarew min iǧan ḏ aƹeffan.
Ṯacejjarṯ ṯaṣebḥant war tirew ca min iǧan ḏ aƹeffan. Ṯenni ṯaƹeffant war tirew ca min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan.
Marra ṯacejjarṯ iy war itirwen ca min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan aḏ twaqess aḏ tmenḍar ḏi ṯmessi.
Ammu s ȓefƹayeȓ nsen iy ɣa ṯessnem yinni itarran ixef nsen ḏ l'anbiya.
Maci marra yinni iy ḏayi iqqaren a Siḏi a Siḏi aḏ aḏfen ɣar ȓmulk ujenna; Lla, war ṯ tiḏfen ca illa yinni iteggen min ixes Baba ig iǧan ḏeg ujenna.

Ḏi Yum Lḥisab ḏ Lƹiqab aṭṭas iy ḏayi ɣa inin: A Siḏi a Siḏi, yak s lḥikma n yisem nnec iy zi tuɣa nseȓmaḏ i yiwḏan? Yak s lḥikma n yisem nnec iy zi tuɣa nsufuɣ jnun? Yak s lḥikma n yisem nnec iy zi tuɣa ntegg ȓaƹjayeb?
Ȓexddenni aḏasen iniɣ: Tuɣayi nec ƹemmarṣ war kenniw ssineɣ ca. Beƹƹḏeṯ xafi a yinni iteggen ccarr!
Marra wenni itsȓan i wawaȓ inu ixeddem zzayes, netta am yijjen n bnaḏem ḏ amiɣis ibna ṯaddarṯ nnes x uzru.
Yuwṯa unẓar, ḥemȓen-d iɣezran, iṣuḍ-d arriḥ ijheḏ iƹḏu x ṯeddarṯ nni. Waxxa amenni war ṯewḍi ca ȓaḥeqqac ṯebna x dsas n uzru.
Marra wenni itsȓan i wawaȓ inu war zzayes ixeddem ca, netta am yijjen n ufɣuȓ ibna ṯaddarṯ nnes x yijḏi.
Yuwṯa unẓar, ḥemȓen-d iɣezran, iṣuḍ-d arriḥ ijheḏ iƹḏu x ṯeddarṯ nni. Ȓexddenni ṯewḍa, ṯeqqim ḏ ȓxirbeṯ."
Wami ikemmeȓ Ƹisa awaȓ nnes, tƹejjben ȓɣaci zeg useȓmeḏ nnes
minzi ɣares ssulṭa iy zi iseȓmaḏ, war iǧi bu amecnaw imseȓmaḏen nsen n ccariƹa.
Wami d ihwa Ƹisa zeg uḏrar nni ḏfaren-ṯ aṭṭas n ȓɣaci.
Iqarreb-d ɣares ijjen ḏayes jḏam, isejjeḏ-as inna-as: "A Siḏi, cek meȓa ṯexseḏ ṯzemmareḏ aḏayi ṯessiṣfiḏ."
Isers xas Ƹisa fus nnes iḥaḏa-ṯ inna-as: "Wah nec xseɣ, cek qa ṯgenfiḏ." Ṣafi ḏeg umcan igenfa umehȓuc nni zi jḏam nnes.
Inna-as Ƹisa: "Xzar, war txebbar ḥadd." Inna-as: "Ruḥ ɣar ȓefqi seḍhar-as ixef nnec. Egg ṣṣeḏqeṯ nni iy zi iweṣṣa Musa ḥima aɣarsen ṯiȓi chaḏeṯ x min iweqƹen."
Wami yuḏef Ƹisa ɣar ubilaj n Kafernaḥum, yusa-d ɣares ijjen n uƹaskari ḏ ameqqran n arrumanus. Iṭaleb-iṯ
inna-as: "A Siḏi, aqa ɣari axeddam inu ḏ anecruf ḏi ṯeddarṯ itnezbar aṭṭas ḏi ṯassuṯ."
Inna-as Ƹisa: "Aḏ raḥeɣ aṯ sgenfiɣ."
Indeq-d uƹaskari nni ameqqran inna-as: "Lla a Siḏi, nec war sḏihiǧeɣ ca aḏ taḏfeḏ ɣar ṯeddarṯ inu. Ini ɣir ijjen n wawaȓ u ṣafi ataf aḏ igenfa uxeddam inu.
Uȓa ḏ nec s yixef inu ɣari yinni xafi iḥekkmen. Ɣari ȓƹaskar x ufus inu ḥekkmeɣ xasen. Aḏ iniɣ i yijjen: Ruḥ, aḏ iraḥ. Aḏ iniɣ i yijjen: Araḥ-d, aḏ d yas. Aḏ iniɣ i uxeddam inu: Egg ṯa, at igg."
Wami isȓa Ƹisa i manayenni itƹejjeb aṭṭas. Inna-asen i yinni ṯ iḏfaren: "Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Yinni iǧan zi Ayṯ-Israʼil war ḏaysen ufiɣ bu lʼiman imɣar aṭṭas am wanita!
Aqa qqareɣ-awem: Aḏ d asen aṭṭas n yiwḏan zi ccarq ḏ ȓɣarb aḏ qqimen ak Brahim ḏ Isḥaq ḏ Yaƹqub ɣar missa ḏi ȓmulk ujenna.
Walakin yinni tuɣa itxeṣṣa aḏ warṯen ȓmulk n Arebbi, ataf aḏ menḍaren ɣar barra ḏi ṯaǧest mani ɣa iȓin imeṭṭawen ḏ uɣeẓẓaẓ n ṯeɣmas."
Inna-as Ƹisa i uƹaskari nni: "Ruḥ! Aɣarec yiȓi anect min ṯumneḏ." Ȓexddenni igenfa uxeddam nni.
Wami yuḏef Ƹisa ɣar ṯeddarṯ n Buṭrus, yufa ṯaḏeggwaȓṯ n Buṭrus ḏi ṯassuṯ ḏayes ṯimessi.
Ɣir iḥaḏa-t s ufus ṯruḥ xas ṯmessi, ṯekkar ṯebḏa tsexxar xas.
Wami ṯeɣȓi ṯfuct ɣar ṯmeddiṯ, uwin-d ɣar Ƹisa aṭṭas n yinni ḏi ǧan jnun. S lʼamar nnes isufuɣ zzaysen jnun isgenfa marra yinni iheȓcen.
Manayenni ḥima aḏ ikemmeȓ wawaȓ iy inna Siḏi Arebbi i nnabi Icaƹya ḏeg yijjen n zman: "Iysi xaneɣ ȓeḥriqaṯ nneɣ, yarbu ȓehȓacaṯ nneɣ."
Wami iẓra Ƹisa aṭṭas n yiwḏan iy ḏas d innḍen, ikkar yumar imeḥḍaren nnes inna-asen: Yallah a neẓwam ɣar ujemmaḍ-in.
Iqarreb-d ɣares ijjen n umseȓmaḏ n ccariƹa inna-as: "A Lmuƹallim, nec ac ḏfareɣ mani ma ṯruḥeḏ."
Inna-as Ƹisa: "Uccanen ɣarsen ifran nsen, ijḍaḍ ɣarsen ȓaƹwac nsen, walakin Mmis n bnaḏem war ɣares uȓa ḏ mani ɣa isummeṯ azeǧif nnes."
Ƹaweḏ inna-as ij umeḥḍar nnes: "A Siḏi, sameḥ-ayi ḏ amezwaru aḏ raḥeɣ aḏ neḍȓeɣ baba."
Inna-as Ƹisa: "Ḏfar-ayi-d." Inna-as: "Yinni immuṯen ejj-iṯen aḏ neḍȓen imettinen nsen."
Inya Ƹisa ḏi ṯɣarrabut, ḏfaren-ṯ imeḥḍaren nnes.
Bȓa ȓexbar, ṯekkar-d ijjen n lƹaṣifa ṯejheḏ aṭṭas ḏi ȓebḥar ṯebḏa ṯɣarrabut tƹemmar s waman. Ƹisa netta tuɣaṯ iṭṭeṣ.
Qarrben ɣares imeḥḍaren, sfaqen-ṯ nnan-as: "A Siḏi, nejja-yaneɣ aqa neccin netmetta!"
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Mayemmi teggwḏem qaƹ ammu? Lʼiman nwem ḏ uqlil." Ȓexddenni ikkar isbedd arriḥ ḏ ȓemwaj, yarsa ȓḥaȓ.
Qqimen iryazen nni tƹejjben ḏayes nnan: "Min iƹna wanitan? Uȓa ḏ arriḥ ḏ ȓebḥar tṭaƹan-as!"
Wami yuweḍ Ƹisa ɣar ujemmaḍ-in n ȓebḥar ɣar ṯmurṯ n ijariṯiyen, ȓqan-ṯ-iḏ ṯnayen n yiwḏan ḏaysen jnun ffɣen-d zeg imeḍȓan mani zeddɣen. Qesḥen, ccaṯen, war izemmar ḥadd axasen ikk x ubriḏ nni.
Ƹeyyḍen nnan-as: "Min ṯexseḏ zzayneɣ a Mmis n Arebbi? Ma ṯusiḏ-d aḏaneɣ ṯƹeddbeḏ qbeȓ i ȓweqṯ?"
Ɣar ȓeggwaj cwayt, ḏinni ijjen n ṯḥimerṯ ḏ ṯameqqrant n yiȓfan ṯarwes.
Jnun nni ttaren zi Ƹisa nnan-as: "Meȓa ṯsufɣeḏ-aneɣ, sekk-aneɣ ɣar ṯḥimerṯ-in n yiȓfan ḥima aḏaysen naḏef."
Inna-asen Ƹisa i jnun nni: "Ruḥem!" Ȓexddenni ffɣen zi ṯnayen nni n yiwḏan uḏfen ḏeg yiȓfan. Ṯehwa ṯḥimerṯ nni marra ḏi ṯeysarṯ ɣar ȓebḥar mmuṯen ḏeg waman.
Yinni yarewsen arewȓen ruḥen ɣar ubilaj, sufɣen ȓexbar ḏinni x marra min iweqƹen ḏ min iweqƹen i yiwḏan nni ḏi ǧan jnun.
Ȓexddenni ffɣen-d marra iwḏan n ubilaj bac aḏ raḥen aḏ ȓqan Ƹisa. Wami ṯ ẓrin, ḥeccmen-ṯ ḥima axasen ibeƹƹeḏ zi jjiheṯ nsen.
Inya Ƹisa ḏi ṯɣarrabut, iqḍeƹ ȓebḥar irewweḥ ɣar dcar nnes.
Ḏinni can yiwḏan uwin-d ɣares ijjen n uryaz mmuṯen-as iḍaren, izzeȓ ḏi ṯassuṯ nnes. Wami Ƹisa iẓra lʼiman iy ḏaysen inna-as i unecruf nni: "War teggweḏ ca a mmi, qa twaɣfarent-ac ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nnec."
Ḏinni can imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa qqaren ḏeg wuȓawen nsen: "Bnaḏem-a iqqar awaȓ war iḥȓin x Arebbi."
Ƹisa issen min tfekkaren ḏi ȓaƹquȓaṯ nsen inna-asen: "Mayemmi tfekkarem ammu ḏi min war iḥȓin?
Min isehȓen aṭṭas aḏas iniɣ i unecruf-a, ma aḏas iniɣ: Twaɣfarent-ac ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nnec? Niɣ ma aḏas iniɣ: Kkar cek uyur?
Nec xseɣ aḏ tessnem belli Mmis n bnaḏem ɣares ssulṭa x ṯmurṯ ḥima aḏ iɣfar ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ." Uca inna-as i unecruf nni: "Kkar, ysi ṯassuṯ nnec, ruḥ aḏ trewwḥeḏ ɣar ṯeddarṯ nnec!"
Ikkar uryaz nni irewweḥ.
Wami ẓrin yiwḏan manayenni, ggwḏen ḥemḏen Arebbi x ssulṭa iy ḏasen iticc i yiwḏan.
Wami yuyur ssenni Ƹisa, yufa ijjen n uryaz qqaren-as Matta iqqim ḏeg umcan mani jemmƹen ḍḍariba. Inna-as Ƹisa: "Ḏfar-ayi-d." Uca ikkar Matta iḏfar-iṯ.
Iqqim Ƹisa ḏi ṯeddarṯ n Matta itett netta ḏ imeḥḍaren nnes. Aṭṭas n iƹeccaren ḏ yinni iƹeṣṣan zaƹma qqimen tetten akiḏes.
Wami ẓrin ȓḥizeb n ifarrisiyen manayenni kkaren nnan-asen i imeḥḍaren nnes: "Mayemmi itett lmuƹallim nwem ak iƹeccaren ḏ yinni iƹeṣṣan?"
Isȓa-yasen Ƹisa inna-asen: "Iwḏan iṣeḥḥan war teḥḏijin bu uḍbib, aḍbib teḥḏajan-ṯ imehȓac.
Ruḥem rzum x ȓmaƹna n lʼaya iy iqqaren: Xseɣ aḏ treḥmem iwḏan, war xseɣ bu aḏ tɣarṣem i ȓebhayem." Inna-asen: "War d usiɣ ca aḏ ȓaɣiɣ i yinni iǧan nican, usiɣ-d aḏ ȓaɣiɣ i yinni iƹeṣṣan!"
Ṯumma qarrben-d imeḥḍaren n Yaḥya ɣar Ƹisa nnan-as: "Mayemmi neccin ḏ ȓḥizeb n ifarrisiyen ȓebda netẓumma, imeḥḍaren nnec war tẓummin ca?"
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Imeddukaȓ n muȓay, ma zemmaren aḏ xeyyqen ḏi nhar nni n ȓfarḥ nnes? Lla, walakin aḏ d asen wussan aḏ imeysi muȓay zi ȓwesṭ nsen. Ȓexddenni aḏ ẓummen!
War iǧi ḥadd itreqqaƹ arruḍ ḏ ȓbaȓi s yijjen n ṯreqqiƹṯ n ttub ḏ jḏiḏ, mayemmi? Ȓaḥeqqac ṯareqqiƹṯ nni n jḏiḏ aḏ tnejmeƹ uca aḏ twakkes zeg warruḍ nni n ȓbaȓi. Ȓexddenni aḏ iqqim ucarrig imɣar!

Uȓa ḏ aman n uḍiȓ ḏ jḏiḏ war xeǧqen ca ḏeg yiȓemawen iqḏimen, ḥima war dduqquzen war tzeǧiƹen ca waman n uḍiȓ aḏ ḍeyyƹen yiȓemawen nni. Walakin aman n uḍiȓ ḏ jḏiḏ xeǧqen ḏeg yiȓemawen ḏ jḏiḏ. Amenni war tḍeyyiƹ uȓa ḏ ijjen n ȓḥajeṯ: lla aman uḍiȓ, lla iȓemawen."
Wami tuɣa ƹaḏ iqqar Ƹisa manaya, yusa-d ɣares ijjen n arrayes isejjeḏ-as inna-as: "Yeǧi qa ȓexxu iy ṯemmuṯ. Yallah akiḏi sers xas fus nnec ḥima aḏ teddar."
Ikkar Ƹisa iḏfar-iṯ netta ḏ imeḥḍaren nnes.
Ḏinni ijjen n ṯemɣarṯ ṯenƹac iseggwusa zeg wami iy ṯehȓec, tazzeȓ s iḏammen. Ṯeḏfar Ƹisa, ṯḥaḏa-yas ṭṭarf n useȓham nnes.
Ṯenna qbeȓ ḏeg wuȓ nnes: "Meȓa ḥaḏiɣ ɣir aseȓham nnes ataf aḏ genfiɣ."
Ineqȓeb ɣares Ƹisa iẓri-t uca inna-as: "War teggweḏ ca a yeǧi, cem lʼiman nnem isgenfa-cem." Ṯgenfa ṯemɣarṯ nni ȓexddenni.
Wami yuweḍ Ƹisa ɣar ṯeddarṯ n arrayes nni, itwaȓa ḏinni ȓebƹaḍ zi ȓɣaci itzemmaren lmusiqa umettin u ḏ yijjen n lharaj.
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Ffɣem ssa! Aqa ṯaḥenjirṯ-a war ṯemmuṯ ca, ṯeṭṭeṣ waha!" Ȓexddenni bḏan ḍeḥḥcen xas.
Wami sufɣen iwḏan nni, yuḏef ɣar uxxam iṭṭef-as ḏeg ufus i ṯḥenjirṯ nni uca ṯekkar.
Iffeɣ ȓexbar ɣar marra ayṯbab n ṯmurṯ nni.
Yuyur ssenni Ƹisa, ḏfaren-ṯ ṯnayen n iḍarɣaȓen tȓaɣan qqaren: "A Mmis n Ayṯ-Dawed, rḥem-aneɣ!"
Wami yuḏef Ƹisa ɣar ṯeddarṯ, qarrben ɣares iḍarɣaȓen nni. Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Ma ṯumnem belli nec zemmareɣ aḏ ggeɣ manaya?" Nnan-as: "Wah a Siḏi."
Uca iḥaḏa-yasen Ƹisa ṯiṭṭawin inna-asen: "Ƹlaḥsab lʼiman nwem iy ɣa twagenfam."
Ȓexddenni nurzment ṯiṭṭawin nsen. Iƹȓem-asen Ƹisa inna-asen: "Ɣarwem aḏ iffeɣ ȓexbar-a ɣar ca ḥadd!"
Walakin niṯni ruḥen sufɣen ȓexbar nni x Ƹisa ḏi ṯmurṯ nni marra.
Ḏi ȓweqṯ iy ḏi ruḥen, can yiwḏan uwin-as-d i Ƹisa ijjen n uryaz ḏ azeynun ḏayes jjenn.
Wami isufeɣ Ƹisa jjenn nni, ibḏa uzeynun nni issawaȓ. Qqimen tƹejjben ȓɣaci nni nnan: "Ƹemmarṣ ma iwqeƹ manaya ḏi ṯmurṯ n Ayṯ-Israʼil."
Walakin ȓḥizeb n ifarrisiyen nnan: "Netta isufuɣ jnun ȓaḥeqqac arrayes n jnun yuca-as jjheḏ-a."
Yuyur Ƹisa ḏi marra ṯineddam ḏ ȓedcur, iseȓmaḏ ḏi ṯemziḏawin n Ayṯ-Israʼil itḥeddaṯ itbeccar s ȓmulk n Arebbi. Isgenfa marra ȓehȓacaṯ ḏ ddiƹan n ddat.
Iẓerr Ƹisa ȓɣaci nni qqsen-as minzi twaƹeddaben tnehwaȓen, ggin amecnaw iḥuȓiyen war ɣarsen ca uw ṯen ɣa yarewsen.
Inna-asen i imeḥḍaren nnes: "Ṯafeǧaḥṯ aṭṭas walakin ḏrus icewwaren iy ɣa ixeḏmen.
Ttareṯ zi Bab n ṯfeǧaḥṯ aḏ yarni icewwaren ḏeg umarjeƹ nnes."
Iȓaɣa-d Ƹisa x ṯenƹac nni n imeḥḍaren nnes yuca-asen ssulṭa iy zi ɣa sufɣen jnun aḏ sgenfan marra ȓehȓacaṯ ḏ ȓeḥriqaṯ n yiwḏan.
Ḏ yina ḏ isemawen n ṯenƹac n arrusul: Amezwaru nsen qqaren-as Simƹan maƹruf s Buṭrus ḏ wumas qqaren-as Andrus, ḏ mmis n Zabadi qqaren-as Yaƹqub ḏ wumas qqaren-as Yuḥanna,
ḏ Filippas, ḏ Bartulumay, ḏ Tuma, ḏ Matta zeg iƹeccaren, ḏ Yaƹqub mmis n Ḥalfa, ḏ Taddi,
ḏ Simƹan umi qqaren <Lmunaḍil>, ḏ Yahuḏa Isxaryuṭi iƹni wenni izzenzen Ƹisa.
Ṯenƹac-a n iryazen issekk-iṯen Ƹisa iweṣṣa-ṯen inna-asen: "War traḥem ca ɣar ṯmura n ȓegnus. War tiḏfem bu ṯineddam n ṯmurṯ n Samarya.
Lla, ruḥeṯ ɣar iḥuȓiyen nni iweddaren iƹni iwḏan n Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Xmi ɣa ṯraḥem, ḥeddṯem s ȓmulk ujenna aqa yuḏes-d.
Sgenfam imehȓac, sfaqem-d yinni immuṯen, siṣfam yinni ig iǧa jḏam, sufɣem jnun. Manaya immuc-awem baṭeȓ, uȓa ḏ kenniw ucem-ṯ baṭeȓ!
War debbarem walu: lla ddheb, lla nnuqarṯ, lla nneḥḥas ḏeg uḥezzam nwem.
War debbarem bu uqrab x ubriḏ uȓa ḏ ṯnayen ičammiren, uȓa ḏ ṯisiȓa, uȓa ḏ aƹekkaz. Minzi wenni itbeccaren ɣares ȓḥaqq aḏ itxaȓes aɣrum nnes.
Xmi ɣa ṯaḏfem can ṯendint niɣ can dcar, rzum x wenni kenniw ɣa iqebȓen ɣar ṯeddarṯ nnes. Qqimeṯ ḏayes aȓ ɣa ṯuyurem ssenni.
Xmi ɣa ṯaḏfem ɣar can ṯeddarṯ, seǧmem x ayṯbab nnes.
Meȓa qebȓen-kenniw ayṯbab nnes, ataf akiḏsen ṯiȓi lbaraka nwem. Meȓa war kenniw qbiȓen ca, ataf war kisen tɣimi ca lbaraka nwem.
Meȓa war kenniw qbiȓen ca ḏi can ṯeddarṯ niɣ ḏi can ṯendint niɣ meȓa war xsen aɣarwem ṣennṭen, ffɣeṯ ssenni mesḥeṯ ṯaƹejjact zeg iḍaren nwem.
Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Ḏi Yum Lḥisab ḏ Lƹiqab aḏ yiȓi lƹiqab n ṯendint nni ktar zi lƹiqab n ṯendint ṯaƹeffant n Sadum ḏ ṯendint ṯaƹeffant n Ƹamura.
Nec aqa ssekkiɣ-kenniw amecnaw iḥuȓiyen jar wuccanen. Iȓim ṯfaqem amecnaw ifiɣeran, iȓim ḏ nniyyeṯ amecnaw iḏbiren.
Ḥḍam ixef nwem zeg yiwḏan. Akenniw sellmen i lmaḥkamaṯ; akenniw uwṯen ḏi ṯemziḏawin nsen.
Akenniw jarren ɣar lḥukkam ḏ izeǧiḏen ƹlaḥsab isem inu ḥima axafi ṯcehḏem ɣar niṯni ḏ yinni zi ȓegnus.
Xmi kenniw ɣa sellmen, bȓa ma aḏ teysim amnus ḏi ȓaƹquȓaṯ nwem min ɣa ṯinim niɣ ḏ mammec iy ɣa ṯessiwȓem; Lla, awaȓen nni iy ɣa ṯinim ḏ Arebbi iy ḏawem ṯen ɣa yucen ḏi ṯsaƹƹat nni.
War iǧi bu ḏ kenniw iy ɣa issiwȓen; Lla, ḏ Arruḥ n Babaṯwem iy ɣa issiwȓen ḏeg umcan nwem.
Umas aḏ isellem umas i ȓmewṯ. Babas aḏ isellem mmis. Ṯarwa aḏ raḥen ḍed i lwalidin nsen, aṯen sellmen i yinni iy ṯen ɣa nɣen.
Akenniw ƹiffen marra ƹlaḥsab isem inu, walakin wenni ɣa iṣbaren ɣar uneggaru ataf aḏ injem.
Meȓa ƹeddben-kenniw ḏi can ṯendint, arewȓem ɣar ṯenneɣni. Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Aḏ d yas Mmis n bnaḏem, ataf kenniw ƹaḏ war ṯkemmȓem x min kenniw weṣṣiɣ ḏi ṯneddam n Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Ameḥḍar war iǧi ca ḏ ameqqran x lmuƹallim nnes. Axeddam war iǧi ca ḏ ameqqran x uweqqaf nnes.
Baraka ɣir aḏ yiȓi umeḥḍar am lmuƹallim nnes, aḏ yiȓi uxeddam am uweqqaf nnes. Meȓa ȓaɣan i bab n ṯeddarṯ <A Ibȓis>, iwa mammec ɣa ȓaɣan i ȓeḥbab n ṯeddarṯ nnes?
War teggwḏem ca zzaysen. Marra min itwasnuffaren aḏ inefḍeḥ. Marra min inuffaren aḏ itwassen!
Min ḏawem qqareɣ ḏi ṯaǧest, ƹawḏem-as ḏi ṯfawṯ n nhar. Min tesȓam s ȓḥess, ƹeyyḍeṯ zzayes x ṯzeqqa.
War teggwḏeṯ ca zeg yinni ineqqen ddat war zemmaren aḏ nɣen uȓa ḏ ȓaƹmar; Lla, ggwḏeṯ zi Arebbi iƹni wenni izemmaren aḏ idemmar ddat ḏ ȓaƹmar ḏi jahennama.
Ma war tmenzin ṯnayen n izawjiwen s duru? Walakin, war zzaysen iweṭṭi uȓa ḏ ijjen ɣar ṯmurṯ meȓa war ixis ca Babaṯwem.
Uȓa ḏ izuṭṭan iy ɣarwem x uzeǧif nwem iḥseb-iṯen Arebbi marra.
War teggwḏem ca. Kenniw ṯseggwam ktar s waṭṭas x izawjiwen.
Wenni zzayi ɣa icehḏen nec zzaṯ i yiwḏan, ataf azzayes cehḏeɣ nec zzaṯ i Baba iǧan ḏeg ujenna.
Wenni ḏayi ɣa inkaren zzaṯ i yiwḏan, ataf aṯ nkareɣ nec zzaṯ i Baba iǧan ḏeg ujenna.
War tfekkarem ca belli usiɣ-d aḏ ggeɣ ȓehna ḏi ddunect-a. War d usiɣ ca aḏ ggeɣ ȓehna; Lla, usiɣ-d aḏ ggeɣ amenɣi.
Usiɣ-d aḏ smenɣeɣ mmis ak babas, ḏ yeǧis ak yemmas, ḏ ṯsȓiṯ ak lallas.
Aḏ yiȓi ȓaƹḏu n bnaḏem ḏ ȓeḥbab iy kis izeddɣen ḏi ṯeddarṯ nnes.
Wenni xef iƹizz babas niɣ ḏ yemmas ktar zzayi nec, ataf war ḏayi isḏiheǧ ca. Wenni xef iƹizz mmis niɣ ḏ yeǧis ktar zzayi nec, ataf war ḏayi isḏiheǧ ca.
Wenni itagin aḏ iysi ṣṣalib nnes aḏayi iḏfar nec, ataf war ḏayi isḏiheǧ ca.
Wenni ɣa irebḥen ṯuḏarṯ nnes, ataf at ixsar. Wenni ɣa ixsaren ṯuḏarṯ nnes x ssabab inu, ataf at irbeḥ.
Wenni kenniw iqebbȓen, ataf iqbeȓ-ayi. Wenni ḏayi iqebbȓen, ataf iqbeȓ wenni ḏayi d issekken.
Wenni iqebbȓen can n nnabi ȓaḥeqqac issekk-iṯ-iḏ Arebbi, ataf aɣares yiȓi lʼajar amecnaw can n nnabi. Wenni iqebbȓen can n ȓmumen ȓaḥeqqac ḏ ȓmumen, ataf aɣares yiȓi lʼajar amecnaw can n ȓmumen.
Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Wenni ɣa yucen ɣir ȓkas n waman ḏ asemmaḍ i can yijjen zeg imezyanen-a ȓaḥeqqac ḏ ameḥḍar inu, ataf aḏ yawi lʼajar nnes war ṯ itḍeyyiƹ ca."
Wami ikemmeȓ Ƹisa ȓuṣiyaṯ i ṯenƹac n imeḥḍaren nnes, yuyur ssenni iruḥ ḥima aḏ iseȓmeḏ aḏ iḥeddeṯ ḏi ṯneddam iy d yuḏsen jjiheṯ nni.
Wami Yaḥya aqaṯ ḏi ȓeḥbes, isȓa x ȓexḏayem n Lmasiḥ. Issekk can imeḥḍaren nnes ɣar Ƹisa
ḥima aḏas inin: "Ma ḏ cek iy xef netsȓa aḏ d taseḏ niɣ a nraja can yijjen nneɣni?"
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-asen: "Ƹeqbeṯ ɣar Yaḥya ƹawḏem-as min tesȓam ḏ min twaȓam:
iḍarɣaȓen twaȓan, izeḥḥafen gguren, yinni iy ḏi iǧa jḏam genfan, iḏehcuren tesȓan, yinni immuṯen tnekkaren-d, ȓmusakin twabeccaren.
Ssaƹḏ n yinni war ḏayi itcekkin ca."
Wami rewwḥen imeḥḍaren n Yaḥya, Ƹisa ibḏa issawaȓ x Yaḥya iqqar-asen i ȓɣaci nni: "Minxef ṯeffɣem aḏ teẓrem ḏi ȓexȓa? Ma ɣar yij uɣanim ithezza-ṯ arriḥ? Lla!
Meȓa lla, minxef ṯeffɣem aḏ teẓrem? Ma ḏ ijjen n uryaz yareḍ arruḍ ḏ aṣebḥan? Lla, yinni iy ɣar iǧa warruḍ ḏ aṣebḥan tƹicen mliḥ tiȓin ḏi ȓquṣur n izeǧiḏen!
Meȓa lla, minxef ṯeffɣem aḏ teẓrem? Ma ḏ ijjen n nnabi? Qqareɣ-awem: Wah, netta ktar zeg yijjen n nnabi.
Ḏ Yaḥya iy xef issawaȓ Lkitab: Aqa tsekkiɣ-d ijjen n arrasul inu zzaṯec, ḥima aḏac isewjeḏ abriḏ nnec.
Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Zi min d jjint ṯemɣarin, war iǧi ḥadd ḏ ameqqran zi Yaḥya, walakin wenni iy iǧan ḏ amezyan qaƹ ḏi ȓmulk n ujenna netta ḏ ameqqran zi Yaḥya.
Zi ȓweqṯ n Yaḥya aȓ ȓexxu iwḏan temḏeḥḥasen aḏ aḏfen ḏi ȓmulk ujenna, iryazen tmenɣan bac aɣarsen yiȓi.
Aqa Ccariƹa n Musa ḏ qaƹ lʼanbiya ssiwȓen x ȓmulk ujenna ḥetta aȓ ȓweqṯ n Yaḥya.
U meȓa ṯexsem aḏ tfehmem, Yaḥya netta ḏ nnabi Ilyas nni iy netraja.
Ṣenneṭ mliḥ a wenni itsȓan.
X manaya wi ḏi ɣa cabbheɣ iwḏan n ȓweqṯ-a? Niṯni am ca n iḥenjiren iy iqqimen ḏi saḥa tȓaɣan i wayawya qqaren:
Netṣuḍ ḏi ṯemja, war ṯecḍiḥem ca. Netƹezza-kenniw, war ṯetrum ca.
Minzi Yaḥya yusa-d itẓumma war isess aman n uḍiȓ, nnan aqa ḏayes jnun!
Yusa-d Mmis n bnaḏem itett isess war itẓummi ca, nnan qa wanita itett isess aṭṭas, ƹaweḏ netta ḏ ameddukeȓ n iƹeccaren ḏ yinni iƹeṣṣan. Innama, ȓefhameṯ n Arebbi qebbȓen-teṯ marra yinni ifehhmen."
Ssenni ibḏa Ƹisa itƹeyyab ṯineddam nni iy ḏi igga aṭṭas n lmuƹjizaṯ nnes, war tuben ca ayṯbab nsent.

Inna Ƹisa: "Ya ȓefḍiḥeṯ nnec ya abilaj n Kurazim! Ya ȓefḍiḥeṯ nnec ya abilaj n Bayt Ṣayda! Maƹlik lmuƹjizaṯ-a iy ḏaywem iweqƹen, weqƹent ḏi ṯneddam ṯiƹeffanin n Ṣur ḏ Ṣayda, ataf ayṯbab nsent tuben mecḥaȓ zeg wami, iȓi ggin arruḍ n lḥuzen qqimen x yiɣɣeḏ ḥima aḏ d tban tuba nsen.
X manayenni aḏawem iniɣ: Aqa ṯineddam ṯiƹeffanin nni n Ṣur ḏ Ṣayda aḏ iȓint ḥsen zzaywem ḏi Yum Lḥisab ḏ Lƹiqab.

Y cek, ay abilaj n Kafernaḥum! Ma tɣir-ac aḏ tgaƹƹḏeḏ ɣar ujenna? Lla, qa cek aḏ tehwiḏ ɣar Ljaḥim. Ȓaḥeqqac lmuƹjizaṯ nni iy ḏayec iweqƹen mȓi weqƹent ḏi ṯendint ṯaƹeffant nni n Sadum, iȓi ƹaḏ aqat ḏ ṯandint aȓ nhara.
X manayenni aḏawem iniɣ: Aqa ṯandint ṯaƹeffant nni n Sadum aḏ tiȓi ḥsen zzayec ḏi Yum Lḥisab ḏ Lƹiqab!"
Ȓexddenni issiweȓ Ƹisa inna: "Ḥemḏeɣ-cek a Baba a Siḏi Arebbi n ujenna ḏ ṯmurṯ ȓaḥeqqac ṯesnuffareḏ manaya x imiɣisen ḏ lƹulama, ṯseḍhareḏ-ṯ-id i iḥenjiren imezyanen.
Wah a Baba, ȓaḥeqqac ammu iy xak yarḍa.
Immuc-ayi kuȓci zi Baba. War issin ḥadd min iƹna Mmis menɣir Babas. War issin ḥadd min iƹna Babas menɣir Mmis. Babas, aṯ ssnen ɣir yinni umi ixes Mmis aḏasen ṯiḏ ismeḍhar.
A yinni yuḥȓen s dqeȓ iy ṯarbum, araḥem-d ɣari marra kenniw nec akenniw sreyyḥeɣ.
Arbuṯ xawem ṯzayȓut inu, ȓemḏeṯ zzayi ȓaḥeqqac nec ḏ aṣebbar, war ḏayi bu ttakebbur. Ȓexddenni aḏ tafem arraḥeṯ i yixef nwem.
Ȓaḥeqqac meȓa ṯarbum ṯzayȓut inu nettaṯ aqa ṯehwan, dqeȓ inu ifsus.
Ḏeg wussan nni ḏi nhar n ssebṯ n lƹibada iƹḏu Ƹisa ḏeg ubriḏ ḏi ȓwesṭ n imendi, imeḥḍaren nnes ǧuzen gguren tekksen ṯiyḏerin tetten-ṯent.
Wami ṯen ẓrin ca n yiwḏan zi ȓḥizeb n ifarrisiyen nnan-as i Ƹisa: "Xzar! Imeḥḍaren nnec teggen min iǧan ḥram ḏi nhar n ssebṯ n lƹibada."
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-asen: "Ma war ṯeɣrim ca min igga Dawed wami tuɣa iǧuz netta ḏ yinni akiḏes?
Yuḏef ɣar ṯemziḏa n Arebbi yufa ḏinni aɣrum nni iy iǧan ḏ ṣṣeḏqeṯ icci-ṯ netta ḏ yinni iy kiḏes; waxxa manayenni war iǧi ca ḥalal ɣir i ȓfuqaha waha.
Niɣ war ṯeɣrim ca ḏi Ccariƹa n Musa belli ȓfuqaha txaȓafen zaƹma nhar n ssebṯ n lƹibada ḏi ṯemziḏa n Arebbi bȓa ma ṯen iḥasseb ḥadd?
Qqareɣ-awem: Ḏanita ḏinni ijjen ktar zi ṯemziḏa n Arebbi.
Mȓi ṯfehmem ȓmaƹna n wawaȓ-a iy iqqar Arebbi: <Xseɣ aḏ treḥmem iwḏan, war xseɣ ca aḏ tɣarṣem i ȓebhayem>, ataf war ṯḥekkmem ca x yinni war iggin minxef.
Ȓaḥeqqac Mmis n bnaḏem ig iǧan ḏ lḥakem x nhar n ssebṯ."
Yuyur ssenni Ƹisa, yuḏef ɣar yijjen n ṯemziḏa n Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Yufa ḏinni ijjen n uryaz fus nnes immuṯ. Ȓexddenni sseqsan Ƹisa rezzun aṯ tahmen nnan-as: "Ma ḥalal aḏ tesgenfiḏ can yijjen ḏi nhar n ssebṯ n lƹibada ma lla?"
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Meȓa can yijjen zzaywem ɣares ij uḥuȓi iwḍa-yas ḏi ṯsrafṯ ḏi nhar n lƹibada, ma ṯiḏ iṭṭef aṯiḏ isiȓi ma lla?
Iwa bnaḏem iseggwa aṭṭas s waṭṭas zeg yij uḥuȓi! Ƹlaḥsab manaya ḥalal aḏ teggeḏ ȓxir ḏi nhar n lƹibada."
Ȓexddenni inna-as Ƹisa i lmuƹaq nni: "Sarreḥ fus nnec." Isarreḥ-iṯ uca iḏweȓ ufus nnes igenfa, mliḥ am ufus nneɣni.
Ffɣen yiwḏan n ȓḥizeb n ifarrisiyen ciṭṭnen jarasen mammec ɣa ggen aḏ nɣen Ƹisa.
Issen Ƹisa manayenni yuyur ssenni. Ḏfaren-ṯ aberru n yiwḏan, isgenfa marra imehȓac nsen.
Iweṣṣa-ṯen inna-asen war txebbarem ḥadd xafi.
Manaya ḥima aḏ iffeɣ wawaȓ iy inna Siḏi Arebbi i nnabi Icaƹya ḏeg yijjen n zman:
<Ḏ wanita ḏ axeddam inu ig ixḍareɣ, wenni iy xafi iƹizzen iy xef arḍiɣ. Aḏayes ggeɣ Arruḥ iqeddsen, aḏ ixebbar yinni zi ȓegnus s ȓḥaqq.
War itmenɣi ak ḥadd, war isnekkar bu ṯɣuyyeṯ, war itsȓi ḥadd i wawaȓ nnes ḏeg ibriḏen.
War itrezzi bu ɣanim imeyyȓen, war isexsay ṯfawṯ n ṯefṯiȓt iteggen ddexxan, aȓ ɣa irbeḥ ȓḥaqq.
Ḏeg yisem nnes ȓegnus aḏ ggen lʼamal.>
Ssenni can yiwḏan uwin-as-d i Ƹisa ijjen n uryaz ḏ aḍarɣaȓ ḏ azeynun ḏayes jjenn. Isgenfa-ṯ Ƹisa ḥima aḏ issiweȓ aḏ itwaȓa.
Qqimen ȓɣaci nni tƹejjben marra nnan: "Maci ḏ wanita ig iǧan ḏ Mmis n Dawed niɣ?"
Tesȓan ȓḥizeb n ifarrisiyen i wawaȓ nsen nnan-asen: "Bnaḏem-a isufuɣ jnun minzi arrayes n jnun umi qqaren Bƹalzabul yuca-as jjheḏ-a."
Issen Ƹisa min nwan inna-asen: "Mkuȓ lmemlaka iy ḏi tmenɣan ayṯbab nnes ijjen ak unneɣni aḏ tnehḏem. Mkuȓ ṯandint niɣ ḏ ṯaddarṯ iy ḏi tmenɣan ayṯbab nnes ijjen ak unneɣni war ṯzemmar aḏ teqqim.
Meȓa Cciṭan isufuɣ Cciṭan, ataf aḏ iqḍa x yixef nnes. Mammec ɣa ṯegg aḏ teqqim lmemlaka nnes?
Nec meȓa sufuɣeɣ jnun s jjheḏ n Bƹalzabul nni zaƹma, inim-ayi kenniw mammec teggen yiwḏan nwem sufuɣen-ṯen uȓa ḏ niṯni? Niṯni s yixef nsen tbeyyanen belli kenniw war ɣarwem bu ȓḥaqq ḏi min ṯeqqarem.
Nec, meȓa sufuɣeɣ jnun s Arruḥ n Arebbi, aqa ȓmulk n Arebbi yusa-d ɣarwem.
Iwa mammec? War izemmar ḥadd aḏ ihjem x ṯeddarṯ n can yijjen ijheḏ bac aḏ yacar agȓa nnes illa meȓa icedd-iṯ ḏ amezwaru. Uca aḏas yawi marra min ɣares ḏi ṯeddarṯ.
Wenni war kiḏi iǧin ca, ataf aqaṯ ḍed inu. Wenni war kiḏi ismunen, ataf netta itzeǧaƹ.
Aqa qqareɣ-awem: Aḏ twaɣfarent marra ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ iy teggen yiwḏan ḏ kuȓ awaȓ nni war iḥȓin iy qqaren x Arebbi. Walakin wenni ɣa yinin can wawaȓ war iḥȓin x Arruḥ iqeddsen, ataf war ḏas iɣeffar ca.
Wenni ɣa yinin can wawaȓ war iḥȓin x Mmis n bnaḏem, ataf axas iɣfar. Walakin wenni ɣa yinin can wawaȓ war iḥȓin x Arruḥ iqeddsen, ataf war xas iɣeffar ca lla ḏi ddunect-a u lla ḏi lʼaxira.
Meȓa ṯacejjarṯ ḏ ṯaṣebḥant, ataf aḏ tarew min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan. Meȓa ṯacejjarṯ ḏ ṯaƹeffant, ataf aḏ tarew min iǧan ḏ aƹeffan. Ṯacejjarṯ ṯḍehhar-d s min tarew.
A ṯarwa ifiɣeran, mammec ɣa ṯeggem aḏ tinim awaȓ aṣebḥan u kenniw ḏ iƹeffanen? Ȓaḥeqqac aqemmum n bnaḏem issawaȓ min iǧan ḏeg wuȓ nnes.
Bnaḏem aṣebḥan isufuɣ-d min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan zi ȓkenz aṣebḥan n wuȓ nnes. Bnaḏem aƹeffan isufuɣ-d min iǧan ḏ aƹeffan zi ȓkenz aƹeffan n wuȓ nnes.
Aḏawem iniɣ: Aqa Yum Lḥisab ḏ Lƹiqab aḏ twaḥasben yiwḏan x mkuȓ awaȓ ixwan iy ssiwȓen.
Ȓaḥeqqac ƹlaḥsab awaȓen nnec aqac bariʼ, niɣ ƹlaḥsab awaȓen nnec aḏ twaƹaqbeḏ."
Ȓebƹaḍ n imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa ḏ ȓḥizeb n ifarrisiyen nnan-as i Ƹisa: "A Lmuƹallim, nexs a nẓer ijjen n lƹalama ḏ ṯameqqrant zzayek."
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-asen: "Iwḏan iƹeffanen n ȓweqṯ-a ixeddƹen Arebbi rezzun lƹalama. Inna-asen: Lla, war ḏasen itmucci illa lƹalama nni n nnabi Yunes.
Amec iseƹḏu Yunes ṯeȓtiyyam jar ǧiyaȓi ḏ wussan ḏeg uƹeddis n usȓem ameqqran, amenni iy ɣa iseƹḏu Mmis n bnaḏem ṯeȓtiyyam jar ǧiyaȓi ḏ wussan ḏeg uƹeddis n ṯmurṯ.
Yum Lḥisab ḏ Lƹiqab aḏ d kkaren imezḏaɣ n ṯendint n Ninwa ak yiwḏan n ȓweqṯ-a axasen ceṯcan, ȓaḥeqqac ayṯbab n ṯendint n Ninwa tuben wami ṯen inha nnabi Yunes. U ḏanita ijjen ḏ ameqqran zi Yunes.
Yum Lḥisab ḏ Lƹiqab aḏ tekkar lmalika n ljanub ak yiwḏan n ȓweqṯ-a axasen ṯceṯca, ȓaḥeqqac ṯusa-d nettaṯ zi ṯmurṯ yugjen ḥima aḏ tṣenneṭ i ȓefhameṯ n Suliman. U ḏanita ijjen ḏ ameqqran zi Suliman.
Cuf, xmi ɣa itwasufeɣ jjenn aƹeffan zi can bnaḏem, ataf aḏ iggur ḏeg imucan yuzɣen irezzu amcan mani ɣa ireyyeḥ. Meȓa war yufi ca,
ataf aḏ yini aqa nec aḏ raḥeɣ aḏ ḏewȓeɣ ɣar ṯeddarṯ inu manis iy ffɣeɣ. Ssenni aɣares iḏweȓ at yaf ṯexwa, ṯeƹḏeȓ, ṯenqa.

Uca aḏ iraḥ aḏ d yawi sebƹa n jnun nneɣni ḏ iƹeffanen ktar zzayes ḥima aḏ ḏewȓen kuȓci aḏayes zeḏɣen. Ataf aḏ tiȓi lḥala ṯaneggarut n bnaḏem nni ḏ ṯaƹeffant ktar zi lḥala nnes ṯamezwarut. Amenni iy ḏasen ɣa ṯewqeƹ i yiwḏan iƹeffanen n ȓweqṯ-a."
Ƹaḏ issawaȓ Ƹisa ak ȓɣaci wami ɣares d tusa yemmas ḏ ayṯmas, bedden barra i ṯeddarṯ rezzun akiḏes ssiwȓen.
Inna-as can yijjen i Ƹisa: "Aqa yemmac ḏ ayṯmac bedden ɣar barra rezzun akiḏec ssiwȓen."
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-as i wenni iy kiḏes issiwȓen: "Min ƹnan yemma ḏ ayṯma?"
Iswiẓẓeḏ s ufus nnes ɣar imeḥḍaren nnes inna: "Aqa yemma ḏ ayṯma."
Inna-as: "Wenni iteggen s min ixes Baba iy iǧan ḏeg ujenna, ataf netta ḏ uma ḏ učma ḏ yemma."
Nhar nni, iffeɣ Ƹisa zi ṯeddarṯ iqqim ṭṭarf n ȓebḥar.
Munen-d xas aṭṭas n ȓɣaci. S zḥameṯ nni iruḥ inya ḏeg yijjen n ṯɣarrabut iqqim ḏayes. Iwḏan qqimen marra x cceṭṭ n ȓebḥar.
Iqqar-asen aṭṭas n ṯmesȓayin s ȓemƹani inna-asen: " Ṣennṭeṯ! Iffeɣ ufeǧaḥ aḏ izreƹ.
Wami izerreƹ, ṯewḍa-yas can zzarriƹeṯ x ṭṭarf n ubriḏ, usin-d ijḍaḍ ccin-teṯ.
Can zzarriƹeṯ ṯewḍa-yas jar yizra war ḏinni bu caȓ aṭṭas. Ṯeɣmi-d ḏeɣya ȓaḥeqqac war ṯuǧiɣ ca ḏi ṯmurṯ aṭṭas.
Walakin wami ṯsummar ṯfuct, ṯnezȓef ȓexddenni ṯisraw ȓaḥeqqac iẓewran nnes war uwṯin ca ɣar ȓaǧeɣ n ṯmurṯ.
Can zzarriƹeṯ ṯewḍa jar isennanen. Ɣmin-d akiḏes isennanen nni jeyyfen-teṯ.
Walakin can zzarriƹeṯ ṯewḍa x ṯmurṯ ṯaṣebḥant, ṯegga ṯiyḏerin. Ȓebƹaḍ ggint miyya, ȓebƹaḍ ggint settin, ȓebƹaḍ ggint ṯȓaṯin.
Ṣenneṭ mliḥ a wenni itsȓan."
Qarrben-d ɣares imeḥḍaren nnes nnan-as: "Mayemmi iy kisen ṯessawaȓeḏ s ȓemƹani?"
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-asen: "Itwasmeḥ i kenniw aḏ tessnem min inuffaren ḏi ȓmulk ujenna. Walakin niṯni lla, war ḏasen itwasmiḥ ca.
Ȓaḥeqqac wenni iǧan ɣares itmarni-yas, aɣares yiȓi aṭṭas. Walakin wenni war ɣar iǧi ca, itwaksi-yas uȓa ḏ min ɣares.
X manaya iy kisen ssawaȓeɣ s ȓemƹani. Waxxa xezzaren, war twiȓin ca. Waxxa tesȓan, war tesȓin ca war fehhmen i ca.
Amenni iy ḏasen itkemmaȓ wawaȓ n nnabi Icaƹya ig inna ḏeg yijjen n zman: <Cḥaȓ ma tesȓim war tefhimem, cḥaȓ ma ṯxezzarem war twiȓim.

Ȓaḥeqqac ccaƹb-a, uȓ nnes iḏweȓ am azru, ƹȓayen war tesȓin walu, qqnen ṯiṭṭawin nsen. Ḥima war twiȓin ca s ṯiṭṭawin nsen, war tesȓin ca s imejjan nsen, war fehhmen ca s wuȓawen nsen, aɣari d ḏewȓen, aṯen sgenfiɣ.>
Walakin ssaƹd nwem kenniw wami ṯiṭṭawin nwem twaȓant, ssaƹḏ nwem wami imejjan nwem tesȓan.
Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Aṭṭas n lʼanbiya ḏ ȓmuminin rzun aḏ ẓren min twaȓam, walakin war ṯ ẓrin ca. Rzun aḏ sȓen min ṯesȓam, walakin war ṯ sȓin ca.
Iwa ṣennṭeṯ ȓmaƹna n ufeǧaḥ nni izerrƹen.
Ijjen itsȓa i wawaȓ x ȓmulk ujenna war ṯ itefhim ca. Iƹni netta am zzarriƹeṯ nni ig iwḍan x ubriḏ. Itraḥ Uƹeffan nni n Ibȓis, itekkes awaȓ nni itwazerƹen ḏayes ḏeg wuȓ.
Zzarriƹeṯ nni ig iwḍan jar yizra nettaṯ am can bnaḏem ig itesȓan i wawaȓ n Arebbi iqbeȓ-iṯ s ȓefraḥeṯ.
Wami war yuwṯi bu iẓewran mliḥ ḏeɣya tneqȓaƹen. Xmi d tasent can ȓemḥayen niɣ ḏ can uƹeddeb x ssabab n wawaȓ n Arebbi, ḏeɣya iteffeɣ abriḏ.
Zzarriƹeṯ nni ig iwḍan jar isennanen nettaṯ am yijjen n bnaḏem iy itesȓan i wawaȓ n Arebbi ḏayes amnus n ddunect, icemmeṯ-iṯ ṭṭmaƹ n wagȓa, ssenni itwajeyyef wawaȓ n Arebbi war ineffeƹ ca.
Walakin zzarriƹeṯ nni ig iwḍan ḏi ṯmurṯ ṯaṣebḥant nettaṯ am can bnaḏem ig itesȓan i wawaȓ n Arebbi, ifehhem-as itarew. Ijjen itarew miyya, ijjen settin, ijjen ṯȓaṯin."
Issiweȓ Ƹisa s yijjen n ȓmaƹna nneɣni inna-asen: "Ȓmulk ujenna igga am yijjen n uryaz izreƹ zzarriƹeṯ ṯaṣebḥant ḏeg umarjeƹ nnes.
Ijjen n ǧiȓeṯ wami ṭṭṣen marra iwḏan, yusa-d ȓaƹḏu nnes izreƹ zzarriƹeṯ n isennanen ak zzarriƹeṯ nni n yirḏan ȓexddenni yarweȓ.
Wami d gaƹƹḏen yirḏan ggin ṯiyḏerin, ȓexddenni gaƹƹḏen-d akiḏsen uȓa ḏ isennanen.
Usin-d ixeddamen nnan-as i bab n umarjeƹ: A siḏi, cek ṯzerƹeḏ zzarriƹeṯ ṯaṣebḥant ḏeg umarjeƹ nnec. Iwa manis ḏas d kkin isennanen-a?
Inna-asen: Can ȓaƹḏu ig iggin manaya. Nnan-as ixeddamen nnes: Ma ṯexseḏ a nraḥ a nekkes isennanen-a?
Inna-asen: Lla, bac war kiḏsen ṯqeǧƹem ca uȓa ḏ irḏan.

Jjeṯ irḏan aḏ mɣaren ak isennanen. Axmi d ɣa yaweḍ ȓweqṯ n umjar aḏasen iniɣ i icewwaren: Kkseṯ isennanen ḏ amezwaru smunem-ṯen ceddem-ṯen ḥima aḏ ḥarqen. Walakin irḏan jemƹem-ṯen awim-ṯen ɣar ṯesrafin inu."
Inna-asen Ƹisa ijjen n ȓmaƹna nneɣni: "Ȓmulk ujenna igga am yijjen n zzarriƹeṯ n yijjen n nnuƹ n arbiƹ qqaren-as bugarḏaȓ. Iysi-t ijjen n uryaz iẓẓu-t ḏeg umarjeƹ nnes.
Tiȓi nettaṯ ḏ ṯamezyant qaƹ x marra ṯiḥebba. Walakin xmi temɣar ṯḏewweȓ ktar zi marra arbiƹ. Ṯḏewweȓ ḏ ṯacejjarṯ, tasen-d yijḍaḍ teggen ḏayes ȓaƹwac nsen."
Inna-asen Ƹisa ijjen n ȓmaƹna nneɣni: "Ȓmulk ujenna am untun ṯeysi-ṯ yijjen n ṯemɣarṯ ṯuggwa zzayes ȓmudd n waren, antun nni isgaƹƹeḏ-iṯ-iḏ marra."
Qaƹ manaya inna-ṯ Ƹisa i yiwḏan s ȓemƹani. War kiḏsen issiwiȓ illa s ȓemƹani waha.
Ḥima aḏ ikemmeȓ wawaȓ iy inna Siḏi Arebbi i nnabi Icaƹya ḏeg yijjen n zman: <Akisen ssiwȓeɣ s ȓemƹani, aḏ sexbareɣ min innuffaren zeg wami ṯeǧa ddunect.>"
Ijja Ƹisa ȓɣaci nni yuḏef ɣar ṯeddarṯ. Ȓexddenni usin-d ɣares imeḥḍaren nnes nnan-as: "Fesser-aneɣ ȓmaƹna n isennanen ḏeg umarjeƹ."
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-asen: "Wenni izerrƹen zzarriƹeṯ ṯaṣebḥant netta ḏ Mmis n bnaḏem.
Amarjeƹ netta ḏ ddunect. Zzarriƹeṯ ṯaṣebḥant nettaṯ ḏ ṯarwa n ȓmulk ujenna. Isennanen niṯni ḏ ṯarwa n Uƹeffan nni n Ibȓis.
Ȓaƹḏu ig izerrƹen isennanen netta ḏ Ibȓis. Ȓweqṯ n umjar nettaṯ ḏ ȓefna n zman. Ixeddamen niṯni ḏ lmalaʼikaṯ.
Amecnaw mammec ismun ufeǧaḥ isennanen isḥerreq-iṯen ḏi ṯmessi, amenni iy ɣa ṯiȓi ȓefna n zman.
Aḏ d issekk Mmis n bnaḏem lmalaʼikaṯ nnes, aḏ kksent zi ȓmulk nnes marra min itsebbaben ḏi ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ ḏ yinni iteggen ccarr.
Aṯen nḍaren ḏi ȓkuceṯ n ṯmessi mani ɣa iȓin imeṭṭawen ḏ uɣeẓẓaẓ n ṯeɣmas.
Walakin ȓmuminin aḏ cƹecƹen am ṯfuct ḏi ȓmulk n Babaṯsen. Ṣenneṭ mliḥ a wenni itsȓan.
Ȓmulk ujenna amecnaw ijjen n ȓkenz ixzen ḏi can umarjeƹ, yufi-ṯ can ḥadd iƹaweḏ isnuffar-iṯ. Uca s ȓefraḥeṯ nni iy ḏayes, izzenz marra min ɣares isɣa amarjeƹ nni.
Ȓmulk ujenna amecnaw ijjen n ttajar iy irezzu x jjuwhar aṣebḥan.
Wami yufa ijjen n jjuwhar iɣȓan, izzenz marra min ɣares isɣi-ṯ.
Ȓmulk ujenna amecnaw ṯracca inḍar-it ij ubeḥri ḏi ȓebḥar, ṯeṭṭef mkuȓ nnuƹ n usȓem.
Wami ṯƹemmar ṯracca sufɣen-t-id ibeḥriyen ɣar ṭṭarf n ȓebḥar. Qqimen, bḏan tixḍaren ggin iseȓman iṣebḥanen ḏi ṯsuǧaṯin, iseȓman iƹeffanen nḍaren-ṯen.
Ammu iy ɣa yiȓi nhar iy ḏi ɣa ifna zman: Aḏ d asent lmalaʼikaṯ aḏ fernent ȓkuffar zi ȓmuminin;
aṯen nḍarent ḏi ȓkuceṯ n ṯmessi mani ɣa iȓin imeṭṭawen ḏ uɣeẓẓaẓ n ṯeɣmas."
Inna-asen Ƹisa i imeḥḍaren nnes: "Ma ṯfehmem marra manaya?" Nnan-as: "Wah a Siḏi."
Inna-asen: "Kuȓ amseȓmaḏ n Ccariƹa n Musa ig ifehmen ȓmulk ujenna netta am yijjen n bab n ṯeddarṯ ig isufuɣen ṯimesȓayin ṯiqḏimin niɣ ḏ jḏiḏ zi mani ixzen ȓkenz nnes."
Wami ikemmeȓ Ƹisa ȓemƹani nni, yuyur ssenni.
Iḏweȓ ɣar ṯmurṯ nnes ibḏa iseȓmaḏ ḏi ṯemziḏa nsen. Tƹejjben ḏayes nnan: "Mani yufa ȓefhameṯ-a iy ḏas immucen ḏ lmuƹjizaṯ-a?
Ma war iǧi ca wanita ḏ mmis n unejjar? Ma war iǧi yemmas ḏ Maryam? Ayṯmas ijjen qqaren-as Yaƹqub, ijjen ḏ Yusef, ijjen ḏ Simƹan, ijjen ḏ Yahuḏa ma lla?
Ma war ǧint ca suyṯmas aqaṯent akiḏneɣ ḏanita? Iwa manis ḏas d ikka marra manaya?"
X manayenni war ṯ qbiȓen ca. Ikkar Ƹisa inna-asen: "Nnabi meḥtarem mani ma, walakin ḏeg ubilaj nnes ḏ ṯeddarṯ nnes lla!"
Igga ḏinni Ƹisa ḏrus n lmuƹjizaṯ ȓaḥeqqac lʼiman nsen ḏ uqlil.
Ḏi ȓweqṯ nni azeǧiḏ Hirudus yarra-d ȓexbar x Ƹisa.
Inna-asen i ixeddamen nnes: "Wanita iƹenni ḏ Yaḥya nni, itwasekkar-d netta zi ȓmewṯ! S manaya iy ɣares jjheḏ iy zi itegg lmuƹjizaṯ-a."
Qbeȓ i manaya, azeǧiḏ Hirudus tuɣa iṭṭef Yaḥya icedd-iṯ iggi-ṯ ḏi ȓeḥbes x ssabab n Hirudiya ṯamɣarṯ n wumas Filippas.
Ȓaḥeqqac iqqar-as Yaḥya i uzeǧiḏ Hirudus: "Ḥram cek aḏ tawiḏ ṯamɣarṯ n wumac."
Azeǧiḏ Hirudus irezzu aḏ ineɣ Yaḥya, walakin iggweḏ zi ccaƹb ȓaḥeqqac Yaḥya twaȓan-ṯ ḏ nnabi.
Wami igga uzeǧiḏ Hirudus ȓƹiḏ lmilad nnes, ṯekkar yeǧis n ṯemɣarṯ nnes Hirudiya ṯecḍeḥ zzaṯ i inewjiwen, iƹjeb-as ȓḥaȓ i uzeǧiḏ Hirudus.
X manaya ijjuǧ inna-as Ttar-ayi min ṯexseḏ, aḏam ṯ uceɣ.
Nettaṯ ƹlaḥsab min ḏas ṯweṣṣa yemmas, ṯekkar ṯenna-as i uzeǧiḏ Hirudus: "Uc-ayi-d ḏa azeǧif n Yaḥya x ssiniyyeṯ!"
Ȓexddenni indem uzeǧiḏ, walakin iweṣṣa aḏas ṯ yuc ȓaḥeqqac tuɣa ijjuǧ zzaṯ i inewjiwen ḏi ȓfarḥ nnes.
Issekk ɣar ȓeḥbes wenni ḏas ɣa iqessen azeǧif i Yaḥya.
Yuwi-d azeǧif nnes ḏi ssiniyyeṯ yuca-as-ṯ i ṯḥenjirṯ nni, ṯruḥ ṯuwi-yas-ṯ i yemmas.
Kkaren imeḥḍaren n Yaḥya usin-d ysin ddat nnes ggin-t ḏeg unḍeȓ. Ssenni uyuren, xbaren Ƹisa s min iweqƹen.
Wami d yarra Ƹisa ȓexbar nni, iruḥ ssenni waḥḏes ḏi ṯɣarrabut ɣar yijjen n umcan ixȓa. Arrin-d ȓexbar ȓɣaci, ḏfaren-ṯ zi ṯneddam x iḍaren.
Wami d iḍra Ƹisa zi ṯɣarrabut yufa qaƹ anect nni n yiwḏan, qqsen-as isgenfa imehȓac nsen.
Wami iƹḏu ȓḥaȓ, qarrben ɣares imeḥḍaren nnes nnan-as: "Ȓweqṯ ṯeƹḏu, amcan-a ḏ ȓexȓa waha. Sekk iwḏan-a ɣar ȓedcuraṯ bac aḏ d sɣen min ɣa ccen."
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Mayemmi ɣa raḥen? Ucem-asen kenniw min ɣa ccen."
Nnan-as imeḥḍaren nnes: "Neccin ɣarneɣ ḏa ɣir xemsa n ṯxebbazin ḏ ṯnayen n iseȓman."
Inna-asen: "Awim-ayi-d manayenni ɣari nec."

Yumar ȓɣaci nni aḏ qqimen x arbiƹ. Iṭṭef xemsa n ṯxebbazin nni ḏ ṯnayen n iseȓman nni, iysi ṯiṭṭawin nnes ɣar ujenna icekkar Arebbi. Irza ṯixebbazin nni x ṯnayen yuca-asen-ṯent i imeḥḍaren nnes, ȓexddenni ferqen-ṯent x yiwḏan nni marra.
Marra ccin jjiwnen. Kkaren jemƹen min xasen iceṭṭen, ṯenƹac n ṯeqrabin ƹemmarent s iȓeqquzen.
Lƹadad n yinni iccin niṯni xemsaȓaf n iryazen bȓa ṯimɣarin bȓa iḥenjiren.
Ȓexddenni yumar Ƹisa imeḥḍaren nnes aḏ nyen ḏi ṯɣarrabut aḏ ẓwan ɣar ujemmaḍ-in n ȓebḥar, netta itemsafaḍ x ȓɣaci.
Wami xasen imsafaḍ x ȓɣaci nni, igaƹƹeḏ ɣar uḏrar aḏ iẓẓaǧ ḏinni waḥḏes. Ɣar ṯmeddiṯ ƹaḏ aqaṯ ḏinni waḥḏes.
Ṯaɣarrabut nni ṯeggwej aṭṭas zi ȓbarr, ȓemwaj tawin-teṯ tarran-teṯ ȓaḥeqqac arriḥ itṣuḍ-d zi jjiheṯ nneɣni.
Ƹȓayen iqarreb-d ȓefjar, iruḥ Ƹisa ɣar imeḥḍaren nnes iggur x iḍaren x waman n ȓebḥar.
Wami ṯ ufin iggur x iḍaren x waman n ȓebḥar, nxeȓƹen nnan qa wanita ḏ ȓexyaȓ! Snekkaren ṯɣuyyeṯ s ṯiggwḏi.
Ȓexddenni inna-asen Ƹisa: "Ahnam! Aqa ḏ nec, war teggwḏem ca!"
Inna-as Buṭrus: "A Siḏi meȓa ḏ cek, ȓaɣa-ayi-d aɣarek d aseɣ x waman."
Inna-as Ƹisa: "Araḥ-d!" Ikkar ihwa-d Buṭrus zi ṯɣarrabut iggur x iḍaren x waman ɣar Ƹisa.
Walakin iggweḏ wami iẓra arriḥ itṣuḍ s jjheḏ, ibḏa iɣarreq. Isnekkar ṯɣuyyeṯ inna: "A Siḏi, ƹṯeq-ayi!"
Ȓexddenni yuca-as Ƹisa fus nnes iṭṭef-iṯ inna-as: "Lʼiman nnec ḏ uqlil waha, mayemmi iy ḏayi ṯcekkeḏ?"
Ṣafi nyan ḏi ṯɣarrabut irsa arriḥ nni.
Uca sejjḏen-as yinni iǧan ḏi ṯɣarrabut nnan: "Ḏ ṣṣaḥ, cek ḏ Mmis n Arebbi!"
Wami iẓwa Ƹisa netta ḏ imeḥḍaren nnes ȓebḥar, uwḍen ɣar ṯmurṯ n Ganisarat.
Ayṯbab n ṯmurṯ nni ẓrin Ƹisa ƹeqȓen-ṯ. Ȓexddenni sufɣen ȓexbar ḏi marra ṯamurṯ nni, uwin-as-d imehȓac marra.
Ttaren-as aṯen ijj aḏ ḥaḏan ɣir ṭṭarf n warruḍ nnes. Ṣafi marra yinni ṯ iḥaḏan genfan.
Ssenni usin-d ȓḥizeb n ifarrisiyen ḏ imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa ɣar Ƹisa zi ṯendint n Lquds nnan-as:
"Mayemmi imeḥḍaren nnec beṭṭȓen lƹadaṯ n ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ? Mayemmi war siriḏen ca ifassen nsen qbeȓ ma aḏ ccen aɣrum?"
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-asen: "Iwa mayemmi kenniw ṯbeṭṭaȓem ȓuṣiyeṯ n Arebbi ḥima aḏ tesxeḏmem lƹadaṯ nwem?
Minzi Arebbi inna: Weqqar babac ḏ yemmac. Aqa wenni ɣa yukkaren babas niɣ ḏ yemmas, ataf itxeṣṣa-yas aḏ immeṯ.
A lmunafiqin! Qa nnabi Icaƹya inna ȓḥaqq wami xawem issiweȓ ḏeg yijjen n zman:
<Ccaƹb-a itweqqar-ayi s uqemmum waha, maca uȓ nnes iggwej xafi.
Iwḏan-a ƹebbḏen-ayi ḏi ȓxawi, ȓaḥeqqac seȓmaḏen ṯimesȓayin iǧan ḏ ȓuṣiyaṯ n bnaḏem waha.>"
Iȓaɣa-d Ƹisa i ȓɣaci inna-asen: "Sennṭeṯ mliḥ, fehmeṯ:
Ma ḏinni ca n ṯmesȓayṯ itaḏfen aqemmum tḥarram bnaḏem?" Inna-asen: "Lla, min d iteffɣen zeg uqemmum aqa manayenni ig itḥarramen bnaḏem."
Qarrben-d ɣares imeḥḍaren nnes nnan-as: "Ma ṯessneḏ belli ifarrisiyen war ḏasen iƹjib bu ȓḥaȓ wami sȓan i wawaȓ nnec?"
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-asen: "Kuȓ arbiƹ war ṯ iẓẓu ca Baba iǧan ḏeg ujenna aḏ ineqȓeƹ s iẓewran nnes.
Jjem-ṯen! Niṯni ḏ iḍarɣaȓen tjarran iḍarɣaȓen. Meȓa aḍarɣaȓ ijarr aḍarɣaȓ, ataf aḏ wḍan s ṯnayen iḏsen ḏi can ṯesrafṯ."
Inna-as Buṭrus: "Fesser-aneɣ ȓmaƹna-ya."
Inna-as Ƹisa: "Uȓa ḏ kenniw ƹaḏ war ṯefhimem ca?
Ma war ṯessinem belli min itaḏfen ḏeg uqemmum itraḥ ɣar uƹeddis iteffeɣ zi ddat?
Walakin min d iteffɣen zeg uqemmum itas-d zeg wuȓ, u ḏ manaya itḥarramen bnaḏem.
Ȓaḥeqqac zeg wuȓ iy zi d tekkant lʼafkar ṯiƹeffanin ḏ ṯmenɣiwṯ ḏ zzna ḏ lfasad ḏ ṯukkarḏa ḏ ẓẓur ḏ ȓbaṭeȓ.
Ḏ ṯimesȓayin-a ig itḥarramen bnaḏem. Walakin meȓa icca s ifassen bȓa ma ṯen isireḏ ataf war itḥarrim bu bnaḏem."
Ikkar Ƹisa yuyur ssenni iruḥ ɣar jwayeh n ṯendint n Ṣur ḏ ṯendint n Ṣayda.
Ṯusa-d ɣares ijjen n ṯemɣarṯ zi Ayṯ-Kanƹan ṯzeddeɣ ḏinni. Traɣa ṯeqqar-as i Ƹisa: "Rḥem-ayi a Siḏi, a Mmis n Ayṯ-Dawed! Qa yeǧi ḏayes ijjen n jjenn ḏ aƹeffan itƹeddab-it aṭṭas."
War ḏas inni Ƹisa uȓa ḏ ijjen n wawaȓ. Qarrben ɣares imeḥḍaren nnes nnan-as: "Ṯamɣarṯ-a sufeɣ-it xaneɣ, zi ṣbaḥ nettaṯ ṯḏeffar-aneɣ ṯesɣuyiw xaneɣ."
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Qa nec twassekkeɣ-d ɣir ɣar iḥuȓiyen iweddaren, iƹni iwḏan n Ayṯ-Israʼil."
Walakin ṯamɣarṯ nni ṯusa-d ɣares ṯsejjeḏ-as ṯenna-as: "A Siḏi, ƹawen-ayi!"
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-as: "Maci maƹqul aḏ itwakkes uɣrum n iḥenjiren aḏ imenḍar i iqzinen."
Ṯenna-as ṯemɣarṯ nni: "Ɣarek ȓḥaqq a Siḏi, walakin uȓa ḏ iqzinen nni tetten ifetwitten n uɣrum ig itweṭṭan zi ṭabȓa n ayṯbab nsen."
Ikkar Ƹisa inna-as: "Cem a ṯamɣarṯ, lʼiman nnem ijheḏ s waṭṭas!" Inna-as: "Min ṯrezzuḏ aḏ tafeḏ." Ḏi ṯsaƹƹat nni ṯgenfa yeǧis.
Ibeƹƹeḏ ssenni Ƹisa, yuyur x cceṭṭ n ȓebḥar n Ljalil. Igaƹƹeḏ ɣar yijjen n uḏrar iqqim ḏinni.
Usin-d ɣares aṭṭas n ȓɣaci. Uwin-d akiḏsen izeḥḥafen ḏ iḍarɣaȓen ḏ izeynunen ḏ inecrufen ḏ waṭṭas n imehȓac nneɣni. Sersen-ṯen ɣar iḍaren nnes isgenfa-ṯen.
Tƹejjben yiwḏan nni wami ẓrin izeynunen ssawaȓen, inecrufen genfan, izeḥḥafen gguren, iḍarɣaȓen twaȓan. Kkaren ḥemḏen Arebbi n Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Iȓaɣa-d Ƹisa i imeḥḍaren nnes inna-asen: "Nec qqsen-ayi yiwḏan-a. Ṯeȓtiyyam zeg wami aqaṯen akiḏi war ɣarsen ca min ɣa ccen. War xseɣ ca aṯen ssekkeɣ niṯni war ccin ca ḥima war tesxiffen x ubriḏ."
Nnan-as imeḥḍaren nnes: "Ḏi ȓexȓa-ya mani ɣa naf aɣrum iy zi ɣa nsecc qaƹ lƹadad-a n yiwḏan?"
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Cḥaȓ ɣarwem n uɣrum?" Nnan-as: "Ɣarneɣ sebƹa n ṯecnifin ḏ ca n iseȓman ḏ imezyanen."
Yumar Ƹisa ȓɣaci aḏ qqimen ḏi ṯmurṯ.
Iṭṭef sebƹa nni n ṯecnifin ḏ iseȓman nni, icekkar Arebbi. Irzi-ṯen yuci-ṯen i imeḥḍaren nnes, imeḥḍaren nnes ferqen-ṯen x ȓɣaci nni.
Marra ccin jjiwnen, ceṭṭent sebƹa n ṯeqrabin ƹemmarent s iȓeqquzen.
Marra iryazen nni ig iccin niṯni arbeƹaȓaf iḏsen bȓa ṯimɣarin bȓa iḥenjiren.
Wami imsafaḍ xasen Ƹisa x ȓɣaci nni, inya ḏeg yijjen n ṯɣarrabut iruḥ ɣar jwayeh n Magdala.
Usin-d ɣar Ƹisa ȓḥizeb n ifarrisiyen ḏ ȓḥizeb n iṣadduqiyen, ttaren zzayes ijjen n lƹalama ḏ ṯameqqrant zeg ujenna bac aṯ jarrben.
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-asen: "Ɣar ȓmeɣreb ṯeqqarem ṯiwecca aḏ yiȓi ljaw ḏ aṣebḥan ȓaḥeqqac ajenna ḏ azeggwaɣ.
Ɣar ȓefjar ṯeqqarem: Nhara aḏ yiȓi unẓar ḏ wajjaj ȓaḥeqqac ajenna ḏ azeggwaɣ ḏayes aseynu ḏ abercan. Lḥala n ujenna ṯessnem at tcerrḥem. Walakin lƹalamaṯ n zman-a lla, war ṯzemmarem aṯent tcerrḥem.
Iwḏan iƹeffanen n ȓweqṯ-a ixeddƹen Arebbi tettaren lƹalama ṯameqqrant, walakin war ḏasen itmuci illa lƹalama nni n nnabi Yunes." Ssenni iruḥ ijji-ṯen.
Wami uwḍen imeḥḍaren nnes ɣar ujemmaḍ-in n ȓebḥar ttun war kisen uwin ca aɣrum.
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Ɣarwem! Ḥḍam ixef nwem zeg untun n lʼaḥzab n ifarrisiyen ḏ iṣadduqiyen."
Ssiwȓen jarasen nnan: " Iqqar manaya ȓaḥeqqac war d nuwi bu uɣrum."
Issen Ƹisa minxef tuɣa ssawaȓen inna-asen: "Kenniw lʼiman nwem ḏ uqlil. Mayemmi ṯeqqarem jarawem war ɣarneɣ bu uɣrum?
Ma ƹaḏ war ṯefhimem? War ṯeƹqiȓem xemsa nni n ṯecnifin ig iseccen xemsaȓaf n iryazen, mecḥaȓ n ṯeqrabin iy ṯeccurem?
War ṯeƹqiȓem sebƹa nni n ṯecnifin ig iseccen arbeƹaȓaf n iryazen, mecḥaȓ n ṯeqrabin iy ṯeccurem?
Mammec ṯeggim war ṯefhimem? Nec war ssiwiȓeɣ ca x uɣrum. Ḥḍam ixef nwem zeg untun n lʼaḥzab n iṣadduqiyen ḏ ifarrisiyen."
Ȓexddenni ƹaḏ iy fehmen imeḥḍaren belli war ḏasen issiwiȓ ca x untun n uɣrum; Lla, inna-asen: Ḥḍam ixef nwem zi min seȓmaḏen ifarrisiyen ḏ iṣadduqiyen.
Wami yuweḍ Ƹisa ɣar jjiheṯ n ṯendint n Qayṣariya n Filippas, isseqsa imeḥḍaren nnes inna-asen: "Min qqaren yiwḏan x Mmis n bnaḏem?"
Nnan-as: "Ijjen iqqar cek ḏ Yaḥya, ijjen iqqar cek ḏ Ilyas, ijjen iqqar cek ḏ Irmiya niɣ ḏ can yijjen zi lʼanbiya."
Inna-asen Ƹisa i imeḥḍaren nnes: "Y kenniw, min ḏayi d tarram nec?"
Indeq-d Simƹan Buṭrus inna-as: "Cek ḏ Lmasiḥ, Mmis n Arebbi iddaren."
Ȓexddenni inna-as Ƹisa: "Ssaƹḏ nnec a Simƹan a mmis n Yuna! War iǧi bu ḏ ca n bnaḏem iy ḏac d ismeḍharen manaya menɣir Baba iǧan ḏeg ujenna.
Nec ƹaweḏ aqa qqareɣ-ac: Cek ḏ Buṭrus, iƹni ḏ 'Azru.' X uzru-ya aḏ bniɣ nec jmaƹṯ n ȓmuminin inu, ṯiwwura n Ljaḥim war zzayes tiwint walu!
Aḏac uceɣ ȓemfataḥ n ȓmulk ujenna. Min ɣa ṯceddeḏ ḏi ṯmurṯ aḏ yiȓi itwacedd ḏeg ujenna. Min ɣa ṯerzmeḏ ḏi ṯmurṯ aḏ yiȓi itwarzem ḏeg ujenna."
Ȓexddenni Ƹisa iweṣṣa imeḥḍaren nnes inna-asen war qqarem i ḥadd belli nec ḏ Lmasiḥ.

Ssenni ibḏa Ƹisa isfehham i imeḥḍaren nnes belli labud aḏ iraḥ netta ɣar ṯendint n Lquds aḏ itwaƹeddeb x waṭṭas n ṯmesȓayin x ufus n imeqqranen n Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏ arruyas n ȓfuqaha ḏ imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa. Aṯ nɣen, wis ṯeȓtiyyam aḏ d itwasekkar zi ȓmewṯ."
Isbeƹƹeḏ-iṯ Buṭrus waḥḏes inha-ṯ inna-as: "Ac iḥfeḍ Arebbi a Siḏi! Ƹemmarṣ war ḏac itewqiƹ manaya."

Walakin Ƹisa ineqȓeb-d ɣar Buṭrus inna-as: "Aggwej xafi ɣar ḏeffar a Cciṭan! Cek am yijjen n uzru ḏeg ubriḏ inu tneqȓaḏeɣ ḏayes. Cek war tfekkareḏ ca amecnaw Arebbi; Lla, cek tfekkareḏ amecnaw bnaḏem."
Ssenni issiweȓ Ƹisa ak imeḥḍaren nnes inna-asen: "Wenni ixsen aḏayi iḏfar nec, labud aḏ ismeḥ ḏeg yixef nnes aḏ ikessi ṣṣalib nnes aḏayi iḏfar.
Ȓaḥeqqac wenni ixsen aḏ isenjem ṯuḏarṯ nnes ataf at ixsar. Wenni ɣa ixsaren ṯuḏarṯ nnes x ssabab inu ataf at yaf.
Minzi ɣa infeƹ bnaḏem meȓa irbeḥ ddunect-a qaƹ wa ixsar ȓaƹmar nnes? Min ɣa yuc bnaḏem ḏeg umcan n ȓaƹmar nnes?
Aqa Mmis n bnaḏem aḏ d yas s lƹaḍama n Babas ak lmalaʼikaṯ nnes, uca aḏ ijaza mkuȓ ijjen ƹlaḥsab ȓxeḏmeṯ nnes.
Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Ȓebƹaḍ zeg yinni iǧan ḏa akiḏi war tmettin ca aȓ ɣa ẓren Mmis n bnaḏem yusa-d ḏi ȓmulk nnes."
Ṯeƹḏu settiyyam, Ƹisa yuwi akiḏes Buṭrus ḏ Yaƹqub ḏ wumas Yuḥanna, yuwi-ṯen waḥeḏsen ɣar yijjen n uḏrar yuƹȓa.
Ḏinni zzaṯ i ṯiṭṭawin nsen iḏweȓ am yijjen n nnur, aɣembub nnes itceƹciƹ am ṯfuct. Iḏweȓ warruḍ nnes ḏ acemȓaȓ ireqq am ṯfawṯ.
Imeḍhar-asen-d ḏinni nnabi Ilyas ḏ nnabi Musa. Twaȓan-ṯen ssawaȓen ak Ƹisa.
Indeq-d Buṭrus inna-as i Ƹisa: "A Siḏi, ḏ aṣebḥan akiḏec neqqim ḏanita. Meȓa ṯexseḏ, aḏ ggeɣ ṯȓaṯa n iqiḍan: ijjen i cek, ijjen i Musa, ijjen i Ilyas."
Ƹaḏ issawaȓ Buṭrus ihwa-d xasen yijjen n useynu itseqsiq. Ṯendeq-d ijjen n ṯmijja zeg useynu nni ṯenna-asen: "Qa ḏ wanita ḏ Mmi iƹizzen, nec farḥeɣ zzayes. Ṣennṭeṯ ɣares."
Wami sȓin imeḥḍaren ṯmijja nni ggwḏen sejjḏen ɣar ṯmurṯ.
Iqarreb ɣarsen Ƹisa iḥaḏa-ṯen inna-asen: "Kkarem war teggwḏem ca."
Ysin ṯiṭṭawin nsen ɣar ujenna war ufin ḥadd illa Ƹisa.
Wami d hewwan zeg uḏrar iweṣṣa-ṯen Ƹisa inna-asen: "War tƹawaḏem i ḥadd min ṯeẓrim aȓ d ɣa ikkar Mmis n bnaḏem zi ȓmewṯ."
Sseqsan-ṯ imeḥḍaren nnes nnan-as: "Mayemmi imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa qqaren itxeṣṣa nnabi Ilyas aḏ d yas netta ḏ amezwaru?"
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Ḏ ṣṣaḥ, itxeṣṣa aḏ d yas Ilyas aḏ iƹḏeȓ kuȓci.
Walakin qqareɣ-awem: Aqa Ilyas nni yusa-d niṯni war ṯ ssinen ca, xeḏmen ḏayes min xsen. Amenni iy ɣa ƹeddben Mmis n bnaḏem."
Uca fehmen imeḥḍaren belli issawaȓ-asen x Yaḥya wenni itṭehharen s waman.
Wami d ḏewȓen ɣar ȓɣaci, iqarreb ijjen n uryaz ɣar Ƹisa iwḍa x ifadden zzaṯ nnes.
Inna-as: "A Siḏi rḥem-ayi memmi, ijjen n jjenn itƹeddab-iṯ aṭṭas. Aṭṭas n ṯwaȓaṯin itweṭṭa ḏi ṯmessi niɣ ḏeg waman.
Uwiɣ-ṯ-iḏ ɣar imeḥḍaren nnec walakin niṯni war zemmaren aṯ sgenfan."
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-asen: "A iwḏan n ȓweqṯ-a iy ḏi war iǧi bu lʼiman, a yinni iffɣen abriḏ! Mecḥaȓ iy kiḏwem ɣa qqimeɣ u mecḥaȓ ḏawem ɣa ṣbareɣ? Awim-ayi-ṯ-id ḏa."
Ƹisa isbedd jjenn nni aƹeffan, iffeɣ zeg uḥenjir nni igenfa ḏi ṯsaƹƹat nni.
Qarrben-d imeḥḍaren ɣar Ƹisa waḥḏes nnan-as: "Mayemmi zaƹma neccin tuɣa war nzemmar aṯ nsufeɣ?"

Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Ȓaḥeqqac lʼiman nwem ḏ uqlil. Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Mȓi ḏaywem lʼiman ɣir anect ijjen n ṯḥebbuct n bugarḏaȓ, aḏ tinim i uḏrar-a: Neqȓeƹ-d cek ssanita ruḥ ɣar ḏiha ataf aḏ d ineqȓeƹ. War xawem iteqsiḥ walu.
{Nnuƹa-ya n jjenn aṯ tsufɣem ɣir s ṯẓaǧiṯ ḏ uẓummi.}"
Imeḥḍaren nnes wami d munen akiḏes ɣar ṯmurṯ n Ljalil ikkar Ƹisa inna-asen: "Ƹȓayen aḏ itwasellem Mmis n bnaḏem ɣar ifassen n yiwḏan.
Aṯ nɣen, nhar wis ṯeȓtiyyam aḏ d itwasekkar." Ȓexddenni xeyyqen imeḥḍaren s waṭṭas s wawaȓ nni.

Wami yuweḍ Ƹisa ḏ imeḥḍaren nnes ɣar ubilaj n Kafernaḥum, usin-d yinni ijemmƹen ḍḍariba i ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant. Qarrben ɣar Buṭrus nnan-as: "Ma war itxeǧis ca lmuƹallim nwem ḍḍariba n ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant?"

Inna-asen Buṭrus: "Wah, itxeǧas-it." Wami yuḏef Buṭrus ɣar ṯeddarṯ, Ƹisa izwar-as s wawaȓ inna-as: "Min ḏac imeḍharen a Simƹan? Uw ɣa ixeǧsen ȓaƹcur niɣ ḍḍariba i izeǧiḏen n ṯmurṯ, ma ḏ ṯarwa nsen niɣ ḏ iwḏan ƹadi?"
Inna-as Buṭrus: "Iwḏan ƹadi." Inna-as Ƹisa: "Iwa ṯarwa nsen war txeǧisen ca baƹda.

Walakin itxeṣṣa war nesxeyyeq ḥadd. Ruḥ ɣar ȓebḥar nḍar ṯiṣennarṯ ḏeg waman, asȓem nni iy ɣa ṯeṭṭfeḏ ḏ amezwaru, rzem-as aqemmum aḏayes ṯafeḏ ijjen n ṯpeyyast n nnuqarṯ. Ysi-t uc-asen-t, xeǧes xac ḏ xafi."
Ḏi ṯsaƹƹat nni qarrben-d imeḥḍaren ɣar Ƹisa nnan-as: "Ug iǧan qaƹ ḏ ameqqran ḏi ȓmulk ujenna?"
Iȓaɣa-d Ƹisa x yijjen n uḥenjir ḏ amezyan, isbedd-iṯ ḏi ȓwesṭ nsen.
Inna-asen: "Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Labud i kenniw aḏ tḏewȓem aḏ tiȓim amecnaw iḥenjiren imezyanen. Meȓa lla, ataf ƹemmarṣ aḏ taḏfem ḏi ȓmulk ujenna.
Wenni isemzayen ixef nnes amecnaw aḥenjir-a, ḏ netta iy ɣa yiȓin ḏ ameqqran qaƹ ḏi ȓmulk ujenna.
Wenni ɣa iqebȓen can uḥenjir am wanita ƹlaḥsab isem inu, axmi ḏ nec ig iqbeȓ.
Wenni iy ɣa yawin ijjen zeg imezyanen-a iy zzayi itamnen ɣar ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ, ḥsen i netta aḏas cedden ijjen n uzru n ṯsirṯ s usɣun ɣar yiri nnes aḏ itwaɣreq ḏi ȓaǧeɣ n ȓebḥar.
Ya tamara n yiwḏan x ssabab n ṯmesȓayin itawin ɣar ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ. Ṯimesȓayin nni aḏ d asent, walakin ya tamara n bnaḏem nni ig iteggen manayenni!

Cek fus nnec niɣ ḍar nnec meȓa itsebbab-ac ḏi can ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ, qess-iṯ zaƹma nḍar-iṯ. Ḥsen i cek aḏ taḏfeḏ jjenneṯ s yijjen n ufus niɣ s yijjen n uḍar zi meȓa qqimen ɣarek ṯnayen n ifassen niɣ ṯnayen n iḍaren aḏ tmenḍareḏ ḏi ṯmessi iy war ixessin ca ƹemmarṣ.
Cek ṯiṭṭ nnec meȓa tsebbab-ac ḏi can ȓefḍiḥeṯ, qȓeƹ-it zaƹma nḍar-it. Ḥsen i cek aḏ taḏfeḏ jjenneṯ s yijjen n ṯiṭṭ zi meȓa qqiment ɣarek ṯnayen n ṯiṭṭawin aḏ tmenḍareḏ ḏi jahennama n ṯmessi.
Ɣarwem aḏ tḥeggarem can ḥadd zeg imezyanen-a. Qqareɣ-awem: Lmalaʼikaṯ nsen ḏeg ujenna ȓebda xezzarent Baba iǧan ḏeg ujenna.
{Liʼanna Mmis n bnaḏem yusa-d aḏ inejja yinni iweddaren.}
Min ḏawem imeḍharen? Ijjen ɣares miyya n iḥuȓiyen. Meȓa iweddar-as ijjen zzaysen, ataf aḏ ijj tesƹa u tesƹin ḏeg uḏrar aḏ iraḥ aḏ irzu x wenni iweddaren.
Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Meȓa yufi-ṯ, ataf azzayes ifareḥ ktar zi min ɣa ifareḥ x tesƹa u tesƹin nni war iweddaren ca!
Amenni uȓa ḏ Babaṯwem iǧan ḏeg ujenna war ixes uȓa ḏ ijjen zeg imezyanen-a aḏ iweddar.
Meȓa ixḍa akiḏec wumac, ruḥ ɣares nha-ṯ ɣir cek ḏ netta ɣir s ṯnayen iḏwem. Meȓa igg-ac array, ataf aḏ tiȓiḏ mliḥ ƹaweḏ ak wumac.
Walakin meȓa yugi aɣarek iṣenneṭ, awi akiḏec ijjen niɣ ṯnayen ḥima ataf lɣaleṭ nnes ssnen-ṯ ṯnayen niɣ ṯȓaṯa n ȓechuḏ.
Walakin meȓa yugi aɣarsen iṣenneṭ, ini-ṯ i jmaƹṯ n ȓmuminin. U meȓa yugi aɣarsen iṣenneṭ, ḥseb-iṯ ḏ ȓkafer niɣ ḏ axeddaƹ.
Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Marra min ɣa ṯceddem ḏi ṯmurṯ ataf aḏ yiȓi itwacedd ḏeg ujenna. Marra min ɣa ṯerzmem ḏi ṯmurṯ ataf aḏ yiȓi itwarzem ḏeg ujenna.
Qqareɣ-awem ƹaweḏ: Meȓa ṯtafqem ṯnayen zzaywem x ṯmurṯ ṯettarem can ȓḥajeṯ i Baba iǧan ḏeg ujenna, ataf aḏawem t istajeb.
Ȓaḥeqqac mani ɣa munen ṯnayen niɣ ṯȓaṯa x ssabab inu, nec aȓ ḏin iȓiɣ ḏi ȓwesṭ nsen."
Ȓexddenni iqarreb Buṭrus ɣar Ƹisa inna-as: "A Siḏi, cḥaȓ n ṯwaȓaṯin iy kiḏi ɣa ixḍa wuma bac aḏas semḥeɣ? Ma sebƹa n ṯwaȓaṯin?"
Inna-as Ƹisa: "Lla, war iǧi bu sebƹa n ṯwaȓaṯin, aḏac iniɣ sebƹin uweṯ-it ḏi sebƹa n ṯwaȓaṯin!
Ȓaḥeqqac ȓmulk ujenna itawi-d ḏeg yijjen n uzeǧiḏ irezzu aḏ igg ȓeḥsab ak ixeddamen nnes.
Wami ibḏa ḏi ȓeḥsab, uwin-d ɣares ijjen ḏayes aṭṭas n umarwas, am ƹecra aȓaf milyar.
War ɣares minzi ɣa yarr amarwas-a, iweṣṣa siḏes aḏ immenz netta ḏ ṯamɣarṯ nnes ḏ ṯarwa nnes ḏ marra min ɣares ḥima aḏ ixeǧes amarwas nni.
Yusa-d uxeddam nni isejjeḏ-as i siḏes inna-as: Ahya a siḏi, ṣbar xafi. Aḏac xeǧseɣ marra min ḏayi tarseḏ.
Ȓexddenni iqqes-as i siḏes iḏȓeq-as, ismeḥ-as ḏeg umarwas nni.
Iffeɣ uxeddam nni yufa ijjen nneɣni zeg ixeddamen, tuɣa itares-as cwayt waha, am yijjen n milyun. Iṭṭef-iṯ ibḏa itjeyyaf-iṯ iqqar-as: Xeǧes-ayi min ḏac tarseɣ!
Iwḍa-yas umeddukeȓ nnes ɣar iḍaren inna-as: Ṣbar xafi cwayt ac xeǧseɣ.
Yugi, iruḥ netta inḍar-iṯ ḏi ȓeḥbes aȓ ɣa ixeǧes amarwas nnes.
Ẓrin yinni kis ixeddmen min iweqƹen, iqqes-asen ȓḥaȓ ruḥen ɣar siḏiṯsen ƹawḏen-as min iweqƹen.
Ikkar iȓaɣa-yas-d siḏes inna-as: Ay axeddam aƹeffan, mayemmi? Nec semḥeɣ-ac ḏi marra min ḏac tarseɣ ȓaḥeqqac ṯettareḏ-ayi.
Ȓa ḏ cek tuɣa itxeṣṣa-cek aḏ treḥmeḏ ameddukeȓ nnec amecnaw mammec c reḥmeɣ uȓa ḏ nec."
Iɣḍeb siḏes s waṭṭas isellem axeddam nni ɣar yinni iy ṯ ɣa iƹeddben aȓ ɣa ixeǧes marra min ḏayes ḏ amarwas.
Ammu iy kiḏwem ɣa igg Baba iy iǧan ḏeg ujenna meȓa war ismiḥ mkuȓ ijjen zzaywem s wuȓ nnes i wumas.
Wami ikemmeȓ Ƹisa awaȓ nnes, iffeɣ zi ṯmurṯ n Ljalil yuweḍ ɣar jwayeh n Yahuḏiya ḏ ujemmaḍ-in n yiɣzar n Lʼurdun.
Ḏfaren-ṯ ijjen n lƹadad n yiwḏan, isgenfa imehȓac nsen ḏinni.
Qarrben-d ɣares can yiwḏan zi ȓḥizeb n ifarrisiyen ḥima aṯ jarrben. Nnan-as: "Ma ḥalal aḏ iǧef can uryaz i ṯemɣarṯ nnes ḏi ayyi ȓḥajeṯ?"
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-asen: "Ma war ṯeɣrim min iqqar Lkitab? Zeg wami ṯeǧa ddunect ixȓeq Lxaliq aryaz ḏ ṯemɣarṯ.
Inna Arebbi: Aqa aryaz aḏ ijj babas ḏ yemmas aḏ imun ak ṯemɣarṯ nnes, aḏ ḏewȓen s ṯnayen iḏsen ḏ ijjen.
X manaya war tiȓin ca ḏ ṯnayen; Lla, aḏ iȓin ḏ ijjen. Iḏen, min ismun Arebbi war ṯ isfarreq ca bnaḏem."
Nnan-as ifarrisiyen: "Iwa, mayemmi iweṣṣa Musa aryaz aḏ yuc ṯabrat n waǧaf i ṯemɣarṯ nnes aḏas iǧef?"
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Ijji-kenniw Musa aḏ teǧfem i ṯemɣarin nwem minzi ɣarwem uȓ iqseḥ, walakin ḏeg umezwaru war tuɣa ca ammu.
Qqareɣ-awem nec: Marra wenni ɣa iǧfen i ṯemɣarṯ nnes amen war ṯezni, yuwi can icten nneɣni, ataf izna."
Nnan-as imeḥḍaren nnes: "Meȓa ammu lḥala n uryaz ak ṯemɣarṯ nnes, ḥsen-as ataf war imeǧec ca."
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Zemmaren aḏ qebȓen awaȓ-a ɣir yinni umi yuca Arebbi ṯizemmar aṯ qebȓen.

Ḏinni ȓebƹaḍ zeg wami xeȓqen war zemmaren aḏ meȓcen. Ḏinni ȓebƹaḍ nneɣni qqnen-ṯen yiwḏan. U ḏinni ȓebƹaḍ nneɣni ugin aḏ meȓcen x ssabab n ȓmulk ujenna. Wenni izemmaren aḏ iqbeȓ ṯimesȓayin-a aṯent iqbeȓ."
Uwin-d yiwḏan can iḥenjiren ḏ imezyanen ɣar Ƹisa ḥima axasen isers ifassen axasen iẓẓaǧ, walakin ƹarrḍen-asen imeḥḍaren nnes.
Ikkar Ƹisa inna-asen: "Jjem iḥenjiren imezyanen aɣari d asen. War ḏasen tƹarraḍem ca ȓaḥeqqac ȓmulk ujenna itiȓi ɣar yinni iy iǧan am yina."
Igga xasen ifassen nnes yuyur ssenni.
Iqarreb ijjen n uḥenjir ɣar Ƹisa inna-as: "A Lmuƹallim, min ɣa ggeɣ ḏ aṣebḥan ḥima aɣari ṯiȓi ṯuḏarṯ n ȓebda?"
Inna-as Ƹisa: "Mayemmi iy ḏayi tesseqsiḏ x min iṣebḥan? Ɣir ijjen ig iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan. Meȓa ṯexseḏ aḏ taḏfeḏ ṯuḏarṯ n ȓebda, egg array s ȓuṣiyaṯ."
Inna-as uḥenjir nni: "Man ȓuṣiyaṯ?" Inna-as Ƹisa: "War neqq, war zenni, war tacar, war cehheḏ bu ẓẓur,
weqqar babac ḏ yemmac, xes ajjar nnec amecnaw ixef nnec."
Inna-as uḥenjir nni: "Tweqqareɣ marra manaya. Min ḏayi iqqimen aṯ ggeɣ?"
Inna-as Ƹisa: "Meȓa ṯexseḏ aḏ teggeḏ kuȓci nican, ruḥ zenz marra min ɣarek ḏ agȓa ṣeddeq-iṯ x ȓmusakin. Ssenni aɣarek yiȓi ijjen n ȓkenz ḏeg ujenna, ȓexddenni araḥ-d cek ḏfar-ayi-d."
Aḥenjir nni, wami isȓa i manayenni iruḥ ixeyyeq aṭṭas ȓaḥeqqac ɣares aṭṭas n wagȓa.
Inna-asen Ƹisa i imeḥḍaren nnes: "Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Mecḥaȓ iqseḥ xas x ttajar aḏ yaḏef ȓmulk ujenna."
Qqareɣ-awem ƹaweḏ: Aqa isheȓ aḏ iƹḏu ijjen n uȓɣem zi ṯiṭṭ n ṯseynefṯ qbeȓ ma aḏ yaḏef ijjen n ttajar ḏi ȓmulk n Arebbi."
Imeḥḍaren setƹejjben aṭṭas wami sȓin manayenni, nnan-as: "Xyar, ug izemmaren aḏ injem!?"
Ixzar ɣarsen Ƹisa inna-asen: "Manaya war ḏas zemmaren ca yiwḏan, walakin kuȓci izemmar-as Arebbi."
Indeq-d Buṭrus inna-as: "Aqa neccin nesmeḥ ḏi kuȓci neḏfar-ic, min ɣarneɣ ɣa yiȓin?"

Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Ḏi ṯuḏarṯ nneɣni xmi ɣa iqqim Mmis n bnaḏem x lƹarc nnes n lƹaḍama, uȓa ḏ kenniw ḏayi d iḏfaren aḏ teqqimem x ṯenƹac n lƹarcaṯ ḥima aḏ tḥekmem x ṯenƹac n ṯqebbaȓ n Ayṯ-Israʼil.

U marra yinni isemmḥen ḏi ṯuḏrin nsen niɣ ḏi ayṯmas niɣ ḏi suyṯmas niɣ ḏi babas ḏ yemmas niɣ ḏi ṯarwa nsen niɣ ḏeg imarjeƹiwen nsen x ssabab inu nec, ataf aɣarsen ṯiȓi miyya n ṯseqqar ktar, aḏ warṯen ṯuḏarṯ n ȓebda.
Aṭṭas iy iǧan ḏ imezwura aḏ ḏewȓen ḏ ineggura, ineggura aḏ ḏewȓen ḏ imezwura."
"Aqa ȓmulk ujenna amecnaw ijjen n bab n umarjeƹ uḍiȓ. Iffeɣ ɣar ṣbaḥ zic aḏ igg ixeddamen ḏeg umarjeƹ uḍiȓ nnes.
Itafeq ak ixeddamen nni x yijjen n dinar i nhar, issekk-iṯen ɣar umarjeƹ nnes.
Iffeɣ-d ɣar jwayeh nni n tesƹa yufa ixeddamen nneɣni qqimen ḏi ȓmewqef bȓa ȓxeḏmeṯ.
Inna-asen: Ruḥem uȓa ḏ kenniw ɣar umarjeƹ inu, ataf aḏawem xeǧseɣ min ṯesḏaheǧem.
Kkaren ruḥen. Iffeɣ-d ɣar jwayeh n ṯenƹac ƹaweḏ ɣar jwayeh n ṯȓaṯa uƹecci igga nnefs ȓxeḏmeṯ.
Uca iffeɣ-d ƹaweḏ ɣar jwayeh nni n xemsa uƹecci, yufa ixeddamen nneɣni qqimen bȓa ȓxeḏmeṯ. Inna-asen: Min kenniw yuɣin ṯeqqimem ḏa nhar amen-ikmaȓ bȓa ȓxeḏmeṯ?
Nnan-as: Walu, war ḏaneɣ isexḏem ḥadd. Inna-asen: Ruḥem uȓa ḏ kenniw ɣar umarjeƹ inu.
Wami ṯeɣȓi ṯfuct, inna-as bab n umarjeƹ i uweqqaf nnes: Ȓaɣa-d i ixeddamen xeǧes-iṯen. Bḏa zeg yinni iy d yusin ḏ ineggura ƹaḏ i imezwura.
Yinni ibḏan ȓxeḏmeṯ ɣar xemsa uƹecci, yuca-asen dinar dinar.
Wami d usin imezwura tɣir-asen aḏasen yuc ktar walakin lla, uȓa n niṯni yuca-asen dinar dinar.
Wami ḏasen yuca dinar, mxeyyaqen ak bab n umarjeƹ.
Nnan-as: Ixeddamen-a iy d yusin ḏ ineggura xeḏmen ijjen n ṯsaƹƹat waha, cek ṯuciḏ-asen amecnaw neccin ig yuwṯin tamara n nhar amen-ikmaȓ ḏi ṯfuct.
Indeq-d bab n umarjeƹ inna-as i yijjen zzaysen: War c cmiṯeɣ ca ay ameddukeȓ. Yac cek ṯtafqeḏ akiḏi x yijjen n dinar niɣ lla?
Ysi texȓiseṯ nnec uyur. Xseɣ aḏas uceɣ i wa iy d yusin ḏ aneggaru anect nnec.
Ma war ɣari ȓḥaqq aḏ ggeɣ min xseɣ zi ṯmesȓayin inu? Niɣ ṯḥesḏeḏ-ayi wami ǧiɣ ṣaxiy?
Amenni yinni iǧan ḏ ineggura aḏ ḏewȓen ḏ imezwura; yinni iǧan ḏ imezwura aḏ ḏewȓen ḏ ineggura."
Wami igaƹƹeḏ Ƹisa ɣar ṯendint n Lquds, ḏeg ubriḏ iruḥ yuwi ṯenƹac nni n imeḥḍaren nnes waḥeḏsen inna-asen:
"Aqa netgaƹƹaḏ ɣar Lquds mani ɣa itwaxḏeƹ Mmis n bnaḏem i arruyas n ȓfuqaha ḏ imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa. Axas ḥekmen s ȓmewṯ,
aṯ sellmen i yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil. Axas ḍeḥcen, aṯ uwṯen s usɣun, aṯ ṣellben. Nhar wis ṯeȓtiyyam aḏ d itwasnekkar zi ȓmewṯ."
Ijjen n ṯemɣarṯ, nettaṯ ḏ yemmaṯsen n ṯarwa n Zabadi, ṯqarreb ɣar Ƹisa ak ṯnayen n ṯarwa nnes ṯsejjeḏ-as ḥima azzayes ṯettar can ȓḥajeṯ.
Inna-as Ƹisa: "Min ṯrezzuḏ?" Ṯenna-as: "Ini-ayi aḏ qqimen yina ṯarwa inu s ṯnayen ḏi ȓmulk nnec ijjen x ufusi ijjen x uẓeȓmaḍ nnec."
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-asen i Yaƹqub ḏ Yuḥanna: "Kenniw war ṯessinem ca min ṯettarem. Ma ṯzemmarem aḏ teswem zi ȓkas nni iy zi ɣa sweɣ nec ƹȓayen?" Nnan-as: "Wah, nzemmar-as!"
Inna-asen: "Wah, ataf aḏ teswem zi ȓkas inu. Walakin aɣimi x ufusi inu ḏ uẓeȓmaḍ inu war iǧi bu ḏ nec iy ṯ ɣa yucen, aḏ immuc i yinni umi ṯen isewjeḏ Baba."
Ƹecra nni n imeḥḍaren wami sȓin x min rezzun ṯnayen nni n wawmaṯen war ḏasen iƹjib ca ȓḥaȓ.
Iȓaɣa-yasen-d Ƹisa marra iḏsen inna-asen: "Qa ṯessnem arruyas n ṯmura ḥekkmen x ccuƹub nsen, yinni imeqqranen zzaysen tzeyyaren xasen.
Walakin manayenni itxeṣṣa war itiȓi ca jarawem. Lla, wenni irezzun aḏ iḏweȓ ḏ ameqqran jarawem itxeṣṣa-yas aḏ yiȓi ḏ axeddam nwem.
Wenni irezzun aḏ iḏweȓ ḏ amezwaru jarawem itxeṣṣa-yas aḏ yiȓi ḏ ismeɣ nwem.
Mmis n bnaḏem uȓa ḏ netta war d yusi ca ḥima axas xeḏmen yiwḏan. Lla, netta yusa-d ḥima axasen ixḏem, axasen iṣeddeq ṯuḏarṯ nnes ḥima aḏ isenjem aṭṭas zzaysen."
Wami ffɣen zi ṯendint n Ariḥa, ḏfaren-d Ƹisa aṭṭas n ȓɣaci.
Ḏinni ṯnayen n iḍarɣaȓen qqimen x ṭṭarf n ubriḏ. Wami sȓin i Ƹisa iggur-d, snekkaren ṯɣuyyeṯ qqaren: "A Siḏi a Mmis n Ayṯ-Dawed, rḥem-aneɣ!"
Zeyyaren xasen yiwḏan nnan-asen sqarem, walakin niṯni qqimen snekkaren ṯɣuyyeṯ ƹaḏ s jjheḏ qqaren: "A Siḏi a Mmis n Ayṯ-Dawed, rḥem-aneɣ!"
Ibedd Ƹisa, iȓaɣa-yasen-d inna-asen: "Min ṯexsem aḏawem ggeɣ?"
Nnan-as: "A Siḏi, qa nexs aḏ nurzment ṯiṭṭawin nneɣ!"
Qqsen-as i Ƹisa iḥaḏa-yasen ṯiṭṭawin nsen. Ḏeg umcan ḏewȓen twaȓan uca ḏfaren-ṯ.
Wami qarrben ɣar ṯendint n Lquds uwḍen ɣar ubilaj n Bayt Faji zzaṯ i Uḏrar n Zzitun, ikkar Ƹisa issekk ṯnayen zeg imeḥḍaren nnes,
inna-asen: "Ruḥem ɣar ubilaj-in iǧan zzaṯwem, aḏ tafem ḏinni ṯaɣyuȓṯ ṯeqqen akiḏes asnus. Fsim-asen awim-ṯen-d ɣari.
Meȓa issiweȓ ɣarwem can yijjen inna-awem ca, inim-as qa Iḥḏaj-iṯen Siḏiṯneɣ. Ȓexddenni akiwem-ṯen-d issekk."
Ammu iwqeƹ ḥima aḏ ikemmeȓ wawaȓ iy inna Siḏi Arebbi i nnabi Zakariya ḏeg yijjen n zman:
"Inim-as i yeǧis n Lquds: Xzar, azeǧiḏ nnem yusa-d ɣarem, war ḏayes bu ttakebbur. Inya x yijjen n ṯeɣyuȓṯ, ḏ usnus mmis n ṯeɣyuȓṯ."
Ruḥen ṯnayen nni imeḥḍaren, ggin mamc ḏasen inna Ƹisa.
Uwin-d ṯaɣyuȓṯ ḏ usnus, ggin xasen izeǧuba nsen ȓexddenni inya Ƹisa.
Aṭṭas n yiwḏan ssun-as abriḏ s izeǧuba nsen. Inneɣni qessen ȓefruƹ n ȓcejjur ssun zzaysen abriḏ.
Yinni igguren zzaṯes ḏ yinni iy ṯ iḏeffaren qqaren: "Lƹaḍama i Mmis n Ayṯ-Dawed! Ssaƹḏ n wenni iy d yusin ƹlaḥsab isem n Siḏi Arebbi. Lḥamdu i Arebbi yuƹȓan."
Wami yuḏef Ƹisa ɣar ṯendint n Lquds, kkaren-d ayṯbab n ṯendint nnan: "Min iƹna wa?"
Nnan ȓɣaci qa wanita ḏ nnabi Ƹisa zeg ubilaj n Naṣira ḏi ṯmurṯ n Ljalil."
Yuḏef Ƹisa ɣar ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant yuzzeȓ x marra x yinni issaɣen ḏ yinni iznuzan. Iqȓeb-asen missaṯ n yinni itṣarrafen tmenyaṯ ḏ ȓekrasa n yinni iznuzan iḏbiren.
Inna-asen: "Lkitab iqqar: <Ṯaddarṯ inu aḏ tiȓi ḏ ṯaddarṯ n ṯẓaǧiṯ.> Walakin kenniw ṯarrim-teṯ ḏ ifri n ixewwanen."
Ḏi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant qarrben-d ɣar Ƹisa iḍarɣaȓen ḏ izeḥḥafen uca isgenfa-ṯen.
Ƹeṣṣben arruyas n ȓfuqaha ḏ imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa wami ẓrin Ƹisa lmuƹjizaṯ iy igga, ḏ iḥenjiren ṭṭarf i ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant tȓaɣan s jjheḏ qqaren: "Lƹaḍama i Mmis n Ayṯ-Dawed!"
Nnan-as i Ƹisa: "Ma tesȓiḏ min xak qqaren?" Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Wah, ma war ṯeɣrim min iǧan ḏi Lkitab? <Ṯeggiḏ, ay Arebbi, ac ḥemḏen iḥenjiren ḏ iseyman s uqemmum nsen.>"
Ssenni ismeḥ ḏaysen, iffeɣ zi ṯendint nni iruḥ ɣar ubilaj n Bayt Ƹanya isens ḏinni.
Ɣar ṣbaḥ zic igaƹƹeḏ Ƹisa ɣar ṯendint, netta iǧuz.
Iẓra ijjen n ṯcejjarṯ n ṯazarṯ x ubriḏ iruḥ ɣares yufi-t ḏayes ṯifray waha. Inna-as: "Cem zi ssa aȓ ṯsawent ƹemmarṣ aḏ tarweḏ." Ȓexddenni ṯuzeɣ ṯcejjarṯ nni n ṯazarṯ.
Imeḥḍaren nnes wami ẓrin min iweqƹen, tƹejjben nnan-as i Ƹisa: "Mammec ṯegga ṯcejjarṯ-a ṯuzeɣ ḏeg umcan?"

Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-asen: "Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Mȓi ḏaywem lʼiman war ṯcekkim ca, ataf aḏ teggem ktar zi min itwaggen i ṯcejjarṯ-a. Meȓa ṯennim i uḏrar-a: Neqȓeƹ-d cek ssanita ṯmenḍareḏ ḏi ȓebḥar, ataf aḏ ineqȓeƹ.
Inna-asen: Meȓa ṯumnem, aɣarwem yiȓi marra min ɣa ṯettarem i Arebbi ḏi ṯẓaǧiṯ nwem."

Yuḏef Ƹisa ḏi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant iseȓmaḏ ḏinni. Qarrben-d ɣares arruyas n ȓfuqaha ḏ imeqqranen zi Ayṯ-Israʼil nnan-as: "Cek manis ḏac d ṯekka ssulṭa nni iy zi teggeḏ ṯimesȓayin-a? Wi ḏac yucin ssulṭa nni?"
