Indeq-d Buṭrus inna-as: "Aqa neccin nesmeḥ ḏi kuȓci neḏfar-ic!"

Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Marra wenni isemḥen ḏi ṯeddarṯ nnes niɣ ḏi ayṯmas niɣ ḏi suyṯmas niɣ ḏi yemmas niɣ ḏi babas niɣ ḏi ṯarwa nnes niɣ ḏeg imarjeƹiwen nnes x ssabab inu nec u ƹlaḥsab Lʼinjil,
ataf aɣares ṯiȓi miyya n ṯseqqar zi ṯuḏrin ḏ ayṯmas ḏ suyṯmas ḏ yemmas ḏ ṯarwa nnes ḏ imarjeƹiwen nnes. Aɣares yiȓi uƹeddeb ḏi zman-a, walakin ḏi zman iy d ɣa yasen aɣares ṯiȓi ṯuḏarṯ n ȓebda.
Aṭṭas iy iǧan ḏ imezwura aḏ ḏewȓen ḏ ineggura; Yinni iy iǧan ḏ ineggura aḏ ḏewȓen ḏ imezwura."

Aqaṯen x ubriḏ tgaƹƹaḏen ɣar ṯendint n Lquds, Ƹisa aqaṯ zzaṯ. Imeḥḍaren nnes ḏehcen, yinni ṯ iḏfaren ggwḏen. Iruḥ yuwi ṯenƹac nni n imeḥḍaren nnes ṯwaȓa nneɣni waḥeḏsen, ibḏa issawaȓ akiḏsen x min ḏas ɣa iweqƹen inna:
"Aqa netgaƹƹaḏ ɣar Lquds mani ɣa itwaxḏeƹ Mmis n bnaḏem i arruyas n ȓfuqaha ḏ imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa. Axas ḥekmen s ȓmewṯ, aṯ sellmen i yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Axas ḍeḥcen, axas ssusfen, aṯ uwṯen s usɣun, aṯ nɣen. Nhar wis ṯeȓtiyyam aḏ d ikkar zi ȓmewṯ."
Yaƹqub ḏ Yuḥanna iy iǧan ḏ ṯarwa n Zabadi qarrben ɣar Ƹisa nnan-as: "A Lmuƹallim, nrezzu aḏaneɣ ṯḏebbareḏ min ɣa nettar zzayek."
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Min ṯrezzum aḏawem ḏebbareɣ?"
Nnan-as: "Ejj-aneɣ a neqqim ḏi lƹaḍama nnec ijjen x ufusi ijjen x uẓeȓmaḍ nnec."
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Kenniw war ṯessinem ca min ṯettarem. Ma ṯzemmarem aḏ teswem zi ȓkas nni iy zi ɣa sweɣ nec? Niɣ aḏ tɣeḍsem ḏi ȓaƹḏab nni iy ḏi ɣa ɣeḍseɣ nec?"
Nnan-as: "Wah, nzemmar-as!" Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Wah, ataf aḏ teswem zi ȓkas nni iy zi ɣa sweɣ nec, aḏ tɣeḍsem ḏi ȓaƹḏab nni iy ḏi ɣa ɣeḍseɣ nec.
Walakin aɣimi x ufusi inu niɣ x uẓeȓmaḍ inu war iǧi bu ḏ nec iy ṯ ɣa yucen, aḏ immuc i yinni umi itwassewjeḏ."
Ƹecra nni n imeḥḍaren wami sȓin x min rezzun Yaƹqub ḏ Yuḥanna war ḏasen iƹjib ca ȓḥaȓ.
Iȓaɣa-yasen-d Ƹisa marra iḏsen inna-asen: "Qa ṯessnem arruyas n ȓegnus ḥekkmen x ccuƹub nsen, yinni imeqqranen zzaysen tzeyyaren xasen.
Walakin manayenni itxeṣṣa war itiȓi ca jarawem; Lla, wenni irezzun aḏ iḏweȓ ḏ ameqqran jarawem itxeṣṣa-yas aḏ yiȓi ḏ axeddam nwem.
Wenni irezzun aḏ iḏweȓ ḏ amezwaru jarawem itxeṣṣa-yas aḏ yiȓi ḏ ismeɣ n marra.
Mmis n bnaḏem uȓa ḏ netta war d yusi ca ḥima axas xeḏmen yiwḏan; Lla, netta yusa-d ḥima axasen ixḏem, axasen iṣeddeq ṯuḏarṯ nnes ḥima aḏ isenjem aṭṭas zzaysen."
Uwḍen ɣar ṯendint n Ariḥa. Menbaƹd iffeɣ Ƹisa zi Ariḥa ak imeḥḍaren nnes ḏ waṭṭas n ȓɣaci. Ufin ḏinni ijjen n uḍarɣaȓ iqqim ṭṭarf n ubriḏ itettar, qqaren-as Bartimus mmis n Timus.
Itesȓa belli Ƹisa Naṣiri iy iƹeddun ssenni ibḏa isnekkar ṯɣuyyeṯ iqqar: "A Ƹisa a Mmis n Ayṯ-Dawed, rḥem-ayi!"
Zeyyaren xas aṭṭas n yiwḏan qqaren-as sqar. Netta yugi, iqqim isnekkar ṯɣuyyeṯ ƹaḏ s jjheḏ iqqar: "A Mmis n Ayṯ-Dawed, rḥem-ayi!"
Ibedd Ƹisa inna-asen: "Ȓaɣam-d xas." Ȓaɣan-d x uḍarɣaȓ nni nnan-as: "Fareḥ cek kkar, aqa itȓaɣa-d xak Ƹisa."
Ikkes azeǧab nnes inḍar-iṯ, inexḍef ḏeɣya ibedd x iḍaren nnes yusa-d ɣar Ƹisa.
Inna-as Ƹisa: "Min ṯexseḏ aḏac ggeɣ?" Inna-as uḍarɣaȓ nni: "A Siḏi, qa nec xseɣ aḏ twaȓiɣ."
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-as: "Ruḥ, qa lʼiman nnec isgenfa-cek!" Ȓexddenni ibḏa itwaȓa iḏfar Ƹisa ḏeg ubriḏ.
Wami qarrben ɣar ṯendint n Lquds ɣar ibilajen n Bayt Faji ḏ Bayt Ƹanya zzaṯ i Uḏrar n Zzitun, ikkar Ƹisa issekk ṯnayen zeg imeḥḍaren nnes
inna-asen: "Ruḥem ɣar ubilaj-in iy iǧan zzaṯwem. Xmi ɣa ṯawḍem ḏinni, aḏ tafem ij usnus iqqen ƹemmarṣ war xas inyi uȓa ḏ ijjen, fsim-as awim-ṯ-iḏ.
Meȓa issiweȓ-d ɣarwem can yijjen inna-awem mayemmi teggem ammu, inim-as qa iḥḏaj-iṯ Siḏiṯneɣ, walakin aḏawem ṯiḏ yarr ḏanita ḏeɣya."
Ruḥen ufin ijjen n usnus ḏi zzenqeṯ iqqen ɣar yijjen n ṯewwarṯ, fesyen-as.
Nnan-asen ȓebƹaḍ zeg yinni ibedden ḏinni: Min teggem? Mayemmi ṯfessim i usnus-a?
Jawben-ṯen ƹlaḥsab mammec ṯen iweṣṣa Ƹisa, uca jjin-ṯen.
Uwin-ṯ-iḏ ɣar Ƹisa ggin xas izeǧuba nsen, netta inya xas.
Aṭṭas n yiwḏan ssun-as abriḏ s izeǧuba nsen. Ȓebƹaḍ zzaysen qessen zeg imarjeƹiwen ȓefruƹ n ȓcejjur ssun-as zzaysen abriḏ.
Yinni igguren zzaṯes ḏ yinni iy ṯ iḏeffaren qqaren: "Lḥamdu i Arebbi! Ssaƹḏ n wanita iy d yusin ƹlaḥsab isem n Siḏi Arebbi.
Ssaƹḏ n ȓmulk nni iy d itasen n jeddiṯneɣ Dawed. Lḥamdu i Arebbi yuƹȓan."
Yuḏef Ƹisa ɣar ṯendint n Lquds ɣar ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant n Ayṯ-Israʼil, ixzar min ḏinni marra. Walakin tuɣa iƹḏu ȓḥaȓ, iffeɣ ak ṯenƹac n imeḥḍaren nnes iruḥ ɣar Bayt Ƹanya.
Ṯiwecca nnes teffɣen zi Bayt Ƹanya, Ƹisa iǧuz.
Iẓra zi ȓeggwaj ijjen n ṯcejjarṯ n ṯazarṯ ḏayes ṯifray, iqarreb ɣares irezzu x ṯazarṯ. Wami ɣares yuweḍ yufa ḏayes ṯifray waha minzi ƹaḏ war d ṯuwiḍ ca ȓweqṯ n ṯazarṯ.
Inna-as: "Cem zi ssa aȓ ṯsawent ƹemmarṣ war zzayem itett ḥadd." Imeḥḍaren nnes sȓan-as i min inna.

Ṣafi uwḍen ɣar ṯendint n Lquds. Yuḏef Ƹisa ɣar ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant ibḏa itazzeȓ x yinni issaɣen ḏ yinni iznuzan ḏinni ḏi ṯemziḏa. Iqȓeb-asen missaṯ n yinni itṣarrafen tmenyaṯ ḏ ȓekrasa n yinni iznuzan iḏbiren.
War itijji uȓa ḏ ijjen aḏ ikk x ṯemziḏa meȓa ɣares sseȓƹaṯ.
Iseȓmaḏ-iṯen inna-asen: "Ma iqqar Lkitab ma lla belli <Ṯaddarṯ inu aḏ tiȓi ḏ ṯaddarṯ n ṯẓaǧiṯ i marra ȓegnus>? Walakin kenniw ṯarrim-teṯ ḏ ifri n ixewwanen."
Sȓin-as arruyas n ȓfuqaha ḏ imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa, bḏan tfekkaren mammec ṯ ɣa nɣen. Ggwḏen zzayes wami marra ȓɣaci qqimen ḏehhcen s useȓmeḏ nnes.
Ɣar ṯmeddiṯ teffɣen ɣar barra n ṯendint.
Ɣar sbaḥ zic wami gguren x ubriḏ ẓrin ṯacejjarṯ nni n ṯazarṯ ṯuzeɣ s iẓewran nnes.
Ifekkar ḏayes Buṭrus inna-as i Ƹisa: "Xzar a Lmuƹallim, ṯacejjarṯ nni n ṯazarṯ iy ṯexziḏ aqa ṯuzeɣ!"
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-asen: "Amnem zi Arebbi!
Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Meȓa can yijjen inna-as i uḏrar-a: Neqȓeƹ-d cek ssanita ṯmenḍared ḏi ȓebḥar, u ḏeg wuȓ nnes war ḏayes bu ccekk yumen aḏ iwqeƹ manayenni, ataf manayenni aḏ yiȓi.
X manaya aḏawem iniɣ: Qaƹ min ɣa ṯettarem i Arebbi ḏi ṯẓaǧiṯ nwem, amnem belli aḏ tiȓi aɣarwem d ṯaweḍ ataf aɣarwem d tiȓi.
Kenniw xmi ɣa ṯbeddem aḏ teẓẓaǧem, meȓa ɣarwem ca n lƹadawa ak can yijjen semḥem-as ḥima Babaṯwem iǧan ḏeg ujenna aḏawem iɣfar ddnub nwem.
{Meȓa war ṯsemḥem ca i yiwḏan, Babaṯwem iǧan ḏeg ujenna war ḏawem iɣeffar ca ddnub nwem.}"
Ṣafi ḏewȓen ɣar Lquds. Ƹisa iggur ḏi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant, usin-d ɣares arruyas n ȓfuqaha ḏ imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa ḏ imeqqranen n Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Kkaren nnan-as: "Cek manis ḏac d ṯekka ssulṭa nni iy zi teggeḏ ṯimesȓayin-a? Wi ḏac yucin ssulṭa nni iy zi ṯent teggeḏ"
Ijaweb-iṯen Ƹisa inna-asen: "Uȓa ḏ nec akenniw sseqsiɣ x yijjen n ṯmesȓayṯ. Meȓa ṯjawbem-ayi-d xas, ataf aḏawem iniɣ zi manis ḏayi d ṯekka ssulṭa-ya iy zi teggeɣ ṯimesȓayin-a."
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Yaḥya, man ssulṭa iy zi iṭehhar s waman, ma zi Arebbi ma zeg yiwḏan? Jawbem-ayi-d."
Ssiwȓen jarasen nnan: "Meȓa nenna-as ssulṭa nni qa ṯekka-d zi Arebbi, ataf aḏaneɣ yini Ƹisa mayemmi war zzayes ṯuminem?
Walakin, meȓa nenna-as ssulṭa nni qa ṯekka-d zeg yiwḏan???" Ggwḏen niṯni zi ccaƹb aḏ inin amenni minzi qaƹ twaȓan belli Yaḥya netta ḏ nnabi.
Uca nnan-as i Ƹisa: "Neccin war nessin ca." Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-asen: "Iwa uȓa ḏ nec war ḏawem qqareɣ ca manis ḏayi d ṯekka ssulṭa-ya iy zi teggeɣ ṯimesȓayin-a."

Ibḏa Ƹisa issawaȓ akiḏsen s ȓemƹani inna-asen: "Ijjen n ssiyyed iẓẓu aḍiȓ ḏeg yijjen n umarjeƹ nnes. Inneḍ-as-d ȓḥiḍ, igga ḏayes ṯasirṯ uḍiȓ. Ibna ḏayes ijjen n ṯsumƹeṯ i ȓƹasseṯ. Ijja ḏayes ixemmasen ṣafi iruḥ isafar.
Wami d yuweḍ ȓweqṯ n uȓqeḍ n uḍiȓ, ikkar issekk ijjen n uxeddam ɣar ixemmasen nni bac aḏas d ucen ȓḥaqq nnes n umarjeƹ n uḍiȓ.
Walakin min ggin ixemmasen nni? Ṭṭfen-ṯ uwṯin-ṯ, ssekken-ṯ-id ixwa.
Issekk-asen ƹaweḏ ijjen n uxeddam nneɣni, merzen-as ƹedden xas.
Issekk-asen ijjen nneɣni, nɣin-ṯ. Issekk-asen inneɣni aṭṭas, ijjen uwṯin-ṯ ijjen nɣin-ṯ.
Iqqim-as memmis iƹizzen waḥḏes. Ɣar uneggaru issekk-iṯ ɣarsen inna aqa aḏ ggwḏen memmi.
Ixemmasen nni min ggin? Kkaren nnan i wayawya: Aqa wenni iy ɣa iwarṯen! Aṯ nneɣ bac aḏas nawi amarjeƹ-a n uḍiȓ!
Ṭṭfen-ṯ nɣin-ṯ, nḍaren-ṯ-iḏ ɣar barra i umarjeƹ uḍiȓ.
Iwa, min ḏasen ɣa igg bab n umarjeƹ nni uḍiȓ? Aḏ d yas netta s yixef nnes aḏ ineɣ ixemmasen nni marra aḏ ijj amarjeƹ nni uḍiȓ i inneɣni.
Ma ƹemmarṣ war ṯeɣrim min yurin ḏi Lkitab? <Azru iy ƹiffen ibennayen, iwqeƹ ḏeg umcan aṣebḥan ḏi ṯɣemmarṯ n dsas.
Ḏ Siḏi Arebbi ig iggin manaya, ḏ ijjen n ȓḥajeṯ ḏ ṯameqqrant!>"
Lḥukkam n Ayṯ-Israʼil rezzun aḏ ṭṭfen Ƹisa, walakin ggwḏen zi ccaƹb. Fehmen belli issawaȓ xasen Ƹisa s ȓmaƹna-ya. Jjin-ṯ uyuren ssenni.
Kkaren lḥukkam nni ssekken ɣar Ƹisa can ifarrisiyen ḏ can yiwḏan zi ȓḥizeb n uzeǧiḏ Hirudus, rzun aṯ ṭṭfen x ca n wawaȓ nnes.

Wami d usin ɣar Ƹisa nnan-as: "A Lmuƹallim qa nessen belli cek nican iy ṯeǧiḏ. War teggwḏeḏ ca zeg yiwḏan ȓaḥeqqac war teggeḏ bu s wuḏemawen. Ṯseȓmaḏeḏ s ȓḥaqq mammec ixes Arebbi a nƹic. Ini-yaneɣ: Ma ṯsemmeḥ ccariƹa nneɣ a nxeǧes ḍḍariba i uzeǧiḏ Qayṣar niɣ lla? Ma ḏas t nxeǧes niɣ lla?"
Issen Ƹisa ixarwiḍen nni iy ḏaysen inna-asen: "Mayemmi ḏayi ṯsewjaḏem ṯaxcebṯ? Awim-ayi-d dinar nni n ḍḍariba ḥima aṯ ẓreɣ."
Ucin-as-ṯ-iḏ. Inna-asen: "Wi yiȓan teṣwirṯ-a ḏ yisem-a iy ḏayes?" Nnan-as: "N Qayṣar."
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-asen: "Min iǧan n Qayṣar ucem-as-ṯ i Qayṣar. Min iǧan n Arebbi ucem-as-ṯ i Arebbi." Uca qqimen tƹejjben ḏayes.
Qarrben-d ɣar Ƹisa can yiwḏan zi ȓḥizeb n iṣadduqiyen (qqaren niṯni belli iwḏan war d tnekkaren ca zi ȓmewṯ). Kkaren nnan-as:
"A Lmuƹallim, qa yura-aneɣ Musa aryaz meȓa immuṯ ijja ṯamɣarṯ nnes war kiḏes d ijji bu ṯarwa, ṯajjaȓṯ nni labud at yawi uȓwes nnes bac akiḏes d ijj ṯarwa i wumas nni immuṯen.
Neccin tuɣa akiḏneɣ sebƹa n wawmaṯen, imȓec umezwaru immuṯ war d ijji bu ṯarwa.
Ṯamɣarṯ nni yuwi-t wis ṯnayen immuṯ war d ijji bu ṯarwa. Amenni ƹaweḏ wis ṯȓaṯa.
Amenni ƹaweḏ aȓ wis sebƹa, mmuṯen marra war kis d jjin bu ddurriṯ. Aȓ uneggaru uȓa ḏ ṯamɣarṯ nni ṯemmuṯ.
Yum Lqiyama, xmi d ɣa kkaren yinni immuṯen, umi ɣa ṯiȓi ṯemɣarṯ nni? Aqa uwin-t s sebƹa iḏsen."
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-asen: "Kenniw ṯexḍam ȓaḥeqqac war ṯessinem ca Lkitab, war ṯessinem ca uȓa ḏ jjheḏ n Arebbi.
Xmi d ɣa kkaren yinni immuṯen iryazen ḏ ṯemɣarin war meǧcen ca war twasmeǧicen ca; Lla, aḏ iȓin amecnaw lmalaʼikaṯ ig iǧan ḏeg ujenna.

Walakin cuf, yinni immuṯen aḏ d kkaren zi ȓmewṯ. Ma ƹemmarṣ war ṯeɣrim min yurin ḏi Lkitab n Musa? Ḏi ȓqiṣṣa n uxcab, wami issiweȓ Arebbi ak Musa inna-as qa nec ḏ Arebbi n Brahim, ḏ Arebbi n Isḥaq, ḏ Arebbi n Yaƹqub."
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Netta ḏ Arebbi n yinni iddaren maci n yinni immuṯen. Aqa kenniw ṯexḍam aṭṭas!"
Yusa-d ijjen zeg imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa isȓa-yasen temnaqacen, yufa belli Ƹisa ijaweb-iṯen mliḥ. Ikkar netta inna-as i Ƹisa: "Min ṯeƹna ȓuṣiyeṯ iy iǧan ḏ ṯameqqrant qaƹ ḏi ccariƹa?"
Inna-as Ƹisa: "Ȓuṣiyeṯ ṯameqqrant ḏ ṯanita: Ṣennṭeṯ ay Ayṯ-Israʼil, Siḏi Arebbi ḏ lʼilah nneɣ, Siḏi Arebbi ḏ ijjen.
Aḏ texseḏ Siḏi Arebbi nnec s marra uȓ nnec, s marra arruḥ nnec, s marra ȓaƹqeȓ nnec, s marra jjheḏ nnec.
Ȓuṣiyeṯ wis ṯnayen ḏ ṯanita: Aḏ texseḏ ajjar nnec amecnaw ixef nnec. War ḏinni bu can ȓuṣiyeṯ ktar zi ṯina."
Inna-as umseȓmaḏ nni n ccariƹa: "A Lmuƹallim mliḥ, min ṯenniḏ ḏ ȓḥaqq. Siḏi Arebbi ḏ ijjen, war ḏinni uȓa ḏ ijjen illa netta.

U ƹaweḏ meȓa bnaḏem itexs Siḏi Arebbi s marra uȓ nnes ḏ ȓaƹqeȓ nnes ḏ jjheḏ nnes aḏ ixes uȓa ḏ ajjar nnes amecnaw ixef nnes, manaya ḥsen zi bnaḏem meȓa iɣareṣ dbiḥeṯ issecmaḍ-it qaƹ ḏi tmessi niɣ aḏ iqeddem mana ktar i Arebbi."
Yufa Ƹisa aryaz nni ijaweb-iṯ s ȓefhameṯ, inna-as: "War ṯeggwijeḏ ca aṭṭas x ȓmulk n Arebbi." Ssenni war izƹim ḥadd aṯ isseqsa ƹaḏ ktar.
Ƹisa aqaṯ ḏi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant iseȓmaḏ ḏinni. Indeq-d inna-asen: "Mayemmi qqaren imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa qa Lmasiḥ ḏ mmis n Dawed?"
Inna-asen: "Qa Dawed inna netta s yixef nnes s Arruḥ iqeddsen: <Siḏi Arebbi inna-as i Siḏi: Qqim-d x ufusi inu, aȓ d ɣa ggeɣ ȓƹaḏyan nnec swadday i iḍaren nnec.>
Mammec ɣa yiȓi Lmasiḥ ḏ mmis n Dawed? Netta Dawed iqqar-as i Lmasiḥ A Siḏi." Aṭṭas n ȓɣaci tesȓan-as, farḥen.
Iseȓmaḏ-iṯen Ƹisa inna-asen: "Ḥḍam ixef nwem zeg imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa. Niṯni texsen aḏ uyuren s iseȓhamen nni nsen, texsen axasen seǧmen ḏi ȓeswaq,
texsen aḏ qqimen ḏeg imucan imezwura ḏi ṯemziḏawin ḏ ȓefruḥ.
Tetten ṯajjaȓin, smeḍharen-d ixef nsen tẓaǧan aṭṭas ḥima aḏ beyynen i yiwḏan belli niṯni ṣebḥen aṭṭas zaƹma. Yina, lḥisab nsen aḏ yiȓi iqṣeḥ aṭṭas!"
Iqqim Ƹisa ḏi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant zzaṯ i ṣṣenduq nnes. Iẓra mammec ȓɣaci srusan ṣṣaḏaqa nsen ḏi ṣṣenduq nni. Aṭṭas n twajar teggen ḏinni aṭṭas n tmenyaṯ.
Ṯusa-d ijjen n ṯajjaȓṯ ḏ ȓmeskina waha ṯegga ḏinni ṯnayen iṣuldan, iƹni ijjen n frank.
Iȓaɣa-d Ƹisa x imeḥḍaren nnes inna-asen: "Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Ṯajjaȓṯ-a ḏ ȓmeskina waha ṯegga ḏi ṣṣenduq ktar zi min ggin marra inneɣni.
Minzi marra inneɣni ucin zi min xasen izayḏen ḏ agȓa. Nettaṯ lla, waxxa ḏ ȓmeskina waha ṯṣeddeq marra min ṯeƹȓem."
Wami d iffeɣ Ƹisa zi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant iqarreb-d ɣares ijjen n zeg imeḥḍaren nnes inna-as: "A Lmuƹallim, xzar izra-ya ḏ ȓebni-ya mecḥaȓ ḏ iṣebḥanen!"
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-as: "Twaȓiḏ ȓebni-ya mecḥaȓ d itas ḏ aṣebḥan, yac? Walakin war ḏa itɣimi uȓa ḏ ijjen n uzru x unneɣni, marra manaya aḏ inehḏem."
Wami iqqim Ƹisa ḏeg Uḏrar n Zzitun zzaṯ i ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant, sseqsan-ṯ Buṭrus ḏ Yaƹqub ḏ Yuḥanna ḏ Andrus waḥḏes nnan-as:
"Ini-yaneɣ cek, meȓmi ɣa iwqeƹ manaya? Min ṯeƹna lƹalama nni xmi ƹȓayen ɣa weqƹent marra ṯimesȓayin-a?"
Ijaweb-iṯen Ƹisa inna-asen: "Ḥḍam ixef nwem ḥima war kenniw ixeddeƹ ḥadd.
Aṭṭas iy d ɣa yasen s yisem inu zaƹma aḏ inin qa nec ḏ Lmasiḥ! Aḏ xeḏƹen aṭṭas n yiwḏan.
Xmi ɣa ṯesȓam x lḥuȓub ḏ ȓexbar n lḥurub war teggwḏeṯ ca, labud zi manaya. Walakin ddunect-a ƹaḏ war ṯfenni ca.
Dduwla aḏ tehjem x dduwla, lmemlaka aḏ tehjem x lmemlaka. Aḏ yiȓi jjuƹ aḏ iwqeƹ zzinzal ḏeg waṭṭas n imucan. Manaya aḏ yiȓi amecnaw ȓeḥriq amezwaru n ṯemɣarṯ itarwen.
Ḥḍam ixef nwem! Akenniw sellmen i lmaḥkamaṯ, akenniw uwṯen ḏi ṯemziḏawin nsen. Aḏ tbeddem zzaṯ i lḥukkam ḏ izeǧiḏen ƹlaḥsab isem inu ḥima axafi ṯcehḏem.
Aqa ḏ amezwaru itxeṣṣa aḏ itwabeccar Lʼinjil i marra ȓegnus.

Xmi kenniw ɣa awin ḥima akenniw sellmen ɣar ccraƹ, bȓa ma aḏ teysim amnus ḏ amezwaru ḏi ȓaƹquȓaṯ nwem min ɣa ṯinim; Lla, awaȓen nni iy ɣa ṯinim ḏ Arebbi iy ḏawem ṯen ɣa yucen ḏi ṯsaƹƹat nni. War iǧi bu ḏ kenniw iy ɣa issiwȓen; Lla, aḏ issiweȓ Arruḥ iqeddsen.
Umas aḏ isellem umas i ȓmewṯ. Babas aḏ isellem mmis. Ṯarwa aḏ raḥen ḍed i lwalidin nsen, aṯen sellmen i yinni iy ṯen ɣa nɣen.
Akenniw ƹiffen marra iwḏan ƹlaḥsab isem inu, walakin wenni ɣa iṣbaren ɣar uneggaru ataf aḏ injem.
Xmi ɣa ṯeẓrem <min iǧan ḏ aƹeffan aṭṭas iheddmen>, netta ibedd mani ixeṣṣa war itbeddi ca, ȓexddenni yinni iǧan ḏi ṯmurṯ n Yahuḏiya itxeṣṣa aḏ arewȓen ɣar iḏurar. (A fhem a wenni iɣrin manaya!)
Wenni ɣa yiȓin x ṯzeqqa nnes itxeṣṣa-as war ihewwi ca ɣar ṯeddarṯ, war ḏayes itiḏef ca ḥima aḏ iysi can ȓḥajeṯ.
Wenni ɣa yiȓin ḏeg umarjeƹ itxeṣṣa-as war iteƹqib ca ɣar ṯeddarṯ aḏ iysi čammir nnes.
Ya tamara iy ɣa yiȓin x ṯemɣarin nni s iƹeddisen ḏeg wussan nni ḏ ṯinni issuṭuḍen!
Ttareṯ i Arebbi bac manaya war itiȓi ca ḏi ȓmecta.
Ḏi ȓweqṯ nni ataf aḏ tewqeƹ ijjen n tamara ḏ ṯameqqrant iy war iweqiƹen ƹemmarṣ zeg wami ṯeǧa ddunect-a iy d ixȓeq Arebbi aȓ ȓexxu, u ƹemmarṣ aḏ tewqeƹ ƹaweḏ.
Maƹlik Siḏi Arebbi war isenqis ca ḏi ȓiyyam nni n tamara-ya iy d ɣa yasen, ataf war inejjem uȓa ḏ ijjen. X ssabab n yinni ixḍar Arebbi, ataf aḏ isenqes ȓiyyam nni iy d ɣa yasen.
Ssenni meȓa inna-awem can yijjen: Xzarem! Aqaṯ ḏanita Lmasiḥ! Niɣ, Aqaṯ ḏiha! War ṯ tamnem ca.

Aqa aṭṭas iy d ɣa imeḍharen s ixarriqen aḏ inin aqa nec ḏ Lmasiḥ niɣ nec zi lʼanbiya. Aḏ ggen lmuƹjizaṯ ḏ ṯimeqqranin ḏ ȓaƹjayeb zaƹma ḥima aḏ xeḏƹen iwḏan. Maƹlik zemmaren iȓi xeḏƹen uȓa ḏ yinni ixḍar Arebbi.
Iȓim ƹlabal kenniw! Aqa nec ƹeȓmeɣ-awem x marra manaya qbeȓ ma aḏ iwqeƹ.
Menbaƹd i tamara n ȓiyyam nni, ȓexddenni ṯfuct aḏ teḏweȓ ḏ ṯaǧest, ṯaziri war ticc bu ṯfawṯ.
Iṯran aḏ d wḍan zeg ujenna, yinni ijehḏen ḏeg ujenna aṯen isenhezz Arebbi.
Ȓexddenni iy ɣa ẓren Mmis n bnaḏem ihewwa-d ḏeg useynu s lƹaḍama ḏ jjheḏ nnes imɣaren.
Aḏ d issekk lmalaʼikaṯ nnes ɣar arbeƹa n imucan n ṯmurṯ manis d itekk arriḥ: zi ccarq ḏ lɣarb ḏ ljanub ḏ ccamal. Aḏ d ismun yinni ixḍar zi ȓaḥedd n ddunect-a aȓ ȓaḥedd n ujenna.
Ȓemḏem ijjen n ȓmaƹna zi ṯcejjarṯ n ṯazarṯ. Ɣir ȓefruƹ nnes aḏ ḥebbben aḏ ggen ṯifray, ataf aḏ tessnem yallah anebḏu iqarreb-d.
Amenni uȓa ḏ kenniw. Xmi ɣa ṯeẓrem ṯimesȓayin-a itewqiƹen ataf aḏ tessnem illa manaya yuḏes-d, aqaṯ zzaṯ i ṯewwarṯ.
Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Yiwḏan n ȓweqṯ-a war tmettin ca aȓ ɣa iwqeƹ marra manaya.
Aḏ ifna ujenna ḏ ṯmurṯ, walakin awaȓen inu war fennin ca ƹemmarṣ.
Cuf, nhar nni niɣ ṯsaƹƹat nni war t issin uȓa ḏ ijjen, lla lmalaʼikaṯ ḏeg ujenna uȓa ḏ Mmis. Issen-it ɣir Baba waḥḏes.
Ḥḍam ixef nwem, iȓim ƹlabal ȓaḥeqqac war ṯessinem ca meȓmi d ɣa ṯas ȓweqṯ nni.
Nhar nni aḏ yiȓi am yijjen n ssiyyed irezzu aḏ isafer. Iffeɣ zi ṯeddarṯ nnes, ixeddamen nnes ikellef-iṯen x wagȓa nnes kuȓ ijjen x ȓxeḏmeṯ nnes. Iweṣṣa aƹessas n ṯewwarṯ aḏ iqqim ifaq.
X manaya faqem baƹda, qa war ṯessinem meȓmi d ɣa iḏweȓ bab n ṯeddarṯ. War ṯessinem ma ag uƹecci niɣ ɣar ȓwesṭ n ǧiȓeṯ niɣ xmi ɣa idden uyaziḍ niɣ ɣar ȓefjar.
Ɣarwem aḏ d yas ƹlaɣafla akenniw yaf ṯeṭṭṣem!
Min ḏawem qqareɣ, qqareɣ-ṯ i marra: Iȓim ƹlabal!"
Iqqim-as yumayen i Ȓƹiḏ Ameqqran n Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏ ȓƹiḏ nni umi qqaren Ȓƹiḏ n Ṯefḍirṯ. Arruyas n ȓfuqaha ḏ imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa rezzun mammec ḏas ɣa ggen ḥima aḏ ṭṭfen Ƹisa s ṯeḥraymiṯ aṯ nɣen.
Nnan jarasen: "Itxeṣṣa war ṯ nteṭṭef ca ḏi Ȓƹiḏ ḥima ccaƹb war itegg ca lfawḍa."

Ƹisa aqaṯ ḏeg ubilaj n Bayt Ƹanya ḏi ṯeddarṯ n yijjen qqaren-as Simƹan bu-jḏam. Wami iqqim ḏinni itett, ṯqarreb-d ɣares ijjen n ṯemɣarṯ ɣares ijjen n ṯzeyyat ḏayes aman n lwarḏ iṣfan, iɣȓan s waṭṭas. Ṯerzem-it ṯferreɣ-as-ṯen x uzeǧif nnes.
Can iḏsen zzaysen iqess-asen ȓḥaȓ nnan jarasen: "Mayemmi qaƹ aḍeyyeƹ-a n waman n lwarḏ?
Ataf aman nni iȓi menzen s yijjen n ttaman ḏ ameqqran ktar zi ṯeȓtmiyya n ṯpeyyasin n nnuqarṯ aḏ mmucent i imesƹan!" Qqimen niṯni nehhan-t aṭṭas.
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Ejjem-t! Mayemmi t ṯesxeyyaqem? Aqa min ḏayi ṯegga ḏ aṣebḥan aṭṭas.
Imesƹan aqaṯen akiḏwem ȓebda. Meȓmi ma ṯexsem ṯzemmarem aḏaysen ṯeggem ȓxir, nec war kiḏwem tɣimiɣ ca i ȓebda.
Ṯegga min xas. Ṯferreɣ-ayi aman-a n lwarḏ x ddat inu ḥima aḏayi ṯsewjeḏ i ṯenḍeȓṯ inu.
Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Mani ma yuweḍ Lʼinjil ḏi ddunect-a amen-ṯekmaȓ, ataf aḏ ƹawḏen x ṯemɣarṯ-a ḏ min ḏayi ṯegga am yijjen n ḏikra xas."
Uca ikkar Yahuḏa Isxaryuṭi wenni zi ṯenƹac n arrusul iruḥ netta ɣar arruyas n ȓfuqaha ḥima aḏasen izzenz Ƹisa.
Sȓin manaya farḥen weƹḏen-ṯ aḏas ucen tmenyaṯ. Ssenni irezzu Yahuḏa lfurṣa mammec iy ɣa igg aḏasen ṯ izzenz.
Nhar amezwaru n Ȓƹiḏ n Ṯefḍirṯ, nhar nni iy ḏi ɣarrṣen i ȓƹiḏ, sseqsan imeḥḍaren Ƹisa nnan-as: "Mani ṯexseḏ a nraḥ aḏac nsewjeḏ amensi n Ȓƹiḏ Ameqqran?"
Ikkar Ƹisa ixḍar ṯnayen zeg imeḥḍaren nnes issekk-iṯen inna-asen: "Ruḥem ɣar ṯendint, akiḏwem imeȓqa ijjen n uryaz iysi-d aqnuc n waman, ḏfarem-ṯ.
Mani ma yuḏef inim-as i bab n ṯeddarṯ nni, Qa inna-ac lmuƹallim: Mani iǧa uxxam inu iy ḏi ɣa ƹeyyḏeɣ nec ḏ imeḥḍaren inu?
Akenniw yawi ɣar yijjen n ṯɣurfat ḏ ṯameqqrant ṯessu, ṯeƹḏeȓ. Ḏinni iy ḏaneɣ ɣa ṯeswejḏem."
Ruḥen imeḥḍaren nnes uḏfen ɣar ṯendint, ufin nican mamc ḏasen inna. Ṣafi swejḏen amensi n Ȓƹiḏ.
Ṯuweḍ-d ṯmeddiṯ, yusa-d Ƹisa ak ṯenƹac n arrusul nnes.
Qqimen tetten inna-asen Ƹisa: "Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Ijjen zzaywem ittet akiḏi aḏayi izzenz."
Iqqim ḏaysen ȓḥaȓ imeḥḍaren nnes tseqsan-ṯ ij-ij nnan-as: "War iǧi bu ḏ nec, yac?"
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-asen: "Ijjen zi kenniw zi ṯenƹac iḏwem, wenni iy kiḏi issisnen ḏi ṭṭebṣi."
Inna-asen: "Mmis n bnaḏem aḏas iwqeƹ ƹlaḥsab mamc xas iqqar Lkitab, walakin ya ȓefḍiḥeṯ n nni iy ṯ ɣa izzenzen! Ḥsen i netta mȓi war d ixȓiq ca."
Wami ƹaḏ tetten, iysi-d aɣrum icekkar Arebbi irza aɣrum nni yuca-asen-ṯ i imeḥḍaren nnes inna-asen: "Ysim-ṯ, ḏ wa ig iǧan ḏ ddat inu."
Iysi-d ȓkas icekkar Arebbi yuca-asen-ṯ, swin zzayes marra iḏsen.
Inna-asen: " Ȓkas-a ḏayes iḏammen n ȓƹaheḏ, iƹni ḏ iḏammen inu iy ɣa yazzȓen ƹlaḥsab aṭṭas n yiwḏan.
Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Zi ssa aȓ ṯsawent war sesseɣ ca zeg waman-a uḍiȓ ḥetta aȓ Nhar nni iy ṯen ɣa sweɣ zi jḏiḏ ḏi ȓmulk n Arebbi."
Ɣennjen ijjen n yizȓi n Ȓƹiḏ, ssenni ffɣen ruḥen ɣar Uḏrar n Zzitun.
Inna-asen Ƹisa i imeḥḍaren nnes: "Aḏayi ṯsemḥem marra iḏwem minzi iqqar Lkitab: <Aḏ uwṯeɣ wenni irassen iḥuȓiyen, kuȓ ijjen zi ṯḥimerṯ mani ɣa yarweȓ.>
Walakin xmi d ɣa kkareɣ zi ȓmewṯ, aḏawem izwareɣ ɣar ṯmurṯ n Ljalil."
Inna-as Buṭrus: "Waxxa aḏayec ɣa semḥen marra, nec war ḏayec semḥeɣ ca."
Yarra xas Ƹisa inna-as: "Aqa tesȓiḏ ȓḥaqq: Ṯa, ǧiȓeṯ-a qbeȓ ma aḏ idden uyaziḍ marrṯayen ataf aḏayi ṯenkareḏ ṯȓaṯa n ṯwaȓaṯin."
Inna-as Buṭrus netta metʼakkad: "Nec war c nekkareɣ ca waxxa akiḏec iy ɣa mmṯeɣ." Amenni iy nnan marra imeḥḍaren.
Yusa-d Ƹisa ak imeḥḍaren nnes ɣar yijjen n umcan qqaren-as <Gatsimani.> Inna-asen: "Qqimem ḏa, nec aḏ raḥeɣ ḏiha aḏ ẓẓaǧeɣ."
Yuwi akiḏes Buṭrus ḏ Yaƹqub ḏ Yuḥanna, ibḏa itnexȓeƹ itxeyyaq.
Inna-asen: "Ȓaƹmar inu ƹȓayen aḏ idduqqez s lḥuzen. Qqimem ḏa ṯfaqem."
Ibeƹƹeḏ xasen cwayt, isejjeḏ ɣar ṯmurṯ ibḏa itettar i Arebbi irezzu axas twakkes ṯsaƹƹat nni.
Inna: "A Baba cek kuȓci ṯzemmareḏ-as, sbeƹƹeḏ-iṯ xafi ȓkas-a n ȓaƹḏab. Maci mamc xseɣ nec; Lla, mamc ixes ȓxaḍar nnec cek."
Iḏweȓ ɣar imeḥḍaren-a yufi-ṯen ṭṭṣen, inna-as i Buṭrus: "Ma teṭṭṣeḏ a Simƹan? Ma war ṯzemmareḏ ca akiḏi ṯfaqeḏ waxxa ḏ ijjen n ṯsaƹƹat waha?
Iȓim ƹlabal ẓẓaǧem ḥima war tiḏfem ca ḏi ȓemḥayen. Uȓ n bnaḏem iwjeḏ walakin ddat nnes ṯeḍƹef."
Ibeƹƹeḏ xasen ƹaweḏ ittar i Arebbi amecnaw amezwaru.
Iḏweȓ-d ƹaweḏ ɣarsen yufi-ṯen ṭṭṣen ȓaḥeqqac iɣelleb xasen yiḍeṣ. Niṯni ƹaweḏ war ufin min ḏas ɣa inin.
Iḏweȓ-d ɣarsen wis ṯeȓt-marraṯ inna-asen: "Ƹaḏ ṯeṭṭṣem, ƹaḏ ṯreyyḥem? Ṣafi, baraka! Aqa ṯuweḍ-d ȓweqṯ nni iy ḏi ɣa itwasellem Mmis n bnaḏem ɣar ifassen n yinni iƹeṣṣan.
Kkarem a nuyurem qa wenni iy ḏayi ɣa izzenzen aqaṯ yusa-d."

Yallah Ƹisa issawaȓ yuweḍ-d Yahuḏa, ijjen zi ṯenƹac nni n arrusul nnes. Yuwi-d akiḏes ȓɣaci aṭṭas ysin ȓesyuf ḏ idebbuzen. Ssekken-ṯen-d arruyas n ȓfuqaha ḏ imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa ḏ imeqqranen n Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Wenni iy ṯ ɣa izzenzen iƹni Yahuḏa qbeȓ tuɣa itafeq akiḏsen x yijjen n lƹalama inna-asen: Wenni xef ɣa seǧmeɣ ḏ wenni iy xef ṯrezzum. Ṭṭfem-ṯ, awim-ṯ iḥḍa.
Ṣafi yusa-d Yahuḏa iqarreb ɣar Ƹisa inna-as: "A Siḏi." Uca iseǧem xas.
Ȓexddenni sersen xas ifassen nsen ṭṭfen-ṯ.
Ijjen zeg yinni ḏinni iǧan ijbeḏ-d ssif yuwṯa zzayes ismeɣ n arrayes n ȓfuqaha iqess-as amezzuɣ.
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Ma tɣir-awem qa nec ḏ lmujrim wami d ṯeysim ȓesyuf ḏ idebbuzen ḥima aḏayi ṯeṭṭfem niɣ?
Tuɣa tɣimiɣ akiḏwem mkuȓ nhar ḏi ṯemzida ṯameqqrant seȓmaḏeɣ ḏinni, war ḏayi ṯeṭṭifem ca. Walakin marra manaya iwqeƹ ḥima aḏ ikemmeȓ min yurin ḏi Lkutub."
Uca semḥen ḏayes marra arewȓen.
Iḏfar-iṯ ijjen n uḥenjir, xas čammir waha. Ṭṭfen-ṯ
walakin netta yarweȓ-asen ḏ aƹeryan ijja ḏinni čammir nnes.
Uwin Ƹisa ɣar arrayes n ȓfuqaha. Munen akiḏes marra arruyas n ȓfuqaha, ḏ imeqqranen n Ayṯ-Israʼil, ḏ imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa.
Iḏfar-iṯ Buṭrus zi ȓeggwaj, yuḏef ɣar ȓemraḥ n ṯeddarṯ n arrays nni. Iqqim ak iƹessasen izɣar ɣar ṯmessi.
Arruyas n ȓfuqaha ḏ marra Jmaƹṯ n lḥukkam n Ayṯ-Israʼil rezzun chaḏeṯ ḍed i Ƹisa ḥima aṯ nɣen walakin war ufin walu.
Aṭṭas iy xas icehhḏen ẓẓur, walakin ɣarsen tanaquḍ ḏi chaḏeṯ nsen kuȓ ijjen min iqqar.
Kkaren ȓebƹaḍ cehḏen xas ẓẓur nnan:
"Netsȓa-yas iqqar qa nec aḏ heḏmeɣ ṯamziḏa-ya ṯameqqrant iy bnan yiwḏan s ifassen, aḏ bniɣ ijjen n ṯemziḏa ḏi ṯeȓtiyyam war t bnin yiwḏan s ifassen."
Walakin ƹaweḏ ɣarsen tanaquḍ ḏi chaḏeṯ nni nsen kuȓ ijjen min iqqar.
Uca ibedd arrays n ȓefuqaha ḏi ȓwesṭ n jmaƹṯ inna-as i Ƹisa: "Ma war ṯeqqareḏ walu cek? Min xac cehhḏen yiwḏan-a?"
Iqqim Ƹisa isqar war xas yarri ca. Ikkar isseqsa-ṯ ƹaweḏ arrayes n ȓefuqaha inna-as: "Ma cek ḏ Lmasiḥ Mmis n Arebbi iy iǧan mubarik?"
Inna-as Ƹisa: "Wah, ḏ nec. Kenniw aḏ teẓrem Mmis n bnaḏem iqqim x ufusi n Lqawi. Aṯ ṯeẓrem ƹaweḏ ihewwa-d ak useynu n ujenna."
Arrays nni n ȓfuqaha iɣareṣ arruḍ x yixef nnes inna-asen: "War neḥḏij bu ȓechuḏ!
Ma ṯesȓim-as iqqar lmunkar x Siḏi Arebbi? Min ḏawem imeḍharen?" Marra ḥekmen xas belli isḏaheǧ ȓmewṯ.
Ssenni bḏan ȓebƹaḍ zzaysen ssusufen xas. Ȓeḥḥfen-as x uɣembub nnes ccaṯen-ṯ s ȓpunyaṯ qqaren-as: Iwa a nnabi siweȓ! Uwin-ṯ-id iƹassasen ccaṯen-ṯ s iseqqiȓen.
Buṭrus iqqim ɣar barra awedday ḏi ȓemraḥ. Ṯqarreb ɣares ijjen n ṯxeddant n arrays n ȓfuqaha.
Ṯeẓri-ṯ izɣar ɣar ṯmessi, ṯexzar ḏayes mliḥ ṯenna-as: "Uȓa ḏ cek ṯeǧiḏ ak Ƹisa zi Naṣira."
Inkar Buṭrus inna-as: "War fhimeɣ ca war ssineɣ ca minxef ṯessawaȓeḏ!" Iffeɣ Buṭrus iruḥ ṭṭarf n ṯewwarṯ n ȓemraḥ. {Ȓexddenni idden uyaziḍ.}
Ṯeẓri-ṯ ṯxeddant nni ḏinni ṯenna-asen ƹaweḏ i yinni ibedden ḏeg umcan nni: "Qa aryaz-a wanita zzaysen."
Inkar Buṭrus ƹaweḏ. Menbaƹd cwayt nnan-as yinni ibedden ḏeg umcan nni: "Iwa nican, cek ḏ ijjen zzaysen minzi cek zi Ljalil."
Ikkar Buṭrus ibḏa itḥarrem ixef nnes itjaǧa iqqar-asen: "Aryaz-a iy xef ṯessawaȓem nec war ṯ ssineɣ ca!"

Ȓexddenni idden uyaziḍ ṯwaȓa wis ṯnayen, ifekkar-d Buṭrus awaȓ nni n Ƹisa wami ḏas inna: Qbeȓ ma aḏ idden uyaziḍ marrṯayen aḏayi ṯenkareḏ ṯȓaṯa n ṯwaȓaṯin. Wami ifekkar ḏi manayenni iru imeṭṭawen ḏ imeǧaḥen aṭṭas.

Wami iṣbeḥ ȓḥaȓ, munen arruyas n ȓfuqaha, ḏ imeqqranen n Ayṯ-Israʼil, ḏ imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa, ḏ marra Jmaƹṯ n lḥukkam nsen mcawaren jarasen. Carfen Ƹisa uwin-ṯ aṯ sellmen i lḥakem arrumani umi qqaren Bilaṭus.
Isseqsa-ṯ Bilaṭus inna-as: "Ma ḏ cek ḏ azeǧiḏ n Ayṯ-Israʼil?" Inna-as Ƹisa: "Aqa ṯenniḏ-t cek."
Qqimen ḏinni arruyas n ȓfuqaha tahamen-ṯ aṭṭas.
Inna-as Bilaṭus i Ƹisa: "Ma war ṯqarreḏ walu? Qa xzar mecḥaȓ xak tceṯcan!"
Iqqim Bilaṭus itƹejjeb wami war xasen yarri bu wawaȓ Ƹisa.
Ḏi mkuȓ Ȓƹiḏ Ameqqran inum Bilaṭus iḍeǧeq-asen-d i yijjen n umeḥbus ƹlaḥsab wenni ixes ccaƹb.
Ijjen n umeḥbus qqaren-as Barabas ggin-ṯ ḏi ȓeḥbes ak yinni itḥerraben ḍed i ȓmexzen minzi nɣin ijjen n bnaḏem ḏi ȓfawḏa.
Gaƹƹḏen ȓɣaci ɣar Bilaṭus, bḏan tettarren zzayes aḏasen igg min inum itegg-asen.
Inna-asen Bilaṭus: "Ma ṯexsem aḏawem d ḍeȓqeɣ i uzeǧiḏ n Ayṯ-Israʼil?"
Issen Bilaṭus belli arruyas nni n ȓfuqaha sellmen-as Ƹisa ȓaḥeqqac ḥesḏen-ṯ.
Kkaren arruyas nni n ȓfuqaha qeȓben azeǧif i ȓɣaci nni ḥima aḏasen d iḍȓeq i Barabas.
Indeq-d Bilaṭus inna-asen: "Iwa min ḏas ɣa ggeɣ i bnaḏem-a umi ṯeqqarem qa netta ḏ Azeǧiḏ n Ayṯ-Israʼil?"
Snekkaren ṯɣuyyeṯ s jjheḏ qqaren: "Ṣelleb-iṯ!"
Inna-asen Bilaṭus: "Mayemmi? Man ljarima ig igga wanita?" Walakin arennin snekkaren ṯɣuyyeṯ s jjheḏ qqaren: "Ṣelleb-iṯ!"
Bilaṭus wami irezzu aḏ iseƹƹef ȓɣaci nni, iḍȓeq-asen-d i Barabas. Ssenni uwṯin Ƹisa s usɣun isellem-asen-ṯ ḥima aṯ ṣellben x ṣṣalib.
Uwin-ṯ ȓƹaskar ɣar ḏaxeȓ ɣar ȓemraḥ n ȓeqṣar n lḥakem, smunen-d ḏinni marra lfirqa n ȓƹaskar nni.
Ggin xas aseȓham ḏ azeggwaɣ. Muḏen-as ijjen n ttaj n isennanen ggin-as-ṯ x uzeǧif nnes.
Bḏan tseǧamen xas qqaren-as ssalam ay azeǧiḏ n Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Ccaṯen-ṯ s yijjen n uɣanim ɣar uzeǧif nnes, ssusufen xas, terkaƹen-as tsejjaḏen-as.
Wami xas kemmȓen abuṣar, kksen-as aseȓham nni azeggwaɣ ggin-as arruḍ nnes uwin-ṯ ḥima aṯ ṣellben.
Ijjen n uryaz ikka-d zi ȓkampu iƹḏu-d ssenni. Aryaz nni zi ṯendint n Lqurina qqaren-as Simƹan, netta ḏ babas n Iskander ak Arufus. Ggin xas ȓƹaskar ṣṣalib s bezzez ḥima aṯ yarbu.
Uwin Ƹisa ɣar yijjen n umcan qqaren-as <Gulguṭa.> (Ȓmaƹna n yisem-a: Amcan n Jumjuma.)
Ucin-as aman uḍiȓ ixelleṭ ḏaysen ijjen n ddwa ḏ amerzag qqaren-as murr, walakin yugi Ƹisa aṯen isew.
Ṣellben-ṯ, ferqen arruḍ nnes jarasen. Ggin lqurƹa ḥima kuȓ ijjen min ɣa iysi.
Tuɣat ḏ tesƹa n ṣbaḥ wami ṯ ṣellben.
Ɣar uzeǧif nnes ggin-as ijjen n ṯeȓwiḥet ṯura ḏayes ttuhma nni iqqaren: "Wanita ḏ azeǧiḏ n Ayṯ-Israʼil."
Ṣellben akiḏes ṯnayen n iceffaren, ijjen x ufusi ijjen x uẓeȓmaḍ nnes.
{S manayenni ikemmeȓ min yurin ḏi Lkitab qa ḥesben-ṯ zi lmujrimin.}
Iwḏan iy tekken ssenni tukkaren-ṯ thezzan azeǧif nsen qqaren-as: "Ma ḏ cek iy ɣa iheḏmen ṯamziḏa ṯameqqrant at tebniḏ ḏi ṯeȓtiyyam!?
Nejja ixef nnec hwa-d zeg ujenna zi ṣṣalib-a!"
Uȓa ḏ arruyas n ȓfuqaha ḏ imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa tbuṣaren xas ƹaweḏ qqaren i wayawya: "Isenjem inneɣni walakin war izemmar ca ȓexxu aḏ isenjem ixef nnes!
Hwa-d a Lmasiḥ ay azeǧiḏ n Ayṯ-Israʼil ȓexxu zeg ujenna zi ṣṣalib-a ḥima a nẓer manaya azzayek namen!" Amenni ƹaweḏ iy ṯ zawaren lmujrimin nni iy kiḏes ṣellben.
Ɣar ṯenƹac n uziȓ, ṯehwa-d ṯaǧest x ṯmurṯ amen-ṯekmaȓ aȓ wami ḏ ṯȓaṯa uƹecci.
Ɣar ṯȓaṯa uƹecci iȓaɣa Ƹisa s jjheḏ inna: "Iliy, Iliy, lma sbaqṯani?" Ȓmaƹna n wawaȓ-a: "Ya Arebbi, ya Arebbi, mayemmi ḏayi ṯsemḥeḏ?"
Sȓin-as ȓebƹaḍ zeg yinni iḥḍaren ḏinni nnan: "Aqa itȓaɣa x nnabi Ilyas."

Ȓexddenni iruḥ ijjen zzaysen iqȓeƹ itazzeȓ, iysi ijjen n spunxa iseɣḏeṣ-it ḏeg waman uḍiȓ ḏ isemmamen, iggi-t x yij ukeccuḍ yuca-as aḏ isew. Inna: "Ȓexxu jjem-ṯ, a nẓer ma aḏ d yas nnabi Ilyas aṯiḏ isihwa!"
Iȓaɣa Ƹisa s yijjen n ṯmijja ṯemɣar yarra nnefs ṣafi immuṯ.
Ȓexddenni ig iqqarṣ arrwaq n ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant x ṯnayen zeg ujenna aȓ ṯmurṯ.
Ijjen n uƹaskari ḏ ameqqran n arrumanus ibedd ḏinni zzaṯes iẓra ȓmewṯ ig igga Ƹisa inna: "Aṯarras-a ḏ ṣṣaḥ ḏ Mmis n Arebbi."
Ḏinni can n ṯemɣarin xezzarent-id zi ȓeggwaj, ḏaysent Maryam ṯamagdaliṯ, ḏ Salumi, ḏ Maryam yemmas n Yaƹqub amezyan ḏ Yusis.
Niṯenti tuɣa ḏeffarent-ṯ, tsexxarent xas wami tuɣaṯ iǧa ḏi ṯmurṯ n Ljalil. Ƹaweḏ ḥḍarent akiḏes aṭṭas n ṯemɣarin nneɣni zi ṯinni kis igaƹƹḏen ɣar Lquds.
Nhar nni sewjaḏen i nhar n ssebṯ n lƹibada. Wami d ṯuweḍ ṯmeddiṯ,

yusa-d ijjen n uryaz qqaren-as Yusef, zi dcar n Arimatya. Netta ḏ ijjen n uryaz muhim jar Jmaƹṯ n lḥukkam n Ayṯ-Israʼil, itreḥḥab ƹaweḏ zi ȓmulk n Arebbi. Izƹem yuḏef ɣar lḥakem Bilaṭus ittar-as ddat n Ƹisa.
Bilaṭus iḏhec wami isȓa Ƹisa ḏeɣya immuṯ. Iȓaɣa-d x uƹaskari nni ameqqran innas-as ma immuṯ ma ƹaḏ?
Wami issen Bilaṭus zeg uƹaskari nni Ƹisa immuṯ, isellem ddat nnes i Yusef.
Yusef isɣa-d ȓecfen, isehwa-d ddat nnes ikeffen-it s ȓecfen. Isers-it ḏeg yijjen n unḍeȓ iɣzin ḏeg uzru igga am yifri. Iseqnunni ijjen n uzru ḏ ameqqran yarri-ṯ x uqemmum n unḍeȓ nni.
Maryam ṯamagdaliṯ ḏ Maryam yemmas n Yusis xezzarent mani inḍeȓ.
Wami iƹḏu nhar n ssebṯ n lƹibada, Maryam ṯamagdaliṯ, ḏ Salumi, ḏ Maryam yemmas n Yaƹqub ruḥent sɣint lƹiṭar uwint-ṯ-id aḏas ḏehnent.
Nhar amezwaru n ssimana zic ak ȓefjar ruḥent ɣar unḍeȓ nnes.
Ssawaȓent jarasent ak ubriḏ qqarent: "Wi ḏaneɣ ɣa ikksen azru x uqemmum n unḍeȓ aṯ iseqnunni?"
Wami xzarent, ufint azru nni itwakkes u netta ḏ ameqqran aṭṭas.
Uḏfent ɣar yifri n unḍeȓ nni ufint ijjen n uḥenjir iqqim x jjiheṯ ṯafusiṯ, igga arruḍ ḏ acemȓaȓ u qqiment ḏehhcent aṭṭas.
Inna-asent: "War ḏehhcent ca! Kennint ṯrezzunt x Ƹisa Naṣiri itwaṣellben. Netta war ḏa iǧi ca, ikkar-d zi ȓmewṯ. Haqa amcan nnes mani tuɣa ṯ sersen.
Ruḥent kennint ȓexxu ɣar imeḥḍaren nnes ḏ Buṭrus inint-asen aqa Ƹisa iruḥ aḏawem izwar ɣar ṯmurṯ n Ljalil akenniw iraja ḏinni. Aṯ tafem ḏinni mammec ɣarwem d iweṣṣa zi qbeȓ."
Ṯimɣarin nni terjijint ḏehhcent, kkarent ruḥent ḏeɣya zeg unḍeȓ nni arewȓent. War ƹawḏent manayenni i ḥadd minzi niṯenti ggwḏent.
{Ƹisa wami d ikkar zi ȓmewṯ zic nhar amezwaru n ssimana imeḍhar-d ḏ amezwaru i Maryam ṯamagdaliṯ ṯenni iy zi tuɣa isufeɣ sebƹa n jnun.
Ṯruḥ nettaṯ aḏ tsiweḍ ȓexbar-a i yinni tuɣa iǧan ak Ƹisa, ṯufi-ṯen ḥeznen trun.
Wami ḏasen ṯƹaweḏ ṯenna-asen qa ẓriɣ-ṯ iddar, war t uminen ca.
Menbaƹd i manaya imeḍhar-asen-d Ƹisa s yijjen n ṣṣifeṯ nneɣni i ṯnayen iḏsen wami tuɣa gguren ɣar ȓkampu.
Ḏewȓen-d aḏ ƹawḏen ȓexbar-a i ayṯmaṯsen, war ṯen uminen ca.
Menbaƹd wami qqimen tetten ḥiṭac n arrusul nnes, imeḍhar-asen-d inha-ṯen minzi lʼiman nsen ḏ uqlil uȓawen nsen qesḥen. Tuɣa niṯni ƹaweḏ war uminen ca yinni iy ṯ iẓrin wami d ikkar zi ȓmewṯ.
Inna-asen: "Ruḥem ɣar marra ddunect, beccarem marra ȓegnus s Lʼinjil.
Wenni yumnen aḏ itwaṭehhar s waman ataf aḏ injem. Wenni war yuminen ca ataf aḏ itwaḥkem.
Ḏ ṯina ḏ lƹalamaṯ iy d ɣa imeḍharen ak yinni itamnen: Aqa niṯni aḏ sufɣen jnun ƹlaḥsab isem inu, aḏ ssiwȓen s yiȓesawen ḏ jḏiḏ,
aḏ ysin ifiɣeran s ifassen nsen. Meȓa swin min ineqqen, ataf war ṯen iḍarri ca. Aḏ sersen ifassen nsen x imehȓac aḏ genfan."
Issiweȓ akiḏsen Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa ssenni itwarfeƹ ɣar ujenna iqqim x ufusi n Arebbi.
Niṯni ffɣen beccaren iwḏan ḏi mkuȓ amcan. Siḏiṯneɣ aqaṯ akiḏsen, ismeḍhar-d ȓḥaqq n yinni itbeccaren s waṭṭas n lƹalamaṯ iy ṯen iḏeffaren.}
A si Tufilus, aṭṭas n yiwḏan ggin aḏ arin min iweqƹen ɣarneɣ.
Urin nican ƹlaḥsab mamc ḏaneɣ xbaren ȓechuḏ ḏ ixeddamen n wawaȓ n Arebbi iǧan ḏeg umezwaru.
Tuɣa ḏi ȓweqṯ n uzeǧiḏ Hirudus netta iḥekkmen x ṯmurṯ n Yahuḏiya ḏinni ijjen n ȓefqi netta zi lfirqa n Abyu qqaren-as Zakariya. Ɣares ijjen n ṯemɣarṯ zi ddurriṯ n Harun nettaṯ qqaren-as Ilizabet.
Zakariya ḏ Ilizabet niṯni gguren nican ak Arebbi, uȓ nsen ḏ acemȓaȓ. Teggen marra min yumar ḏ marra min iweṣṣa Siḏi Arebbi.
Walakin war ɣarsen bu iḥenjiren minzi Ilizabet war tirew ca. Ƹaweḏ niṯni s ṯnayen iḏsen mɣaren aṭṭas.
Ijjen n nhar Zakariya ṯuweḍ-d nnuba nnes aḏ ixḏem ḏi ṯemziḏa ḏ ȓefqi zzaṯ i Arebbi ak lfirqa nnes.
Ggin lqurƹa ƹlaḥsab ttaqalid nsen iy teggen ȓfuqaha. Nhar nni ṯusa-d lqurƹa ḏi Zakariya bac aḏ yaḏef ɣar ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant n Siḏi Arebbi ḥima aḏ iceƹƹeȓ tbaxur ḏinni.
Wami itceƹƹaȓ tbaxur, marra ccaƹb nni iy ḏinni imunen qqimen ɣar barra i ṯemziḏa tẓaǧan.
Ȓexddenni imeḍhar-as-d i Zakariya ijjen n lmalak n Siḏi Arebbi ibedd x ufusi n ȓmeḏbaḥ n tbaxur.
Zakariya wami ṯ iẓra inexȓeƹ, iggweḏ.
Inna-as Lmalak nni: "A Zakariya war teggweḏ ca, qa istajeb-ac Arebbi ḏi min ḏas ṯettareḏ. Ṯamɣarṯ nnec Ilizabet aḏac d ṯejj ijjen n uḥenjir, aṯ ṯsemmiḏ cek Yaḥya.
Ssaƹḏ nnec aḏ tfarḥeḏ. Xmi d ɣa ixȓeq azzayes farḥen aṭṭas n yiwḏan
minzi aḏ yiȓi ḏ ameqqran ɣar Siḏi Arebbi. Aḏ tiȓi labud ƹemmarṣ aḏ isew aman n uḍiȓ niɣ ḏ waman n imendi. Aḏ yiȓi iƹemmar s Arruḥ iqeddsen ḥetta ḏeg uƹeddis n yemmas.
Aḏ yarr aṭṭas n Ayṯ-Israʼil ɣar Siḏi Arebbi nsen.

Aḏ yuyur zzaṯ i Siḏi Arebbi s yijjen n arruḥ ijheḏ am wenni n nnabi Ilyas. Aḏ ismeṣȓaḥ lwalidin ak ṯarwa nsen. Aḏ yarr yinni iƹeṣṣan ɣar ubriḏ n yinni iǧan nican ḥima aḏ isewjeḏ ccaƹb i Siḏi Arebbi aḏ iȓin wejḏen."
Inna-as Zakariya i lmalak nni: "Mammec ɣa ssneɣ nec manaya ḏ ṣṣaḥ? Qa nec wessareɣ, ṯamɣarṯ inu ṯewsar."
Indeq-d lmalak nni inna-as: "Qa nec ḏ Jibril ḏ wenni itbeddan zzaṯ i Arebbi, issekk-ayi-d Arebbi ɣarec bac akic ssiwȓeɣ aḏac iniɣ ȓexbar-a isfarraḥen.
Ȓexxu cek aḏ tiȓiḏ ḏ azeynun. War ṯessiwiȓeḏ ca ḥetta aȓ nhar nni iy ɣa iwqeƹ manaya minzi cek war ṯumineḏ ca zeg wawaȓ inu wenni iy d ɣa iffɣen nican ḏi ȓweqṯ nnes."
Ccaƹb qqimen trajan Zakariya, tƹejjben wami iƹḍeȓ aṭṭas ɣar ḏaxeȓ ḏi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant.
Wami d iffeɣ ssenni war izemmar ca akiḏsen issiweȓ, iqqim issawaȓ akiḏsen s ifassen waha. Ssenni fehmen imeḍhar-as-d lwaḥi ɣar ḏaxeȓ ḏi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant iḏweȓ ḏ azeynun.
Wami ƹḏun wussan n ȓxeḏmeṯ nnes iḏweȓ ɣar ṯeddarṯ nnes.
Menbaƹd ṯeysi ṯemɣarṯ nnes Ilizabet aƹeddis ṯeqqim xems chur ṯesnuffar ixef nnes.
Ṯeqqar: "Ḏ manaya iy ḏayi yuca Siḏi Arebbi ḏi nhar wami ḏayi ifqeḏ ḥima axafi ikkes ȓƹib n yiwḏan."
Ilizabet wami ṯeǧa ḏi char wis setta, issekk-d Arebbi ijjen n lmalak qqaren-as Jibril ɣar yijjen n ubilaj ḏi ṯmurṯ n Ljalil qqaren-as Naṣira.
Iruḥ ɣar yijjen n ṯeƹzriṯ qqaren-as Maryam ṯenni iy keḏ igga zzujiya ijjen n uryaz zi ddurriṯ n Dawed netta qqaren-as Yusef.
Yuḏef ɣares lmalak nni inna-as: "Azul ya ṯenni iy xef irḍa Arebbi, aqa Siḏi Arebbi aqaṯ akiḏem."
Ḏinni Maryam ṯnexȓeƹ wami ṯesȓa i wawaȓen nnes, ṯrezzu aḏ tmeyyez min iƹna sȓam nni.
Inna-as lmalak nni: "War teggweḏ ca a Maryam, aqa cem yarḍa xam Arebbi!
Aḏ teysiḏ aƹeddis, aḏ d tejjeḏ ijjen n uḥenjir aṯ tsemmiḏ Ƹisa.
Aḏ yiȓi imɣar, ataf tȓaɣan-as a Mmis n Wenni Yuƹȓan. Aḏas yuc Siḏi Arebbi nnes lƹarc n jeddis ameqqran Dawed.
Aḏ iḥkem x ȓqum n Yaƹqub i ȓebda, ȓmulk nnes ƹemmarṣ aḏ ifna."
Ṯenna-as Maryam i lmalak nni: "Mammec iy ɣa yiȓi manaya? Aqa nec ƹaḏ ḏ ṯaƹzriṯ."
Indeq-d lmalak nni inna-as: "Axam d ihwa Arruḥ iqeddsen ḏ jjheḏ n Wenni Yuƹȓan axam yarr ṯiȓi. S manayenni aḥenjir iqeddsen iy ɣa d ṯejjeḏ ataf tȓaɣan-as a Mmis n Arebbi.
Ilizabet ṯenni iǧan zi ȓeḥbab nnem, waxxa nettaṯ ṯemɣar aqat s uƹeddis. Aqat ḏi char wis setta waxxa tȓaɣan-as yiwḏan a ṯenni war itirwen ca.
War ṯeǧi bu can ȓḥajeṯ ṯeqseḥ ɣar Arebbi."
Ṯenna-as Maryam: "Nec aqayi ḏ ṯaxeddant ɣar Siḏi Arebbi, arḍiɣ x wawaȓ nnec aḏayi iwqeƹ." Ssenni iruḥ xas lmalak nni.
Ḏeg wussan nni ṯekkar Maryam ṯruḥ s ṯazzȓa ɣar uḏrar ɣar yijjen n ubilaj ḏi ṯmurṯ n Yahuḏiya.
Ṯuḏef ɣar ṯeddarṯ n Zakariya ṯseǧem x Ilizabet.
Wami ṯesȓa Ilizabet i sȓam n Maryam, inhezz useymi nni ḏeg uƹeddis nnes, nettaṯ ṯeccur s Arruḥ iqeddsen.
Ṯȓaɣa s yijjen n ṯmijja ṯejheḏ ṯenna: "Cem twabarkeḏ jar ṯemɣarin, ƹaweḏ itwabarek wenni iy iǧan ḏeg uƹeddis nnem!
Nhara ḏ nhar ḏ ameqqran i nec wami ɣari d tusa yemmas n Siḏi!
Wami d tusiḏ sȓiɣ i sȓam nnem, inhezz uƹeddis inu s ȓefraḥeṯ.
A ssaƹḏ n ṯenni yumnen min ḏas inna Siḏi Arebbi aḏ yiȓi."
Uca ṯenna Maryam: "Ȓaƹmar inu iḥemmeḏ Siḏi Arebbi,
arruḥ inu ifareḥ zi Arebbi iy ḏayi isnejmen.
Iẓra-ayi ḏ ṯaxeddanṯ nnes ḏ ṯadriwect waha. Ssa aȓ ṯsawent marra iwḏan aḏayi ḥessben ḏ ṯamimunt,
minzi wenni izemmaren igga-ayi aṭṭas n ṯmesȓayin ḏ ṯimeqqranin. Netta isem nnes ḏ ameqqran,
arraḥmeṯ nnes ṯeǧa zi ljil ɣar ljil i yinni ṯ iteggwḏen.
Igga s ufus nnes ȓexḏayem ṯimeqqranin, icettet yinni iḥesben ixef nsen ḏ imeqqranen.
Isehwa-d izeǧiḏen zi lƹarcaṯ nsen, isgaƹƹeḏ yinni iǧan ḏ ḏrawec.
Isejjiwen s ȓxir nnes yinni iǧuzen, issekk twajar s ifassen nsen xwan.
Iƹawen Ayṯ-Israʼil iy iǧan ḏ ȓƹabḏ nnes ƹlaḥsab arraḥmeṯ nnes,
mamc iwƹeḏ ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ, Brahim ḏ ddurriṯ nnes i ȓebda."
Ṯeqqim Maryam ak Ilizabet can ṯeȓt chur ssenni ṯeƹqeb-d ɣar ṯeddarṯ nnes.
Wami d ṯuweḍ ȓweqṯ n Ilizabet aḏ tarew, ṯejja-d aḥenjir.
Jjiran nnes ḏ ȓeḥbab nnes farḥen akiḏes wami ɣarsen ȓexbar belli Siḏ Arebbi irḍa xas aṭṭas.
Ṯeƹḏu ṯmenyam, usin-d yiwḏan ḥima aṯ ṭehharen. Rezzun aḏas semman Zakariya x yisem n babas,
walakin yemmas ṯugi ṯenna-asen: "Lla, aṯ nsemma Yaḥya."
Nnan-as: "Uȓa ḏ ijjen zi ȓeḥbab nnem ma isemma s yisem-a."
Sseqsan babas s ifassen: "Mammec ṯexseḏ cek aṯ tsemmiḏ?"
Ittar Zakariya ijjen n ṯaȓwiḥet yura ḏayes: "Isem nnes Yaḥya." Qqimen yiwḏan nni tƹejjben marra iḏsen.
Ḏeg umcan indeq Zakariya ibḏa issawaȓ iḥemmeḏ Arebbi.
Ggwḏen marra jjiran. Bḏan ssawaȓen yiwḏan x marra manaya ḏi marra iḏurar n ṯmurṯ n Yahuḏiya.
Marra ug itesȓan x ṯmesȓayin-a qqaren ḏeg wuȓawen nsen, Min ɣa iḏweȓ uḥenjir-a? Minzi fus n Siḏi Arebbi aqaṯ akiḏes.
Zakariya babas n Yaḥya, iccur s Arruḥ iqeddsen, issiweȓ s min iƹȓem zi Arebbi inna:
"Lḥamdu lillah i Siḏi Arebbi n Ayṯ-Israʼil, ȓaḥeqqac ifqeḏ ccaƹb nnes ifekk-iṯ.
Ismeḍhar-aneɣ-d wenni ḏeg iǧa jjheḏ iy ḏaneɣ ɣa isnejmen, yusa-d zi ddurriṯ n Dawed ȓƹabḏ n Arebbi.
Manaya issiweȓ s yiȓesawen n lʼanbiya ṣṣaliḥin aṭṭas zeg wami,
aḏaneɣ isenjem zi ȓƹaḏyan nneɣ, ƹaweḏ zeg ifassen n marra yinni ḏaneɣ itƹiffan.
Aḏ d ismeḍhar arraḥmeṯ nnes iy zi iwƹeḏ ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ, aḏ iƹqeȓ x ȓƹaheḏ nnes iqeddsen.
Yuca-as ȓƹaheḏ i jeddiṯneɣ Brahim,
aḏaneɣ isenjem zeg ifassen n ȓƹaḏyan nneɣ, ḥima aṯ neƹbeḏ bȓa ṯiggwḏi,
s wuȓ iṣfa ḏ acemȓaȓ i marra ṯuḏarṯ nneɣ.
Y cek ay aḥenjir, aḏac tȓaɣan nnabi n Wenni Yuƹȓan, minzi aḏ tuyureḏ ɣar zzaṯ ḥima aḏ teswejḏeḏ abriḏ i Siḏi Arebbi.
Ƹaweḏ aḏ tesȓemḏeḏ i ccaƹb nnes x usenjem, iƹni mamc iy ɣa twaɣfarent ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nsen.
Minzi Arebbi nneɣ ḏ araḥman ḏ araḥim, ifqeḏ-aneɣ-d zeg ujenna xmi ṯɣeǧi ṯfuct.
Ḥima aḏ yuc ṯfawṯ i yinni itƹicen ḏi ṯaǧesṯ ḏi ṯiȓi n ȓmewṯ, ḥima aḏaneɣ isuyur iḍaren nneɣ ɣar ubriḏ n ȓehna."
Tuɣa aḥenjir itemɣar itejhiḏ s arruḥ nnes. Izeddeɣ ḏi ȓexȓa aȓ wami d imeḍhar i Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Ḏi ȓiyyam nni azeǧiḏ Qayṣar Agusṭus yuca lʼamar aḏ ḥesben marra imezḏaɣ n ṯmura iy ḏi iḥkem.
Aḥsab-a amezwaru iwqeƹ wami iḥkem Kurinus ḏi ṯmurṯ n Surya.
Ruḥen marra iwḏan ḥima aḏ sejjlen, kuȓ ijjen iruḥ ɣar ubilaj nnes.
Igaƹƹeḏ Yusef zi ṯmurṯ n Ljalil zeg ubilaj n Naṣira iruḥ ɣar ṯmurṯ n Yahuḏiya ɣar ubilaj n Dawed wenni umi qqaren Bayt Laḥm minzi netta zi ddurriṯ n Dawed ḏ ȓeḥbab nnes.
Igaƹƹeḏ ḏinni aḏ isejjel netta ḏ Maryam ṯenni iy keḏ igga zzujiya, nettaṯ aqat s uƹeddis.
Wami uwḍen ḏinni, ṯuweḍ-d ȓweqṯ nnes ḥima aḏ tarew.
Ṯurew mmis amenzu ṯseḥnunneḍ-iṯ ṯeggi-ṯ ḏi ȓmeḏweḏ minzi war ufin bu umcan ḏi ṯeddarṯ n imsafaren.
Tuɣa ḏinni aȓ jjiheṯ nni imeksawen ḥeṭṭan ṯiḥimeriwin nsen s ǧiȓeṯ.
Ṯusa-d ijjen n lmalaʼika n Siḏ Arebbi ṯbedd-d ɣarsen, itceƹciƹ nnur n lƹaḍama n Siḏ Arebbi inneḍ-d xasen ggwḏen aṭṭas.
Ṯenna-asen lmalaʼika nni: "War teggwḏem ca. Aqa nec tbeccareɣ-kenniw s yijjen n ȓexbar imɣar aṭṭas azzayes ifareḥ marra ccaƹb.
Ixȓeq-d nhara ḏeg ubilaj n Dawed wenni iy kenniw ɣa isnejmen, netta ḏ Siḏiṯneɣ Lmasiḥ.
Kenniw aḏ tafem ijjen n lƹalama aḏ tafem ijjen n useymi iḥnunneḍ iṭṭeṣ ḏi ȓmeḏweḏ."
Ƹlaɣafla meḍharen-d ak lmalaʼika nni aṭṭas n imezḏaɣ n ujenna ḥemmḏen Arebbi qqaren:
"Lƹaḍama i Arebbi Yuƹȓan, ḏ ȓehna n yinni ḏi ṯmurṯ mixef irḍa."
Wami ruḥent lmalaʼikaṯ nni ƹeqbent ɣar ujenna, ssiwȓen imeksawen nni jarasen nnan: "Yallahet a nraḥeṯ ɣar Bayt Laḥm a nẓer manaya ig iweqƹen min xaneɣ issiweȓ Siḏi Arebbi."
Ruḥen ḏeɣya ufin Maryam ḏ Yusef ḏ useymi nni iṭṭeṣ ḏi ȓmeḏweḏ.
Wami ṯ ufin ḏinni, kkaren xbaren iwḏan min ḏasen ṯenna lmalaʼika nni x uḥenjir-a.
Marra wenni itsȓan itƹejjeb ḏeg wawaȓ nni iy ḏasen nnan imeksawen.
Amma Maryam, ṯxemmeȓ marra ṯimesȓayin-a ḏeg wuȓ nnes txemmam ḏaysent.
Ssenni ƹeqben imeksawen nni semɣaren Arebbi ḥemmḏen-ṯ x marra min sȓin ḏ min ẓrin, ufin ṯimesȓayin nni weqƹent nican amecnaw mamc ḏasen ṯenna lmalaʼika nni.
Wami ikemmeȓ uḥenjir nni ṯmeniyyam ḥima aḏayes iṭehhar, semman-ṯ Ƹisa s yisem nni mamec ṯ isemma lmalak nni zi qbeȓ ma aḏ yiȓi ḏeg uƹeddis n yemmas.
Wami kemmȓen wussan nni iy ḏi teggen ruḍu bac lwalidin nnes aḏ iȓin ṣfan ƹlaḥsab Ccariƹa n Musa, uwin-ṯ ɣar ṯendint n Lquds ḥima axas ttaren i Siḏ Arebbi.
Ammu ig yuri ḏi Lkitab n Siḏ Arebbi: <Mkuȓ mmis amenzu aḏ yiȓi ḏ ameqqran ɣar Siḏ Arebbi.>
Ƹaweḏ bac aḏ qeddmen ijjen n dbiḥeṯ mamc d yusa ḏi Lkitab n Siḏ Arebbi: <Ṯnayen n ṯeḏbirin n ȓexȓa, niɣ ṯnayen n ṯeḏbirin ḏ ṯimezyanin.>
Tuɣa ḏinni ḏi ṯendint n Lquds ijjen n bnaḏem qqaren-as Cimƹun. Iggur nican, iteggweḏ Arebbi, itraja Ayṯ-Israʼil aḏ nejmen, Arruḥ iqeddsen aqaṯ xas.
Tuɣa netta ixbar-iṯ Arruḥ iqeddsen war itmetti ca aȓ ɣa iẓer Lmasiḥ n Siḏ Arebbi.
Ikkar Cimƹun isuyur-iṯ Arruḥ iqeddsen ɣar ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant. Wami uḏfen lwalidin n Ƹisa ḥima aḏas ggen min ṯeqqar Ccariƹa n Musa,
yufa Cimƹun aḥarmuc nni iysi-ṯ jar ifassen nnes icekkar Arebbi inna:
"Ya Mulana, ejj-ayi ȓƹabḏ nnec aḏ raḥeɣ ȓexxu ɣar ṯeddarṯ n ȓehna, amecnaw mamc ṯenniḏ cek s wawaȓ nnec.
Minzi ṯiṭṭawin inu ẓrint asenjem nnec,
iy ṯeswejḏeḏ i marra iwḏan.
Netta ḏ ijjen n nnur iy ṯesmeḍhareḏ i ȓegnus, netta ḏ ijjen n lƹaḍama n ccaƹb nnec n Ayṯ-Israʼil."
Babas ḏ yemmas qqimen tƹejjben ḏi min xas itwannan.
Ibarek-iṯen Cimƹun inna-yas i yemmas Maryam: "Aqa wanita iggi-ṯ Siḏi Arebbi aḏ d isehwa aḏ isiȓi aṭṭas n yiwḏan ḏi Ayṯ-Israʼil. Netta ḏ ijjen n lƹalama ataf war t txisen ca,
aḏ nfeḍḥen lʼafkar n waṭṭas n wuȓawen. ḏ ijjen n lḥuzen am ssif iqeḍƹen aḏ icukk ȓaƹmar nnem."
Tuɣa ḏinni ƹaweḏ ijjen n nnabiya ḏ ṯawessarṯ qqaren-as Ḥanan nettaṯ ḏ yeǧis n Fanwil zi ṯeqbiȓṯ n Ƹacur. Ṯƹic ak uryaz nnes sebƹa iseggwusa.
Ȓexddenni immuṯ netta, ṯeqqim nettaṯ ḏ ṯajjaȓṯ ḥetta wami ṯemmuṯ x arbeƹa u ṯmanin iseggwusa. Tɣima ȓebda ḏi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant, ṯƹebbeḏ Arebbi tẓumma tẓaǧa ǧiȓeṯ ḏ wass.
Ḏi ȓweqṯ nni ṯusa-d ṯḥemmeḏ Arebbi ṯessiweȓ x uḥenjir nni ak marra yinni itrajan nhar nni ḏi ɣa ifekk Arebbi Lquds.
Wami Yusef ḏ Maryam ṣafi kemmȓen marra min zzaysen ṯumar Ccariƹa n Siḏ Arebbi, ḏewȓen ɣar ṯmurṯ n Ljalil ɣar ubilaj nsen n Naṣira.
Ƹisa itemɣar itejhiḏ itcar s ȓefhameṯ, xas arḍa n Arebbi.
Lwalidin nnes traḥen mkuȓ aseggwas ɣar Lquds ḏi Ȓƹiḏ Ameqqran n Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Ƹisa wami yuweḍ ṯenƹac n iseggwusa, gaƹƹḏen ɣar Lquds ƹlaḥsab taqalid n Ȓƹiḏ.
Wami kemmȓen wussan n Ȓƹiḏ rewwḥen netta iqqim ḏi Lquds, walakin niṯni war ssinen ca belli netta ƹaḏ iqqim ḏinni.
Tɣir-asen aqaṯ akiḏsen ak lmejmaƹ nsen. Uyuren nhar ikmaȓ, bḏan rezzun xas jar familya ḏ imeddukaȓ.
Wami war ṯ ufin ca, ḏewȓen ɣar ṯendint rezzun xas.
Kkin ṯeȓtiyyam uca ufin-ṯ iqqim ḏi ṯemzida ṯameqqrant jar yinni iseȓmaḏen, itsȓa-yasen itseqsa-ṯen.
Marra yinni ḏas itsȓan tƹejjben ḏayes s ȓaƹqeȓ nnes ḏ ljawabaṯ nnes.
Wami ṯ ẓrin lwalidin nnes tƹejjben ḏayes, ṯenna-as yemmas: "Mayemmi ḏaneɣ ṯeggiḏ ammu? Aqa nec ḏ babac nrezzu xak, ṯejjiḏ-aneɣ ḏi ȓaƹḏab."
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Mayemmi xafi ṯrezzum? Ma war ṯessinem ca belli nec itxeṣṣa-ayi aḏ iȓiɣ ḏi ṯeddarṯ n Baba?"
War ḏas fhimen ca i wawaȓ nni iy ḏasen inna.
Iḏweȓ-d akiḏsen ɣar Naṣira itegg-asen array. Yemmas txemmam ḏi marra manaya ḏeg wuȓ nnes.
Ƹisa yarenni ḏi ȓefhameṯ ḏ ṭṭul, itemɣar ḏi arḍa ɣar Arebbi ḏ ȓƹabḏ.

Azeǧiḏ Qayṣar Tibaryus yuweḍ xemessṭacar ssna zeg wami iteḥkam, lƹam nni ƹaweḏ Bilaṭus Lbanṭi netta ḏ lḥakem x Yahuḏiya, Hirudus netta ḏ lwali x Ljalil, umas Filippas netta ḏ lwali x Iṭurya ḏ jwayeh n Tarxanitis, Laṣan netta ḏ lwali x Abilina,
Ḥanin ḏ Qiyafa niṯni ḏ arruyas n ȓfuqaha. Ḏi ȓweqṯ nni yusa-d wawaȓ n Arebbi i Yaḥya mmis n Zakariya ḏi ȓexȓa.
Ikkar netta ikka x marra imucan ṭṭarf n iɣzar n Lʼurdun ibḏa itbeccar iwḏan ḥima aḏ tuben aḏ twaṭehharen s waman ḥima aḏ twaɣfarent ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nsen.
Manaya ƹlaḥsab min yura ḏi Lkitab n wawaȓ n nnabi Icaƹya: Ṯmijja tȓaɣa ḏi ȓexȓa ṯeqqar: Swejḏeṯ abriḏ i Siḏi Arebbi, ggem ibriḏen nnes nican.
Aḏ itwanṭu kuȓ iɣzar, aḏ iwaṭa kuȓ aḏrar ḏ ṯaƹrurṯ. Min war icnin aḏ icna, aḏ twaƹeḏȓen ibriḏen itwaḥfaren.
Marra iwḏan aḏ ẓren asenjem n Arebbi.
Yaḥya iqqar-asen i ȓɣaci yinni iffɣen bac aḏ twaṭehharen s waman: "Ya ṯarwa n ifiɣeran, wi ḏawem iƹeȓmen aḏ tarewȓem zi lɣaḍab n Siḏi Arebbi iy d ɣa yasen?
Meȓa ṯtubem ḏ ṣṣaḥ, ggeṯ ȓexḏayem ḏ ṯiṣebḥanin. Maci aḏ tinim ḏi nnefs nwem qa neccin ḏ ṯarwa n Brahim u ṣafi. Meȓa ixes Arebbi ṯarwa n Brahim, ataf aḏ iysi izra-ya aṯen yarr ḏ ṯarwa n Brahim!
Aqa caqur iwjeḏ ḥima aḏ iqess iẓewran n ȓcejjur. Mkuȓ ṯacejjarṯ iy war itirwen ca min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan ataf aḏ twaqess aḏ tmenḍar ḏi ṯmessi."
Nnan-as ȓɣaci: "Y neccin min ɣa negg?"
Yarra xasen Yaḥya inna-asen: "Wenni ɣar ǧant ṯnayen n ṯeqmijaṯin itxeṣṣa aḏ yuc icten i wenni war ɣar iǧi ca. Ƹaweḏ wenni ɣar iǧa min ɣa icc itxeṣṣa aḏ yuc i wenni war ɣar iǧi ca."
Usin-d ɣares ȓebƹaḍ zeg yinni ijemmƹen ḍḍariba bac aḏ twaṭehharen s waman nnan-as: "A Lmuƹallim, min ɣa negg neccin?"
Yarra xasen inna-asen: "War jemmƹeṯ bu ktar zi lqanun."
Ƹaweḏ sseqsan-ṯ ȓƹaskar nnan-as: "Y neccin min ɣa negg?" Inna-asen Yaḥya: "War tkessim bu tmenyaṯ s bessif. War znuzam ḥadd x ȓbaṭeȓ. Qenƹem s min ṯrebḥem."
Qaƹ iwḏan nni trajan Lmasiḥ tfekkaren ḏeg wuȓ nsen Yaḥya ma netta ḏ Lmasiḥ ma lla.

Ijaweb-iṯen Yaḥya marra inna-asen: "Qa nec ṭehhareɣ-kenniw s waman, walakin aḏ d yas ijjen ijheḏ xafi, war sḏihiǧeɣ ca aḏas fesyeɣ uȓa ḏ ifiȓan n ṯsiȓa nnes. Netta akenniw iṭehhar s Arruḥ iqeddsen ḏ yiȓesawen n ṯmessi.
Ɣares ṯazzarṯ ḏeg ufus ḥima aḏ izuzzar ṯaffa nnes qaƹ, aḏ ismun ṯiḥebba n yirḏan aṯent igg ḏi ṯesrafṯ. Min war ineffƹen ca aṯ issecmeḍ ḏi ṯmessi iy war ixessin ƹemmarṣ."
Amenni Yaḥya iseȓmaḏ iwḏan itbeccar-iṯen s waṭṭas n ṯmesȓayin nneɣni.
Menbaƹd lwali Hirudus yuwi icten qqaren-as Hirudya u nettaṯ ḏ ṯamɣarṯ n wumas. Yaḥya inha Hirudus x manaya, ƹaweḏ inha-ṯ x marra lʼaɣlaṭ nneɣni iy itegg.
Hirudus netta min igga? Yarni ḏi ccarr nnes igga Yaḥya ḏi ȓeḥbes.
Wami marra ccaƹb ittwaṭehhar s waman, yusa-d uȓa ḏ Ƹisa itwaṭehhar s waman. Netta wami itẓaǧa, ṯnurzem ṯewwarṯ ḏeg ujenna
ihwa-d Arruḥ iqeddsen ḏi ṣṣifeṯ n ṯeḏbirṯ yarsa-d x Ƹisa. Ḏ ijjen n ṯmijja zeg ujenna ṯeqqar-as qa cek ḏ Memmi iƹizzen, nec farrḥeɣ zzayek.
Wami ibḏa Ƹisa ḏi ȓxeḏmeṯ nnes tuɣa ɣares ca n ṯȓaṯin iseggwusa. Tɣir-asen ḏ mmis n Yusef, n Ƹali,
n Maṭyu, n Lawi, n Mluki, n Yani, n Yusef,
n Maṭyusus, n Amun, n Naḥum, n Ḥuṣni, n Naji,
n Muḥit, n Maṭyusus, n Camƹi, n Yuski, n Yuḍa,
n Yuhan, n Ris, n Zarubbabil, n Cƹaltihil, n Nir,
n Mluki, n Adi, n Qasem, n Lmudam, n Ƹir,
n Yassu, n Liƹazar, n Yurim, n Maṭyu, n Lawi,
n Cimƹun, n Yahuḏa, n Yusef, n Yunam, n Lyaqim,
n Malyu, n Mennan, n Maṭyus, n Naṯan, n Dawed,
n Yassa, n Ƹubid, n Buƹazza, n Salmun, n Nassun,
n Ƹaminadab, n Admi, n Ƹarni, n Ḥaṣrun, n Faris, n Yahuḏa,
n Yaƹqub, n Isḥaq, n Brahim, n Taraḥ, n Naḥur,
n Sarug, n Raƹu, n Falaj, n Ƹabir, n Ṣalaḥ,
n Qinan, n Arfakceḏ, n Sam, n Nuḥ, n Lamak,
n Matucaliḥ, n Axnux, n Yarid, n Muhallil, n Qinan,
n Anuc, n Cuṯ, n Adam mmis n Arebbi.
Iḏweȓ-d Ƹisa zeg iɣzar n Lʼurdun iccur s Arruḥ iqeddsen, ȓexddenni yuwi-ṯ Arruḥ nni ɣar ȓexȓa.
Ikka ḏinni arbeƹin yum itjerrab-iṯ Ibȓis. Ḏeg wussan nni war icci walu. Wami kemmȓen wussan nni iǧuz.
Ikkar Ibȓis inna-as i Ƹisa: "Cek meȓa ḏ Mmis n Arebbi, ini-yasen i yizra-ya aḏ ḏewȓen ḏ aɣrum."
Yarra xas Ƹisa inna-as: "Lla, Lkitab iqqar: <Bnaḏem war itƹic ca s uɣrum waha.>"
Ikkar Ibȓis yuwi Ƹisa ɣar yijjen n umcan yuƹȓa, ismeḍhar-as-d marra lmemlakaṯ n ddunect-a ḏeg yijjen n dqiqeṯ.
Inna-as Ibȓis: "Aḏac uceɣ marra jjheḏ-a ḏ lƹaḍama-ya nsent ȓaḥeqqac nec ṯemmuc-ayi, at uceɣ i wumi ma xseɣ.
Meȓa ṯsejjḏeḏ-ayi, aḏ yiȓi qaƹ manaya i cek."
Inna-as Ƹisa: "Lla, Lkitab iqqar: <Sejjeḏ i Siḏi Arebbi nnec, ƹbeḏ-iṯ netta waḥḏes.>"
Ikkar Ibȓis yuwi Ƹisa ɣar ṯendint n Lquds, isiȓi-ṯ x ṯqiccat n ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant inna-as: "Cek meȓa ḏ Mmis n Arebbi, ngez ssanita ɣar ṯmurṯ.
Aqa Lkitab iqqar: <Qa Arebbi aḏ iweṣṣa bac ac ḥḍant lmalaʼikaṯ nnes.>
Ƹaweḏ iqqar: <Ac ysint x ifassen nsent bac war ṯeȓqifeḏ uȓa ḏ ij uzru s uḍar nnec.>"
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-as: "Lla, Lkitab iqqar: <War tjarrab ca Siḏi Arebbi nnec.>"
Ibȓis wami ikemmeȓ akiḏes marra ajerrab nni, ikkar ibeƹƹeḏ xas aȓ yijjen n ṯwaȓa nneɣni.
Iḏweȓ Ƹisa ɣar ṯmurṯ n Ljalil s jjheḏ n Arruḥ iqeddsen, itentacar ȓexbar nnes marra ḏi jwayeh nni.
Iseȓmaḏ ḏi ṯemziḏawin nsen semɣaren-ṯ marra iwḏan.
Yusa-d ɣar ubilaj n Naṣira mani irebba. Nhar n ssebṯ n lƹibada iruḥ ɣar ṯemzida am ȓebda, ikkar ḥima aḏ iɣar.
Ucin-as Lkitab nni n nnabi Icaƹya, irzem-iṯ yufa amcan iy ḏi yura wawaȓ-a:
<Aqa Arruḥ n Siḏi Arebbi aqaṯ xafi, ixḍar-ayi ḥima aḏ beccareɣ ȓmusakin. Issekk-ayi-d aḏ xbareɣ lḥurriya i imeḥbas, yinni itwaḍarɣȓen aṯen arreɣ twaȓan, yinni itwaḍeȓmen aḏasen d rxuɣ.
Aḏ xbareɣ x useggwas n arḍa n Siḏi Arebbi.>
Ibelleƹ lkitab nni yarra-as-ṯ i uxeddam iqqim. Marra yinni iǧan ḏi ṯemziḏa qqimen txezzaren ḏayes.
Ibḏa iqqar-asen: "Nhara qa iffeɣ-d wawaȓ n Lkitab-a iy umi ṯesȓim."
Marra ssawaȓen xas mliḥ, tƹejjben ḏeg wawaȓen iṣebḥanen iy d iffɣen zeg uqemmum nnes. Nnan xas: Ma war iǧi ca wanita ḏ mmis n Yusef?

Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Bȓa ccekk aḏayi ṯinim ȓmaƹna-ya: Cek ay aḍbib mȓi ṯeddawiḏ, iȓi ṯeddawiḏ ixef nnec. Aḏayi ṯinim ƹaweḏ qa min nesȓa iweqƹen ḏeg ubilaj n Kafernaḥum, ȓexxu manayenni egg-iṯ uȓa ḏanita ḏi ṯmurṯ nnec."
Inna-asen: "Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: War iǧi ca can nnabi qebȓen-ṯ ḏi ṯmurṯ nnes.
Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Tuɣa ḏinni aṭṭas n ṯajjaȓin ḏi ṯmurṯ n Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏi zman n nnabi Ilyas wami war yuwṯi bu unẓar ṯeȓt snin u sett chur wami iwqeƹ ijjen n buheyyuf ḏi ṯmurṯ ṯekmaȓ.
Walakin ṯajjaȓin nni war ɣarsent d itwassekk ca nnabi Ilyas, itwassekk-d ɣir ɣar yicten n ṯajjaȓṯ waha ḏi dcar n Ṣarepta ḏi ṯmurṯ n Ṣayda.
Ƹaweḏ tuɣa aṭṭas n yiwḏan heȓcen ḏaysen jḏam ḏi ṯmurṯ n Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏi zman nni n nnabi Alicaƹ. Arebbi war zzaysen isgenfi uȓa ḏ ijjen, isgenfa illa Nuƹman zi Surya."
Yinni imunen ḏi ṯemziḏa wami sȓin i wawaȓ-a ɣeḍben aṭṭas.
Kkaren sufɣen-ṯ ɣar barra n ṯendint. Uwin-ṯ ɣar jjarf n uḏrar mani ṯebna ṯendint nsen bac aṯ seyyben x jjarf nni.
Walakin netta ifȓeṯ-asen yuyur.
Iruḥ Ƹisa ɣar ubilaj n Kafernaḥum ig iǧan ḏi ṯmurṯ n Ljalil, ibḏa iseȓmaḏ iwḏan ḏinni ḏi nhar n lƹibada nsen kuȓ ssebṯ.
Qqimen yiwḏan nni tƹejjben ḏeg useȓmeḏ nnes minzi ɣares ssulṭa iy zi iseȓmaḏ.
Ufin ḏi ṯemziḏa nni ijjen n uryaz ḏayes ijjen n jjenn ḏ aƹeffan. Ibḏa isnekkar ṯɣuyyeṯ s jjheḏ
inna-as i Ƹisa: "Min ḏayneɣ ṯrezzuḏ a Ƹisa Naṣiri? Ma ṯusiḏ-d axaneɣ ṯeqḍiḏ? Nec qa ssneɣ min ṯeƹniḏ; cek ḏ Lƹaḍim n Arebbi!"
Izeyyar-iṯ Ƹisa inna-as: "Stuk cek, ffeɣ zzayes!" Iseɣḍeȓ jjenn aryaz nni ɣar ṯmurṯ ḏi ȓwesṭ nsen ȓexddenni iffeɣ zzayes war ḏas iggi walu.
Qqimen marra iwḏan nni ḏehhcen nnan i wayawya: "Min iƹna manaya? Itʼamar uȓa ḏ jnun iƹeffanen s yijjen n ssulṭa ḏ ṯzemmar niṯni teffɣen."
Itentacar ȓexbar nnes ḏi mkuȓ amcan ḏi jwayeh nni.
Ssenni Ƹisa iffeɣ-d zi ṯemziḏa nni yuḏef ɣar ṯeddarṯ n Simƹan. Yufa ḏinni ṯaḏeggwaȓṯ n Simƹan qa ṯehȓec ḏayes ṯimessi aṭṭas, ttaren zzayes ḥima at isgenfa.
Yuḏar aɣares isbedd ṯimessi ṯeffeɣ-it. Ḏeg umcan ṯekkar ṯebḏa tsexxar xasen.
Wami ṯeɣȓi ṯfuct ɣar ṯmeddiṯ, iwḏan uwin ɣar Ƹisa imehȓac nsen kuȓ ijjen mamec igga ȓehȓac nnes. Mkuȓ ijjen zzaysen isrusa xas fus nnes isgenfa-ṯ.
Zeg waṭṭas n yiwḏan ƹaweḏ teffɣen jnun snekkaren ṯɣuyyeṯ qqaren-as qa cek ḏ Mmis n Arebbi." Walakin netta itzeyyar-iṯen, war ṯen itejji ca aḏ ssiwȓen minzi ssnen netta ḏ Lmasiḥ.
Wami iṣbaḥ ȓḥaȓ iffeɣ Ƹisa iruḥ ɣar yijjen n umcan n ȓexȓa. Iwḏan nni bḏan rezzun xas, usin-d ɣares ṭṭfen-ṯ ḥima war xasen iggur ca.
Inna-asen: "Lla, nec itxeṣṣa-ayi aḏ beccareɣ s ȓmulk n Arebbi ḏi ṯneddam nneɣni minzi twassekkeɣ-d i manaya."
Iruḥ itḥeddaṯ ḏi ṯemziḏawin nsen n Yahuḏiya.
Ijjen n nhar ibedd Ƹisa ɣar ȓebḥar n Ganisarat, mzaḥamen xas ȓɣaci bac aḏ sȓen i wawaȓ n Arebbi.
Yufa ṯnayen n ṯɣarruba beddent x ṭṭarf n ȓebḥar. Tuɣa hwan-d zzaysent iḥeǧaqen n iseȓman bac aḏ ƹeḏȓen ṯiracciwin nsen.
Inya Ƹisa ḏeg yicten zi ṯɣarruba nni ṯenni iy iǧan n Simƹan, iṭaleb zzayes aḏ yuyur cwayt x ȓbarr u netta iqqim ḏayes ibḏa iseȓmaḏ ȓɣaci zi ṯɣarrabut nni.
Wami ikemmeȓ awaȓ nni inna-as i Simƹan: "Ndeh ṯaɣarrabut nnec ɣar mani uǧɣen waman ḍȓeq ṯiracciwin ḥima aḏ tḥeǧqeḏ iseȓman."
Inna-as Simƹan: "A Lmuƹallim, neccin ǧiȓeṯ ṯekmaȓ nxeddem war d nsiȓi uȓa ḏ ijjen n usȓem, walakin wami t ṯenniḏ cek aḏ ḍeȓqeɣ ṯiracciwin."
Wami ggin ammu siȓin-d aṭṭas n iseȓman, ṯiracciwin nsen ƹȓayen aḏ qqarṣent.
Ceyyaren imeddukaȓ nsen ḏi ṯɣarrabut nni nneɣni ḥima aḏ d asen aṯen ƹawnen. Usin-d ƹemmaren ṯnayen n ṯɣarruba nsen aȓ wami ƹȓayen aḏ ɣerqent.
Simƹan Buṭrus wami iẓra manaya yusa-d iwḍa ɣar iḍaren n Ƹisa inna-as: "A Siḏi, beƹƹeḏ xafi nec ḏ lƹaṣi."
Iḏhec netta ḏ yinni akiḏes marra ȓaḥeqqac ḥeǧqen-d aṭṭas n iseȓman.
Ƹaweḏ iḏhec uȓa ḏ Yaƹqub ḏ Yuḥanna ṯarwa n Zabadi niṯni ḏ imeddukaȓ n Simƹan. Inna-as Ƹisa i Simƹan: "War teggweḏ ca, cek ssa aȓ ṯsawent ataf aḏ tḥeǧqeḏ iwḏan."
Wami d ḏewȓen s ṯɣarruba ɣar ȓbarr semḥen ḏi marra min ɣarsen ḏfaren Ƹisa.
Wami Ƹisa aqaṯ ḏeg yijjen n ṯendint, yusa-d ijjen n uryaz ḏayes jḏam aṭṭas. Iẓra Ƹisa iwḍa-yas ɣar iḍaren ittar-as inna-as: "A Siḏi, cek meȓa ṯexseḏ ṯzemmareḏ aḏayi ṯessiṣfiḏ."
Iqarreb ɣares Ƹisa iḥaḏa-ṯ s ufus nnes inna-as: "Wah nec xseɣ, cek qa ṯgenfiḏ!" Ṣafi ḏeg umcan iruḥ-as jḏam nni.
Iweṣṣa-ṯ inna-as: "War txebbar ḥadd. Inna-as: "Ruḥ ɣar ȓefqi seḍhar-as ixef nnec. Egg ṣṣeḏqeṯ nni iy zi iweṣṣa Musa ḥima aɣarsen ṯiȓi chaḏeṯ x min iweqƹen."
Walakin ssenni ibḏa itentacar xas ȓexbar ktar ƹaḏ. Usin-d ɣares aṭṭas n ȓɣaci ḥima aḏas sȓen ḥima aḏ genfan zi ȓehȓacaṯ nsen.
Netta tuɣa itraḥ ɣar imucan ig ixȓan ḥima aḏ iẓẓaǧ ḏinni.

Ijjen n nhar tuɣa Ƹisa iseȓmaḏ iwḏan. Qqimen ḏinni jarasen ȓebƹaḍ zi ȓḥizeb n ifarrisiyen ḏ imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa, usin-d zi marra ȓedcuraṯ n Ljalil ḏ Yahuḏiya ḏ Lquds. Jjheḏ n Siḏi Arebbi aqaṯ ak Ƹisa bac aḏ isgenfa imehȓac.
Usin-d can yiwḏan ysin ijjen n uryaz izzeȓ ḏi ṯassuṯ nnes mmuṯen-as iḍaren. Rezzun mammec ɣa ggen aṯ siḏfen aṯ sersen zzaṯes.
Wami ufin war zemmaren aṯ siḏfen minzi ḏinni aṭṭas n ȓɣaci, gaƹƹḏen zzayes ɣar ṯzeqqa qeȓƹen ijjen n umcan ḏi ssqef sehwan-ṯ-id x ṯassuṯ nnes ɣar ȓwesṭ zzaṯ i iḍaren n Ƹisa.
Netta wami iẓra lʼiman nsen inna-as i unecruf nni: "Ay aryaz, twaɣfarent-ac ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nnec."
Bḏan imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa ḏ ȓḥizeb n ifarrisiyen tfekkaren nnan ḏeg wuȓawen nsen: "Min iƹna wanita itarra ixef nnes ḏ Arebbi? Ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ war ṯent iɣfar ca illa Arebbi waḥḏes!"
Ƹisa issen min nwan inna-asen: "Mayemmi tfekkarem ammu kenniw ḏi ȓaƹquȓaṯ nwem?
Min isehȓen aṭṭas aḏas iniɣ i unecruf-a, ma aḏas iniɣ: Twaɣfarent-ac ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nnec? Niɣ ma aḏas iniɣ: Kkar cek uyur?
Nec xseɣ aḏ tessnem Mmis n bnaḏem ɣares ssulṭa x ṯmurṯ ḥima aḏ iɣfar ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ." Uca inna-as Ƹisa i unecruf nni: "Aḏac iniɣ, bedd x iḍaren nnec ysi ṯassuṯ nnec ruḥ aḏ trewwḥeḏ ɣar ṯeddarṯ nnec!"
Ȓexddenni ikkar unecruf nni zzaṯsen iysi min tuɣa xef izzeȓ, irewweḥ iḥemmeḏ Arebbi.
Marra ḏehcen ḏi manaya ḥemmḏen Arebbi, ggwḏen aṭṭas nnan: "Nhara neẓra ṯimesȓayin seḏhacent aṭṭas!"
Menbaƹd iruḥ Ƹisa yufa ijjen ijemmeƹ ḍḍariba qqaren-as Lawi, iqqim ḏeg umcan mani jemmƹen ḍḍariba. Inna-as Ƹisa: "Ḏfar-ayi-d."
Uca ikkar Lawi ismeḥ ḏi marra iḏfar-iṯ.
Igga-as Lawi ijjen n zarrdeṯ ḏ ṯameqqrant ḏi ṯeddarṯ nnes. Ḥḍaren akiḏsen aṭṭas n iƹeccaren ḏ inneɣni iy qqimen akiḏsen aḏ ccen.
Ceṯcan zzayes ȓḥizeb n ifarrisiyen ḏ imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa nnan-asen i imeḥḍaren nnes: "Mayemmi tettem ṯsessem ak iƹeccaren ḏ yinni iƹeṣṣan?"
Yarra xasen Ƹisa inna-asen: "Iwḏan iṣeḥḥan war teḥḏijin bu uḍbib, aḍbib teḥḏajan-ṯ imehȓac."
Inna-asen: "Nec war d usiɣ ca aḏ ȓaɣiɣ i yinni iǧan nican ḥima aḏ tuben, usiɣ-d ɣar yinni iƹeṣṣan."
Nnan-as: "Mayemmi imeḥḍaren n Yaḥya ḏ imeḥḍaren n ȓḥizeb n ifarrisiyen tẓumman tẓaǧan aṭṭas, imeḥḍaren nnec tetten sessen waha?"
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Kenniw ma tejjem imeddukaȓ n muȓay aḏ ẓummen ḏi ȓfarḥ nnes?"
Inna-asen: "Lla, walakin ƹaḏ aḏ d asen wussan aḏ imeysi muȓay zi ȓwesṭ nsen, ȓexddenni aḏ ẓummen ḏeg wussan nni."

Issiweȓ ƹaweḏ akiḏsen s ȓmaƹna-ya: "War iǧi ḥadd iteqssas-d ṯareqqiƹṯ zeg warruḍ n jḏiḏ ḥima s ṯreqqiƹṯ nni azzayes ireqqeƹ arruḍ ḏ ȓbaȓi. Mayemmi? Arruḍ ḏ jḏiḏ aḏ iqqim itcerrag waha, wenni n ȓbaȓi war xas d tis ṯreqqiƹṯ nni n jḏiḏ.
Uȓa ḏ aman n uḍiȓ ḏ jḏiḏ war xeǧqen ca ḏeg yiȓemawen iqḏimen, ḥima war dduqquzen war tzeǧiƹen ca waman n uḍiȓ aḏ ḍeyyƹen yiȓemawen nni.
Walakin aman n uḍiȓ ḏ jḏiḏ xeǧqen ḏeg yiȓemawen ḏ jḏiḏ.
Meȓa iswa can ijjen aman uḍiȓ iqḏimen, ataf war itexs ca yinni ḏ jḏiḏ minzi iqqar qa yinni iqḏimen ḏ iṣebḥanen."
Ijjen n nhar n ssebṯ n lƹibada, iƹḏu Ƹisa ḏeg ubriḏ ḏi ȓwesṭ n imendi akiḏes imeḥḍaren nnes. Bḏan imeḥḍaren nnes tekksen ṯiyḏerin, tqeccaren-ṯent s ifassen nsen, tetten-ṯent.
Nnan-asen ȓebƹaḍ zi ȓḥizeb n ifarrisiyen: "Mayemmi teggem min iǧan ḥram ḏi nhar n lƹibada?"
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-asen: "Ma war ṯeɣrim ca min igga Dawed wami tuɣa iǧuz netta ḏ yinni akiḏes?
Yuḏef ɣar ṯemziḏa n Arebbi yufa ḏinni aɣrum nni iy iǧan ḏ ṣṣeḏqeṯ icca netta yuca-asen i yinni akiḏes; waxxa manayenni war iǧi ca ḥalal ɣir i ȓfuqaha waha."
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Mmis n bnaḏem ig iǧan ḏ lḥakem ḥetta x nhar n ssebṯ n lƹibada."
Ijjen n nhar n ssebṯ n lƹibada nneɣni, yuḏef Ƹisa ɣar yijjen n ṯemziḏa n Ayṯ-Israʼil ibḏa iseȓmaḏ. Ḏinni ijjen n uryaz fus nnes afusi immuṯ.
Imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa ḏ ȓḥizeb n ifarrisiyen tlaḥaḍen xas ma aṯ isgenfa ma lla ḏi nhar n lƹibada ḥima aṯ tahmen.
Ƹisa issen min ɣarsen ḏi ȓaƹquȓaṯ nsen, inna-as i uryaz nni iy ɣar iǧa fus immuṯ: "Kkar bedd ḏi ȓwesṭ." Aryaz nni ikkar ibedd ḏinni.
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Akenniw sseqsiɣ: Ḏi nhar n lƹibada ma ḥalal a negg ȓxir niɣ a negg ccarr? A nsenjem nnefs niɣ aṯ nneɣ?"
Ixzar ɣarsen marra ij-ij, inna-as i uryaz nni: "Sarreḥ fus nnec!" Isarreḥ-iṯ uca iḏweȓ ufus nnes igenfa.
Niṯni min ggin? Ɣeḍben aṭṭas mcawaren jarasen min ɣa ggen i Ƹisa.
Ḏeg wussan nni, igaƹƹeḏ Ƹisa ɣar uḏrar aḏ iẓẓaǧ iqqim ḏinni ǧiȓeṯ ṯekmaȓ itẓaǧa i Arebbi.
Wami iṣbaḥ ȓḥaȓ, iȓaɣa-d x imeḥḍaren nnes ixḍar ṯenƹac zzaysen iggi-ṯen ḏ arrusul.
Ḏinni Simƹan, isemma-ṯ Buṭrus, ḏ wumas Andrus, ḏ Yaƹqub, ḏ Yuḥanna, ḏ Filippas, ḏ Bartulumay,
ḏ Matta, ḏ Tuma, ḏ Yaƹqub mmis n Ḥalfa, ḏ Simƹan umi qqaren <Lmunaḍil>,
ḏ Yahuḏa mmis n Yaƹqub, ḏ Yahuḏa Isxaryuṭi iƹni wenni izzenzen Ƹisa.
Ihwa-d Ƹisa ibedd ḏeg yijjen n umcan ḏ ȓewḍa. Ḏinni aṭṭas n imeḥḍaren nnes ḏ waṭṭas n yiwḏan zi ṯmurṯ n Yahuḏiya ṯekmaȓ, zi Lquds, ƹaweḏ zi Ṣur ḏ Ṣayda ig iǧan x uɣezḏis n ȓebḥar.
Usin-d ɣares ḥima aḏ sȓan i wawaȓ nnes, ƹaweḏ ḥima aṯen isgenfa zi ȓehȓacaṯ nsen. Yinni itƹeddaben s jnun ḏ iƹeffanen uȓa ḏ niṯni tgenfan.
Xsen marra ȓɣaci nni aṯ ḥaḏan minzi ijjen n jjheḏ iteffeɣ-d zzayes, isgenfa-ṯen marra iḏsen.
Iysi ṯiṭṭawin nnes Ƹisa ɣar imeḥḍaren nnes inna-asen: "Ssaƹḏ nwem a ȓmusakin, aqa ȓmulk n Arebbi i kenniw.
Ssaƹḏ nwem a yinni iǧuzen, aqa aḏ tejjawnem. Ssaƹḏ nwem a yinni itrun, aqa aḏ tḍeḥcem.
Ssaƹḏ nwem meȓa tƹiffan-kenniw yiwḏan, war kenniw qebȓen ssawaȓen ḏaywem s ȓƹib, tzawaren-kenniw ƹlaḥsab Mmis n bnaḏem.
Ḏi Nhar nni farḥem negzem s ȓefraḥeṯ ȓaḥeqqac aɣarwem yiȓi ijjen n lʼajar ḏ ameqqran ḏeg ujenna minzi ammu iy iggin ȓejḏuḏ nsen i lʼanbiya.
Walakin, ya ȓefḍiḥeṯ nwem a twajar, minzi ṯƹicem min ṯƹicem.
Ya ȓefḍiḥeṯ nwem a yinni ijjiwnen ȓexxu, minzi akenniw iȓqef jjuƹ. Ya ȓefḍiḥeṯ nwem a yinni iḍeḥcen ȓexxu, minzi aḏ txeyyqem aḏ trum.
Ya ȓefḍiḥeṯ nwem meȓa tcekkaren-kenniw yiwḏan minzi ammu iy iggin ȓejḏuḏ nsen i yinni itarran ixef nsen ḏ lʼanbiya.
Aḏawem iniɣ a yinni itesȓan: Xseṯ ȓƹaḏyan nwem, ggeṯ ȓxir ḏeg yinni kenniw itƹiffan.
Barkeṯ wenni iy kenniw ineƹȓen, ttareṯ i Arebbi x yinni kenniw itƹeddaben.
Wenni c ɣa yuwṯan ɣar umeggiz nnec, uc-as cek uȓa ḏ ameggiz nnec nneɣni. Wenni ḏac ɣa iysin azeǧab nnec, ejj-iṯ cek aḏac iysi uȓa ḏ ṯaqmijat nnec.
Wenni ḏac ɣa ittaren can ṯmesȓayṯ, uc-as-t. Wenni ḏac ɣa ikksen ṯimesȓayin nnec, war ṯ tettar ca aḏac ṯent yarr.
Mammec texsem aḏawem ggen yiwḏan, uȓa ḏ kenniw ggem-asen amenni.
Meȓa kenniw texsem ɣir yinni iy kenniw itexsen, man lʼajar iy ɣarwem? Iwa uȓa ḏ yinni iƹeṣṣan texsen yinni ṯen itexsen.
Meȓa teggem ȓxir ɣir ḏeg yinni iy ḏaywem iteggen ȓxir, man lʼajar iy ɣarwem? Uȓa ḏ yinni iƹeṣṣan teggen manaya.
Meȓa ṯerḍȓem i yinni ṯessnem aḏawem d arren, man lʼajar iy ɣarwem? Uȓa ḏ yinni iƹeṣṣan reṭṭȓen i yinni iƹeṣṣan ḥima aḏ d arren amarwas nsen.

Walakin xseṯ ȓƹaḏyan nwem, ggeṯ ḏaysen ȓxir. Reḍȓeṯ war trajaṯ walu. Uca aɣarwem yiȓi lʼajar ḏ ameqqran, aḏ tiȓim ḏ ṯarwa n Arebbi Yuƹȓan. Minzi netta ḏ aṣebḥan ak yinni war ṯ itcekkaren ca ḏ yinni iteggen ccarr.
Reḥmeṯ iwḏan mammec ireḥḥem Babaṯwem.
War tƹeyyabem ḥadd ḥima war kenniw itƹeyyib ca Arebbi. War tzawaȓem ḥadd ḥima war kenniw itzawaȓ ca Arebbi. Semḥem i yiwḏan, aḏawem iɣfar Arebbi.
Ucem-asen i yiwḏan, ataf aḏawem immuc. Aḏawem immuc ȓaƹbar ḏ aṣebḥan ḏeg waḥsi n uzeǧab nwem, aṯ shezzen aṯ ḏekknen ḥetta aḏ infeyyeḍ. Ȓaƹbar iy ṯsexḏamem ḏ wenni iy kiḏwem ɣa isexḏem Arebbi."
Issiweȓ akiḏsen ƹaweḏ Ƹisa s yijjen n ȓmaƹna inna-asen: "Aḍarɣaȓ, ma aḏ ijarr aḍarɣaȓ? Ma war weṭṭin ca s ṯnayen iḏsen ḏi can ṯesrafṯ?
Ameḥḍar war iǧi ca ḏ ameqqran x lmuƹallim nnes. Walakin mkuȓ ameḥḍar ig ikemmȓen ṯɣuri nnes itiȓi amecnaw lmuƹallim nnes.
Mayemmi tseḥqareḏ cwayt n uȓum ig iǧan ḏi ṯiṭṭ n wumac, cek tettuḏ akeccuḍ ig iǧan ḏi ṯiṭṭ nnec?

Mammec teggeḏ ṯzeƹƹmeḏ aḏ tiniḏ i wumac: Ay uma, ejj-ayi aḏac d kkseɣ ȓum-a ig iǧan ḏi ṯiṭṭ nnec, cek ƹaḏ tejjiḏ akeccuḍ ḏi ṯiṭṭ nnec? A lmunafiq, kkes ḏ amezwaru akeccuḍ zi ṯiṭṭ nnec. Ƹaḏ iy ɣa ṯetwaȓiḏ mliḥ ḥima aḏ tekkseḏ ȓum ig iǧan ḏi ṯiṭṭ n wumac!
War ṯeǧi ṯcejjarṯ ṯaṣebḥant tarew min iǧan ḏ aƹeffan. War ṯeǧi ƹaweḏ ṯcejjarṯ ṯaƹeffant tarew min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan.
Minzi kuȓ ṯacejjarṯ ṯḍehhar-d s min tarew. War d ȓeqḏen bu ṯazarṯ zeg isennanen. War d tekksen bu uḍiȓ zi ṯzeggwarṯ.

Bnaḏem aṣebḥan isufuɣ-d min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan zi ȓkenz aṣebḥan n wuȓ nnes. Bnaḏem aƹeffan isufuɣ-d min iǧan ḏ aƹeffan zi ȓkenz aƹeffan n wuȓ nnes. Ȓaḥeqqac aqemmum n bnaḏem issawaȓ min iǧan ḏeg wuȓ nnes.
Mayemmi ḏayi ṯeqqarem a Siḏi, a Siḏi u kenniw war teggem min ḏawem qqareɣ?
Marra wenni ɣari d itasen itesȓa i wawaȓ inu ixeddem zzayes ataf aḏawem iniɣ mindi itcabbah.
Itcabbah ḏeg yijjen n uryaz ig ibennan ṯaddarṯ nnes, iɣza aṭṭas igga dsas x uzru. Wami d iḥmeȓ iɣzar iƹḏu x ṯeddarṯ nni, war izemmar at isenhezz minzi ṯebna mliḥ.
Wenni itsȓan i wawaȓ inu war zzayes ixeddem ca ataf itcabbah ḏeg yijjen n uryaz ibna ṯaddarṯ nnes x ucaȓ bȓa dsas. Wami xas iƹḏu iɣzar nni ṯewḍa ḏeɣya ḏ abriḏ, ṯeqqim ḏ ȓxirbeṯ."
Wami ikemmeȓ Ƹisa awaȓ nnes ak yiwḏan iy tuɣa ḏas itesȓan, yuḏef ɣar ubilaj n Kafernaḥum.
Ḏinni ijjen n uƹaskari ḏ ameqqran n arrumanus ɣares ijjen n uxeddam itƹewwaȓ xas aṭṭas, walakin axeddam nni ihȓec ƹȓayen aḏ immeṯ.
Wami isȓa x Ƹisa issekk ɣares ca n ȓecyux n Ayṯ-Israʼil ḥima aṯ ḥeccmen aḏ d yas aḏ isgenfa axeddam nnes.
Wami d usin ɣar Ƹisa ḥeccmen-ṯ nnan-as: Bnaḏem-a isḏaheǧ aṯ tƹawneḏ
minzi itexs ccaƹb nneɣ ƹaweḏ ibna ṯamziḏa nneɣ.
Ikkar Ƹisa iruḥ akiḏsen. Wami iqarreb ɣar ṯeddarṯ nni issekk-d ɣares uƹaskari nni can imeddukaȓ nnes inna-as: "A Siḏi ṯƹeddbeḏ ixef nnec waha, nec war sḏihiǧeɣ ca aḏ taḏfeḏ ɣar ṯeddarṯ inu.
X manaya nec ḥesbeɣ ixef inu war sḏihǧeɣ ca aḏ d aseɣ ɣarek. Ini ɣir ijjen n wawaȓ u ṣafi ataf aḏ igenfa uxeddam inu.
Uȓa ḏ nec s yixef inu ɣari yinni xafi iḥekkmen. Ɣari ȓƹaskar x ufus inu ḥekkmeɣ xasen. Aḏ iniɣ i yijjen: Ruḥ, aḏ iraḥ. Aḏ iniɣ i yijjen: Araḥ-d, aḏ d yas. Aḏ iniɣ i uxeddam inu: Egg ṯa, at igg."
Wami isȓa Ƹisa i manayenni itƹejjeb ḏayes aṭṭas, ineqȓeb ɣar ȓɣaci iy ṯ iḏfaren inna-asen: "Aḏawem iniɣ: Yinni iǧan zi Ayṯ-Israʼil war ḏaysen ufiɣ bu lʼiman imɣar aṭṭas am wanita!"
Yinni issekk uƹaskari nni ḏewȓen ɣar ṯeddarṯ ufin axeddam igenfa.
Ṯiwecca nnes iruḥ Ƹisa ɣar yijjen n ubilaj qqaren-as Naƹin, akiḏes imeḥḍaren nnes ḏ ȓɣaci aṭṭas.
Wami iqarreb ɣar ṯewwarṯ n ubilaj, yufa ḏinni ysin-d ijjen n umettin aṯ neḍȓen. Netta iy ɣares ɣar yemmas waḥḏes, nettaṯ ḏ ṯajjaȓṯ. Akiḏes ḏinni aṭṭas n ȓɣaci zeg ubilaj nni.
Wami t iẓra Siḏiṯneɣ ṯeqqes-as inna-as: "War tru ca!"
Iqarreb ɣar ȓmeḥmeȓ iḥaḏa-ṯ, bedden yinni ṯ iysin. Inna: "Kkar ay aḥenjir."
Ikkar-d umettin nni ibḏa issawaȓ, yarr-iṯ Ƹisa i yemmas.
Marra ggwḏen semɣaren Arebbi nnan: "Imeḍhar-d jaraneɣ ijjen n nnabi ḏ ameqqran. Arebbi ifqeḏ ccaƹb nnes!"
Iffeɣ ȓexbar-a x Ƹisa ḏi marra ṯamurṯ n Yahuḏiya ḏ marra jwayeh iy ḏas d innḍen.
Yaḥya yarra-d ȓexbar x marra manaya zeg imeḥḍaren nnes. Iȓaɣa-d x ṯnayen zzaysen
issekk-iṯen ɣar Siḏiṯneɣ ḥima aḏas inin ma ḏ cek iy xef netsȓa aḏ d taseḏ niɣ a nraja can yijjen nneɣni?
Wami d usin ṯnayen nni n iryazen ɣar Ƹisa, nnan-as qa isqaḏ-aneɣ-d ɣarek Yaḥya ac nesseqsa: Ma ḏ cek iy netraja aḏ d taseḏ niɣ ḏ can yijjen nneɣni?
Ḏi ȓweqṯ nni isgenfa Ƹisa aṭṭas n imehȓac ḏ yinni ḏi iǧa ȓeḥȓiq ḏ yinni ḏi ǧan jnun ḏ iƹeffanen. Ƹaweḏ yarra aṭṭas n iḍarɣaȓen twaȓan.

Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Ƹeqbeṯ ɣar Yaḥya ƹawḏem-as min twaȓam ḏ min tesȓam: iḍarɣaȓen twaȓan, izeḥḥafen gguren, yinni iy ḏi iǧa jḏam genfan, iḏehcuren tesȓan, yinni immuṯen tnekkaren-d, ȓmusakin twabeccaren.
Ssaƹḏ n yinni war ḏayi itcekkin ca."
Ṣafi rewwḥen yinni issekk Yaḥya, Ƹisa ibḏa issawaȓ x Yaḥya iqqar-asen i ȓɣaci nni: "Minxef ṯeffɣem aḏ teẓrem ḏi ȓexȓa? Ma ɣar yij uɣanim ithezza-ṯ arriḥ? Lla!
Meȓa lla, minxef ṯeffɣem aḏ teẓrem? Ma ḏ ijjen n uryaz yareḍ arruḍ ḏ aṣebḥan? Lla, yinni iy ɣar iǧa warruḍ ḏ aṣebḥan tƹicen mliḥ tiȓin ḏi ȓquṣur n izeǧiḏen!
Meȓa lla, minxef ṯeffɣem aḏ teẓrem? Ma ḏ ijjen n nnabi? Qqareɣ-awem: Wah, netta ktar zeg yijjen n nnabi.
Ḏ Yaḥya iy xef issawaȓ Lkitab: <Aqa tsekkiɣ-d ijjen n arrasul inu zzaṯec, ḥima aḏac isewjeḏ abriḏ nnec.>
Aqa tesȓam: Zi min d jjint ṯemɣarin war iǧi ḥadd ḏ ameqqran zi Yaḥya, walakin wenni iy iǧan ḏ amezyan qaƹ ḏi ȓmulk n Arebbi netta ḏ ameqqran zi Yaḥya."
Marra iwḏan tesȓan xas, uȓa ḏ iƹeccaren niṯni s yixef nsen ƹtarfen belli manaya iǧa nican minzi niṯni twaṭehharen s waman ƹlaḥsab Yaḥya.
Walakin ȓḥizeb n ifarrisiyen ḏ yinni itcerraḥen ccariƹa war xisen ca min ixes Arebbi, ugin aṯen iṭehhar Yaḥya s waman.
"X manaya wi ḏi ɣa cabbheɣ iwḏan n ȓweqṯ-a? Minḏi tcabbahen?
Niṯni am ca n iḥenjiren iy iqqimen ḏi ssaḥa tȓaɣan i wayawya qqaren: Netṣuḍ ḏi ṯemja, war ṯecḍiḥem ca. Netƹezza-kenniw, war ṯetrum ca.
Minzi Yaḥya yusa-d itẓumma war isess aman n uḍiȓ kenniw ṯennim aqa ḏayes jnun!
Yusa-d Mmis n bnaḏem itett isess war itẓummi ca. Kenniw ṯennim aqa bnaḏem-a itett isess aṭṭas, ƹaweḏ netta ḏ ameddukeȓ n iƹeccaren ḏ yinni iƹeṣṣan.
Innama, ȓefhameṯ n Arebbi qebbȓen-teṯ marra yinni itefhamen."
Ij ufarrisi iƹareḍ Ƹisa ḥima aḏ icc akiḏes. Yuḏef ɣar ṯeddarṯ n ufarrisi nni iqqim ɣar missa.
Ḏinni ḏeg ubilaj nni ijjen n ṯemɣarṯ ṯƹeṣṣa. Ṯarra-d ȓexbar Ƹisa iqqim aḏ icc ḏi ṯeddarṯ n ufarrisi nni, ṯusa-d nettaṯ ɣares ijjen n ṯzeyyat ḏayes aman n lwarḏ.
Ṯeqqim ɣar ḏeffar n Ƹisa ɣar iḍaren nnes ṯebḏa ṯetru wḍan-as imeṭṭawen nnes x iḍaren n Ƹisa. Ṯruḥ ṯemseḥ-iṯen s ucewwaf nnes, ṯseǧem-iṯen ṯeḏhen-iṯen s waman n lwarḏ.
Afarrisi nni iy ṯ iƹarḍen wami iẓra manaya inna ḏi nnefs nnes: Wanita maƹlik ḏ nnabi ataf aḏ issen min ṯeƹna ṯemɣarṯ-a iy ṯ itḥaḏan, nettaṯ ṯeƹṣa Arebbi.
Indeq-d Ƹisa inna-as: "A Simƹan, ɣari ij n ȓḥajeṯ aḏac t iniɣ." Inna-as Simƹan: "Siweȓ a Lmuƹallim."
"Ḏinni ijjen n ssiyyed irḍeȓ tmenyaṯ i ṯnayen n yiwḏan. Ijjen irḍeȓ-as xemsmiyya dinar, ijjen irḍeȓ-as xemsin dinar.
Walakin war ɣarsen minzi ɣa arren, ṣafi ssiyyed nni ismeḥ-asen marra. In-ayi cek: Manwen iy ṯ ɣa iḥibben aṭṭas?"
Inna-as Simƹan: "Imken wenni umi ismeḥ ḏeg waṭṭas n umarwas." Inna-as Ƹisa: "Ɣarek ȓḥaqq."

Ineqȓeb ɣar ṯemɣarṯ nni inna-as i Simƹan: "Aqa twaȓiḏ ṯamɣarṯ-a? Usiɣ-d ɣar ṯeddarṯ nnec war ḏayi d ṯuwiḏ cek uȓa ḏ aman iy zi ɣa sirḏeɣ iḍaren inu. Nettaṯ ṯsireḏ-ayi iḍaren inu s imeṭṭawen nnes ṯemseḥ-iṯen s ucewwaf nnes.
Cek war xafi ṯseǧmeḏ ca. Zeg wami d usiɣ nettaṯ ṯseǧam-ayi iḍaren inu.
Cek war ḏayi ṯeḏhineḏ azeǧif uȓa s zzect. Nettaṯ ṯeḏhen-ayi iḍaren inu s waman n lwarḏ.
X manaya aḏac iniɣ, ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nni iy ṯegga aṭṭas twaɣfarent-as minzi nettaṯ ḏayes ȓemḥibbeṯ aṭṭas. Wenni umi twaɣfarent ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ ḏrus, netta ḏayes ȓemḥibbeṯ ḏrus."
Inna-as i ṯemɣarṯ nni: "Ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nnem twaɣfarent-am."
Bḏan yinni iy kis iqqimen qqaren i wayawya: "Min iƹna wanita ig iɣfaren ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ-a?"
Inna-as Ƹisa i ṯemɣarṯ nni: "Cem isenjem-icem lʼiman nnem, ruḥ ḏi ȓehna."
Menbaƹd i manaya iggur Ƹisa zi dcar ɣar dcar zeg ubilaj ɣar ubilaj itḥeddaṯ itbeccar s ȓmulk n Arebbi. Akiḏes ṯenƹac n imeḥḍaren nnes
ḏ can ṯemɣarin isgenfa-ṯent zi jnun ḏ ȓehȓacaṯ. Niṯenti ḏ Maryam umi qqaren ṯamagdaliṯ iy zi ffɣen sebƹa n jnun,
ḏ Ayunna ṯamɣarṯ n Xuzi lwakil n Hirudus, ḏ Suzana, ḏ ṯinneḍni aṭṭas iy tƹawanent s wagȓa nsent.
Wami xas d munen ƹaweḏ aṭṭas n ȓɣaci ḏ yinni ɣares d yusin zi mkuȓ abilaj, ibḏa issawaȓ akiḏsen s yijjen n ȓmaƹna inna:
"Iffeɣ ufeǧaḥ aḏ izreƹ. Wami izerreƹ, ṯewḍa-yas can zzarriƹeṯ x ṭṭarf n ubriḏ. Ƹeffsen xas yiwḏan ccin-teṯ ijḍaḍ n ujenna.
Can zzarriƹeṯ ṯewḍa-yas jar yizra. Ṯeɣmi-d, ȓexddenni ṯnezȓef ṯisraw ȓaḥeqqac war ṯeswi bu waman.
Can zzarriƹeṯ ṯewḍa jar isennanen. Ɣmin-d akiḏes isennanen nni jeyyfen-teṯ.
Can zzarriƹeṯ ṯewḍa x ṯmurṯ ṯaṣebḥant. Ṯuȓi-d ṯemɣar ṯegga ṯiyḏerin, kuȓ icten ṯurew miyya." Wami ikemmeȓ wawaȓ-a inna s jjheḏ: "Ṣenneṭ mliḥ a wenni itsȓan."
Sseqsan-ṯ imeḥḍaren nnes nnan-as: "Min ixes aḏ yini ȓmaƹna-ya?"

Inna-asen: "Itwasmeḥ i kenniw aḏ tessnem min inuffaren ḏi ȓmulk n Arebbi, walakin i yiwḏan nneɣni lla. Ssawaȓeɣ akiḏsen s ȓemƹani ḥima aḏ xzaren walakin war twiȓin ca, ḥima aḏ sȓen walakin war fehhmen i ca.
Ȓmaƹna-ya ixes aḏ yini: Zzarriƹeṯ nni nettaṯ ḏ awaȓ n Arebbi.
Zzarriƹeṯ nni ig iwḍan x ubriḏ nettaṯ am yiwḏan iy tesȓan i wawaȓ n Arebbi. Itraḥ Ibȓis itekkes-asen-ṯ zeg wuȓ ḥima war timnen ca, war nejjmen ca.

Zzarriƹeṯ nni ig iwḍan jar yizra nettaṯ am yiwḏan iy tesȓan i wawaȓ n Arebbi, qebȓen-ṯ s ȓefraḥeṯ. Wami war uwṯin bu iẓewran mliḥ ḏeɣya tneqȓaƹen. Tamnen zzayes ɣir ḏeg yijjen n ȓweqṯ waha, ḏi ȓweqṯ n ȓemḥayen ḏeɣya teffɣen abriḏ.
Zzarriƹeṯ nni ig iwḍan jar isennanen nettaṯ am yiwḏan iy tesȓan i wawaȓ n Arebbi, walakin ḏeɣya temjeyyafen s umnus ḏ wagȓa ḏ ccehawaṯ n ddunect-a war neffƹen ca.
Walakin zzarriƹeṯ nni ig iwḍan ḏi ṯmurṯ ṯaṣebḥant nettaṯ am yiwḏan iy tesȓan i wawaȓ n Arebbi qebȓen-ṯ s wuȓ nsen aṣebḥan ḏ acemȓaȓ, ṣebbaren ḥima aḏ arwen.
Uȓa ḏ ijjen war itcaƹƹiȓ ȓqendiȓ ḥima axas iqȓeb aqnuc niɣ aṯ igg swadday i qama. Lla, itegg-iṯ x ȓmarfaƹ ḥima aḏasen yuc ṯfawṯ i yinni iy d ɣa yaḏfen.
Marra min inuffaren aḏ d imeḍhar. Marra min itwasnuffaren aḏ inefḍeḥ aḏ itwassen.
Arrem-d ȓbaȓ nwem i mammec tesȓam. Wenni iǧan ɣares itmarni-yas. Walakin wenni war ɣar iǧi ca, itwaksi-yas uȓa ḏ min ḏas itɣir ɣares."
Ƹisa ṯusa-d ɣares yemmas ḏ ayṯmas, war zemmaren ca aɣares awḍen, ḏinni aṭṭas n ȓɣaci.
Nedqen-d can yiwḏan nnan-as: "Aqa yemmac ḏ ayṯmac bedden ɣar barra rezzun acek ẓren."
Yarra xasen inna-asen: "Aqa yemma ḏ ayṯma niṯni ḏ iwḏan nni itsȓan i wawaȓ n Arebbi xeddmen zzayes."
Ijjen n nhar inya Ƹisa ḏi ṯɣarrabut ak imeḥḍaren nnes inna-asen: "Yallah a neẓwam ɣar ujemmaḍ-in n ȓebḥar." Ruḥen,
wami uyuren ḏi ȓebḥar, Ƹisa ikka xas yiḍeṣ. Ƹlaɣafla ikkar-d ijjen n arriḥ ijheḏ aṭṭas ḏi ȓebḥar, ṯebḏa ṯɣarrabut tƹemmar s waman uwḍen-d ḏeg yijjen n lxaṭar.
Qarrben ɣares imeḥḍaren sfaqen-ṯ nnan-as: "A Lmuƹallim a Lmuƹallim, aqa neccin netmetta!" Ikkar Ƹisa isbedd arriḥ ḏ ȓemwaj ihedden ȓḥaȓ irsa.
Inna-asen: "Mani iǧa lʼiman nwem?" Ggwḏen tƹejjben nnan i wayawya: "Min iƹna wanitan? Uȓa ḏ arriḥ ḏ waman n ȓebḥar itʼamar-iṯen tṭaƹan-as."
Uwḍen ɣar ṯmurṯ n ijariṯiyen zzaṯ i ṯmurṯ n Ljalil.
Wami yuweḍ Ƹisa ɣar ȓbarr iȓqa-ṯ-iḏ ijjen n bnaḏem zi ṯendint ḏayes jnun. Netta aṭṭas zeg wami war yarreḍ bu warruḍ war izeddeɣ ca ḏi ṯeddarṯ, izeddeɣ ḏeg imeḍȓan.

Wami yufa Ƹisa ḏinni ibḏa isnekkar ṯɣuyyeṯ, iwḍa ɣar iḍaren n Ƹisa indeq-d s yijjen n ṯmijja ṯuƹȓa inna-as: "A Ƹisa a Mmis n Arebbi Yuƹȓan, min ṯexseḏ zzayi? Tettareɣ zzayek ḥima war ḏayi tƹeddibeḏ ca!"

Inna manaya minzi Ƹisa tuɣa yumar jjenn nni aƹeffan ḥima aḏ iffeɣ zeg uryaz nni. Ƹaweḏ minzi jjenn nni iteṭṭef-iṯ aṭṭas n ṯwaȓaṯin. Waxxa teqqnen-as ifassen ḏ iḍaren nnes s snaseȓ ḥeṭṭan-ṯ, itrezza-ṯent indeh-iṯ jjenn nni ɣar ȓexȓa.
Isseqsa-ṯ Ƹisa inna-as: "Mammec ḏac qqaren?" Inna-as: "Nec qqaren-ayi Aberru" minzi tuɣa uḏfen ḏayes aṭṭas n jnun.
Ḥeccmen-ṯ aṭṭas jnun nni ḥima war ṯen itsekki ca ɣar wanu bȓa ȓaḥedd.
Ḏinni ijjen n ṯḥimerṯ ḏ ṯameqqrant n yiȓfan ṯarwes x uḏrar. Ttaren zzayes ḥima aṯen ijj aḏayes aḏfen. Ssenni ijji-ṯen.
Ffɣen jnun zi bnaḏem nni uḏfen ḏeg yiȓfan. Ṯehwa ṯḥimerṯ nni x uḏrar ɣar ȓebḥar ṯeɣreq ḏinni.
Yinni yarewwsen, ẓrin min iweqƹen arewȓen sufɣen ȓexbar ḏi ṯendint ḏ ȓedcuraṯ.
Ffɣen-d yiwḏan ḥima aḏ ẓren min iweqƹen. Usin-d ɣar Ƹisa ufin aryaz nni ffɣen zzayes jnun, iqqim ɣar iḍaren n Ƹisa yareḍ arruḍ nnes igenfa iḏweȓ s ȓaƹqeȓ nnes. Uca ggwḏen aṭṭas.
Xebbaren-ṯen ȓechuḏ mammec igga Ƹisa isgenfa aryaz nni iy ḏi tuɣa ǧan jnun.
Uca ttaren zi Ƹisa marra ayṯbab n jjiheṯ n ijariṯiyen ḥima axasen ibeƹƹeḏ minzi ggwḏen aṭṭas. Inya ḏi ṯɣarrabut iƹqeb ssenni.
Aryaz nni iy zi ffɣen jnun ittar zi Ƹisa ḥima akiḏes iraḥ. Walakin Ƹisa yugi issekk-iṯ inna-as:
"Ƹqeb ɣar ṯeddarṯ nnec, sxebbar-iṯen s min ḏac igga Arebbi." Iruḥ uryaz nni ibḏa itxebbar ḏi ṯendint ṯekmaȓ zi min ḏas igga Ƹisa.
Wami d iḏweȓ Ƹisa, reḥḥben zzayes ȓɣaci minzi marra iḏsen trajan-ṯ.
Yusa-d ɣares ijjen n uryaz qqaren-as Yagrus. Netta ḏ arrayes n ṯemziḏa iy iǧan ḏinni. Iwḍa ɣar iḍaren n Ƹisa ibḏa itḥeccam-iṯ aṭṭas ḥima akiḏes iraḥ ɣar ṯeddarṯ nnes
minzi ɣares ɣir ijjen n ṯḥenjirṯ waha ƹȓayen aḏ tegg ṯenƹac iseggwusa, tmetta. Ikkar Ƹisa iruḥ, temzaḥamen xas ȓɣaci.
Ḏinni jar yiwḏan nni ijjen n ṯemɣarṯ ṯenƹac iseggwusa zeg wami iy ṯehȓec, tazzeȓ s iḏammen. Marra min ɣares ḏ agȓa ṯḍeyyeƹ-iṯ x iḍbiben, war izemmar ḥadd at isgenfa.
Ṯeḏfar Ƹisa, ṯḥaḏa-yas ṭṭarf n useȓham nnes ȓexddenni ṯgenfa ḏeg umcan.
Inna Ƹisa: "Wi ḏayi iḥaḏan?" Marra iḏsen nkaren. Inna-as Buṭrus: "A Lmuƹallim, qa marra yiwḏan-a temzaḥamen xac!"
Inna Ƹisa: "Lla, sḥisseɣ can yijjen iḥaḏa-ayi minzi ssneɣ jjheḏ iffeɣ zzayi."
Wami ṯufa ṯemɣarṯ nni ṯnefḍeḥ, ṯruḥ ɣar Ƹisa terjiji ṯewḍa-yas ɣar iḍaren nnes. Ṯƹaweḏ-as zzaṯ i marra iwḏan nni mayemmi iy ṯ ṯḥaḏa ḏ mammec ṯgenfa ḏeg umcan.
Inna-as Ƹisa: "A yeǧi, cem lʼiman nnem isgenfa-cem. Ruḥ ḏi ȓehna."
Wami ƹaḏ issawaȓ, yusa-d ijjen zi ṯeddarṯ n arrayes nni n ṯemziḏa inna-as: "Yeǧic cek ṯemmuṯ. War tƹeddab ca ȓexxu lmuƹallim."
Isȓa-yas Ƹisa inna-as: "War teggweḏ ca! Amen waha, aqa yeǧic aḏ tgenfa."
Wami yuweḍ ɣar ṯeddarṯ n Yagrus, war ijji uȓa ḏ ijjen aḏ yaḏef illa Buṭrus ḏ Yuḥanna ḏ Yaƹqub ḏ babas d yemmas n ṯḥenjirṯ nni.
Marra trun xas tƹezzan. Inna-asen Ƹisa: "War xas trum ca. Aqa ṯaḥenjirṯ-a war ṯemmuṯ ca, ṯeṭṭeṣ waha!"
Bḏan ḍeḥḥcen xas qa ssnen belli ṯemmuṯ.
Iṭṭef-as ḏeg ufus i ṯḥenjirṯ nni inna-as: "A ṯaḥenjirṯ kkar."
Ȓexddenni buḥbeȓ nnes iḏweȓ-as-d, ṯekkar ḏeg umcan. Iweṣṣa-ṯen aḏas ucen min ɣa ṯecc.
Babas ḏ yemmas qqimen tƹejjben. Netta iweṣṣa-ṯen inna-asen war tƹawaḏem i ḥadd min iweqƹen.
Iȓaɣa-d Ƹisa x ṯenƹac n arrusul yuca-asen ṯizemmar ḏ ssulṭa aḏ ḥekmen x marra jnun u ƹaweḏ ḥima aḏ sgenfan ȓehȓacaṯ.
Issekk-iṯen ḥima aḏ beccaren s ȓmulk n Arebbi aḏ sgenfan imehȓac.
Inna-asen: "War kiḏwem tiwim walu x ubriḏ. War kessim ni aƹekkaz, ni aqrab, ni aɣrum, ni nnuqarṯ, ni ṯnayen n ičammiren.
Xmi ɣa ṯaḏfem ɣar can ṯeddarṯ, qqimem ḏinni aȓ ɣa ṯuyurem ssenni.
Meȓa war kenniw qbiȓen ca ḏi can ṯendint, ffɣem ssenni mesḥeṯ ṯaƹejjact zeg iḍaren nwem am ca n chaḏeṯ xasen."
Ṣafi ruḥen arrusul ƹḏun ḏi ȓedcuraṯ, tbeccaren sgenfan iwḏan ḏi mkuȓ amcan.
Lwali Hirudus yarra-d ȓexbar x marra min itewqiƹen, iḏhec minzi can yiwḏan qqaren qa wanita ḏ Yaḥya nni, itwasekkar-d zi ȓmewṯ.
Ijjen iqqar lla, qa ḏ Ilyas iy d imeḍharen. Ijjen iqqar lla, qa ikkar-d ijjen zi lʼanbiya nni iqḏimen.
Hirudus inna: "Aqa nec qesseɣ azeǧif i Yaḥya nni, min iƹna wanita iy xef tesȓiɣ manaya?" Ixes aṯ iẓer.
Wami d ḏewȓen arrusul, ƹawḏen-as i Ƹisa x marra min ggin. Yuwi-ṯen ssenni ɣar jjiheṯ n yijjen n ubilaj umi qqaren Bayt Ṣayda.
Wami ȓɣaci ssnen manaya ḏfaren-ṯ. Netta isteqbeȓ-iṯen ibḏa issawaȓ akiḏsen x ȓmulk n Arebbi isgenfa yinni ixsen aḏ genfan.
Wami iƹḏu ȓḥaȓ usin-d ɣares ṯenƹac n imeḥḍaren nnes nnan-as: "Sekk iwḏan-a ssa ɣar ȓedcuraṯ ḏ ṯuḏrin yuḏsen ammu ḏ wammu, aḏ rzun min ɣa ccen ḏ mani ɣa sensen minzi amcan-a ḏ ȓexȓa waha."
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Ucem-asen kenniw min ɣa ccen." Nnan-as: "Neccin ɣarneɣ ḏa ɣir xemsa n ṯxebbazin ḏ ṯnayen n iseȓman. Ma a nraḥ neccin a d nseɣ macca i marra iwḏan-a?"
(Minzi ḏinni can xemsaȓaf n iryazen.) Inna-asen Ƹisa i imeḥḍaren nnes: "Sɣimem-ṯen ḏ lfirqaṯ, xemsin xemsin."
Ggin manayenni, sɣimen-ṯen marra.
Ikkar iṭṭef xemsa nni n ṯxebbazin ḏ ṯnayen nni n iseȓman, iysi ṯiṭṭawin nnes ɣar ujenna uca icekkar Arebbi. Irza aɣrum nni yuca-asen-ṯ i imeḥḍaren nnes ḥima aṯ ferqen x yiwḏan nni marra.
Ccin marra jjiwnen. Ssenni ysin ṯenƹac n ṯeqrabin ƹemmarent s iȓeqquzen nni iceṭṭen.
Ijjen n nhar Ƹisa itẓaǧa waḥḏes ṭṭarf nnes imeḥḍaren nnes. Ikkar isseqsa-ṯen inna-asen: "Min xafi qqaren yiwḏan?"
Arrin xas nnan-as: "Ijjen iqqar cek ḏ Yaḥya. Ijjen iqqar cek ḏ Ilyas. Ijjen iqqar cek zi lʼanbiya iqḏimen iy d ikkaren zi ȓmewṯ."
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Y kenniw, min ḏayi d tarram nec?" Indeq-d Buṭrus inna-as: "Cek ḏ Lmasiḥ n Arebbi."
Ƹisa iʼakked xasen yumar-iṯen bac war txebbaren ḥadd x manayenni.

Inna-asen i imeḥḍaren nnes: "Mmis n bnaḏem labud aḏ itwaƹeddeb x waṭṭas n ṯmesȓayin, aṯ ƹiffen imeqqranen n Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏ arruyas n ȓfuqaha ḏ imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa. Aṯ nɣen, wis ṯeȓtiyyam aḏ d itwasekkar zi ȓmewṯ."
Ṯumma inna-asen i marra iwḏan nni: "Wenni ixsen aḏayi iḏfar nec, labud aḏ ismeḥ ḏeg yixef nnes, labud kuȓ nhar aḏ ikessi ṣṣalib nnes minxef ɣa iƹeddeb aḏayi iḏfar.
Ȓaḥeqqac wenni irezzun aḏ isenjem ṯuḏarṯ nnes ataf at ixsar. Wenni ɣa ixsaren ṯuḏarṯ nnes x ssabab inu ataf at isenjem.
Minzi ɣa infeƹ bnaḏem meȓa irbeḥ ddunect-a qaƹ wa ixsar ixef nnes niɣ iḍeyyeƹ ixef nnes?
Wenni xafi ɣa iƹeffaren nec niɣ aḏ iƹeffar x wawaȓ inu, ataf axas iƹeffar Mmis n bnaḏem xmi d ɣa yas s lƹaḍama nnes ḏ lƹaḍama n Babas ak lmalaʼikaṯ iqeddsen.
Aqa tesȓam ȓḥaqq: Ȓebƹaḍ zeg yinni iǧan ḏa akiḏi war tmettin ca aȓ ɣa ẓren ȓmulk n Arebbi."
Menbaƹd i wawaȓ nni can ṯmenyam igaƹƹeḏ Ƹisa ɣar uḏrar ḥima aḏ iẓẓaǧ, yuwi akiḏes Buṭrus ḏ Yuḥanna ḏ Yaƹqub.
Wami iẓẓuǧ, ibeddeȓ uɣembub nnes iḏweȓ ḏayes nnur, iḏweȓ warruḍ nnes ḏ acemȓaȓ itceƹciƹ.
Meḍharen-d ṯnayen n iryazen ssawaȓen akiḏes ijjen ḏ nnabi Musa ijjen ḏ nnabi Ilyas.
Meḍharen-d ak Ƹisa s yijjen n lƹaḍama ḏ ṯameqqrant, bḏan ssawaȓen akiḏes x wufuɣ nnes iy zi ɣa iffeɣ ḏeɣya zi Lquds.
Walakin Buṭrus ḏ yinni akiḏes teṭṭṣen tnuddumen s yiḏes, wami faqen mliḥ ṯumma ufin lƹaḍama n Ƹisa, akiḏes ṯnayen n iryazen bedden.

Wami ƹaḏ gguren zzayes iryazen nni, indeq-d Buṭrus inna-as i Ƹisa: "A Siḏi, ḏ aṣebḥan akiḏec neqqim ḏanita. Neccin a negg ṯȓaṯa n iqiḍan, ijjen i cek, ijjen i Musa, ijjen i Ilyas." Buṭrus tuɣa ifaja, war yufi ca min ɣa yini.
Wami netta tuɣaṯ ƹaḏ issawaȓ ihwa-d xasen ij useynu iɣeṭṭa-ṯen ggwḏen.
Ṯendeq-d zzayes ijjen n ṯmijja zeg useynu nni ṯenna-asen: "Qa ḏ wanita ḏ Mmi iy ixḍareɣ, ṣennṭeṯ ɣares."
Wami ṣafi ṯmijja nni ṯessiweȓ ufin Ƹisa waḥḏes. Imeḥḍaren nni snuffaren manayenni ḏeg wuȓ nsen war xebbaren ḥadd ḏi lʼayamaṯ nni x min ẓrin.
Ṯiwecca nnes hwan-d zeg uḏrar, reḥḥben zzaysen ȓɣaci aṭṭas.
Iȓaɣa ijjen n uryaz zi ȓɣaci nni inna: "A Lmuƹallim, tettareɣ zzayec aḏ texzareḏ mmi aqa ḏ wa waha iy ɣari.
Memmi ixeṭṭef-iṯ ijjen n jjenn, ḏeɣya isnekkar ṯɣuyyeṯ. Jjen nni iserjiji-ṯ aȓ d ɣa isufeɣ netta kuffu zeg uqemmum nnes, war ḏas irexxu ḥetta aȓ ṯ ɣa isala.
Ttareɣ zeg imeḥḍaren nnec azzayes sufɣen jjenn-a walakin niṯni war ḏas zemmaren ca."
Yarra xasen Ƹisa inna-asen: "A iwḏan n ȓweqṯ-a iy ḏi war iǧi bu lʼiman, a yinni iffɣen abriḏ! Mecḥaȓ iy kiḏwem ɣa qqimeɣ u mecḥaȓ ḏawem ɣa ṣbareɣ? Awi-yayi-d mmic ḏanita."
