Nhar nni tuɣa ḏ jjemƹa, israʼiliyen sewjaḏen i nhar n ssebṯ n lƹibada. X manayenni neḍȓen Ƹisa ḏeg yifri nni n unḍeȓ minzi yuḏes.
Ḏi nhar amezwaru n ssimana, ṯusa-d Maryam ṯamagdaliṯ ɣar yifri n unḍeȓ n Ƹisa zic. Tuɣa ƹaḏ ṯaǧest, ṯufa azru itwakkes x yifri n unḍeȓ.
Ṯuzzeȓ-d ṯusa-d ɣar Simƹan Buṭrus ḏ umeḥḍar nneɣni wenni iƹizzen x Ƹisa aṭṭas, ṯenna-asen qa ysin Ƹisa zeg yifri n unḍeȓ, war nessin mani ṯ ggin.
Isijj x yifri yufa ȓecfen imars ḏinni walakin war yuḏif ca.
Iḏeffar-iṯ-iḏ Simƹan Buṭrus ixḍeȓ, yuḏef ḏeg yifri n unḍeȓ. Itwaȓa ȓecfen nni
yufa ȓqabb iy zi tuɣa iɣeṭṭa uzeǧif n Ƹisa war iǧi ca ag ȓecfen, iḍfes waḥḏes.
Ȓexddenni yuḏef umeḥḍar nni izwaren ɣar yifri n unḍeȓ, iẓra manayenni yumen.
Walakin niṯni ƹaḏ war fhimen ca zi Lkitab belli labud aḏ ikkar Ƹisa zi ȓmewṯ.
Ssenni rewwḥen imeḥḍaren.
Maryam ṯbedd ɣar ṯewwarṯ n yifri n unḍeȓ ṯeqqim ṯetru. Wami ṯetru ṯsijj x yifri n unḍeȓ
ṯufa ṯnayen n lmalaʼikaṯ s warruḍ ḏ acemȓaȓ icten ṯeqqim ɣar uzeǧif icten ṯeqqim ɣar iḍaren mani tuɣa ṯeǧa ddat n Ƹisa.
Nnant-as: "A ṯamɣarṯ min cem yuɣin ṯetruḏ?" Ṯenna-asent: "Ysin Siḏi, war ssineɣ mani ṯ sersen."
Ṯenna manayenni ṯexzar ɣar ḏeffar ṯufa ḏinni Ƹisa, walakin nettaṯ war ṯessin ca netta ḏ Ƹisa.
Inna-as Ƹisa i Maryam: "A ṯamɣarṯ min cem yuɣin ṯetruḏ, mixef ṯrezzuḏ?" Maryam tɣir-as ḏ bab n jarda nni, ṯenna-as: "A Siḏi meȓa ḏ cek iy ṯ iysin, in-ayi mani ṯ ṯserseḏ ḥima aṯ ysiɣ."
Inna-as Ƹisa: "A Maryam!" Ȓexddenni ṯeƹqeȓ-iṯ ṯenna-as s wawaȓ n israʼiliyen: "A Rabuni!" (Zaƹma <A Lmuƹallim.>)
Inna-as Ƹisa: "War ḏayi teṭṭef ca, qa nec ƹaḏ war gaƹƹḏeɣ ca ɣar Baba. Ruḥ ɣar ayṯma inu, in-asen qa nec aḏ gaƹƹḏeɣ ɣar Baba ḏ Babaṯwem, ɣar Arebbi inu ḏ Arebbi nwem."
Ṯruḥ Maryam ṯamagdaliṯ ṯessiweḍ-asen ȓexbar i imeḥḍaren ṯenna-asen qa ẓriɣ Siḏiṯneɣ issiweȓ-d akiḏi aqa min ḏayi inna...
Nhar n ȓḥad munen imeḥḍaren ɣar ṯmeddiṯ, ṯiwwura qqnent ggwḏen zeg israʼiliyen. Yusa-d Ƹisa ibedd ḏi ȓwesṭ inna-asen: "Sȓam xawem."
Inna-asen manaya, isbeyyen-asen-d ifassen nnes ḏ uɣezḏis nnes. Farḥen imeḥḍaren wami ẓrin Siḏiṯsen.
Inna-asen ƹaweḏ Ƹisa: "Sȓam xawem. Mammec ḏayi d issekk Baba, ammu nec akenniw ssekkeɣ."
Wami inna manaya iṣṣuḍ xasen inna-asen: "Qebȓeṯ Arruḥ iqeddsen.
Wenni umi ṯsemḥem i ddnub nnes, aḏas twasemḥent. Wenni umi war ṯesmiḥem ca, war ḏas twasmiḥent ca."
Walakin ijjen zi ṯenƹac n imeḥḍaren nnes umi qqaren Tuma tȓaɣan-as Acniw, war kisen iǧi ca wami d yusa Ƹisa.

Nnan-as imeḥḍaren nni nneɣni qa neẓra Siḏiṯneɣ! Ikkar Tuma inna-asen: "Meȓa war ẓriɣ ca lʼaṯar n imesmiȓen ḏeg ifassen nnes aḏ ggeɣ ḍaḍ inu ḏeg umcan n imesmiȓen nni, aḏ serseɣ fus inu x uɣezḏis nnes, war timneɣ ca."
Menbaƹd i ṯmeniyyam, munen imeḥḍaren ƹaweḏ ɣar ḏaxeȓ, ṯiwwura qqnent akiḏsen Tuma. Yusa-d Ƹisa ibedd ḏi ȓwesṭ nsen inna-asen: "Sȓam xawem!"
Inna-as i Tuma: "Egg ḍaḍ nnec ḏanita, xzar ifassen inu. Sers fus nnec x uɣezḏis inu. War tcekka ca; Lla, amen."
Indeq-d Tuma inna-as: "A Siḏi inu, ay Arebbi inu!"
Inna-as Ƹisa: "Aȓ wami ḏayi ṯeẓriḏ, ƹaḏ iy ṯumneḏ? Ssaƹḏ n yinni war ḏayi ẓrin ca, umnen."
Igga Ƹisa aṭṭas n lmuƹjizaṯ nneɣni zzaṯ i imeḥḍaren nnes, niṯenti war urint ca ḏi Lkitab-a.
Ṯimesȓayin-a urint ḥima aḏ tamnem belli Ƹisa netta ḏ Lmasiḥ Mmis n Arebbi bac meȓa ṯumnem aɣarwem ṯiȓi ṯuḏarṯ ḏeg yisem nnes.
Menbaƹd i manaya imeḍhar-d Ƹisa ƹaweḏ i imeḥḍaren nnes x cceṭṭ n ȓebḥar n Ṭabarya. Ammu iy iwqeƹ.
Munen ḏinni ȓebƹaḍ n imeḥḍaren nnes: Simƹan Buṭrus ḏ Tuma wenni umi qqaren <Acniw>, ḏ Naṯnahil netta zeg ubilaj n Qana ḏi ṯmurṯ n Ljalil, ḏ ṯarwa n Zabadi, ḏ ṯnayen nneɣni.
Ikkar Simƹan Buṭrus inna-asen nec aḏ raḥeɣ aḏ ymareɣ. Nnan-as akic nraḥ uȓa ḏ neccin. Ffɣen, nyin ḏi ṯɣarrabut. Ḏi ǧiȓeṯ nni war ymaren walu.
Wami iṣbaḥ ȓḥaȓ, ufin Ƹisa ibedd x cceṭṭ n ȓebḥar walakin imeḥḍaren war ṯ ƹqiȓen ca.
Inna-asen: "Ay iḥenjiren, ma ṯeymarem can iseȓman?" Nnan-as: "Lla, walu."
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Seyybeṯ ṯracca x ufusi n ṯɣarrabut aḏ tafem iseȓman." Wami t seyyben war zemmaren atid jebḏen ȓaḥeqqac ṯƹemmar s iseȓman aṭṭas.

Ameḥḍar nni iƹizzen x Ƹisa aṭṭas inna-as i Buṭrus qa win ḏ Siḏiṯneɣ. Wami isȓa Simƹan Buṭrus qa win ḏ Ƹisa, ikkar yareḍ čammir nnes ȓaḥeqqac tuɣa ikkes-iṯ, ȓexddenni inḍew ḏi ȓebḥar bac aḏ iraḥ ɣar Ƹisa.
Walakin imeḥḍaren nni nneɣni iy kiḏes iǧan ḏfaren-ṯ-iḏ s ṯɣarrabut, jebbḏen-d ṯracca nni ṯeccur s iseȓman. War ggwijen ca x ȓbarr ɣir can miyyat mitru waha.
Wami d uwḍen ɣar ȓbarr, ufin ṯimessi n ȓefḥam xas iseȓman ḏ uɣrum.
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Awim-d cwayt n iseȓman iy d ṯeymarem ȓexxu."
Inya Simƹan Buṭrus ijbeḏ-d ṯracca nni ɣar ȓbarr, ḏayes miyya u ṯȓaṯa u xemsin n iseȓman ḏ imeqqranen. Qaƹ manaya, war ṯeqqares ca ṯracca nni.
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "Araḥem-d aḏ teccem." War izƹim uȓa ḏ ijjen zeg imeḥḍaren aṯ isseqsa, min ṯeƹniḏ cek? Ȓaḥeqqac ssnen qa ḏ Siḏiṯsen.
Iruḥ Ƹisa iysi-d aɣrum nni ḏ iseȓman nni ifreq-iṯen xasen.
Ṯanita ḏ wis ṯeȓt marraṯ iy ḏi itmeḍhar-d Ƹisa i imeḥḍaren nnes zeg wami iy d ikkar zi ȓmewṯ.

Wami reyyqen, inna-as Ƹisa i Simƹan Buṭrus: "A Simƹan a mmis n Yuḥanna, ma tḥibbiḏ-ayi ktar zi yina?" Inna-as Simƹan Buṭrus: "Wah a Siḏi, cek ṯessneḏ qa nec texseɣ-c." Inna-as Ƹisa: "Secc izmaren inu."
Inna-as Ƹisa wis marrṯayen: "A Simƹan a mmis n Yuḥanna, ma tḥibbiḏ-ayi?" Yenna-as Simƹan: "Wah a Siḏi, cek ṯessneḏ qa nec texseɣ-c." Inna-as Ƹisa: "Arwes iḥuȓiyen inu."

Inna-as Ƹisa wis ṯeȓt marraṯ: "A Simƹan a mmis n Yuḥanna, ma texseḏ-ayi?" Iqqes-as ȓḥaȓ i Buṭrus ȓaḥeqqac inna-as-ṯ wis ṯeȓt marraṯ, cek ma texseḏ-ayi? Inna-as: "A Siḏi, cek ṯessneḏ kuȓci. Ṯessneḏ qa nec texseɣ-c." Inna-as Ƹisa: "Secc iḥuȓiyen inu.
Aqa tesȓiḏ ȓḥaqq: Ḏi ṯemẓi nnec tḥezzameḏ ixef nnec traḥeḏ mani ma ṯexseḏ. Walakin xmi ɣa ṯewsareḏ, aḏ tḍeȓqeḏ ifassen nnec ataf ḥadd nneɣni ac iḥezzem ac yawi mani war texseḏ ca."
Inna manayenni Ƹisa ḥima aḏ isbeyyen mamc ɣa immeṯ Buṭrus ḥima aḏ tmeḍhar lƹaḍama n Arebbi. Wami iy ḏas inna manayenni, inna-as: "Ḏfar-ayi-d."
Ineqȓeb Buṭrus yufa iḏeffar-iṯen-d umeḥḍar nni iƹizzen x Ƹisa aṭṭas, iƹni wenni tuɣa iqqimen ɣar uɣezḏis n Ƹisa ḏeg umensi nni inna-as: A Siḏi, min iƹna wenni c ɣa izzenzen?
Wami ṯ iẓra Buṭrus inna-as i Ƹisa: "A Siḏi, y win min ḏas ɣa iweqƹen?"
Inna-as Ƹisa i Buṭrus: "Nec meȓa xseɣ win aḏ iddar aȓ ɣa d ḏewȓeɣ, war ḏac iruḥ bu ȓḥaȓ. Cek ḏfar-ayi-d!"

Ssenni iffeɣ ȓexbar ɣar wawmaṯen qqaren: <Ameḥḍar-a war itmetti ca.> Walakin ḏ ṣṣaḥ Ƹisa war yinni ca belli ameḥḍar-a war itmetti ca. Min inna? Inna-t ammu: <Nec meȓa xseɣ win aḏ iddar aȓ ɣa d ḏewȓeɣ, war ḏac iruḥ bu ȓḥaȓ.>
Ameḥḍar-a, min iƹna? Ḏ netta ig icehhḏen x ṯmesȓayin-a ṯumma yuri-ṯent. Neccin nessen qa chaḏeṯ nnes n ṣṣaḥ.
Aṭṭas n ṯmesȓayin nneɣni iy igga Ƹisa. Maƹlik ṯura kuȓ icten zzaysent ict-ict, ḥessbeɣ belli ataf ddunect-a marra war ṯzemmar aḏ teysi lkutub nni iy ɣa yarin.
Wami iƹḏu ȓaƹḏab n ȓmewṯ nnes, itmeḍhar-asen-d x yijjen n arbeƹin yum isefham-iṯen mebȓa ccekk netta aqa iddar. Itas-d ɣarsen issawaȓ akiḏsen x ȓmulk n Arebbi.
Wami tuɣa akiḏsen itett, iweṣṣa-aṯen inna-asen: "War teffɣem ca zi ṯendint n Lquds. Rajam aȓ d ɣa yas min iwƹeḏ Baba iy xef ḏawem tuɣa ssiwȓeɣ.
Iƹni Yaḥya iṭehhar i yiwḏan s waman, kenniw war ḏawem iqqim ca aḏ twaṭehharem s Arruḥ iqeddsen."
Wami munen arrusul ak Ƹisa nnan-as: "A Siḏi, ma ḏeg wussan-a iy d ɣa ṯarreḏ ȓeḥkam ɣar Ayṯ-Israʼil?"
Inna-asen Ƹisa: "War ḏawem itwasmeḥ ca aḏ tessnem lʼawqat niɣ ḏ ttawarix tuɣa igga Baba s ssulṭa nnes.
Walakin axmi xawem d ɣa ihwa Arruḥ iqeddsen, aɣarwem yiȓi jjheḏ. Axafi ṯcehḏem ḏi ṯendint n Lquds ḏ marra ṯimura n Yahuḏiya ḏ Samarya aȓ ṭṭarf uneggaru n ddunect-a."
Ɣir ikemmeȓ Ƹisa awaȓ nnes, itwarfeƹ ɣar ujenna. Qqimen txezzaren ḏayes uca iweddar-asen ḏeg useynu.
Qqimen txezzaren mliḥ wami yuȓi ɣar ujenna, ƹlaɣafla ufin akiḏsen ṯnayen n iṯarrasen bedden, ɣarsen arruḍ ḏ acemȓaȓ.
Nnan-asen: "Ay iryazen n ṯmurṯ n Ljalil, mayemmi ƹaḏ ṯbeddem ḏanita txezzarem ḏeg ujenna? Qa Ƹisa-ya wanita iy ḏawem itwarfƹen ɣar ujenna, mammec ṯ ṯeẓrim igaƹƹeḏ ɣar ujenna amenni iy d ɣa iḏweȓ."
Ssenni ḏewȓen-d arrusul zeg Uḏrar n Zzitun ɣar ṯendint n Lquds ig iggwjen s yijjen n kilumit.
Wami uwḍen, gaƹƹḏen ɣar ṯɣurfat mani tiȓin: Buṭrus ḏ Yuḥanna ḏ Yaƹqub ḏ Andrus, ḏ Filippas ḏ Tuma ḏ Bartulumay ḏ Matta, ḏ Yaƹqub mmis n Ḥalfa ḏ Simƹan Lmunaḍil, ḏ Yahuḏa mmis n Yaƹqub.
Yina kuȓ nhar tmunen marra s yijjen n lfikra tẓaǧan, akiḏsen can n ṯemɣarin ḏ Maryam yemmas n Ƹisa ḏ ayṯmas.
Ḏeg wussan nni ikkar Buṭrus ibedd ḏi ȓwesṭ n ȓmuminin (ḏinni can miyya u ƹicrin iḏsen) inna-asen:
"Ay ayṯma, tuɣa itxeṣṣa aḏ ikemmeȓ wawaȓ n Arruḥ iqeddsen iy d yusin x yiȓes n nnabi Dawed ḏeg yijjen n zman wami issiweȓ x Yahuḏa iƹni wenni izenzen Ƹisa isbeyyen-asen abriḏ yuwi yinni iy ṯ iṭṭfen.
Yahuḏa-ya tuɣa itwaḥsab zzayneɣ, yuḏef akiḏneɣ ḏi ȓxeḏmeṯ n Arebbi.
S tmenyaṯ nnes ig iṭṭef n lḥaram, iruḥ isɣa zzaysent ijjen n ṯmurṯ. Ḏinni iy iwḍa s jjheḏ x wuḏem nnes, idduqqez-as uƹeddis menḍaren-as-d marra waḏan nnes.
Arrin-as-d ȓexbar marra ayṯbab n Lquds. X manayenni semman-as i ṯmurṯ nni s wawaȓ nsen <Ḥaqel Damma> iƹni <Iyar n iḏammen.>
Iqqar Lkitab n Zzabur: Arebbi aḏ ixȓa ṯaddarṯ n wenni war ḏayes izeddeɣ ḥadd. Iqqar ƹaweḏ: Ȓxeḏmeṯ nnes at iṭṭef ijjen nneɣni.
Iḏen, itxeṣṣa a nexḍar ijjen n uryaz zeg yinni tuɣa iǧan akiḏneɣ marra ȓweqṯ nni wami Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa itaḏef iteffeɣ xaneɣ.
Iƹni zeg wami iy ṯ iṭehhar Yaḥya s waman aȓ wami iy itwarfeƹ xaneɣ ɣar ujenna. Aryaz-a itxeṣṣa akiḏneɣ icheḏ qa Ƹisa ikkar-d zi ȓmewṯ."
Kkaren qeddmen ṯnayen n yiwḏan: ijjen qqaren-as Matyas ijjen qqaren-as Yusef. Yusef nni ƹaweḏ qqaren-as Barsaba niɣ Yustus.
Ttaren-as i Arebbi nnan-as: "A Siḏi Arebbi qa cek ṯessneḏ min iǧan ḏeg wuȓawen n yiwḏan marra. Seḍhar-aneɣ-d wenni iy ṯixḍareḏ zi ṯnayen-a.
Akiḏneɣ yiȓi ḏi ȓxeḏmeṯ-a, aḏ iḏweȓ ḏ arrasul ḏeg umcan n Yahuḏa wenni ig isemḥen ḏi ȓxeḏmeṯ-a iruḥ ɣar umcan nnes aƹeffan."
Uca ggin lqurƹa, lqurƹa nni ṯusa-d ḏi Matyas, arnin-ṯ-iḏ ɣar ḥiṭac nni n arrusul.
Wami d yuweḍ Ȓƹiḏ n nhar wis xemsin, munen marra ȓmuminin ḏeg yijjen n umcan.
Ƹlaɣafla ihwa-d ijjen n ȓḥess zeg ujenna am arriḥ iy itṣuḍen s jjheḏ, yuḏef ḏi mkuȓ jjiheṯ n ṯeddarṯ mani qqimen.
Ẓrin iȓesawen am iṣfeḍawen n ṯmessi iruḥ kuȓ yiȓes waḥḏes imars ij ij x kuȓ ijjen zzaysen.
Ccuren s Arruḥ iqeddsen marra iḏsen, bḏan ssawaȓen s lluɣaṯ war iǧin bu nsen amecnaw mammec ḏasen yuca Arruḥ aḏ ssiwȓen.
Ḏinni can iryazen zi Ayṯ-Israʼil teggwḏen Arebbi tzuran ɣar Lquds, niṯni zi marra ṯimura n ddunect-a.
Iryazen nni wami sȓan i ȓḥess nni usin-d munen ḏinni qqimen tƹejjben, mkuȓ ijjen itsȓa i lluɣa nnes.
Ḏehhcen tƹejjben nnan jarasen: "Marra iwḏan-a iy ssawaȓen lʼaṣel nsen zi ṯmurṯ n Ljalil niɣ lla?
Mammec mkuȓ ijjen zzayneɣ itsȓa i lluɣa n ṯmurṯ nnes?
Iƹni ṯamurṯ n Bardaya ḏ Madya ḏ Ƹilam, ḏ imezḏaɣ n Misibuṭamya ḏ Yahuḏiya ḏ Kapdukya, ḏ Punṭus ḏ Asya,
ḏ Frijya ḏ Pamfilya, ḏ Miṣra ḏ jwayeh n Lqurina ḏi Libya, ḏ yinni itzuran zi ṯendint n Ruma.
Ḏ Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏ yinni iseȓmen ḏi ddin n Ayṯ-Israʼil, ḏ Ayṯ-Krit ḏ waƹraben. Neccin marra netsȓa-yasen ssawaȓen s lluɣaṯ nneɣ x ṯmesȓayin ṯimeqqranin n Arebbi."
Ḏehcen ccekken, bḏan ssawaȓen jarasen nnan: "Min ixes aḏ yini manaya?"
Ȓebƹaḍ ḍeḥcen xasen nnan qa swin aṭṭas n waman uḍiȓ.
Buṭrus aqaṯ ak ḥiṭac nni n arrusul, ikkar issiweȓ s jjheḏ inna-asen: "Ay iryazen n Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏ marra imezḏaɣ n Lquds, itxeṣṣa aḏ tessnem aḏ tṣennṭem mliḥ i wawaȓen inu.
Iwḏan-a war swin ca war ɣellan ca s ccreb amecnaw mammec ṯḥessbem minzi ṯsaƹƹat-a ƹaḏ ḏ tesƹa n ṣbaḥ waha!
Lla, issiweȓ nnabi Waʼil x manaya ḏeg yijjen n zman wami inna:
Arebbi inna: Ḏeg wussan ineggura aḏ farɣeɣ Arruḥ inu x marra iwḏan. Ṯarwa nwem ḏ yissiṯwem aḏ ssiwȓen s min ƹeȓmen zi Arebbi. Iḥenjiren nwem aḏ ẓren lwaḥi, iwessura nwem aḏ arjan ṯirja.
Ḏeg wussan nni aḏ farɣeɣ Arruḥ inu x lƹibad inu iryazen ḏ ṯemɣarin, aḏ ssiwȓen s min ƹeȓmen zi Arebbi.
Aḏ ggeɣ ȓaƹjayeb ḏeg ujenna ḏ lƹalamaṯ ḏi ṯmurṯ, aḏ iȓin iḏammen ḏ ṯmessi ḏ waṭṭas n ddexxan.
Ṯfuct aḏ teḏweȓ ḏ ṯaǧest, ṯaziri aḏ teḏweȓ ḏ iḏammen qbeȓ iy d ɣa yas Nhar nni ameqqran lƹaḍim n Siḏi Arebbi.
Ssenni marra wenni iy ɣa iȓaɣan s yisem n Siḏi Arebbi ataf aḏ injem.

Ay iryazen n Ayṯ-Israʼil, ṣennṭeṯ i min ḏawem ɣa iniɣ. Ƹisa-ya zi Naṣira min iƹna netta? Netta ḏ ijjen n uryaz itwaḍhar-d zi Arebbi i kenniw s lmuƹjizaṯ ḏ lburhanaṯ ḏ lƹalamaṯ ig igga Arebbi x ufus n Ƹisa jarawem mammec ṯessnem.
Y kenniw min ḏas ṯeggim? Wami itwasellem ƹlaḥsab mammec ixes Arebbi ḏ mammec tuɣa issen netta, kenniw tṣellbem-ṯ ṯenɣim-ṯ s ifassen n lkuffar.
Walakin Arebbi netta isekkar-iṯ-iḏ iḍȓeq-as zi ȓeḥriq nni n ȓmewṯ xmi tarew, aqa ȓmewṯ war ḏas ṯzemmar.
Liʼanna issiweȓ xas nnabi Dawed ḏeg yijjen n zman wami inna: Qa twaȓiɣ Siḏi Arebbi zzaṯi i ȓebda, aqaṯ x ufusi inu bac war terjijiɣ.
X manaya ifarreḥ wuȓ inu, izehhu yiȓes inu. Ddat inu aḏ tƹic ḏi lʼamal.
War ṯsemmḥeḏ ca ḏi ȓaƹmar inu ḏi Lʼaxira, war tejjiḏ ca Lƹaḍim nnec aḏ ikiccew.
Ṯseḍhareḏ-ayi-d ibriḏen n ṯuḏarṯ, aḏayi ṯesfarḥeḏ s waṭṭas xmi ɣa ẓreɣ aɣembub nnec.
Ay ayṯma, aḏawem iniɣ ṣarraḥa: Dawed zi ssalaf ṣṣaliḥin, netta immuṯ itwanḍeȓ. Anḍeȓ nnes aqaṯ akiḏneɣ aȓ nhara.
Azeǧiḏ Dawed tuɣa ḏ nnabi iƹni issen belli iwƹeḏ-iṯ Arebbi inna-as aqa aḏ sɣimeɣ ijjen zi ddurriṯ nnec x lƹarc nnec.
Dawed iƹȓem zi Arebbi min ɣa iweqƹen, issiweȓ x lqiyama n Lmasiḥ belli war ḏayes isemmeḥ ca ḏi Lʼaxira, war tkicciw ca ddat nnes.
Ƹisa-ya wanita isekkar-iṯ-iḏ Arebbi zi ȓmewṯ, aqa neccin marra ncehheḏ x manaya.
Wami itwarfeƹ ɣar ufusi n Arebbi, iysi zi Babas Arruḥ iqeddsen iy zi ṯ iwƹeḏ, isfareɣ-d Ƹisa manaya iy twaȓam ȓexxu ḏ manaya iy ṯesȓam.
Qa Dawed war itwarfeƹ ca ɣar ujenna, netta s yixef nnes iy innan: Siḏi Arebbi inna-as i Siḏi: Qqim-d x ufusi inu,
aȓ d ɣa ggeɣ ȓƹaḏyan nnec swadday iḍaren nnec.
Iwa kenniw itxeṣṣa aḏ tessnem marra Ayṯ-Israʼil mebȓa ccekk, qa Ƹisa-ya wanita iy ṯṣellbem iggi-ṯ Arebbi ḏ Siḏiṯneɣ ḏ Lmasiḥ."
Iwḏan nni wami sȓin i wawaȓ-a, uȓawen nsen cemḍen. Kkaren nnan-as i Buṭrus ḏ arrusul nneɣni: "Ay ayṯma, min ɣa negg?"
Inna-asen Buṭrus: "Tubeṯ, twaṭehhareṯ s waman kuȓ ijjen zzaywem ƹlaḥsab isem n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ ḥima aḏ twaɣfarent ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nwem, ataf aḏawem immuc Arruḥ iqeddsen ḏ lhadiya.
Liʼanna yuca-awem ȓƹaheḏ i kenniw ḏ ṯarwa nwem ḏ marra yinni iggwjen, iƹni i marra yinni iy xef d ɣa iȓaɣa Siḏi Arebbi."
Iƹȓem-asen Buṭrus aṭṭas iweṣṣa-aṯen inna-asen: "Snejmeṯ ixef nwem zeg yiwḏan n ȓqewṯ-a ḏi ǧan ixarwiḍen."
Ssenni yinni iqebȓen awaȓ nnes ruḥen twaṭehharen s waman. Nhar nni marnin can ṯeȓtaȓaf iḏsen ɣar ȓmuminin.
Ȓmuminin ȓebda tesȓan i ttaƹlim n arrusul, tmunen ag wayawya am wawmaṯen, tetten aɣrum ag wayawya, tẓaǧan.
Arrusul teggen aṭṭas n lmuƹajizaṯ ḏ lburhanaṯ, yiwḏan tƹejjben zzaysen marra.
Tmunen marra ȓmuminin carrcen marra ag wayawya.
Znuzan agȓa nsen ḏ ȓeḥwayej nsen, ferrqen x mkuȓ ijjen min iḥḏaj.
Tmunen marra iḏsen mkuȓ nhar ḏi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant n Ayṯ-Israʼil. Tetten aɣrum marra ḏi ṯuḏrin nsen, tetten mecca s ȓefraḥeṯ ḏ ȓxaḍar nsen.
Ḥemmḏen Arebbi, reṭṭan xasen yiwḏan marra. Kuȓ nhar yarenni-yasen Siḏi Arebbi ḏi lƹadad n yinni inejjmen.
Ijjen n nhar ɣar ṯȓaṯa uƹecci ḏi ȓweqṯ n ṯẓaǧiṯ, Buṭrus ḏ Yuḥanna gaƹƹḏen ɣar ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant n Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Ufin ḏinni ijjen n uryaz ḏ anecruf ixȓeq-d amenni. Tawin-ṯ-iḏ yiwḏan ɣar ṯewwarṯ n ṯemziḏa umi qqaren <Ṯawwarṯ ṯaṣebḥant>, srusan-ṯ ḏinni mkuȓ nhar aḏ ittar ɣar yinni itaḏfen ɣar ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant.
Wami iẓra unecruf nni Buṭrus ḏ Yuḥanna taḏfen ɣar ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant, ibḏa itettar-asen ṣṣaḏaqa.
Buṭrus ḏ Yuḥanna xezzaren ḏayes mliḥ, inna-as Buṭrus: "Xzar-d ɣarneɣ!"
Ixzar ɣarsen, itɣiȓ-as aḏas ucen can ȓḥajeṯ.
Indeq-d Buṭrus inna-as: "Nec war ɣari nnuqarṯ niɣ ḏ ddheb. Walakin zi min ɣari nec aḏac ṯ uceɣ. Inna-as: Ƹlaḥsab isem n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ zi Naṣira, kkar uyur!"
Yuca-as fus iṭṭef-iṯ zeg ufus nnes afusi isgaƹƹeḏ-iṯ, ȓexddenni ṯicƹebin nnes ḏ iḍaren nnes genfan.
Inexḍef ibedd x iḍaren nnes ibḏa iggur. Yuḏef akiḏsen ɣar ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant iggur ineṭṭew iḥemmeḏ Arebbi.
Wami ṯ ẓrin marra iwḏan iggur iḥemmeḏ Arebbi,
ƹeqȓen-ṯ nnan ḏ wanita tuɣa itɣiman itettar zzaṯ i Ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant ɣar ṯewwarṯ umi qqaren <Ṯawwarṯ ṯaṣebḥant.> Qqimen tƹejjben aṭṭas, ḏehhcen zi min ḏas iweqƹen.
Aryaz nni igenfan iṭṭef ḏi Buṭrus ḏ Yuḥanna. Marra iwḏan nni qqimen ḏehhcen, ruḥen ɣarsen tazzȓen ɣar umcan umi qqaren <Asqif n Suliman.>
Wami ṯen iẓra Buṭrus inna-asen: "Ay iryazen n Ayṯ-Israʼil, mayemmi ṯetƹejjbem x manaya? Mayemmi ḏayneɣ txezzarem ammu? Ma tfekkarem s jjheḏ nneɣ niɣ s ṭṭaƹa nneɣ iy zi narra aryaz-a iggur?

Lla, ḏ Arebbi n ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ iƹni Arebbi n Brahim ḏ Arebbi n Isḥaq ḏ Arebbi n Yaƹqub. Liʼanna ḏ netta iy d isbeyynen lƹaḍama nnes ḏeg uxeddam nnes Ƹisa. Walakin ḏ kenniw iy ṯ isellmen i lḥukkam ṯenkarem-ṯ zzaṯ i Bilaṭus wami tuɣa irezzu aḏas iḍȓeq.
Wenni iǧan ƹaḍim ḏ ṣṣaliḥ ṯenkarem-ṯ, wenni iǧan ḏ ameḥbus ḏ lmujrim ṯettarem xas i Bilaṭus aḏawem d itwaḍȓeq.
Ṯenɣim wenni iǧan ḏ lʼaṣel n ṯuḏarṯ, walakin Arebbi isekkar-iṯ-iḏ zi ȓmewṯ, neccin necheḏ xas.
Ḏeg yisem n Ƹisa iƹni ḏ lʼiman s yisem nnes, aqa aryaz-a iy twaȓam iy ṯessnem iḏweȓ ijheḏ. S lʼiman nnes ḏi Ƹisa iy zi igenfa qaƹ mammec twaȓam marra kenniw.
Ȓexxu ssneɣ ay ayṯma belli ṯeggim manayenni i Ƹisa s ȓeqfaȓeṯ nwem kenniw ḏ arruyas nwem.
Ammu ikemmeȓ wawaȓ nnes iy inna Arebbi i marra lʼanbiya zi qbeȓ, iƹni itxeṣṣa Lmasiḥ nnes aḏ itwaƹeddeb.
Itxeṣṣa netta aḏ iqqim ḏeg ujenna aȓ ȓweqṯ iy ḏi ɣa itwaƹḏeȓ kuȓci ƹlaḥsab awaȓen n lʼanbiya ṣṣaliḥin iy ḏasen inna Arebbi ḏeg yijjen n zman.
Aqa inna Musa: Aḏawem d yuc Siḏi Arebbi nwem ijjen n nnabi zeg ayṯmaṯwem am nec. Itxeṣṣa aḏ tṣennṭem i marra min ḏawem ɣa yini.
Qa marra wenni war ḏas itṣenniṭen ca ɣar nnabi nni aḏ itwakkes zi ȓqum aḏ inehḏem.
Aqa nnabi Ṣamwil ḏ marra lʼanbiya iy ṯiḏ iḏfaren xebbaren x wussan-a yina iy ḏi neǧa.
Kenniw ḏ ddurriṯ n lʼanbiya. Kenniw ḏ ṯarwa n ȓƹaheḏ nni ig igga Arebbi ak ȓejḏuḏ nwem. Inna-as Arebbi i Brahim: Zi ddurriṯ nnec iy zi ɣa barkeɣ marra ȓegnus n ṯmurṯ-a.
Wami ḏawem d yuca Arebbi axeddam nnes Ƹisa, ḏ amezwaru issekk-awem-ṯ-iḏ i kenniw bac akenniw ibarek, iƹni aḏ isbeƹƹeḏ mkuȓ ijjen zzaywem x ccarr nnes."
Usin-d ȓḥizeb n iṣadduqiyen ḏ ȓfuqaha ḏ umeqqran n iƹessasen n ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant n Ayṯ-Israʼil, ufin Buṭrus ḏ Yuḥanna ssawaȓen ak yiwḏan.
War ḏasen iƹjib bu ȓḥaȓ qaƹ wami ufin Buṭrus ḏ Yuḥanna seȓmaḏen tḥeddaṯen i yiwḏan x Ƹisa qqaren belli iwḏan aḏ d kkaren zi ȓmewṯ.
Kkaren ṭṭfen Buṭrus ḏ Yuḥanna siḏfen-ṯen ḏi ȓeḥbes jjin-ṯen ḏinni aȓ ṯiwecca minzi iƹḏu ȓḥaȓ.
Aṭṭas n yiwḏan iy isȓin i wawaȓ nsen umnen. Iryazen nni iy yumnen ȓexxu uwḍen ɣar yijjen xemsaȓaf iḏsen.
Ṯiwecca nnes munen ḏi Lquds imeqqranen n Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏ arruyas nsen ḏ imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa.
Tuɣa ḏinni Ḥanin ig iǧan ḏ arrayes n ȓfuqaha ḏ Qiyafa ḏ Yuḥanna ḏ Iskandar ḏ yinni iǧan zi ȓeḥbab n arrayes n ȓfuqaha.
Uwin-d Buṭrus ḏ Yuḥanna sbedden-ṯen ḏi ȓwesṭ nsen nnan-asen: "Man jjheḏ niɣ ḏ yisem iy zi teggem manaya?"
Buṭrus iccur-d s Arruḥ iqeddsen ȓexddenni inna-asen: "A lḥukkam ay imeqqranen n ccaƹb!
Ma teggem-aneɣ lʼistijwab nhara ƹlaḥsab ijjen n ȓxir iy negga ḏeg unecruf-a ƹlaḥsab mammec igenfa?
Iwa itxeṣṣa aḏ tessnem kenniw ḏ marra Ayṯ-Israʼil belli aryaz-a iy ḏa ibedden zzaṯwem igenfa s yisem n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ zi Naṣira. Kenniw ṯṣellbem-ṯ, walakin Arebbi isekkar-iṯ-iḏ zi ȓmewṯ.
Ƹisa-ya netta ḏ azru nni iy ṯƹiffem kenniw ibennayen. Ȓexxu iḏweȓ ḏ azru aṣebḥan aqaṯ ḏi ṯɣemmarṯ n dsas.
War izemmar ḥadd aḏ injem bȓa zzayes netta. Liʼanna war ḏinni uȓa ḏ ijjen n yisem nneɣni jar i iryazen ḏi ddunect-a azzayes netwasenjem illa netta."
Xzaren lḥukkam nni ḏi zƹameṯ n Buṭrus ḏ Yuḥanna ufin-ṯen war ɣrin ca niṯni ḏ iwḏan ƹadi. Qqimen tƹejjben, ƹeqȓen-ṯen tuɣaṯen ak Ƹisa.
Ƹaweḏ twaȓan aryaz nni igenfa ibedd ḏinni akiḏsen, war ufin min ɣa inin.
Lḥukkam nni umaren Buṭrus ḏ Yuḥanna aḏ ffɣen barra aḏ jjen Jmaƹeṯ nni n lḥukkam aḏ mcawaren waḥeḏsen.
Nnan: "Min ɣa negg i ṯnayen-a n iryazen? War nzemmar ca a nenkar lmuƹjiza-ya iy ggin aqa ṯmeḍhar-asen-d i marra imezḏaɣ n Lquds.
Walakin labud aḏasen neƹȓem bac ssa aȓ tsawent war ssiwiȓen ɣar ḥadd ƹlaḥsab isem n Ƹisa bac war itentacar ca useȓmeḏ-a ḏi ccaƹb."
Siḏfen-ṯen-d, umaren-ṯen nnan-asen war ssawaȓeṯ war seȓmaḏeṯ ḥadd ƹlaḥsab isem n Ƹisa.
Indeq-d Buṭrus ḏ Yuḥanna nnan-asen: "Ḥekmeṯ kenniw, ma mliḥ zzaṯ i Arebbi a nṭaƹ i wawaȓ nnes niɣ i wawaȓ nwem?
War nzemmar ca a nejj x min neẓra niɣ x min nesȓa."
Arnin siggwḏen-ṯen, ȓexddenni ḍeȓqen-asen. War ufin mammec ḏasen ɣa ggen aṯen ƹaqben minzi marra iwḏan ḥemmḏen Arebbi x min iweqƹen.
Aryaz-a igenfan s lmuƹjiza nni ɣares ktar zi arbeƹin iseggwusa.
Ɣir ḍeȓqen-asen-d i Buṭrus ḏ Yuḥanna, ruḥen ɣar imeddukaȓ nsen ƹawḏen-asen marra min ḏasen nnan arruyas n ȓfuqaha ḏ imeqqranen n Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Wami sȓin i manaya, ttaren i Arebbi ḏi ṯẓaǧiṯ marra iḏsen nnan-as: "Ya Mawlana ḏ cek ixeȓqen ajenna ḏ ṯmurṯ ḏ ȓebḥar ḏ marra min ḏaysen.
Ḏ cek iy innan s Arruḥ iqeddsen s yiȓes n jeddiṯneɣ Dawed ȓƹabḏ nnec wami inna: Mayemmi ȓegnus ɣeḍben aṭṭas? Mayemmi iwḏan tciṭinen ḏi ȓxawi?
Sewjaḏen izeǧiḏen n ṯmurṯ ixef nsen, munen arruyas ak wayawya, bac aḏ ƹarrḍen i Siḏi Arebbi ḏ Lmasiḥ nnes.
Li'anna ḏ ṣṣaḥ azeǧiḏ Hirudus ḏ lḥakem Bunṭyus Bilaṭus munen ak Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏ yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏi ṯendint-a. Tafqen ḍed i uxeddam nnec iqeddsen Ƹisa iy ṯixḍareḏ.
Ggin qaƹ min tuɣa ṯzemmmeḏ aḏ iwqeƹ s ufus ḏ ȓxaḍar nnec.
A Siḏi, ȓexxu xzar mammec ḏaneɣ theddaḏen, uc-aneɣ i neccin lƹibad nnec a nessiweȓ s wawaȓ nnec s zƹameṯ.
Sarreḥ fus nnec bac aḏ tesgenfiḏ aḏ tesbeyyneḏ lmuƹjizaṯ ḏ lburhanaṯ ƹlaḥsab isem n Ƹisa axeddam nnec iqeddsen."
Wami kemmȓen ṯẓaǧiṯ nni inhezz umcan nni mani munen, ccuren niṯni marra s Arruḥ iqeddsen ssawaȓen s wawaȓ n Arebbi s yijjen n zƹameṯ.
Jmaƹeṯ nni n ȓmuminin ɣarsen uȓ nsen ḏ ȓaƹqeȓ nsen kif-kif. Uȓa ḏ ijjen zzaysen war iḥesseb min ɣares nnes waḥḏes, carrcen marra ṯimesȓayin jarasen.
Cehhḏen arrusul s yijjen n jjheḏ ḏ ameqqran x lqiyama iy igga Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa wami ikkar zi ȓmewṯ. Arebbi igga xasen marra ijjen n lbaraka ṯemɣar.
War iǧi uȓa ḏ ijjen zzaysen ma iḥḏaj. Li'anna yinni iy ɣar iǧa ṯimura ḏ ṯuḏrin traḥen znuzan-ṯent tawin-d tmenyaṯ nni,
srusan-ṯent ɣar iḍaren n arrusul tferraqen-ṯent ƹlaḥsab mkuȓ ijjen min iḥḏaj.
Ḏinni ijjen qqaren-as Yusef, ƹaweḏ semman-ṯ arrusul s Barnaba iƹni <wenni itcejjaƹen.> Netta zi ccurfa n Ayṯ-Lawi ḏ mmis n ṯendint n Qubruṣ.
Ikkar izzenz ijjen n ṯmurṯ iy ɣares, yuwi-d tmenyaṯ nni isers-iṯent ɣar iḍaren n arrusul.
Ikkar ijjen n uryaz qqaren-as Anas ṯamɣarṯ nnes qqaren-as Safura, iruḥ izzenz ijjen n ṯmurṯ nnes.
Yuwi-d tmenyaṯ, ca isnuffar-iṯent ɣares, ca yuwi-ṯent isers-iṯent ɣar iḍaren n arrusul. Ṯamɣarṯ nnes ṯargeb qaƹ x manayenni.
Inna-as Buṭrus: "Ay Anas, mayemmi ṯejjiḏ Cciṭan ac iɣarr yuḏef ḏeg wuȓ nnec ṯesxerrqeḏ x Arruḥ iqeddsen ṯesnuffareḏ can n tmenyaṯ i yixef nnec zi tmenyaṯ n ṯmurṯ nni?

Ṯamurṯ nni tuɣa ṯeǧa nnec marra qbeȓ iy t ɣa ṯezzenzeḏ. Wami ṯezzenzeḏ ṯamurṯ nni, tmenyaṯ nni marra ǧant nnec kulci." Inna-as: "Mayemmi ṯenwiḏ ḏeg wuȓ nnec manaya? Qa war iǧi ṯesxerrqeḏ x yiwḏan, qa ṯesxerrqeḏ x Arebbi."
Wami isȓa Anas i wawaȓ nni, iwḍa ɣar ṯmurṯ immuṯ ḏinni. Iwḏan marra iy d yarrin ȓexbar-a ggwḏen aṭṭas.
Usin-d ccabab keffnen Anas s ȓecfen uwin-ṯ neḍȓen-ṯ.
Ƹḏunt can ṯȓaṯa n ṯsaƹƹaṯin ṯusa-d ṯemɣarṯ n Anas war d ṯarri bu ȓexbar x min iweqƹen.
Indeq-d Buṭrus inna-as: "In-ayi, ma anictuya waha iy zi ṯezzenzem ṯamurṯ nni?" Ṯenna-as nettaṯ: "Wah, anictuya wah."
Inna-as Buṭrus: "Mayemmi ṯtafqem aḏ tzaƹmem aḏ teẓrem Arruḥ n Siḏi Arebbi min ɣa igg?" Inna-as: "Yinni inḍȓen aryaz nnem ḏewȓen-d aqaṯen ɣar ṯewwarṯ, acem ysin uȓa ḏ cem."
Ṣafi ṯewḍa ȓexddenni, ṯemmuṯ ḏinni ɣar iḍaren n Buṭrus. Uḏfen ccabab nni ufin-t ṯemmuṯ, ysin-t neḍȓen-t ag uɣezḏis n uryaz nnes.
Marra jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin ḏ marra yinni isȓin x manaya ggwḏen aṭṭas.
Arrusul teggen aṭṭas n lmuƹjizaṯ ḏ lburhanaṯ jar yiwḏan, tmunen marra ḏeg Useqqif n Suliman ḏi Ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant.
Zeg yiwḏan nni iy war yuminen ca war izƹim ḥadd akiḏsen yiȓi ak ȓmuminin walakin waxxa amenni teḥtaramen-ṯen aṭṭas.
Marnin-d aṭṭas n yiwḏan iy yumnen zi Siḏiṯneɣ, zzaysen ijjen n lƹadad n iryazen uȓa ḏ ṯemɣarin.
Iwḏan sufuɣen-d imehȓac nsen ɣar znaqi, srusan-ṯen x ṯassuṯ ḏ ijarṯiȓen ḥima axmi ssenni d ɣa iƹḏu Buṭrus, imken aḏ iȓqef ȓebƹaḍ zzaysen s ṯiȓi nnes.
Tasen-d aṭṭas n yiwḏan zi ȓeḏcuraṯ iy yuḏsen ɣar Lquds, tawin-d imehȓac nsen ḏ yinni itƹeddaben jnun iƹeffanen niṯni tgenfan marra.
Ikkar arrayes n ȓfuqaha ḏ marra yinni kis iǧan niṯni zi ȓḥizeb n iṣadduqiyen, ḥesḏen arrusul aṭṭas.
Ṭṭfen-ṯen ggin-ṯen ḏi ȓeḥbes.
Walakin s ǧiȓeṯ ijjen n lmalaʼika n Siḏi Arebbi ṯerzem-asen ṯiwwura n ȓeḥbes, ṯsufeɣ-iṯen ṯenna-asen:
"Ruḥem beddeṯ ḏi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant, ḥeddṯem i yiwḏan s marra awaȓen n ṯuḏarṯ-a n jḏiḏ."

Ḏ manayenni iy ggin, uḏfen ɣar ȓefjar ɣar ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant bḏan seȓmaḏen. Menbaƹd iruḥ arrayes n ȓfuqaha ḏ marra yinni kis iǧan smunen-d Jmaƹeṯ n lḥukkam n Ayṯ-Israʼil iƹni marra imeqqranen nsen, ssenni ssekken iƹessasen n ṯemziḏa aḏ d awin arrusul zi ȓeḥbes.
Wami uwḍen iƹessasen nni ɣar ȓeḥbes war ṯen ufin ca ḏinni. Ḏewȓen-d ssiwḍen ȓexbar,
nnan-asen: "Nufa ṯiwwura n ȓeḥbes bellƹent mliḥ, ḏ iƹessasen n ȓeḥbes bedden zzaṯ i ṯewwura nni. Neccin wami nuḏef ɣar ḏaxeȓ war ḏinni nufi ḥadd."
Wami sȓin i wawaȓ-a arruyas n ȓfuqaha ḏ umeqqran n iƹessasen n ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant ismeḍ-asen ȓaƹjeb ḏeg wuȓ fekkaren mani ɣa yaweḍ manaya?
Yusa-d ɣarsen ijjen inna-asen: "Iryazen nni iy ṯeggim ḏi ȓeḥbes aqaṯen ḏi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant seȓmaḏen iwḏan!"
Ȓexddenni iruḥ umeqqran nni n iƹessasen ak imxazniyen nnes uwin-d arrusul bȓa lƹunf minzi ggwḏen zi ccaƹb aṯen rejmen s uzru.
Wami d siḏfen arrusul, sbedden-ṯen zzaṯ i Jmaƹeṯ n lḥukkam n Ayṯ-Israʼil. Inna-asen arrayes n ȓfuqaha:
"Neccin numar-ikenniw war ṯseȓmaḏem ca ƹlaḥsab isem nni n Ƹisa. Walakin kenniw ṯƹemmarem Lquds s ttaƹlim nwem. Ṯexsem aḏ teggem ȓmewṯ n uryaz-a x yiri nneɣ."
Indeq-d arrasul Buṭrus ḏ arrusul nneɣni nnan-asen: "Itxeṣṣa-yaneɣ a nṭaƹ i Arebbi maci i yiwḏan!
Arebbi n ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ isekkar-d Ƹisa wenni iy ṯenɣim kenniw ṯrefƹem-ṯ x ṯeḥnact.
Irfeƹ-iṯ Arebbi aɣares iggi-ṯ x ufusi nnes bac aḏ iḥkem aḏ isenjem, aḏ yuc ttuba i Ayṯ-Israʼil aḏ iɣfar ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nsen.
X ṯmesȓayin-a ncehheḏ xasent neccin ḏ Arruḥ iqeddsen, Arruḥ-a yuci-ṯ Arebbi i yinni ḏas itṭaƹan."
Wami sȓin i wawaȓ-a xeyyqen ɣeḍben rezzun aṯen nɣen.
Ikkar-d ijjen n ufarrisi, netta ḏ amseȓmaḏ n ccariƹa qqaren-as Gamlil iteḥtaram-iṯ ccaƹb marra. Ibedd ḏi ȓwesṭ n Jmaƹeṯ n lḥukkam n Ayṯ-Israʼil, ittar-asen aḏ sufɣen arrusul cwayt n ȓweqṯ ɣar barra.
Inna-asen: "Ay iryazen n Ayṯ-Israʼil, ḥḍam ixef nwem zi min ṯexsem aḏ teggem i yiwḏan-a!
Qbeȓ i wussan-a, ikkar-d ijjen n uryaz qqaren-as Aṯuddas. Yarra ixef nnes ḏ ameqqran, ḏfaren-ṯ can arbeƹa miyya n iryazen. Walakin nɣin-ṯ, marra yinni iy ṯ iḏfaren msefraqen ḏewȓen ḏ walu.

Menbaƹd i uryaz-a Aṯuddas, ikkar-d ijjen nneɣni qqaren-as Yahuḏa zi ṯmurṯ n Ljalil ḏi ȓiyyam n lʼiḥṣaʼ n imezḏaɣ n Ayṯ-Israʼil. Ijmeƹ akiḏes ijjen n lƹadad n yiwḏan, walakin nɣin-ṯ uȓa ḏ netta, yinni iy ṯ iḏfaren kuȓ ijjen manis ikka.
Ȓexxu akenniw neṣḥeɣ aḏ tbeƹƹḏem i yiwḏan-a, aṯen ṯejjem. Min newwan niɣ ḏ min xeddmen, meȓa zzaysen waha aḏ iqḍa.
Meȓa manaya zi Arebbi war ṯzemmarem ca axasen ṯeqḍam. Ɣarwem aḏ tafem ixef nwem tmenɣam ak Arebbi!"
Sȓin yiwḏan nni ɣar Gamlil. Uwin-d arrusul ƹannen-asen aƹmuḏ nnan-asen: "Qa ƹemmarṣ aḏ tƹawḏem aḏ tessiwȓem ƹlaḥsab isem n Ƹisa." Ȓexddenni ḍeȓqen-asen.
Farḥen arrusul wami ffɣen zi Jmaƹeṯ nni n lḥukkam n Ayṯ-Israʼil, ḥessben belli ɣarsen lhimma x lʼihana nni iy ḏasen iweqƹen x yisem n Ƹisa.
Qqimen mkuȓ nhar traḥen ɣar ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant, traḥen zi ṯeddarṯ aȓ ṯeddarṯ seȓmaḏen tbeccaren s Ƹisa belli netta ḏ Lmasiḥ.

Ḏeg wussan nni lƹadad n imeḥḍaren imarni. Ȓmuminin iy ssawaȓen s lluɣa ṯayunaniṯ tceṯcan zeg yinni issawaȓen lƹibriya, qqaren qa neccin ṯajjaȓin nneɣ war ḏasent ticcen bu ȓḥaqq nsent xmi ferrqen lmuƹawana mkuȓ nhar.
Kkaren ṯenƹac nni n arrusul smunen marra imeḥḍaren nnan-asen: "Neccin arrusul maci maƹqul a nesmeḥ ḏeg wawaȓ n Arebbi bac a nefreq lmuƹawana.
Ay ayṯma, kkarem awim-d sebƹa n iryazen zzaywem aḏ tiȓi ṯessnem-ṯen aqaṯen mliḥ, aḏ iȓin ccuren s Arruḥ iqeddsen ḏ ȓefhameṯ. Neccin aṯen nkellef s lmuhimma-ya
bac neccin arrusul a nuc ȓweqṯ nneɣ i ṯẓaǧiṯ ḏ uḥeddeṯ."

Iƹjeb-asen ȓḥaȓ i marra jmaƹeṯ. Kkaren ixḍaren ijjen n uryaz qqaren-as Stifan, netta iccur s lʼiman ḏ Arruḥ iqeddsen. Ixḍaren Filippas ḏ Brukurus ḏ Nikanur ḏ Timun ḏ Parminas ḏ Nikulas zeg Wanṭakya, tuɣa isȓem netta ḏi ddin n Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Sebƹa-ya n ṣṣaḥaba qeddmen-ṯen ɣar arrusul, ẓẓuǧen xasen sersen xasen ifassen nsen baraken-ṯen.
Intacar wawaȓ n Arebbi, marnin-d aṭṭas n imeḥḍaren ḏi Lquds, umnen aṭṭas n ȓfuqaha n Ayṯ-Israʼil zi Lʼinjil.
Stifan nni netta iccur s lbaraka n Arebbi ḏ jjheḏ, ixeddem jar yiwḏan lburhanaṯ ḏ lmuƹjizaṯ ḏ ṯimeqqranin.
Kkaren ȓebƹaḍ zi temziḏa umi qqaren <Lbartinun.> Niṯni ḏ israʼiliyen n ṯendint n Lqurina ḏ ṯendint n Iskandariya ḏ inneɣni zi lʼiqlim n Kilikya ḏ lʼiqlim n Asya. Bḏan temnaqaren ak Stifan,
walakin war zemmaren aḏ qawwmen ȓefhameṯ ḏ Arruḥ iy zi issawaȓ.
Kkaren ucin arrecweṯ i can iryazen bac aḏ inin qa neccin nesȓa i Stifan netta iqqar awaȓ war iḥȓin x Musa ḏ Arebbi!
Wami sƹeṣṣben iwḏan uȓa ḏ imeqqranen n Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏ imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa, ṭṭfen Stifan uwin-ṯ ɣar Jmaƹeṯ n lḥukkam n Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Uwin-d iwḏan axas cehḏen ẓẓur qqaren "Qa bnaḏem-a iqqar awaȓ war iḥȓin x umcan-a amqeddes ḏ Ccariƹa n Musa!
Nesȓa-yas iqqar belli Ƹisa zi Naṣira aḏ ihḏem amcan-a aḏ ibeddeȓ lƹadaṯ nni iy ḏaneɣ d ijja Musa."
Xezzaren ḏayes ḏi Stifan marra yinni iy ḏinni iǧan ḏi Jmaƹeṯ n lḥukkam n Ayṯ-Israʼil, ufin aɣembub nnes am uɣembub n lmalaʼika.
Ikkar arrayes n ȓfuqaha inna-as i Stifan: "Ma ḏ ṣṣaḥ manaya?"
Inna-asen Stifan: "Ay ayṯma! A yinni imɣaren! Ṣennṭeṯ ɣari. Wami tuɣa iǧa jeddiṯneɣ Brahim ḏi ṯmurṯ nni n Misubuṭamya qbeȓ ma aḏ izḏeɣ ḏi ṯendint n Ḥaran, imeḍhar-as-d Arebbi Lƹaḍim
inna-as: Kkar, ffeɣ cek ssa zi ṯmurṯ-a nnec, ejj ȓeḥbab nnec ruḥ ɣar ṯmurṯ nni iy ḏac d ɣa seḍhareɣ.
Ikkar Brahim yuyur zi ṯmurṯ nni n ikaldaniyen, iƹni Misubuṭamya, iruḥ izḏeɣ ḏi ṯendint n Ḥaran. Wami immuṯ babas, yuwi-ṯ Arebbi ɣar ṯmurṯ-a mani ṯzeddɣem ȓexxu.
Walakin war ḏas yuci uȓa ḏ ccbar zi ṯmurṯ-a aṯ imlek. Ḏi ȓweqṯ nni Brahim war ɣares bu ṯarwa. Waxxa amenni iwƹeḏ-iṯ Arebbi inna-as: Aḏac uceɣ ṯamurṯ-a aḏ tiȓi nnec cek ḏ ddurriṯ nnec menbaƹd i cek.
Ammu iy ḏas inna Arebbi: Ddurriṯ nnec aḏ ƹicen ḏi ṯmurṯ n midden, aḏ iȓin ḏ isemɣan n ayṯbab n ṯmurṯ nni, axasen ssekken tamara arbeƹmiyya iseggwusa.
Walakin Arebbi iqqar: Aḏ ƹaqbeɣ iwḏan n ṯmurṯ nni iy ṯen iggin ḏ isemɣan, menbaƹd aḏ ffɣen ssenni ddurriṯ nnec aḏ tiȓi ƹebbḏen-ayi ḏeg umcan-a.
Fa Arebbi yuca-as ȓƹaheḏ nni n ṭṭahareṯ i Brahim. Brahim ijja-d Isḥaq, iṭehhar-iṯ nhar wis ṯmenyam. Isḥaq ijja-d Yaƹqub. Yaƹqub ijja-d ṯenƹac n ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ.
Ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ ḥessḏen umaṯsen Yusef, zzenzen-ṯ aḏ iḏweȓ ḏ ismeɣ ḏi Miṣra. Walakin Arebbi aqaṯ akiḏes,
ifekk-iṯ zi marra tamara nnes. Yuca-as lḥikma, isƹizz-iṯ ɣar Firƹun iƹni azeǧiḏ n Miṣra. Iggi-ṯ Firƹun aḏ iḥkem x Miṣra ḏ ȓeqṣar nnes ikmaȓ.
Ṯumma iwqeƹ buheyyuf ḏi marra ṯimura n Miṣra ḏ Kanƹan. Ṯekka xasen tamara ḏ ṯameqqrant, ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ war ufin min ɣa ccen.
Wami isȓa Yaƹqub Miṣra ḏayes ḏinni irḏan, issekk ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ ḏinni ṯwaȓa ṯamezwarut.
Wami ruḥen ḏinni ṯwaȓa wis ṯnayen, inna-asen Yusef i ayṯmas aqa nec ḏ umaṯwem Yusef, ȓexddenni ƹeqȓen-ṯ. Ssenni ig issen Firƹun ȓeḥbab n Yusef.
Yusef issekk aḏ d awin babas Yaƹqub ḏ ȓeḥbab nnes, ḏaysen xemsa u sebƹin iḏsen.
Ihwa-d Yaƹqub ɣar Miṣra mani immuṯ netta ḏ ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ.
Mmeysin-d ssenni uwin-ṯen ɣar ṯmurṯ n Cakim, neḍȓen-ṯen ḏinni ḏeg unḍeȓ nni iy tuɣa isɣa Brahim s can n nnuqarṯ x Ayṯ-Ḥammur ḏi Cakim.
Ṯumma wami d ṯqarreb ȓweqṯ nni iy ḏi ɣa ikemmeȓ Arebbi awaȓ nnes minzi tuɣa iwƹeḏ Brahim, ikṯar ccaƹb nneɣ ḏi Miṣra imarni-d aṭṭas.
Imeḍhar-d ijjen n uzeǧiḏ nneɣni ḏi Miṣra netta war issin ca Yusef.
Ixeddeƹ ccaƹb nneɣ issekk-it x ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ, itegg xasen bessif bac aḏ nḍaren iseyman nsen ɣar barra ḥima aḏ mmṯen.
Ḏi ȓweqṯ nni ixȓeq-d Musa, netta ḏ aṣebḥan aṭṭas. Itwarebba ṯeȓt chur ḏi ṯeddarṯ n babas.
Wami ṯ nḍaren ɣar barra, ṯeysi-ṯ yeǧis n Firƹun ṯrebba-ṯ ṯarri-ṯ ḏ mmis.
Uca sȓemḏen-as i Musa marra min ssnen imiṣriyen, iḏweȓ ɣares jjheḏ ḏi min iqqar ḏ min itegg.
Ṯumma wami ikemmeȓ arbeƹin iseggwusa, irezzu aḏ ifqeḏ ayṯmas iƹni Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Iẓra ijjen n umiṣri iƹedd x yijjen n uʼisraʼili, iruḥ netta iḏafeƹ x wenni itwaḍeȓmen, intaqam-as inɣa amiṣri nni.
Netta inwa ayṯmas Ayṯ-Israʼil aḏ fehmen belli aṯen isenjem Arebbi x ufus nnes, walakin niṯni war fhimen ca.
Ṯiwecca nnes yufa ṯnayen israʼiliyen tmenɣan jarasen, ixes aṯen ismeṣȓaḥ inna-asen: Kenniw ḏ awmaṯen, mayemmi tƹeddam x wayawya?
Ikkar-d wenni itƹeddan, iƹann-iṯ inna-as: Uw c iggin cek ḏ arrayes niɣ ḏ ȓqaḍi xaneɣ?
Ma ṯrezzuḏ aḏayi ṯenɣeḏ am ṯenɣiḏ amiṣri nni n iḍennaṭ?
Wami isȓa Musa manaya, ikkar yarweȓ iruḥ ɣar ṯmurṯ n Midyan iƹic ḏinni ḏ abarrani. Xeȓqen-d ɣares ḏinni ṯnayen n iḥenjiren.
Ṯumma wami ƹḏun arbeƹin iseggwusa, ṯbedd-d ɣares ijjen n lmalaʼika zeg uḥaḏuq n ṯmessi ṯreqq ḏeg uxcab ḏi ṣṣaḥra zzaṯ i uḏrar n Sina.
Wami iẓra Musa manayenni itƹejjeb, iqarreb ɣares aḏ ixzar. Isȓa i ṣṣut n Siḏi Arebbi iqqar-as:
Nec ḏ Arebbi n ȓejḏuḏ nnec, ḏ Arebbi n Brahim ḏ Isḥaq ḏ Yaƹqub. Ibḏa Musa iterjiji s ṯiggwḏi war izƹim ca aḏ ixzar.
Inna-as Siḏi Arebbi: Kkes ṯisiȓa zeg iḍaren nnec qa amcan-a mani ṯbeddeḏ netta muqeddes.
Aqa ẓriɣ ȓaƹḏab n ccaƹb inu iǧan ḏi Miṣra, sȓiɣ i iɣuyan nsen aqa hwiɣ-d aṯen snejmeɣ. Ȓexxu araḥ-d cek ac ssekkeɣ ɣar Miṣra.

Musa-ya nkaren-ṯ nnan-as: Uw c iggin cek ḏ arrayes niɣ ḏ ȓqaḍi xaneɣ? Walakin netta issekk-iṯ Arebbi aḏ yiȓi ḏ arrayes ḏ wenni iy ṯen ɣa isnejmen. Issekk-iṯ Arebbi x ufus n lmalaʼika nni iy ḏas d imeḍharen ḏeg uxcab nni.
Musa-ya ḏ netta iy ṯen isufɣen s ȓaƹjayeb ḏ lmuƹjizaṯ iy igga ḏi Miṣra, ḏi Ȓebḥar azeggwaɣ, uȓa ḏi ṣṣaḥra arbeƹin iseggwusa.
Ḏ Musa-ya iy ḏasen innan i Ayṯ-Israʼil: Aḏawem d yuc Arebbi ijjen n nnabi zeg ayṯmaṯwem am nec.
Ḏ netta Musa iy igguren ak jmaƹeṯ n Ayṯ-Israʼil ig imunen ḏi ṣṣaḥra. Ḏ netta mikeḏ ṯessiweȓ lmalaʼika x uḏrar n Sina ḏ ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ. Ḏ netta iy xef d hwan wawaȓen iddaren ḥima aḏaneɣ ṯen yuc.
Walakin ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ ugin aḏas ṭaƹen ugin aṯ qebȓen, nwan ḏeg wuȓawen nsen aḏ ḏewȓen ɣar Miṣra.
Nnan-as i Harun: Ṣneƹ-aneɣ lʼaṣnamaṯ ḥima aḏ iȓin ḏ arebbiṯen nneɣ aṯen neysi ɣar zzaṯ nneɣ. War nessin ca manis ikka Musa-ya iy ḏaneɣ d isufɣen zi Miṣra!
Ḏi ȓiyyam nni ṣenƹen ijjen n lʼaṣnam x teṣwirṯ n uyenduz. Qeddmen-as dbiḥeṯ, farḥen aṭṭas x min ggin s ifassen nsen.

Ibeƹƹeḏ xasen Arebbi, ijji-ṯen aḏ ƹebbḏen iṯran n ujenna am mammec iqqar Lkitab n lʼanbiya: "Ay Ayṯ-Israʼil, wami tqeddamem dbiḥeṯ ḏ teḍḥiyeṯ ḏi arbeƹin iseggwusa nni ḏi ṣṣaḥra, ma ṯeggim-ayi-t i nec niɣ?
Lla, ṯeysim aqiḍun n lʼaṣnam umi qqaren Mulux, ḏ yiṯri n arebbi nwem umi qqaren Rafan. Ḏ yina ḏ lʼaṣnamaṯ iy ṯeggim bac aṯen ṯƹebḏem! X manaya nec axawem azzȓeɣ aɣirin i ṯmurṯ n Babil."
Ɣarsen ɣar ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ Ṯamziḏa uqiḍun n Arebbi ḏi ṣṣaḥra. Iggi-t Musa amec iy ṯ yumar Arebbi ƹlaḥsab cckel iy tuɣa iẓra.
Ṯamziḏa nni uqiḍun ṯemmuc-asen i ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ. Niṯni ysin-t akiḏsen ak Yacuƹ ɣar ṯmurṯ-a n ȓegnus iy xef yuzzeȓ Arebbi zzaṯ i ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ. Ṯeqqim amenni aȓ wussan n Dawed.
Dawed irḍa xas Arebbi inna-as: A Siḏi Arebbi n jeddiṯneɣ Yaƹqub, ejj-ayi aḏ ḏebbareɣ ijjen n umcan aḏayes ṯiȓi ṯzeddiɣṯ nnec.
Walakin iruḥ Suliman ibna netta ijjen n ṯeddarṯ i Arebbi.
Waxxa amenni qa Arebbi Yuƹȓan war izeddeɣ ca ḏi ṯuḏrin iy bennan s ifassen. Amec inna nnabi Icaƹya:
Iqqar Siḏi Arebbi ajenna ḏ lƹarc inu, ḏ ṯamurṯ mix srusiɣ iḍaren inu. Mammec ṯegga ṯeddarṯ iy ḏayi ɣa ṯebnam? Mani ɣa yiȓi umcan n arraḥeṯ inu?
Ma war iǧi ca ḏ fus inu iy d ixeȓqen manaya kuȓci?
Inna-asen Stifan: A yinni iy ḏi ṯeǧa ṯɣennant, qa uȓawen nwem ḏ imejjan nwem qqnen! Kenniw teggem mammec iy ggin ȓejḏuḏ nwem, kif-kif. Ȓebda tƹarraḍem-as i Arruḥ iqeddsen.
Ma injem can n nnabi war ṯ ƹeddben ca ȓejḏuḏ nwem? Niṯni nɣin uȓa ḏ lʼanbiya nni n zman iy innan qa aḏ d yas wenni iǧan ṣṣaliḥ, iƹni wenni ȓexxu ṯxeḏƹem kenniw ṯenɣim-ṯ.
Ṯeṭṭfem ccariƹa x ufus n lmalaʼikaṯ, kenniw war zzayes ṯeggim ca."
Wami sȓin Jmaƹeṯ nni n lḥukkam n Ayṯ-Israʼil awaȓ n Stifan, xeyyqen ɣeḍben, tɣeẓẓaẓen ɣares ṯiɣmas.
Stifan iccur s Arruḥ iqeddsen, ixzar ɣar ujenna iẓra lƹaḍama n Arebbi yufa Ƹisa ibedd x ufusi n Arebbi.
Inna: "Aqa twaȓiɣ ajenna inurzem ḏ Mmis n bnaḏem ibedd x ufusi n Arebbi."
Snekkaren ṯɣuyyeṯ s jjheḏ bellƹen x imejjan nsen, hejmen xas marra iḏsen.
Sufɣen-ṯ barra i ṯendint bḏan rejjmen-ṯ s uzru. Sersen izeǧuba nsen ɣar iḍaren n yijjen n ccab qqaren-as Cawul.
Qqimen rejjmen Stifan s uzru netta inna: "A Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa, qbeȓ buḥbeȓ inu!"
Iwḍa x ifadden inna-as s jjheḏ: "A Siḏi, war xasen ḥesseb ca ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ-a!" Wami inna manaya ṣafi iffeɣ-iṯ buḥbeȓ nnes.

Wami nɣin Stifan, ijjen qqaren-as Cawul aqaṯ ḏinni iḥḍar itafeq akiḏsen. Nhar nni bḏan tƹeddaben jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin ḏi ṯendint n Lquds. Mesfraqen marra ȓmuminin ruḥen ɣar jwayeh n Yahuḏiya ḏ Samarya kuȓ ijjen mani iruḥ, war iqqim ḥadd ḏi Lquds illa arrusul.
Can n iryazen iy teggwḏen Arebbi neḍȓen Stifan ḥeznen xas aṭṭas.
Cawul netta irezzu aḏ iqḍa x jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin, itaḏef zi ṯeddarṯ ɣar ṯeddarṯ isufuɣ-d iryazen ḏ ṯemɣarin itegg-iṯen ḏi ȓeḥbes.
Ȓmuminin nni imesfraqen traḥen zeg umcan ɣar umcan tbeccaren s wawaȓ n Arebbi.
Filippas iruḥ ɣar ṯendint n Samarya, itḥeddaṯ i imezḏaɣ nnes s Lmasiḥ.
Ssenni marra ȓɣaci nni wami sȓin i wawaȓ nnes wami ẓrin lmuƹjizaṯ nni igga, qqimen tṣennaṭen-as mliḥ ɣar min iqqar.
Jnun iƹeffanen ffɣen zeg waṭṭas n yiwḏan snekkaren ṯɣuyyeṯ s jjheḏ. Aṭṭas n izeḥḥafen ḏ yinni umi mmuṯen iḍaren genfan.
Farrḥen aṭṭas ḏi ṯendint nni.
Ḏinni ḏi ṯendint nni ijjen n useḥḥar qqaren-as Simƹan mecḥaȓ zeg wami isxeddam ssḥur. Iseḏhac marra iwḏan n Ayṯ-Samarya, yarra ixef nnes ḏ ameqqran.
Tesȓan-as marra iwḏan s umezyan ḏ umeqqran nnan xas: "Aryaz-a netta ḏ jjheḏ nni ameqqran n Arebbi iy iǧan Ƹaḍim!"
Tesȓan-as minzi iseḏhac-iṯen aṭṭas n ȓweqṯ s ssḥur nnes.
Walakin wami ṯen ibeccar Filippas s ȓmulk n Arebbi ḏ yisem n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ ȓexddenni umnen tetwaṭehharen s waman s iryazen ḏ ṯemɣarin.
Simƹan netta s yixef nnes yumen itwaṭehhar s waman. Imun ak Filippas itƹejjeb Simƹan wami iẓra lmuƹjizaṯ ḏ lburhanaṯ ḏ ṯimeqqranin ig itewqiƹen.
Wami d arrin ȓexbar arrusul ḏi Lquds qa Ayṯ-Samarya qebȓen awaȓ n Arebbi, kkaren ssekken ɣarsen Buṭrus ḏ Yuḥanna.
Wami uwḍen, ttaren-as i Arebbi aḏasen yuc Arruḥ iqeddsen.
Ƹaḏ war d ihwi Arruḥ uȓa x yijjen zzaysen minzi tuɣa twaṭehharen s waman ƹlaḥsab isem n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa u ṣafi.
Ṯumma Buṭrus ḏ Yuḥanna sersen xafsen ifassen nsen uca immuc-asen Arruḥ iqeddsen.
Wami sersen arrusul ifassen nsen x yiwḏan itwaȓa Simƹan belli immuc-asen Arruḥ iqeddsen. Ikkar Simƹan irezzu aḏasen yuc tmenyaṯ i arrusul.
Inna-asen: "Ucem-ayi uȓa ḏ nec jjheḏ-a ḥima wenni iy xef ɣa serseɣ ifassen inu aḏas immuc Arruḥ iqeddsen."
Ikkar Buṭrus inna-as: "Lla, jmeƹ nnuqarṯ nnec qa aḏ tiȓi ḏ ṯimessi akiḏec ḏi ȓefna minzi ṯenwiḏ aḏ tesɣeḏ lhadiya n Arebbi s tmenyaṯ!
War ɣarek itiȓi bu umcan uȓa ḏ ȓḥaqq ḏi ȓxeḏmeṯ-a ȓaḥeqqac uȓ nnec war iǧi ca nican ak Arebbi.
Tub zi ccarr nnec, ttar i Siḏi Arebbi imken aḏac iɣfar min ṯenwiḏ ḏeg wuȓ nnec.
Twaȓiɣ cek ṯeccureḏ s ṯarzugi n ȓeḥseḏ, cek ḏ ameḥbus n ccarr."
Inna-as Simƹan: "Ttareṯ akiḏi ɣar Siḏi Arebbi ḥima war ḏayi tewqiƹ uȓa ḏ ijjen n ȓḥajeṯ zi min ṯennim."
Wami Buṭrus ḏ Yuḥanna cehḏen x Ƹisa beccaren niṯni s wawaȓ n Siḏi Arebbi, kkaren ḏewȓen ɣar Lquds beccaren s Lʼinjil ḏeg waṭṭas n ȓedcuraṯ ḏi Samarya.
Ijjen lmalaʼika n Siḏi Arebbi ṯessiweȓ-d ɣar Filippas ṯenna-as: "Kkar, ruḥ ɣar ljanub ekk x ubriḏ nni n ȓexȓa itawin zi Lquds ɣar Ɣazza."

Ikkar iruḥ, imseȓqa ḏinni ak yijjen n uryaz netta ḏ aḥabaci ḏ axaṣyuni. Netta zeg imeqqranen n lmalika n Lḥabaca qqaren-as nettaṯ Kandaka, netta ig itkellafen x ṣṣenduq n tmenyaṯ n lmalika nni. Tuɣa iruḥ ɣar Lquds aḏ iƹbeḏ Arebbi,
iḏweȓ-d ɣar Lḥabaca inya x ukarru nnes iqqar ḏi Lkitab n nnabi Icaƹya.
Inna-as Arruḥ n Arebbi i Filippas: "Yallah, mun ak ukarru-yin."
Yuzzeȓ Filippas ɣar uḥabaci nni itsȓa-yas iqqar ḏi Lkitab n nnabi Icaƹya. Inna-as: "Ma ṯfehmeḏ min ṯeqqareḏ?"
Inna-as uḥabaci nni: "Nec, mammec ɣa ggeɣ aḏ fehmeɣ meȓa war ḏayi isefhem can yijjen? Yallah ney-d akiḏi ḏeg ukarru-ya."
Aqa lʼayaṯ nni iy iqqar uḥabaci ḏi Lkitab: <Netta amecnaw aḥuȓi iy tawin aḏas ɣarṣen, amecnaw izmar iy iḏweȓ ḏ azeyzun zzaṯ i yinni itȓassen ṯaḍufṯ nnes, ammen war irezzem ca netta aqemmum nnes.
Ḍeȓmen-ṯ, ksin-as ȓḥaqq nnes. War ɣares ṯeǧi ddurriṯ axas yiȓi wawaȓ. Ṯuḏarṯ nnes twakkes x ṯmurṯ-a.>
Isseqsa uḥabaci nni Filippas inna-as: "Tettareɣ zzayek aḏayi ṯiniḏ, minxef issawaȓ nnabi-ya? Ma x yixef nnes niɣ x can ḥadd nneɣni?"
Itcarraḥ-as Filippas ibḏa-yas zi lʼayaṯ-a ḏi Lkitab itbeccar-iṯ s Ƹisa.
Gguren ḏeg ubriḏ uwḍen ɣar can waman. Inna-as uḥabaci nni: "Aqac aman mujud, min ḏayi yuɣen nec war twaṭehhareɣ ca s waman-a?"
{Inna-as Filippas: "Cek, meȓa ṯumneḏ s marra uȓ nnec qa ṯzemmareḏ aḏ twaṭehhareḏ s waman-a." Yarra xas inna-as: "Wah, nec tamneɣ belli Ƹisa Lmasiḥ netta ḏ Mmis n Arebbi."}
Yumar uḥabaci aḏ sbedden akarru nni. Hwan s ṯnayen iḏsen ɣar waman, Filippas iṭehhar-as i uḥabaci nni s waman.
Wami d gaƹƹḏen zeg waman nni, Arruḥ n Siḏiṯneɣ irfeƹ Filippas ssenni. War iqqim ca uḥabaci nni itwaȓa Filippas ktar ƹaḏ, yuyur x ubriḏ nnes s ȓefraḥeṯ.
Filippas yufa ixef nnes ḏi ṯendint n Wacdud, itraḥ zeg umcan ɣar umcan itbeccar s Lʼinjil ḏi marra ibilajen ḥetta aȓ wami yuweḍ ɣar ṯendint n Qayṣariya.
Cawul ƹaḏ itheddaḏ s ȓmewṯ imeḥḍaren n Siḏiṯneɣ. Ikkar iruḥ ɣar arrayes n ȓfuqaha,
ittar zzayes arruxṣaṯ aṯent iysi ɣar ṯemziḏawin n Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏi Dimaceq bac yinni ɣa yaf ḏeffaren abriḏ n Ƹisa s ṯemɣarin ḏ iryazen aṯen yawi ḏ imeḥbas ɣar Lquds.
Wami iggur ɣar Dimaceq iqqim-as cwayt aḏ yaweḍ, ƹlaɣafla inneḍ-as-d ijjen n nnur itceƹciƹ-d xas zeg ujenna.
Iwḍa ɣar ṯmurṯ, itesȓa i yijjen n ṯmijja ṯeqqar-as-d: "A Cawul a Cawul, mayemmi ḏayi tƹeddabeḏ?"
Yarra xas Cawul inna-as: "Min ṯeƹniḏ cek a Siḏi?" Ṯenna-as ṯmijja nni: "Nec ḏ Ƹisa wenni iy tƹeddabeḏ."
Inna-as: "Kkar aḏef ɣar ṯendint, aḏac itwanna ḏinni min itxeṣṣa aḏ teggeḏ."
Iryazen nni isafaren ak Cawul bedden ḏinni ḏewȓen war ssiwiȓen ca. Sȓin i ṯmijja walakin war twiȓin ḥadd.
Ikkar Cawul zi ṯmurṯ irzem ṯiṭṭawin nnes iḏweȓ war itwiȓi walu. Ṭṭfen-ṯ zeg ufus nnes uwin-ṯ ɣar Dimaceq.
Iqqim ḏinni ṯeȓtiyyam war itett ca, war isess ca, war itwiȓi ca.
Ḏinni ḏi Dimaceq ijjen n umeḥḍar qqaren-as Anas. Imeḍhar-as-d Siḏiṯneɣ ḏi lwaḥi inna-as: "Ay Anas." Yarra xas inna-as: "Aqayi a Siḏi."
Inna-as Siḏiṯneɣ: "Kkar ruḥ ɣar zzenqeṯ nni umi qqaren <Abriḏ Iseggḏen>, rzu ḏinni ḏi ṯeddarṯ n Yahuḏa x yijjen n uryaz zi ṯendint n Ṭarsus, isem nnes Cawul. Netta itẓaǧa ḏinni.
Tuɣa iẓra ḏi lwaḥi ijjen n uryaz qqaren-as Anas aḏ d yas axas isers ifassen nnes bac aḏ iḏweȓ itwaȓa."
Yarra xas Anas inna-as: "A Siḏi, nec xebbaren-ayi aṭṭas n yiwḏan x bnaḏem-a Cawul, mecḥaȓ iƹeddeb netta ȓmuminin nnec ṣṣaliḥin ḏi Lquds.
Ȓexxu aqaṯ ḏa, ucin-as arruxṣa arruyas n ȓfuqaha ḥima aḏ iṭṭef marra yinni iƹebbḏen s yisem nnec."
Inna-as Siḏiṯneɣ: "Lla ruḥ, qa aryaz-a ḏ nec iy ṯ ixḍaren aṯ ssekkeɣ ḥima aḏ issiweḍ isem inu i yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil, ḏ izeǧiḏen nsen, ḏ israʼiliyen.
Nec aḏas d seḍhareɣ mecḥaȓ iy ɣa itwaƹeddeb u labud x ssabab n yisem inu nec."

Iruḥ Anas yuḏef ṯaddarṯ nni isers ifassen nnes x Cawul inna-as: "Ay uma Cawul, nec qa issekk-ayi-d Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa, wenni iy ḏac d imeḍharen ḏeg ubriḏ nni iy d ṯuwiḏ. Issekk-ayi-d ɣarek ḥima aḏ tḏewȓeḏ twaȓiḏ aḏ teccareḏ s Arruḥ iqeddsen."
Ȓexddenni ṯewḍa-yas-d ijjen n ȓḥajeṯ zi ṯiṭṭawin nnes am ṯeqcurṯ, iḏweȓ itwaȓa. Ikkar itwaṭehhar s waman.
Wami icca, iḏweȓ-d ɣares jjheḏ nnes. Iqqim Cawul ȓebƹaḍ n wussan ak imeḥḍaren ḏi Dimaceq.
Ȓexddenni ibḏa itḥeddaṯ ḏi ṯemziḏawin n Ayṯ-Israʼil iqqar-asen qa Ƹisa ḏ Mmis n Arebbi.
Tƹejjben marra yinni itesȓan qqaren: Ma war iǧi ḏ wanita irzun aḏ iqḍa x yinni itȓaɣan x yisem-a n Ƹisa ḏi Lquds? Ma war iǧi ɣarsen iy d yusa ḏanita bac aṯen iṭṭef aṯen yawi ɣar arruyas n ȓfuqaha?
Cawul netta yarni itḥeddaṯ s jjheḏ, iseḏhac Ayṯ-Israʼil ig izeddɣen ḏi Dimaceq, isbeyyen-asen-d s wawaȓ nnes qa Ƹisa ḏ Lmasiḥ.
Ijjen n ǧiȓeṯ imeḥḍaren nnes serwȓen-ṯ, sehwan-ṯ-iḏ s iseɣwan ḏeg yijjen n uqbub zeg yijjen n ṯburjat n ṣṣur n ṯendint.
Wami d yuweḍ Cawul ɣar Lquds irezzu aḏ imun ak imeḥḍaren, walakin ggwḏen zzayes marra war ḏayes ttiqen ca netta ḏ ameḥḍar n ṣṣaḥ.
Barnaba ikkar ikellef zzayes yuwi-ṯ ɣar arrusul. Iƹaweḏ-asen xas mammec ḏas d imeḍhar Siḏiṯneɣ i Cawul ḏeg ubriḏ nni ḏ mammec iy kis issiweȓ ḏ mammec itḥeddaṯ s zƹameṯ ƹlaḥsab isem n Ƹisa ḏi Dimaceq.
Ssenni ṣafi, itraḥ itas-d Cawul akiḏsen ḏi Lquds, itḥeddaṯ s yijjen n zƹameṯ ƹlaḥsab isem n Siḏiṯneɣ.
Issawaȓ ak israʼiliyen yinni issawaȓen s lluɣa ṯayunaniṯ itemnaqar akiḏsen, ssenni niṯni rezzun aṯ nɣen.
Wami d arrin ȓexbar ayṯmaṯneɣ, uwin-ṯ ɣar Qayṣariya ssenni ssekken-ṯ ɣar ṯendint n Ṭarsus.
Ḏi ȓweqṯ nni jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin ḏi marra jwayeh n Yahuḏiya ḏ Ljalil ḏ Samarya hnan. Twajehḏen, teggwḏen zi Siḏi Arebbi, twacejjaƹen s Arruḥ iqeddsen, tmarnin ḏi lƹadad.
Buṭrus itraḥ zeg umcan ɣar umcan, iruḥ iẓra ȓmuminin ṣṣaliḥin iy zeddɣen ḏeg ubilaj n Ludda.
Yufa ḏinni ijjen n uryaz qqaren-as Ƹinyas, netta izzeȓ ṯmenya iseggwusa ḏi ṯassuṯ mmuṯen-as iḍaren.
Inna-as Buṭrus: "A Ƹinyas, qa cek isgenfa-cek Ƹisa Lmasiḥ! Kkar jmeƹ ṯassuṯ nnec." Ȓexddenni ikkar ibedd x iḍaren.
Marra iwḏan iy zeddɣen ḏeg ubilaj n Ludda ḏ ȓewḍa n Carun ẓrin-ṯ tuben ɣar Siḏi Arebbi.
Ḏi ṯendint n Yafa ḏinni ijjen n ṯmeḥḍarṯ qqaren-as Ṭabita (ȓmaƹna n yisem-a, <ṯiɣit n uzɣar>). Tegg ȓxir aṭṭas tƹawan imesƹan.
Ḏi ȓweqṯ nni ṯehȓec ṯemmuṯ, ysint-teṯ sirḏent-teṯ sgaƹƹḏen-teṯ ɣar yijjen n ṯɣurfat.
Sȓin imeḥḍaren ḏi ṯendint n Yafa belli Buṭrus aqaṯ ḏeg ubilaj n Ludda. Ludda ṯuḏes-d i Yafa, ssekken ɣares ṯnayen n yiwḏan ḥecmen-ṯ nnan-as: "Ƹafek arwaḥ akiḏneɣ ḏeɣya!"
Ikkar Buṭrus iruḥ akiḏsen. Wami yuweḍ sgaƹƹḏen-ṯ ɣar ṯɣurfat nni. Nnḍent-as-d i netta marra ṯajjaȓin, trunt seḍharent-as ičammiren ḏ izeǧuba tuɣa ṯxeyyeḍ Ṭabita wami tuɣa ṯeǧa akiḏsent.
Ssenni isufeɣ-iṯen Buṭrus marra zi ṯɣurfat, iwḍa x ifadden ibḏa itẓaǧa. Ixzar ɣar ddat nnes inna-as: "Ya Ṭabita, kkar!" Uca nettaṯ ṯerzem ṯiṭṭawin nnes, wami ṯeẓra Buṭrus ṯekkar ṯeqqim.
Isiɣ-as fus nnes, isekkar-it-id. Iȓaɣa-d i ȓmuminin ṣṣaliḥin ḏ ṯajjaȓin inna-asen aqa ṯeddar.
Iffeɣ ȓexbar ḏi ṯendint n Yafa marra, umnen zi Siḏiṯneɣ aṭṭas n yiwḏan.
Iqqim Buṭrus ḏi Yafa aṭṭas n wussan ak yijjen n bu-yiȓemawen qqaren-as Simƹan.
Ḏi ṯendint n Qayṣariya tuɣa ḏinni ijjen n uryaz qqaren-as Kurninyus. Netta ḏ ijjen n uƹaskari ḏ ameqqran n arrumanus aqaṯ ḏeg yijjen n lfirqa n ȓƹaskar umi qqaren <Aṭalyan.>
Ḏayes ddin iteggweḏ Arebbi, netta ḏ marra ayṯbab n ṯeddarṯ nnes. Itegg ȓxir aṭṭas ḏeg yinni iḥḏajen, war ixeṭṭi ca ṯẓaǧiṯ nnes.
Ijjen n nhar ɣar ṯȓaṯa uƹecci, iẓra nican ḏi lwaḥi ijjen n lmalak n Arebbi itaḏef-d xas itȓaɣa-yas-d: "A Kurninyus."
Ixzar ḏayes Kurninyus mliḥ iggweḏ inna-as: "A siḏi, min ṯrezzuḏ?" Inna-as lmalak nni: "Qa ṯẓaǧiṯ nnec ḏ ṣṣaḏaqa nnec aqa iqbeȓ-iṯent zzayek Arebbi, netta qa ifqeḏ-icek.
Sekk ȓexxu iryazen ɣar ṯendint n Yafa aḏac d awin ijjen n bnaḏem isem nnes Simƹan umi qqaren Buṭrus.
Aqaṯ ḏ anewji ɣar yijjen n bu-yiȓemawen qqaren-as Simƹan, ṯaddarṯ nnes aqat x ṭṭarf n ȓebḥar."
Wami iruḥ lmalak nni iy kis d issiwȓen, iȓaɣa-d i ṯnayen zeg ixeddamen nnes ḏ yijjen n uƹaskari ḏayes ddin, itiȓi ȓebda akiḏes.
Iƹaweḏ-asen marra min iweqƹen, issekk-iṯen ɣar ṯendint n Yafa.
Ṯiwecca nnes, yinni itwassekken zi Kurninyus ɣar ṯendint n Yafa wami ƹȓayen aḏ awḍen ḏinni, yuȓi Buṭrus ɣar ṯzeqqa ɣar uzyen n nhar aḏ iẓẓaǧ.
Iǧuz aṭṭas ixes aḏ icc. Wami ƹaḏ sewjaḏen-as mecca yuḥa-yas-d Arebbi ḏi lwaḥi.
Iẓra ajenna inurzem shewwan-d zzayes ɣar ṯmurṯ ijjen n ȓḥajeṯ ṯegga am ṯcuqqet ḏ ṯameqqrant twacedd zi ṯɣemmura nnes s arbeƹa.
Ḏayes marra lḥayawanaṯ igguren x arbeƹa n iḍaren ḏ min itenḥuruḏen x uƹeddis ḏ yijḍaḍ n ujenna.
Ṯendeq-d ijjen n ṯmijja ṯenna-as: "Kkar a Buṭrus, ɣareṣ, ecc!"
Inna-as netta: "Lla walu a Siḏi! Nec ƹemmarṣ ma cciɣ min iǧan ḥram niɣ mekruh."
Ṯendeq-d ṯmijja nni wis marrṯayen ṯenna-as: "Cek war tḥarram ca min iḥeǧeȓ Arebbi yarri-ṯ ḥalal!"
Iwqeƹ manaya ṯȓaṯa n ṯwaȓaṯin, ssenni ṯnejmeƹ ṯcuqqet nni ṯeḏweȓ ɣar ujenna.
Iqqim Buṭrus itxemmam itƹejjeb ḏi ȓmaƹna n lwaḥi-ya iy iẓra, ȓexddenni iryazen nni iy d issekk Kurninyus ufin ṯaddarṯ n Simƹan bedden ɣar ṯewwarṯ nnes.
Ȓaɣan nnan: "Simƹan wenni umi qqaren Buṭrus, ma aqaṯ ḏinni ḏ anewji?"
Buṭrus ƹaḏ itxemmam ḏi lwaḥi nni inna-as Arruḥ n Arebbi, "Qa ṯȓaṯa n iryazen rezzun xak.
Kkar hwa ɣarsen, ruḥ akiḏsen bȓa ma aḏaysen ṯcekkeḏ qa ḏ nec iy ṯen d issekken."
Ihwa-d Buṭrus ɣar iryazen nni inna-asen, "Aqa ḏ nec iy xef ṯrezzum. Mayemmi ɣari d ṯusim?"

Nnan-as: "Qa neccin issekk-aneɣ-d Kurninyus ijjen n uƹaskari ḏ ameqqran n arrumanus. Netta ḏ ijjen n uryaz nican iteggweḏ Arebbi, tweqqaren-ṯ marra ȓqum n Ayṯ-Israʼil. Inna-as ijjen n lmalak n Arebbi: Sekk ɣar Buṭrus, aḏ d yas ɣar ṯeddarṯ nnec aḏas ṯṣennṭeḏ min ḏac ɣa yini."
Ikkar Buṭrus isiḏef-iṯen ɣar ḏaxeȓ isnewjew-iṯen. Ṯiwecca nnes iruḥ akiḏsen Buṭrus. Munen akiḏes ȓebƹaḍ n ayṯmas zi ṯendint n Yafa.
Farwicca nnes yuweḍ Buṭrus ɣar ṯendint n Qayṣariya. Itraja-ṯen ḏinni Kurninyus, akiḏes ȓebƹaḍ n ȓeḥbab nnes ḏ ȓebƹaḍ n imeddukaȓ nnes iy d iƹareḍ.
Wami yuweḍ Buṭrus ɣar ṯeddarṯ nni, iffeɣ-d ɣares Kurninyus iwḍa-yas ɣar iḍaren nnes isejjeḏ-as.
Isbedd-iṯ Buṭrus x iḍaren inna-as: "Lla, kkar bedd. Qa nec ḏ bnaḏem am nec am cek."
Yuḏef Buṭrus issaweȓ akiḏes yufa ḏinni aṭṭas n yiwḏan munen.
Inna-asen: "Qa ṯessnem belli israʼiliyen ɣarsen ḥram aḏ xellṭen ak ȓbarrani niɣ aḏ aḏfen ṯaddarṯ nsen. Walakin Arebbi isfahem-ayi-d qbeȓ war qqareɣ i ḥadd qa cek ḥram niɣ mekruh.
Wami ḏayi d ṯȓaɣim usiɣ-d bȓa ma aḏ iniɣ lla. Akenniw sseqsiɣ, mayemmi ɣari d ṯessekkem?"
Indeq-d Kurninyus inna-as: "Qa nec arbeƹiyyam zeg wami ɣar ṯȓaṯa uƹecci am ȓweqṯ-a, tuɣa tẓaǧiɣ ḏi ṯeddarṯ inu. Ƹlaɣafla ibedd-d zzaṯi ijjen n uṯarras ɣares arruḍ itceƹciƹ.
Iqqar-ayi-d: A Kurninyus! Qa Arebbi istajeb-ac i ṯẓaǧiṯ nnec, ṣṣaḏaqa nnec ifekkar ḏayes.
Sekk ɣar ṯendint n Yafa, awi-d Simƹan wenni umi qqaren Buṭrus. Aqaṯ ḏinni ḏ anewji ḏi ṯeddarṯ n yijjen n bu-yiȓemawen qqaren-as Simƹan x ṭṭarf n ȓebḥar.
Iwa x manaya iy ɣarek d ssekkeɣ ḏeɣya, ṯeggiḏ mliḥ wami d ṯusiḏ. Neccin ȓexxu marra aqaneɣ neḥḍar zzaṯ i Arebbi bac a nṣenneṭ marra minzi cek iweṣṣa Siḏi Arebbi."
Ibḏa Buṭrus issawaȓ inna-asen: "Ḏ ṣṣaḥ twaȓiɣ Arebbi war itegg ca s wuḏemawen jar yiwḏan.
Arebbi iqebbeȓ iwḏan zi mkuȓ ȓgens yinni iy ṯ iteggwḏen teggen min iǧan nican.
Ṯessnem Arebbi issekk-d awaȓ nnes ɣar Ayṯ-Israʼil itbeccar-iṯen s Lʼinjil n ȓehna s Ƹisa Lmasiḥ, netta ḏ Siḏiṯneɣ n marra iwḏan.
Neccin ḏ ȓechuḏ x marra min itegg Ƹisa ḏi ṯmurṯ n Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏ ṯendint n Lquds. Nɣin-ṯ wami ṯ refƹen x ṯeḥnact.
Nhar wis ṯeȓtiyyam isekkar-iṯ-iḏ Arebbi zi ȓmewṯ ismeḍhar-iṯ-iḏ.
Maci ismeḍhar-iṯ-iḏ Arebbi i marra ccaƹb; Lla, ismeḍhar-iṯ-iḏ i ȓechuḏ iy ixḍar zi qbeȓ iƹni neccin iy kiḏes iccin iy kiḏes iswin wami d ikkar zi ȓmewṯ.
Neccin iweṣṣa-yaneɣ Ƹisa a nbeccar ccaƹb, a necheḏ belli Arebbi ixḍar-iṯ aḏ iḥaseb yinni iddaren ḏ yinni immuṯen.
Marra lʼanbiya cehhḏen xas nnan qa marra yinni zzayes ɣa yamnen aḏ twaɣfarent ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nsen s yisem nnes."
Wami ƹaḏ issawaȓ Buṭrus ḏi manaya, yusa-d Arruḥ iqeddsen ihwa-d x marra yinni itesȓan i wawaȓ nnes.
Ȓmuminin zeg Ayṯ-Israʼil iy d yusin ak Buṭrus qqimen tƹejjben wami ufin Arruḥ iqeddsen itwafeyyeḍ uȓa x yinni war iǧin ca ḏ israʼiliyen.
Ȓaḥeqqac sȓin-asen ssawaȓen s lluɣaṯ war iǧin bu nsen ḥemmḏen Arebbi. Uca inna Buṭrus:
"Ma ḏinni can bnaḏem iy ɣa isbedden iwḏan-a bac war tetwaṭehhiren ca s waman? Yina immuc-asen Arruḥ iqeddsen am neccin am niṯni!"
S manaya iweṣṣa-ṯen Buṭrus aḏ twaṭehharen s waman ƹlaḥsab isem n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ. Ssenni ttaren zzayes akiḏsen iqqim can wussan.
Menbaƹd, arrusul ḏ uwmaṯen yinni iǧan ḏi Yahuḏiya sȓin qa uȓa ḏ yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil qebȓen awaȓ n Arebbi.
Ibḏa Buṭrus itfessar-asen ṯa s ṯa inna-asen:
"Nec wami tuɣa ǧiɣ ḏi ṯendint n Yafa tẓaǧiɣ yuḥa-ayi-d Arebbi, ḏi lwaḥi nni shewwan-d zeg ujenna ɣar ṯmurṯ ijjen n ȓḥajeṯ ṯegga am ṯcuqqet ḏ ṯameqqrant twacedd zi ṯɣemmura nnes s arbeƹa ṯusa-d ɣari.
Xzareɣ ḏayes mliḥ ufiɣ lḥayawanaṯ igguren x arbeƹa n iḍaren ḏ ȓuḥuc ḏ min itenḥuruḏen x uƹeddis ḏ yijḍaḍ n ujenna.
Ṯumma sȓiɣ i yijjen n ṯmijja ṯeqqar-ayi: Kkar a Buṭrus, ɣareṣ, ecc!
Nniɣ-as: Lla walu a Siḏi! Nec ƹemmarṣ war ggiɣ ḏeg uqemmum inu min iǧan ḥram niɣ mekruh.
Ṯendeq-d ṯmijja nni zeg ujenna wis marrṯayen ṯenna-ayi: Cek war tḥarram ca min iḥeǧeȓ Arebbi yarri-ṯ ḥalal!
Iwqeƹ-ayi manayenni ṯȓaṯa n ṯwaȓaṯin, ssenni inejmeƹ kuȓci ɣar ujenna.
Ḏi ṯsaƹƹat nni bedden ṯȓaṯa n iryazen ɣar ṯeddarṯ nni mani ǧiɣ ḏ anewji, twassekken-d ɣari zi ṯendint n Qayṣariya.
Ṯumma iweṣṣa-ayi Arruḥ n Arebbi inna-ayi ruḥ akiḏsen bȓa ma aḏaysen ṯcekkeḏ. Uwiɣ akiḏi setta-ya n yayṯma, nuḏef ɣar ṯeddarṯ n Kurninyus.
Iƹaweḏ-aneɣ netta mammec iẓra ijjen n lmalak ibedd-d ḏi ṯeddarṯ nnes inna-as: Sekk iryazen ɣar ṯendint n Yafa aḏ d awin ssenni Simƹan umi qqaren Buṭrus.
Aḏac yini awaȓen iy zi ɣa ṯnejmeḏ cek ḏ marra ayṯbab n ṯeddarṯ nnec.
Ṯumma wami bḏiɣ ssawaȓeɣ, yusa-d Arruḥ iqeddsen ihwa-d xasen mammec xaneɣ d ihwa ḏeg umezwaru.
Fekkareɣ-d min inna Siḏiṯneɣ wami inna qa Yaḥya iṭehhar i yiwḏan s waman, kenniw qa aḏ twaṭehharem s Arruḥ iqeddsen.
Iwa meȓa yuca-asen Arebbi i niṯni amecnaw min ḏaneɣ yuca i neccin wami numen zi Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ, min ƹniɣ nec bac aḏ ƹarrḍeɣ i Arebbi?"
Yinni iḥḍaren wami sȓin i wawaȓ-a, sqaren ḥemḏen Arebbi nnan: "Xyar, uȓa ḏ yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil yuca-asen Arebbi ttuba aɣarsen ṯiȓi ṯuḏarṯ!"

Ƹlaḥsab aƹeddeb nni iy iweqƹen wami itwaneɣ Stifan, ȓmuminin kuȓ ijjen mani iruḥ: ijjen iruḥ aȓ Finiqya, ijjen iruḥ aȓ Qubruṣ, ijjen iruḥ aȓ Wanṭakya. War tbecciren ḏinni ḥadd s wawaȓ n Arebbi illa israʼiliyen.
Walakin ȓebƹaḍ n iryazen zi Qubruṣ ḏ Lqurina usin-d ɣar Wanṭakya bḏan ssawaȓen ak iyunaniyen tbeccaren-ṯen s Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa.
Siḏi Arebbi aqaṯ akiḏsen, aṭṭas n yiwḏan umnen ḏewȓen-d ɣar Siḏiṯneɣ.
Yuweḍ ȓexbar-a ɣar jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin ḏi Lquds, kkaren ssekken Barnaba ɣar Wanṭakya.
Wami d yuweḍ, yufa mammec ṯen ibarek Arebbi. Ifareḥ ibḏa itcejjaƹ-iṯen marra bac aḏ qqimen ḏeg ubriḏ n Siḏiṯneɣ s marra uȓawen nsen.
Barnaba netta ḏ ijjen n uryaz ḏ aṣebḥan iccur s Arruḥ iqeddsen itamen aṭṭas, xarebbi n yiwḏan umnen zi Siḏiṯneɣ.
Iruḥ Barnaba ɣar ṯendint n Ṭarsus irezzu x Cawul.
Wami ṯ yufa yuwi-ṯ-iḏ akiḏes ɣar ṯendint-a n Wanṭakya. Seƹḏun ƹam ikmaȓ ak jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin, seȓmaḏen aṭṭas n yiwḏan. Ḏanita ḏi Wanṭakya-ya iy twasemman imeḥḍaren ṯwaȓa ṯamezwarut s <imasiḥiyen.>
Ḏi ȓiyyam nni hwan-d can n lʼanbiya zi Lquds ɣar Wanṭakya.

Ikkar ijjen zzaysen qqaren-as Ɣabus, ixbar i ȓmuminin ḏinni s min ḏas inna Arruḥ n Arebbi. Inna-asen qa aḏ iwqeƹ ijjen n buheyyuf ḏ ameqqran x ṯmurṯ marra (u ḏ ṣṣaḥ iwqeƹ manayenni ḏi ȓweqṯ n Lmalik Qayṣar Kludyus).
Kkaren imeḥḍaren tafqen jarasen kuȓ ijjen zzaysen aḏ ssekken cwayt n lmuƹawana ƹlaḥsab ṯizemmar nsen ɣar ayṯmaṯsen ig izeddɣen ḏi Yahuḏiya.
Amenni iy ggin jarasen, ucin lmuƹawana nni i Barnaba ḏ Cawul at ssiwḍen i imeqqranen n jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin iy iǧan ḏinni.
Ḏi ȓweqṯ nni, azeǧiḏ Hirudus ibḏa itƹeddab ȓebƹaḍiṯ zi jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin.
Netta yumar uca nɣin s ssif Yaƹqub umas n Yuḥanna.
Wami yufa manayenni iƹjeb-asen i Ayṯ-Israʼil ikkar iṭṭef uȓa ḏ Buṭrus. Ḏi ȓiyyam n Ȓƹiḏ n Ṯefḍirṯ iy ḏi iwqeƹ manayenni.
Iṭṭef-iṯ iggi-ṯ ḏi ȓeḥbes, isellem-iṯ i arbeƹa n lfirqaṯ n ȓƹaskar aṯ ḥḍan, mkuȓ lfirqa ḏayes arbeƹa. Inwa axas iḥkem zzaṯ i ccaƹb menbaƹd i Ȓƹiḏ Ameqqran.
Tƹessasen x Buṭrus ḏi ȓeḥbes, jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin tettaren xas i Arebbi.
Ǧiȓeṯ nni iy ḏi d ɣa iṣebbeḥ Hirudus aḏ iḥkem x Buṭrus zzaṯ i ccaƹb, tuɣa Buṭrus iṭṭeṣ jar ṯnayen n ȓƹaskar icedd s ṯnayen n snaseȓ. Ȓƹaskar nneɣni ɣar ṯewwarṯ tƹessasen x ȓeḥbes.

Ȓexddenni ṯmeḍhar-d ḏinni ijjen n lmalaʼika n Siḏi Arebbi, itceƹciƹ-d ijjen n nnur ḏi ȓeḥbes. Lmalaʼika nni ṯuwṯa Buṭrus ɣar uɣezḏis nnes ṯesfaq-iṯ-iḏ ṯenna-as: "Kkar ḏeɣya!" Uca snaseȓ nni fesyent zeg ifassen nnes.
Ṯenna-as lmalaʼika nni: "Kkar ḥezzem, qqen ṯisiȓa nnec." Igga Buṭrus min ḏas ṯenna. Ṯenna-as ƹaweḏ: "Egg azeǧab nnec, ḏfar-ayi-d."
Ikkar Buṭrus iffeɣ iḏfar-it, war issin ca min tegg lmalaʼika nni ma ḏ ṣṣaḥ ma lla, itɣir-as yuḥa-yas-d Arebbi.
Ƹḏun x uƹessas amezwaru ḏ wis ṯnayen. Uwḍen ɣar ṯewwarṯ n ȓeḥḏiḏ ṯenni itawin ɣar ṯendint, ṯerzem waḥḏes ffɣen. Ȓexddenni wami gguren ḏeg yijjen n zzenqeṯ ṯesmeḥ ḏayes lmalaʼika nni.
Ḏinni iy d yarra Buṭrus ȓbaȓ nnes inna: "Ȓexxu ssneɣ manaya ḏ ṣṣaḥ qa issekk-ayi-d Siḏi Arebbi lmalaʼika nnes, isenjem-ayi-d zeg ifassen n Hirudus ḏ marra min xsen aḏayi ggen Ayṯ-Israʼil."
Wami ifṭen ḏi manaya, iruḥ ɣar ṯeddarṯ n Maryam yemmas n Yuḥanna umi qqaren Marqus, tmunen ḏinni aṭṭas n yiwḏan tẓaǧan.
Buṭrus tuɣa isqerqub ḏi ṯewwarṯ n barra, ṯruḥ ɣares ijjen n ṯxeddant qqaren-as Ruda aḏas terzem.
Wami ṯeƹqeȓ awaȓ n Buṭrus ṯfareḥ aṭṭas, walakin qbeȓ ma aḏ terzem ṯawwarṯ ṯeƹqeb-d ɣarsen ṯuzzeȓ ṯenna-asen qa Buṭrus aqaṯ ɣar ṯewwarṯ isqerqub.
Nnan-as: "Ma ṯbuhȓiyeḏ niɣ?" Walakin nettaṯ metʼakkeda belli min ṯenna nican. Nnan-as: "Waqila wanita ḏ buḥbeȓ n Buṭrus waha."
Iqqim Buṭrus isqerqub ƹaḏ ḏi ṯewwarṯ. Wami ḏas rezmen ufin-ṯ ḏ netta, qqimen tƹejjben.
Iqqar-asen s ufus stukaṯ, ssenni iƹaweḏ-asen mammec iy ṯ isufeɣ Siḏi Arebbi zi ȓeḥbes. Inna-asen: "Xebbarem Yaƹqub ḏ ayṯmaṯneɣ s min iweqƹen." Iffeɣ iruḥ ɣar yijjen n umcan nneɣni.
Wami iṣbaḥ ȓḥaȓ iwqeƹ ijjen n umenɣi ḏ ameqqran jar ȓƹaskar manis ikka Buṭrus.
Hirudus issekk axas rzun, war ṯ yufi ca. Wami ḏasen igga lʼistijwab i iƹessasen nni, yumar aṯen nɣen. Ssenni iffeɣ uzeǧiḏ Hirudus zi ṯmurṯ n Yahuḏiya iruḥ ɣar ṯendint n Qayṣariya iqqim ḏinni.

Tuɣa iɣḍeb x imezḏaɣ n ṯendint n Ṣur ḏ ṯendint n Ṣayda. Kkaren imezḏaɣ nni rezzun aḏ meṣȓaḥen ak uzeǧiḏ Hirudus liʼanna lmakla nsen tekk-d zi ṯmurṯ n uzeǧiḏ. Ttaren-as manaya wami ruḥen mesfhamen ak Blastus iǧan netta ḏ naʼib n Hirudus.
Ḏeg yijjen n ȓmunasaba, ikkar Hirudus irsa arruḍ iy teggen izeǧiḏen iqqim x lƹarc ibḏa istexṭab x imezḏaɣ n ṯmurṯ nni.
Kkaren niṯni ƹeyyḍen s jjheḏ qqaren: "Cek ṯmijja nnec am yijjen zi arebbiṯen maci am bnaḏem!"
Ȓexddenni ijjen n lmalaʼika n Siḏi Arebbi ṯsehȓec Hirudus wami war iḥmiḏ ca Arebbi. Ɣeẓẓen-ṯ imiɣziwen immuṯ netta.
Walakin awaȓ n Arebbi itentacer netta yarenni.
Barnaba ḏ Cawul ḏewȓen-d zi Lquds wami kemmȓen ȓxeḏmeṯ nsen, uwin-d akiḏsen Yuḥanna umi qqaren Marqus.

Ḏi jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin ḏi ṯendint n Wanṭakya ḏinni lʼanbiya ḏ imseȓmaḏen. Niṯni ḏ Barnaba, ḏ Simƹan wenni umi qqaren Abercan, ḏ Luqyus zi Lqurina, ḏ Manahen wenni ig irebban ak uzeǧiḏ Hirudus zi ṯemẓi nnes, ḏ Cawul.
Wami ƹebbḏen Siḏi Arebbi tẓumman, inna-asen Arruḥ iqeddsen: Ḥuzem-ayi-d Barnaba ḏ Cawul i ȓxeḏmeṯ nni umi ṯen ixḍareɣ.
Wami ẓummen ẓẓuǧen, ȓexddenni sersen xasen ifassen nsen ssekken-ṯen.
Issekk-iṯen Arruḥ iqeddsen ruḥen ɣar ṯendint n Sulukya. Ssenni safaren ḏeg uɣarrabu ɣar ṯeyzirṯ n Qubruṣ.
Wami uwḍen ɣar ṯendint n Salamis bḏan tbeccaren s wawaȓ n Arebbi ḏi ṯemziḏawin n Ayṯ-Israʼil, itƹawan-iṯen Yuḥanna nni.
Uyuren ḏi ṯeyzirṯ nni amen-ṯekmaȓ aȓ wami uwḍen ɣar ṯendint n Pafus. Ufin ḏinni ijjen n useḥḥar netta ḏ aʼisraʼili yarra ixef nnes ḏ nnabi qqaren-as Benyacuƹ.
Itiȓi ak lƹamil wenni umi qqaren Sarjyus Bulus. Lƹamil nni netta ḏ ijjen n uryaz ḏ amiɣis, iȓaɣa-d i Barnaba ḏ Cawul ixes aḏas sȓemḏen awaȓ n Arebbi.
Walakin iƹarreḍ-asen useḥḥar nni Benyacuƹ (wenni umi qqaren s ṯyunaniṯ Ulimas). Netta irezzu aḏ isbeƹƹeḏ lƹamil x lʼiman.
Ikkar Cawul iƹni Bulus iccur s Arruḥ iqeddsen ixzar ḏeg useḥḥar nni mliḥ;
Inna-as: "Cek ḏ mmis n Ibȓis. Cek ḏ ȓaƹḏu n qaƹ min iǧan nican, ṯeccureḏ s lḥila ḏ ṯeḥraymect! Ma ƹaḏ ṯrezzuḏ aḏ tƹewwjeḏ ibriḏen iy iǧan nican n Siḏi Arebbi?

Ssa aȓ ṯsawent Siḏi Arebbi aqaṯ ḍeḏ nnec, aḏ tḏarɣȓeḏ ataf war ṯẓerreḏ ca ṯfawṯ n ṯfuct aȓ yijjen n lmudda." Ȓexddenni ṯekka-as-d ṯacbabṯ i useḥḥar nni x ṯiṭṭawin itwaȓa ṯaǧest, iqqim itenneḍ ḏinni irezzu wi ṯ ɣa isgewwḏen s ufus.
Iẓra manayenni lƹamil ȓexddenni yumen, iqqim iḏehhec s ttaƹlim n Siḏiṯneɣ.
Inya Bulus ḏ imeddukaȓ nnes ḏeg uɣarrabu, ruḥen zi ṯendint nni n Pafus ɣar ṯendint n Barja ḏi Pamfilya. Ismeḥ ḏaysen ḏinni Yuḥanna iḏweȓ-d ɣar Lquds.
Niṯni ffɣen zi ṯendint n Barja ruḥen ɣar ṯendint n Wanṭakya ḏi jwayeh n Pisidya. Uḏfen qqimen ḏi ṯemziḏa n Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏi nhar n ssebṯ.
Menbaƹd i ṯɣuri zi Lkutub n Ccariƹa n Musa ḏ lʼanbiya, ssekken arruyas n ṯemziḏa awaȓ nsen i Barnaba ḏ Cawul nnan-asen: "Ay ayṯma, meȓa ɣarwem can wawaȓ iy zi ɣa ṯcejjƹem ccaƹb-a, inim-asen-ṯ."
Ikkar iceyyar-asen Bulus s ufus inna-asen: "Ay iryazen n Ayṯ-Israʼil ay yinni iteggwḏen Arebbi, ṣennṭeṯ.
Fa Arebbi iy iǧan x ccaƹb n Ayṯ-Israʼil ixḍar netta ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ, yarni lƹadad nsen wami niṯni tuɣa zeddɣen ḏi Miṣra. Isufeɣ-iṯen ssenni s jjheḏ nnes.
Ṯumma iṣbar akiḏsen ḏeg uƹeṣṣay nsen can arbeƹin sna ḏi ṣṣaḥra.
Ṯumma iqḍa x sebƹa n ȓegnus ḏi ṯmurṯ n Kanƹan, ṯamurṯ nni iswarṯ-it i ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ.
Marra manayenni ikka xasen ijjen arbeƹmiyya u xemsin sna. Ṯumma igga xasen ȓquḍaṯ aȓ ȓweqṯ nni n nnabi Ṣamwil.
Ṯumma ttaren-as i Arebbi aɣarsen yiȓi ijjen n uzeǧiḏ nsen, ssenni yuca-asen Cawul mmis n Qays zi Ayṯ-Benyamin. Iḥkem xasen netta arbeƹin iseggwusa.
Ṯumma ikkes-iṯ Arebbi, yarra Dawed ḏ azeǧiḏ xasen. Icheḏ xas inna qa ufiɣ Dawed mmis n Yassa netta ḏ ijjen n uryaz iqbeȓ ȓxaḍar inu aḏ igg marra min xseɣ.
Ṯumma zi ddurriṯ n Dawed issekk-d Arebbi Ƹisa ɣar Ayṯ-Israʼil iƹni wenni iy ṯen ɣa isnejmen, mammec ṯen iwƹeḏ zi qbeȓ.
Qbeȓ ma aḏ iraḥ ɣarsen Ƹisa, tuɣa ḏinni Yaḥya itbeccar marra ccaƹb n Ayṯ-Israʼil ḥima aḏ tuben aḏ twaṭehharen s waman.

Wami Yaḥya ƹȓayen aḏ ikemmeȓ ȓxeḏmeṯ nnes inna-asen: Min ḏayi tarrim kenniw? Qa nec war ǧiɣ ca ḏ wenni iy trajam! Menbaƹd i nec aḏ d yas ijjen war sḏihiǧeɣ aḏas fesyeɣ uȓa ḏ ifiȓan n ṯsiȓa iqqen ḏeg iḍaren nnes."
Inna-asen Bulus: "Ay ayṯma, a ṯarwa n Brahim, ay yinni iteggwḏen Arebbi! Qa ḏ neccin umi d issekk Arebbi awaȓ-a iy zi ɣa nenjem.

Qa imezḏaɣ n Lquds ḏ arruyas nsen war ƹqiȓen ca Ƹisa-ya, war fhimen ca awaȓen n lʼanbiya ḏi Lkutub iy qqaren ḏi ṯemziḏawin zi ssebṯ ɣar ssebṯ. Wami ḥekmen x Ƹisa s ȓmewṯ ffɣen-d wawaȓen nni iy nnan lʼanbiya.
Waxxa war ufin uȓa ḏ ijjen n ssabab iy zi ɣa xas ḥekmen s ȓmewṯ, walakin ttaren i Bilaṭus aṯ ineɣ.
Wami ggin marra min tuɣa xas urin lʼanbiya, sehwan-ṯ-iḏ zi ṯeḥnact sersen-ṯ ḏeg unḍeȓ.
Walakin Arebbi isekkar-iṯ-iḏ zi ȓmewṯ.
Ṯumma imeḍehhar-d Ƹisa ḏeg waṭṭas n nhuraṯ i yinni tuɣa igaƹƹḏen akiḏes zi ṯmurṯ n Ljalil ɣar ṯendint n Lquds. Ȓexxu yina iǧan ḏ ȓechuḏ nnes ɣar ccaƹb.
Fa Arebbi isekkar-d Ƹisa zi ȓmewṯ iƹni ƹemmarṣ aḏ ikiccew. Amenni iqqar Lkitab: <Aḏawem uceɣ lbaraka ṯamqeddest, lbaraka ḏ ṣṣaḥ iy zi weƹḏeɣ nnabi Dawed.>
Amenni iqqar ƹaweḏ Lkitab: <War tejjiḏ ca Lƹaḍim nnec aḏ ikiccew.>
Liʼanna Dawed ḏi zman nnes wami ikemmeȓ min ixes Arebbi ṣafi immuṯ, itwanḍeȓ ṭṭarf i ȓejḏuḏ nnes ṣafi ikiccew.
Walakin wenni d isekkar Arebbi zi ȓmewṯ netta lla war ikiccew ca.
Iwa ḥḍaṯ ixef nwem bac war ḏawem itewqiƹ ca min urin lʼanbiya:
Xzareṯ a yinni itbuṣaren, tƹejjbeṯ fnaṯ. Ḏi ȓiyyam nwem aḏ ggeɣ can ṯmesȓayin waxxa ixebbar-ikenniw ḥadd zzaysent, war ṯ timnem ca."
Wami kkaren Bulus ḏ Barnaba aḏ d ffɣen zi ṯemziḏa nni n Ayṯ-Israʼil, ttaren zzaysen yiwḏan nni aḏasen ḥeddṯen s manayenni nhar n ssebt iy d ɣa yasen.
Wami d teffɣen zi ṯemziḏa, ḏfaren-ṯen aṭṭas n israʼiliyen ḏ yinni iseȓmen ḏi ddin n Ayṯ-Israʼil iy teggwḏen Arebbi. Bulus ḏ Barnaba ssiwȓen akiḏsen cejjƹen-ṯen ḥima aḏ arnin ḏi arḍa n Arebbi.
Wami d ṯuweḍ sebṯ nni, munen ƹȓayen marra ayṯbab n ṯendint ḥima aḏ ṣennṭen i wawaȓ n Siḏi Arebbi.
Ayṯ-Israʼil wami ufin ȓɣaci aṭṭas bḏan ḥessḏen aṭṭas arrusul bḏan tƹarraḍen i wawaȓ n Bulus, tukkaren-ṯ.

Bulus ḏ Barnaba nnan-asen s yijjen n zƹameṯ: "Neccin tuɣa itxeṣṣa aḏawem nessiweȓ i kenniw ḏ imezwura s wawaȓ n Arebbi. Wami ṯugim, ṯḥekmem x yixef nwem belli kenniw war ṯesḏiheǧem ca ṯuḏarṯ n ȓebda, ȓexxu qa neccin a nraḥ ɣar yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Liʼanna Siḏi Arebbi iweṣṣa-yaneɣ inna-aneɣ: <Arriɣ-cek ḏ ṯfawṯ i marra ȓegnus, ḥima iwḏan aḏ nejmen ḥetta aȓ ṭṭarf n ddunect.>"
Yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil wami sȓin min inna Bulus, farḥen ḥemmḏen i wawaȓ n Siḏi Arebbi. Umnen marra yinni ixḍar Arebbi i ṯuḏarṯ n ȓebda.
Intacar wawaȓ n Siḏi Arebbi ḏi ṯmurṯ nni marra.
Walakin israʼiliyen samaren ṯimɣarin iy ḏaysent ddin ɣarsent lmartaba, ƹaweḏ samaren imeqqranen n ṯendint. Teggen ssabab i yiwḏan ḥima aḏ ƹeddben Bulus ḏ Barnaba uca uzzȓen xasen zi jjiheṯ nni.
Kkaren Bulus ḏ Barnaba mesḥen ṯaƹejjact zeg iḍaren nsen am yijjen n chaḏeṯ xasen, ruḥen ɣar ṯendint n Ikunya.
Imeḥḍaren iǧan ḏinni ccuren s ȓefraḥeṯ ḏ Arruḥ iqeddsen.
Ḏi ṯendint n Ikunya uḏfen Bulus ḏ Barnaba s ṯnayen iḏsen ɣar ṯemziḏa n Ayṯ-Israʼil, umnen aṭṭas n israʼiliyen ḏ iyunaniyen s ttebcir nsen.
Walakin israʼiliyen iy yugin aḏ amnen samaren yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil x ayṯmaṯneɣ, ƹemmaren-asen azeǧif.

Bulus ḏ Barnaba qqimen ḏinni aṭṭas n ȓweqṯ tbeccaren s Siḏiṯneɣ s yijjen n zƹameṯ. Igga Siḏiṯneɣ lmuƹjizaṯ ḏ lburhanaṯ x ifassen n Bulus ḏ Barnaba bac aḏ isbeyyen awaȓen nni iy tbeccaren x arḍa n Siḏiṯneɣ ḏ ṣṣaḥ.
Mesfraqen ayṯbab n ṯendint-a n Ikunya x ṯnayen. Ȓebƹaḍ iḏsen aqaṯen ak israʼiliyen, ȓebƹaḍ iḏsen aqaṯen ak arrusul.
Kkaren israʼiliyen ḏ yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil tafqen ak arruyas nsen bac aḏ ƹedden x arrusul aṯen rejmen s uzru.
Ḏi ṯendint n Listra ḏinni ijjen n uryaz ḏ anecruf mmuṯen-as iḍaren, zeg wami d ixȓeq ƹemmarṣ ma yuyur.
Itsȓa i wawaȓ n Bulus. Ixzar ḏayes mliḥ Bulus, yufa ḏayes lʼiman iy zi ɣa igenfa.
Iȓaɣa-d s yijjen n ṯmijja ṯejheḏ inna-as: "Kkar, bedd nican x iḍaren nnec!" Ȓexddenni inexḍef ibḏa iggur.
Wami ẓrin ȓɣaci nni min igga Bulus, ƹeyyḍen s lluɣa n Liqunya nnan qa arebbiṯen ḏewȓen ḏ iwḏan hwan-d ɣarneɣ!
Semman-as i Barnaba <Zafas>, semman-as i Bulus <Hirmis> liʼanna ḏ Bulus ig itbeccaren aṭṭas.

Yusa-d ȓemqeddem n lʼaṣnam Zafas wenni ig itiȓin ḏi zzawyiṯ zzaṯ i ṯendint, yuwi-d iyenduzen yuwi-d ṯiqebbiḍin n nwar ɣar ṯewwura n ṯendint, ixes netta ḏ ccaƹb aḏasen qeddmen dbiḥeṯ i Barnaba ḏ Bulus.
Arrusul nni iƹni Barnaba ḏ Bulus wami sȓin awaȓ nni kkaren cerrgen arruḍ nsen. Uḏfen ḏi ȓwesṭ n yiwḏan ƹeyyḍen nnan-asen:

"Ay iryazen, mayemmi teggem manaya? Qa neccin ḏ iwḏan waha am kenniw am neccin kif-kif. Nuwi-awem-d ijjen n wawaȓ ḏ aṣebḥan bac aḏ tbeƹƹḏem i ṯmesȓayin-a war ineffƹen ca, aḏ tḏewȓem ɣar Arebbi iddaren iy d ixeȓqen ajenna ḏ ṯmurṯ ḏ ȓebḥar ḏ marra min ḏaysen.
Ḏi zmanaṯ iƹḏun, Arebbi ijja marra ȓegnus aḏ ḏfaren ibriḏen iy xsen.
Walakin Arebbi isbeyyan-awem-d ixef nnes s min ixeddem, iƹni itegg ȓxir iticc-awem anẓar zeg ujenna ḏ ṯfeǧaḥṯ ḏi ȓweqṯ nnes. Iteccar-awem uȓawen nwem s ȓefraḥeṯ."
S wawaȓ-a Bulus ḏ Barnaba sbedden-ṯen, walakin ȓɣaci nni qesḥen s waṭṭas ƹȓayen qeddmen-asen dbiḥeṯ.
Menbaƹḏ usin-d can israʼiliyen zi Wanṭakya ḏ Ikunya tsamaren ȓɣaci nni, arejmen Bulus s uzru jarren-ṯ barra i ṯendint tɣiȓ-asen immuṯ.
Walakin wami xas munen imeḥḍaren, ikkar-d iddar wa ssenni yuḏef ɣar ṯendint. Ṯiwecca nnes iffeɣ ak Barnaba iruḥ ɣar ṯendint n Dirba.
Beccaren ḏi ṯendint nni n Dirba, arrin aṭṭas n yiwḏan ḏ imeḥḍaren. Ssenni ḏewȓen ɣar ṯendint n Listra ḏ Ikunya ḏ Wanṭakya.
Ggin uȓ ḏeg imeḥḍaren nni, cejjƹen-ṯen bac aḏ arnin ḏi lʼiman nsen. Qqaren-asen: U labud axaneɣ ṯekk aṭṭas n tamara bac neccin ȓmuminin a naḏef ḏi ȓmulk n Arebbi.
Bulus ḏ Barnaba ixḍaren imeqqranen ḏi mkuȓ jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin ȓexddenni ẓẓuǧen, ẓummen, jjin-ṯen ḏeg ufus n Siḏi Arebbi iy zi umnen.
Ssenni ƹḏun x jwayeh n Pisidya, uwḍen ɣar jwayeh n Pamfilya.
Wami tbeccaren s wawaȓ n Arebbi ḏi ṯendint n Barja, ƹḏun ɣar ṯendint n Waṭalya.
Wami kemmȓen ȓxeḏmeṯ nni ḏinni, ƹeqben ssenni ḏeg uɣarrabu ɣar ṯendint n Wanṭakya manis d usin qbeȓ, zi manis twakellfen s ȓxeḏmeṯ nni s arḍa n Arebbi.
Wami uwḍen ḏinni, smunen jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin ƹawḏen-asen marra min igga Arebbi x ufus nsen ḏ mammec irzem-asen ṯawwarṯ n lʼiman i yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Seƹḏun aṭṭas n ȓweqṯ ḏinni ak imeḥḍaren.
Usin-d ca n iryazen zi Yahuḏiya seȓmaḏen ayṯmaṯneɣ ḏeg Wanṭakya nnan-asen: "War ṯzemmarem ca aḏ tnejmem illa meȓa ṯeggim ṭṭahareṯ ƹlaḥsab Ccariƹa n Musa."
Wami uwḍen ɣar Lquds, reḥḥben zzaysen jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin ḏ imeqqranen n jmaƹeṯ-a ḏ arrusul. Ḏinni Bulus ḏ Barnaba ƹawḏen-asen i niṯni marra min igga Arebbi x ufus nsen.
Walakin kkaren can n ȓmuminin ȓḥizeb nsen zeg ifarrisiyen nnan: Itxeṣṣa wa labud aḏ ṭehharen yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil, aṯen ṯweṣṣam aḏ ṭaƹen i Ccariƹa n Musa.
Munen arrusul ḏ imeqqranen n jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin ḥima aḏ xzaren ḏi lxilaf-a.

Wami mnaqacen aṭṭas, ikkar Buṭrus ibedd inna-asen: "Ay ayṯma, aqa kenniw ṯessnem mecḥaȓ zeg wami iy ḏayi ixḍar Arebbi zzaywem bac yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil aḏ sȓen zeg uqemmum inu awaȓ n Lʼinjil aḏ amnen.
Arebbi ḏ netta ig issnen uȓ n bnaḏem, iseḍhar-d netta belli iqbeȓ-iṯen iƹni yuca-asen Arruḥ iqeddsen mammec ḏaneɣ ṯ yuca i neccin.
War iggi bu s wuḏemawen jaraneɣ, isireḏ-asen uȓawen nsen wami umnen.
Ȓexxu kenniw mayemmi ṯzaƹmem aḏ teẓrem Arebbi min ɣa igg, teggem dqeȓ n ṯzayȓut x yiri n imeḥḍaren? Dqeȓ nni tuɣa war nzemmar aṯ neysi lla neccin uȓa ḏ ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ.
Neccin min ntamen? Ntamen belli neccin a nenjem s arḍa n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa mammec ɣa nejmen uȓa ḏ yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil."
Marra jmaƹeṯ nni ḏinni iy qqimen war nnin walu, tesȓan i Barnaba ḏ Bulus ssawaȓen x lmuƹjizaṯ ḏ lburhanaṯ igga Arebbi x ufus nsen jar yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Wami kemmȓen awaȓ nsen, indeq-d Yaƹqub inna-asen: "Ay ayṯma, ṣennṭem ɣari mliḥ!
Iƹaweḏ-aneɣ Simƹan x mammec ḏeg umezwaru ifqeḏ Arebbi yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil ixḍar ca zzaysen aḏ iȓin ḏ ccaƹb nnes.
Manaya yusa-d ak lʼanbiya min nnan ḏi zman, mammec iqqar Lkitab:
Menbaƹd i manaya nec aḏ d ḏewȓeɣ, aqiḍun n Dawed iy iwḍan aṯ sbeddeɣ, min zzayes inheḏmen aṯ sgaƹƹḏeɣ aṯ ƹeḏȓeɣ.
Inna-asen Yaƹqub: "X manaya nec twaȓiɣ war nseqsaḥ ca x yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil ig itamnen ȓexxu zi Arebbi.
Walakin aḏasen nari ṯabrat-a ḥima aḏ beƹƹḏen x lmakla itwaqeddmen i lʼaṣnam ḏ lfasad ḏ min itwajeyyfen ḏ iḏammen.
Liʼanna zi zman tḥeddaṯen i yiwḏan s Ccariƹa n Musa ḏi mkuȓ ṯendint, qqaren-t zi ssebṯ ɣar ssebṯ ḏi ṯemziḏawin n Ayṯ-Israʼil."

X manaya arrusul ḏ imeqqranen n jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin ḏ marra jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin ggin aḏ ixḍaren can n iryazen nsen, aṯen ssekken ak Bulus ḏ Barnaba ɣar ṯendint n Wanṭakya. Ixḍaren ijjen umi qqaren Silas ḏ yijjen qqaren-as Yahuḏa iƹni wenni umi qqaren Barsaba, ɣarsen ijjen n umcan ḏ ameqqran jar ȓmuminin.

Ssekken akiḏsen ṯabrat-a nnan-asen: "Ay ayṯmaṯneɣ war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil ig izeddɣen ḏi Wanṭakya ḏ Surya ḏ lʼiqlim n Kilikya, netseǧam xawem neccin iy iǧan ḏ arrusul ḏ imeqqranen n jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin.
Netsȓa belli can yiwḏan zzayneɣ usin-d ɣarwem bȓa lʼiḏen nneɣ, seddƹen-kenniw siḏfen ḏaywem ccekk s wawaȓ nsen.
Neccin marra ntafeq, nixḍar can n iryazen aṯen d nessekk ɣarwem ak imƹizzen nneɣ Barnaba ḏ Bulus.
Iryazen-a ɣamaren s ṯuḏarṯ nsen x yisem n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
X manaya nessekk-awem-d uȓa ḏ Yahuḏa-ya ḏ Silas-a bac aḏawem inin s uqemmum nsen min ḏawem d nura ḏi ṯebrat-a.
Neccin ḏ Arruḥ iqeddsen netwaȓa mliḥ war xawem ntegg bu dqeȓ aṭṭas illa min iǧan wa labud.
Iƹni aḏ tbeƹƹḏem x lmakla itwaqeddmen i lʼaṣnam, ḏ iḏammen, ḏ min itwajeyyfen, ḏ lfasad. Meȓa ṯbeƹƹḏem x ṯmesȓayin-a wa ataf ṯeggim mliḥ. Akenniw iƹawen Arebbi."
Yina itwassekken ɣar Wanṭakya ṣafi uwḍen ḏinni, smunen jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin ucin-asen ṯabrat nni.
Wami t ɣrin jmaƹeṯ nni farḥen aṭṭas liʼanna ṯcejjeƹ-iṯen.
Yahuḏa ḏ Silas niṯni ḏ l'anbiya, tcejjaƹen ȓmuminin s waṭṭas n wawaȓen, ggin ḏaysen uȓ.
Qqimen dinni ijjen n lmudda, menbaƹd ssekken-ṯen ȓmuminin nni ḏi ȓehna ɣar yinni iy ṯen d issekken.
{Walakin Silas igga aḏ iqqim ḏinni.}
Bulus ḏ Barnaba qqimen ḏi ṯendint n Wanṭakya, seȓmaḏen tbeccaren s wawaȓ n Siḏi Arebbi, niṯni ḏ waṭṭas n yiwḏan.
Ṯeƹḏu ijjen n ȓweqṯ, inna-as Bulus i Barnaba: Yallah, a neḏweȓ ɣar ayṯmaṯneɣ ḏi kuȓ ṯendint mani nbeccar s wawaȓ n Siḏi Arebbi a nẓer mammec ǧan.
Barnaba ixes akiḏsen yawi Yuḥanna wenni umi qqaren Marqus.
Walakin Bulus war ḏas iƹjib ca aṯ awin akiḏsen minzi Marqus tuɣa ismeḥ ḏaysen ḏi Pamfilya war kisen iqqim ca ḏi ȓxeḏmeṯ nni.
War tafqen qaƹ ḏi ṯmesȓayṯ-a, kuȓ ijjen manis ikka. Barnaba isafar ak Marqus ḏeg uɣarrabu ɣar Qubruṣ.
Bulus netta ixḍar Silas, ffɣen niṯni kellfen-ṯen ȓmuminin x ȓxeḏmeṯ nni nnan axawem yarḍa Siḏiṯneɣ.
Iruḥ ɣar Surya ḏ lʼiqlim n Kilikya itegg uȓ ḏi ṯjumaƹ n ȓmuminin.
Yuweḍ Bulus ɣar ṯendint n Dirba ḏ ṯendint n Listra, yufa ḏinni ijjen n umeḥḍar qqaren-as Timutawus. Yemmas nettaṯ ḏ ṯaʼisraʼiliṯ ḏ ȓmumna, babas ḏ ayunani.
Ayṯmaṯneɣ iy iǧan ḏi ṯendint n Ikunya ḏ Listra ssiwȓen mliḥ x Timutawus.
Igga-as ṭṭahareṯ Bulus wami ixes aṯ yawi akiḏes. Igga-as amenni ƹlaḥsab israʼiliyen iǧan ḏeg imucan nni niṯni marra ssnen belli babas ḏ ayunani.
Xmi iggur Bulus ḏ imeddukaȓ nnes zeg ubilaj ɣar ubilaj iqqar-asen ȓuṣiyaṯ nni ṯinni iy ggin arrusul ḏ imeqqranen n jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin ḏi Lquds ḥima aṯent ḏfaren yiwḏan.
Amenni ṯijumaƹ n ȓmuminin tejhiḏent ḏi lʼiman, kuȓ nhar yarenni lƹadad nsent.
Bulus ḏ imeddukaȓ nnes kkin x jwayeh n Frijya ḏ Galaṭya, war ṯen ijji ca Arruḥ iqeddsen aḏ beccaren s wawaȓ n Arebbi ḏi lʼiqlim n Asya.
Wami uwḍen ɣar lḥudud n Misya, qeǧben aḏ aḏfen lʼiqlim n Biṯinya walakin war ṯen ijji ca Arruḥ n Ƹisa.
S manaya semḥen ḏi Misya hwan ɣar ṯendint n Traws.
Ḏi ǧiȓeṯ nni ihwa-d ijjen n lwaḥi x Bulus iẓra ḏayes ijjen n uṯarras zi lʼiqlim n Masidunya ibedd itṭalab-iṯ iqqar-as zwa-d ɣarneɣ ɣar Masidunya ƹawen-aneɣ.
Wami ṣafi iẓra lwaḥi nni Bulus, nekkar neccin nsewjeḏ ḥima a nsafer ȓexddenni ɣar lʼiqlim n Masidunya. Nefhem belli Arebbi itȓaɣa-d xaneɣ aṯen nbeccar s Lʼinjil ḏinni.
Ssenni nsafer ḏeg uɣarrabu zi ṯendint n Traws, nruḥ nican ɣar ṯendint n Samutrakya. Ṯiwecca nnes nruḥ ɣar ṯendint n Niyapulis.
Ssenni nruḥ ɣar Filippi, nettaṯ ḏ ijjen n ṯendint ṯusa-d ḏi lwilaya ṯamezwarut n lʼiqlim n Masidunya, staƹmaren-teṯ irumaniyen. Neqqim ḏinni ḏi ṯendint nni ȓebƹaḍ n wussan.
Ḏi nhar n ssebṯ n lƹibada neffeɣ zi ṯewwarṯ n ṯendint nruḥ ɣar ṭṭarf n yiɣzar, tɣiȓ-aneɣ a naf ḏinni ijjen n umcan n ṯẓaǧiṯ. Neqqim nessawaȓ ak ṯemɣarin nni iy nufa ḏinni imunen.

Akiḏsent ḏinni ijjen n ṯemɣarṯ ṯesȓa-yaneɣ qqaren-as Lidya. Nettaṯ zi ṯendint n Ṯiyatra ṯeznuza ṯcuqqet nni iy iɣȓan llun nnes ḏ llila, ṯƹebbeḏ Arebbi. Irzem-as Siḏi Arebbi uȓ nnes bac aḏ tṣenneṭ i wawaȓ n Bulus.

Wami ṯetwaṭehhar s waman nettaṯ ḏ ȓeḥbab nnes, ṯettar zzayneɣ ṯenna-aneɣ: "Araḥem-d ɣar ṯeddarṯ inu qqimem akiḏi iƹni meȓa ṯteyyqem belli nec umneɣ zi Siḏi Arebbi." Ṯḥeccem-aneɣ nettaṯ aȓ wami neqbeȓ.
Ijjen n nhar wami nruḥ ɣaȓ umcan nni mani tẓaǧan yiwḏan, ṯmeȓqa akiḏneɣ ijjen n ṯismeɣṯ nettaṯ ḏ ṯakehhant tawi-d s ssiḥer nnes aṭṭas n tmenyaṯ i ayṯbab nnes.
Tbaƹ-aneɣ-d neccin ḏ Bulus tƹeyyaḍ ṯeqqar qa iryazen-a ƹebbḏen Arebbi Yuƹȓan, tbeccaren-kenniw s ubriḏ iy zi ɣa ṯnejmem!

Ṯegga manayenni aṭṭas n nhuraṯ, Bulus war ḏas iƹjib bu ȓḥaȓ. Ineqȓeb-d ɣares inna-as i jjenn nni iy ḏayes: "Nec tamareɣ-cek ƹlaḥsab isem n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ azzayes ṯeffɣeḏ." Ȓexddenni iffeɣ jjenn nni zzayes ḏeg umcan.
Ayṯbab n ṯismeɣṯ nni wami ufin ṯawwarṯ n lmanda nsen ṣafi ṯbelleƹ xasen, kkaren ṭṭfen Bulus ḏ Silas jarren-ṯen ɣar ssaḥa ɣar lḥukkam.
Qeddmen-ṯen ɣar lḥukkam nnan-asen: "Iryazen-a ḏ israʼiliyen teggen-aneɣ ȓfawḍa ḏi ṯendint.
Seȓmaḏen lƹadaṯ war nzemmar ca aṯent neqbeȓ niɣ azzaysent nexḏem minzi neccin ḏ irumaniyen."
Ȓexddenni munen ȓɣaci hejmen x Bulus ḏ Silas, lḥukkam nni cerrgen-asen arruḍ umaren xasen bac aḏasen ucen aƹmuḏ.
Uwṯin-ṯen aṭṭas s uƹmuḏ nḍaren-ṯen ḏi ȓeḥbes. Nnan-as i lḥaris n ȓeḥbes ƹess xasen mliḥ.
Wami isȓa netta awaȓ-a, iruḥ iggi-ṯen ɣar ḏaxeȓ qaƹ n ȓeḥbes iqqen-iṯen zeg iḍaren nsen ɣar ikeccuḍen iḏeqȓen.
Ɣar ȓwesṭ n ǧiȓeṯ Bulus ḏ Silas tẓaǧan tɣennajen izȓan i Arebbi, tesȓan-asen imeḥbas.
Ƹlaɣafla iwqeƹ ijjen n zzinzal ḏ ameqqran aȓ wami nhezzen uȓa ḏ dsasaṯ n ȓeḥbes. Nurzment ṯewwura nnes marra, ƹaweḏ nufsȓent-asen snaseȓ i imeḥbas marra.
Wami d ifaq lḥaris n ȓeḥbes zeg yiḍeṣ yufa ṯiwwura n ȓeḥbes nurzment tɣiȓ-as imeḥbas nni arewȓen, ijbeḏ-d ssif ḥima aḏ ineɣ ixef nnes.
Iȓaɣa-yas-d Bulus s jjheḏ inna-as: "Lla! Ɣarek aḏ tḍarreḏ ixef nnec, qa neccin ƹaḏ aqaneɣ ḏa marra iḏneɣ!"
Inna lḥaris n ȓeḥbes ceƹƹȓem ȓefnaraṯ. Iruḥ itazzeȓ ɣar Bulus ḏ Silas isejjeḏ-asen ɣar iḍaren nsen ibḏa iterjiji.
Isufeɣ-iṯen-d inna-asen: "A siyaḏi, min ɣa ggeɣ bac aḏ nejmeɣ?"
Nnan-as: "Amen zi Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa aḏ tnejmeḏ cek ḏ ȓeḥbab nnec."
Bḏan tbeccaren-ṯ netta ḏ marra ȓeḥbab nnes s wawaȓ n Siḏiṯneɣ.
Ḏi ṯsaƹƹat nni s ǧiȓeṯ, yuwi-ṯen lḥaris n ȓeḥbes imseḥ-asen ijarriḥen. Ȓexddenni itwaṭehhar s waman netta ḏ marra ȓeḥbab nnes.
Yuwi-ṯen ɣar ṯeddarṯ nnes yuca-asen aḏ ccen. Ifareḥ netta ḏ marra ȓeḥbab nnes minzi umnen zi Arebbi.
Wami d iṣbeḥ ȓḥaȓ, lḥukkam ssekken imxazniyen ɣar lḥaris n ȓeḥbes nnan-as: Ḍȓeq-asen i iryazen-a!
Lḥaris ixebbar Bulus inna-as qa umaren-kenniw lḥukkam aḏ twaḍeȓqem. Ṣafi ffɣeṯ, ruḥeṯ ḏi ȓehna!

Inna-asen Bulus i imxazniyen nni: "Uwṯin-aneɣ zzaṯ i yiwḏan bȓa ȓqanun nḍaren-aneɣ ḏi ȓeḥbes, walakin neccin ɣarneɣ ljinsiya n Ruma. Ȓexxu niṯni, ma rezzun aḏaneɣ sufɣen war d itarri ḥadd ȓexbar?" Inna-asen: "Lla, itxeṣṣa aḏ d asen lḥukkam nni s yixef nsen aḏaneɣ sufɣen!"
Imxazniyen nni ruḥen ƹawḏen-asen awaȓ-a i lḥukkam, lḥukkam nni nxeȓƹen wami ssnen belli Bulus ḏ Silas ḏ irumaniyen.
Usin-d ɣarsen tettaren zzaysen aḏasen samḥen, sufɣen-ṯen zi ȓeḥbes ttaren zzaysen aḏ ffɣen zi ṯendint.
Wami ffɣen zi ȓeḥbes ruḥen ɣar ṯeddarṯ n Lidya. Ẓrin ḏinni ayṯmaṯsen cejjƹen-ṯen, ssenni uyuren.
Ƹḏun x ṯendint n Umfipulis ḏ ṯendint n Upulunya, uwḍen ɣar ṯendint n Salunik mani ṯeǧa ḏinni ijjen n ṯemziḏa n Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Yuḏef Bulus ɣar ṯemziḏa nni mammec itegg ȓebda. Ṯȓaṯa n simanaṯ kuȓ nhar n ssebṯ n lƹibada itemnaqac akiḏsen iqqar-asen min yurin ḏi Lkutub.
Isefham-iṯen isbeyyan-asen ddalil x mammec u labud Lmasiḥ aḏ itwaƹeddeb aḏ d ikkar zi ȓmewṯ. Inna-asen qa Ƹisa-ya iy zi kenniw tbeccareɣ netta s yixef nnes ḏ Lmasiḥ.
Qtanƹen ȓebƹaḍ zzaysen munen ak Bulus ḏ Silas. Akiḏsen xarebbi n iyunaniyen iy iteggwḏen Arebbi. Akiḏsen ƹaweḏ aṭṭas n ṯemɣarin zi ṯinni iy ɣar ṯeǧa lmartaba.

Walakin israʼiliyen nneɣni ḥesḏen-ṯen, ruḥen smunen-d zi ssuq ijjen n lmejmuƹ n ikruccaren iƹeffanen bac aḏ ggen ssdaƹ, snekkaren ȓfawḍa ḏi ṯendint. Hejmen x ṯeddarṯ n yijjen qqaren-as Yasin rezzun x Bulus ḏ Silas ḥima aṯen sellmen i ȓɣaci.
Wami war ṯen ufin ca, jarren Yasin ḏ ȓebƹaḍ n ayṯmaṯneɣ ɣar lḥukkam n ṯendint. Snekkaren ṯɣuyyeṯ qqaren: "Iryazen nni iy ggin lfitna ḏi marra ddunect, ȓexxu aqaṯen ḏa
ḏ inewjiwen ɣar Yasin wanita. Marra yina ƹeṣṣan ȓqanun n Lmalik Qayṣar qqaren qa ḏinni ijjen n uzeǧiḏ nneɣni qqaren-as Ƹisa."
Wami ccaƹb ḏ lḥukkam n ṯendint sȓin i manaya, ikkar ijjen n ssdaƹ ḏ ameqqran.
Ssenni ṭṭfen lkafala zi Yasin ḏ inneɣni, ḍeȓqen-asen.
Ssenni s ǧiȓeṯ nni ayṯmaṯneɣ ssekken Bulus ḏ Silas ɣar ṯendint umi qqaren Birya. Wami uwḍen, uḏfen ɣar ṯemziḏa n Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Ayṯ-Birya niṯni ḥsen zeg Ayṯ-Salunik, qebbȓen awaȓ n Arebbi ḏeɣya s ȓefraḥeṯ. Qqaren ḏi Lkutub kuȓ nhar bac aḏ ssnen awaȓ nni iy qqaren Bulus ḏ Silas ma ḏ ṣṣaḥ niɣ lla.
Umnen aṭṭas zzaysen. Umnent xarebbi n ṯemɣarin ṯiyunaniyin ɣarsent lmartaba, umnen ƹaweḏ aṭṭas n iyunaniyen.
Israʼiliyen nni ḏi ṯendint n Salunik arrin-d ȓexbar Bulus itbeccar s wawaȓ n Arebbi ḏi ṯendint n Birya. Usin-d ɣar Birya bḏan teggen ixarwiḍen shajen xas ȓɣaci.
Ȓexddenni ayṯmaṯneɣ ssekken Bulus ɣar ȓebḥar, iqqim Silas ḏ Timutawus ḏi ṯendint n Birya.
Iryazen nni iy ruḥen ak Bulus ssiwḍen-ṯ ɣar ṯendint n Utina ssenni ḏewȓen-d. Iweṣṣa-ṯen Bulus inna-asen: Inim-asen i Silas ḏ Timutawus araḥem-d ɣari ḏeɣya.
Bulus wami tuɣa itraja Silas ḏ Timutawus ḏi ṯendint nni n Utina itwaȓa ṯandint nni ṯƹemmar s lʼaṣnamaṯ war ḏas iƹjib bu ȓḥaȓ.
Itemnaqac ḏi ṯemziḏa ak israʼiliyen ḏ inneɣni iteggwḏen Arebbi, itemnaqac ƹaweḏ ak yinni iy keḏ itemseȓqa kuȓ nhar ḏi ssaḥa n ṯendint.

Can n lfalasifa umi qqaren ibikuriyen ḏ can lfalasifa nneɣni umi qqaren iriwaqiyen bḏan temnaqacen ak Bulus nnan ȓebƹaḍ zzaysen, min ixes aḏ yini wanita itpeȓpiȓen waha? Nnan yiwḏan nneɣni imken itbeccar s arebbiṯen n dduwal. Nnan manaya minzi Bulus itbeccar s Ƹisa ḏ lqiyama.
Uwin Bulus nedhen-ṯ ɣar lmajlis nsen umi qqaren Aryubagus nnan-as: "Nrezzu a nessen ttaƹlim-a n jḏiḏ iy zi ṯseȓmaḏeḏ cek.
Ṯimesȓayin-a netƹejjeb ḏaysent, ƹemmarṣ war nesȓi x min ṯeqqareḏ cek. Nexs a nessen ȓmaƹna nsent."
(Iwa marra imezḏaɣ n Utina niɣ ḏ ȓbarrani iy ḏayes izeḏɣen sƹeddun marra ȓweqṯ nsen ḏeg wawaȓ niɣ ḏeg uṣenneṭ n can ȓḥajeṯ ḏ jḏiḏ.)
Ȓexddenni ibedd Bulus ḏi ȓwesṭ n lmajlis inna-asen: "Ay iryazen n Utina, nec twaȓiɣ kenniw ṯceɣȓem aṭṭas ḏi ddin.

Axmi tsariɣ nec, xezzareɣ mliḥ ḏi zzawyaṯ nwem mani ṯƹebbḏem. Ẓriɣ ḏinni ijjen n ȓmeḏbaḥ urint ḏayes ṯira, ṯira nni qqarent: Arebbi nni iy war itwassnen ca. Cuf, Arebbi nni iy ṯƹebbḏem kenniw war ṯ ṯessinem ca, aḏawem iniɣ nec min iƹna.
