Ixȓeq-d ddunect-a ḏ marra min ḏayes, netta ḏ Siḏi Arebbi n ujenna ḏ ṯmurṯ. War izeddeɣ ca ḏi zzawyaṯ nni ig bennan yiwḏan s ifassen nsen.
War xas tsexxiren ca ifassen n bnaḏem, netta war iteḥḏiji walu. Ḏ netta iy d iticcen i marra iwḏan ṯuḏarṯ ḏ buḥbeȓ ḏ marra ṯimesȓayin nneɣni.
Zeg yijjen n bnaḏem iy zi d ixȓeq marra ȓegnus bac aḏ zeḏɣen ḏi ddunect-a amen-ṯekmaȓ. Iḥedd-asen nhuraṯ n ttarix nsen ḏ mani iy ɣa zeḏɣen.
Igga-asen ammu Arebbi ḥima iwḏan axas rzun aɣares swizzḏen s ifassen nsen aṯ afen. Innama, netta kuȓ ijjen zzayneɣ war xas iggwij ca.
Zzayes netta iy neddar, zzayes netta iy ntenhezza, zzayes netta iy neǧa. Mammec nnan uȓa ḏ ȓebƹaḍ n ccuƹaraʼ nwem qa neccin ḏ ṯarwa nnes.

Cuf, neccin meȓa ḏ ṯarwa n Arebbi, itxeṣṣa-yaneɣ war netfekkir ca belli wenni yuƹȓan qa netta am ddheb niɣ am nnuqarṯ niɣ am uzru. Arebbi war iǧi ca ḏ lʼaṣnam ig itṣennaƹ bnaḏem s lfikra nnes ḏ ṯzemmar nnes.
Manaya Arebbi war t yuwi ca ḏi zman n ȓeqfaȓeṯ, walakin ȓexxu yumar marra iwḏan ḏi mkuȓ amcan bac aḏ tuben.
Mayemmi? Arebbi izemmem ijjen n nhar iy ḏi ɣa iḥaseb marra iwḏan s ȓḥaqq x ufus n bnaḏem nni ig ixḍar. Yuca-asen ddalil i marra iwḏan x manaya wami ṯiḏ isekkar zi ȓmewṯ."
Yina wami tesȓan x yiwḏan aḏ d kkaren zi ȓmewṯ ḏi Lqiyama ḍeḥcen ȓebƹaḍ xasen, walakin ȓebƹaḍ nneɣni nnan-as qa neccin nexs aḏac nṣenneṭ ṯwaȓa nneɣni x manaya.
Ssenni iffeɣ Bulus zi ȓwesṭ nsen.
Ȓebƹaḍ zzaysen umnen munen ak Bulus. Zzaysen Diyunisyus zi lmajlis n Aryubagus ḏ yijjen n ṯemɣarṯ qqaren-as Damaris ḏ inneɣni akiḏsen.
Menbaƹd iffeɣ Bulus zi ṯendint n Utina iruḥ ɣar ṯendint n Kurinṯ.
Mkuȓ nhar n ssebṯ n lƹibada Bulus itemnaqac ak Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏ iyunaniyen ḏi ṯemziḏa bac aṯen iseqneƹ.
Wami d ixḍeȓ Silas ḏ Timutawus zi lʼiqlim n Masidunya, ibḏa Bulus ixeddem ɣir s ttebcir u ṣafi, icehheḏ i Ayṯ-Israʼil belli Ƹisa netta ḏ Lmasiḥ.

Wami bḏan tƹarraḍen-as tbuṣaren xas, imseḥ arruḍ nnes am yijjen n chaḏeṯ xasen inna-asen: "Iḏammen nwem x yirawen nwem, qa nec tberriɣ azeǧif inu zzaywem. Ssa aȓ ṯsawent aḏ raḥeɣ ɣar yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil."
Iffeɣ-d ssenni iruḥ ɣar ṯeddarṯ n yijjen n uryaz iƹebbḏen Arebbi qqaren-as Titus Yustus, ṯaddarṯ nnes aqat ṭṭarf i ṯemziḏa nni.
Ȓefqih n ṯemziḏa nni qqaren-as Krispus, yumen s Siḏiṯneɣ netta ḏ marra ȓeḥbab nnes. Xarebbi n yiwḏan zi ṯendint n Kurinṯ wami sȓin i wawaȓ n Bulus, umnen twaṭehharen s waman.
Ijjen n ǧiȓeṯ yuḥa-yas-d Siḏi Arebbi i Bulus inna-as: "War teggweḏ ca, siweȓ war stuka ca.
Nec aqayi akiḏec, cek war c itḍarri ḥadd zeg yinni xak d ɣa ihejmen minzi nec ɣari aṭṭas n ccaƹb inu ḏi ṯendint-a."
Iqqim ḏinni Bulus ƹam u sett-chur iseȓmaḏ netta awaȓ n Arebbi i yiwḏan.
Walakin ḏi ȓweqṯ nni n Galyun lƹamil n lʼiqlim n Uxaya, munen israʼiliyen hejmen x Bulus uwin-ṯ ɣar lmaḥkama.
Nnan aryaz-a isqenneƹ iwḏan aḏ ƹebḏen Arebbi ḍed i ȓqanun.
Wami ƹȓayen aḏ issiweȓ Bulus ikkar lƹamil Galyun inna-asen i israʼiliyen nni: "Maƹlik ṯceṯcam x can n ccarr niɣ x can n ljarima ḏ ṯaƹeffant, ataf ɣarwem ȓḥaqq aɣarwem ṣennṭeɣ.
Walakin manaya ḏ lxilaf jarawem kenniw ḏeg wawaȓen ḏ yisemawen ḏ ccariƹa nwem. Ḥellem manaya nniṯ jarawem. Bȓa ma aḏ iȓiɣ nec ḏ ȓqaḍi x ṯmesȓayin-a jarawem."
Ssenni yuzzeȓ-d xasen zi lmaḥkama.
Kkaren marra iḏsen ṭṭfen Sastin ȓefqi n ṯemziḏa n Ayṯ-Israʼil uwṯin-ṯ zzaṯ i lmaḥkama. Galyun netta war ṯ icqi ca manayenni qaƹ.

Iqqim ƹaḏ Bulus aṭṭas n wussan ḏi ṯendint n Kurinṯ. Ssenni imsafaḍ x ayṯmas ḏinni, inya ḏeg uɣarrabu iruḥ ɣar Surya akiḏes Priskila ḏ Wakilas. Tuɣa iḥeff Bulus acewwaf nnes ḏi ȓemwiyi umi qqaren Kanɣarya minzi tuɣa xas ȓƹaheḏ iy igga ak Siḏi Arebbi.
Uwḍen ɣar ṯendint n Ufasus, ijja Bulus ḏinni Priskila ḏ Wakilas, ssenni yuḏef ɣar ṯemziḏa bac aḏ imnaqac ak israʼiliyen.
Ttaren zzayes israʼiliyen-a aḏ iqqim ƹaḏ ktar walakin netta yugi.
Wami xasen imsafaḍ inna-asen qa meȓa ixes Arebbi, ƹaḏ aḏ d ƹeqbeɣ. Ssenni inya ḏeg uɣarrabu iffeɣ zi ṯendint nni n Ufasus.
Wami yuweḍ ɣar ṯendint n Qayṣariya, igaƹƹeḏ ɣar Lquds iseǧem x jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin, ssenni yuyur ɣar ṯendint n Wanṭakya.
Wami iy ḏayes ikka can ȓweqṯ, iffeɣ iƹḏu ḏi jwayeh n Galaṭya ḏ jwayeh n Frijya itegg uȓ ḏeg imeḥḍaren nni iy iǧan ḏinni marra.
Ijjen n uʼisraʼili qqaren-as Apulus netta ixȓeq ḏi ṯendint n Iskandariya, yusa-d ɣar ṯendint n Ufasus. Netta ifsus ḏeg wawaȓ iɣra aṭṭas ḏi Lkutub.
Aryaz-a iȓmeḏ x ubriḏ n Siḏiṯneɣ, issawaȓ s jjheḏ ḏ ameqqran, iseȓmaḏ nican x Ƹisa. Walakin issen ɣir x uṭehhar nni n waman ig isexḏem nnabi Yaḥya.
Ibḏa issawaȓ ḏi ṯemziḏa n Ayṯ-Israʼil s zƹameṯ. Sȓin-as Priskila ḏ Wakilas, uwin-ṯ akiḏsen ɣar ṯeddarṯ nsen bḏan sfehhamen-ṯ ḥsen x ubriḏ n Arebbi.

Wami ixes Apulus aḏ isafer ɣar lʼiqlim n Uxaya, cejjƹen-ṯ ayṯmas urin-asen ijjen n ṯebrat i imeḥḍaren nni n ḏinni bac azzayes reḥben. Wami yuweḍ ɣar lʼiqlim nni iƹawen aṭṭas yinni yumnen s arḍa n Arebbi.
Liʼanna netta itemnaqac s jjheḏ ak israʼiliyen zzaṯ i yiwḏan, niṯni war zemmaren ca aṯ jawben nican minzi isbeyyen-asen-d awaȓen zi Lkutub belli netta Ƹisa ḏ Lmasiḥ.
Apulus wami iǧa ḏi ṯendint n Kurinṯ ḏi lʼiqlim n Uxaya, ikkar arrasul Bulus ikka x ubriḏ n iḏurar yuweḍ ɣar ṯendint n Ufasus. Yufa ḏinni can imeḥḍaren
inna-asen: "Ma ihwa-d xawem Arruḥ iqeddsen wami ṯumnem?" Nnan-as: "Lla, neccin ƹemmarṣ war xas nesȓi ca x Arruḥ iqeddsen."
Inna-asen: "Mammec ṯeggim wami ṯetwaṭehharem s waman?" Nnan-as: "Neccin netwaṭehhar s waman ƹlaḥsab mammec ixeddem nnabi Yaḥya."
Inna-asen Bulus: "Qa Yaḥya itṭehhar s waman i yinni ituben, iqqar-asen amneṯ zeg wenni iy d ɣa yasen menbaƹd i nec, iƹni Ƹisa."
Sȓin i manaya ruḥen twaṭehharen s waman ƹlaḥsab isem n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa.
Wami xasen isers Bulus ifassen nnes, ihwa-d xasen Arruḥ iqeddsen. Bḏan ssawaȓen s lluɣaṯ war iǧin bu nsen, ssawaȓen s minzi ƹeȓmen zi Arebbi.
Iryazen nni niṯni can ṯenƹac iḏsen.
Ssenni Bulus yuḏef ɣar ṯemziḏa n Ayṯ-Israʼil, issawaȓ ḏinni s zƹameṯ can n ṯeȓt-chur. Itemnaqac akiḏsen bac aṯen iseqneƹ x ȓmulk n Arebbi.

Ȓebƹaḍ zzaysen ṭṭfen akiḏes ṯaɣennant ugin aḏ amnen, tukkaren ḏi ttaƹlim n Siḏiṯneɣ zzaṯ i yiwḏan. Ssenni iffeɣ-d Bulus zi ṯemziḏa nni yuwi akiḏes imeḥḍaren nnes, kuȓ nhar iseȓmaḏ-iṯen ḏi lmarkez n Tirannus.
Iqqim Bulus itegg manayenni ƹamayen. Marra imezḏaɣ n lʼiqlim n Asya sȓin i wawaȓ n Siḏi Arebbi, Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏ iyunaniyen s ṯnayen iḏsen.
Arebbi itegg lmuƹjizaṯ ḏ ṯimeqqranin x ufus n Bulus.
Iwḏan kessin ȓezyuf ḏ ṯibantiwin tḥaḏan zzaysent Bulus srusan-ṯent x imehȓac. Ȓexddenni ȓehȓacaṯ nni tgenfan, ƹaweḏ teffɣen zzaysen jnun nni iƹeffanen iy ḏaysen.

Ḏinni can israʼiliyen niṯni ḏ iseḥḥaren traḥen zeg umcan ɣar umcan. Tjarraben aḏ sxeḏmen isem n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa bac aḏ sufɣen jnun iƹeffanen zeg yiwḏan. Nnan-asen qa tʼamareɣ-kenniw ƹlaḥsab isem n Ƹisa iy zi itḥeddaṯ Bulus, ffɣeṯ!
Amenni iy teggen ijjen n sebƹa n ṯarwa n yijjen n uʼisraʼili qqaren-as Skiba, netta zi arruyas n ȓfuqaha.
Ijjen n nhar indeq-d jjenn nni aƹeffan inna-asen qa nec ssneɣ Ƹisa min iƹna, ssneɣ Bulus min iƹna, kenniw min ṯeƹnam?
Ȓexddenni inḍew xasen uryaz nni iy ḏi iǧa jjenn aƹeffan iɣeȓb-iṯen marra ijheḏ xasen. Arewȓen zi ṯeddarṯ nni ḏ iƹaryanen jarrḥen.
Arrin-asen-d ȓexbar marra imezḏaɣ n Ufasus, iƹni Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏ iyunaniyen s ṯnayen iḏsen. Ṯeȓqef-iṯen ṯiggwḏi uca itwasemɣar isem n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa aṭṭas.
Usin-d aṭṭas zeg yinni iy yumnen ȓexxu, ȓexḏayem nsen iy tuɣa ggin ṯiƹeffanin ƹtarfen zzaysent.
Aṭṭas n yiwḏan tuɣa ggin ssḥur uwin-d lkutub nsen sḥarrqen-ṯen ɣar barra zzaṯ i kuȓci. Wami ḥesben ttaman n lkutub nni, ufin xemsin aȓaf n dinar.
Amenni awaȓ n Siḏi Arebbi itentacer yarenni ɣares jjheḏ aṭṭas.
Menbaƹd i manaya, iƹewweȓ Bulus aḏ isafer ɣar Lquds, aḏ ikk x lʼiqlim n Masidunya ḏ lʼiqlim n Uxaya. Inna: Xmi ɣa awḍeɣ ḏinni, itxeṣṣa-ayi ƹaweḏ aḏ raḥeɣ ɣar ṯendint n Ruma!
Issekk ɣar Masidunya ṯnayen zeg yinni iy ṯ itƹawanen ijjen qqaren-as Timutawus ijjen qqaren-as Arisṭus, netta Bulus iqqim ijjen n ȓweqṯ ḏi lʼiqlim n Asya.
Ḏi ȓweqṯ nni ṯewqeƹ ijjen n ȓfawḍa ṯemɣar x ssabab n ubriḏ n Siḏiṯneɣ.

Ḏinni ijjen n uryaz qqaren-as Dimitriyus. Netta iḍebbaƹ nnuqarṯ, itṣennaƹ munikuṯ s nnuqarṯ itemcabbahen ḏi zzawyiṯ n lʼaṣnam umi qqaren Ṯarṭamist. Dimitriyus-a isrebbaḥ aṭṭas yina itṣennaƹen munikuṯ-a.
Iȓaɣa-d x yinni ixeddmen ḏi manayenni ḏ yinni itṣennaƹen ṯimesȓayin nneɣni amenni. Inna-asen: "Ay iryazen, ṯessnem belli nrebbeḥ aṭṭas n tmenyaṯ ḏi ṣṣenƹaṯ-a.

Aqa twaȓam tesȓam Bulus-a isqenneƹ aṭṭas n yiwḏan ḏi ṯendint-a n Ufasus ƹȓayen uȓa ḏi marra lʼiqlim n Asya, isufuɣ-iṯen zeg ubriḏ nneɣ. Iqqar-aneɣ qa l'aṣnam-a itwaṣenƹen s ifassen qa war ǧin ca ḏ arebbiṯen.

Xaṭar manaya x ṣṣenƹaṯ nneɣ ataf war ɣares bu lqima. Xaṭar ƹaweḏ uȓa x zzawyiṯ ṯameqqrant n arebbi nneɣ Ṯarṭamist ataf aḏ tneqḍeƹ. Ataf nettaṯ ƹaweḏ imken war ḏayes tɣimi lƹaḍama nnes qaƹ, ṯanita iy ƹebbḏen imezḏaɣ n lʼiqlim-a n Asya marra ḏ ddunect amen-ṯekmaȓ."
Wami sȓin i wawaȓ-a, ɣeḍben aṭṭas snekkaren ṯɣuyyeṯ qqaren Ṯarṭamist n Ayṯ-Ufasus mecḥaȓ ṯemɣar!

Ṯewqeƹ ijjen n ȓfawḍa ḏ ṯameqqrant ḏi ṯendint nni amen-ṯekmaȓ. Munen yiwḏan-a uzzȓen ɣar furbu jarren akiḏsen ṯnayen n imeddukaȓ n Bulus iy kiḏes itsafaren, ijjen qqaren-as Ɣayus ijjen qqaren-as Aristarxus, niṯni zi Ayṯ-Masidunya.
Irezzu Bulus aḏ iḥḍar zzaṯ i ȓɣaci nni, war ṯ jjin ca imeḥḍaren nnes.
Ḥetta can n imxazniyen ḏ imeqqranen zi lʼiqlim nni n Asya iy ǧan ḏ imeddukaȓ n Bulus ssekken ɣares ttaren zzayes nnan-as war traḥ ca ɣar furbu nni.
Mxarwaḍen marra iwḏan iy ḏinni imunen, snekkaren ṯɣuyyeṯ kuȓ ijjen min iqqar. Azyen ameqqran war issin mixef ḏin munen.

Ḏinni jar ȓɣaci nni ijjen n bnaḏem qqaren-as Iskander. Ƹanen-ṯ israʼiliyen ɣar zzaṯ, ȓaɣan-as-d ȓebƹaḍ zzaysen ḥima aḏ issiweȓ. Itceyyar-asen i ȓɣaci nni s ifassen irezzu aṯen isbedd bac aḏ iḏafeƹ s yijjen n wawaȓ.
Wami ẓrin ȓɣaci nni netta ḏ aʼisraʼili, munen marra iḏsen can ṯnayen n ṯsaƹƹaṯin snekkaren ṯɣuyyeṯ nnan Ṯarṭamist n Ayṯ-Ufasus mecḥaȓ ṯemɣar!

Yusa-d naʼib n lḥakem n ṯendint ihedden ȓɣaci nni inna-asen: "Ay iryazen n Ufasus, ma ḏinni ca ḥadd iy war issinen ca belli ṯandint-a n Ufasus ḏ nettaṯ iy iḥeṭṭan zzawyiṯ n Ṯarṭamist ṯameqqrant ḏ uzru nnes amqeddes iy d iwḍan zeg ujenna?
Manaya war ḏayes bu ccekk. Iḏen itxeṣṣa kenniw aḏ theddnem, war xeddmeṯ ca bȓa ȓaƹqeȓ.
Ṯuwim-d ḏanita iryazen-a, war xewwnen ca zzawyaṯ war nnin bu ȓƹib ḏi arebbi nneɣ.
Meȓa ixes Dimitriyus ḏ yinni iy kiḏes itṣennaƹen nnuqarṯ aḏ ceṯcan x can yijjen, aqa lmaḥkama mujud u lƹamil mujud aḏ raḥen aḏ ceṯcan s ȓqanun.
Meȓa ɣarwem ca uceṯci nneɣni, axas ḥekmen ḏi lmajlis n ṯendint.
Ȓexxu aqaneɣ ḏi lxaṭar a netwaḥkem marra iḏneɣ x ȓfawḍa itewqiƹen nhara, neccin war ɣarneɣ bu can n ssabab x ssdaƹ-a."
Wami inna awaȓ-a issekk yinni imunen aḏ rewwḥen.
Ṯkemmeȓ ȓfawḍa nni, menbaƹd Bulus iȓaɣa-d x imeḥḍaren icejjeƹ-iṯen. Ssenni imsafaḍ xasen, iruḥ isafer ɣar lʼiqlim n Masidunya.
Itcejjaƹ imeḥḍaren ḏinni s waṭṭas n wawaȓen. Wami iƹḏu ḏi jwayeh nni, yuweḍ ɣar Lyunan
ikka ḏinni ṯeȓt-chur. Wami ƹȓayen aḏ iney Bulus ḏeg uɣarrabu aḏ iraḥ ɣar Surya, ciṭṭnen israʼiliyen bac aṯ nɣen. X manaya netta igga aḏ iƹqeb x ubriḏ n Masidunya.
Isafer akiḏes Supatrus mmis n Piru zi ṯendint n Birya, ḏ Aristarxus ḏ Sakundus niṯni zi ṯendint n Salunik, ḏ Ɣayus zi ṯendint n Dirba, ḏ Timutawus ḏ Tuciq ḏ Trifumu niṯni zi lʼiqlim n Asya.
Yina izwaren-aneɣ trajan-aneɣ ḏi ṯendint n Traws.
Wami iƹḏu Ȓƹiḏ n Ṯefḍirṯ, nenya ḏeg uɣarrabu neffeɣ zi ṯendint n Filippi. Menbaƹd i xemsiyyam neḏfar-iṯen ɣar ṯendint n Traws, neqqim ḏinni sebƹiyyam.
Ḏeg wass amezwaru n simana nmun neccin a necc aɣrum, issiweȓ Bulus ak yiwḏan. Iqqim issawaȓ aȓ uzyen n ǧiȓeṯ minzi ṯiwecca nnes inwa aḏ isafer.
Ḏinni aṭṭas n ȓeqnaḏeȓ ḏi ṯɣurfat nni mani nmun.
Ḏinni ijjen n uḥenjir qqaren-as Yutikus iqqim netta x ṯenharṯ n ṯburjat. Iȓha Bulus itemharwaḍ, aḥenjir nni iṭṭef-iṯ yiḍeṣ iɣelleb xas yiḍeṣ nni uca iwḍa zi ṯȓaṯa n ṭṭbaqaṯ aȓ ṯmurṯ ufin-ṯ immuṯ.
Ihwa-d Bulus yuḍaȓ ɣares iysi-iṯ-iḏ s ifassen. Inna-asen: War teggwḏem ca, aqa iƹqeb-as-d buḥbeȓ nnes.
Iruḥ Bulus igaƹƹeḏ sennej, irza aɣrum icca. Issiweȓ aṭṭas aȓ wami ḏ ȓefjar ikkar yuyur.
Iwḏan nni twacejjƹen aṭṭas wami aḥenjir nni srewwḥen-ṯ iddar.
Itafeq Bulus akiḏneɣ bac neccin a nsafer ɣar ṯendint n Wassus ḏeg uɣarrabu netta aḏ d yas x iḍaren, menbaƹd a nemseȓqa ḏinni aṯ nesney akiḏneɣ ḏeg uɣarrabu.
Wami xaneɣ d iḥreṯ ḏi ṯendint n Wassus, nesney-iṯ-iḏ akiḏneɣ ḏeg uɣarrabu nruḥ ɣar ṯendint n Mitilini.
Ssenni nsafer ḏeg uɣarrabu, ṯiwecca nnes nuweḍ ɣar ṯeyzirṯ n Kiyus. Wis ṯeȓtiyyam nuweḍ zzaṯ i ṯeyzirṯ n Samus. Wis arbeƹiyyam nuweḍ ɣar ṯendint n Militus.
Wami ɣares d usin imeqqanen nni inna-asen: "Kenniw qa ṯessnem mammec tƹiceɣ marra ȓweqṯ nni iy tuɣa akiḏwem qqimeɣ, zi nhar nni amezwaru iy d uḏfeɣ ɣar Asya.
Xeddmeɣ i Siḏi Arebbi bȓa ttakebbur, s imeṭṭawen inu kkint xafi ȓemḥayen wami xayi ciṭṭnen israʼiliyen.
War zzaywem snuffareɣ walu, nec txebbareɣ-kenniw s marra min kenniw ɣa inefƹen. Seȓmaḏeɣ-awem-ṯ zzaṯ i yiwḏan u ƹaweḏ zi ṯeddarṯ ɣar ṯeddarṯ.
Ƹeǧmeɣ i israʼiliyen ḏ iyunaniyen bac aḏ tuben ɣar Arebbi aḏ amnen s Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa.
Nec nhara ggureɣ ɣar ṯendint n Lquds ḏ Arruḥ iy ḏayi itawin ḏinni, war ssineɣ min ḏayi ɣa iweqƹen.
Innama, ḏi mkuȓ ṯendint iƹeǧem-ayi-d Arruḥ iqeddsen qa itraja-ayi ȓeḥbes ḏ tamara.
Walakin war ticceɣ bu lhimma i ṯuḏarṯ inu. Nec aḏ kemmȓeɣ minxef d usiɣ ḏ ȓxeḏmeṯ iy zi ḏayi ikellef Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa, iƹni aḏ cehḏeɣ x L'injil n arḍa n Arebbi.
Ȓexxu kenniw umi beccareɣ s ȓmulk n Arebbi ssneɣ nec belli uȓa ḏ ijjen zzaywem ma aḏ iẓer aɣembub inu ssa aȓ ṯsawent.
X manaya qqareɣ-awem nec zi nhara tberriɣ ixef inu zeg iḏammen nwem marra.
Liʼanna nec war zzaywem snuffareɣ walu zi marra min inewwa Arebbi aṯ igg.
Ḥḍaṯ ixef nwem. Ḥḍaṯ ṯḥimerṯ nwem, ṯenni iy zi kenniw ikellef Arruḥ iqeddsen. Arewseṯ jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin n Arebbi qa netta iseɣ-it s iḏammen nnes.
Cuf, ssneɣ xmi ɣa uyureɣ nec aḏ d aḏfen jarawem can n wuccanen iwƹaren war reḥḥmen ca ṯḥimerṯ.
Ƹaweḏ zzaywem aḏ d meḍharen can iṯarrasen aḏ sƹewwjen lḥaqiqa ḥima aḏ jarren ɣarsen imeḥḍaren.
Iwa iȓiṯ ƹlabal! War tettum ca nec ṯeȓt-snin iy kiḏwem kkiɣ, qqimeɣ tweṣṣiɣ mkuȓ ijjen zzaywem ǧiȓeṯ ḏ wass s imeṭṭawen inu.
Ay ayṯma, ȓexxu axawem weddiɣ, iȓiṯ ag Arebbi ḏ wawaȓen n arḍa nnes. Awaȓen-a ḏaysen ṯizemmar aḏawem ucen jjheḏ aḏawem ucen ȓwarṯ ak marra ȓmuminin ṣṣaliḥin.
Nec ƹemmarṣ war ḍmiƹeɣ i yixef inu can n ddheb niɣ ḏ nnuqarṯ niɣ ḏ warruḍ n can ḥadd.
Kenniw ṯessnem nec tuɣa xeḏmeɣ s ifassen inu bac aɣari yiȓi min ḥḏajeɣ nec ḏ min ḥḏajen yinni akiḏi.
S marra manaya smeḍhareɣ-awem-d mammec itxeṣṣa-yaneɣ a nexḏem mliḥ bac a nƹawen yinni iḥḏajen. A nfekkar ḏeg wawaȓ n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa iy inna: Ssaƹḏ n wenni iticcen ktar zeg wenni iqebbȓen."
Wami inna Bulus ṯimesȓayin-a, irkeƹ x ifadden ḏ yinni marra netta iẓẓuǧ.
Ḏerrƹen-as i Bulus bḏan tseǧamen xas, trun marra iḏsen.
Xeyyqen aṭṭas s wawaȓ nni iy ḏasen inna war ṯẓerrem ca aɣembub inu ssa aȓ ṯsawent. Ssenni uwin-ṯ ɣar uɣarrabu.
Wami xasen d nuyur ssenni, nenya ḏeg uɣarrabu nruḥ nican ɣar ṯeyzirṯ n Kus. Ṯiwecca nnes nuweḍ ɣar ṯeyzirṯ n Rudus. Ssenni nuyur ɣar ṯendint n Batara.
Nufa ḏinni ijjen n uɣarrabu itraḥ ɣar jwayeh n Finiqya, nenya ḏayes nuyur.
Ṯmeḍhar-aneɣ-d ṯeyzirṯ n Qubruṣ x uẓeȓmaḍ nneɣ. Neƹḏu-t, nruḥ ɣar Surya neḍra ḏi ṯendint n Ṣur minzi aɣarrabu itxeṣṣa aḏ isers sseȓƹaṯ ḏinni.
Wami nerzu x imeḥḍaren, nufi-ṯen ḏinni neqqim akiḏsen sebƹiyyam. Ƹlaḥsab min ƹeȓmen niṯni zi Arruḥ, qqaren-as i Bulus war tgaƹƹaḏ ca cek ɣar ṯendint n Lquds.

Wami ḏaneɣ ṯeqḍa ḏinni ȓweqṯ nneɣ nekkar neffeɣ bac a nsiɣi x usafar nneɣ. Marra imeḥḍaren ruḥen akiḏneɣ ɣar barra n ṯendint s ṯemɣarin nsen ḏ ṯarwa nsen, nerkeƹ x ifadden nneɣ x yijḏi n ȓebḥar neẓẓuǧ.
Wami nemsafaḍ xasen nenya ḏeg uɣarrabu, niṯni rewwḥen ɣar ṯuḏrin nsen.
Ssenni nsiɣi x usafar nneɣ ḏi ȓebḥar zi ṯendint nni n Ṣur nexḍeȓ ɣar ṯendint n Baṭlaymus. Nseǧem x ayṯmaṯneɣ ḏinni, neqqim akiḏsen ijjen n nhar.
Ṯiwecca nnes nruḥ ɣar ṯendint n Qayṣariya nuḏef neqqim ḏi ṯeddarṯ n lmubcir Filippas. Netta ḏ ijjen zi sebƹa n ṣṣaḥaba n arrusul n Lquds.
Netta ɣares arbeƹa n ṯḥenjirin ḏ ṯiƹzriyin ssawaȓent s min ƹeǧment zi Arebbi.
Wami neqqim akiḏsen can wussan, yusa-d ɣarneɣ ijjen n nnabi zi Yahuḏiya qqaren-as Ɣabus.

Iqarreb-d ɣarneɣ iysi aḥezzam n Bulus, icedd iḍaren ḏ ifassen i yixef nnes inna: "Iqqar Arruḥ iqeddsen: Ammu israʼiliyen n Lquds aḏ qqnen bab n uḥezzam-a, aṯ sellmen i yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil."
Neccin ḏ yiwḏan wami nesȓa manaya nḥeccem Bulus bac war itriḥ ca ɣar ṯendint n Lquds.
Inna-aneɣ: "Min kenniw yuɣin? Mayemmi iy ḏayi ṯeḥfarem ḏeg wuȓ s imeṭṭawen nwem? Nec aqayi mujud maci aḏayi qqnen waha. Nec aqayi mujud aḏ mmṯeɣ ḏi Lquds ƹlaḥsab isem n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa!"
Wami nufa neccin war ṯ nseqniƹ ca, nesqar nenna: Min ixes Siḏi Arebbi aṯ igg ḏ wenni netta!
Menbaƹd ȓexddenni, nsewjeḏ ixef nneɣ a ngaƹƹeḏ ɣar ṯendint n Lquds.
Uwin-aneɣ can n imeḥḍaren zi ṯendint n Qayṣariya bac a nnewjew ɣar yijjen n bnaḏem qqaren-as Mnasun netta zi ṯendint n Qubruṣ. Netta zeg imeḥḍaren imezwura.
Wami nuweḍ ɣar Lquds, reḥḥben zzayneɣ ayṯmaṯneɣ s ȓefraḥeṯ.
Ṯiwecca nnes yuḏef akiḏneɣ Bulus ɣar arrasul Yaƹqub, ḥḍaren ḏinni marra imeqqranen n jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin.
Iseǧem xasen Bulus, iƹaweḏ-asen ṯa s ṯa inna-asen min igga Arebbi x ufus nnes jar yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Wami sȓin i manayenni, ḥemḏen Arebbi nnan-as i Bulus: "Cuf ay umaṯneɣ mecḥaȓ n uȓufaṯ n israʼiliyen iy yumnen! Marra iḏsen rezzun aḏ ggen lwajib ƹlaḥsab ccariƹa nneɣ.
Itwanna-yasen zaƹma cek ṯseȓmaḏeḏ marra israʼiliyen iy zeddɣen ḏi lxarij aḏ semḥen ḏi Musa, ṯeqqareḏ-asen war ṭehhareṯ ca i ṯarwa nwem, war ḏeffareṯ ca lƹadaṯ nneɣ.
Bȓa ccekk aḏ sȓen qa cek illa ṯusiḏ-d. Iwa, mammec ɣa negg?
Iḏen, min ḏac ɣa nini egg-iṯ. Cuf, ɣarneɣ arbeƹa n iryazen ggin ȓƹaheḏ ak Siḏi Arebbi.

Awi yina xeǧes xasen axmi ɣa ṯeggem marra kenniw ȓuḍu nni aṣebḥan bac niṯni aḏ ḥeffen aḏ ḏewȓen ḏ iqeccura. Ammu aḏ ssnen marra min xak itwannan war iǧi bu ḏ ṣṣaḥ. Cek s yixef nnec ṯḏeffareḏ ccariƹa nneɣ.
Walakin ƹlaḥsab ȓmuminin nni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil, nura-yasen ṯabrat numar-iṯen aḏ beƹƹḏen x lmakla itwaqeddmen i lʼaṣnam, ḏ iḏammen, ḏ min itwajeyyfen, ḏ lfasad."

Ṯiwecca nnes yuwi Bulus iryazen nni akiḏes, igga ȓuḍu nni aṣebḥan akiḏsen. Yuḏef ɣar ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant aḏ iƹȓem ȓfuqaha x ȓweqṯ iy ḏi ɣa kemmȓen nhuraṯ nni iqqimen x uṣeffi nsen, iƹni ȓweqṯ iy ɣa qeddmen ȓfuqaha dbiḥaṯ i arbeƹa-ya.
Wami ƹȓayen aḏ kemmȓen sebƹa nni n nhuraṯ n ȓuḍu, can israʼiliyen zi lʼiqlim n Asya ẓrin Bulus ḏi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant samaren xas marra ȓɣaci nni temzaḥamen xas.

Snekkaren ṯɣuyyeṯ qqaren: "Ay iryazen n Ayṯ-Israʼil! Qa aryaz-a wenni iseȓmaḏen iwḏan marra ḏi mkuȓ amcan irezzu aḏ ƹarrḍen ccaƹb nneɣ ḏ ccariƹa nneɣ ḏ umcan-a nneɣ! Ƹaweḏ isiḏef-d iyunaniyen ɣar ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant, isexnaz amcan-a muqeddes."
Nnan manayenni minzi tuɣa ẓrin akiḏes ḏi ṯendint ijjen n bnaḏem qqaren-as Trifumu zi Ayṯ-Ufasus, itɣiȓ-asen Bulus isiḏef-iṯ ɣar ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant.
Ṯekkar ȓfawḍa ḏi ṯendint marra. Kkaren yiwḏan nni uzzȓen ɣar Bulus ṭṭfen-ṯ, jarren-ṯ zi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant ɣar barra ȓexddenni bellƹen ṯiwwura.
Wami rezzun aṯ nɣen, yuweḍ ȓexbar ɣar arrayes n ȓƹaskar n arrumanus ṯekkar ijjen n ȓfawḍa ḏi Lquds marra.
Iruḥ netta ḏeɣya yuwi akiḏes ȓƹaskar ḏ imeqqranen nsen yuzzeȓ ɣarsen. Israʼiliyen wami ẓrin arrayes ḏ ȓƹaskar nnes, bedden war qqimen ca ƹaḏ ccaṯen Bulus.
Iqarreb arrayes nni ɣar Bulus iṭṭef-iṯ, yumar aṯ qqnen s ṯnayen n snaseȓ. Isseqsa xas inna-asen: Wanita min iƹna ḏ min igga?
Ȓɣaci nni snekkaren ṯɣuyyeṯ kuȓ ijjen min iqqar. Wami arrayes nni war ifhim ca nican man ssabab n ssdaƹ nni, yumar aṯ siȓin ɣar lqecla.
Wami yuweḍ Bulus ɣar ddruj, arbun-ṯ ȓƹaskar siȓin-ṯ ƹlaḥsab amenɣi nni n yiwḏan.
Minzi ḏeffaren-ṯ snekkaren ṯɣuyyeṯ qqaren ysim xaneɣ wanita!
Wami ƹȓayen aḏ siḏfen Bulus ɣar lqecla nni, inna-as i arrayes n ȓƹaskar: "Smeḥ-ayi ac iniɣ ijjen n wawaȓ." Inna-as arrayes nni i Bulus: "Mammec teggeḏ cek ṯessawaȓeḏ ṯayunaniṯ?
Ma war ṯeǧiḏ ca cek ḏ amiṣri nni iy iggin lfitna ḏi ȓiyyam nni wami ṯsuyureḏ arbeƹaȓaf n lʼirhabiyen ɣar ȓexȓa?"
Inna-as Bulus: "Lla, nec ḏ aʼisraʼili, ljinsiya inu zi ṯendint maƹrufa n Ṭarsus ḏi lʼiqlim n Kilikya. Tettareɣ zzayec aḏayi ṯsemḥeḏ aḏ ssiwȓeɣ ak yiwḏan-a."
Wami iy ṯ ijja arrayes n ȓƹaskar aḏ issiweȓ, ibedd Bulus x ddruj iceyyar-asen s ifassen nnes. Niṯni sqaren, issiweȓ akiḏsen s lluɣa lƹibriya inna-asen:
"Ay ayṯma ay imɣaren, ṣennṭeṯ-ayi mliḥ ȓexxu bac aḏ ḏafƹeɣ x yixef inu!"
Wami sȓin i Bulus issawaȓ s lluɣa lƹibriya uca qeḍƹen ȓḥess. Inna-asen:

"Nec ḏ aʼisraʼili xeȓqeɣ ḏi ṯendint n Ṭarsus ḏi lʼiqlim n Kilikya, walakin nec ymiɣ ḏi ṯendint-a ḏanita. Ɣriɣ ɣar iḍaren n lʼustad Gamlil twarebbiɣ s ccariƹa n ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ mammec ḏaneɣ ṯweṣṣa ṯa s ṯa kuȓci. Rezzuɣ aḏ ggeɣ lwajib ak Arebbi s wuȓ inu mamc ṯrezzum aḏ teggem kenniw marra nhara.
Nec tuɣa tƹeddabeɣ yinni iḏfaren abriḏ-a ḥetta wami mmuṯen. Ṭṭfeɣ iryazen ḏ ṯemɣarin ggiɣ-ṯen ḏi ȓeḥbes.

Arrayes n ȓfuqaha ḏ marra Jmaƹeṯ n imeqqranen n Ayṯ-Israʼil niṯni ḏ ȓechuḏ x manayenni. Ucin-ayi arruxṣaṯ aṯent ssiwḍeɣ ɣar ayṯmaṯsen ḏi ṯendint n Dimaceq. Ruḥeɣ ḏinni aḏ ṭṭfeɣ iwḏan n ubriḏ-a aṯen d awiɣ ɣar Lquds bac aḏ twaƹaqben.
Nec tuɣa ggureɣ ḏeg ubriḏ qarrbeɣ ɣar Dimaceq, tuɣa ƹȓayen ḏ azyen n nhar. Ƹlaɣafla inneḍ-ayi-d ijjen n nnur itceƹciƹ zeg ujenna.
Wḍiɣ ɣar ṯmurṯ sȓiɣ i yijjen n ṯmijja ṯeqqar-ayi-d: A Cawul a Cawul, mayemmi ḏayi tƹeddabeḏ?
Nniɣ-as nec: Min ṯeƹniḏ cek a Siḏi? Inna-ayi Nec ḏ Ƹisa zi Naṣira ḏ wenni iy tƹeddabeḏ.
Yinni kiḏi iǧan ẓrin nnur nni walakin war fhimen ca i ṯmijja n wenni iy kiḏi d issawaȓen.
Nniɣ-as nec: Min ɣa ggeɣ a Siḏi? Inna-ayi Siḏiṯneɣ: Kkar aḏef ɣar Dimaceq, aḏac itwanna ḏinni marra min yurin aḏ teggeḏ.
Nnur nni tuɣa itseqsiq ijheḏ xafi, ḏewȓeɣ war twiȓiɣ walu. Ṭṭfen-ayi zeg ufus inu yinni kiḏi iǧan, ssiwḍen-ayi ɣar Dimaceq.
Inna-ayi: Arebbi n ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ ixḍar-icek netta bac aḏ tessneḏ min ixes, aḏ twaȓiḏ s ṯiṭṭawin nnec axeddam nnes ṣṣaliḥ aḏ tṣennṭeḏ i yijjen n wawaȓ zeg uqemmum nnes.
Cek axas ṯiȓiḏ ḏ ccaheḏ ɣar marra iwḏan ƹlaḥsab min ṯeẓriḏ ḏ min ṯesȓiḏ.
Y ȓexxu min trajiḏ? Kkar aḏ twaṭehhareḏ s waman, sireḏ zi ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nnec xmi ɣa ṯȓaɣiḏ x yisem nnes.
Wami ḏewȓeɣ ɣar ṯendint n Lquds tẓaǧiɣ ḏi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant, ihwa-d xafi ijjen n lwaḥi.
Ẓriɣ Siḏiṯneɣ inna-ayi: Kkar ffeɣ ḏeɣya zi Lquds minzi chaḏeṯ nnec xafi war t qebbȓen ca.
Nniɣ-as: A Siḏi, niṯni ssnen belli tuɣa traḥeɣ zi ṯemziḏa ɣar ṯemziḏa tḥebbaseɣ ccaṯeɣ yinni zzayek yumnen.
Ḥḍareɣ nec wami sizzȓen iḏammen n Stifan wenni xak icehhḏen. Wafqeɣ x ȓmewṯ nnes, ḥḍiɣ-asen uȓa ḏ arruḍ n yinni iy ṯ inɣin.
Inna-ayi Siḏi: Ruḥ, cek ac ssekkeɣ ɣar imucan ggwjen aṭṭas, ɣar yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil."
Sȓin mliḥ i Bulus ḥetta aȓ wami inna awaȓ-a aneggaru. Ȓexddenni snekkaren xas ṯɣuyyeṯ nnan: Mḥaṯ aryaz-a zi ddunect-a, war isḏiheǧ ca aḏ iqqim ƹaḏ iddar!
Snekkaren ṯɣuyyeṯ, neṭṭaren izeǧuba nsen, zzuzzaren ṯaƹejjact ɣar ujenna.
Ikkar arrayes n ȓƹaskar yumar aḏ siḏfen Bulus ɣar lqecla, aṯ uwṯen s usɣun aḏas ggen lʼistijwab mayemmi xas snekkaren ṯɣuyyeṯ qaƹ ammu.
Wami ṯ cedden bac aṯ uwṯen, inna-as Bulus i umeqqran n ȓƹaskar ibedden ḏinni: "Ma qanuni aḏ tuwṯem ijjen n bnaḏem s usɣun ɣares ljinsiya n arrumanus meȓa war xas ṯḥekkimem ca?"
Wami isȓa umeqqran nni n ȓƹaskar manayenni, iruḥ ɣar arrayes n ȓƹaskar inna-as: "Min teggeḏ cek ammu? Qa aryaz nni ɣares ljinsiya n arrumanus!"
Yusa-d arrayes nni inna-as: "In-ayi cek, ma ɣarek ljinsiya n arrumanus?" Yarra xas Bulus: "Wah, nec aqat ɣari."
Inna-as arrayes nni: "Qa nec sɣiɣ ljinsiya inu s waṭṭas n tmenyaṯ." Inna-as Bulus: "Nec xeȓqeɣ-d zzayes."
Ȓexddenni beƹƹḏen xas ḏeɣya yinni ixsen as ggen lʼistijwab. Iggweḏ waxxa ḏ arrayes nni wami issen belli icedd ijjen ɣares ljinsiya n arrumanus.

Ṯiwecca nnes, irezzu arrayes nni n ȓƹaskar aḏ issen mayemmi Ayṯ-Israʼil tahamen Bulus, iruḥ yumar arruyas n ȓfuqaha ḏ marra Jmaƹeṯ n lḥukkam n Ayṯ-Israʼil aḏ munen. Ȓexddenni isufeɣ-d Bulus yuwi-ṯ-iḏ ɣarsen isbedd-iṯ zzaṯsen.
Ixzar mliḥ Bulus ɣar Jmaƹeṯ n lḥukkam n Ayṯ-Israʼil inna-asen: "Ay ayṯma, qa nec ggiɣ lwajib nican ak Arebbi, zi qbeȓ ḥetta nhara nec ḍḍamir inu mertaḥ."
Ikkar Anas arrayes n ȓfuqaha yumar yinni ibedden ak Bulus aṯ uwṯen ɣar uqemmum.
Ȓexddenni inna-as Bulus: "Cek ṯeggiḏ am ȓḥiḍ ircan ijjiyaren s jjir, ac yuweṯ Arebbi! Ṯeqqimeḏ cek ḏinni axafi ṯḥekmeḏ ƹlaḥsab ccariƹa, walakin ȓexxu txalafeḏ ccariƹa wami ṯen ṯumareḏ aḏayi uwṯen."
Nnan-as i Bulus yinni ḏinni iḥḍaren: "Ma tukkareḏ cek arrayes n ȓfuqaha n Arebbi?!"
Inna-asen Bulus: "Ay ayṯma, qa nec war ṯ ssineɣ ca tuɣaṯ ḏ arrayes n ȓfuqaha minzi Lkitab iqqar: <Arrayes n ccaƹb, war ḏayes qqar bu ȓƹib.>"

Wami issen Bulus qa ca zzaysen zi ȓḥizeb n iṣadduqiyen ca nneɣni zi ȓḥizeb n ifarrisiyen, ikkar iȓaɣa-d s jjheḏ ḏi Jmaƹeṯ nni n lḥukkam jarasen inna-asen: "Ay ayṯma, qa nec ḏ afarrisi mmis n ifarrisiyen! Aqa tḥakamem xafi wami nec ɣari lʼamal aḏ d kkaren yiwḏan zi ȓmewṯ ḏi Lqiyama."
Wami inna manaya iwqeƹ ijjen n lxilaf jar ifarrisiyen ḏ iṣadduqiyen, Jmaƹeṯ nni n lḥukkam mesfraqen jarasen.
(Minzi iṣadduqiyen qqaren qa war ḏinni lla Lqiyama, lla lmalaʼikaṯ, lla jnun, walakin ifarrisiyen qqaren marra manaya iǧa.)

Iwqeƹ ijjen n ssdaƹ imɣar, kkaren ȓebƹaḍ zeg imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa niṯni ḏ ifarrisiyen temnaqaren s jjheḏ qqaren: "Neccin war ḏas ntif bu can lɣaleṭ ḏi bnaḏem-a, imken issiweȓ akiḏes can n jjenn niɣ ḏ can n lmalaʼika."
Wami bḏan tmenɣan s jjheḏ ƹlaḥsab lxilaf nni, iggweḏ arrayes n ȓƹaskar aḏ mezqen Bulus. Yumar ȓƹaskar nnes aḏ hwan aḏ d xeḍfen Bulus zi ȓwesṭ nsen, aṯ siȓin ɣar lqecla.
Ǧiȓeṯ nni ibedd-d Siḏiṯneɣ ɣar Bulus inna-as: "Egg zƹameṯ! Mammec iy zzayi ṯcehḏeḏ ḏi ṯendint n Lquds, u labud ƹaweḏ azzayi ṯcehḏeḏ ḏi ṯendint n Ruma."
Wami d iṣbeḥ ȓḥaȓ ciṭṭnen Ayṯ-Israʼil, weƹḏen Arebbi ḥarrmen ixef nsen war tetten war sessen aȓ ɣa nɣen Bulus.
Ktar zi arbeƹin iḏsen ig iciṭṭnen ḏi manaya.
Ruḥen ɣar arruyas n ȓfuqaha ḏ imeqqranen n Ayṯ-Israʼil nnan-asen: "Neccin newƹeḏ Arebbi nḥarrem ixef nneɣ war ntett walu aȓ ɣa nneɣ Bulus neccin.

Ȓexxu Jmaƹeṯ n lḥukkam ḏ kenniw ttarem zi arrayes n ȓƹaskar n arrumanus bac aɣarwem d issekk Bulus. Ggeṯ ixef nwem ṯexsem akiḏes ṯeggem lʼistijwab mliḥ. Neccin aqaneɣ mujud bac aṯ nneɣ qbeȓ iy d ɣa yaweḍ."
Mmis n učmas n Bulus yarra-d ȓexbar x min ciṭṭinen yiwḏan nni, iruḥ ɣar lqecla yuḏef ḏinni iƹaweḏ-as manayenni i Bulus.
Iȓaɣa-d Bulus x yijjen n uƹaskari ḏ ameqqran n arrumanus inna-as: "Awi aḥenjir-a ɣar arrayes nwem aqa ɣares can wawaȓ aḏas ṯ yini."
Yuwi-ṯ ɣar arrayes n ȓƹaskar inna-as qa iȓaɣa-d xafi Bulus ameḥbus nni ittar zzayi inna-ayi aḏac d awiɣ aḥenjir-a aqa ɣares can wawaȓ aḏac ṯ yini.
Arrayes nni n ȓƹaskar iṭṭef aḥenjir nni ḏeg ufus, yuwi-ṯ ɣar can ṯɣemmarṯ waḥḏes inna-as: "Min texseḏ aḏayi ṯiniḏ?"
Inna-as uḥenjir nni: "Israʼiliyen ttafaqen jarasen bac azzayek ttaren aḏ d tessekkeḏ ṯiwecca Bulus ɣar Jmaƹeṯ n lḥukkam nsen. Ggin ixef nsen axmi xsen aḏas ggen lʼistijwab mliḥ.

War ṯen tejja ca ac sqenƹen qa ḏinni ktar zi arbeƹin n iryazen wejjḏen i Bulus, weƹḏen Arebbi ḥarrmen ixef nsen war tetten war sessen aȓ ṯ ɣa nɣen. Aqa niṯni wejjḏen, ɣir trajan aḏ twafqeḏ x ṭṭaleb nsen."
Issekk arrayes-a n ȓƹaskar aḥenjir nni inna-as: "War tƹawaḏ i ḥadd belli cek ṯenniḏ-ayi i nec ȓexbar-a."

Ȓexddenni iȓaɣa-d arrayes nni n ȓƹaskar i ṯnayen n imeqqranen nnes inna-asen: "Swejḏeṯ miyytayen n ȓƹaskar ḏ sebƹin n yinni iy inyin x yiysan ḏ miyytayen zeg yinni ikessin ikeccuḍen ɣarsen ṯicceṭ n wuzzeȓ, aḏ traḥem ɣar tesƹa n ǧiȓeṯ ɣar ṯendint n Qayṣariya.
Swejḏeṯ i Bulus minxef ɣa iney bac aṯ tsiwḍem ḏi lʼaman u ḍaman ɣar Lwali Filikes."
Uca yura ijjen n ṯebrat i Lwali Filikes inna-as ḏayes:
"A si Lwali Filikes, nec Kludyus Lisyas tseǧameɣ xak.
Aryaz-a ṭṭfen-ṯ Ayṯ-Israʼil tuɣa ƹȓayen aṯ nɣen. Wami d arriɣ ȓexbar qa netta ɣares ljinsiya n arrumanus, ruḥeɣ nec ḏ ȓƹaskar inu nsenjem-iṯ-iḏ.
Rezzuɣ aḏ ssneɣ nec ttuhmaṯ iy xas ggin, uwiɣ-ṯ ɣar Jmaƹeṯ n lḥukkam nsen.
Ufiɣ ttuhmaṯ nni niṯenti ḏ can ṯmesȓayin x ccariƹa nsen waha. War xas ufiɣ bu can ttuhma isḏaheǧ xas ȓmewṯ niɣ ḏ ȓeḥbes.
Wami d arriɣ ȓexbar ciṭṭnen xas, ssekkeɣ-ṯ-iḏ ɣarek ḏeɣya. Umareɣ yinni xas iy ggin ttuhmaṯ aḏac ƹawḏen min ɣarsen ḍed nnes."
Menbƹad i xemsiyyam ihwa-d ɣar Qayṣaria arrayes n ȓfuqaha Anas akiḏes ȓebƹaḍ n imeqqranen n Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏ ijjen n lmuḥami qqaren-as Tartulus, tahhamen Bulus ɣar Lwali.
Walakin war xseɣ ca ac sƹeṭṭaȓeɣ aṭṭas, tettareɣ zzayek ƹlaḥsab ȓxaḍar nnec aɣarneɣ ṯesȓeḏ cwayt.
Aryaz-a wanita nufi-ṯ itxarwaḍ waha itegg lfitna jar marra israʼiliyen iy ǧan ḏi marra ddunect. Netta ḏ ijjen n arrayes n lbidƹa n nnaṣara.
Ƹaweḏ irezzu aḏ isexnez ḥetta ṯamziḏa ṯameqqrant. Neccin neṭṭef-iṯ {nexs axas neḥkem ƹlaḥsab ccariƹa nneɣ.
Walakin yusa-d arrayes n ȓƹaskar Lisyas ikkes-aneɣ-ṯ zeg ufus nneɣ s lquwwa.
Yumar yinni iteggen ttuhmaṯ bac aɣarek d asen.} Axmi ḏas ɣa ṯeggeḏ cek s yixef nnec lʼistijwab aḏ tessneḏ minxef ṯ ntaham neccin."
Tafqen israʼiliyen x ttuhmaṯ nni, qqaren qa manayenni iggi-ṯ ḏ ṣṣaḥ.
Iceyyar-as Lwali i Bulus bac aḏ issiweȓ. Indeq-d Bulus inna-as: "Nec ssneɣ mecḥaȓ zeg wami cek ṯḥekkmeḏ x ṯmurṯ-a. X manaya farrḥeɣ bac aḏ ḏafƹeɣ x yixef inu.
Ṯzemmareḏ aḏ tesseqsiḏ nec yallah ṯenƹacar yum zeg wami gaƹƹḏeɣ ɣar Lquds maci ktar, bac aḏ ƹebḏeɣ Arebbi.
War ḏayi ufin ca tmenɣiɣ ak can ḥadd ḏi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant niɣ tsamareɣ ȓɣaci ȓa ḏi ṯemziḏawin uȓa ḏi ṯendint.
War ɣarsen bu ddalil x ttuhmaṯ-a iy xafi tqeddamen ȓexxu.
Walakin qqareɣ-ac nec taƹtarafeɣ zzaṯec ƹebbḏeɣ Arebbi n ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ ƹlaḥsab abriḏ-a iy ḥessben niṯni zaƹma ḏ lbidƹa. Tamneɣ s marra min itafaqen ak ccariƹa ḏ min d yurin ḏi Lkutub n lʼanbiya.
Ɣari lʼamal zi Arebbi mamc ɣarsen iǧa ɣar iryazen-a, iƹni aḏ d kkaren zi ȓmewṯ ṣṣaliḥin ḏ ḍḍalimin.
Falihaḏa teggeɣ marra jjheḏ inu bac aḏ ƹiceɣ s yijjen n ḍḍamir mertaḥ zzaṯ i Arebbi ḏ yiwḏan.
Menbaƹd i waṭṭas n iseggwusa ƹeqbeɣ-d ɣar ṯendint n Lquds uwiɣ-d can n ṣṣaḏaqa i lʼumma inu, qeddmeɣ ca n dbiḥaṯ.
Wami ḏayi ufin ḏi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant teggeɣ ȓuḍu. War ufin akiḏi bu ȓɣaci, war teggeɣ bu ssdaƹ. Walakin ḏinni can n israʼiliyen zi lʼiqlim n Asya,
itxeṣṣa niṯni aɣarek d asen s yixef nsen ḏanita bac aḏ inin ttuhmaṯ iy ɣarsen ḍed inu.
Niɣ aḏac inin yina iy ḏa ibedden man ljarima iy xafi ufin wami beddeɣ zzaṯ i Jmaƹeṯ n lḥukkam nsen.
Wac imken x wawaȓ nni iy nniɣ s uȓaɣi jarasen wami beddeɣ ḏinni? Nniɣ-asen aqa kenniw ṯḥakamem xafi nhara minzi tamneɣ belli iwḏan aḏ d kkaren zi ȓmewṯ ḏi Lqiyama."
Filikes netta issen mliḥ x ubriḏ-a n Ƹisa, walakin iʼejjel lḥukem nnes inna-asen: "Ḥetta aḏ d yas arrayes n ȓƹaskar Lisyas ƹaḏ iy ɣa ḥekmeɣ x manaya."
Yumar ijjen n umeqqran n ȓƹaskar inna-as: "Ƹess x Bulus ḏi ȓeḥbes." Inna-as: "Walakin uc-as cwayt n lḥurriya, ejj imeddukaȓ nnes aɣares d asen bac aḏayes thillan."
Ƹḏun can wussan, yusa-d Filikes akiḏes ṯamɣarṯ nnes Drusila, nettaṯ ḏ ṯaʼisraʼiliṯ. Iȓaɣa-d x Bulus iṣenneṭ-as wami issawaȓ x lʼiman zi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Wami issiweȓ Bulus x min iǧan nican, ḏ mammec ɣa iḥkem bnaḏem x yixef nnes, ḏ Yum Lḥisab ḏ Lƹiqab iy d ɣa yasen uca inexȓeƹ Filikes inna-as: "Ṣafi ȓexxu, ƹqeb. Xmi ɣari ɣa ṯiȓi lfurṣa axak d ȓaɣiɣ."
Netta ƹaweḏ Filikes irezzu zi Bulus arrecweṯ. S manaya itȓaɣa-d xas aṭṭas n ṯwaȓaṯin issawaȓ akiḏes.
Ƹḏun ṯnayen n iseggwusa, iḏweȓ-d Burkyus Fastus ḏeg umcan n Lwali Filikes. Walakin Filikes igga-asen ȓxaḍar i israʼiliyen, ijja Bulus ḏi ȓeḥbes.
Fastus netta iḏweȓ ḏ Lwali ḏi lʼiqlim. Wami ṯeƹḏu ṯeȓtiyyam igaƹƹeḏ zi ṯendint nni n Qayṣariya ɣar ṯendint n Lquds.
Inna-asen Lwali qa Bulus aqaṯ ḏi ṯendint n Qayṣariya ḏ ameḥbus, ȓexxu nec aḏ ḏewȓeɣ ḏinni.
U labud akiḏi raḥen zzaywem ȓebƹaḍ n imeqqranen nwem. Meȓa ixḍa uryaz nni ḏi can ȓḥajeṯ, qeddmem-ayi-d ttuhmaṯ iy ɣarwem ḍed nnes ḏinni.
Iqqim Fastus ḏi Lquds ma ṯmeniyyam ma ƹecriyyam, menbƹad ihwa ɣar Qayṣariya. Ṯiwecca nnes, igga ljelsa ḏi lmaḥkama yumar aḏas d awin Bulus.
Wami d iḥḍar ḏinni, munen-d xas israʼiliyen nni iy d yusin zi Lquds. Tahamen-ṯ s waṭṭas n ṯmesȓayin iy wƹarent walakin war ɣarsen bu ddalil.
Ibḏa Bulus itḏafaƹ x yixef nnes inna: "Nec war xḍiɣ ca ḏi manayenni, niɣ ḏi Ccariƹa n Ayṯ-Israʼil niɣ ḏi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant niɣ ḏi Lmalik Qayṣar."
Walakin Lwali Fastus irezzu aḏ igg ȓxaḍar i Ayṯ-Israʼil uca inna-as i Bulus: "Ma ṯexseḏ aḏ tgaƹƹḏeḏ ɣar ṯendint n Lquds axak ḥekmeɣ ḏinni nec x ttuhmaṯ-a?"
Inna-as Bulus: "Nec aqayi beddeɣ ḏi lmaḥkama-ya n Lmalik Qayṣar, itxeṣṣa ḏa iy ɣa twaḥakmeɣ. Qa Ayṯ-Israʼil war ḏaysen xḍiɣ ca, mammec ṯessneḏ cek.

Meȓa xḍiɣ iƹni ggiɣ can ȓḥajeṯ sḏaheǧeɣ xas ȓmewṯ war zemmareɣ azzayes arewȓeɣ. Walakin meȓa ttuhmaṯ-a iy xafi qeddmen war ǧint ca ḏ ṣṣaḥ, uȓa ḏ ijjen ma ɣares ȓḥaqq aḏayi isellem i niṯni. Nec testanafeɣ ddaƹweṯ inu ɣar Lmalik Qayṣar."
Lwali Fastus issiweȓ ak imcawaren nnes uca inna-as i Bulus: "Meȓa cek ddaƹweṯ nnec ṯestanfeḏ-t ɣar Qayṣar, qa ɣar Qayṣar iy ɣar ɣa ṯraḥeḏ."
Ƹḏun ȓebƹaḍ n wussan, yusa-d uzeǧiḏ Aɣribas akiḏes učmas Brinka ɣar ṯendint n Qayṣariya bac aḏ seǧmen x Lwali Fastus.
Wami ḏinni iy qqimen aṭṭas n wussan, issiweȓ Fastus ak uzeǧiḏ x lqaḍiya n Bulus. Inna-as: "Ḏanita ijjen n uryaz ijji-ṯ Filikes ḏ ameḥbus.
Wami ruḥeɣ nec ɣar Lquds qeddmen-ayi-d ttuhmaṯ arruyas n ȓfuqaha ḏ imeqqranen n Ayṯ-Israʼil, ttaren zzayi axas ḥekmeɣ x lmujrim.
Nniɣ-asen: Ƹlaḥsab lƹada n arrumanus war tsellimen ḥadd ḥetta aḏ imqabaȓ ak yinni iy xas iggin ttuhma, aɣares ṯiȓi lfurṣa aḏ iḏafeƹ x yixef nnes.
Iḏen, ṯiwecca nnes munen-d ḏanita qa ggiɣ ljelsa nnes ḏi lmaḥkama. Tuɣa war ƹeṭṭaȓeɣ ca, umareɣ bac aṯiḏ awin.
Kkaren ssiwȓen yinni xas iqeddmen ttuhmaṯ, ufiɣ ttuhmaṯ nni iy ggin ḍed i Bulus war ǧint ca ḏ can ljarimaṯ iy tuɣa xseɣ aḏ ssneɣ nec.
Lla, menɣen akiḏes x can ṯmesȓayin ḏi ddin nsen ḏ yijjen n uryaz qqaren-as Ƹisa, qa immuṯ walakin Bulus iqqar lla netta iddar!
Wami weddareɣ nec war ufiɣ mammec ɣa beḥṯeɣ ḏi ṯmesȓayin-a, nniɣ-as i Bulus: Ma aḏ traḥeḏ ɣar Lquds axak ḥekmeɣ ḏinni x ttuhmaṯ-a?
Bulus yugi, ikkar istanef ddaƹweṯ nnes ɣar Qayṣar. Umareɣ nec aḏ iqqim ḏ ameḥbus aȓ ṯ ɣa ssekkeɣ i Lmalik Qayṣar."
Inna-as uzeǧiḏ Aɣribas i Fastus: "Nec s yixef inu xseɣ aḏas ṣennṭeɣ i uryaz-a." Inna-as Fastus: "Ṯiwecca aḏas ṯṣennṭeḏ."

Ṯiwecca nnes, wami d yusa uzeǧiḏ Aɣribas ḏ Brinka s yijjen n ccan ḏ ameqqran, uḏfen ɣar uxxam ḏ ameqqran n uyraw akiḏes arruyas n ȓƹaskar n arrumanus ḏ imeqqranen n ṯendint. Ȓexddenni yumar Fastus uwin-d Bulus.

Inna Fastus: "A si azeǧiḏ Aɣribas ḏ iryazen iḥḍaren akiḏneɣ marra! Aqa twaȓam aryaz-a zzaṯwem xas iy ḏayi qeddmen ttuhmaṯ marra lʼumma n Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏi Lquds uȓa ḏanita ḏi Qayṣariya. Snekkaren xas ṯɣuyyeṯ qqaren labud wanita war itɣimi ca ƹaḏ aḏ iddar!
Nec war xas ufiɣ bu can ȓḥajeṯ isḏaheǧ xas ȓmewṯ. Wami istanef ddaƹweṯ nnes ɣar lmalik Qayṣar, xseɣ aɣares ṯ ssekkeɣ.

Walakin nec war xas ufiɣ bu can n ttuhma nican ḥima aḏas t ariɣ i si Lmalik Qayṣar. S manaya seḥḍareɣ-ṯ-iḏ zzaṯwem, xaṣṣatan cek a si azeǧiḏ Aɣribas, bac meȓa ṯeggim-as lʼistijwab aḏ ssneɣ min xas ɣa ariɣ.
Nec twaȓiɣ maci maƹqul aḏ ssekkeɣ can umeḥbus bȓa ma aḏ ariɣ ttuhmaṯ iy xas qeddmen."
Inna-as uzeǧiḏ Aɣribas i Bulus: "Qa neccin nesmeḥ-ac aḏ tdafƹeḏ x yixef nnec." Iceyyar Bulus s ufus nnes ibḏa itḏafaƹ x yixef nnes inna-as:
"A ssaƹḏ inu nec a si azeǧiḏ Aɣribas wami ḏayi ṯejjiḏ aḏ ḏafƹeɣ x yixef inu nhara zzaṯec cek x marra ttuhmaṯ iy zzayi tahamen Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Xaṣṣatan minzi cek ṯessneḏ marra lƹadaṯ n Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏ lxilafaṯ nsen. S manaya tettareɣ zzayek aḏ teṣbareḏ aḏayi ṯṣennṭeḏ.
Qa marra Ayṯ-Israʼil ssnen mammec tuɣa ṯeǧa ṯuḏarṯ inu zi ṯemẓi inu iy ƹiceɣ ḏi ṯmurṯ inu, ƹaweḏ uȓa ḏi ṯendint n Lquds.
Niṯni ssnen-ayi aṭṭas zeg wami. Meȓa xsen axafi cehḏen nec ƹiceɣ ḏ afarrisi, ȓḥizeb nni iqesḥen aṭṭas ḏi ddin nneɣ.
Cuf, mayemmi iy ǧiɣ nec nhara ḏi lmaḥkama-ya? Liʼanna ɣari lʼamal zi ȓƹaheḏ nni iy ḏaneɣ yuca Arebbi zi ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ.
Ǧiȓeṯ ḏ nhar ṯenƹac n ṯqebbaȓ n Ayṯ-Israʼil ƹebbḏen Arebbi minzi ɣarsen lʼamal ȓƹaheḏ nni aḏ yiȓi. Cuf, a si azeǧiḏ, lʼamal-a netta ḏ ttuhma iy xafi nnan Ayṯ-Israʼil!
Mayemmi ṯenwim qa Arebbi war itemkin ca aḏ d isnekkar yinni immuṯen zi ȓmewṯ?
Nec qenƹeɣ s yixef inu tuɣa ḍaruri aḏ ggeɣ marra min zemmareɣ bac aḏ ƹarrḍeɣ i yisem n Ƹisa zi Naṣira.
Amenni iy ggiɣ ḏi ṯendint n Lquds. S arruxṣa n arruyas n ȓfuqaha tḥebbaseɣ aṭṭas n ȓmuminin ṣṣaliḥin. Xmi xasen taḥkamen s ȓmewṯ, nec tafaqeɣ x manayenni.
Mecḥaȓ n ṯwaȓaṯin traḥeɣ zi ṯemziḏa ɣar ṯemziḏa tƹeddabeɣ-ṯen, rezzuɣ aḏ ssiwȓen s bezzez ȓƹib ḏi Arebbi. S uɣḍab nni inu traḥeɣ ḥetta ɣar ṯneddam ḏi lxarij bac aṯen ƹeddbeɣ ḏinni.
S manaya iy ruḥeɣ ijjen n nhar ɣar ṯendint n Dimaceq, ysiɣ-d arruxṣa n arruyas n ȓfuqaha ḏ ttesriḥ nsen.
A si azeǧiḏ, wami ggureɣ ɣar uzyen n nhar ẓriɣ ijjen n nnur ḏeg ujenna ṯfawṯ nnes tseqsiq ktar zi ṯfuct, inneḍ-ayi-d itceƹciƹ xafi nec ḏ yinni iy kiḏi igguren.
Newḍa marra ɣar ṯmurṯ, sȓiɣ i yijjen n ṯmijja ṯessawaȓ s lluɣa lƹibriya ṯeqqar-ayi-d: A Cawul a Cawul, mayemmi ḏayi tƹeddabeḏ? Teggeḏ am wenni iy ḏi ṯeǧa ṯɣennant isuggur-iṯ Arebbi s ṯsennant.
Nniɣ-as: Min ṯeƹniḏ cek a Siḏi? Inna-ayi qa Nec ḏ Ƹisa wenni iy tƹeddabeḏ.
Ȓexxu kkar, bedd x iḍaren nnec. Aqa nec meḍhareɣ-ac-d bac ac d ixḍareɣ aḏ tḏewȓeḏ ḏ axeddam inu aḏ tiȓiḏ ḏ ijjen n ccaheḏ x min zzayi teẓriḏ ḏ min ƹaḏ ḏac d ɣa sbeyyneɣ.
Ac snejmeɣ zi lʼumma nnec, ac snejmeɣ ƹaweḏ zeg yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil. Ac ssekkeɣ ɣarsen

bac aḏasen ṯrezmeḏ ṯiṭṭawin nsen, aṯen ṯesbeƹƹḏeḏ zi ṯaǧest ɣar nnur, aṯen ṯesbeƹƹḏeḏ zi ssulṭa n Cciṭan ɣar Arebbi. Ammu aḏasen twaɣfarent ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nsen aɣarsen yiȓi umcan ak ṣṣaliḥin iƹni s lʼiman iy ḏayi iy ggin.
Nec a si azeǧiḏ Aɣribas, war ƹṣiɣ ca lwaḥi nni iy xafi d ihwan zeg ujenna.

Lla, tbeccareɣ ḏ amezwaru imezḏaɣ n tendint n Dimaceq, ƹaḏ ḏ imezḏaɣ n ṯendint n Lquds ḏ marra jwayeh n ṯmurṯ n Yahuḏiya, ḏ aneggaru marra yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil. Tbeccareɣ-ṯen aḏ tuben aḏ ḏewȓen ɣar Arebbi, aḏ xeḏmen ȓexḏayem n ttuba iy iǧan n ṣṣaḥ.
X manaya ṭṭfen-ayi Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant, xsen aḏayi nɣen.
Walakin Arebbi iƹawen-ayi-d zi qbeȓ ḥetta nhara. Ammu aqayi nec ḏanita beddeɣ, tbeccareɣ s umezyan ḏ umeqqran. Qqareɣ ɣir ṯimesȓayin nni iy nnan lʼanbiya ḏ Musa labud aḏ weqƹent.
Iƹni, Lmasiḥ wa labud aḏ itwaƹeddeb aḏ ibeccar lʼumma nneɣ s nnur ḏ marra yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil liʼanna ḏ netta iy d ɣa ikkaren ḏ amezwaru zi ȓmewṯ."
Bulus netta aqaṯ ƹaḏ issawaȓ itḏafaƹ x yixef nnes, ikkar lwali Fastus inna-as s jjheḏ: "A Bulus, cek ma ṯeflippaḏ? Ṯɣuri nnec ṯemɣar qa ṯesbuheȓi-yic!"
Inna-as Bulus: "A si lwali Fastus, lla nec war flippaɣ ca. Min qqareɣ ḏ ṣṣaḥ u s ȓaƹqeȓ.

Azeǧiḏ Aɣribas issen netta mliḥ x manaya, nec rezzuɣ akiḏes ssiwȓeɣ s ṣṣaraḥa marra. Nec mesteqneƹ war ṯeqqim uȓa ḏ ijjen n ȓḥajeṯ zi manaya war t issin ca, liʼanna war ṯewqiƹ ca ḏi can n ṯɣemmarṯ waha.
A si azeǧiḏ Aɣribas, cek ma tamneḏ s lʼanbiya? Nec ssneɣ illa cek tamneḏ."
Inna-as uzeǧiḏ Aɣribas: "Ma s cwayt n ȓweqṯ ṯa cek ṯenwiḏ aḏayi ṯarreḏ ḏ amasiḥi?"
Inna-as Bulus: "S cwayt n ȓweqṯ ṯa niɣ s waṭṭas, nec tettareɣ zi Arebbi i cek ḏ yinni iy ḏayi itesȓan nhara aḏ tḏewȓem am nec walakin bȓa snaseȓ-a."
Ikkar Uzeǧiḏ ḏ Lwali ḏ Brinka ḏ yinni kiḏsen iqqimen.
Fɣen, nnan i wayawya qa bnaḏem-a war itegg ca minxef isḏaheǧ ȓmewṯ niɣ ḏ ȓeḥbes.
Inna-as uzeǧiḏ Aɣribas i lwali Fastus: "Bnaḏem-a maƹlik war istanef ddaƹweṯ nnes ɣar Qayṣar ataf tuɣaṯ itwaḍȓeq."

Wami umaren aḏaneɣ ssekken ḏeg uɣarrabu ɣar ṯmurṯ n Iṭalya, sellmen Bulus ḏ ȓebƹaḍ n imeḥbas akiḏes ijjen n uƹaskari ḏ ameqqran n arrumanus qqaren-as Yulyus. Netta yusa-d zi ȓƹaskar nni umi qqaren <Lfirqa n Qayṣar.>
Ngaƹƹeḏ ḏeg yijjen n uɣarrabu itraḥen ḏi ȓweqṯ nni zi ȓmuwyi n Adramit ɣar ȓmuyawaṯ n lʼiqlim n Asya. Iruḥ akiḏneɣ Aristarxus, netta zi Ayṯ-Masidunya zi ṯendint n Salunik.
Ṯiwecca nnes, wami nuweḍ ɣar ṯendint n Ṣayda igga ȓxir Yulus ḏi Bulus ijji-ṯ aḏ iraḥ ɣar imeddukaȓ nnes bac aḏayes thillan.
Ssenni neffeɣ nruḥ ḏeg uɣarrabu ḏi jjiheṯ nni mani ihedden ȓebḥar n ṯeyzirṯ n Qubruṣ, minzi arriḥ iccaṯ-aneɣ-d ɣar uɣembub nneɣ.
Wami neƹḏu ȓebḥar nni iy iǧan zzaṯ i lʼiqlim n Kilikya ḏ lʼiqlim n Pamfilya, nuweḍ ɣar ṯendint n Mira ḏi lʼiqlim n Likya.
Yufa ḏinni uƹaskari nni ameqqran ijjen n uɣarrabu yusa-d zi ṯendint n Iskandariya itraḥ ḏi ȓweqṯ nni ɣar ṯmurṯ n Iṭalya, isney-aneɣ ḏayes.

Aṭṭas n wussan neccin iggur zzayneɣ uɣarrabu walakin yuyur ɣir cwayt n ubriḏ waha, menbaƹd neƹḏu ṭṭarf i ṯendint n Kanidus. Wami arriḥ war ḏaneɣ ijji ca a nkemmeȓ x ubriḏ nni, neƹḏu swadday n ṯeyzirṯ n Krit jjiheṯ n Qabu n Salmun.
S bezzez nuggur ṭṭarf ṭṭarf n ȓbarr menbaƹd nuweḍ ɣar yijjen n umcan qqaren-as <Ȓmarsaṯ Ṯiṣebḥanin> netta yuḏes i ubilaj n Lisya.
Walakin aƹaskari nni ameqqran war ḏas iggi ca array i Bulus, igga array i bab n uɣarrabu ḏ arrayes nnes.

Lʼianna ȓmarsa nni ḏ ṯaƹeffant bac aḏayes seƹḏun ȓmecta ḏinni. X manaya azyen ameqqran ggin aḏ uyuren ssenni ḏeg uɣarrabu, tmennan aḏ awḍen ɣar ubilaj n Finikes aḏayes seƹḏun ȓmecta. Nettaṯ ḏ ijjen n ȓmarsa ḏi ṯeyzirṯ n Krit teḍhur ɣar ljanub ḏ ccamal ḏi jjiheṯ n lɣarbi.
Wami d iṣuḍ ijjen n arriḥ ifsus zi ljanub, itɣir-asen ufin min rezzun. Sgaƹƹḏen-d aȓiyzim n uɣarrabu ruḥen ḏi ȓebḥar ṭṭarf i ȓbarr n ṯeyzirṯ nni n Krit.
Walakin menbaƹd cwayt ikkar-d ijjen n arriḥ ijheḏ ihwa-d zi ṯeyzirṯ nni, arriḥ nni qqaren-as <Asmawi.>
Lƹaṣifa nni ṯuwi aɣarrabu, wami war nzemmar ca a nuyur ɣar zzaṯ nejja aɣarrabu nni aṯ yawi arriḥ.
Nnuffar zi arriḥ wami neƹḏu swadday n yijjen n ṯeyzirṯ ḏ ṯamezyant qqaren-as Kawda. Izeyyar xaneɣ aṭṭas ȓḥaȓ walakin nrekken ṯaɣarrabut n lʼiɣaṯa,

nesgaƹƹeḏ-it-id ɣar uɣarrabu. Ixeddamen cedden aɣarrabu s iseɣwan swadday bac war itrezzi ca. Wami ggwḏen aɣarrabu aḏ yuyur aḏ innaɣ ḏeg yijḏi n ȓebḥar n Surt, sehwan-d ȓeqȓuƹ uɣarrabu jjin arriḥ aṯ yawi.
Ṯarni lƹaṣifa nni, ṯiwecca nnes bḏan neṭṭaren sseȓƹaṯ ḏi ȓebḥar.
Nhar wis ṯeȓtiyyam nḍaren ȓqecc uɣarrabu ḏi ȓebḥar s ifassen nsen.
Ṯeqqim amenni lƹaṣifa nni, aṭṭas n wussan war neẓri ṯfuct uȓa ḏ yiṯran. Neccin ḏeg uneggaru nefqeḏ lʼamal belli a nenjem.
Wami kkin aṭṭas n ȓweqṯ war ccin ca aɣrum, ikkar Bulus inna-asen: "Ay iryazen, maƹlik ḏayi ṯeggim array war ṯeffiɣem ca zi ṯeyzirṯ n Krit, ataf qa war xawem ṯekki ca tamara-ya niɣ ḏ ṯxessarṯ-a.
Ȓexxu tettareɣ zzaywem aḏ tiȓim ḏ iryazen aqa war itmetti ḥadd zzaywem, ɣir aɣarrabu-ya aḏ irez waha.
Cuf, ǧiȓeṯ-a ṯanita qa ṯmeḍhar-ayi-d ijjen n lmalaʼika n Arebbi, Arebbi wenni umi xeddmeɣ netta ḏ bab inu.
Ṯenna-ayi lmalaʼika nni: A Bulus, war teggweḏ ca! Wa labud aḏ tbeddeḏ ɣar Lmalik Qayṣar. Xzar ƹaweḏ, yinni iy kiḏec itsafaren marra isenjem-iṯen Arebbi akiḏec."
Inna-asen Bulus: "Iwa iȓiṯ ḏ iryazen! Qa nec tamneɣ zi Arebbi min ḏayi inna aḏ yiȓi qa aḏ yiȓi.
Walakin labud aḏ innaɣ uɣarrabu-ya ɣar ṭṭarf n can ṯeyzirṯ."
Ḏi ǧiȓeṯ nni wis arbeƹṭacar yum neccin ƹaḏ nuggur nweddar ḏi ȓebḥar n Wadriyatiki, ɣar uzyen n ǧiȓeṯ tɣir-asen i ixeddamen n uɣarrabu qa tqerraben ɣar ȓbarr.
Ƹbaren ȓaǧeɣ n ȓebḥar ufin sebƹa u ṯȓaṯin mitru. Ṯeƹḏu cwayt n ȓweqṯ, ƹaweḏ ƹbaren ufin ɣir sebƹa u ƹicrin mitru.
Ggwḏen aɣarrabu aḏ iȓqef izra, nḍaren zi puppa n uɣarrabu arbeƹa n iȓiyzam qqimen tẓaǧan bac aḏ iṣbeḥ ȓḥaȓ.
Ixeddamen n uɣarrabu wami rezzun aḏ arewȓen zzayes, sehwan ṯaɣarrabut n lʼiɣaṯa ɣar waman sneƹmiȓen axmi xsen aḏ nḍaren iȓiyzam zi pruba uɣarrabu.
Inna-as Bulus i uƹaskari nni ameqqran ḏ ȓƹaskar nni akiḏes: "Meȓa war qqimen ca ixeddamen-a ḏeg uɣarrabu, war ṯzemmarem ca aḏ tnejmem."
Ȓexddenni ȓƹaskar qessen iseɣwan n ṯɣarrabut n lʼiɣaṯa jjin-teṯ axasen ṯbeƹƹeḏ.
Wami ibḏa aḏ iṣbeḥ ȓḥaȓ, ikkar Bulus ittar zzaysen marra aḏ ccen ca n ȓḥajeṯ inna-asen: "Ṯeƹḏu arbeƹṭacar yum trajam waha ṯeǧuzem, war ṯeccim walu.
Ȓexxu tettareɣ zzaywem aḏ teccem can ȓḥajeṯ bac aḏ teqqimem ṯeddarem, war iweṭṭi uȓa ḏ ijjen n uzuṭṭu zeg uzeǧif nwem."
Wami inna awaȓ-a, ikkar iysi-d aɣrum icekkar Arebbi zzaṯsen marra, irez-iṯ ibḏa itett-iṯ.
Cejjƹen marra iḏsen ccin.
Neccin lƹadad nneɣ ḏeg uɣarrabu miyytayen u setta u sebƹin n yiwḏan.
Wami ccin jjiwnen, nḍaren irḏan ḏi ȓebḥar bac aḏ sfessen aɣarrabu.
Wami d iṣbeḥ ȓḥaȓ, twaȓan ca n ṯmurṯ niṯni war t ssinen ca. Ẓrin ijjen n lxalij ḏinni, cceṭṭ nnes ḏayes ijḏi. Ggin aɣares sqarrben aɣarrabu meȓa zemmaren-as.
Qeḍwen iȓiyzam jjin-ṯen ḏi ȓebḥar, serxun iseɣwan iy zi twarekknen dmamaṯ. Sgaƹƹḏen ȓeqȓaƹ n zzaṯ i arriḥ itṣuḍen, wejjhen ɣar ȓbarr.
Walakin aɣarrabu ikka ḏeg yijjen n uyeddim n yijḏi ḏi ȓwesṭ n waman innuɣ ḏayes ḏinni. Pruba nnes ṯennuɣ mliḥ war tenhezzi ca. Puppa nnes ṯebḏa trezza ccaṯen-t ȓemwaj.
Ȓƹaskar nwan aḏ nɣen imeḥbas bac war zzaysen itƹummi ḥadd aḏ yarweȓ.
Walakin aƹaskari nni ameqqran ixes aḏ isenjem Bulus, isbedd-iṯen x min xsen aḏ ggen. Yumar yinni issnen aḏ ƹummen aḏ neḍwen ḏ imezwura ḥima aḏ ffɣen ɣar ȓbarr.
Inneɣni aṯen ḏfaren x ṯfeȓwin niɣ x ṯeȓwiḥin uɣarrabu. Amenni iy ggin bac aḏ ffɣen marra iḏsen ɣar ȓbarr aḏ nejmen.
Wami nenjem nuweḍ ɣar ȓbarr, nufa isem n ṯeyzirṯ nni qqaren-as Malṭa.
Ibarbariyen n ṯmurṯ nni ggin ḏayneɣ ȓxir aṭṭas. Reḥben zzayneɣ marra, ceƹƹȓen-aneɣ ṯimessi minzi tuɣa ṯesmeḍ ƹaweḏ iccaṯ unẓar.
Bulus ijmeƹ-d ikeccuḍen, wami ṯen isers ḏi ṯmessi iffeɣ-d ijjen n ufiɣer zi ȓeḥmu, iqqes-as iȓseq-as ḏeg ufus.
Wami ẓrin ibarbariyen fiɣer iȓseq ḏeg ufus n Bulus, nnan jarasen: Nican aryaz-a wanita inɣa can yijjen. Arebbi nneɣ umi qqaren <Lʼirada> war ṯ ijji ca aḏ iddar waxxa injem zi ȓebḥar.
Walakin Bulus inḍar fiɣer nni ḏi ṯmessi war ḏas iwqiƹ walu.
Ibarbariyen nni trajan ma aḏ yuff wa ima ḏeɣya aḏ iwḍa aḏ immeṯ. Wami ṯ rajan aṭṭas twaȓan-ṯ war ḏas iwqiƹ walu, ibeddeȓ array nsen nnan wanita ḏ can yijjen zi arebbiṯen nneɣ!
Ȓbarr-a wanita yuḏes ɣar ca n ṯmura n arrayes n ṯeyzirṯ nni, netta qqaren-as Publiyus. Irḥeb zzayneɣ, isnewjew-aneɣ ikarem-aneɣ ṯeȓtiyyam.
Babas n Publiyus itnezbar ḏi ṯassuṯ ihȓec s ṯmessi itazzeȓ-as uƹeddis. Iruḥ ɣares Bulus ɣar uxxam nnes iẓẓuǧ, isers xas ifassen nnes isgenfa-ṯ.
Iwqeƹ manayenni, senni usin-d ɣares imehȓac n ṯeyzirṯ nni marra isgenfa-ṯen Bulus.
Weqqaren-aneɣ ucin-aneɣ aṭṭas n ṯmesȓayin. Wami nekkar a neffeɣ ḏeg uɣarrabu, ḏebbaren-aneɣ-d ȓqecc nni iy neḥḏaj.
Menbaƹd i ṯeȓt chur, ngaƹƹeḏ ḏeg yijjen n uɣarrabu zi Iskandariya tuɣa iseƹḏu ȓmecta ḏi ṯeyzirṯ nni. Aɣarrabu nni x uɣembub nnes ḏayes lʼaṣnam semman-ṯen <Icniwen n Arebbi.>
Nuweḍ ɣar ṯendint n Saraqusa neqqim ḏayes ṯeȓtiyyam.
Ssenni nruḥ ḏeg uɣarrabu ɣar ṯendint n Riǧew. Ṯiwecca nnes ikkar-d ijjen n arriḥ zi ljanub, nhar wis ṯeȓtiyyam nuweḍ ɣar ȓmuyi n Butisuli.
Nufa ḏinni ȓebƹaḍ n ayṯmaṯneɣ, ƹarḍen-aneɣ a neqqim akiḏsen sebƹiyyam. Amenni iy nuweḍ ɣar ṯendint n Ruma.
Ɣarsen ȓexbar ɣar ayṯmaṯneɣ ḏi Ruma nusa-d, ffɣen-d aḏaneɣ d ȓqan ḥetta ɣar Ssuq n Wabyan u ḥetta ɣar Ṯraṯa n Ṯuḏrin n imsafaren. Wami ṯen iẓra Bulus, icekkar Arebbi itwacejjeƹ.
Nuḏef ṯandint n Ruma, ismeḥ-as ȓmexzen i Bulus aḏ izḏeɣ waḥḏes akiḏes iqqim ijjen n uƹaskari axas iƹesses.

Ṯeƹḏu ṯeȓtiyyam, iȓaɣa-d Bulus x imeqqranen n Ayṯ-Israʼil. Wami d munen inna-asen: "Ay ayṯma, nec war ggiɣ walu ḍed i ccaƹb nneɣ niɣ ḍed i lƹadaṯ n ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ. Waxxa amenni ṭṭfen-ayi ḏi Lquds sellmen-ayi i ifassen n arrumanus.
Niṯni ggin-ayi lʼistijwab, xsen aḏayi ḍeȓqen minzi war xafi ufin bu can ttuhma iy xef sḏaheǧeɣ ȓmewṯ.
Wami Ayṯ-Israʼil ƹarrḍen qa war ufiɣ illa aḏ stanfeɣ ddaƹweṯ inu ɣar Lmalik Qayṣar. Walakin nec war ggiɣ bu can ttuhma x lʼumma inu.
Iḏen x manaya ttareɣ-kenniw akenniw ẓreɣ akiḏwem ssiwȓeɣ. Aqa ƹlaḥsab lʼamal n Ayṯ-Israʼil iy twaceddeɣ s ssensȓeṯ-a."
Nnan-as: "War ḏaneɣ d ṯuwiḍ xak uȓa ḏ ijjen n ṯebrat zi jwayeh n Yahuḏiya. Zeg yinni iy d yusin zi ayṯmaṯneɣ ssenni war ḏaneɣ issiweȓ ḥadd xac, war xak inni ḥadd ȓƹib.
Walakin nexs aḏac nṣennet lʼafkar nnec minzi nessen aṭṭas n yiwḏan ḏi mkuȓ amcan tƹarraḍen i ȓḥizeb-a wanita."

Ttafqen aḏ meȓqen ijjen n nhar, tmarnin-d inneɣni usin-d ɣares aṭṭas iḏsen ɣar ṯeddarṯ mani iqqim Bulus. Ibḏa itḥeddaṯ-iṯen zi ṣbaḥ aȓ wami d yuweḍ uƹecci netta icehheḏ s ȓmulk n Arebbi, ixes aṯen iseqneƹ s Ccariƹa n Musa ḏ Lkutub n lʼanbiya x Ƹisa.
Ȓebƹaḍ zzaysen qtanƹen s min inna, ȓebƹaḍ zzaysen war uminen ca.
Niṯni war mesfhimen ca ak wayawya. Qbeȓ ma aḏ ffɣen ssenni, inna-asen Bulus awaȓ-a ḏ aneggaru: "Arruḥ iqeddsen inna ȓḥaqq i ȓejḏuḏ nwem s yiȓes n nnabi Icaƹya, inna:
<Ruḥ ɣar ccaƹb-a ini-yasen: Cḥaȓ ma tesȓam war ṯfehhmem, cḥaȓ ma ṯxezzarem war twiȓim.

Ȓaḥeqqac ccaƹb-a, uȓawen nsen ḏewȓen am uzru, ƹȓayen war tesȓin walu, qqnen ṯiṭṭawin nsen. Ḥima war twiȓin s ṯiṭṭawin nsen, war tesȓin s imejjan nsen, war fehhmen s wuȓawen nsen, aɣari d ḏewȓen aṯen sgenfiɣ.>
Iwa itxeṣṣa aḏ tessnem uȓa ḏ yinni war iǧin ca ḏ israʼiliyen Arebbi aṯen isenjem, niṯni aḏas sȓen."
{Wami inna awaȓ-a, ffɣen Ayṯ-Israʼil zzayes temnaqaren s jjheḏ jarasen.}
Iqqim Bulus ƹamayen ḏi ṯeddarṯ nni itxeǧas ȓekra netta s yixef nnes. Itreḥḥab s yinni iy ɣares d igguren marra.
Itḥeddaṯ-iṯen s ȓmulk n Arebbi, iseȓmaḏ x Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ s yijjen n zƹameṯ ḏ lḥurriya.
Nec ḏ Bulus axeddam n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ, igg-ayi-d Arebbi aḏ iȓiɣ ḏ arrasul. Twaxḍareɣ ḥima aḏ xbareɣ s Lʼinjil n Arebbi,
Lʼinjil-a iy zi iwƹeḏ Arebbi ḏi zman s yiȓes n lʼanbiya nnes ḏi Lkitab lmuqeddes.
Aqa zi Ƹisa u x ssabab n yisem nnes igga ḏayi Arebbi lbaraka ḥima aḏ iȓiɣ ḏ arrasul, aḏ beccareɣ iwḏan zi marra ȓegnus azzayes amnen aḏas ṭaƹen.
Uȓa ḏ kenniw zeg yinni itwaxḍaren aḏ teḏfarem Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Tariɣ i marra imƹizzen n Arebbi iy iǧan ḏi ṯendint n Ruma ixḍar-ikenniw aḏ tiȓim ḏ ȓmuminin ṣṣaliḥin. Akiḏwem yiȓi arḍa ḏ ȓehna zi Arebbi Babaṯneɣ ḏ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ Siḏiṯneɣ.
Ḏ amezwaru, tcekkareɣ Arebbi xawem marra iḏwem s yisem n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ ȓaḥeqqac lʼiman nwem arrin-as-d ȓexbar ḏi ddunect-a ṯekmaȓ.
Nec rezzuɣ s waṭṭas akenniw ẓreɣ ḥima aḏawem uceɣ ijjen n lqudra ruḥiya iy ḏawem ɣa yucen jjheḏ.
Iƹni a ncejjeƹ ayawya s lʼiman iy ḏayneɣ icarrcen.
Ay ayṯma, xseɣ aḏ tessnem belli aṭṭas n ṯwaȓaṯin teggeɣ aɣarwem d aseɣ, walakin ȓexxu ƹaḏ war ɣarwem d uwiḍeɣ. Nec xseɣ ȓxeḏmeṯ inu aḏ tenjeḥ ḏaywem mammec ṯenjeḥ jar ȓegnus nneɣni.
Liʼanna u labud aḏ ggeɣ lwajib ak iyunaniyen ḏ yinni war iǧin ca ḏ iyunaniyen, ak yinni iɣrin ḏ yinni war iɣrin ca.
S manaya nec rezzuɣ aṭṭas akenniw beccareɣ s Lʼinjil uȓa ḏ kenniw iy iǧan ḏi ṯendint n Ruma.
Aqa nec war tseḏḥiɣ ca zi Lʼinjil liʼanna Lʼinjil ḏ jjheḏ nni ig isxeddam Arebbi bac aḏ isenjem marra wi ɣa yamnen: Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏ imezwura ṯumma yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Arebbi isbeyyen-aneɣ-d ḏi Lʼinjil mammec ɣa nemṣȓaḥ akiḏes, manaya s lʼiman waḥḏes. Mammec iqqar Lkitab: <Wenni iǧan nican aḏ iƹic s lʼiman.>
Fa imeḍhar-d uɣḍab n Arebbi zeg ujenna x marra ccarr ḏ ȓbaṭeȓ iy teggen yiwḏan iƹni yinni itbeṭṭaȓen lḥaqiqa s ccarr nsen.
Aqa min zemmaren yiwḏan aṯ ssnen x Arebbi imeḍhar-asen-d, liʼanna Arebbi netta s yixef nnes iy ḏasen-t-id ismeḍharen.
Zeg wami ṯeǧa ddunect-a, min war itwaẓerren n Arebbi iƹni jjheḏ nnes itduman ḏ ṭṭabiƹa nnes yuƹȓan, nfehhem-iṯent nẓerr-iṯent mliḥ ḏi ṯmesȓayin itwaxeȓqen. Ƹlaḥsab manaya iwḏan war ɣarsen bu lƹuder.
Waxxa niṯni tuɣa ssnen Arebbi, walakin war ṯ ḥemmiḏen ca war ṯ ṯcekkaren ca mammec itxeṣṣa aḏ ggen ak Arebbi. Lʼafkar nsen ḏewȓent xwant, uȓawen nsen ḏ ibuhaȓiyen ḏewȓen ḏ ṯaǧest.
Ḥessben x yixef nsen ḏ imiɣisen, niṯni ḏewȓen ḏ ibuhaȓiyen.
Beddȓen lƹaḍama n Arebbi iddaren i ȓebda s lʼaṣnam itcabbahen ḏeg iwḏan iy ɣa ifnan, ḏ lʼaṣnam itcabbahen ḏeg yijḍaḍ ḏ lḥayawanaṯ ḏ min itenḥuruḏen.
S manayenni isellem-iṯen Arebbi i min tcehhan wuȓawen nsen bac aḏ ggen lfasad bac aḏ sbehdȓen ayawya.
Kkaren beddȓen lḥaqiqa n Arebbi s ixarriqen. Ƹebbḏen xeddmen i min d itwaxeȓqen maci i Arebbi Lxaliq, wenni iy ḏi ṯeǧa lbaraka i ȓebda n ȓebdaṯ. Amin.
Ṯumma isellem-iṯen Arebbi i ccehawaṯ nsen iy ṯen ifeḍḥen. Kkarent ṯemɣarin beddȓent iryazen s ṯemɣarin.
Uȓa ḏ iryazen kkaren semḥen ḏi ṯemɣarin, ṯekkar ḏaysen ṯmessi ijjen x unneɣni, aryaz ifesseḏ ak uryaz. S manaya jebḏen-d lƹiqab i yixef nsen iy sḏaheǧen x ȓmunkar iy teggen.
Ssenni niṯni wami ugin aḏ ssnen Arebbi, isellem-iṯen i ȓaƹquȓaṯ nsen infeḍḥen aḏ ggen min war iḥȓin.
Niṯni ccuren s kuȓ nnuƹ n ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ ḏ ccarr ḏ ṭṭmaƹ ḏ ȓeqbaḥeṯ ḏ ȓeḥseḏ. Neqqen iwḏan tmenɣan. Ccuren s uɣḏar ḏ min war iḥȓin, qqaren nnamima.
Qqaren ȓbaṭeȓ, tƹiffan Arebbi, tukkaren iwḏan, semɣaren ixef nsen, ḏaysen ttakebbur. Teggen nniṯ ccarr ḏ jḏiḏ, ƹeṣṣan lwalidin.
War fehhmen ca, war teṭṭfen ca ḏeg wawaȓ nsen, war ḏaysen bu lḥanana uȓa ḏ arraḥmeṯ.
Waxxa ssnen Arebbi iḥekkem xasen s ȓmewṯ x yinni iteggen ṯimesȓayin-a, niṯni kkaren teggen-ṯent. Ktar zi manaya, reṭṭan x yinni iy ṯent iteggen.
Iḏen ay aryaz, cek meȓa tƹeyyabeḏ x yiwḏan, ataf war ɣarek bu ȓḥaqq min ma ṯeƹniḏ. Liʼanna xmi tƹeyyabeḏ x can yijjen, tƹeyyabeḏ x yixef nnec, mayemmi? Liʼanna cek teggeḏ kif-kif mammec teggen niṯni!
Wah, neccin nessen qa lƹiqab n Arebbi ihewwa nican x yinni iteggen ṯimesȓayin-a.
Ay aryaz, iwa min tfekkareḏ? Ma aḏ tnejmeḏ zi lƹiqab n Arebbi wami tƹeyyabeḏ x yina u cek teggeḏ ṯmesȓayin-a kif-kif am niṯni?
Niɣ ṯseḥqareḏ lḥanana imɣaren n Arebbi ḏ ṣṣbar nnes ḏ ȓxaḍar iy ɣares? Ma war ṯessineḏ Arebbi s lḥanana nnes irezzu ac d isbeyyen abriḏ bac aḏ tubeḏ?
Walakin cek s ṯɣennant-a iy ḏayek ḏ wuȓ nnec war ituben ca tesmuniḏ aɣḍab i yixef nnec aȓ Yum Lḥisab ḏ Lƹiqab, nhar iy ḏi d ɣa imeḍhar ȓḥukem n Arebbi s ȓḥaqq.
Ṯumma aḏ ixeǧes Arebbi mkuȓ ijjen x ȓexḏayem nnes.
Aḏasen yuc ṯuḏarṯ war ifennin ca i yinni iṣebbaren teggen lḥasanaṯ, liʼanna rezzun x lhimma ḏ uweqqar ḏ ṯuḏarṯ nni itduman.
Walakin aɣarsen yiȓi lḥisab ḏ lƹiqab ɣar yinni iy irezzun i yixef nsen waha ḏ yinni war itṭiƹin ca i lḥaqiqa ḏeffaren min war iǧin ca nican.
Aḏ yiȓi uziyyar ḏ tamara x kuȓ bnaḏem iteggen ssayyiʼaṯ, x yinni zi Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏ imezwura ƹaḏ ḏ yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Walakin aḏ tiȓi lhimma ḏ uweqqar ḏ ȓehna i marra yinni iteggen lḥasanaṯ, Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏ imezwura ƹaḏ ḏ yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Liʼanna Arebbi war itegg ca s wuḏemawen.
Cuf, marra yinni iƹeṣṣan niṯni war ɣarsen tiȓi bu ccariƹa, ataf aḏ fnan bȓa ccariƹa. Walakin yinni iƹeṣṣan ataf ɣarsen ccariƹa, aḏ twaḥakmen ƹlaḥsab ccariƹa nni.
Liʼanna iwḏan war tmeṣȓiḥen ca ag Arebbi meȓa tṣennaṭen waha i wawaȓ n ccariƹa; Lla, yinni iteggen array s min ḏayes ḏi ccariƹa, ataf ḏ yinni iy itmeṣȓaḥen ag Arebbi.

U ḏ ṣṣaḥ, yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil war ɣarsen ca ccariƹa, maƹlik teggen array s nniyyeṯ nsen min ḏayes ḏi ccariƹa n Musa, ataf niṯni aḏ iȓin ḏ ccariƹa s yixef nsen waxxa war ɣarsen ca ccariƹa n Musa.
Yina seḍharen-d belli min yurin ḏi ccariƹa aqaṯ ɣarsen yura ḏeg wuȓawen nsen. Ȓaƹquȓaṯ nsen iy zi ṣaḥḥen manaya, ḍḍamir nsen iƹeǧem-asen xmi teggen min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan niɣ ḏ min iǧan war iḥȓin.
Iqqar Lʼinjil iy zi tḥeddaṯeɣ: Manaya aḏ yiȓi ḏi Nhar nni xmi ɣa iḥaseb Arebbi x ufus n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ marra min inuffaren ḏeg wuȓawen n yiwḏan.
Iwa cek, meȓa ṯḥessbeḏ ixef nnec ḏ aʼisraʼili, trajiḏ zi ccariƹa, teftaxareḏ s lƹalaqa nnec ak Arebbi.
Meȓa cek ṯessneḏ min ixes Arebbi, ṯessneḏ ƹaweḏ aḏ tixḍareḏ min iǧan nican liʼanna ccariƹa n Musa ṯesfehham-ic.
Meȓa cek aqac metʼakked ṯzemmareḏ aḏ tsuyureḏ iḍarɣaȓen, cek ƹaweḏ aqac ḏ nnur i yinni iǧan ḏi ṯaǧest,
ṯneṣṣḥeḏ yinni war issinen, ṯseȓmaḏeḏ imezyanen, liʼanna ɣarek ḏi ccariƹa n Musa marra ṯusna ḏ lḥaqiqa.
Iwa cek iy iseȓmaḏen yinni, mayemmi war ṯseȓmiḏeḏ ca ixef nnec? Cek tḥeddaṯeḏ ṯeqqareḏ: "War tacar ca." Y cek, ma tacareḏ?
Ṯeqqareḏ: "War zenna ca." Y cek, ma ṯzenniḏ? Cek tƹiffiḏ lʼaṣnam. Y cek, ma tacareḏ zi ṯemziḏawin?
Cek iteftaxaren zi ccariƹa, ma war tweqqareḏ ca Arebbi xmi ṯƹeṣṣiḏ min ḏayes ḏi ccariƹa n Musa?
Aqa mammec iqqar Lkitab: <Ay Ayṯ-Israʼil, x ssabab nwem minzi qqaren awaȓen war iḥȓin x yisem n Arebbi yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil.>
Cek meȓa ṯxeddmeḏ s min ḏayes ḏi ccariƹa, ataf ṭṭahareṯ nnec aḏ tiȓi ɣares arbeḥ. Walakin meȓa ṯƹeṣṣiḏ ccariƹa, ataf aḏ tiȓiḏ axmi war ṯeggiḏ ca ṭṭahareṯ.
Innama, meȓa ḏinni can yijjen war iggi ca ṭṭahareṯ, netta ixeddem s min ḏayes ḏi ccariƹa n Musa, ataf wanita itwaḥsab axmi igga ṭṭahareṯ.
Iƹni wenni ixeddmen s min ḏayes ḏi ccariƹa n Musa, waxxa war iggi ca ṭṭahareṯ ḏi ddat, axac iḥkem cek iy ɣar iǧa Lkitab nni ḏ ṭṭahareṯ. Mayemmi? Liʼanna cek ṯƹeṣṣiḏ ccariƹa.
Liʼanna wenni iǧan ḏ aʼisraʼili ḏ ṣṣaḥ, war iǧi am wenni d itbanen am israʼiliyen ḏi ddat waha. Ƹaweḏ ṭṭahareṯ n ṣṣaḥ war ṯeǧi ca ḏ ṯenni d itbanen ɣar barra waha x ddat.
Walakin aʼisraʼili iǧan ḏ ṣṣaḥ itiȓi ɣares manaya ɣar ḏaxeȓ. U ḏ ṭṭahareṯ n ṣṣaḥ tiȓi ḏeg wuȓ s Arruḥ n Arebbi, war iǧi bu s ccariƹa. Bnaḏem-a war ṯ tcekkaren ca yiwḏan, itcekkar-iṯ Arebbi.
Iwa israʼiliyen, ma ɣarsen can nnfaƹ x yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil? Ƹaweḏ ṭṭahareṯ, ma ḏayes can nnfaƹ?
Wah, aṭṭas n nnfaƹ! Ḏ amezwaru, ijja-asen-d Arebbi awaȓ nnes ḏ lʼamana.
Iwa meȓa ȓebƹaḍ zzaysen war uminen ca, ma s lkufer nsen iy zi ɣa isbeṭṭeȓ Arebbi ȓƹaheḏ nnes?
Ƹemmarṣ! Ȓaḥeqqac Arebbi iqqar lḥaqiqa waxxa iwḏan marra sxerriqen. Mammec iqqar Lkitab: <Awaȓen nnec aḏ iȓin ṣeḥḥan, cek aḏ trebḥeḏ xmi ɣa twaḥekmeḏ.>
Fa meȓa ȓbaṭeȓ nneɣ iy ntegg ismeḍhar-d ȓḥaqq n Arebbi, min ɣa nini? (Nec ssawaȓeɣ ƹlaḥsab lfikra n bnaḏem.) Arebbi, ma iḍeǧem-aneɣ xmi ḏaneɣ itƹaqab?
Lla, ƹemmarṣ! Maƹlik amenni, mammec ɣa igg Arebbi aḏ iḥaseb ddunect-a?
Imken aḏ yini can yijjen: Mȓi ȓbaṭeȓ inu netta ismeḍhar-d mliḥ lḥaqiqa n Arebbi, mȓi zzayes itmarni Arebbi ḏi lƹaḍama nnes, iwa mayemmi ḏayi ɣa iḥseb ḏ lƹaṣi?
Niɣ aḏ yini can yijjen: Yallah a negg ȓbaṭeȓ ḥima azzayes d ikk ȓxir. Amenni tahamen-aneɣ can yiwḏan s ẓẓur belli neqqar awaȓ-a. Iwḏan-a niṯni sḏaheǧen lƹiqab n Arebbi!
Iwa neccin Ayṯ-Israʼil, ma lḥala nneɣ ḥsen zeg yiwḏan nneɣni? Lla, ƹemmarṣ! Nenna qbeȓ qa Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏ yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil marra negga ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ.
Mammmec iqqar Lkitab: <War iǧi ḥadd nican, uȓa ḏ ijjen.
Uȓa ḏ ijjen ma ifehhem. War irezzu x Arebbi, uȓa ḏ ijjen.
Ffɣen abriḏ marra iḏsen, ḏewȓen marra war neffƹen. War iǧi ḥadd itegg min iṣebḥan.
Ṯmijja nsen ḏ anḍeȓ inurzmen, iȓesawen nsen ixeddƹen. Ssem n ifiɣeran iteffeɣ-d zeg iyencicen nsen.
Nnaƹȓeṯ ḏ ṯarzugi iccur zzaysen uqemmum nsen.
Tqelliqen s iḍaren nsen aḏ sizzȓen iḏammen.
Tejjan arrwina ḏ lʼazma mani ma ruḥen,
abriḏ n ȓehna war ṯ ssinen.
Ṯiggwḏi zi Arebbi war ɣarsen ṯeǧi jar ṯiṭṭawin nsen.>
Fa neccin nessen belli marra min ḏayes ḏi ccariƹa n Musa tweṣṣa yinni ɣar ṯeǧa ccariƹa-ya bac uȓa ḏ ijjen war ɣares itiȓi bu lƹuder. U marra yinni iǧan ḏi ddunect-a aḏ iȓin swadday n lḥisab n Arebbi.
Falihaḏa, uȓa ḏ ijjen n bnaḏem war izemmar aḏ imeṣȓaḥ ak Arebbi s ȓexḏayem iy ḏayes ḏi ccariƹa; Lla, ccariƹa ṯesbeyyan-aneɣ-d min ṯeƹna ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ.
Fa ȓexxu Arebbi ismeḍhar-aneɣ-d mammec ɣa negg a nmeṣȓaḥ akiḏes bȓa ccariƹa. Manaya ṣaḥḥen-ṯ Lkutub n lʼanbiya ḏ ccariƹa n Musa niṯni s yixef nsen.
Arebbi, netta isemṣȓaḥ-iṯen akiḏes s arḍa nnes baṭeȓ s usenjem iy d yusin s Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.

Arebbi iqeddem-iṯ ḏ lfidya ḥima aḏ twaɣfarent ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ s iḏammen nnes, iƹni i yinni iqebbȓen manayenni s lʼiman nsen. S manayenni ismeḍhar-d Arebbi ȓḥaqq nnes. Netta tuɣa iṣebbar, war t yuwi ca ḏi ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nni iy iƹḏun,
ḥima aḏ d ismeḍhar ḏi zman-a ȓḥaqq nnes. Liʼanna Arebbi netta nican ig iǧa, netta isemṣȓaḥ akiḏes wenni ɣa yamnen zi Ƹisa.
Iwa ma a neftaxer s can ȓḥajeṯ? Lla, memnuƹ! Ma memnuƹ s ccariƹa, iƹni s lḥasanaṯ? Lla, s lʼiman!
Mayemmi? Ȓaḥeqqac neccin ɣarneɣ belli bnaḏem ismeṣȓah-iṯ Arebbi akiḏes s lʼiman nnes bȓa lḥasanaṯ n ccariƹa.
Iwa Arebbi, ma netta ḏ Arebbi n Ayṯ-Israʼil waha? Lla! Ma war iǧi uȓa ḏ Arebbi n yiwḏan war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil? Wah, ḏ Arebbi nsen uȓa ḏ niṯni.
Liʼanna Arebbi netta ḏ ijjen. Ḏ netta ig ismeṣȓahen Ayṯ-Israʼil akiḏes s lʼiman, ḏ yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil s nnefs lʼiman.
Iḏen, ma a nesbeṭṭeȓ ccariƹa s lʼiman-a? Ƹemmarṣ! Lla, neccin netḥama ccariƹa.
Iwa min ɣa nini x jeddiṯneɣ Brahim? Min ḏas iweqƹen i netta?
Maƹlik netta isemṣȓaḥ-iṯ Arebbi akiḏes ƹlaḥsab ȓexḏayem nnes, ataf Brahim ɣares ȓḥaqq iy zi ɣa iftaxer zeg yixef nnes walakin zzaṯ i Arebbi lla.
Mamc iqqar Lkitab: <Uca yumen Brahim zi Arebbi, ikkar Arebbi isemṣȓaḥ-iṯ akiḏes s lʼiman nni.>
Fa wenni ɣa iggen can ȓxeḏmeṯ, ma isḏaheǧ axas itwaxeǧes niɣ lla? Wah, manaya ḏ texȓiseṯ nnes maci ḏ kadu.
Wenni war itwekkiȓen x ȓexḏayem ig itegg, itwekkiȓ x Arebbi itarran lƹaṣi ɣar ubriḏ, wanita isemṣȓaḥ-iṯ Arebbi akiḏes s lʼiman iy ḏayes.
Nnabi Dawed uȓa ḏ netta, issawaȓ x ssaƹḏ n bnaḏem wami ṯ isemṣȓaḥ Arebbi akiḏes bȓa ȓexḏayem. Iqqar:
<Ssaƹḏ n yinni umi twaɣfarent ssayyiʼaṯ nsen, twamḥant ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nsen.
Ssaƹḏ n wenni war itḥisib Siḏi Arebbi x ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nnes.>
U ssaƹḏ-a, ma n yinni waḥeḏsen ig iteggen ṭṭahareṯ niɣ uȓa ḏ yinni war iteggen ca ṭṭahareṯ? Cuf, neccin neqqar: "Arebbi isemṣȓaḥ Brahim akiḏes s lʼiman nnes."
Meȓmi iy ṯ isemṣȓaḥ akiḏes Arebbi? Ma qbeȓ ma aḏ igg ṭṭahareṯ nnes niɣ menbaƹd ma t igg? Lla, maci menbaƹd i ṭṭahareṯ nnes walakin qbeȓ.

Ṯumma ṭṭahareṯ-a ṯusa-as-d ḏ ijjen n lƹalama ḏ ijjen n ddalil belli Arebbi isemṣȓaḥ-iṯ akiḏes s lʼiman nni iy tuɣa ḏayes qbeȓ ma aḏ iṭehhar. Mayemmi manaya? Bac aḏ yiȓi Brahim ḏ jeddiṯsen n yinni marra itamnen waxxa war ggin ca ṭṭahareṯ, bac uȓa ḏ yinni aṯen isemṣȓaḥ Arebbi akiḏes.

U netta ḏ jeddiṯsen ƹaweḏ uȓa n yinni iggin ṭṭahareṯ, walakin maci ggin ṭṭahareṯ u ṣafi. Lla, itxeṣṣa-yasen aḏ ḏeffaren ȓaṯar n lʼiman mamc tuɣa iǧa ɣar jeddiṯneɣ Brahim wami tuɣa ƹaḏ war iggi bu ṭṭahareṯ.
Ȓƹaheḏ iy zi iwƹeḏ Arebbi Brahim ḏ ddurriṯ nnes ḥima aḏ iwareṯ netta ddunect. Ȓƹaheḏ nni war d yusi ca s ccariƹa, yusa-d s lʼiman nni ig isemṣȓaḥen iwḏan ak Arebbi.
Maƹlik aḏ warṯen yinni iḏeffaren ccariƹa, ataf lʼiman-a walu, ataf ȓƹaheḏ-a ixwa.
Aqa ccariƹa n Musa tawi-d lƹiqab n Arebbi. Walakin mani war tiȓi ca ccariƹa war tiȓi ca ḏinni ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ.

S manayenni ȓƹaheḏ-a ibna x lʼiman waḥḏes: Ḥima ȓƹaheḏ-a aḏ d yas zi arḍa nnes, ḥima aṯ iḍmen Arebbi i marra ddurriṯ n Brahim. U maci ɣir wenni iḏeffaren ccariƹa n Musa; Lla, uȓa ḏ wenni icarrcen ḏi lʼiman n Brahim. Netta ḏ jeddiṯneɣ marra.
Mammec iqqar Lkitab: <Arriɣ-cek ḏ jeddiṯsen i waṭṭas n ȓegnus.> Ḏinni Brahim zzaṯ i Arebbi iy zi itamen, iƹni wenni d isnekkaren yinni immuṯen, iƹni wenni d ixeȓqen min ƹemmarṣ war iǧin.
Waxxa war ḏinni bu lʼamal qaƹ, yumen Brahim igga lʼamal. Amenni iy iḏweȓ ḏ jeddiṯsen i waṭṭas n ȓegnus mammec tuɣa ḏas itwanna zi qbeȓ: < Min iǧan ḏ iṯran ḏeg ujenna amenni iy ɣa ṯiȓi ddurriṯ nnec.>
Ṯumma lʼiman nnes war inqiṣ ca waxxa ɣares ƹȓayen miyya n iseggwusa, waxxa issen ixef nnes war izemmar ca ṯamɣarṯ nnes Sara war tirew ca.
Waxxa amenni war inqiṣ ca lʼiman nnes, war itcekki ca ḏi ȓƹaheḏ nni iy ḏas yuca Arebbi. Walakin yarenni ḏi lʼiman nnes iḥemmeḏ Arebbi,
netta aqaṯ metʼakked aṭṭas Arebbi izemmar aḏ ikemmeȓ x ȓƹaheḏ nnes.
S manaya isemṣȓaḥ-iṯ Arebbi akiḏes.
Mayemmi iqqar Lkitab qa < Arebbi isemṣȓaḥ-iṯ akiḏes >? Ma iqqar awaȓ-a ƹlaḥsab Brahim waḥḏes?
Lla, yura ƹaweḏ ƹlaḥsab neccin umi ḏaneɣ isemṣȓaḥ akiḏes wami zzayes numen zi Arebbi wenni iy d isekkaren Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa zi ȓmewṯ.
Itwasellem ḥima aḏ immeṯ x ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nneɣ, itwasekkar-d ḥima aḏaneɣ isemṣȓaḥ Arebbi akiḏes.
Iḏen fa wami ḏaneɣ isemṣȓaḥ Arebbi akiḏes s lʼiman nneɣ aqaneɣ ḏi ȓehna ak Arebbi x ufus n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Netta zzayes iy nufa abriḏ s lʼiman ɣar arḍa iy ḏi neǧa ȓexxu. Nfarreḥ ḏi lʼamal n lƹaḍama n Arebbi.
War iǧi ɣir manaya waha, nfarreḥ neccin uȓa ḏi ȓemḥayen. Nessen belli ȓemḥayen-a tarwent-id ṣṣbar.
Ṣṣbar-a itarew ḏayneɣ minzi ɣa neɣȓeb x ȓemḥayen. S ȓeɣȓab-a x ȓemḥayen itarew ḏayneɣ lʼamal.
Lʼamal-a war ḏaneɣ itxeyyib ca, mayemmi? Liʼanna Arebbi yuca-aneɣ Arruḥ iqeddsen, zzayes ig iccur uȓawen nneɣ s ȓemḥibbeṯ nnes.
Fa ḏi ȓweqṯ nni nican ṯenni tuɣa ixḍar Arebbi neccin war ɣarneɣ bu jjheḏ, immuṯ Lmasiḥ xaneɣ wami neƹṣa.
Muḥaȓ aḏ iqbeȓ can yijjen aḏ immeṯ x yijjen n bnaḏem nneɣni ḏ aṣebḥan waha. Meȓa bnaḏem aqaṯ ḏ aṣebḥan aṭṭas, imken can yijjen axas iqbeȓ aḏ immeṯ.
Walakin neccin tuɣaneɣ ƹaḏ nƹeṣṣa Arebbi wami immuṯ xaneɣ Lmasiḥ. S manayenni isbeyyen-aneɣ-d Arebbi mecḥaȓ ḏaneɣ itexs.
Iḏen, aqaneɣ bariʼin ȓexxu s iḏammen n Lmasiḥ, u labud zzayes iy ɣa nenjem zeg uɣḍab n Arebbi.
Neccin nmeṣȓaḥ ak Arebbi s ȓmewṯ n Mmis wami tuɣaneɣ neccin ƹaḏ ḏ ȓƹaḏyan nnes. Ȓexxu wami kiḏes nmeṣȓaḥ, u labud zzayes iy ɣa nenjem s ṯuḏarṯ nnes!
War iǧi ɣir manaya waha, neccin nfarreḥ zi Arebbi s Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ wenni iy ḏaneɣ isemṣȓaḥen akiḏes.
Iḏen, ṯban-d ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ ɣar ddunect s yijjen n bnaḏem, iƹni Adam. S ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ nni iy ṯeǧa ȓmewṯ. Ssenni ṯnefreq ȓmewṯ x yiwḏan marra liʼanna iwḏan marra ƹṣan.
Aqa ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ tuɣa teǧa ḏi ddunect qbeȓ ma aḏ d ṯas ccariƹa. Walakin mani war ṯuwiḍ ca ccariƹa, Arebbi war ḏinni itḥisib bu ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ.
Innama, zi zman n Adam aȓ zman n Musa ṯḥekkem ȓmewṯ x yiwḏan uȓa x yinni war iƹṣin ca amecnaw ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ n Adam, u netta ḏ ȓmiṯal n bnaḏem iy d ɣa yasen.

Walakin ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ n Adam war nzemmar at nmeṯṯel ak lhadiya n arḍa n Arebbi. Cuf, ijjen n bnaḏem, netta ḏ Adam, iƹṣa Arebbi yuwi-d ȓmewṯ i marra yiwḏan. Ȓexxu mecḥaȓ imɣar arḍa n Arebbi ḏ lhadiya iy d infeyyḍen x yiwḏan s arḍa n yijjen n bnaḏem nneɣni netta ḏ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.

Cuf ƹaweḏ, lhadiya n Arebbi maci amecnaw min iweqƹen x ssabab n ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ igga bnaḏem nni Adam. Liʼanna ȓḥukem iy d ṯuwi ijjen n ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ netta ḏ lḥisab ḏ lƹiqab. Walakin s lhadiya-ya Arebbi isemṣȓaḥ akiḏes bnaḏem menbaƹd i waṭṭas n ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ.

Iƹni, s ssabab n ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ nni n yijjen n bnaḏem ṯebḏa ȓmewṯ ṯḥekkem x yiwḏan s ssabab n bnaḏem nni. Ȓexxu s ssabab n yijjen n bnaḏem, iƹni s Ƹisa Lmasiḥ, ḏ ṯuḏarṯ nettaṯ ṯḥekkem aṭṭas x yinni iqebbȓen arḍa imɣaren n Arebbi ḏ lhadiya iy ṯen isemṣȓaḥen akiḏes.
Iḏen ijjen n ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ ig igga ijjen n bnaḏem ṯuwi-d lḥisab ḏ lƹiqab i marra iwḏan. Amenni ijjen n baraʼa ig igga ijjen n bnaḏem yuwi-d ṣṣulḥ ḏ ṯuḏarṯ i marra iwḏan.
Liʼanna mammec iƹṣa Adam Arebbi yuwi-d ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ i waṭṭas n yiwḏan, amenni iṭaƹ Ƹisa i Arebbi ssenni meṣȓaḥen aṭṭas n yiwḏan ak Arebbi.
U ccariƹa nettaṯ ṯuḏef-d ḥima aḏ kṯarent ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ. Walakin cḥaȓ ma kṯarent ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ, arḍa n Arebbi ikṯar ktar zzaysent.
U mammec ṯeḥkem ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ ṯuwi-d ȓmewṯ, amenni iy xaneɣ iḥkem arḍa wami ḏaneɣ isemṣȓaḥ Arebbi akiḏes yuwi-d ṯuḏarṯ n ȓebda x ufus n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Iwa, min ɣa nini? Ma a nsiɣi ḏi ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ ḥima aḏ ikṯar arḍa n Arebbi?
Lla, ƹemmarṣ! Neccin nemmuṯ-as i ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ, ixeṣṣa-yaneɣ ȓexxu war netsiɣi ca a nƹic ḏayes.
Ma war ṯessinem ca kenniw? Neccin, wami netwaṭehhar s waman ḥima a niȓi ḏ ijjen ak Lmasiḥ, netwaṭehhar akiḏes ḥima a ncarec ḏi ȓmewṯ nnes.

Falihaḏa wami netwaṭehhar akiḏes s waman, iƹni netwanḍeȓ akiḏes ḏi ȓmewṯ. Mayemmi? Ḥima mammec d ikkar Lmasiḥ zi ȓmewṯ s lƹaḍama n Arebbi Babaṯneɣ, amenni uȓa ḏ neccin aqa a nƹic ḏeg yijjen n ṯuḏarṯ ḏ jḏiḏ.
Cuf, meȓa ncarec akiḏes ḏeg yijjen n ȓmewṯ am ṯenni iy igga netta, amenni ƹaweḏ iy kiḏes ɣa ncarec ḏeg yijjen n lqiyama am ṯenni iy igga netta.
Neccin nessen belli nnefs nneɣ tuɣa ṯeǧa qbeȓ, nettaṯ iƹni, twaṣelleb ak Lmasiḥ ḥima aḏ tbeṭṭeȓ nnefs nneɣ iccuren s ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ, bac war netɣimi ca ssa aȓ ṯsawent ƹaḏ ḏ isemɣan n ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ.
Aqa wenni immuṯen ihna zi ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ.
Fa meȓa nemmuṯ neccin ak Lmasiḥ, ntamen ƹaweḏ akiḏes neddar.
Neccin nessen qa Lmasiḥ ikkar-d zi ȓmewṯ, ƹemmarṣ aḏ immeṯ ƹaweḏ. War tɣimi ȓmewṯ axas ṯḥekkem.
Liʼanna wami immuṯ, immuṯ ijjen n ṯwaȓa waha i ȓebda i min iǧan ḏ ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ. Ṯuḏarṯ nnes iddar ȓexxu, iddar-it i Arebbi.
Ammu labud aḏ tḥessbem kenniw ixef nwem ṯemmuṯem-as i ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ, ṯeddarem-as i Arebbi s Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Falihaḏa ixeṣṣa war tejjim ca ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ aḏ teḥkem x ddat nwem iy ɣa ifnan ḥima war teggem ca array i ccehweṯ nnes.

War tqeddameṯ uȓa ḏ ijjen n ṭṭarf zi ddat nwem i ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ aḏ tegg ccarr s ddat nwem. Qeddmeṯ ixef nwem i Arebbi am yiwḏan zaƹma iy d ikkaren zeg imettinen ɣar ṯuḏarṯ. Qeddmeṯ kuȓ ṭṭarf zi ddat nwem ḥima azzayes itwagg min iǧan nican.
Aqa ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ war ṯeqqim ca aḏ teḥkem xawem liʼanna war ṯeǧim ca swadday n ufus n ccariƹa, aqawem swadday n arḍa n Arebbi.
Iwa neccin ma a neƹṣa Arebbi xmi aqaneɣ swadday n arḍa nnes war neǧi ca swadday n ufus n ccariƹa? Lla, ƹemmarṣ!

Ma war ṯessinem ca? Meȓa ṯsellmem ixef nwem i can yijjen ṯḏewȓem ḏ isemɣan ṯṭaƹam-as, ataf aḏ tḏewȓem ḏ isemɣan i wenni umi ṯṭaƹam. Imma aḏ tṭaƹem i ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ itawin ɣar ȓmewṯ, imma aḏ tṭaƹem i wenni iy kenniw ɣa yawin ɣar ṣṣulḥ akiḏes.

Nec ssawaȓeɣ akiḏwem s yijjen n wawaȓ ƹadi liʼanna iqseḥ x bnaḏem aḏ ifhem manaya. Qbeȓ tuɣa tqeddamem kuȓ ṭṭarf zi ddat nwem bac azzayes itwagg lfasad ḏ ccarr itemɣuren. Walakin ȓexxu tqeddameṯ ddat nwem aḏ texḏem min iǧan nican ḥima aḏ tiȓim ṯeṣfam.
Cuf, wami tuɣa ṯṭaƹam i ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ, tuɣa ɣarwem lḥurriya aḏ trezzum war teggem min iǧan nican.
Ḏi ȓweqṯ nni, ṯimesȓayin nni ma ḏaysent can nnfaƹ minzi ȓexxu tseḏḥam? Walu, liʼanna ṯimesȓayin nni tawint ɣar ȓmewṯ.
Ȓexxu ṯehnam zi ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ, ṯṭaƹam i Arebbi. Man nnfaƹ iy zzayes ɣa ṯawim? Iƹni aḏ tiȓim ṯeṣfam u manayenni itawi ɣar tuḏarṯ n ȓebda.
Aqa axeǧes n ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ netta ḏ ȓmewṯ, walakin lhadiya n Arebbi nettaṯ ḏ ṯuḏarṯ n ȓebda ḏi Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Ay ayṯma, ssawaȓeɣ akiḏwem ṯessnem ccariƹa. Ma war ṯessinem illa ccariƹa ṯḥekkem x bnaḏem iy iddaren waha?
Maṯalan ḏi ccariƹa, ṯamɣarṯ ṯemȓec meȓa aryaz nnes aqaṯ ƹaḏ iddar, aqat x yiri nnes. Meȓa aryaz nnes immuṯ aqa twafekk zi lqanun n ȓemȓac.

S manaya, meȓa ṯruḥ ɣar can yijjen nneɣni, aryaz nnes aqaṯ ƹaḏ iddar, ataf twaḥsab ṯezna. Walakin meȓa immuṯ uryaz nnes, ataf twafekk zi lqanun-a. Ȓexddenni meȓa ṯemȓec ak can uryaz nneɣni ataf war twiḥisib ca ṯezna.

Ay ayṯma, amenni iy ṯeǧam uȓa ḏ kenniw. Iƹni twafekkem zi ccariƹa n Musa wami ṯemmuṯ ddat n Lmasiḥ, aqawem x yiri n yijjen nneɣni netta ḏ yiri n Lmasiḥ iy d ikkaren zi ȓmewṯ, ḥima a narew ȓexḏayem ḏ ṯiṣebḥanin i Arebbi.

Liʼanna qbeȓ wami tuɣa ntegg array i ṭṭabiƹa ṯaƹeffant nneɣ, arnint ḏayneɣ ccehawaṯ ḏ ṯiƹeffanin ƹlaḥsab min ḏaneɣ ṯenna ccariƹa, xeddment ccehawaṯ nni ḏi ddat nneɣ uca ntarew ȓexḏayem itawin ɣar ȓmewṯ.
Walakin ȓexxu neccin netwafekk zi ccariƹa-ya iy ḏaneɣ iqqnen, nemmuṯ-as i manayenni. Neccin nƹebbeḏ s yijjen n ubriḏ ḏ jḏiḏ n Arruḥ n Arebbi, maci s nniḍam nni aqḏim iy yurin ḏi Lkitab.

Iwa min ɣa nini? Ma ccariƹa n Musa nettaṯ s yixef nnes ḏ ijjen n ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ? Lla, ƹemmarṣ! Maƹlik ccariƹa war ṯeǧi, ataf war ssineɣ min ṯeƹna ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ. Maƹlik war ḏayes ȓuṣiyeṯ nni <War ƹecceq>, ataf war ssineɣ min iƹna uƹeccaq.
Ṯumma ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ ṯufa ḏayi lfurṣa s ȓuṣiyeṯ-a, ṯarni ḏayi zi kuȓ nnuƹ n uƹeccaq iy iǧan liʼanna ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ bȓa ccariƹa axmi ṯemmuṯ.
Nec qbeȓ ma aḏ ssneɣ ccariƹa, tuɣayi ddareɣ. Walakin wami d ṯusa ȓuṣiyeṯ n Arebbi, ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ axmi ṯekkar-d zi ȓmewṯ uca nec axmi mmuṯeɣ.
Ṯumma ufiɣ ȓuṣiyeṯ nni iy d yusin aḏayi ṯuc ṯuḏarṯ, lla, qa nec ṯuwi-yayi ɣar ȓmewṯ.
Liʼanna ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ ṯufa ḏayi lfurṣa s ȓuṣiyeṯ-a ṯecmeṯ-ayi u ƹaweḏ zzayes zi ȓuṣiyeṯ-a ṯneɣ-ayi.
S manaya ccariƹa n Musa ṯeṣfa, ȓuṣiyeṯ n Arebbi ṯeṣfa, ṯeṣȓaḥ, ṯeṣbaḥ.

Iwa, ma iḏweȓ min iṣebḥan ḏ ssabab iy zi ɣa mmṯeɣ nec? Lla, ƹemmarṣ! Lƹaks, ḏ ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ iy iggin manayenni, ṯesxeddam min iṣebḥan ḥima aḏayi ṯneɣ. Mayemmi? Ḥima aḏ tesmeḍhar ixef nnes nettaṯ ḏ ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ. Ṯumma s lfurṣa n ȓuṣiyeṯ-a ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ ṯesmeḍhar-d bȓa ȓaḥedd mecḥaȓ iqbeḥ ccarr nnes.
Fa neccin nessen ccariƹa n Musa zi Arebbi, walakin nec ḏ bnaḏem twammenzeɣ i ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ.
War sent tefhimeɣ ca i ȓexḏayem inu liʼanna nec war teggeɣ min xseɣ aṯ ggeɣ, teggeɣ min tƹiffiɣ.
U xmi teggeɣ min war xseɣ ca aḏ ggeɣ, ataf wafqeɣ belli ccariƹa n Musa ṯeṣbaḥ.
Ṯumma zi ssa aȓ ṯsawent ataf maci ḏ nec iteggen manaya, ḏ ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ nni iy ḏayi izeddɣen.
Nec ṭṭabiƹa ṯaƹeffant inu ssneɣ war ḏayes ṯezḏiɣ uȓa ḏ ijjen n ṯmesȓayṯ ḏ ṯaṣebḥant. Liʼanna rezzuɣ aḏ ggeɣ ṯimesȓayin ṯiṣebḥanin, walakin war zemmareɣ aṯent ggeɣ.
Ṯimesȓayin nni ṯiṣebḥanin iy texseɣ aṯent ggeɣ war ṯent teggeɣ ca; Lla, ccarr nni iy war texseɣ aṯ ggeɣ teggeɣ-ṯ.
Meȓa teggeɣ min war texseɣ, ataf nettaṯ ḏ ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ nni iy ḏayi izeddɣen; maci ḏ nec iteggen manayenni.
Falihaḏa nec ufiɣ ḏeg yixef inu ijjen n ṭṭabiƹa, iƹni xmi texseɣ aḏ ggeɣ can ṯmesȓayṯ ḏ ṯaṣebḥant, ufiɣ ḏinni ccarr yuḏes.
Liʼanna ḏi nnefs inu nec farḥeɣ s ccariƹa n Arebbi,
walakin tafeɣ ijjen n ṭṭabiƹa nneɣni ḏeg yixef inu ig itmenɣan ak min ɣari ḏi ȓaƹqeȓ inu. S ṭṭabiƹa-ya teqqen-ayi ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ nni iy ḏayi izeddɣen ḏeg yixef inu.
Ya ȓefḍiḥeṯ inu nec! Wi ḏayi ɣa isnejmen zi ddat-a ṯanita n ȓmewṯ?
Tcekkareɣ Arebbi ƹlaḥsab Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ! S manaya ḏi ȓaƹqeȓ inu nec ḏ ismeɣ n ccariƹa n Arebbi, nec ḏi ddat inu ḏ ismeɣ n ṭṭabiƹa n ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ.
Iḏen fa ȓexxu, war iǧi bu lḥisab ḏ lƹiqab x yinni iǧan ḏ ijjen ak Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Liʼanna ḏi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ, ṭṭabiƹa n Arruḥ ig iticcen ṯuḏarṯ ṯfekk-icek-d zi ṭṭabiƹa n ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ ḏ ȓmewṯ.

Cuf, Arebbi igga min war ṯzemmar aḏ tegg ccariƹa n Musa, mayemmi? Ƹlaḥsab ḍḍuƹef n ddat nneɣ iy ḏas ikksen jjheḏ i ccariƹa. Arebbi, wami iy d issekk Mmis imeṯṯel-iṯ-iḏ am ddat n bnaḏem iƹṣan, issekk-iṯ-id ḏ lfidya x ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ nneɣ. Ammu iḥaseb iƹaqeb ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ ig iǧan ḏi ddat n bnaḏem
bac aḏ itwakemmeȓ min ṯxes zzayneɣ ccariƹa n Musa. Neccin, iƹni ḏ yinni ig igguren ḏeg ubriḏ n Arruḥ, war ntegg array i nnefs nneɣ.
Cuf, yinni itƹicen ƹlaḥsab ṭṭabiƹa ṯaƹeffant nsen xeddmen s ȓxaḍar nsen ḏi ṯmesȓayin n ṭṭabiƹa ṯaƹeffant nsen. Walakin yinni itƹicen ƹlaḥsab abriḏ n Arruḥ xeddmen s ȓxaḍar nsen ḏi ṯmesȓayin n Arruḥ.
Aqa yinni ixeddmen s ȓxaḍar nsen ḏi ṯmesȓayin n ṭṭabiƹa ṯaƹeffant nsen ataf aḏ mmṯen. Walakin yinni ixeddmen s ȓxaḍar nsen ḏi ṯmesȓayin n Arruḥ ataf aḏ ddaren aɣarsen yiȓi ȓehna.
Aqa ȓxaḍar ixeddmen ḏi ṯmesȓayin n ṭṭabiƹa ṯaƹeffant n bnaḏem itƹarraḍ Arebbi. War iṭṭiƹi ca i ccariƹa n Arebbi, u ḏ ṣṣaḥ war izemmar ca.
U yinni itṭaƹan i ṭṭabiƹa ṯaƹeffant nsen war zemmaren ca aḏ sarḍan Arebbi.
Amma kenniw, meȓa izeddeɣ ḏaywem Arruḥ n Arebbi, ataf aḏ tƹicem x ubriḏ n Arruḥ ataf war teggem array i ṭṭabiƹa ṯaƹeffant nwem. U wenni war ɣar iǧi Arruḥ n Lmasiḥ, war iǧi ca zi Lmasiḥ.
Ṯumma Lmasiḥ meȓa aqaṯ ḏaywem, ddat nwem waxxa ṯemmuṯ s ssabab n ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ, arruḥ nwem iddar s ssabab n ṣṣulḥ.
Ṯumma meȓa izeddeɣ ḏaywem Arruḥ n Arebbi iy d isekkaren Ƹisa zi ȓmewṯ, ataf wenni iy d isekkaren Ƹisa zi ȓmewṯ aḏaywem d yarr ṯuḏarṯ uȓa ḏi ddat nwem ifennan iƹni s Arruḥ nnes iy ḏaywem izeddɣen.
X manayenni ay ayṯma, itxeṣṣa-yaneɣ a negg lwajib, walakin maci ḥima a negg array i ṭṭabiƹa ṯaƹeffant nneɣ.
Liʼanna kenniw meȓa teggem array i ṭṭabiƹa ṯaƹeffant nwem, aḏ temmṯem. Meȓa ṯneqqem ȓefƹayer n ddat nwem s Arruḥ n Arebbi, aḏ teddarem.
U yinni iḏeffaren Arruḥ n Arebbi, ḏ yinni iy iǧan ḏ ṯarwa n Arebbi.

Liʼanna Arruḥ iy ḏawem d immucen war kenniw itarri ca ḏ isemɣan ḥima aḏ tƹicem ƹaweḏ ḏi ṯiggwḏi; Lla, immuc-awem-d Arruḥ iqeddsen ḥima aḏ tiȓim ḏ ṯarwa n Arebbi. S Arruḥ nni iy ɣa nȓaɣa: Abba, iƹni, a Baba inu.
Iƹni Arruḥ n Arebbi s yixef nnes ig iṣaḥḥen ḏi arruḥ nneɣ belli neccin ḏ ṯarwa n Arebbi.
U neccin meȓa aqaneɣ ḏ ṯarwa n Arebbi, ataf a nwareṯ. Iƹni a nwareṯ zi Arebbi, a nwareṯ ak Lmasiḥ. Walakin ixeṣṣa-yaneɣ a ncarec akiḏes ḏeg uƹeddeb nnes ḥima a ncarec akiḏes ƹaweḏ ḏi lƹaḍama nnes.
Cuf, nec twaȓiɣ aƹeddeb-a iy xaneɣ itekken ḏi ddunect-a netta war iǧi ḏ walu bac aḏ imeṯṯel ak lƹaḍama iy ḏaneɣ d ɣa imeḍharen.
Aqa marra min d itwaxeȓqen ḏaysen mezȓi ḏ ameqqran trajan aḏ ẓren ṯsaƹƹat nni iy ḏi d ɣa banen ṯarwa n Arebbi.
Liʼanna marra min d itwaxeȓqen nṣaben s lfacal. Walakin maci s array nsen, s array n wenni iy ṯen iṣaben. U manayenni ḏi lʼamal.
Lʼamal, iƹni, belli marra min d itwaxeȓqen aḏ twafekken zi lfana n ȓmewṯ, aḏ carcen ḏi lḥurriya n lƹaḍama iy ɣarsen ɣar ṯarwa n Arebbi.
Cuf, neccin nessen belli marra min d itwaxeȓqen aqaṯen aȓ nhara ƹaḏ tnezbaren amecnaw ṯamɣarṯ nni iy ḏi iǧa ȓeḥriq n ṯarwa.
U maci niṯni waha, uȓa ḏ neccin umi immuc Arruḥ iqeddsen ḏ amezwaru nnehhek ḏeg yixef nneɣ. Ḏayneɣ mezȓi, neccin netraja zi Arebbi aḏ d isbeyyen belli neccin ḏ ṯarwa nnes, iƹni aḏ ifekk ddat nneɣ.
Aqa ḏi mezȓi-ya neccin nenjem. Cuf, meȓa ṣafi nufa mezȓi nni iy nrezzu, ataf ṣafi war ḏayneɣ itiȓi bu mezȓi ƹaḏ. Ma a nraja ƹaḏ mezȓi nni meȓa ṣafi nufi-ṯ?
Lla, walakin meȓa ƹaḏ war ṯ nufi ca ataf aṯ nraja s ṣṣbar.
Fa ammu Arruḥ iqeddsen itƹawan-aneɣ ḏi ḍḍuƹef nneɣ. Neccin war nessin ca mliḥ minxef ɣa neẓẓaǧ, walakin Arruḥ iqeddsen s yixef nnes itṭalab-as i Arebbi x ssabab nneɣ s unhak war itsemiƹen.
Ṯumma Arebbi netta itwaȓan min iǧan ḏeg wuȓawen n bnaḏem, issen min itexs Arruḥ iqeddsen. Liʼanna Arruḥ ƹlaḥsab ȓxaḍar n Arebbi itṭalab x ȓmuminin ṣṣaliḥin.
Fa neccin nessen belli marra min itewqiƹen qaƹ itarra-ṯ Arebbi ḏ ttisir i yinni iy ṯ itexsen, iƹni ḏ yinni umi iy d iȓaɣa ƹlaḥsab lɣaraḍ nnes.
Liʼanna yinni iy tuɣa issen-iṯen zi qbeȓ, izemmem-iṯen zi qbeȓ ḥima aḏ iȓin x ṣṣifeṯ n Mmis aḏ iȓin am netta. Ammu aḏ yiȓi netta ḏ Mmis amenzu n waṭṭas n ayṯmas.
Ṯumma yinni iy tuɣa izemmem zi qbeȓ, iȓaɣa-d xasen. Ṯumma yinni umi d iȓaɣa, isemṣȓaḥ-iṯen akiḏes. Ṯumma yinni isemṣȓaḥ akiḏes, yuca-asen amcan ḏi lƹaḍama nnes.
Iwa, min ɣa nini menbaƹd i marra manaya? Meȓa Arebbi aqaṯ akiḏneɣ, uw izemmaren aḏ yiȓi ḍed nneɣ?
Siḏi Arebbi war isƹizz ca Mmis xaneɣ, iqeddem-iṯ i ȓmewṯ xaneɣ marra. Ma aḏ teqqim can ȓḥajeṯ war ḏaneɣ-t iticc ca akiḏes?
Wi izemmaren aḏ itahem yinni iy ixḍar Arebbi? Uȓa ḏ ijjen! Arebbi s yixef nnes netta ig isemṣȓaḥen akiḏes iwḏan.
Wi izemmaren axasen iḥkem? Uȓa ḏ ijjen! Liʼanna netta Ƹisa Lmasiḥ ig immuṯen. U ktar, ikkar-d zi ȓmewṯ u ḏ netta iy iǧan x ufusi n Arebbi, itcafaƹ ḏayneɣ.
Wi ḏaneɣ ɣa iƹezȓen zi ȓemḥibbeṯ n Lmasiḥ? Uȓa ḏ ijjen! Ȓa ḏ azeyyar, ȓa ḏ tamara, ȓa ḏ aƹeddeb, ȓa ḏ buheyyuf, ȓa ḏ ṯuƹaryant, ȓa ḏ lxaṭar, uȓa ḏ ssif.
Mammec iqqar Lkitab: <Neccin x ssabab nnec cek netwajah ȓmewṯ nhar ikmaȓ. Neccin netwaḥsab amecnaw iḥuȓiyen umi ɣa ɣarṣen.>
Walakin ḏi marra manaya neccin netwaḥsab ktar zi lʼabṭal x ufus n wenni iy ḏaneɣ ixsen.
Ssawaȓeɣ ȓḥaqq ḏi Lmasiḥ war iǧi bu ḏ ixarriqen. Ȓaƹqeȓ inu u ḏ Arruḥ iqeddsen aḏayi ṣaḥḥen min ɣa iniɣ.
Niṯni ḏ Ayṯ-Israʼil, itbenna-ṯen Siḏi Arebbi. Ismeḍhar-asen-d lƹaḍama nnes, iƹaheḏ-iṯen, yuca-asen ccariƹa n Musa ḏ lƹibada, iwƹeḏ-iṯen.
Usin-d zi ssalaf ṣṣaliḥin, u zeg uẓwer nsen iy d yusa Lmasiḥ ḏ ddat ḏ bnaḏem. Arebbi itwaḥmeḏ i ȓebda, wenni iḥekkmen x marra. Amin.
Walakin, awaȓ n Arebbi ma war injiḥ ca? Lla, injeḥ! Fa maci Ayṯ-Israʼil qaƹ ig iǧan ḏ israʼiliyen ḏ ṣṣaḥ.
Ƹaweḏ war iǧi marra ṯarwa iy d ikkin zi Brahim ḏ ṯarwa nnes n ṣṣaḥ. Inna-as Arebbi: <Ḏ ṯarwa nnec iy d ɣa iffɣen zi mmic Isḥaq iy ɣa itwaḥessben.>
Manaya ixes aḏ yini ṯarwa n Arebbi ḏ ṣṣaḥ twaḥessben zi ṯarwa n ȓƹaheḏ, maci zi ṯarwa n bnaḏem.
Liʼanna ȓƹaheḏ-a iy ḏas yuca Arebbi i Brahim ḏ wanita, inna: <Aḏ d ƹeqbeɣ aseggwas iy d ɣa yasen am ȓweqṯ-a, aḏ afeɣ ij uḥenjir ɣar Sara.>
War iǧi bu manayenni waha. Rafiqa ṯeysi aƹeddis ɣares acniwen, babaṯsen netta ḏ jeddiṯneɣ Isḥaq.
Mammec iqqar Lkitab: <Ḥibbeɣ Yaƹqub, seḥqareɣ Ƹasu.>
Min ɣa nini x manaya? Ma Arebbi iḍeǧem? Lla, ƹemmarṣ!
Qa Arebbi inna-as i Musa: <Aḏ reḥmeɣ wenni xseɣ, aḏ ḥinneɣ x wenni xseɣ.>
Manaya war iǧi ca zi ȓxeḏmeṯ n bnaḏem niɣ zi min itexs, manaya aqaṯ zi Arebbi wenni ireḥḥmen.
Aqa iqqar-as Lkitab i Firƹun: <Ggiɣ-ac ḏ azeǧiḏ ḥima aḏayek d smeḍhareɣ jjheḏ inu, ḥima aḏ itwassen yisem inu ḏi marra ddunect.>
Falihaḏa Arebbi ireḥḥem wenni ixes, isɣannan wenni ixes.
Iwa a bnaḏem, ma aḏayi ṯiniḏ mayemmi ƹaḏ iy ḏaneɣ itḥasab Arebbi? Ma aḏayi ṯiniḏ ug izemmaren aḏ imɣannen ak min ixes netta?
Cuf a bnaḏem, min ṯeƹniḏ cek bac ṯzemmareḏ aḏ tarreḏ awaȓ x Arebbi? Ma zemmaren aḏ inin iɣerrafen i wenni iy ṯen iṣenƹen, Mayemmi ḏaneɣ ṯeggiḏ ammu?
Ma war ɣares bu ȓḥaqq ɣar lemƹallem aḏ isexḏem ṯȓaxṯ mammec ixes, iƹni aḏ igg zeg yijjen n ȓƹajneṯ iḏeqqi ijjen n uɣerraf i min iṣebḥan, aḏ igg ijjen i min iƹuffnen?
Amenni ig igga Arebbi. Wami ixes aḏ d ismeḍhar aɣḍab nnes aḏ d isbeyyen jjheḏ iy ɣares, iṣebbar aṭṭas x yinni iy xef iɣḍeb iƹni iɣerrafen nni wejḏen aḏ twarzen.
Mammec iqqar Arebbi ḏi Lkitab n nnabi Hucaƹ: <Yinni tuɣa war iǧin ca ḏ ccaƹb inu, asen ȓaɣiɣ a ccaƹb inu. Ṯenni tuɣa war iƹizzen, as ȓaɣiɣ a ṯamƹizzit inu.>
U ḏeg umcan nni wenni mani ḏasen inna Arebbi: Kenniw war ṯeǧim ca ḏ ccaƹb inu, ḏinni iy ḏasen ɣa ȓaɣan a ṯarwa n Arebbi iddaren.
Fa nnabi Icaƹya iȓaɣa netta x Ayṯ-Israʼil inna: <Waxxa lƹadad n Ayṯ-Israʼil igga am yijḏi n ȓebḥar, ḏrus zzaysen iy ɣa inejmen.
Aqa Siḏi Arebbi war itƹeṭṭiȓ ca aḏ ixḏem ḏi ddunect-a awaȓ ig inna.>
Ammu ig inna nnabi Icaƹya zi qbeȓ: <Maƹlik war iǧi ḏ Siḏi Arebbi Lƹalamin iy iḥefḍen can ddurriṯ nneɣ, iȓi iwqeƹ-aneɣ amecnaw min iweqƹen i ṯendint n Sadum ḏ ṯendint n Ƹamura.>
Iwa, min ɣa nini? Yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil tuɣa war rezzun ca ṣṣulḥ ak Arebbi, walakin ufin-ṯ wami umnen.
Ayṯ-Israʼil wami rezzun ijjen n ccariƹa iticcen ṣṣulḥ ak Arebbi, war ufin ca ccariƹa nni.
Mayemmi? Liʼanna tuɣa rezzun ṣṣulḥ nni s ȓexḏayem nsen waha bȓa ma aḏ amnen. Nqeȓḍen ḏeg uzru nni iy ḏi tneqȓaḍen yiwḏan.
Mammec iqqar Lkitab: <Aqa ggiɣ ḏi ṯendint n Lquds ij n ttirceṯ iy ḏi tenqȓaḍen yiwḏan, ḏ yijjen n uzru iy ṯen iɣeṭṭȓen. Wenni iy zzayes ɣa yamnen, ƹemmarṣ aṯ xeyybeɣ.>
Inna-asen Bulus: Ay ayṯma, mecḥaȓ tmenniɣ s wuȓ inu tẓaǧiɣ i Arebbi aḏ tenjem lʼumma inu.
Nec cehhḏeɣ xasen rezzun aḏ ggen lwajib ak Arebbi, walakin war ssinen ca aḏ ggen lwajib.
Wami war ssinen ca mammec igga Arebbi isemṣȓaḥ akiḏes bnaḏem, kkaren niṯni ḏfaren abriḏ nsen nniṯ war qbiȓen ca abriḏ n Arebbi.
Li'anna Lmasiḥ ḏayes ḏi netta iy ṯkemmeȓ ccariƹa ḥima marra wi zzayes ɣa yamnen aḏ imeṣȓaḥ ak Arebbi.
