Niṯni ȓaƹquȓaṯ nsen twaqesḥen war fehhmen ca. Aȓ nhara xmi ɣa ɣaren ḏi Ȓƹaheḏ nni aqḏim tafen ltam nni ƹaḏ ḏayes. Ltam nni war itwakkes ca, ɣir s Lmasiḥ iy ɣa itwakkes.
Wah, aȓ nhara xmi ɣa ɣaren Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏi Lkitab n Musa ataf uȓawen nsen ɣemmsen s yijjen n ltam.
Walakin xmi ɣa yamen can yijjen zi Siḏiṯneɣ, aḏas itwakkes ltam nni.
Cuf, Siḏiṯneɣ netta ḏ Arruḥ, mani ma iǧa Arruḥ n Siḏiṯneɣ ḏinni lḥurriya ruḥiya.
Ȓexxu neccin aɣembub nneɣ war iɣmis s walu. Netwaȓa lƹaḍama n Siḏiṯneɣ, netwabeddaȓ bac a niȓi ḏ ijjen n ṣṣifeṯ nnes s yijjen n lƹaḍama itmarnin. Manaya itas-d zi Siḏiṯneɣ ig iǧan ḏ Arruḥ.
S manaya, war ntefciȓ ca minzi ɣarneɣ ȓƹaheḏ-a wanita s arraḥmeṯ n Arebbi.

Neccin netbeƹƹaḏ x ṯmesȓayin n ȓefḍiḥeṯ ig itwaxeddmen s ṯnufra. War nesxeddim ca ṯaḥraymiṯ, war netḥerrif ca awaȓ n Arebbi. Neccin zzaṯ i Arebbi nseȓmaḏ lḥaqiqa bȓa ma at nesnuffar. Ammu ɣarsen marra iwḏan ḏi ḍḍamir nsen belli ḏayneɣ ttiqeṯ.
Lʼinjil nneɣ meȓa iɣemmes s yijjen n ltam, iɣemmes ɣir i yinni ifennan.
Yinni war yuminen ca ȓaƹquȓaṯ nsen isṭemmeṣ-iṯen Ibȓis wenni iǧan am arebbi n ddunect-a zaƹma. Niṯni war zemmaren aḏ ẓren nnur n Lʼinjil iƹni lƹaḍama n Lmasiḥ, netta iǧan ḏ ṣṣifeṯ n Arebbi.
War netbeccir ca s yixef nneɣ, netbeccar s Ƹisa Lmasiḥ iƹni netta ḏ Siḏiṯneɣ. U neccin ḏ ixeddamen nwem ƹlaḥsab Ƹisa.
Ḏ Arebbi ig innan: "Nnur aḏ iceƹceƹ zi ṯaǧest." Ḏ Arebbi-ya ig iceƹcƹen ḏeg wuȓawen nneɣ bac a nessen lƹaḍama n Arebbi ig itceƹciƹen ḏeg wuḏem n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Fa ȓkenz-a wanita aqaṯ ɣarneɣ ḏeg iɣerrafen n ucaȓ iƹni ḏi ddat nneɣ, bac aḏ d imeḍhar belli jjheḏ-a ameqqran aṭṭas itas-d zi Arebbi maci zzayneɣ.
Neccin netwazeyyar zi mkuȓ jjiheṯ, walakin war netwaḥesseȓ ca. War nessin ca mani ɣa narr s uzeǧif, walakin war ntefciȓ ca.
Netwaƹeddab, walakin war neqqim ca waḥeḏneɣ. Netwaɣḍeȓ, walakin war nerriz ca.
Ȓebda narebbu ḏi ddat nneɣ ȓmewṯ n Ƹisa bac aḏ d tmeḍhar uȓa ḏ ṯuḏarṯ n Ƹisa ḏi ddat nneɣ.
Liʼanna neccin ig iddaren netwasellam ȓebda ɣar ȓmewṯ ƹlaḥsab Ƹisa ḥima ṯuḏarṯ n Ƹisa aḏ d tmeḍhar ḏi ddat nneɣ itmettan.
X manaya xmi neccin netwajah ȓmewṯ, kenniw tiȓi ḏaywem ṯuḏarṯ.
Iqqar yijjen ḏi Lkitab: "Umneɣ, s manaya ssiwȓeɣ." Nnefs lʼiman-a iǧan ḏayneɣ, zzayes iy ntamen zzayes iy nessawaȓ.
Nessen wenni iy d isekkaren Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa netta ƹaweḏ aḏaneɣ d isekkar ak Ƹisa aḏaneɣ iseḥḍar akiḏwem zzaṯ nnes.
Cuf, manaya iwqeƹ marra bac akenniw infeƹ. Xmi itentacar arḍa ɣar yiwḏan aṭṭas s waṭṭas iƹni arḍa-ya aḏ d isfeyyeḍ ccuker i lƹaḍama n Arebbi.
X manaya neccin war ntefciȓ ca. Waxxa ṭṭabiƹa n ddat nneɣ ɣar barra traḥ, ṭṭabiƹa nneɣ ɣar ḏaxeȓ tejhiḏ nhar x nhar.
Cuf, ȓemḥayen nneɣ fsusent traḥent tasent-id ḏeɣya, sewjaḏent-aneɣ ɣar yijjen n lƹaḍama ḏ ṯameqqrant bȓa ȓeqyas.
War nesrusi ca ṯiṭṭawin nneɣ ḏi min netwaȓa, nsrusa-ṯent ḏi min war netwiȓi ca. Liʼanna min netwaȓa ḏeɣya itraḥ, min war netwiȓi ca ḏ wenni ig itduman i ȓebda.
Cuf, neccin nessen meȓa irez uqiḍun-a iƹni ddat nneɣ n ddunect-a, ataf ɣarneɣ ijjen n ṯzeddiɣṯ nneɣni zi Arebbi. Ṯaddarṯ nni war ibnin ca s ifassen tduma i ȓebda.
Ȓexxu neccin nnehhek ḏayneɣ mezȓi a neɣmes s ddat nneɣ n ujenna.
Xmi ɣa neɣmes zzayes, ataf war ḏaneɣ tifen ca ḏ iƹaryanen.
Liʼanna xmi netɣemmas s ddat-a nneɣ, tbessaȓ xaneɣ neccin ƹaḏ nnehhek. Iwa war nrezzu ca a niȓi bȓa arruḍ, nrezzu a neɣmes s ddat nneɣ n ujenna, mayemmi? Bac min ifennan aṯ iseɣȓey min war itmettin.
Wi ḏaneɣ iswejḏen i manayenni? Netta ḏ Arebbi, yuca-aneɣ-d Arruḥ nnes ḏ ijjen n ttesbiq.
Iḏen ƹemmarṣ a nefceȓ neccin. Nessen meȓa ƹaḏ aqaneɣ ḏi ddat-a n ddunect-a ntaggwaj zi Siḏiṯneɣ.
Aqa netƹic s lʼiman maci s min netwaȓa.
War ntefciȓ ca, lla! Maƹlic neccin meȓa ntaggwaj zi ddat-a n ddunect-a ataf neccin netƹic ak Siḏiṯneɣ.
X manayenni mixef nrezzu? Nrezzu axas narḍa waxxa nzeddeɣ ḏi ddat-a n ddunect-a niɣ ntaggwaj zzayes.
Liʼanna labud a nbedd marra iḏneɣ zzaṯ i lƹarc n Lmasiḥ mani iy ɣa netwaḥkem. Kuȓ ijjen aṯ ijaza x min isḏaheǧ ƹlaḥsab ṯimesȓayin nni ig igga wami izḏeɣ ḏi ddat, ḏ ṯiṣebḥanin niɣ ḏ ṯiƹeffanin.
Falihaḏa wami nessen a neggweḏ zi Siḏiṯneɣ, nrezzu iwḏan aḏ qtanƹen. Y min neƹna neccin issen-iṯ Arebbi mliḥ, u tmenniɣ ƹaweḏ ḍḍamir nwem aḏ issen manayenni.

Ma nebḏa a ncekkar ixef nneɣ ƹaweḏ zaƹma? Lla, nticc-awem minzi xaneɣ ɣa teftaxarem. Mayemmi? Iƹni ḥima aɣarwem yiȓi minzi ɣa ṯarrem x yinni iteftaxaren x min d itbanen ɣar barra maci min iǧan ɣar ḏaxeȓ ḏeg wuȓ.
Cuf, meȓa iruḥ-aneɣ ȓaƹqeȓ zaƹma, manaya jaraneɣ ḏ Arebbi. Meȓa ɣarneɣ ȓaƹqeȓ, ataf manaya mliḥ i kenniw.
Liʼanna ȓemḥibbeṯ n Lmasiḥ tsayṭar xaneɣ wami nessen ijjen immuṯ ƹlaḥsab marra iwḏan. Falihaḏa ȓmewṯ nnes ḏ ȓmewṯ n marra iwḏan.
Immuṯ netta ƹlaḥsab marra iwḏan bac yinni iddaren war teddaren ca i yixef nsen waha, aḏ ddaren i wenni xasen immuṯen ṯumma itwasekkar-d zi ȓmewṯ.
X manayenni, zi ssa aȓ ṯsawent neccin war nxezzar ca ḏi ḥadd ƹlaḥsab ȓaƹqeȓ n ddunect-a. Waxxa nxezzar qbeȓ ḏi Lmasiḥ ƹlaḥsab ȓaƹqeȓ n ddunect-a, ȓexxu war ṯ netwiȓi ca amenni.
S manaya, wenni iǧan ḏi Lmasiḥ aqa itwaxȓeq-d ḏ jḏiḏ; min iǧan ḏ aqḏim iƹḏu yusa-d min iǧan ḏ jḏiḏ.
Manaya marra zi Arebbi, isemṣȓaḥ-aneɣ akiḏes s Lmasiḥ yuca-aneɣ-d a nbeccar s ȓƹaheḏ n ṣṣulḥ.
Iƹni Arebbi igga ḏi Lmasiḥ bac aḏ isemṣȓaḥ iwḏan akiḏes, war xasen iḥesseb ca ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nsen. Ƹaweḏ Arebbi ikellef xaneɣ awaȓ-a wanita n ṣṣulḥ.
Falihaḏa neccin ḏ lmubcirin n Lmasiḥ, Arebbi issekk ṭṭalab nnes x ufus nneɣ. Nṭalab-ikenniw ƹlaḥsab Lmasiḥ aḏ temṣȓaḥem ak Arebbi.
Tuɣa wanita war ɣares bu ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ yarri-ṯ Arebbi ḏ ȓƹiḏ nneɣ ḥima aḏaneɣ yarr nican ak Arebbi.
Fa neccin ig ixeddmen ak Arebbi ntettar i kenniw neqqar-awem: Maci aḏ tqebbȓem arḍa n Arebbi war zzayes ṯxeddmem ca.
Aqa netta iqqar: <Wami iy xafi ṯarḍa ȓweqṯ sȓiɣ-ac, nhar nni n ufekki ƹawneɣ-c.> Haqac, ȓexxu ḏ ȓweqṯ ig yarḍan x Arebbi. Haqac, ȓexxu ḏ nhar ig isenjamen.
War nesrusi walu ḏeg ubriḏ i ḥadd bac aṯ neɣḍeȓ ḥima war tifen bu ȓƹib ḏi ȓxeḏmeṯ nneɣ.
Innama, neccin netqeddam-awem ixef nneɣ s marra minzi neccin ḏ ixeddamen n Arebbi: Iƹni nṣebbar aṭṭas; tekkent xaneɣ ȓemḥayen ḏ tamara ḏ uziyyar;
neccin tmarraṯen-aneɣ, tḥebbasen-aneɣ, teggen-aneɣ ȓfawḍa; neccin neccaṯ tamara, neqqim ḏi ǧiyaȓi bȓa iḍeṣ, neǧuz.
Netqeddam-awem ixef nneɣ s ṣṣfa iy ɣarneɣ ḏ ȓefhameṯ ḏ ttasiƹ n ȓxaḍar ḏ ȓxir ḏ Arruḥ iqeddsen ḏ ijjen n ȓemḥibbeṯ bȓa nnifaq;
s wawaȓ n lḥaqiqa ḏ jjheḏ n Arebbi ḏ ȓesnaḥ n ȓḥaqq ig iǧan ḏeg ufusi ḏ uẓermaḍ.
Netqeddam-awem ixef nneɣ liʼanna iwḏan tweqqaren-aneɣ sbehdaȓen-aneɣ; qqaren ḏayneɣ ȓbaṭeȓ semɣaren-aneɣ; tarran-aneɣ ḏ iɣeccacen walakin neccin war ḏayneɣ bu ixarriqen;
nekkaren-aneɣ walakin neccin netwassen mliḥ; netmetta walakin neccin nteddar; tƹaqaben-aneɣ walakin neccin war ḏaneɣ neqqen ca;
neccin netwazeyyar walakin ȓebda nfarreḥ; neccin ḏ ipubriṯen nserbaḥ aṭṭas n yiwḏan; war ɣarneɣ walu walakin ɣarneɣ kuȓci.
Ay Ayṯ-Kurinṯ, nessiweȓ akiḏwem s marra ṣṣaraḥa, uȓawen nneɣ nnurzmen aṭṭas i kenniw.
Ȓemḥibbeṯ nneɣ war xawem t nteɣliq ca neccin, ḏ kenniw iy xaneɣ t iteɣlaqen.
Ssawaȓeɣ akiḏwem am ṯarwa inu. Iwa jjeṯ waxxa ḏ uȓawen nwem aḏ nnurzmen aṭṭas am neccin.
War teggeṯ xawem ṯzayȓut ak yinni war yuminen ca, war tiȓiṯ ca ḏ ṯiyuya akiḏsen. Ma ḏinni ca n ȓḥajeṯ ig icarrec ȓḥaqq ak ȓbaṭeȓ? Lla. Min icarrec nnur ak ṯaǧest? Walu.
Ma ḏinni ca n ȓḥajeṯ kif-kif jar Lmasiḥ ḏ Ibȓis? Lla. Ma ḏinni ca n ȓḥajeṯ ṯcarrec jar ȓmumen ḏ wenni war yuminen ca? Walu.

Min ṯcarrec ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant n Arebbi ak lʼaṣnam? Walu. Cuf, neccin iy iǧan ḏ ṯamziḏa n Arebbi iddaren. Amenni iqqar Arebbi: <Nec aḏ zeḏɣeɣ akiḏsen aḏ uyureɣ jarasen, aḏ iȓiɣ ḏ Arebbi nsen, niṯni aḏ iȓin ḏ ccaƹb inu.
X manaya iqqar Siḏi Arebbi: Ffɣem-d zi ȓwesṭ nsen ƹezȓeṯ ixef nwem, war tḥaḏaṯ ca min iǧan ḥaram. Uca nec akenniw qebȓeɣ,
aḏ iȓiɣ ḏ babaṯwem, kenniw aḏ tiȓim ḏ ṯarwa inu ḏ yissi inu. Amenni iqqar Arebbi izemmaren i kuȓci.>
Iḏen ay imƹizzen inu, wami ḏaneɣ iƹaheḏ Arebbi x ṯmesȓayin-a labud a nessiṣfa ixef nneɣ zi marra min ḏaneɣ isexnizen ḏi ddat ḏ arruḥ ḥima a niȓi ḏ ṣṣaliḥin bȓa axeṭṭi s ṯiggwḏi n Arebbi.
Arzmem-aneɣ kenniw imucan ḏeg wuȓawen nwem. Uȓa ḏ ijjen war ṯ neḍȓim ca, war ṯ nesƹewwej ca, war ṯ nɣecc ca.
War qqareɣ ca manaya bac akenniw ƹeyybeɣ lla. Ȓaḥeqqac nniɣ-awem qbeȓ qa kenniw ḏeg wuȓawen nneɣ, a nemmeṯ niɣ a neddar akiḏwem.
Nec teggeɣ akiḏwem zƹameṯ aṭṭas, lʼiftixar iy ɣari ḏaywem imɣar. Twacejjƹeɣ aṭṭas, ȓefraḥeṯ inu temfeyyaḍ-d x marra ȓemḥayen nneɣ.
Cuf, neccin wami d nuḏef ɣar lʼiqlim n Masidunya ddat nneɣ war ṯriyyeḥ ca, netwazeyyar zi mkuȓ jjiheṯ amenɣi ɣar barra ḏ ṯiggwḏi ɣar ḏaxeȓ.
Walakin Arebbi, iƹni wenni itƹawanen yinni itxeyyaqen iƹawen-aneɣ s umaṯneɣ Titus wami d yusa.
U maci ɣir wami d yusa Titus, iƹawen-aneɣ Arebbi ƹaweḏ wami tuɣa ḏayes thillam. Ixbar-aneɣ Titus qa ṯweḥḥcem-ayi, qa ṯnedmem ṯrezzum xafi aṭṭas. Amenni ȓefraḥeṯ inu ṯarni ktar.
Iwa wami kenniw sxeyyqeɣ s ṯebrat nni inu nneɣni, ḏ amezwaru tuɣa nedmeɣ ȓexxu war ndimeɣ ca. Iƹni nedmeɣ wami ẓriɣ ṯabrat nni inu ṯesxeyyeq-ikenniw ḏeg yijjen n ȓweqṯ walakin ṯeƹḏu ḏeɣya.
Ȓexxu nec farrḥeɣ. Maci wami ṯxeyyqem; Lla, wami ṯxeyyqem bac aḏ ttubem. Ṯxeyyqem iƹni ijjen n uxiyyeq zi Arebbi, amenni war kenniw ṯeȓqif uȓa ḏ ijjen n ṯxessarṯ zzayneɣ.
Cuf, axiyyeq zi Arebbi itarew-d ttuba, ttuba-ya ṯneddeh-ikenniw aḏ tnejmem war tejji bu ndameṯ. Axiyyeq zi ddunect-a lla, itarew-d ȓmewṯ.

Fekkareṯ kenniw ḏi min ḏaywem d itarew uxiyyeq-a zi Arebbi. Iƹni mecḥaȓ tḥawaȓem s wuȓ ṯrezzum aḏ tḥellem manaya ḏeɣya. Iƹni mecḥaȓ ṯnedmem mecḥaȓ ṯenxeȓƹem, ḏaywem ijjen n mezȓi ḏ ṯiggwḏi. Iƹni mecḥaȓ ṯeswejḏem aḏ tḥekmem nican. Min ma iǧan ḏi ṯmesȓayṯ-a kenniw war ḏaywem bu ȓƹib.
Nec uriɣ-awem-d ṯabrat nni, mayemmi? Ma ƹlaḥsab wenni iḍeȓmen niɣ ḏ wenni itwaḍeȓmen? Lla, uriɣ-awem-t-id bac akenniw sfehmeɣ zzaṯ i Arebbi mecḥaȓ iy ḏaneɣ teggem array s wuȓ.
S marra manaya netwaƹawen. Maci netwaƹawen neccin u ṣafi; Lla, ƹaweḏ nfareḥ aṭṭas wami neẓra mecḥaȓ ifareḥ Titus arruḥ nnes ṯesreyyḥem-ṯ kenniw marra.
Wami zzaywem ftaxareɣ ɣar Titus war iǧi mayemmi ɣa seḏḥiɣ ȓexxu. Ȓaḥeqqac mammec nessiweȓ akiḏwem nican ḏi marra, uȓa ḏ lʼiftixar nneɣ xawem ɣar Titus qa iffeɣ-d nican.
Netta aqa ṯeqqimem-as ḏeg wuȓ u ktar ƹaḏ xmi itfekkar ḏi array iy ḏas ṯeggim, iƹni ṯqebȓem-ṯ s yijjen n ṯiggwḏi terjijim.
Farrḥeɣ wami zemmareɣ axawem tƹewwaȓeɣ ḏi min ḏi ma.
Fa ay ayṯma, nexs aḏ tessnem x arḍa nni iy ḏasent yuca Arebbi i ṯjumaƹ n ȓmuminin ig iǧan ḏi lʼiqlim n Masidunya.
Ṯekka xasen ijjen n ȓmiḥneṯ ḏ ṯameqqrant ṯeqseḥ xasen aṭṭas. Waxxa niṯni ḏ ipubriṯen war ɣarsen walu walakin niṯni ȓefraḥeṯ nsen ṯemɣar. Zi manayenni iy zi teffeɣ ijjen n ṣṣaḏaqa ḏ ṯameqqrant aṭṭas.
Aqa nec cehhḏeɣ ṣeddqen s min zemmaren aḏ ucen, qa ḏ ṣṣaḥ ṣeddqen ktar zi min zemmaren. Ggin manaya s ȓxaḍar nsen waḥeḏsen,
ttaren zzayneɣ s wuȓ nsen aḏ ƹawnen s ȓxir-a ȓmuminin ṣṣaliḥin iy iǧan ḏi ṯendint n Lquds.
Neccin neḏhec wami ggin manayenni. Ƹlaḥsab min ixes Arebbi sellmen ḏ amezwaru ȓxaḍar nsen i Siḏiṯneɣ u ƹaḏ sellmen-ṯ i neccin.
Amenni iy nweṣṣa Titus wami tuɣa ibḏa ijemmeƹ zi qbeȓ ȓxir n ṣṣaḏaqa-ya zzaywem, ȓexxu nweṣṣa-ṯ at ikemmeȓ.

Kenniw teggem zyada ḏi marra ṯimesȓayin, iƹni ḏi lʼiman nwem ḏ lxuṭba nwem ḏ ṯusna nwem ḏ mammec iy tḥawaȓem s wuȓawen nwem u ḏ ȓemḥibbeṯ nwem i neccin. Ammu iy ɣa ṯeggem mliḥ aṭṭas ḏi ȓxir n ṣṣaḏaqa-ya ƹaweḏ.
War qqareɣ ca manaya ḏ ijjen n ȓuṣiyeṯ; Nec rezzuɣ aḏ jarrbeɣ lḥaqiqa n ȓemḥibbeṯ nwem iƹni tcabbaheɣ min teggem kenniw ak mammec tḥawaȓen iwḏan nneɣni s wuȓawen nsen ḏi ȓxeḏmeṯ-a.
Aqa ṯessnem arḍa n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ. Tuɣa netta ɣares kuȓci, walakin ƹlaḥsab neccin ismeḥ ḏi kuȓci manayenni bac aɣarneɣ yiȓi kuȓci s manayenni iy ḏi ismeḥ.
Ȓexxu nec aḏawem uceɣ array inu ḏi manaya, azzayes ṯawim nnfaƹ. Azeḏɣaṯ kenniw ig iṣeddqen ḏ imezwura; u kenniw ƹaweḏ ḏ imezwura iy ṯexsem aḏ teggem manayenni.
Ȓexxu u labud aḏ tkemmȓem ccɣeȓ-a s min ṯzemmarem aḏ tṣeddqem. Iƹni min ṯebḏam s wuȓawen nwem, iwa ƹaweḏ kemmȓem-ṯ.
Liʼanna bnaḏem meȓa s ȓxaḍar nnes, min ɣa iṣeddeq aḏ itwaqbeȓ. Walakin ƹlaḥsab min ɣares ḏ agȓa maci ƹlaḥsab min war ɣares.
Cuf, neccin ma nrezzu aḏ tucem fus i yiwḏan nneɣni, axawem ibesseȓ dqeȓ? Lla, nrezzu mkuȓ ijjen aɣares yiȓi ȓḥaqq nnes nican.
Ḏi ȓweqṯ-a ṯanita min ḏawem ɣa iceṭṭen ḏ agȓa aḏ infeƹ i min teḥḏajan niṯni. Menbaƹd, min ḏasen ɣa iceṭṭen aḏ infeƹ i min teḥḏajam kenniw. Ammu iy ɣa yiȓi ȓḥaqq nnes nican i mkuȓ ijjen.
Mammec iqqar Lkitab: "Wenni ismunen aṭṭas war ḏas itceṭṭi walu, wenni ismunen ḏrus war ḏas itxeṣṣi walu."
A neḥmeḏ Arebbi wami ḏas igga ḏeg wuȓ i Titus nnefs n ȓxaḍar iy ɣari nec xawem.
Iqbeȓ Titus ṭṭalab nneɣ, u ktar itegg marra ṯizemmar nnes aɣarwem d yas s ȓxaḍar nnes nniṯ.
Ak Titus nessekk umaṯneɣ nni maƹruf ɣar marra ṯijumaƹ n ȓmuminin x ȓxeḏmeṯ itegg ƹlaḥsab Lʼinjil.

Maci manayenni waha, qa xḍarent-ṯ-iḏ ṯjumaƹ n ȓmuminin bac akiḏneɣ isafar xmi ɣa neksi ȓxir n ṣṣaḏaqa-ya. Nkellef x ṣṣaḏaqa-ya i lƹaḍama n Siḏiṯneɣ s yixef nnes u bac aḏ d imeḍhar mammec ntegg ṯizemmar a nƹawen.
Ammu nexs axaneɣ nesbeƹƹeḏ aya n ȓƹib iy xaneɣ ɣa inin x mammec iy ɣa nkellef x ṣṣaḏaqa-ya ṯameqqrant.
Ntegg ṯizemmar bac a negg min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan maci ƹlaḥsab Siḏi Arebbi waha, ntegg ƹaweḏ ƹlaḥsab min twaȓan yiwḏan.
Ƹaweḏ nessekk akiḏsen umaṯneɣ nneɣni aṭṭas n ṯwaȓaṯin njarreb-iṯ nufi-ṯ ixeddem mliḥ s wuȓ nnes. Ȓexxu ƹlaḥsab ttiqeṯ ṯameqqrant iy ɣares ḏaywem ixeddem s wuȓ nnes ƹaḏ ktar zi min tuɣa ixeddem qbeȓ.
Meȓa sseqsan x Titus, netta icarrec akiḏi ixeddem akiḏi jarawem. Meȓa sseqsan x ayṯmaṯneɣ yina, niṯni ssekkant-ṯen ṯjumaƹ n ȓmuminin sbeyyanen-d lƹaḍama n Lmasiḥ.
Falihaḏa, awim-asen i iryazen-a ddalil n ȓemḥibbeṯ nwem ḏ ssabab s minzi nteftaxar ḏaywem bac manaya aṯ ẓrent ṯijumaƹ n ȓmuminin.
U ssekkeɣ-d ɣarwem ayṯmaṯneɣ Titus ḏ ṯnayen-a nneɣni bac lʼiftixar nneɣ ḏaywem war itiȓi ca ḏ ȓbaṭeȓ waha, ataf aḏ tiȓim ṯsewjaḏem mammec tuɣa ḏasen nniɣ nec.
Menbaƹd meȓa usin-d akiḏi ȓebƹaḍ zi Ayṯ-Masidunya ufin-kenniw war ṯeswejḏem ca ataf neccin a nseḏḥa x ttiqeṯ nneɣ ḏaywem (uȓa ḏ kenniw aḏ tseḏḥam).

S manaya ufiɣ u labud aḏ cejjƹeɣ ayṯmaṯneɣ yina iy ḏayi d izwaren ɣarwem zic bac aḏ ƹeḏȓen marra x ṣṣaḏaqa-ya ṯameqqrant iy zi ḏayi ṯƹahḏem zi qbeȓ. Ammu aḏ tiȓi ṣṣaḏaqa-ya mujuda s wuȓawen nwem maci s bessif.
Fekkareṯ, wenni ɣa izerƹen ḏrus aḏ imjar ḏrus. Wenni ɣa izerƹen aṭṭas aḏ imjar aṭṭas.
Kuȓ ijjen itxeṣṣa-yas aḏ iṣeddeq s min inwa ḏeg wuȓ nnes maci s uxeyyaq niɣ s bessif, minzi Arebbi itexs wenni itṣeddaqen s ȓefraḥeṯ.
Arebbi netta izemmar akenniw isfeyyeḍ s lbaraka bac ataf ȓebda aɣarwem yiȓi min teḥḏajam marra ṯumma aḏ tarnim aṭṭas ḏi marra ȓxeḏmeṯ ṯaṣebḥant.
Mammec iqqar Lkitab: <Netta iferreq aṭṭas uca yuca-asen i ipubriṯen, ȓḥaqq ig itegg netta itduma i ȓebda.>
Wenni ig iferrqen zzarriƹeṯ i ufeǧaḥ nni ig izerrƹen iticc-as ƹaweḏ uȓa ḏ aɣrum iy ɣa icc, ataf netta ƹaweḏ aḏawem yarni ḏi zzarriƹeṯ nni iy ṯzerrƹem aḏ isemɣar min ṯmejjarem zi ṣṣaḏaqa-ya nwem.
Aɣarwem yiȓi ȓxir aṭṭas ḏi marra bac ataf aḏ tiȓim ṣaxiyin. U xmi ɣa nessiweḍ ṣṣaḏaqa-ya nwem aḏ teḏweȓ ḏ ijjen n ccuker i Arebbi.
Liʼanna ṣṣaḏaqa-ya iy teggem maci ɣir tƹemmar zzayes ifassen ixwan n ȓmuminin ṣṣaliḥin ḏi Lquds; Lla, nettaṯ ƹaweḏ itenfeyyaḍ zzayes aṭṭas n ccuker i Arebbi.
Ṣṣaḏaqa-ya ṯuca ddalil xawem, zzayes iy ɣa ḥemḏen ṣṣaliḥin Arebbi. Ṯumnem s Lʼinjil n Lmasiḥ, ṯṭaƹem-as xmi tṣeddaqem aṭṭas xasen u x marra iwḏan.
Rezzun xawem tẓaǧan xawem ƹlaḥsab arḍa nni ameqqran iy ḏawem yuca Arebbi.
A neḥmeḏ Arebbi x lhadiya nni nnes, war nzemmar at newṣef.
Fa nec ḏ Bulus, s yixef inu tṭalabeɣ-kenniw s ttawaḍuƹ ḏ lḥanana n Lmasiḥ. Wah, ṯeqqarem nec zaƹma terjijiɣ xmi tiȓiɣ akiḏwem, xmi tɣabeɣ xawem tqesiḥeɣ.
Tettareɣ-kenniw bac war ḏayi tijjim ca aḏ iȓiɣ qesḥeɣ ak ȓebƹaḏ zzaywem am trajiɣ nec aḏ ggeɣ, ȓebƹaḍ-a tfekkaren qa netƹic s array n bnaḏem waha.
Ḏ ṣṣaḥ netƹic am bnaḏem, walakin war netḥarib ca am bnaḏem.
Ȓesnaḥ nneɣ maci am wenni ig isxeddam bnaḏem, ɣarneɣ ijjen n ȓesnaḥ nneɣ zi Siḏi Arebbi zzayes iy netrezza imucan ijehḏen.
Netrezza awaȓen ḏ kuȓ array iy ḏi iǧa ttakebbur ig itƹarraḍen i min nessen x Arebbi. Nḥebbes kuȓ lfikra ḥima ataf aḏ tṭaƹ i Lmasiḥ.
Xmi ɣa ṯessiwḍem kenniw nican ṭṭaƹa nwem, ataf neccin a niȓi nsewjaḏ bac a nƹaqeb wenni war itṭiƹin ca.
Kenniw ṯxezzarem ɣar min d itbanen x wuḏem waha. Meȓa can yijjen metʼakked netta zi Lmasiḥ u labud aḏ ifekkar uȓa ḏ neccin zi Lmasiḥ am netta.
Waxxa teftaxareɣ cwayt s ṣṣaraḥa-ya x ssulṭa nni iy ḏaneɣ yuca Siḏiṯneɣ, walakin war tseḏḥiɣ ca zi manaya. Ssulṭa-ya yuca-aneɣ-t ḥima akenniw nsejheḏ maci ḥima akenniw nrez.
War xseɣ ca aḏawem tɣiȓ belli nec akenniw siggwḏeɣ s ṯebraṯin inu.
Liʼanna qqaren xafi ȓebƹaḍ zzaywem qa ṯibraṯin n Bulus jehḏent qesḥent. U qqaren ƹaweḏ walakin xmi akiḏneɣ itiȓi netta s yixef nnes iteḍƹif awaȓen nnes xwan.
Lla! Wenni issawaȓen amenni itxeṣṣa-yas aḏ issen min neƹna neccin ḏi ṯebraṯin-a nneɣ axmi netɣab, amenni iy ɣa nexḏem xmi d nḥeṭṭar.
Cuf, war nzemmar a nqaran ixef nneɣ niɣ a nmeṯṯel ixef nneɣ ak yinni itcekkaren i yixef nsen. Yina xmi tmeyyazen ixef nsen ak wayawya niɣ tmeṯṯalen ixef nsen ak wayawya iƹni ḏaysen ȓeqfaȓeṯ.
Walakin neccin a neftaxar s min iǧan nican maci ktar, a neftaxar s min ḏaneɣ ikellef Arebbi iƹni xawem kenniw.
Iwa kenniw, ma ikellef-aneɣ Arebbi xawem niɣ lla? Wah, neccin nuweḍ-d ɣarwem, nusa-d ɣarwem ḏ imezwura s Lʼinjil n Lmasiḥ.
War nteftaxar ca s ȓxeḏmeṯ iy ggin midden iƹni bac a nawi ccan nnes; Lla, neccin netmenna aḏ tarnim ḏi lʼiman nwem bac ƹaweḏ lḥudud nneɣ akiḏwem itmarni.
Ammu neccin a nbeccar s Lʼinjil ḏeg imucan aɣirin nwem, aqa war nexs ca a neftaxar s ȓxeḏmeṯ iy ggin midden.
Mamc iqqar Lkitab: <Wenni irezzun aḏ iftaxar, aḏ iftaxar netta zi Siḏi Arebbi.>
Liʼanna maci wenni itqeddamen ixef nnes iy ɣa itwaqebbȓen; Lla, wenni iy ɣa itwaqebbȓen ḏ Siḏi Arebbi iy ṯ ɣa iqeddmen.
Walakin nec ggwḏeɣ mammec ḏas iwqeƹ i Ḥawwa icmeṯ-it ufiɣar s ṯeḥraymiṯ nnes uȓa ḏ kenniw ȓaƹquȓaṯ nwem aḏ ffɣen abriḏ, war ḏas tṭiƹim ca i Lmasiḥ s wuȓawen nwem bȓa nnifaq u bȓa ȓƹib.

Liʼanna kenniw ṯeqqarem maƹlic waxxa yusa-d ɣarwem ijjen itbeccaren s yijjen n Ƹisa nneɣni mzuwwar maci ḏ wenni iy xef netbeccar neccin zi qbeȓ. Niɣ ḏeɣya ṯqebbȓem ijjen n arruḥ nneɣni mzuwwar maci ḏ wenni iy tuɣa ṯqebȓem zi qbeȓ. Niɣ ḏeɣya ṯqebbȓem ijjen n Lʼinjil nneɣni mzuwwar maci ḏ wenni iy tuɣa ṯqebȓem zi qbeȓ.
Cuf, war ḥessbeɣ ca ixef inu ḏ aneqṣi zi arrusul imezwura. Lla walu.
U nec waxxa war ssineɣ ca lxuṭba inu mliḥ, war ḏayi ṯenqiṣ ca ṯusna. Neccin ṯusna-ya nesbeyyen-awem-t-id nican s marra ṯimesȓayin.
Ma ḏ ȓƹib meȓa beccareɣ-kenniw s Lʼinjil n Arebbi bȓa ma ḏayi ṯxeǧsem, iƹni semzayeɣ ixef inu bac akenniw sgaƹƹḏeɣ?
Nec jemƹeɣ-d tmenyaṯ zi ṯjumaƹ nneɣni n ȓmuminin qebȓeɣ zzaysen manayenni bac akiḏwem xeḏmeɣ.
Wami ḥḍareɣ akiḏwem tuɣa nec teḥḏajiɣ, war tbessaȓeɣ x ḥadd zzaywem; Lla, ucin-ayi min teḥḏajiɣ ayṯmaṯneɣ yinni iy d yusin zi Masidunya. Amenni ugiɣ axawem bessȓeɣ, aḏ qqimeɣ mestammer amenni.
S ȓḥaqq n Lmasiḥ iy ḏayi, uȓa ḏ ijjen ḏeg imucan n Uxaya ma aḏ ikkes lʼiftixar-a inu.
Mayemmi? Ma war kenniw texseɣ ca? Qa Arebbi issen belli ṯƹizzem xafi.
Fa min teggeɣ aḏ qqimeɣ ammu teggeɣ-ṯ. Mayemmi? Xseɣ aḏ qesseɣ iḍaren i yinni irezzun lfurṣa aḏ iȓin mquddan akiḏneɣ ḏi ṯmesȓayin-a iy xef teftaxaren.
Cuf, iryazen am yina tarran ixef nsen ḏ arrusul xeddmen ḏ iɣeddaren, sneƹmiȓen ḏ arrusul n Lmasiḥ.
Iwa war nesteɣȓib ca liʼanna Cciṭan netta s yixef nnes isneƹmiȓ ḏ ijjen n lmalaʼika n nnur.
Falihaḏa, war nesteɣȓib ca meȓa ixeddamen n Cciṭan sneƹmiȓen ḏ ixeddamen n ȓḥaqq. Ȓefna nsen aḏ yiȓi ƹlaḥsab min staḥqent ȓefƹayeȓ nsen.
Aḏ iniɣ ƹaweḏ, war ḏayi ḥessbeṯ ca ḏ abuhaȓi. Waxxa ṯḥesbem-ayi ḏ abuhaȓi, qebbȓem-ayi bac aḏ ftaxareɣ cwayt.
Manaya iy zi teftaxareɣ qqareɣ-ṯ nec am yijjen n ṯubbuhȓiya, war ṯ iqqar ca Siḏiṯneɣ.
Xmi teftaxaren yiwḏan-a aṭṭas ƹlaḥsab min itegg bnaḏem, uȓa ḏ nec aḏ ftaxareɣ.
Ma kenniw zaƹma ṯfehmem mliḥ? Iwa, mayemmi s ȓefraḥeṯ ṯṣebbarem ibuhaȓiyen?
Aqa ṯṣebbarem uȓa ḏ yinni iy kenniw itarran ḏ isemɣan, ḏ yinni iy kenniw itetten, ḏ yinni iy xawem itbuṣaren, ḏ yinni iy ḏi iǧa ttakebbur, ḏ yinni iy kenniw iccaṯen s iseqqiȓen.
Nec tseḏḥiɣ zaƹma, neccin neḍƹef war nzemmar a nexḏem amenni! Qqareɣ nec zaƹma s ṯubbuhȓiya-ya qa meȓmi ma izƹem ḥadd azzayes iftaxar uȓa ḏ nec azzayes ftaxareɣ.
Meȓa niṯni ḏ iƹibraniyen, uȓa ḏ nec ḏ aƹibrani. Meȓa niṯni zi Ayṯ-Israʼil, uȓa ḏ nec ḏ aʼisraʼili. Meȓa niṯni usin-d zi ṯarwa n Brahim, uȓa ḏ nec usiɣ-d zi ṯarwa n Brahim.

Meȓa niṯni ḏ ixeddamen n Lmasiḥ, uȓa ḏ nec ḥsen ƹaḏ ḏ axeddam n Lmasiḥ (ssawaȓeɣ zaƹma s ṯubbuhȓiya-ya). Nec ccaṯeɣ tamara ktar zzaysen, ḥebbsen-ayi ktar zzaysen, uwṯin-ayi s usɣun ktar zzaysen. Nec mecḥaȓ n ṯwaȓaṯin twajaheɣ ȓmewṯ.
Xemsa n ṯwaȓaṯin ccaṯen-ayi israʼiliyen s arbeƹin n ṯyiṯa qell icten s usɣun.
Ṯȓaṯa n ṯwaȓaṯin tmarraṯen-ayi s uƹmuḏ. Ijjen n ṯwaȓa rejmen-ayi s uzru. Ṯȓaṯa n ṯwaȓaṯin iɣreq zzayi uɣarrabu seƹḏuɣ ijjen n wass ḏ yijjen n ǧiȓeṯ ḏi ȓebḥar.

Nec mecḥaȓ n ṯwaȓaṯin tiȓiɣ tsafareɣ ḏi lxaṭar n iɣezran, ḏ lxaṭar n iceffaren, ḏ lxaṭar n ȓqum inu, ḏ lxaṭar n iyunaniyen, ḏ lxaṭar ḏi ṯendint, ḏ lxaṭar ḏi ȓexȓa, ḏ lxaṭar ḏi ȓebḥar, ḏ lxaṭar n yinni itarran ixef nsen ḏ ayṯma.
Xeddmeɣ, ccaṯeɣ tamara, tnuseɣ aṭṭas n ǧiyaȓi bȓa iḍeṣ. Fuḏeɣ ǧuzeɣ, qqimeɣ aṭṭas n ṯwaȓaṯin bȓa lmakla. Ṯneqq-ayi ṯesmeḍ arruḍ inu ḏ uqlil.
Iwa qaƹ ṯimesȓayin-a u ƹaḏ ḏayi amnus kuȓ nhar ƹlaḥsab marra ṯijumaƹ n ȓmuminin.
Meȓa can yijjen iḍƹef, nec ma war teḍƹifeɣ ca? Meȓa can yijjen itwasufeɣ zeg ubriḏ, nec ma war ḏayi iteqqes ca wuȓ inu?
Meȓa nec u labud aḏ ftaxareɣ, aḏ ftaxareɣ s min ḏayi d isbeyyanen ḍeƹfeɣ.
Wenni itwabarken i ȓebda iƹni Arebbi Babas n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa, issen illa nec qqareɣ lḥaqiqa.
Ḏi ṯendint n Dimaceq qa lwali n uzeǧiḏ Ḥariṯ igga ȓƹasseṯ ḏi ṯendint ḥima aḏayi iṭṭef.
Walakin sehwan-ayi-d imeḥḍaren inu ḏeg yijjen n uqbub s iseɣwan zeg yijjen n ṯburjat n ṣṣur n ṯendint ȓexddenni nejmeɣ zeg ifassen nnes.
U labud aḏ ftaxareɣ ƹaḏ, waxxa war ḏayes bu nnfaƹ. Aḏ ssiwȓeɣ ȓexxu x ṯmesȓayin iy d ihwan ḏi lwaḥi ḏ ṯmesȓayin innufaren iy d isbeyyen Siḏiṯneɣ.
Ijjen n uryaz iǧan ḏi Lmasiḥ, aqa ssneɣ-ṯ ḏ nec. Arbeƹṭac iseggwusa zeg wami itwaxḍef ɣar ujenna wis ṯȓaṯa. Ma itwaxḍef s ddat niɣ bȓa ddat manayenni war ṯ ssineɣ ca nec, issen-iṯ illa Arebbi.
Ijjen n uryaz am wanita zemmareɣ nec azzayes ftaxareɣ. Walakin war teftaxareɣ ca zi min ḏayi d yusin, teftaxareɣ zi ḍḍuƹef inu u ṣafi.

Cuf, mȓi xseɣ aḏ ftaxareɣ zeg yixef inu ataf ssawaȓeɣ s ȓḥaqq maci s ṯubbuhȓiya. Walakin ugiɣ aḏ ggeɣ ammu, mayemmi? Ḥima aḏayi ḥesben yiwḏan ɣir s min twaȓan ḏayi s ṯiṭṭawin nsen u ḏ min tṣennaṭen zzayi s imejjan nsen.

Iḏen immuc-ayi ijjen n usennan ḏeg uysum inu, mayemmi? Ḥima war semɣareɣ ca ixef inu ƹlaḥsab ṯimesȓayin-a istƹejjiben iy ḏayi d isbeyyen Arebbi ḏi lwaḥi. Asennan-a wenni iy d issekken Cciṭan itƹeddab-ayi bac war semɣareɣ ca ixef inu.
Ttareɣ-as i Siḏiṯneɣ ṯȓaṯa n ṯwaȓaṯin bac axafi isbeƹƹeḏ manaya.
Netta inna-ayi lla, icfa-yac arḍa inu; Jjheḏ inu aḏ iḏweȓ ikmaȓ s ḍḍuƹef-a. Falihaḏa farrḥeɣ aṭṭas aḏ ftaxareɣ s ḍḍuƹef n jjheḏ inu bac jjheḏ n Lmasiḥ aḏayi izḏeɣ.
S manaya ƹlaḥsab Lmasiḥ nec farrḥeɣ s ḍḍuƹef inu ḏ ṯukkwra ḏ tamara ḏ uƹeddeb ḏ uziyyar. Mayemmi? Meȓa ḍeƹfeɣ ȓexddenni nec aḏ iȓiɣ jehḏeɣ.
Ƹaḏ ssawaȓeɣ s ṯubbuhȓiya-ya zaƹma, ḏ kenniw iy xafi ibezzen ammu. Cuf, tuɣa itxeṣṣa-kenniw aḏayi ṯcekarem, mayemmi? Liʼanna nec waxxa ḏ walu iy ǧiɣ, war ǧiɣ bu ḏ aneqṣi zi arrusul nni imezwura.
Ṯimesȓayin nni iy d isbeyyanen nec ḏ arrasul iy ǧiɣ niṯenti tuɣa twaxeȓqent-id jarawem s yijjen n ṣṣbar ḏ ameqqran, iƹni lƹalamaṯ ḏ lmuƹjizaṯ ḏ lburhanaṯ.
Ma ḏinni ca n ṯmesȓayṯ minxef arḍiɣ nec ḏi ṯjumaƹ n ȓmuminin ṯinneɣni war xas arḍiɣ ca jarawem? Wah icten, iƹni war xawem tbessiȓeɣ ca! Semḥem-ayi x falṭa-ya.

Ȓexxu aqayi wejḏeɣ aɣarwem d aseɣ ḏi zziyara wis ṯȓaṯa. War xawem tbessiȓeɣ ca, war rezzuɣ ca x wagȓa nwem rezzuɣ xawem kenniw. Ȓaḥeqqac war itxeṣṣi ca iḥenjiren aḏ smunen agȓa i lwalidin nsen, itxeṣṣa lwalidin nsen iy ɣa ismunen agȓa i iḥenjiren.
Nec s ȓefraḥeṯ aḏ hḏiɣ ixef inu aḏ twahḏiɣ ƹlaḥsab ȓaƹmar nwem. Meȓa texseɣ-kenniw aṭṭas, ma ṯesneqṣem ȓemḥibbeṯ nwem xafi?
Iwa ṣafi, meȓa war xawem bessȓeɣ ca, ma ṯeqqarem ȓexxu qa nec ḏ aɣeccac ṭṭfeɣ-kenniw s ṯeḥraymiṯ, ah?
Ma ṯenwim xewwneɣ-kenniw s yijjen zeg yinni tuɣa ɣarwem d ssekkeɣ? Lla, walu.
Ḏ nec iy d iweṣṣan Titus aɣarwem d yas, ssekkeɣ-d akiḏes umaṯneɣ nni. War izemmar akenniw iɣecc Titus. Nec ḏ netta nxeddem s yijjen n ȓaƹqeȓ ḏ ijjen, isurifen nneɣ ḏ ijjen.
Mecḥaȓ zeg wami ṯnewwam zaƹma ndafeƹ x yixef nneɣ zzaṯwem waha? Lla ay imƹizzen inu, nessawaȓ marra manaya ḏi Lmasiḥ zzaṯ i Arebbi bac akenniw nsejheḏ.

Cuf, ggwḏeɣ xmi d ɣa awḍeɣ war kenniw tifeɣ ca mammec tmenniɣ akenniw afeɣ. U ƹaweḏ war ḏayi tifem ca mammec tmennim aḏayi ṯafem. Ggwḏeɣ aḏ afeɣ jarawem amenɣi ḏ ȓeḥseḏ ḏ uƹaṣṣeb, kuȓ ijjen irezzu i yixef nnes waha, ḏ ȓbaṭeȓ ḏ nnamima, ḏaywem ttakebbur ḏ ȓfawḍa.
Ggwḏeɣ aɣarwem d ƹeqbeɣ aḏ seḏḥiɣ zi Arebbi inu aḏ ruɣ aṭṭas x yinni ig iƹṣan zi qbeȓ, ƹaḏ war tuben ca zeg ufelles ḏ lfasad ḏ ȓeqbaḥeṯ iy tuɣa teggen.
Ṯanita ḏ zziyara wis ṯȓaṯa taseɣ-d ɣarwem. Mamc iqqar Lkitab: <Kuȓ ttuhma axas cehḏen ḏ ddalil ṯnayen n ȓechuḏ niɣ ṯȓaṯa.>

Nec ḏi zziyara iy tuɣa d ggiɣ ɣarwem wis ṯnayen ƹeȓmeɣ-asen i yinni iƹeṣṣan ḏ yiwḏan nneɣni marra. Ȓexxu xmi xawem tɣabiɣ aḏawem ƹeȓmeɣ ƹaweḏ, iƹni xmi d ɣa awḍeɣ uȓa ḏ ijjen zeg yinni iƹeṣṣan ma axas ḥinneɣ.
Mayemmi? Liʼanna ṯrezzum ddalil Lmasiḥ issawaȓ zzayi. Ma iḍƹef netta ḏi ȓwesṭ nwem? Lla, ijheḏ jarawem.
Wah, netta itwaṣelleb x ṣṣalib s ḍḍuƹef, wa innama iteddar s jjheḏ n Arebbi. Amenni uȓa ḏ neccin. Neḍƹef am ḍḍuƹef nnes netta, wa innama jarawem nteddar akiḏes netta s jjheḏ n Arebbi.
Jarrbeṯ ixef nwem ma aqa kenniw ḏi lʼiman. Rajƹeṯ ixef nwem. Yac ṯessnem qa Ƹisa Lmasiḥ aqaṯ ḏaywem? Iƹni meȓa war ṯesqiṭem ca.
U nec tteyyqeɣ illa kenniw aḏaneɣ ṯafem neccin war nesqiṭ ca.

Ntettar-as i Arebbi bac war ṯƹeṣṣim ca, maci bac aḏaneɣ afen yiwḏan war nesqiṭ ca ḏi ttuhma-ya iy xawem nqeddem; Lla, neccin nrezzu aḏ teggem min iǧan nican. Meȓa zɣiȓ-asen i ȓebƹaḍ qa nesqeṭ zaƹma ḏi ttuhma-ya iy xawem nqeddem, iwa maƹlic.
Cuf, war nzemmar a negg walu ḍed i lḥaqiqa; nxeddem i lḥaqiqa.
Liʼanna nfarreḥ meȓmi ma neḍƹef, kenniw tiȓim ṯjehḏem. Ḏ manaya mixef nrezzu ḏi ṯẓaǧiṯ nneɣ aḏ tṣeȓḥem nican.

S manaya iy tariɣ nec ṯimesȓayin-a ḏi ṯebrat-a nec ɣabeɣ xawem. Ammu xmi iy d ɣa ƹeqbeɣ ɣarwem war xseɣ ca aḏ iȓiɣ qesḥeɣ akiḏwem ƹlaḥsab ssulṭa nni iy ḏayi yuca Siḏiṯneɣ. Yuca-ayi-t bac akenniw sjehḏeɣ maci akenniw rzeɣ.
Ṣafi ay ayṯma, farrḥeṯ. Ṣeȓḥeṯ ibriḏen nwem nican. Tṣennaṭeṯ ɣari min ḏawem qqareɣ. Iȓiṯ ḏ ijjen ḏi array nwem. Tƹiceṯ ḏi ȓehna. Arebbi nneɣ n ȓemḥibbeṯ ḏ ȓehna aḏ yiȓi akiḏwem.
Arḍa n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ ḏ ȓemḥibbeṯ n Arebbi ḏ umƹacar n Arruḥ iqeddsen akiḏwem yiȓi marra. Amin.
Nec ḏ Bulus, nec ḏ ijjen n arrasul maci s yiwḏan niɣ s ȓxaḍar n bnaḏem; Lla, nec ḏ arrasul s Ƹisa Lmasiḥ u ƹaweḏ s Arebbi Babaṯneɣ iy d isekkaren Ƹisa zi ȓmewṯ.
Tariɣ ṯabrat-a nec ḏ marra ayṯma iǧan akiḏi ɣar ṯjumaƹ n ȓmuminin iǧan ḏi jwayeh n Galaṭya.
Akiḏwem yiȓi arḍa ḏ ȓehna zi Arebbi Babaṯneɣ ḏ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ Siḏiṯneɣ.
Lmasiḥ iṣeddeq ixef nnes x ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ nneɣ s ȓxaḍar n Arebbi Babaṯneɣ ḥima aḏaneɣ isenjem zi zman-a aƹeffan iy ḏi neǧa.
Aɣares ṯiȓi lƹaḍama i netta i ȓebda n ȓebdaṯ. Amin.
Nec setƹejjibeɣ ḏaywem, ḏeɣya ṯsemḥem ḏi Arebbi iy ḏawem d iȓaɣan s arḍa n Lmasiḥ ṯḏeffarem can n Lʼinjil nneɣni mzuwwar!
Walakin war ḏinni bu can n Lʼinjil nneɣni. Ɣir ḏinni can yiwḏan iy kenniw isxerwaḍen rezzun aḏ sƹewwjen Lʼinjil n Lmasiḥ.
Walakin neccin meȓa nbeccar-ikenniw niɣ ibeccar-ikenniw can n lmalak zeg ujenna s can n Lʼinjil nneɣni maci s wenni iy zi kenniw nbeccar zi qbeȓ, ataf wenni iy kenniw ɣa ibeccaren aḏ itwanƹeȓ!
Mammec ḏawem nenna zi qbeȓ aḏawem ṯ ƹawḏeɣ nec ȓexxu: Meȓa can yijjen ibeccar-ikenniw s can n Lʼinjil nneɣni maci ḏ wenni iy tuɣa ṯqebȓem, ataf aḏ itwanƹeȓ!

Cuf, nec ma rezzuɣ ȓexxu axafi arḍan yiwḏan? Lla, rezzuɣ axafi yarḍa Arebbi! Ma nec rezzuɣ aḏasen ƹejbeɣ i yiwḏan? Lla, maƹlik ƹaḏ rezzuɣ aḏasen ƹejbeɣ i yiwḏan, ataf nec war ǧiɣ ca ḏ axeddam n Lmasiḥ.
Fa ay ayṯma, itxeṣṣa-kenniw aḏ tessnem belli Lʼinjil nni iy zi kenniw beccareɣ qa netta war d yusi ca zi bnaḏem.
War ḏayi d yusi zi ḥadd, war ḏayi ṯ sȓemḏen ca yiwḏan; Lla, netta ihwa-d xafi ḏ lwaḥi zi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Aqa ṯesȓim xafi mammec tuɣa tƹiceɣ zi qbeȓ wami tuɣa tbaƹeɣ ddin n Ayṯ-Israʼil, iƹni mammec tuɣa tƹeddabeɣ jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin n Arebbi s umenɣi, rezzuɣ axasen qḍiɣ.
Tuɣa nec tgaƹƹaḏeɣ mliḥ ḏi ddin n Ayṯ-Israʼil ƹȓayen qaƹ ḥsen zeg iqrinen inu. Tuɣa nec rezzuɣ aṭṭas aḏ ggeɣ lwajib ƹlaḥsab lƹadaṯ n ȓejḏuḏ inu.
War gaƹƹḏeɣ ca ɣar ṯendint n Lquds bac aḏ ẓreɣ yinni tuɣa iǧan ḏ arrusul qbeȓ i nec. Lla, nec ruḥeɣ nican ɣar ṯmurṯ n waƹraben u ssenni ḏewȓeɣ-d ƹaweḏ ɣar ṯendint n Dimacq.
Ṯeƹḏu ijjen ṯeȓt snin gaƹƹḏeɣ ɣar ṯendint n Lquds ḥima aḏ ẓreɣ arrasul Buṭrus, qqimeɣ akiḏes ijjen xemmesṭacar yum.
Nec ḏinni war ẓriɣ uȓa ḏ ijjen n arrasul nneɣni ɣir Yaƹqub umas n Siḏiṯneɣ.
Min ḏawem d tariɣ, tariɣ-ṯ-iḏ u Arebbi ixezzar ḏayi war iǧi bu ḏ ixarriqen.
Menbaƹd ruḥeɣ ɣar Surya ḏ lʼiqlim n Kilikya.
Tuɣa nec ƹaḏ war ḏayi ssinen ca ḏeg uɣembub inu ṯijumaƹ n ȓmuminin n Lmasiḥ ḏi ṯmurṯ n Yahuḏiya.
Niṯni ɣir tesȓan xafi qa Bulus nni iy tuɣa ḏaneɣ itƹeddaben zi qbeȓ ȓexxu netta itbeccar s Lʼinjil nni iy xef irezzu aḏ iqḍa.
Ssenni uca ḥemmḏen Arebbi xafi.
Wami ṯeƹḏu ijjen arbeƹṭacar sna, gaƹƹḏeɣ ƹaweḏ ɣar ṯendint n Lquds ak Barnaba, uwiɣ akiḏi uȓa ḏ umaṯneɣ Titus.

Ƹlaḥsab min zi ḏayi iweṣṣa Arebbi ḏeg yijjen n lwaḥi iy gaƹƹḏeɣ ḏinni sexbareɣ-ṯen x Lʼinjil iy zi tbeccareɣ jar ȓegnus. Walakin ggiɣ manayenni ɣir i yinni iǧan ḏ imeqqranen n jmaƹeṯ ḥima aḏ ssneɣ min xeḏmeɣ ḏ min tuɣa xeddmeɣ war iǧi ca ḏ ȓbaṭeȓ.
Titus iǧan ḏ amƹacar inu, waxxa netta ḏ ayunani war xas zeyyaren ca ḥima aḏ igg ṭṭahareṯ.
Rezzun xas x manayenni can n wawmaṯen zaƹma tbuṣaren waha, uḏfen-d jaraneɣ s ṯnufra ḥima aḏ jesssen x lḥurriya iy ɣarneɣ ḏi Lmasiḥ bac aḏaneɣ arren am isemɣan i ccariƹa nsen.
Walakin neccin nugi aḏasen negg array uȓa ḏ ijjen n dqiqeṯ ḥima aḏ teqqim akiḏwem lḥaqiqa n Lʼinjil.
Amma yinni tɣir-awem ḏ imeqqranen xawem, niṯni war arnin uȓa ḏ ijjen n wawaȓ zi min beccareɣ nec. Qqareɣ manaya, min ma ƹnan yina ɣari kif-kif, iƹni Arebbi war itegg bu s wuḏemawen jaraneɣ.
Walakin min ufin? Ufin ikellef-ayi Arebbi bac aḏ beccareɣ i iyunaniyen mammec ikellef Buṭrus bac aḏ ibeccar i Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Minzi Arebbi ig isxeddamen ttebcir n Buṭrus am arrasul i Ayṯ-Israʼil, ḏ netta ig isxeddamen ƹaweḏ ttebcir inu am arrasul i yinni iǧan ḏ iyunaniyen.

Yaƹqub ḏ Buṭrus ḏ Yuḥanna itwaḥsabben ḏ imeqqranen ḏi jmaƹeṯ nni, fehmen arḍa iy ḏayi yuca Arebbi seǧmen xaneɣ nec ḏ Barnaba s ufus afusi nsen amƹacar. Qebȓen-aneɣ neccin a nraḥ a nbeccar i yinni iǧan ḏ iyunaniyen, niṯni aḏ beccaren i yinni iǧan zi Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Ɣir ttaren zzayneɣ a nfekkar ḏeg ipubriṯen nsen. Manayenni rezzuɣ-ṯ nniṯ s wuȓ inu aṯ ggeɣ.
Fa wami d yusa Buṭrus ɣar ṯendint n Wanṭakya wajheɣ-ṯ aɣembub ḏeg uɣembub liʼanna igga ijjen n lɣaleṭ.

Min iƹna lɣaleṭ nni? Aqa qbeȓ ma aḏ d yas ijjen n ȓḥizeb iƹni can yiwḏan zi Yaƹqub tuɣa Buṭrus itett ak ȓmuminin iǧan ḏ iyunaniyen. Walakin wami d yusa ȓḥizeb nni, ibḏa Buṭrus itbeƹƹaḏ x iyunaniyen nni ineƹzeȓ xasen. Mayemmi? Liʼanna iggweḏ zi ȓḥizeb nni iƹni n ṭṭahareṯ.
Ȓexddenni ḏfaren-ṯ ḏi nnifaq nnes israʼiliyen nneɣni iy yumnen. Uȓa ḏ Barnaba s yixef nnes sbeƹƹḏen-ṯ zeg ubriḏ nican ḏi nnifaq-a nsen.

Wami ṯen ẓriɣ war gguren ca nican ƹlaḥsab lḥaqiqa iy iǧan ḏi Lʼinjil, nniɣ-as i Buṭrus zzaṯsen marra: Cek ḏ aʼisraʼili walakin tƹiceḏ amecnaw iyunaniyen, iƹni maci amecnaw aʼisraʼili. Mammec ɣa ṯeggeḏ aḏ tzeyyareḏ x iyunaniyen bac aḏ ƹicen amecnaw israʼiliyen?
Neccin ḏ israʼiliyen zeg wami d nexȓeq, neccin war neǧi ca zi ȓegnus iƹeṣṣan zaƹma.

Innama, nessen belli bnaḏem war itwasemṣȓaḥ ca ak Arebbi iƹni meȓa iṭaƹ i Ccariƹa n Musa; Lla, manaya illa s lʼiman zi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ. X manaya uȓa ḏ neccin numen zi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ bac a nemṣȓaḥ ak Arebbi s lʼiman nni iy zi numen, maci s ṭṭaƹa n Ccariƹa n Musa. Liʼanna uȓa ḏ ijjen n bnaḏem war itwamsemṣȓaḥ ca ak Arebbi s ṭṭaƹa n ccariƹa nni.
Fa neccin nrezzu a nemṣȓaḥ ak Arebbi s lʼiman zi Lmasiḥ. Meȓa s manaya menbaƹd nufa ixef nneɣ am ȓegnus iƹeṣṣan zaƹma, ma ataf Lmasiḥ itcejjaƹ-aneɣ ɣar ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ? Lla, ƹemmarṣ!
Lƹaks, nec aḏ iȓiɣ ḏ lƹaṣi meȓa bniɣ ƹaweḏ nniḍam nni aqḏim n ccariƹa iy heḏmeɣ.
Ƹlaḥsab Ccariƹa n Musa nettaṯ s yixef nnes, nec mmuṯeɣ zaƹma i ȓeḥkam n Ccariƹa-ya xafi bac aḏ ddareɣ i Arebbi waha.

Twaṣellbeɣ ak Lmasiḥ. Ssa aȓ ṯsawent maci ḏ nec iy ɣa iddaren; Lla, ḏ Lmasiḥ iy ɣa iddaren ḏayi. Ṯuḏarṯ-a iy ddareɣ ȓexxu ḏi ddat inu, aqa ddareɣ-t s lʼiman inu zi Mmis n Arebbi iy ḏayi iḥibben iṣeddeq xafi ixef nnes.
Nec ugiɣ aḏ sbeṭṭȓeɣ arḍa n Arebbi. Cuf, maƹlik bnaḏem imeṣȓaḥ ak Arebbi s Ccariƹa n Musa, ataf immuṯ Lmasiḥ x ȓbaṭeȓ waha.
A Ayṯ-Galaṭya, ma ṯbuhȓiyem niɣ? Wi ḏawem iggin ssḥur? Ncerreḥ-awem mliḥ zzaṯ i ṯittawin nwem mammec immuṯ Lmasiḥ x ṣṣalib.
Akenniw sseqsiɣ x yijjen n ṯmesȓayṯ waha. Ma ihwa-d xawem Arruḥ iqeddsen wami ṯṭaƹem i Ccariƹa n Musa? Lla, ihwa-d wami ṯesȓim i Lʼinjil ṯumnem zzayes.
Ma ṯbuhȓiyem mliḥ niɣ? Kenniw ṯebḏam mliḥ s ṯzemmar n Arruḥ iqeddsen. Ma ṯrezzum ȓexxu aḏ tkemmȓem s ṯzemmar nwem n bnaḏem?!
Marra min tƹeddbem, ma iruḥ ḏ ȓbaṭeȓ niɣ? Lla, imken maci ḏ ṣṣaḥ!
Iḏen, mammec ḏawem d iticc Arebbi Arruḥ iqeddsen itegg jarawem lmuƹjizaṯ? Wac xmi tṭaƹam i Ccariƹa n Musa? Lla, xmi tesȓam Lʼinjil tamnem zzayes.
Iqqar Lkitab x Brahim: <Uca yumen Brahim zi Arebbi, ikkar Arebbi isemṣȓaḥ-iṯ akiḏes s lʼiman nni.>
Falihaḏa, fehmeṯ kenniw belli yinni yumnen niṯni ḏ ṯarwa n Brahim.
Zi qbeȓ ixbar-d Arebbi ḏi Lkitab aḏ ismeṣȓaḥ akiḏes s lʼiman yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil. Ƹlaḥsab manayenni ibeccar zi qbeȓ Brahim s Lʼinjil inna-as qa aḏ twabarken marra ȓegnus x ssabab nnec.
X manayenni yinni yumnen aḏ twabarken ak Brahim iƹni wenni umi qqaren aryaz n lʼiman.

Cuf, marra yinni itƹewwaȓen x ṭṭaƹa n Ccariƹa n Musa twanaƹƹȓen. Mayemmi? Ȓaḥeqqac Lkitab iqqar: <Twanaƹƹȓen marra yinni war ixeddmen ca zi marra ṯimesȓayin iy yurin ḏi ccariƹa war zzaysent teggen ca!>
Maƹruf belli uȓa ḏ ijjen war izemmar aḏ imeṣȓaḥ ak Arebbi s Ccariƹa n Musa ȓaḥeqqac Lkitab iqqar: <Wenni iǧan nican aḏ iƹic s lʼiman.>
Walakin abriḏ n Ccariƹa n Musa war iǧi ca am ubriḏ n lʼiman ȓaḥeqqac ccariƹa tweṣṣa: <Kuȓ ijjen ixeddmen s ȓuṣiyaṯ-a ḏ lqawanin-a itxeṣṣa azzaysen iƹic.>
Lmasiḥ ifekk-aneɣ zi nnaƹȓeṯ nni iǧan ḏi ccariƹa wami yarra ixef nnes ḏ ijjen n nnaƹȓeṯ ƹlaḥsab neccin. Ȓaḥeqqac Lkitab iqqar: <Menƹuȓ kuȓ ijjen iy ṯ ɣa sgaƹƹḏen x ṯeḥnact.>
S Ƹisa Lmasiḥ ṯehwa-d lbaraka nni iy zi tuɣa ṯ iwƹeḏ Arebbi i Brahim ṯuweḍ ɣar ȓegnus, ḥima s lʼiman aḏaneɣ immuc Arruh iqeddsen iy zi ḏaneɣ iwƹeḏ.
Ay ayṯma, aḏawem uceɣ ijjen n lmiṯal zi lƹadaṯ nneɣ. Lwaṣiya, nettaṯ meȓa ṯura ṯeḍbeƹ, war izemmar ḥadd at isbeṭṭeȓ niɣ aḏayes yarni can n ȓḥajeṯ.
Amenni ƹaweḏ ȓƹaheḏ nni iƹni lwuƹud iy ḏas yuca Arebbi i Brahim ḏ wayyaw nnes. Lkitab war iqqar ca <ayyawen nnes>, iƹni aṭṭas iḏsen. Lla, iqqar <ayyaw nnes>, iƹni ijjen n bnaḏem u netta ḏ Lmasiḥ.

Fa nec, min rezzuɣ aḏ iniɣ? Iƹni Ccariƹa n Musa ṯusa-d arbeƹmiyya u ṯȓaṯin sna menbaƹd i ȓƹaheḏ-a ak Brahim. Ccariƹa nni war ṯzemmar ca aḏ tesbeṭṭeȓ ȓƹaheḏ-a ak Brahim ig igga Arebbi. Iƹni min iwƹeḏ Arebbi i Brahim war ṯ tarri ca ccariƹa nni ḏ ȓbaṭeȓ.
Cuf, lwareṯ maƹlik iticc-iṯ Arebbi ak Ccariƹa n Musa, ataf war ṯ iticc ca ak ȓƹaheḏ nnes i Brahim. Walakin lla, lwareṯ nni iwƹed-iṯ Arebbi i Brahim s yijjen n ȓƹaheḏ.

Iwa, mayemmi teǧa Ccariƹa n Musa baƹḏa? Ccariƹa ṯemmuc nettaṯ bac aḏ issen bnaḏem ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ. Tuɣa ṯṣeǧaḥ qbeȓ ma aḏ d yas wayyaw n Brahim iy zi ṯ iwƹeḏ Arebbi. Ccariƹa nni uwint-it lmalaʼikaṯ, ṯumma ijjen n lwasiṭ iƹni Musa issiweḍ-it-id.
Netta ḏ lwasiṭ waha, iƹni war ixeddem ca waḥḏes. Walakin Arebbi netta ig iǧan waḥḏes.
Iḏen Ccariƹa n Musa, ma tƹarraḍ lwuƹud n Arebbi? Lla walu! Cuf, maƹlik ṯemmuc can ccariƹa iticcen ṯuḏarṯ i bnaḏem, ataf aḏaneɣ ṯarr nican ak Arebbi ccariƹa nni.
Walakin lla, Lkitab iqqar belli marra min iǧan netta amecnaw ameḥbus n ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ. Mayemmi? Bac min iwƹeḏ aḏ immuc s lʼiman zi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ i yinni iy ɣa yamnen.
Fa qbeȓ ma aḏ d yas lʼiman-a, tuɣa Ccariƹa n Musa ṯcarref-aneɣ iƹni neccin tuɣa neǧa amecnaw imeḥbas nnes ḥetta aȓ wami iy d imeḍhar lʼiman-a iy tuɣa d itasen.
S manayenni Ccariƹa n Musa tuɣa trebba-yaneɣ ḥetta aȓ wami d yusa Lmasiḥ u ssenni iy ɣa nmeṣȓaḥ ak Arebbi s lʼiman.
Ȓexxu wami ṣafi imeḍhar-d lʼiman, war ṯeqqim ca Ccariƹa n Musa trebba-yaneɣ.
Ḏi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ aqa kenniw marra iḏwem ḏ ṯarwa n Arebbi s lʼiman.
Liʼanna kenniw ig itwaṭehharen s waman bac aḏ tiȓim ḏi Lmasiḥ, aqa ṯmunem kenniw ḏ ijjen akiḏes.
War ḏinni lla aʼisraʼili niɣ ḏ ayunani. War ḏinni lla ismeɣ niɣ ḏ wenni iǧan ḥurr. War ḏinni lla aryaz lla ṯamɣarṯ. Aqa kenniw marra iḏwem ṯmunem ḏ ijjen ḏi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Meȓa kenniw zi Lmasiḥ ataf kenniw ḏ ṯarwa n Brahim ɣarwem lwareṯ nni ƹlaḥsab minzi ṯ iwƹeḏ Siḏi Arebbi.
Iwa, min xseɣ aḏawem iniɣ? Wenni iy ɣa iwarṯen can ṯmesȓayṯ netta ƹaḏ ḏ amezyan, itwaḥsab netta am yijjen n yismeɣ waxxa ataf netta ḏ bab n kuȓci.
Iƹni itegg array i wenni iy ṯ itrebban u ḏ wenni iy zzayes itkellafen aȓ ɣa d ṯaweḍ ȓweqṯ nni iy ḏas iḥedd babas.
Ammu uȓa ḏ neccin. Wami neǧa ƹaḏ ḏ imezyanen, am isemɣan ḥekkmen xaneɣ lqawanin iqḏimen n ddunect-a.
Walakin wami d ṯuweḍ ȓweqṯ ig izemmem Arebbi, ikkar netta issekk-d Mmis itwaxȓeq-d zeg yijjen n ṯemɣarṯ, itwaxȓeq-d ṯḥekkem xas Ccariƹa n Musa.
Mayemmi? Ḥima aḏ iqeddem lfidya x yinni iy xef ṯḥekkem Ccariƹa n Musa bac aḏaneɣ itbenna Arebbi a niȓi ḏ ṯarwa nnes.
Wami ṯḏewȓem kenniw ḏ ṯarwa n Arebbi, issekk-d Arruḥ n Mmis yuḏef ḏeg wuȓawen nneɣ ɣar ḏaxeȓ itȓaɣa iqqar, a Baba a Baba inu!
X manaya ȓexxu cek maci ḏ ismeɣ, cek ḏ mmis. Wami cek ḏ mmis, azzayes ṯwarṯeḏ zi Arebbi.
Ḏi ȓweqṯ nni iƹḏun tuɣa war ṯessinem ca Arebbi, ḥekkmen xawem lʼaṣnam zaƹma, ḏi ṭṭabiƹa nsen niṯni maci ḏ arebbiṯen n ṣṣaḥ.
Walakin ȓexxu kenniw ṯessnem Arebbi, iƹni netta iy kenniw issnen. Mammec teggem ƹaweḏ ṯḏewwaȓem ɣar lqawanin iqḏimen nni iteḍƹifen war itejhiḏen ca? Ma ṯexsem aɣarsen ṯḏewȓem ḏ isemɣan ƹaweḏ niɣ?
Aqa kenniw tbaƹem ussan n ddin nsen ḏ ȓechuraṯ ḏ ȓfuṣul ḏ lƹamaṯ nsen!
Ggwḏeɣ, imken marra ȓxeḏmeṯ inu akiḏwem ṯiȓi ḏi ȓbaṭeȓ u ṣafi.
Ay ayṯma tzawageɣ-kenniw, iȓiṯ am nec liʼanna nec ƹaweḏ ḏewȓeɣ am kenniw. Kenniw war ḏayi ṯeḍȓimem ca uȓa s yijjen n ȓḥajeṯ.
Aqa ṯessnem belli nec tbeccareɣ-kenniw s Lʼinjil ḏ amezwaru ƹlaḥsab ijjen n ȓehȓac ḏ lmaraḍ ḏi ddat inu.
Ȓehȓac nni inu yuwi-awem-d ijjen n tamara. Waxxa amenni war ḏayi ṯḥeggarem ca war ḏayi ṯseḥqarem ca. Lla, ṯreḥbem zzayi ɣarwem am yijjen zi lmalaʼikaṯ n Arebbi niɣ am Ƹisa Lmasiḥ s yixef nnes.
Iwa, manis ṯekka ȓefraḥeṯ nni tuɣa ɣarwem? Aqa cehhḏeɣ xawem belli maƹlik tuɣa ṯzemmarem, iȓi ṯqeȓƹem-d ṯiṭṭawin nwem ṯucim-ayi-ṯent.
Ma ȓexxu nec ḏ ȓƹaḏu nwem wami ḏawem nniɣ lḥaqiqa nican?

Iwḏan-a iseƹƹwajen Lʼinjil, min rezzun? Teggen akiḏwem ȓxir aṭṭas zaƹma walakin ƹlaḥsab aƹeddis nsen imɣaren. Rezzun akenniw kesben bac akenniw sbeƹƹḏen xaneɣ, ṯumma kenniw iy ḏaysen ɣa iggen ȓxir aṭṭas.
Iwa ȓebda ḏ lemliḥ meȓa can yijjen irezzu aḏawem igg ȓxir. Maci ɣir nec iy ɣa iggen manaya waha, walakin labud ssabab n ȓxir-a aḏ yiȓi ḏ aṣebḥan.
A ṯarwa inu, kessiɣ xawem ijjen n umnus ƹaweḏ amecnaw ȓeḥriq n ṯarwa ḥetta aȓ d ixȓeq Lmasiḥ ḏaywem!
Mecḥaȓ tmenniɣ akiḏwem iȓiɣ ȓexxu bac ṣṣut inu war iteqsiḥ ca akiḏwem ammu liʼanna aqayi tƹeddabeɣ s umnus ƹlaḥsab kenniw.
Inim-ayi kenniw itexsen axawem ṯḥekkem Ccariƹa n Musa. Ma war ṯessinem min ḏayes ḏi ccariƹa nni niɣ?
Wah, Lkitab iqqar belli Brahim ɣares ṯnayen n ṯarwa nnes, ijjen zi ṯismeɣṯ ijjen zi tenni iy iǧan ḥurr.
Mmis nni iy d yusin zi ṯismeɣṯ ixȓeq-d ƹlaḥsab ȓxaḍar n bnaḏem waha. Walakin mmis iy d yusin zi ṯenni iy iǧan ḥurr ixȓeq-d ƹlaḥsab minzi iwƹeḏ Arebbi Brahim.
Iƹni manaya ḏayes ȓemƹani. Ṯimɣarin-a niṯenti s ṯnayen ḏaysent ṯnayen n ȓƹuhuḏ. Ijjen n ȓƹaheḏ netta zeg Uḏrar n Sina, itarew ṯarwa ḏ isemɣan. Nettaṯ ḏ Hajar.
Iwa Hajar nettaṯ amecnaw Aḏrar n Sina iy d itasen ḏi ṯmurṯ n waƹraben. Nettaṯ ṯetwaḥsab ḏ ṯandint n Lquds ḏi ȓweqṯ-a liʼanna nettaṯ ḏ ṯarwa nnes ig iǧan ḏ isemɣan.
Walakin ṯandint n Lquds iy iǧan ḏeg ujenna aqat ḥurr, nettaṯ ḏ yemmaṯneɣ.
Minzi Lkitab iqqar: <Ssaƹḏ nnem ya ṯenni war itirwen ca ṯarwa! Ƹeyyeḍ s ȓefraḥeṯ ya ṯenni war ḏi itiȓi ȓeḥriq n ṯarwa! Aqa ṯarwa n ṯenni bȓa aryaz aḏ arnin ktar zi ṯenni ɣar iǧa uryaz.>
Fa ay ayṯma, kenniw ḏ ṯarwa n ȓƹaheḏ amecnaw Isḥaq mmis n Brahim.
Ḏi ȓweqṯ nni, wenni iy d ixeȓqen ƹlaḥsab ȓxaḍar waha n bnaḏem itƹeddab Isḥaq iƹni wenni iy d ixeȓqen s jjheḏ n Arruḥ iqeddsen. U manaya kif-kif ḏi ȓweqṯ-a.
Walakin min iqqar Lkitab? <Azzeȓ x ṯismeɣṯ ḏ mmis ȓaḥeqqac mmis n ṯismeɣṯ war itwariṯ ca akeḏ mmis n ṯenni iǧan ḥurr.>
Ay ayṯma, s manaya war neǧi ca ḏ ṯarwa n ṯismeɣṯ; Lla, neccin ḏ ṯarwa n ṯenni iǧan ḥurr.
Ɣar lḥurriya iḍȓeq-aneɣ-d Lmasiḥ bac a niȓi ḥurr ḏ ṣṣaḥ. Beddeṯ nican baƹda, war tejjaṯ ca axawem ibesseȓ ƹaweḏ ijjen n dqeȓ n ṯzayȓut n isemɣan.
Ṣennṭeṯ! Nec ḏ Bulus qqareɣ-awem meȓa ṯeggim ṭṭahareṯ n Musa, ataf Lmasiḥ war kenniw ineffeƹ s walu.
Aḏawem ƹawḏeɣ, aḏ iniɣ i kuȓ aryaz wenni iy ɣa iggen ṭṭahareṯ n Musa, itxeṣṣa labud aḏ iṭaƹ i Ccariƹa n Musa amen-ṯekmaȓ.
Kenniw iy irezzun ṣṣulḥ s ccariƹa nni ak Arebbi, aqa ṯetwaḥarrmem zi Lmasiḥ ṯbeƹƹḏem x arḍa nnes.
Qa neccin lla, netraja Arebbi aḏaneɣ isemṣȓaḥ akiḏes s lʼiman, u lʼamal-a nneɣ netta s jjheḏ n Arruḥ iqeddsen.
Liʼanna ḏi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ iƹni bnaḏem meȓa igga ṭṭahareṯ niɣ war t iggi ca, manaya war ineffeƹ s walu. Min ineffƹen? Ineffeƹ lʼiman ig ixeddmen ccɣeȓ nnes s ȓemḥibbeṯ.
Tuɣa kenniw ṯeǧam ḏeg yijjen n ubriḏ ɣar zzaṯ mliḥ. Wi kenniw isbedden bac war teggem ca array i lḥaqiqa?
Array-a iy teggem kenniw zaƹma maci zi Arebbi iy ḏawem d itȓaɣan.
Ɣir ḏrus n untun isgaƹƹaḏ-d marra ȓƹajneṯ n urecṯi.
Nec ɣari ttiqeṯ ḏi Arebbi war ṯqebbȓem bu can n array nneɣni. Walakin wenni iy kenniw isxerwaḍen, min ma iƹna netta aṯ iḥaseb s lƹiqab nnes.
Ay ayṯma, nec maƹlik ƹaḏ seȓmaḏeɣ ṭṭahareṯ n Musa zaƹma, iwa mayemmi ƹaḏ ḏayi tƹeddaben niṯni? Maƹlik labud ṭṭahareṯ-a, ataf ṣafi war itiȓi bu uḥeggar n ṣṣalib.
U yinni iy kenniw iheǧcen x ṭṭahareṯ-a tmenniɣ aḏ raḥen niṯni aḏ qessen ixef nsen!

Cuf ay ayṯma, iȓaɣa-yawem-d Arebbi bac aḏ tiȓim ḥurr. Walakin war tejjaṯ ca lḥurriya-ya nwem aḏ tiȓi ḏ ijjen n ubriḏ iy zi ɣa ṯseƹƹifem ccehweṯ n ṭṭabiƹa ṯaƹeffant nwem; Lla, aḏ tsexxarem i wayawya s ȓemḥibbeṯ.
Aqa marra ȓuṣiyaṯ n Ccariƹa n Musa munent-iḏ ḏanita: <Aḏ texseḏ ajjar nnec amecnaw ixef nnec.>
Walakin meȓa tmermacem ayawya am ȓuḥuc wa itett wa, ḥḍam ixef nwem aḏ tseɣȓim ayawya.
Fa nniɣ-awem, tƹiceṯ ƹlaḥsab ȓxaḍar n Arruḥ iqeddsen ṯumma war tseƹƹifem ca ccehawaṯ n ṭṭabiƹa ṯaƹeffant nwem.

Liʼanna min ṯrezzu ṭṭabiƹa ṯaƹeffant nneɣ netta ḍed n min irezzu Arruḥ iqeddsen. U amenni min irezzu Arruḥ iqeddsen netta ḍed n min ṯrezzu ṭṭabiƹa ṯaƹeffant nneɣ. Tƹarraḍen i wayawya ssenni war teggem ca ṯimesȓayin-a iy ṯexsem aḏ teggem.
U meȓa ȓxaḍar n Arruḥ iqeddsen indeh-ikenniw, ataf war xawem ṯḥekkim ca ccariƹa.
Ȓexḏayem n ṭṭabiƹa ṯaƹeffant nneɣ aqa tbanent-id iƹni lfasad ḏ min isexnizen ḏ ȓeqbaḥeṯ,
ḏ lƹibada n lʼaṣnam ḏ ssḥur ḏ lƹadawa ḏ umenɣi ḏ lɣira ḏ uɣḍab ḏ lʼananiya ḏ lxilafaṯ ḏ lʼaḥzab,
ḏ ȓeḥseḏ ḏ waṭṭas n ccreb ḏ lmadella n ssekra ḏ min itcabbahen ḏi manaya. Ƹeǧmeɣ-awem-d ȓexxu mamc tuɣa ḏawem ƹeȓmeɣ zi qbeȓ: yinni iteggen ȓexḏayem-a war twariṯen ca ȓmulk n Arebbi.
Fa min d itarew Arruḥ iqeddsen? Itarew-d ȓemḥibbeṯ ḏ ȓefraḥeṯ ḏ ȓehna ḏ ttasiƹ n ȓxaḍar ḏ ȓxir ḏ wuȓ acemȓaȓ ḏ bnaḏem ḏi iǧa ttiqeṯ
ḏ ttawaḍuƹ ḏ bnaḏem iḥekkmen x ccehweṯ nnes. War ṯeǧi bu can n ccariƹa ig isbeddan ṯimesȓayin-a.
U yinni iǧan n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ ṣafi ṣellben ṭṭabiƹa nni ṯaƹeffant nsen ak ccehweṯ ḏ ȓxaḍar n ṭṭabiƹa-ya.
Meȓa netƹic s Arruḥ iqeddsen, ataf labud a nuyur s ȓxaḍar nnes.
War nsemɣar ca ixef nneɣ s ttakebbur, war ḏayneɣ itiȓi ca ȓeḥseḏ ḏ ṯɣennant jaraneɣ.

Ay ayṯma, meȓa ṯufim can yijjen zzaywem ṯseḥṣer-iṯ ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ, labud meȓa ṯjehḏem kenniw s Arruḥ iqeddsen aṯiḏ tarrem ɣar ubriḏ s yijjen n wuȓ iṣebbaren. U ḥḍa ixef nnec uȓa ḏ cek bac war ṯetwaɣarriḏ ca.
Arbuṯ dqeȓ ag wayawya, s manaya aḏ teggem ȓuṣiyeṯ nni n Lmasiḥ.
Cuf, meȓa can n bnaḏem itfekkar aḏ iftaxar s yixef nnes walakin netta war ḏayes walu, ataf ixeddeƹ ixef nnes.
Lla, labud mkuȓ ijjen aḏ irajeƹ nniṯ ȓexḏayem nnes, ṯumma ataf aḏ iftaxar nican u bȓa ma aḏ icabbeh ixef nnes ḏeg umƹacar nnes.
Ȓaḥeqqac mkuȓ ijjen aḏ yarbu ȓeḥmeȓ nnes.
Fa wenni umi seȓmaḏen awaȓ n Arebbi, itxeṣṣa aḏ icarec netta ak wenni iseȓmaḏen zi marra min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan.
War xeddƹeṯ ca ixef nwem, Arebbi war ṯ icemmeṯ uȓa ḏ ijjen. Iƹni min ma izreƹ bnaḏem, ḏ manayenni iy ɣa imjar.
Wenni iy ɣa izerƹen min ṯexs ṭṭabiƹa ṯaƹeffant nnes azzayes imjar min ifennan. Wenni iy ɣa izerƹen min ixes Arruḥ iqeddsen azzayes imjar ṯuḏarṯ n ȓebda.
Iwa itxeṣṣa war ntiḥeȓ ca ḏi ȓexḏayem n ȓxir. Mayemmi? Ȓaḥeqqac aȓ ȓweqṯ nni nican n umjar a nemjar iƹni meȓa war nefciȓ ca.
Iḏen meȓmi ma nufa lfurṣa, labud a negg ȓxir ḏi marra iwḏan xaṣṣatan ak ayṯmaṯneɣ ḏi lʼiman.
Aqa twaȓam ȓḥuruf-a mecḥaȓ ḏ imeqqranen niṯni, u nec tariɣ-ṯen nniṯ s ufus inu!
Yinni irezzun aḏ ftaxaren zi ddat, iƹni min war iǧin ca zi Arruḥ iqeddsen, niṯni tbessaȓen xawem bac aḏ teggem ṭṭahareṯ n Musa. Mayemmi? Ɣir rezzun niṯni war tƹeddiben ca x ssabab n ṣṣalib n Lmasiḥ.
Cuf, yinni iteggen ṭṭahareṯ niṯni s yixef nsen war tṭiƹin ca i ccariƹa nsen. Rezzun kenniw aḏ teggem ṭṭahareṯ bac aḏ ftaxaren belli ṯeggim lƹada nsen ḏi ddat nwem.
Walakin nec ƹemmarṣ aḏ ftaxareɣ illa zi ṣṣalib n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ. Zi ṣṣalib nnes iy zi ṯetwaṣelleb ddunect i nec, u zzayes ƹaweḏ nec iy zi twaṣellbeɣ i ddunect.
Liʼanna bnaḏem meȓa igga ṭṭahareṯ niɣ war t iggi ca, manaya war ineffeƹ ca; Lla, ineffeƹ meȓa bnaḏem ixȓeq-d qaƹ ḏ jḏiḏ.
Marra yinni igguren x min tweṣṣiɣ nec ḏi ȓuṣiyeṯ-a ataf aɣarsen yiȓi ȓehna ḏ arraḥmeṯ ak ccaƹb n Arebbi.
Ssa aȓ ṯsawent itxeṣṣa war ḏayi itegg ḥadd tamara ȓaḥeqqac ddat inu ḏayes lʼaṯar n Ƹisa.
Ay ayṯma, aḏ yiȓi ak arruḥ nwem arḍa n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ. Amin.
Nec ḏ Bulus, nec ḏ ijjen n arrasul n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ s ȓxaḍar n Arebbi. Uriɣ ṯabrat-a i ṣṣaliḥin iy iǧan ḏi jwayeh n Ufasus iy yumnen s Ƹisa.
Akiḏwem yiȓi arḍa ḏ ȓehna zi Arebbi Babaṯneɣ ḏ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ Siḏiṯneɣ.
Aḏ itwabarek Arebbi, Babas n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ. U ḏi Lmasiḥ ibarek-aneɣ Siḏi Arebbi zi mkuȓ lbaraka ruḥiya ig iǧan ḏeg ijennaṯen.
Cuf, ixḍar-aneɣ ḏi Lmasiḥ qbeȓ ma d ixȓeq ddunect-a bac a niȓi neṣfa bȓa ȓƹib zzaṯes.
S ȓemḥibbeṯ nnes izemmem-aneɣ bac aḏaneɣ itbenna am ṯarwa nnes s Ƹisa Lmasiḥ ƹlaḥsab lɣaraḍ n ȓxaḍar nnes.
Aḏ itwabarek arḍa nnes imɣaren, ifareɣ-iṯ-iḏ xaneɣ Arebbi s Mmis iƹizzen.
Ifekk-aneɣ-d Siḏi Arebbi s lfidya nni n Mmis iƹni s iḏammen nnes bac aḏ twaɣfarent ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nneɣ ƹlaḥsab agȓa n arḍa nnes.
Arḍa-ya ifareɣ-aneɣ-ṯ-iḏ Siḏi Arebbi s marra ȓefhameṯ ḏ ṯusna nnes.
U ƹlaḥsab lɣaraḍ nnes ig igga ḏi Lmasiḥ isbeyyen-aneɣ-d ȓmaƹna inuffaren n ȓxaḍar nnes.
Ȓmaƹna-ya inuffaren ixeṭṭeṭ-it-id bac aḏ tebḏa ṯṣeǧaḥ ḏi ȓweqṯ nnes nican bac aḏ ismun Arebbi marra ṯimesȓayin ḏi Lmasiḥ, iƹni ṯimesȓayin ḏeg ujenna ḏ ṯmurṯ.
Marra ṯimesȓayin itegg-iṯent Arebbi ƹlaḥsab min ixeṭṭeṭ ḏ min ixḍar netta. Neccin ḏi Ƹisa yarra-aneɣ Arebbi a nwareṯ ƹlaḥsab min izemmem netta s lɣaraḍ nnes.
Ḥima neccin iy yumnen ḏ imezwura ḏi Lmasiḥ a neḥmeḏ Arebbi x lƹaḍama nnes.
Ṯumma ismun-ikenniw-d ƹaweḏ ak Lmasiḥ wami ṯṣennṭem i wawaȓ n lḥaqiqa iƹni Lʼinjil iy zi ṯnejmem. Wami ṯumnem iḍbeƹ-ikenniw Arebbi s ṭṭabaƹ nnes iƹni s Arruḥ iqeddsen iy zi ḏaneɣ iwƹeḏ.
Arruḥ-a netta ḏ ijjen n ȓƹarbun iḍemmen lwareṯ nneɣ aȓ ɣa ṯ neṭṭef ṯumma a neḥmeḏ Arebbi x lƹaḍama nnes.
X manaya, nec zeg wami tuɣa tesȓiɣ x lʼiman nwem zi Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa ḏ ȓemḥibbeṯ nwem i marra ṣṣaliḥin
tcekkareɣ Arebbi xawem bȓa ma aḏ beddeɣ u ȓebda tfekkareɣ ḏaywem ḏi ṯẓaǧiṯ inu.
Ḥima Arebbi Babaṯneɣ ƹaḍim n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ aḏawem d yuc ijjen n arruḥ n ȓefhameṯ, kenniw aḏ tƹeȓmem x min inuffaren bac aḏ tessnem Siḏi Arebbi mliḥ.
Aḏawem d yuc ijjen n nnur i wuȓawen nwem bac aḏ tessnem min iƹna lʼamal-a iy zi ḏawem d iȓaɣa, ḏ min iƹna wagȓa-ya n lwareṯ ƹaḍim n ṣṣaliḥin,
ḏ min iƹna jjheḏ nnes imɣaren bȓa ȓeqyas ɣar neccin iy yumnen. Jjheḏ-a am wenni ig isexḏem Arebbi s lquwwa nnes
ig igga ḏi Lmasiḥ wami ṯiḏ isekkar zi ȓmewṯ isɣim-iṯ x ufusi nnes ḏeg ijennaṯen.
Isuƹȓa-ṯ Arebbi aṭṭas x marra ȓeḥkam ḏ ȓmexzen ḏ jjheḏ ḏ lmemlaka. Isuƹȓa-ṯ netta ƹaweḏ x kuȓ isem iy teggen ḏ isemawen, maci ɣir ḏi zman-a iy ḏi neǧa waha walakin ƹaweḏ ḏi lʼaxira.
Igga Arebbi ƹaweḏ marra ṯimesȓayin swadday iḍaren nnes iggi-ṯ ḏ azeǧif iy itrayyan x marra ṯimesȓayin ḏi jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin.
Jmaƹeṯ-a nettaṯ iy iǧan ḏ ddat n Lmasiḥ u zzayes nettaṯ iy iccur yixef nnes u ḏ netta iy iccuren marra ḏi min ḏi ma.
Fa kenniw tuɣa ṯemmuṯem s wuȓawen nwem ƹlaḥsab ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ ḏ ddnub nwem.
Ḏaysent iy tuɣa tƹicem xmi ṯeggurem ḏeg ubriḏ n ddunect-a ṯḏeffarem arrayes n ȓeḥkam iy iǧan jar ujenna ḏ ṯmurṯ iƹni Cciṭan iy iǧan netta ḏ arruḥ nni ig ixeddmen ḏeg yinni iy iƹeṣṣan Arebbi.

Neccin marra tuɣa netƹic am niṯni ḏeg yijjen n ȓweqṯ wami tuɣa netseƹƹaf ccehawaṯ n array aƹeffan n nnefs nneɣ nḏeffar min irezzu ḏ min itfekkar. Tuɣaneɣ am marra iwḏan iƹni neccin zeg yinni iy ɣa iƹaqeb Siḏi Arebbi.
Walakin Arebbi s ȓemḥibbeṯ nnes iy igga i neccin ḏ arraḥmeṯ nnes ṯameqqrant aṭṭas, min ḏaneɣ igga netta?
Iseddar-aneɣ-d ak Lmasiḥ waxxa neccin s wuȓawen nneɣ nemmuṯ ƹlaḥsab ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nneɣ. Iwa s arḍa n Siḏi Arebbi iy zi nenjem.
Ṯumma isekkar-aneɣ-d ak Lmasiḥ isɣim-aneɣ ḏeg imucan n ujenna s Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Mayemmi? Ḥima Siḏi Arebbi ḏi zmanaṯ iy d ɣa yasen aḏ d ismeḍhar agȓa nnes iƹni arḍa nnes mecḥaȓ ig iǧa ḏ ameqqran bȓa ȓeqyas iy ḏaneɣ d isbeyyen ḏi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Aqa s arḍa n Siḏi Arebbi iy zi ṯnejmem wami ṯumnem. Manaya war zzaywem d itekk ca zi kenniw; Lla, manaya itekk-d zi lhadiya n Arebbi.
Manaya maci ƹlaḥsab lḥasanaṯ nwem lla, bac uȓa ḏ ijjen war iteftaxar ca zeg yixef nnes.
Liʼanna neccin ḏ ȓxeḏmeṯ n Siḏi Arebbi, ixȓeq-aneɣ-d ḏi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ bac a negg ȓexḏayem ṯiṣebḥanin. Niṯenti isewjeḏ-aneɣ-ṯent-id Arebbi zi qbeȓ bac aṯent nexḏem.
Iwa ƹeqȓeṯ belli kenniw tuɣa ṯeǧam zeg yinni itwasemman ḏ lkuffar zaƹma, war ṯeggim ca ṭṭahareṯ. Amenni iy qqaren yinni iteggen ṭṭahareṯ (iƹni ɣir min teggen ḏi ddat s ifassen n bnaḏem waha ).

Ƹeqȓeṯ belli ḏi ȓweqṯ nni tbeƹƹaḏem x Lmasiḥ tenƹezaȓem zi ljinsiya n ccaƹb n Arebbi. Aqa kenniw ḏ ibarraniyen ƹlaḥsab ṯimesȓayin nni iy zi d iwƹeḏ Arebbi ḏi ȓƹuhuḏ nnes. Kenniw tuɣa ṯeǧam bȓa lʼamal bȓa Arebbi ḏi ddunect-a.
Walakin wami ṯumnem zi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ, kenniw iy tuɣa ṯuggwjem aṭṭas zi Arebbi qbeȓ, ṣafi ȓexxu isqarreb-ikenniw-d ɣares s iḏammen n Lmasiḥ.

Cuf, Lmasiḥ netta s yixef nnes ḏ ȓehna nneɣ. Ḏ netta ig ismunen Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏ ȓegnus nneɣni igga ṯnayen n ccuƹub-a ḏeg yijjen n ccaƹb. S ddat n Lmasiḥ ihḏem ȓḥiḍ nni iy tuɣa ḏaneɣ iferrqen s lƹadawa jaraneɣ.
S ddat nnes isbeṭṭeȓ ccariƹa nni s ȓuṣiyaṯ nnes ḏ lqawanin nnes bac aḏ igg ḏeg yixef nnes ijjen n ccaƹb waḥḏes ḏ jḏiḏ ḏeg umcan n ṯnayen n ccuƹub nni. Amenni igga ȓehna.
Amenni isemṣȓaḥ ṯnayen n ccuƹub-a ak Arebbi yarri-ṯen ḏ ijjen n ccaƹb s ṣṣalib, inɣa zzayes lƹadawa jarasen.
Aqa yusa-d Ƹisa itbeccar netta s Lʼinjil yuwi-awem-d ȓehna i kenniw tuɣa iǧan ṯbeƹƹḏem x Arebbi u ḏ yinni iy d yuḏsen ɣar Arebbi.
Liʼanna s Lmasiḥ am neccin am kenniw nzemmar a nqarreb ɣar Arebbi Babaṯneɣ s yijjen n Arruḥ iqeddsen.
Iḏen, ȓexxu kenniw war ṯeqqimem ca ḏ ibarraniyen niɣ ḏ imezḏaɣ. Lla, ȓexxu kenniw ḏ imƹacaren ak ṣṣaliḥin iƹni yuca-awem Arebbi ljinsiya akiḏsen ṯḏewȓem ḏ ȓeḥbab n ṯeddarṯ n Arebbi.
Ṯaddarṯ-a nettaṯ ṯebna x dsas n yizra iy iǧan ḏ arrusul ḏ lʼanbiya. U Lmasiḥ s yixef nnes aqaṯ ḏ azru nni iy iǧan ḏeg umcan aṣebḥan ḏi ṯɣemmarṯ n dsas nnes.
Ḏayes ḏi netta iy imun marra ȓebni n ṯeddarṯ-a tgaƹƹaḏ ḏ icten bac aḏ tiȓi ḏ ijjen n ṯemziḏa ḏ ṯamqeddest i Arebbi.
Ḏayes ƹaweḏ ḏi Lmasiḥ ibenna-kenniw ijjen ak unneɣni bac aḏ tiȓim ḏ ijjen n ṯzeddiɣṯ ḏayes iy ɣa izḏeɣ Arebbi s Arruḥ nnes.
X manaya terkaƹeɣ x ifadden inu, nec Bulus iy iǧan ḏ ameḥbus ƹlaḥsab Ƹisa Lmasiḥ u xawem kenniw iy war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil...
Ma ṯesȓam niɣ lla x lmesʼuliya nni, iƹni ijjen n lbaraka iy ḏayi yuca Arebbi xawem kenniw?
Iƹni ȓmaƹna inuffaren x Lʼinjil ismeḍhar-ayi-iṯ-iḏ isehwa-ṯ-iḏ xafi s lwaḥi mamc ḏawem t uriɣ cwayt zi qbeȓ.
Xmi ɣa ṯɣarem manaya aḏ tessnem ȓefhameṯ inu iy ɣari ḏi ȓmaƹna-ya inuffaren x Lmasiḥ.
Ȓmaƹna-ya war ṯiḏ ismeḍhar ca Arebbi i ṯarwa n Adam ḏi zmanaṯ iy iƹḏun am mammec ṯiḏ ismeḍhar ȓexxu s Arruḥ iqeddsen i arrusul ṣṣaliḥin ak lʼanbiya.
Ȓmaƹna-ya inuffaren ṯanita, min ṯeƹna? Aqa uȓa ḏ yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil aḏ warṯen zi Arebbi ak Ayṯ-Israʼil s Lʼinjil. Niṯni ḏ ijjen n jmaƹeṯ, marra aḏ carcen ḏi min iwƹeḏ Arebbi ḏi Lmasiḥ.
Ḏewȓeɣ ḏ axeddam n Lʼinjil-a ƹlaḥsab lbaraka n Arebbi wami ḏayi t ihḏa isexḏem-it s jjheḏ nnes.
Lbaraka-ya yuca-ayi-t Arebbi waxxa ḏ amezyan iy ǧiɣ x marra ṣṣaliḥin bac nec aḏ beccareɣ yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil aḏ ssnen agȓa nni n Lmasiḥ iy war itwacerriḥen ca.
Ƹaweḏ bac aḏ seḍhareɣ mliḥ i marra iwḏan min ixeṭṭeṭ Arebbi ḏi ȓmaƹna nni inuffaren ig ijja netta ḏeg yixef nnes ḏi zmanaṯ iy iƹḏun u ḏ netta ḏ Lxaliq n marra min iǧan ḏ ṯimesȓayin.
Min ixeṭṭeṭ netta? Yinni ig iḥekkmen ḏ yinni ig ijehḏen ḏeg ijennaṯen ȓexxu aḏ ssnen x ufus n jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin min ṯeƹna ȓefhameṯ n Arebbi x marra ṯimesȓayin.
Manaya iǧa ƹlaḥsab lɣaraḍ n Arebbi zi ȓebda, u lɣaraḍ-a ikemmeȓ-iṯ s Ƹisa Lmasiḥ Siḏiṯneɣ.
Zzayes netta a nqarreb ɣar Arebbi s zƹameṯ ḏ ttiqeṯ bȓa ma a neggweḏ xmi zzayes ntamen.
Falihaḏa nniɣ-awem war tefciȓeṯ ca ƹlaḥsab aƹeddeb inu xawem ȓaḥeqqac manaya akenniw infeƹ.
Nniɣ-awem x manaya nec terkaƹeɣ x ifadden inu zzaṯ i Babaṯneɣ.
Zzayes netta iy d tekken isemawen n lʼaṣel n marra ȓeḥbab n ujenna ḏ ṯmurṯ.
Tettareɣ i Arebbi zeg wagȓa nnes aƹḍim akenniw isejheḏ ḏi nnefs nwem s ufus n Arruḥ nnes
ḥima Lmasiḥ aḏ izḏeɣ ḏeg wuȓawen nwem s lʼiman. Tettareɣ i Arebbi ƹaweḏ aḏ twaẓẓum aḏ tuwṯem mliḥ iẓewran ḏeg ucaȓ n ȓemḥibbeṯ
bac aḏ yiȓi ɣarwem jjheḏ ak marra ṣṣaliḥin aḏ tzemmarem aḏ tfehmem mecḥaȓ ṯiȓiw mecḥaȓ ṯazeyrarṯ mecḥaȓ ṯuƹȓa mecḥaȓ ṯuǧeɣ ȓemḥibbeṯ n Lmasiḥ.
Aḏ tessnem ƹaweḏ mliḥ ȓemḥibbeṯ-a ṯanita n Lmasiḥ mecḥaȓ ṯemɣer x marra ṯusna ḏi ddunect-a bac aḏ teccarem s min iccur Arebbi.
Iwa Siḏi Arebbi ḏ netta iy izemmaren aḏ igg aṭṭas s waṭṭas zi min ḏas ntettar niɣ ḏ min netxeyyal ƹlaḥsab jjheḏ nnes iy ixeddmen ḏayneɣ.
Aɣares ṯiȓi lƹaḍama ḏi jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin u ƹaweḏ ḏi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ zi ljil ɣar ljil i ȓebda n ȓebdaṯ. Amin!
Iḏen fa nec ig iǧan ḏ ameḥbus x ssabab n Siḏiṯneɣ akenniw nhiɣ bac aḏ tuyurem nican ƹlaḥsab awaȓ nni iy ḏawem d iȓaɣan zeg ujenna.
Iȓim bȓa ttakebbur qaƹ. Iȓim s yijjen n ttawaḍuƹ. Ṣbarem ak wayawya s ttasiƹ n ȓxaḍar ḏ ȓemḥibbeṯ.
Ggeṯ marra lmejhud nwem bac aḏ tiȓim ḏ ijjen ḏi Arruḥ iqeddsen wami ṯeṭṭfem fus ḏeg ufus s ȓehna.
Jmaƹeṯ ḏ icten, Arruḥ iqeddsen ḏ ijjen. Amenni Arebbi wami ḏawem d iȓaɣa, iȓaɣa-yawem-d ɣar lʼamal ḏ ijjen.
Siḏiṯneɣ ḏ ijjen, lʼiman ḏ ijjen, ṭṭahareṯ s waman ḏ icten.
Arebbi Babaṯneɣ n marra ḏ ijjen. Aqaṯ x marra, iƹeddu-d x marra, aqaṯ ḏi marra.
Cuf, kuȓ ijjen zzayneɣ ṯemmuc-as yijjen n lbaraka ƹlaḥsab mammec t iwzen Lmasiḥ ḏ lhadiya.
X manaya iqqar Lkitab: <Wami igaƹƹeḏ ɣar umcan nni iy yuƹȓan, yuwi akiḏes xarebbi ḏ imeḥbas yuca-asen lhadiyaṯ i iryazen.>
(Min ixes aḏ yini belli netta igaƹƹeḏ? Iƹni ixes aḏ yini belli netta ihwa-d ƹaweḏ ɣar imucan iy yuǧɣen ḏi ṯmurṯ.
Wah, wenni iy d ihwan ḏ wenni s yixef nnes ig igaƹƹḏen qaƹ ḏeg ujenna n ijennaṯen bac aḏ iccar marra ṯimesȓayin.)
Ḏ netta ig ixḍaren arrusul ḏ lʼanbiya ḏ yinni ig itbeccaren s Lʼinjil ḏ ȓfuqaha ḏ imseȓmaḏen.
Niṯni aḏ swejḏen i ṣṣaliḥin aḏ xeḏmen ccɣeȓ n Arebbi bac jmaƹeṯ n Lmasiḥ aḏ tejheḏ.
Aȓ ɣa niȓi marra ḏ ijjen ḏi lʼiman u ḏi ṯusna x Mmis n Arebbi. Aȓ ɣa niȓi marra ƹaweḏ nemɣar iƹni ḏ iryazen am ȓaƹbar nni ikmaȓ n ȓqedd n Lmasiḥ.
Amenni war netɣimi ca ḏ iḥenjiren tawint-aneɣ ȓemwaj tarrant-aneɣ. Niɣ ḏ arriḥ itṣuḍ xaneɣ ikessi-yaneɣ ssa ḏ ssa s kuȓ arriḥ zaƹma n useȓmeḏ u s ṯeḥraymiṯ ḏ ixarwiḍen n iryazen ḏ min tciṭṭinen.
Lla, innama neccin xmi nessawaȓ ȓḥaqq s ȓemḥibbeṯ labud a nemɣar s kuȓ abriḏ a niȓi am netta ḏ azeǧif nni itrayyan xaneɣ iƹni Lmasiḥ.
Zzayes zi Lmasiḥ ddat ṯekmaȓ n jmaƹeṯ ṯmun aqat ḏ icten s qaƹ ȓemfaseȓ nni iy ḏayes. U kuȓ ṭṭarf nnes meȓa ixeddem nican ataf aḏ isemɣer ddat-a u s yixef nnes aḏ tebna s ȓemḥibbeṯ.
Aqa min ḏawem qqareɣ ḏ uziyyar-a iy xawem tzeyyareɣ ḏi Siḏiṯneɣ, iƹni u labud war ṯeggurem ca mammec gguren ȓegnus s ȓaƹquȓ nsen ixwan.
Niṯni ṯṭemmeṣ-iṯen ȓefhameṯ zaƹma iy ḏaysen. Niṯni ggwjen zi ṯuḏarṯ n Arebbi ƹlaḥsab ȓeqfaȓeṯ nni iy ḏaysen s ṯɣennant n wuȓawen nsen.
Fellsen qaƹ ḏeffaren ccehweṯ nsen u ṣafi, ḏaysen ijjen n zƹameṯ aḏ sxeḏmen i kuȓ nnuƹ n min isexnizen.
Walakin kenniw lla, maci amenni iy ṯȓemḏem x Lmasiḥ.
Wah, ṯȓemḏem x Ƹisa lḥaqiqa iy iǧan ḏayes iƹni meȓa ṯesȓam xas nican.
Iwa tuɣa ṯȓemḏem aḏ tsemḥem ḏi ṭṭabiƹa nni nwem tuɣa ɣarwem qbeȓ. Liʼanna ṭṭabiƹa nni nwem ṯarecca ƹlaḥsab ccehweṯ nnes istwaɣarren.
Tuɣa ṯȓemḏem aḏ tiȓim ḏ jḏiḏ zi ȓefhameṯ n ȓaƹquȓaṯ nwem
aḏ teggem ijjen n ṭṭabiƹa ṯenneɣni iƹni ḏ jḏiḏ, ijjen n ṭṭabiƹa iy d ɣa itwaxeȓqen amecnaw wenni n Arebbi ḏayes ȓḥaqq ḏayes min iṣfan.
Iḏen labud kuȓ ijjen zzaywem aḏ ibeƹƹeḏ zeg ixerriqen aḏ issiweȓ s ȓḥaqq ak wajjar nnes liʼanna neccin marra ḏ ijjen n jmaƹeṯ iy neǧa.
Ƹeṣṣbeṯ bȓa ma aḏ teggem ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ. War tejjaṯ ca ṯfuct axawem ṯeɣȓi kenniw ƹaḏ tƹeṣṣibem.
Iƹni war tejjaṯ ca abriḏ i Cciṭan aḏ yaḏef ḏeg wuȓawen nwem.
Wenni ig itacaren labud aḏ ibeƹƹeḏ zi ṯukkarḏa nni, aḏ ixḏem ijjen n ȓxeḏmeṯ ḏ ṯaṣebḥant s ifassen nnes bac aḏ iƹawen zzayes wenni iteḥḏajen.
War tejjaṯ ca aḏ d iffeɣ zeg uqemmum nwem can wawaȓ ḏ aƹeffan. Lla, aḏ d iffeɣ zzayes ɣiȓ awaȓ aṣebḥan wenni itcejjaƹen ḏ wenni itḥellalen bac azzayes snefƹen yinni ḏas itesȓan.
War sxeyyaqem ca Arruḥ iqeddsen n Arebbi iƹni wenni iy zi ṯetwaḍebƹem i Nhar nni iy ɣa ṯnejjmem.
Marra lƹuqda ḏ uɣḍab ḏ uƹeṣṣeb ḏ sḏaƹ ḏ ȓbaṭeȓ sbeƹƹḏem-ṯen xawem marra, u kkseṯ ƹaweḏ kuȓ nnuƹ n ȓeqbaḥeṯ.
Teggeṯ ȓxir ak wayawya, tḥinnam x wayawya. Semmḥem i wayawya mammec ḏawem iɣfar Arebbi ḏi Lmasiḥ.
Falihaḏa ggem mamc itegg Arebbi minzi kenniw ḏ ṯarwa nnes imƹizzen.
Ƹicem ḏi ȓemḥibbeṯ mamc igga Lmasiḥ wami ḏaneɣ iḥibb iṣeddeq xaneɣ ixef nnes am yijjen n ṣṣeḏqeṯ ṯufuḥ ḏ ijjen n dbiḥeṯ i Arebbi.
Wa labud war itiȓi walu jarawem zi lfasad niɣ ḏ min isexnizen niɣ ḏ ṭṭmaƹ ȓaḥeqqac manaya maci maƹqul i ṣṣaliḥin.
U labud ƹaweḏ war itiȓi ca jarawem awaȓ aƹeffan niɣ ḏ wawaȓ ixwan niɣ ḏ nnukta ḏ ṯaƹeffant; Lla, itxeṣṣa aḏ yiȓi ccuker i Arebbi.

Liʼanna wenni iteggen lfasad niɣ ḏ min isexnizen niɣ ḏ min iseḍmaƹen, iƹni netta ḏ wenni iƹebbḏen lʼaṣnam, aqa tessnem bȓa ccekk belli marra yinni iteggen manaya war ɣarsen bu lwareṯ ḏi ȓmulk n Lmasiḥ niɣ ḏi Arebbi.
War tejjaṯ can ḥadd akenniw icmeṯ s wawaȓen nnes ixwan. Liʼanna x ssabab n ṯmesȓayin-a iy d ihewwa uɣḍab n Arebbi x yinni iy ṯ iƹeṣṣan.
Iḏen war temƹacareṯ ca akiḏsen.
Cuf, ḏeg yijjen n ȓweqṯ kenniw tuɣa ḏ ṯaǧest, ȓexxu kenniw ṯḏewȓem ḏ ijjen n nnur ḏi Siḏi Arebbi. Iwa ƹiceṯ am ṯarwa n nnur.
Aqa nnur itarew-d min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan ḏ min iǧan nican ḏ min iǧan ḏ lḥaqiqa.
Meyyzeṯ ƹaweḏ min ḏas iteƹjiben i Siḏi Arebbi.
War carrcem ca ḏi ȓexḏayem n ṯaǧest war tarwent ca, feḍḥem-ṯent.
Yinni war itṭiƹin ca. Meȓa nessiweȓ xasen ijjen n wawaȓ waha x min teggen s ṯnufra ataf a nseḏḥa.
Walakin min d infeḍḥen s nnur aḏ d imeḍhar
minzi ḏ nnur iy d ismeḍharen marra. X manaya iqqar Lkitab: <Faq cek a wenni iteṭṭṣen kkar-d zi ȓmewṯ, axak iceƹceƹ Lmasiḥ s nnur nnes.>
Iḏen fa, rajƹaṯ ixef nwem xzareṯ mammec iy ɣa ṯƹicem. Maci aḏ tƹicem am yinni iy ḏi ṯeǧa ȓeqfaȓeṯ; Lla, ƹicem am yinni iy ḏi ṯeǧa ȓefhameṯ.
Staɣellam ȓweqṯ nwem mliḥ liʼanna nhuraṯ-a ḏ iƹeffanen.
Iwa war tiȓim ca bȓa ȓaƹqeȓ; Lla, fehmeṯ min ixes Siḏi Arebbi.
War skareṯ ca s ccreb ig itawin ɣar lmadella n ssekra; Lla, ccarem s Arruḥ iqeddsen.
Siwȓem ag wayawya s wawaȓen n Zzabur ḏ lʼamdaḥ ḏ yizȓan ruḥiya. Ɣennjem, ggem lmusiqa i Siḏi Arebbi ḏeg wuȓawen nwem.
Cekkarem ȓebda Arebbi Babaṯneɣ x marra ṯimesȓayin ḏeg yisem n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Ṯaƹem i wayawya ƹlaḥsab ȓuweqqar nwem i Lmasiḥ.
A ṯimɣarin, ṭaƹent i iryazen nkent mammec iy ṯṭaƹant i Siḏiṯneɣ.
Ȓaḥeqqac aryaz itrayya x ṯemɣarṯ nnes mamc ƹaweḏ itrayya Lmasiḥ x jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin. Jmaƹeṯ-a isenjem-it Lmasiḥ u ḏ nettaṯ ig iǧan ḏ ddat nnes.
U mammec ṯṭaƹa jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin i Lmasiḥ, amenni iy ɣa ṭaƹent ṯemɣarin i iryazen nsent ḏi marra.
Ḥima Lmasiḥ aḏ iqeddem jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin i yixef nnes tceƹciƹ ḏ ṯamqeddest war twessix war tecniq war ḏayes itiȓi bu ca n ȓƹib nneɣni.
Amenni kif-kif labud iryazen aḏ ḥibben ṯimɣarin nsen mamc tḥibban ddat nsen. Wenni itḥibban ṯamɣarṯ nnes ḏ ixef nnes iy itḥibba.
Cuf, ƹemmarṣ war iǧi ḥadd itƹiffa ddat nnes; Lla, itḏebbar-d xas itḥawaȓ xas. Amenni iy itegg Lmasiḥ ag jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin.
Liʼanna neccin ḏ ṭrufaṯ n ddat nnes.
Lkitab iqqar: <X manaya aryaz aḏ ismeḥ ḏi babas ḏ yemmas aḏ imun ak ṯemɣarṯ nnes, ṯnayen iḏsen aḏ ḏewȓen ḏ ijjen.>
Ḏeg wawaȓ-a mixef nessawaȓ ḏayes ijjen n ȓmaƹna inuffaren yuǧeɣ aṭṭas. Qqareɣ nec belli ȓmaƹna-ya issawaȓ x Lmasiḥ ak jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin.
Innama, labud kuȓ ijjen zzaywem aḏ iḥibb ṯamɣarṯ nnes am mammec itḥibba ixef nnes. Ṯamɣarṯ u labud aḏ tweqqar aryaz nnes.
Ay iḥenjiren ṭaƹem i lwalidin nwem ḏi Siḏiṯneɣ, aqa manaya nican ig iǧa.
Lkitab iqqar: <Weqqar babac ḏ yemmac.> War ḏinni bu can ȓuṣiyeṯ nneɣni qbeȓ i ṯanita yuca-d akiḏes Arebbi ijjen n lwaƹd.
Iƹni inna: <Ḥima aɣarek ṯiȓi marra mliḥ, ḥima aḏ iȓin wussan nnec ḏi ddunect-a ḏ izeyraren.>
Ay ibabaṯen, war seɣḍabem ca iḥenjiren nwem, rebbam-ṯen x ttarbiyeṯ ḏ useȓmeḏ n Siḏiṯneɣ.
Ay isemɣan, ṭaƹem i ayṯbab nwem ḏi ddunect-a, weqqarem-ṯen ggwḏem-ṯen s yijjen n wuȓ iṣfa amecnaw mammec ṯṭaƹam i Lmasiḥ.
Ṭaƹem-asen maci ɣir xmi ḏawem tbeddan ɣar uzeǧif waha aḏasen ṯƹejbem; Lla, aḏ tiȓim am isemɣan n Lmasiḥ aḏ teggem s ȓxaḍar nwem min ixes Arebbi.
Xeḏmem s yijjen n ȓxaḍar nwem axmi ṯxeddmem i Siḏiṯneɣ maci i iryazen.
Itxeṣṣa kenniw aḏ tessnem marra ȓxir iy ɣa ṯeggem akenniw ijaza xas Siḏiṯneɣ waxxa kenniw ḏ isemɣan niɣ ḏ ayṯbab nsen.
U kenniw ay ayṯbab n isemɣan aḏasen ṯeggem kif-kif, maci aṯen tsiggwḏem. Aqa ṯessnem belli Bab nwem ḏ Bab nsen netta ḏ ijjen aqaṯ ḏeg ujenna, war itegg bu s wuḏemawen.
Aqa awaȓ inu aneggaru: Jehḏeṯ s Siḏi Arebbi u s lquwwa nnes ṯameqqrant.
Ggem xawem marra ȓesnaḥ n Arebbi bac aḏ tesbeddem min xawem itciṭṭin Ibȓis.

Liʼanna neccin war netmenɣi ca ḍed i yiwḏan n uysum ḏ iḏammen. Lla, netmenɣa ḍed n ṯzemmar n ṯaǧest-a ṯanita n zman-a ḏ yinni ig iḥekkmen ḏ yinni ig ijehḏen ḏi ṯaǧest-a. Neccin netmenɣa ḍed n ccayaṭin iƹeffanen ig iǧan ḏeg imucan n ijennaṯen.
S manaya ysiṯ ɣarwem marra ȓesnaḥ n Arebbi bac war trekkwiȓem ca ḏi nhar n ccarr. U meȓa ṯeggim manaya marra, ataf aḏ tbeddem.
Beddem baƹda nican, ḥezzmem aḥezzam nni n lḥaqiqa iy teggem ḏi nneṣṣ. Ggem ƹaweḏ ṯjilit nni n ȓeḥḏiḏ n ȓḥaqq.
Qqnem ṯisiȓa i iḍaren nwem bac aḏ teswejḏem ixef nwem aḏ tbeccarem s Lʼinjil n ȓehna.
Aḏ teysim ȓebda lʼiman nwem am yijjen n lḥimaya x ufus iy zi ɣa ṯsexsim marra fȓičaṯ nni iḥarrqen n Uƹeffan nni n Ibȓis.
Ysiṯ ƹaweḏ lkask n usefȓeṯ, sxeḏmem akiḏes ssif nni n Arruḥ iqeddsen ig iǧan ḏ awaȓ n Arebbi.
Marra ḍḍuruf iy ḏi ṯeǧam ttarem i Arebbi xasen s Arruḥ iqeddsen s marra lʼanwaƹ n ṯẓaǧiṯ ḏ dduƹaʼ. Sxeḏmem ȓaƹqeȓ nwem ḏi manaya, arrem-d ȓbaȓ nwem s yijjen n ṣṣbar, ttarem x marra ṣṣaliḥin.
Ttarem xafi nec ƹaweḏ meȓmi ma rezmeɣ aqemmum inu aḏayi muccen wawaȓen iy zi ɣa beccareɣ s ȓmaƹna inuffaren n Lʼinjil.
Ƹlaḥsab Lʼinjil-a wanita iy tiȓiɣ nec ḏ ijjen n ssafir carrfeɣ s snaseȓ. Ẓẓaǧem kenniw bac azzayes beccareɣ bȓa ma aḏ ggwḏeɣ ƹlaḥsab lwajib inu.
Rezzuɣ aḏ tessnem mamc ǧiɣ ḏ min teggeɣ. Ḏ uma Tuciq iƹizzen iy ḏawem ɣa yinin marra manaya. Netta ḏ ijjen n uxeddam nican ḏi Siḏiṯneɣ.
Tsekkiɣ-awem-ṯ-iḏ i kenniw x ssabab-a wanita bac aḏ tessnem mamc ǧiɣ nec aḏ icejjeƹ uȓawen nwem.
Aḏ yiȓi ȓehna i ayṯmaṯneɣ ḏ ȓemḥibbeṯ ak lʼiman zi Arebbi Babaṯneɣ ḏ Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Aḏ yiȓi arḍa i marra yinni ig itḥibban Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ s yijjen n ȓemḥibbeṯ war ṯfenni ca ƹemmarṣ.
Nec ḏ Bulus akiḏi Timutawus neccin ḏ ixeddamen n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ. Ntari ṯabrat-a i ṣṣaliḥin n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ iy iǧan ḏi ṯendint n Filippi ḏ arruyas nsen ḏ nnuyab nsen.
Akiḏwem yiȓi arḍa ḏ ȓehna zi Arebbi Babaṯneɣ ḏ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ Siḏiṯneɣ.
Tcekkareɣ Arebbi kuȓ ṯwaȓat xmi ḏaywem tfekkareɣ.
Kur ṯwaȓat tẓaǧiɣ xawem ḏi ṯẓaǧiṯ inu s yijjen n ȓefraḥeṯ ḏ ṯameqqrant
ȓaḥeqqac ṯcarrcem akiḏi ḏi Lʼinjil zi nhar amezwaru aȓ ȓexxu.
Nec aqayi mteyyqen ḏi ṯmesȓayṯ-a: Wenni ig ibḏan ḏaywem ca n ccɣeȓ ḏ aṣebḥan axas itsiɣi axas itkemmaȓ ḥetta aȓ Nhar nni n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Ɣari ȓḥaqq aḏaywem fekkareɣ amenni ȓaḥeqqac aqa kenniw ɣari ḏeg wuȓ inu. Aqa marra ṯcarrcem akiḏi ḏi arḍa n ȓxeḏmeṯ-a waxxa aqayi ḏi ȓeḥbes niɣ tḏafaƹeɣ x Lʼinjil ḏ ȓḥaqq iy ḏayes.
Ataf Arebbi ḏ ccaheḏ inu mecḥaȓ iy kenniw tweḥḥaceɣ s lḥanana n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Ḏ ṯanita ḏ ṯẓaǧiṯ inu ataf aḏ tarni ȓemḥibbeṯ nwem ktar u ktar bac aḏ tessnem marra aḏ tmeyyzem marra.
Ḥima aḏ tixḍarem min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan ḥima aḏ tiȓim ṯeṣfam bȓa ȓƹib ɣar nhar n Lmasiḥ.
Zzayes zi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ aḏ tiȓim ṯƹemmarem s min d itarwen ȓḥaqq. Marra manaya i lƹaḍama n Arebbi ḏ lḥamd nnes.
Ay ayṯma rezzuɣ aḏ tessnem min ḏayi iweqƹen, manayenni ḏ ṣṣaḥ ixeddem i Lʼinjil bac aḏ itentacar.
Nec lḥala inu ṯeḏweȓ maƹrufa jar marra ȓƹaskar n ȓeqṣar ḏ marra iwḏan iƹni nec aqayi ḏi ȓeḥbes ƹlaḥsab Lmasiḥ.
X ssabab n snaseȓ-a inu azyen ameqqran n ayṯma twacejjƹen bac aḏ ssiwȓen s wawaȓ n Arebbi s yijjen n zƹameṯ ḥsen zi qbeȓ bȓa ṯiggwḏi.
Ḏ ṣṣaḥ ḏinni ȓebƹaḍ tbeccaren s Lmasiḥ s ȓeḥseḏ ḏ lƹadawa, u ḏinni ȓebƹaḍ tbeccaren nican s ȓxaḍar nsen.
Yina tbeccaren s ȓemḥibbeṯ nsen wami ssnen twaxḍareɣ bac aḏ dafƹeɣ x Lʼinjil.
Yinni nneɣni lla, tbeccaren s Lmasiḥ s lʼananiya maci s wuȓ nsen iṣfa, rezzun aḏayi ggen lmacakil wami ǧiɣ ḏi ȓeḥbes.
Walakin maƹlic, s ṯnayen n ibriḏen-a Lmasiḥ itwabeccar. Ḏ manayenni iy iǧan muhim waxxa s wuȓ iy iǧan ḏ aɣeddar niɣ s wuȓ iy iǧan iṣfan. U s manayenni iy zi farḥeɣ nec. Wah, aḏ qqimeɣ nec farrḥeɣ.
Liʼanna ssneɣ xmi tettarem xafi i Arebbi ḏ Arruḥ n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ itƹawan-ayi ataf min ḏayi itewqiƹen aḏ iḏweȓ ḏ asefȓeṯ inu.
Trajiɣ s wur inu nec tmenniɣ war tseḏḥiɣ ca qaƹ x lwajib inu. Lla, nec tzeƹƹameɣ ȓexxu aḏ zeƹmeɣ menbaƹd bac s ddat inu azzayes imɣar Lmasiḥ waxxa aḏ mmṯeɣ niɣ aḏ ddareɣ.
Minzi ɣari Lmasiḥ netta ḏ ṯuḏarṯ inu, ɣari ȓmewṯ nettaṯ ḏ ljaʼiza inu.
Meȓa qqimeɣ ddareɣ s ddat-a inu, ataf aḏ arniɣ mliḥ ḏi ȓxeḏmeṯ inu. Walakin nec war ssineɣ ca min ɣa ixḍareɣ.
Ȓexxu aqayi jar ṯnayen n ṯmesȓayin-a iy ɣa ixḍareɣ. Ḏayi mizȓi aḏ uyureɣ zi ṯuḏarṯ-a aḏ iȓiɣ ak Lmasiḥ ȓaḥeqqac manaya qaƹ ḥsen zi marra.
Walakin labud ḥsen i kenniw meȓa qqimeɣ ddareɣ s ddat-a inu.
Aqayi teyyqeɣ s lwajib-a inu ssneɣ aḏ qqimeɣ aḏ siɣiɣ ḏanita akiḏwem bac aḏ tarnim ḏi lʼiman azzayes ṯfarḥem.
Aɣarwem d ƹeqbeɣ ƹaweḏ. X ssabab-a ataf ȓefraḥeṯ nwem ḏi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ aḏ d tenfeyyeḍ ƹlaḥsab nec.

Lmuhim, suyureṯ ixef nwem ḏeg yijjen n ubriḏ iticcen lqima i Lʼinjil n Lmasiḥ. Ṯumma waxxa nec usiɣ-d akenniw ẓreɣ niɣ ɣabeɣ xawem ataf axawem sȓeɣ ȓexbar belli ṯuggurem nican x yijjen n array, ṯxeddmem fus ḏeg ufus x ssabab n lʼiman iy iǧan ḏi Lʼinjil,
ƹaweḏ war teggwḏem ca qaƹ zeg yinni iy ḏawem itƹarraḍen. Manaya iy teggem aɣarsen ṯiȓi ḏ ijjen n lƹalama iy d isbeyyanen mliḥ niṯni aḏ fnan kenniw aḏ tnejmem. Marra manaya aḏ d yas zi Arebbi.
Maci ƹlaḥsab Lmasiḥ azzayes ṯamnem waha; Lla, labud ƹaweḏ aḏ twaƹeddbem ƹlaḥsab ssabab nnes.
Minzi kenniw tmenɣam ḏeg umenɣi nni iy ḏi tuɣa tmenɣiɣ nec u ƹaḏ tesȓim belli tmenɣiɣ ḏayes.
Meȓa kenniw twacejjƹem s Lmasiḥ niɣ ṯethillam ḏi ȓemḥibbeṯ nnes niɣ ṯcarrcem ak Arruḥ nnes, niɣ ṯufim ḏayes arraḥmeṯ ḏ lḥanana,
ataf itxeṣṣa aḏ tkemmȓem i ȓefraḥeṯ inu aɣarwem yiȓi array ḏ ijjen ḏ ȓemḥibbeṯ ḏ icten, kenniw aḏ tiȓim ḏ ijjen aɣarwem ṯiȓi ijjen n lfikra.
War teggem walu zi lʼananiya niɣ zi ttakebbur. Bȓa ttakebbur weqqarem inneɣni ḥsen zeg yixef nwem.
Itxeṣṣa kuȓ ijjen zzaywem war ixezzar ca min ṯ ithiman waha. Itxeṣṣa-ṯ ƹaweḏ aḏ ixzar min ithiman i yinneɣni.
Array nwem itxeṣṣa aḏ yiȓi am array n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Netta aqaṯ ḏ ṣṣifeṯ n Arebbi, walakin wami imqudda ak Arebbi war inwi ca aḏ iṭṭef ḏi manayenni.
Lla, netta yarra ixef nnes ḏ walu iṭṭef ijjen n ṣṣifeṯ am yismeɣ, iƹni ixȓeq-d am ṣṣifeṯ n bnaḏem.
Wami d imeḍhar am ṣṣifeṯ n yijjen n bnaḏem, isehwa-d ixef nnes iṭaƹ ḥetta wami immuṯ ijjen n ȓmewṯ ḏi ṣṣalib.
X manayenni isgaƹƹeḏ-iṯ Arebbi ɣar ujenna qaƹ, igga-as isem nni iy iǧan ḏeg ujenna x yisemawen marra.
Bac x yisem nni n Ƹisa aḏ rekƹen marra x ifadden nsen, yinni iǧan ḏeg ujenna ḏ yinni iǧan ḏi ṯmurṯ ḏ yinni iǧan swadday n ṯmurṯ.
Aḏ iƹtaref kuȓ yiȓes aḏ yini x Ƹisa Lmasiḥ qa netta ḏ Siḏiṯneɣ azzayes isemɣar Arebbi Babaṯneɣ.

Iḏen ay imƹizzen inu, mamc tuɣa ṯetṭaƹam ȓebda zi qbeȓ wami tuɣayi akiḏwem, amenni ƹaweḏ iy ɣa ḏayi ṯṭaƹem wami xawem ɣabeɣ. Iƹni aḏ teqqimem teggem lmejhud bac aḏ tkemmȓem mliḥ ḏeg usenjem nwem s yijjen n ṯiggwḏi ḏ yijjen n tarjiji.
Minzi ḏ Arebbi ig isxeddamen array nwem ḏ ȓexḏayem nwem bac aḏ teggem lɣaraḍ nnes ḏ aṣebḥan.
Ggeṯ marra ṯimesȓayin bȓa ma aḏ tceṯcam bȓa ma aḏ tmenɣem.
Nec farrḥeɣ akiḏwem s yijjen n ȓefraḥeṯ maƹlic meȓa ferrɣen-ayi-d waha am yijjen n ṣṣeḏqeṯ n iḏammen x dbiḥeṯ nwem iy tqeddamem kenniw s lʼiman nwem.
Amenni ƹaweḏ uȓa ḏ kenniw itxeṣṣa akiḏi ṯfarḥem s yijjen n ȓefraḥeṯ.
Tmenniɣ s Ƹisa Lmasiḥ aḏawem d ssekkeɣ Timutawus ḏeɣya bac xmi ḏayi d ɣa yarr ȓexbar xawem aḏayi isfareḥ.
War ɣari ḏa ḥadd am netta thima-ṯ lḥala nwem.
Marra rezzun min ḏasen ithiman i yixef nsen waha, maci min ithiman i Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Amma Timutawus netta ṯessnem-ṯ meltazem s yixef nnes, ixeddem akiḏi ḏi Lʼinjil am yijjen n uḥarmuc ixeddem ak babas.
X manaya, tmenniɣ aḏawem ṯiḏ ssekkeɣ walakin trajiɣ aḏ ẓȓeɣ mamc ɣa ƹḏunt lmacakil inu.
U nec aqayi mteyyqen ḏi Siḏiṯneɣ aɣarwem d aseɣ ḏeɣya uȓa ḏ nec.
Cuf, twaȓiɣ labud aḏawem d arreɣ uma Parfulitus wenni iy kiḏi itemƹacaren am ca n umjaheḏ. Netta ḏ amsexxar nwem wenni iy ḏayi d ṯessekkem bac aḏayi ithilla.
Itweḥḥac-ikenniw aṭṭas marra iḏwem, iysi xawem amnus ƹaweḏ wami d ṯarrim ȓexbar tuɣa ihȓec.
Wah, tuɣa ihȓec ḏ ṣṣaḥ. Tuɣa ƹȓayen immuṯ walakin Arebbi irḥem-iṯ. War iǧi ca netta waha, irḥem-ayi uȓa ḏ nec bac war xafi itmarni ȓhemm x ȓhemm.
X manayenni aḏawem ṯiḏ ssekkeɣ ȓexxu ḏ abriḏ bac aḏ tfarḥem xmi ṯ ɣa ṯeẓrem u ƹaweḏ war ḏayi itiȓi bu umnus.
Reḥḥbem-ṯ s Siḏiṯneɣ s yijjen n ȓefraḥeṯ ḏ ṯameqqrant, weqqareṯ iryazen am netta.
Mayemmi? Tuɣa ƹȓayen immuṯ ƹlaḥsab ȓxeḏmeṯ n Lmasiḥ minzi iɣamar s ṯuḏarṯ nnes wami irzu aḏ ixḏem min war ṯzemmarem ca aḏ txeḏmem kenniw zi lwajib nwem ɣari.
Ȓexxu ay ayṯma aḏ kemmȓeɣ, farḥeṯ s Siḏiṯneɣ! War ɣari bu lmuckil aḏawem ƹawḏeɣ ṯimesȓayin-a s ṯira, kenniw ƹaweḏ azzaysent twaḥḍam zi lxaṭar.
Ḥḍam ixef nwem zeg iqzinen nni, iƹni iryazen nni iteggen ccarr itḥejjamen i bnaḏem.
Cuf, ḏ neccin ig iǧan ḏ ṭṭahareṯ nni n ṣṣaḥ. Iƹni nƹebbeḏ s Arruḥ n Arebbi, ɣir nteftaxar s Ƹisa Lmasiḥ, war netriji ca aȓ lḥasanat nneɣ.
Iwa uȓa ḏ nec ɣari ssabab aḏ rajiɣ aȓ lḥasanat inu zaƹma. Meȓa ḏinni can yijjen ɣares ssabab aḏ iraja aȓ lḥasanat nnes, ataf nec ɣari ktar zzayes.
Mayemmi? Nec ṭehhareɣ nhar wis ṯmeniyyam. Lʼaṣel inu zi Ayṯ-Israʼil zi Ayṯ-Benyamin. Nec ḏ aƹibrani mmis n iƹibraniyen. Ƹlaḥsab ccariƹa, nec zi ȓḥizeb nni n ifarrisiyen.
Ƹlaḥsab zƹameṯ inu nec tuɣa tƹeddabeɣ jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin n Lmasiḥ. Ƹlaḥsab lqawanin iy iǧan ḏi ccariƹa tuɣayi s bȓa ȓƹib.
Walakin x ssabab n Lmasiḥ min ḏayi ineffƹen qbeȓ, ȓexxu ḥessbeɣ-ṯ ḏ ṯaxṣarṯ.
Ḏ ṣṣaḥ ḥessbeɣ ṯimesȓayin-a qaƹ ḏ ṯaxṣarṯ x ssabab n lqima ṯameqqrant bac aḏ ssneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ netta ḏ Siḏi. X ssabab nnes iy xṣareɣ ṯimesȓayin-a qaƹin, ḥesbeɣ-ṯent ḏ zzbeȓ bac aḏ rebḥeɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Ḥima aḏayi afen ḏayes bȓa ca n ṣṣulḥ ak Arebbi iy d itasen zzayi nec waha ƹlaḥsab ccariƹa. Lla, ṣṣulḥ nni inu ak Arebbi itas-d s lʼiman inu zi Lmasiḥ, iƹni ṣṣulḥ nni itas-d zi Arebbi itas-d s lʼiman.
Rezzuɣ aḏ ssneɣ Lmasiḥ ḏ jjheḏ nnes wami d ikkar zi ȓmewṯ. Aḏ ssneɣ ƹaweḏ ṯamƹacarṯ nni xmi ɣa ncarec akiḏes s uƹeddeb nni iy xas ikkin netta, a neḏweȓ amecnaw netta s ȓmewṯ nnes.
Amenni mamec ma igga, nec aḏ afeɣ Yum Lqiyama aḏ yiȓi inu.
War iǧi ca ṣafi ṭṭfeɣ marra ṯimesȓayin nni niɣ ṣafi war ḏayi bu ca n ȓƹib; Lla, nec ƹaḏ tḥawaȓeɣ aḏ ṭṭfeɣ ṯimesȓayin nni iy zi ḏayi iṭṭef Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Ay ayṯma, war ḥessbeɣ ca ṣafi ṭṭfeɣ qaƹ ṯimesȓayin nni. Walakin ḏinni ijjen n ṯmesȓayṯ teggeɣ-t: Tettuɣ min iteƹqaben ɣar ḏeffar, teggeɣ lmejhud inu ɣar min d igguren ɣar zzaṯ.
Tḥawaȓeɣ x manayenni iy xef rezzuɣ bac aḏ rebḥeɣ ljaʼiza nni iy zi ḏayi d iȓaɣa Arebbi ɣares ɣar ujenna s Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Falihaḏa marra neccin ig itemɣuren ḏi lʼiman itxeṣṣa a nfekkar amenni. Meȓa kenniw war ṯfekkarem ca amenni ḏ Arebbi iy kenniw ɣa isfehmen.
Walakin min nessen ƹaḏ nican labud aḏayes neṭṭef mliḥ.
Ay ayṯma, muneṯ ak yinni iteggen am nec. Xzareṯ mliḥ ɣar yinni igguren ḏeg ubriḏ nneɣ.
Liʼanna ḏinni aṭṭas n yinni igguren ḏ ȓƹaḏyan x ṣṣalib n Lmasiḥ. Awaȓ-a nniɣ-awem-ṯ zi qbeȓ, ȓexxu tƹawaḏeɣ-awem-ṯ s imeṭṭawen inu.
Aneggaru nsen aḏ itwamḥa. Arebbi nsen netta ḏ aƹeddis nsen. Semɣaren ixef nsen s ȓefḍayeḥ nsen. Ȓaƹquȓaṯ nsen nnuɣen ḏi ṯmesȓayin n ddunect-a.
Neccin lla, ljinsiya nneɣ aqat ḏeg ujenna. Ssenni iy d ɣa yas wenni iy netraja iy ḏaneɣ ɣa isnejmen iƹni Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Ddat nneɣ n ddunect-a at isbeddeȓ Lmasiḥ bac aḏ teḏweȓ am ddat nnes lƹaḍim. Itegg manaya s jjheḏ nni iy zi izemmar aḏ yarr qaƹ ṯimesȓayin swadday i lḥukem nnes.
Iḏen ay ayṯma iy xafi iƹizzen iy tweḥḥaceɣ ig iǧan ḏ ȓefȓaḥeṯ inu ḏ ttaj inu, amenni labud itxeṣṣa aḏ teqqimem ṯbeddem ḏi Siḏiṯneɣ ay imƹizzen inu.
Tettareɣ i suyṯmaṯneɣ Ṯudya ḏ Ṯinticya bac aḏ yiȓi array nsent ḏ ijjen ak Siḏiṯneɣ.
Wah, tettareɣ uȓa ḏ cek ay amƹacar inu n ṣṣaḥ, ƹawen ṯimɣarin-a iy kiḏi ixeddmen fus ḏeg ufus ḏi Lʼinjil, akiḏsent ƹaweḏ Krimu ḏ imƹacaren inu nneɣni. Isemawen nsen marra aqaṯen ḏi Lkitab n Ṯuḏarṯ.
Farrḥeṯ ȓebda s Siḏiṯneɣ! Aḏawem iniɣ awaȓ-a ƹaweḏ, farrḥeṯ!
Itxeṣṣa aḏ d imeḍhar ṣṣbar nwem i marra iwḏan, aqa Siḏiṯneɣ yuḏes-d.
War kessim bu umnus x walu. S ṯẓaǧiṯ nwem ḏ dduƹaʼ nwem akiḏsen ccuker nwem aḏ tqeddmem marra ṯimesȓayin s ṭṭalabaṯ nwem i Arebbi.
Ṯumma ȓehna n Arebbi ig itejhiḏen x marra ȓefhameṯ ḏi ddunect-a ḏ wenni iy ɣa iḥḍan uȓawen nwem ḏ ȓaƹquȓaṯ nwem ḏi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.

Ɣar uneggaru ay ayṯma, min iǧan ḏ lḥaqiqa ḏ mindi iǧa ȓewqqar ḏ min iǧan iseggḏen ḏ min iǧan iṣfan ḏ min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan ḏ min xaneɣ iƹizzen ḏ ayyi ṯamesȓayṯ ḏ ṯaṣebḥant aṭṭas aḏas nuc lqima itxeṣṣa kenniw aḏ tfekkarem ḏi ṯmesȓayin-a.
Min ṯȓemḏem ḏ min ṯqebȓem zzayi ḏ min ṯesȓim ḏ min ṯeẓrim xafi itxeṣṣa u labud aḏ tesxeḏmem ṯimesȓayin-a. Ṯumma akiḏwem yiȓi Arebbi n ȓehna.
Fa, mecḥaȓ farḥeɣ s Siḏiṯneɣ wami aȓ uneggaru ƹaweḏ tuɣa ṯzemmarem aḏayi ṯfeqḏem. Wah, tuɣa tfekkarem ḏayi qbeȓ walakin war ṯufim ca lfurṣa bac aḏayi ṯƹawnem.
Awaȓ-a inu war iqqar ca rezzuɣ can ȓḥajeṯ; Lla, nec ȓemḏeɣ aḏ qenƹeɣ mammec ma ǧant ḍḍuruf inu.
Ssneɣ aḏ ƹiceɣ ḏeg uzeyyar, ssneɣ ƹaweḏ aḏ ƹiceɣ ḏi ȓxir. Nec mamc ma ǧant ḍḍuruf inu ȓemḏeɣ ssir aḏ wajheɣ ȓxir niɣ ḏ jjuƹ, waxxa ɣari aṭṭas niɣ cwayt waha.
Qaƹ ṯimesȓayin zemmareɣ-asent s wenni iy ḏayi iticcen jjheḏ.
Walakin mliḥ wami ṯcarcem akiḏi ḏi lmacakil inu.

A Ayṯ-Filippi, wami ffɣeɣ nec zi lʼiqlim n Masidunya ṯessnem qa ḏ kenniw waha zi marra ṯijumaƹ n ȓmuminin iy kiḏi icarcen ḏi lmuƹawana. Manayenni iwqeƹ wami yallah bḏiɣ tbeccareɣ s Lʼinjil ḏi jwayeh nni.
Waxxa wami tuɣayi ḏi ṯendint n Salunik min ḥḏajeɣ ḏinni ṯessekkem-ayi-ṯ-id aṭṭas n ṯwaȓaṯin.
Walakin nec war rezzuɣ ca aḏayi ṯucem ca n ȓḥajeṯ, nec rezzuɣ min ɣa yarnin ḏi lʼajar nwem ak Arebbi.

Ṭṭfeɣ ȓmuneṯ ṯekmaȓ zzaywem u ktar ƹaḏ. Ṯḏebbarem-ayi-d mliḥ wami qebȓeɣ zeg wumaṯneɣ Parfulitus lhadiyaṯ nni iy ḏayi d ṯessekkem. Niṯenti am yijjen ṣṣeḏqeṯ ṯetfuḥ ḏ yijjen n dbiḥeṯ iy ɣa iqbeȓ Arebbi iy ḏas ɣa iƹejben.
Aqa Arebbi inu aḏawem yuc qaƹ min ṯeḥḏajem ƹlaḥsab agȓa nnes lƹaḍim ḏi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Lƹaḍama i Arebbi Babaṯneɣ i ȓebda n ȓebdaṯ. Amin.
Siwḍem sȓam i marra ṣṣaliḥin s Ƹisa Lmasiḥ. Awmaṯen iy iǧan akiḏi sawwaḍen-awem-d sȓam.
Marra ṣṣaliḥiin sawwaḍen-awem-d sȓam xaṣṣatan yinni iǧan ḏi ṯeddarṯ n uzeǧiḏ Qayṣar.
Aḏ yiȓi ak arruḥ nwem arḍa n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Nec ḏ Bulus ḏ arrasul n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ s ȓxaḍar n Arebbi, akiḏi umaṯneɣ Timutawus.
Tariɣ ṯabrat-a i wawmaṯen iy ḏi iǧa lʼiman iǧan ḏ ṣṣaliḥin ḏi ṯendint n Kulus. Akiḏwem yiȓi arḍa ḏ ȓehna zi Arebbi Babaṯneɣ.
Neccin ȓebda netcekkar Arebbi Babas n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ xmi ḏas ntettar xawem.
Liʼanna netsȓa xawem x lʼiman nwem iy ḏaywem x Ƹisa Lmasiḥ ḏ ȓemḥibbeṯ nwem iy teggem i ṣṣaliḥin marra.
Amenni iy ṯ ṯȓemḏem zeg wumaṯneɣ Pafras netta ḏ amsexxar iƹizzen ḏi ȓxeḏmeṯ. Ixeddem nican i Lmasiḥ ƹlaḥsab nneɣ.
Iƹaweḏ-aneɣ xawem x ȓemḥibbeṯ nwem lʼaṣel n ȓemḥibbeṯ-a ḏ Arruḥ iqeddsen.
X manaya zi nhar nni wami tuɣa nesȓa neccin xawem, netɣima ntettar-as i Arebbi xawem bac aḏ tƹemmarem s ṯusna x ȓxaḍar n Arebbi s marra ȓƹaqeȓ ḏ ȓefhameṯ ig iticcen Arruḥ iqeddsen.
Ḥima aḏ tuyurem x yijjen n ubriḏ iy ḏas iticcen i Siḏiṯneɣ lqima iy ḏas iteƹjiben marra. X ubriḏ-a aḏ tarwem marra ȓexḏayem ṯiṣebḥanin aḏ tmarnim ḏi ṯusna nwem x Arebbi.
Ntettar i Arebbi aḏ tjehḏem ḏi marra ṯizemmar nwem ƹlaḥsab lquwwa nnes iǧan ƹaḍima bac aḏ tbeddem aḏ teṣbarem mliḥ s ȓefraḥeṯ,
bac aḏ tcekkarem Babaṯneɣ wenni iy ḏawem yucin ȓḥaqq aḏ tcarcem ḏi lwareṯ n ṣṣaliḥin ḏi nnur.
Isefȓeṯ-aneɣ zi ȓeḥkam n ṯaǧest issiweḍ-aneɣ ɣar ȓmulk n Mmis iƹizzen.
Zzayes netta isenjem-aneɣ iƹni iɣfar-aneɣ ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nneɣ.
Mmis netta ḏ ṣṣifeṯ n Arebbi wenni war nzemmar ca neccin aṯ nẓer. Netta ḏ amenzu iḥekkem x qaƹ min d itwaxeȓqen.

Zzayes netta iy zi d twaxeȓqent qaƹ ṯimesȓayin ig iǧan ḏeg ujenna niɣ ḏi ṯmurṯ. Waxxa tbanent-id niɣ war d tbinent ca. Niɣ ḏ lƹarcaṯ niɣ ḏ lmemlakaṯ niɣ ḏ yinni iḥekkmen niɣ ḏ yinni ijehḏen. Qaƹ ṯimesȓayin-a zzayes iy d twaxeȓqent, twaxeȓqent-as-d i netta.
Ḏ netta ig iǧan qbeȓ x ṯmesȓayin qaƹ u x dsas nnes iy tmunent qaƹ ṯimesȓayin.
Ḏ netta iy iǧan ḏ azeǧif n ddat iƹni n jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin. Ḏ netta ig iǧan ḏ amezwaru, ḏ netta ig iǧan ḏ amenzu zeg imettinen bac ḏ netta iy ɣa yiȓin ḏ amezwaru ḏi ṯmesȓayin qaƹ.
Liʼanna iƹjeb-as i Arebbi aḏayes isezḏeɣ ḏi Mmis qaƹ min ɣares.
Ṯumma isemṣȓaḥ Arebbi qaƹ ṯimesȓayin i yixef nnes ig iǧan ḏi ṯmurṯ niɣ ḏeg ujenna iƹni igga ȓehna s iḏammen n Mmis iy yuzzȓen x ṣṣalib.
Kenniw tuɣa qbeȓ tiggwjem x Arebbi tmenɣam akiḏes s ȓaƹquȓaṯ nwem teggem ṯimesȓayin ḏ ṯiƹeffanin.
Walakin ȓexxu lla, Arebbi isemṣȓaḥ-ikenniw akiḏes s ddat n Lmasiḥ iƹni s ȓmewṯ nnes bac akenniw iqeddem zzaṯes ṯeṣfam bȓa ȓƹib war ḏinni bu wi kenniw iy ɣa itahamen.

Walakin labud aḏ teqqimem ḏi lʼiman nwem nican aḏ tbeddem x dsas, war ṯsemmḥem ca ḏi lʼamal n Lʼinjil tuɣa iy tesȓim. Lʼinjil-a twabeccarent zzayes qaƹ ṯimesȓayin itwaxeȓqen swadday ujenna, u nec Bulus ḏewȓeɣ ḏ axeddam nnes.
Ȓexxu nec farrḥeɣ x minxef tƹeddabeɣ ƹlaḥsab kenniw. Liʼanna ḏi ddat-a inu kessiɣ ȓḥaqq inu zi min ƹaḏ ineqqṣen zeg uƹeddeb nni n Lmasiḥ ƹlaḥsab ddat nnes iƹni jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin.
Jmaƹeṯ-a ḏewȓeɣ ɣares nec ḏ ijjen n uxeddam nnes ƹlaḥsab lwajib nni zi Arebbi iy ḏayi d immucen bac akenniw beccareɣ s wawaȓ ikmaȓ n Arebbi.
Awaȓ-a netta ḏ ȓmaƹna nni iy tuɣa inuffaren ḏi zmanaṯ ḏ ljilaṯ iƹḏun, ȓexxu arrin-d xas ȓexbar ṣṣaliḥin.

Niṯni ixḍar-iṯen Arebbi bac aḏ xebbaren i yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil aḏasen inin mecḥaȓ imɣar ȓxir-a lƹaḍim n ȓmaƹna inuffaren wanita. Min iƹna ȓmaƹna-ya? Lmasiḥ netta iǧa ḏaywem, ḏ lʼamal n lƹaḍama.
Lmasiḥ-a netbeccar zzayes i yiwḏan, nnehha-ṯen marra iḏsen, nseȓmaḏ-iṯen s marra ȓefhameṯ bac a nqeddem iwḏan marra ḏi Lmasiḥ bȓa ca n ȓƹib i Arebbi.
X manaya nec xeddmeɣ, taḥȓeɣ ḏi ȓxeḏmeṯ-a s marra jjheḏ nni n Lmasiḥ netta isxeddam-ayi s ṯzemmar nnes.
Cuf, xseɣ aḏ tessnem mecḥaȓ taḥȓeɣ ḏi ȓxeḏmeṯ-a ƹlaḥsab kenniw ḏ yinni iǧan ḏi ṯendint n Lawdukya ḏ marra yinni ƹemmarṣ ma ẓȓin aɣembub inu.
Rezzuɣ uȓawen nwem aḏ twacejjƹen xmi ɣa munen ak wayawya s ȓemḥibbeṯ bac aḏ tawḍem ɣar marra ȓxir nni ig iǧan ḏeg yijjen n ȓefhameṯ ṯekmaȓ ḏ yijjen n ṯusna x ȓmaƹna inuffaren n Arebbi iǧan ḏi Lmasiḥ.
Ḏayes ḏi netta iy twasnuffaren marra ȓkunuz n ȓefhameṯ ḏ marra ȓkunuz n ṯusna.
Qqareɣ-awem manaya bac war d itis ḥadd akenniw icmeṯ s wawaȓ nnes aḏawem isneƹmiȓ ḏ ṣṣaḥ.
Nec waxxa war ǧiɣ ca akiḏwem s ddat inu aqayi akiḏwem s arruḥ inu, farrḥeɣ nec xmi twaȓiɣ lƹibada nwem nican teggem-t ṯa s ṯa u mecḥaȓ iy tbeddam ḏi lʼiman nwem ḏi Lmasiḥ.
Iḏen, mammec ṯqebȓem Ƹisa Lmasiḥ amenni iy ɣa ṯƹicem.
Itxeṣṣa-kenniw aḏ tiȓim ṯebnam x ḏsas nnes mliḥ, aḏ tiȓim ṯjehḏem ḏi lʼiman nwem mammec iy kenniw seȓmaḏen, aḏ tiȓim tenfeyyaḍem s ccuker.
Arrem-d ȓbaȓ nwem uȓa ḏ ijjen ma izemmar akenniw isxarweḍ s lfelsafa niɣ s uɣeddaȓ nni ixwan ƹlaḥsab ttaqalid n bnaḏem niɣ ƹlaḥsab lqawanin iqḏimen n ddunect-a qa maci ƹlaḥsab Lmasiḥ.
Liʼanna Lmasiḥ marra min iǧan n Arebbi izḏeɣ ḏi ddat nnes.
