Kenniw ṯuḏarṯ nwem ṯekmaȓ ak Lmasiḥ iǧan netta ḏ azeǧif itrayyan x marra yinni iḥekkmen ḏ yinni ijehḏen.
Dayes ḏi netta ƹaweḏ iy ḏi ṯṭehharem walakin maci ḏ ijjen n ṭṭahareṯ iy ggin s ifassen n bnaḏem; Lla, ṯṭehharem ṭṭabiƹa nwem ṯaƹeffant qaƹ s yijjen n ṭṭahareṯ iggi-t Lmasiḥ.
Iƹni ṯenḍȓem akiḏes s ṭṭahareṯ nwem ḏeg waman, u ƹaweḏ s ṭṭahareṯ nwem ḏeg waman ṯekkarem-d akiḏes zi ȓmewṯ s lʼiman nwem ḏi ṯzemmar n Arebbi wenni d isekkaren Ƹisa zi ȓmewṯ.
Fa kenniw tuɣa ṯemmuṯem s wuȓawen nwem ƹlaḥsab ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ ḏ ṭṭabiƹa nwem war iṭehharen ca, walakin Arebbi iseddar-d kenniw ak Lmasiḥ wami ḏaneɣ iɣfar qaƹ ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nneɣ.
Imḥa amarwas nni ig izemmmen xaneɣ aqaṯ ḍed nneɣ s Lqanun. Manayenni iysi-ṯ iṣemmar-iṯ x ṣṣalib.
Arebbi ikkes ṯizemmar nni n yinni iḥekkmen ḏ yinni ijehḏen yarri-ṯen axasen furrjen iwḏan ifḍeḥ-iṯen irbeḥ-iṯen x ṣṣalib.
Iḏen war tejjam ḥadd akenniw iƹeyyeb x min tettem niɣ x min ṯsessem niɣ x ca n ȓeƹyuḏaṯ iy tiȓin kuȓ ƹam niɣ kuȓ char niɣ x nhar n ssebṯ n lƹibada.
Marra ṯimesȓayin-a niṯenti am ṯiȓi waha n ṯmesȓayin nni iy d ɣa yasen, ṯimesȓayin nni n ṣṣaḥ n Lmasiḥ.

War tejjam uȓa ḏ ijjen n bnaḏem akenniw isbeṭṭeȓ x ljaʼiza. Netta bnaḏem nni ḏ wenni ig isemɣaren min iqesḥen ḏi ddin, isemɣar ƹaweḏ lƹibada nni iy zi ƹebbḏen lmalaʼikaṯ. Issawaȓ aṭṭas ṯa s ṯa x min iẓra zaƹma ḏi ca n lwaḥi nnes. Ȓƹaqeȓ nnes yuff imɣar s ttakebbur. War ḏinni bu Arruḥ iqeddsen, ḏinni lʼafkar nnes ixwan waha.

Bnaḏem nni isexṣar lƹalaqa ak wenni itrayyan ḏ azeǧif. Azeǧif nni netta itḏebbar i ddat nnes amen-ṯekmaȓ wami nettaṯ ṯmun s ipurṣuṯen ḏ ȓemfaseȓ nnes bac ddat aḏ temɣar ƹlaḥsab min ixes Arebbi aḏ temɣar.
Kenniw meȓa ṯemmuṯem ak Lmasiḥ i lqawanin nni iqḏimen n ddunect-a, mayemmi ḏas teggem array i lqanun nni axmi ƹaḏ tƹicem zzayes ḏi ddunect-a?
Iƹni: "War kessi ca s ufus, war tqasa ca, war tḥaḏa ca."
Lqawanin-a yina ssawaȓen x can ṯmesȓayin iy ɣa ifnan xmi ɣa twaccent, niṯni ḏ lqawanin ḏ useȓmeḏ n yiwḏan waha.

Ḏ ṣṣaḥ, tɣiȓ-asen i yiwḏan lqawanin nni am ḏaysen ȓefhameṯ zaƹma x ssabab n lwajib n lƹibada nsen ḏ ddin nsen iqseḥ u ƹaweḏ mecḥaȓ tzeyyaren x ddat n bnaḏem. Walakin lqawanin-a war tƹiwinen uȓa ḏ ijjen n bnaḏem bac war itseƹƹif ca ccehawaṯ n ddat nnes.
Iḏen fa wami twasnekkarem kenniw ak Lmasiḥ u labud aḏ terzum s wuȓawen nwem ṯimesȓayin nni iǧan ḏeg ujenna mani iqqim Lmasiḥ ɣar ufusi n Arebbi.
Rezzuṯ s wuȓawen nwem ṯimesȓayin nni iǧan ḏeg ujenna, maci ṯinni ḏi ṯmurṯ.
Minzi zaƹma kenniw ṯemmuṯem, ṯuḏarṯ nwem aqa ṯnuffar ak Lmasiḥ ḏi Arebbi.
Xmi d ɣa imeḍhar Lmasiḥ iƹni wenni iǧan ḏ ṯuḏarṯ nwem, ȓexddenni akiḏes tmeḍharem uȓa ḏ kenniw ḏi lƹaḍama.
X manaya nɣeṯ min iǧan ḏaywem ḏi ṭṭabiƹa nwem n ddunect-a iƹni lfasad ḏ min ixenzen ḏ ccehweṯ ḏ ȓxaḍar aƹeffan ḏ ṭṭmaƹ ig iǧan netta am lƹibada n lʼaṣnam.
Ƹlaḥsab ṯimesȓayin-a iy d ɣa yasen Nhar n uɣḍab n Arebbi.
Tuɣa qbeȓ ṯuyurem x ibriḏen-a ṯƹicem ḏaysen.
Walakin ȓexxu ṯimesȓayin nni itxeṣṣa axawem ṯent ṯesbeƹƹḏem qaƹ iƹni aƹeṣṣab ḏ uɣḍab ḏ ccarr ḏ ȓbaṭeȓ ḏ wawaȓen iƹeffanen iy ṯeqqarem s uqemmum nwem.
War sxerriqem ca x wayawya ȓaḥeqqac ṯbeddȓem ṭṭabiƹa nni nwem tuɣa ɣarwem qbeȓ ḏayes ixarwiḍen waha.
Ȓexxu kenniw ṯeggim ijjen n ṭṭabiƹa nneɣni ḏ jḏiḏ ƹaḏ tḏewwaȓ-d ḏ jḏiḏ, ȓmaƹrifa nnes am ṣṣifeṯ n Lxaliq nnes.
War itɣimi bu uyunani niɣ ḏ aʼisraʼili, niɣ ḏ wenni iṭehharen niɣ ḏ wenni war iṭehhiren ca, niɣ ḏ abarbari niɣ ḏ aweḥciw, niɣ ḏ ismeɣ niɣ ḏ wenni iǧan ḥurr. Lla, Lmasiḥ netta ḏ marra, aqaṯ ḏi marra.
Iḏen kenniw ḏ ccaƹb muqeddes ixḍar-ikenniw Arebbi ṯƹizzem xas. Labud aḏaywem ṯiȓi lḥanana ḏ ȓxir ḏ ttawaḍuƹ ḏ ṣṣbar u marra bȓa ttakebbur.
Ṣbareṯ ak wayawya. Meȓa can yijjen zzaywem ɣares can lmuckil iy zzayes ɣa iceṯca x unneɣni, itxeṣṣa ijjen aḏ ismeḥ i unneɣni. Mammec ḏawem iɣfar Arebbi i kenniw, amenni iy ɣa ṯsemḥem i yiwḏan.
Ktar marra zi ṯmesȓayin-a ṯina itxeṣṣa aḏ tesxeḏmem ȓemḥibbeṯ jarawem minzi ȓemḥibbeṯ-a tas-d am yijjen n usɣun ig ismunen marra ṯimesȓayin-a ḏeg yicten.
Jjem ȓehna n Lmasiḥ aḏ iḥkem ḏeg wuȓawen nwem minzi kenniw ḏ ijjen n jmaƹeṯ iȓaɣa-yawem-d aȓ ȓehna-ya. Kenniw ƹaweḏ cekkarem Arebbi.

Jjem awaȓen n Lmasiḥ aḏaywem zeḏɣen s marra lbaraka nsen. S marra ȓefhameṯ itxeṣṣa ijjen aḏ isefhem unneɣni, ijjen aḏ inha unneɣni. Ɣennjem s wawaȓen n Zzabur ḏ lʼamdaḥ ḏ yizȓan ruḥiya akiḏes ṯeggem ijjen n ccuker ḏeg wuȓawen nwem i Arebbi.
Marra min teggem s wawaȓen niɣ s lḥasanaṯ, itxeṣṣa aḏ teggem manaya marra ƹlaḥsab isem n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa azzayes tcekkarem Arebbi Babaṯneɣ.
A ṯimɣarin, ṭaƹent i iryazen nkent minzi manaya ig iǧan ḏ lmaƹqul zi Arebbi.
Ay iryazen, ḥibbem ṯimɣarin nwem war iǧi aḏkisent twaqsḥem.
Ay iḥenjiren, ṭaƹem i lwalidin nwem ḏi marra ṯimesȓayin minzi manaya itƹejib-as i Siḏi Arebbi.
Ay ibabaṯen, war tqehharem ca ṯarwa nwem bac war tefciȓen ca.

Ay isemɣan, ṭaƹeṯ i ayṯbab nwem n ddunect-a ḏi marra ṯimesȓayin. Ṭaƹem-asen maci ɣir xmi ḏawem tbeddan ɣar uzeǧif waha ḥima aḏasen ṯƹejbem; Lla, ṭaƹem-asen s ȓxaḍar nwem akiḏwem ṯiȓi ijjen n ṯiggwḏi ḏi Siḏiṯneɣ.
Marra min teggem, teggem-ṯ s ȓxaḍar nwem mammec ḏas ṯxeddmem i Siḏiṯneɣ maci i iryazen.
Kenniw ṯessnem ljaʼiza nwem aḏ tiȓi ḏ ijjen n lwareṯ zi Siḏiṯneɣ. Netta umi ṯxeddmem netta ḏ Siḏiṯneɣ Lmasiḥ.
Cuf, wenni iḍeǧmen ataf aḏ icc aƹmuḏ x min iḍeǧem. Arebbi war itegg bu s wuḏemawen jar yiwḏan.
Ay ayṯbab n isemɣan, ḏebbarem xasen x isemɣan nwem s min iǧan nican ḏ ȓḥaqq nsen aqa kenniw ṯessnem illa ɣarwem Bab nwem ḏeg ujenna.
Teggem lmejhud s ṯẓaǧiṯ nwem, iȓim ƹlabal ḏi ṯẓaǧit nwem cekkarem Arebbi.
Ḏi nnefs n ȓweqṯ ttarem-as i Arebbi xaneɣ bac aḏ irzem ṯawwarṯ i wawaȓ nneɣ a nbeccar s ȓmaƹna inuffaren n Lmasiḥ iy xef iy ǧiɣ nec ḏi ȓeḥbes.
Ttarem-as i Arebbi bac azzayes sfehmeɣ mliḥ i yiwḏan ƹlaḥsab min labud aḏ iniɣ.
Ƹiceṯ s ȓefhameṯ ak yinni iǧan ɣar barra nwem war yuminen ca, staɣellam ȓweqṯ nwem mliḥ.
U labud awaȓ nwem aḏ yiȓi ȓebda iccur s arḍa imeǧḥen s ȓemȓeḥ bac aḏ tessnem mamc ɣa ṯarrem x kur ijjen.
Umaṯneɣ Tuciq akenniw ixebbar x marra min teggeɣ ḏanita. Netta iƹizz xafi, itsexxar i Arebbi s yijjen n ttiqeṯ. Netta ḏ axeddam itemƹacaren akiḏi ḏi ȓxeḏmeṯ n Siḏiṯneɣ.
Ssekkeɣ-ṯ-iḏ ɣarwem x ccɣeȓ-a wanita bac aḏ tessnem mamc neǧa neccin aḏ icejjeƹ uȓawen nwem.
Akiḏes umaṯneɣ Wanisamu netta iy xaneɣ iƹizzen ḏayes ttiqeṯ, netta zi ṯmurṯ nwem. Yina akenniw xebbaren marra min iweqƹen ḏeg umcan-a.
Isawwaḍ-awem-d sȓam Aristarxus wenni iy kiḏi iǧan ḏi ȓeḥbes-a. Isawwaḍ-awem-d sȓam uȓa ḏ Marqus mmis n ƹzizes n Barnabas. Tuɣa weṣṣiɣ-kenniw x Marqus-a, meȓa yusa-d ɣarwem reḥḥbeṯ zzayes.
Isawwaḍ-awem-d sȓam ƹaweḏ Ƹisa wenni umi qqaren Yustus. Ḏ yina waha ig iǧan ḏ israʼiliyen zeg yinni itemƹacaren akiḏi ḏi ȓxeḏmeṯ-a ƹlaḥsab ȓmulk n Arebbi, tcejjaƹen-ayi aṭṭas.

Isawwaḍ-awem-d sȓam Pafras netta ig iǧan zi ṯmurṯ nwem, netta ḏ ijjen n uxeddam n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ. Ȓebda itaḥeȓ ḏi ṯẓaǧiṯ ƹlaḥsab kenniw bac aḏ tbeddem x dsas aḏ tiȓim ṯemɣarem ḏi lʼiman nwem war ɣarwem itȓi bu ccekk ḏi marra min ixes Arebbi.
Nec cehhḏeɣ xas irebbeȓ xawem mliḥ ḏ yinni ƹaweḏ iǧan ḏi ṯendint n Lawdukya ḏ yinni iǧan ḏi ṯendint n Yirapulis.
Isawwaḍ-awem-d sȓam amƹizz nneɣ Luqa ig iǧan ḏ aḍbib, akiḏes Dimas.
Siwḍem-asen sȓam inu i ayṯmaṯneɣ iy iǧan ḏi ṯendint n Lawdukya ḏ wučmaṯneɣ Numibya ḏ jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin iy iǧan ḏi ṯeddarṯ nnes.
Xmi ɣa ṯɣarem ṯabrat-a kenniw jarawem, ƹaweḏ xzarem jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin at ɣaren ḏi Lawdukya. Xzarem ƹaweḏ kenniw ṯabrat nsen zi Lawdukya at tɣarem.
Inim-as i Arkippus u labud aḏ tkemmȓeḏ lwajib n ȓxeḏmeṯ iy ṯqebȓeḏ zi Siḏiṯneɣ.
Qa nec ḏ Bulus s ṯira n ufus inu iy zi ḏawem d sawwaḍeɣ sȓam ȓexxu. Feqḏem-ayi-d s snaseȓ inu n ȓeḥbes-a. Akiḏwem yiȓi arḍa.
Nec ḏ Bulus, akiḏi Silas ḏ Timutawus. Ntari ṯabrat-a ɣar jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin n Ayṯ-Salunik iy yumnen zi Arebbi Babaṯneɣ ḏ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ Siḏiṯneɣ. Akiḏwem yiȓi arḍa ḏ ȓehna.
Neccin ȓebda netcekkar Arebbi xawem marra, ntettar i Arebbi xawem bȓa ma a nbedd.
Netxemmam zzaṯ n Arebbi iǧan ḏ Babaṯneɣ mecḥaȓ ixeddem lʼiman nwem, mecḥaȓ ṯrebbeȓ ȓemḥibbeṯ nwem, u mecḥaȓ iṣebbar lʼamal nwem ḏi Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Ay ayṯmaṯneɣ yinni iƹizzen x Arebbi, nessen qa netta ixḍar-ikenniw.
Liʼanna Lʼinjil iy netbeccar war d yusi ca ɣarwem s wawaȓen waha, yusa-d ɣarwem s ṯzemmar ḏ Arruḥ iqeddsen ḏ yijjen n uqennaƹ imɣar. Aqa ṯessnem mamc tuɣa netƹic jarawem ƹlaḥsab kenniw.
Kenniw ṯebḏam teggem mamc ntegg neccin ḏ mamc itegg Siḏiṯneɣ liʼanna kenniw ḏi ȓwesṭ n waṭṭas n tamara ṯqebȓem awaȓ nneɣ s ȓefraḥeṯ iy d yusin zi Arruḥ iqeddsen.
Ammu ṯḏewȓem ḏ ijjen n lmiṯal aṯ ḏeffaren marra ȓmuminin ig iǧan ḏi lʼiqlim n Masidunya ḏ lʼiqlim n Uxaya.

Zzaywem kenniw iy d iffeɣ ṣṣut n wawaȓ n Siḏiṯneɣ. Maci iffeɣ-d ḏi Masidunya ḏ Uxaya waha; Lla, iffeɣ-d ȓexbar-a x lʼiman nwem zi Arebbi ɣar yiwḏan ḏi marra imucan. X manaya war ḏaneɣ itxeṣṣi ca axas nessiweȓ minzi iwḏan tesȓan xawem.
Iwḏan nni s yixef nsen sufuɣen xawem ȓexbar x mamc iy ḏaneɣ ṯqebȓem ḏ mamc iy ṯsemḥem ḏi lʼaṣnam bac aḏ tƹebḏem Arebbi iddaren iy iǧan ḏ ṣṣaḥ.
Ḥima aḏ trajam Mmis iy d ɣa yasen zeg ujenna wenni iy d isekkar Arebbi zeg imettinen iƹni Ƹisa iy ḏaneɣ isenjamen zeg uɣḍab nni iy d ɣa yasen.
Ay ayṯma, kenniw s yixef nwem ṯessnem nnfaƹ nni iy d nuwi wami d nusa ɣarwem.
Ḏi ṯendint n Filippi ṯessnem belli tƹeddan xaneɣ ḏinni tbuṣaren xaneɣ. Walakin neccin nzaƹem akiḏwem, tuɣa itƹawan-aneɣ Arebbi bac a nbeccar jarawem s Lʼinjil waxxa can yiwḏan tƹarraḍen-aneɣ.
Awaȓ nneɣ iy zi netweṣṣa war d itis ca zeg uɣḏar niɣ zi min ixenzen niɣ zi ṯeḥraymiṯ.

Lla, iḍbeƹ-aneɣ Arebbi ikellef-aneɣ x wawaȓen-a iǧan ḏi Lʼinjil. Zi manaya nessawaȓ bac axaneɣ yarḍa Arebbi maci axaneɣ arḍan yiwḏan minzi ḏ netta ig iǧan ḏ wenni itmeyyazen min ɣarneɣ ḏeg wuȓawen nneɣ.
Cuf, qa ṯessnem ƹemmarṣ ma nseȓha ḥadd s wawaȓen niɣ ƹemmarṣ ma neḍmeƹ ḥadd ƹlaḥsab ca n ssabab. Icehheḏ xaneɣ Arebbi!
War nexs ca iryazen aḏaneɣ cehharen: lla kenniw, lla can iryazen nneɣni. Neccin tuɣa nzemmar axawem nzeyyar s ssulṭa nneɣ am arrusul.
Walakin lla, neccin nxeddem akiḏwem s ttawaḍuƹ am ṯemɣarṯ ak ṯarwa nnes.
Ammu iy nethella ḏaywem netxes-ikenniw. Nfareḥ wami ncarec akiḏwem Lʼinjil ḏ ṯuḏarṯ nneɣ minzi ṯƹizzem xaneɣ aṭṭas.
Ay ayṯma, aqa ṯƹeqȓem x ȓxeḏmeṯ nneɣ qa neccin nuwṯa xas tamara. Wami kenniw netbeccar s Lʼinjil n Arebbi, qa nxeddem ǧiȓeṯ ḏ nhar bac war netbessiȓ ca x can ḥadd zzaywem.
Netƹic akiḏwem kenniw iy yumnen s yijjen n ṣṣfa ḏ yijjen n ubriḏ nican bȓa ȓƹib. Kenniw ḏ ȓechuḏ x manaya uȓa ḏ Arebbi.
Ntegg akiḏwem am yijjen n uryaz ak ṯarwa nnes. Netweṣṣa-kenniw netcejjaƹ-ikenniw netzeyyar xawem
bac aḏ tuyurem s yijjen n ṯicri iy ḏas iticcen lqima i Arebbi ig isḏaheǧ netta iƹni wenni iy ḏawem d itȓaɣan ɣar ȓmulk nnes ḏ lƹaḍama nnes.

Neccin netcekkar Arebbi xawem bȓa ma a nbedd wami ṯqebȓem awaȓ nnes iy ḏawem d nessiweḍ. Ṯqebȓem-ṯ maci am wawaȓ n yiwḏan, ṯqebȓem-ṯ am wawaȓ n Arebbi nican. Ixeddem wawaȓ-a ƹaweḏ ḏaywem kenniw iy yumnen.
Ay ayṯma, ṯḏewȓem am ṯjumaƹ nni n ȓmuminin n Arebbi ḏi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ ṯinni iy iǧan ḏi ṯmurṯ n Yahuḏiya. Liʼanna iwḏan n ṯmurṯ nwem tbuṣaren xawem am Ayṯ-Yahuḏiya tbuṣaren x ṯjumaƹ n ȓmuminin iy ḏinni.
Ay ayṯma, tuɣa nɣab xawem cway n ȓweqṯ, walakin ḏeg wuȓawen nneɣ war xawem nɣib ca. Ḏi ȓweqṯ nni netḥawaȓ aṭṭas bac a d nas minzi ḏayneɣ mezȓi akenniw nẓer.
Mecḥaȓ n ṯwaȓaṯin nexs aɣarwem d nas, nec s yixef inu ƹaweḏ, walakin itqaṭeƹ-aneɣ-d Cciṭan ḏeg ubriḏ.
Liʼanna ḏ kenniw iy iǧan ḏ lʼamal nneɣ ḏ ȓefraḥeṯ nneɣ ḏ ttaj nneɣ n ccan zzaṯ i Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa xmi d ɣa yas.
Wah, ḏ kenniw iy iǧan ḏ ccan nneɣ ḏ ȓefraḥeṯ nneɣ.
Nessekk-iṯ ḥima uȓa ḏ ijjen war iterjiji ca s ȓemḥayen-a nwem; Aqa ṯessnem belli manaya iy xaneɣ yurin.
Wah, wami tuɣaneɣ akiḏwem qbeȓ neqqar-awem qa ȓemḥayen axaneɣ kkent. Ḏ manaya ig iweqƹen qa ṯessnem kenniw.

X manaya, wami ugiɣ aḏ ṣbareɣ ƹaḏ ktar, ssekkeɣ-d ɣarwem Timutawus bac aḏ ssneɣ lʼiman nwem. Ggwḏeɣ wenni itɣarran tuɣa iɣarr-ikenniw s ibriḏen nnes uca min tuɣa nexḏem jarawem imken iḏweȓ axmi war neggi walu.

Ȓexxu iḏweȓ-d ɣarneɣ zzaywem Timutawus, yuwi-yaneɣ-d ijjen n ȓexbar ḏ aṣebḥan x lʼiman nwem ḏ ȓemḥibbeṯ nwem. Inna-aneɣ aqa txemmamem ḏayneɣ mliḥ, ḏaywem ƹaweḏ mezȓi aḏaneɣ ṯeẓrem uȓa ḏ neccin ḏayneɣ mezȓi akenniw nẓer.
X manaya ay ayṯma, neccin netwacejjeƹ s lʼiman nwem waxxa aqaneɣ ḏanita ḏi ȓemḥayen ḏ yij uziyyar.
Ȓexxu aqa netƹic mliḥ wami tbeddam nican ḏeg ubriḏ n Siḏiṯneɣ.
Mammec iy ɣa negg a ncekkar Arebbi xawem?! Mecḥaȓ n ȓefraḥeṯ iy ɣarneɣ zzaṯ i Arebbi ƹlaḥsab kenniw!
Ǧiȓeṯ ḏ nhar ntettar-as i Arebbi s wuȓawen nneɣ bac akenniw nẓer ƹaweḏ, aḏawem narni min ineqqṣen ḏi lʼiman nwem.
Aḏaneɣ irzem Arebbi Babaṯneɣ abriḏ ɣarwem netta s yixef nnes ak Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa.
Aḏ yarni Siḏiṯneɣ ȓemḥibbeṯ nwem ak wayawya at isfeyyeḍ s waṭṭas ak marra iwḏan am neccin nexs-ikenniw.
Aḏawem isejheḏ uȓawen nwem bac aḏ tiȓim bȓa ȓƹib aḏ tiȓim muqeddsin zzaṯ i Arebbi Babaṯneɣ xmi d ɣa yas Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa ak marra ṣṣaliḥin nnes.

Fa ay ayṯma ƹlaḥsab ṯimesȓayin nneɣni, kenniw qa ṯqebȓem zzayneɣ mamc iy ɣa ṯƹicem bac axawem yarḍa Arebbi; amenni ƹaweḏ iy tƹicem. Ȓexxu ḏi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ netḥeccam-ikenniw netweṣṣa-kenniw bac aḏ teggem ƹaḏ ktar.
Cuf, ṯessnem ṯimesȓayin nni iy zi kenniw nweṣṣa s ssulṭa n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Aqa ȓxaḍar n Arebbi itxeṣṣa-kenniw aḏ tiȓim ṯeṣfam aḏ tbeƹƹḏem zi lfasad.
Itxeṣṣa aḏ tessnem mamc ɣa ṯḥekmem x ddat nwem ƹlaḥsab min iǧan muqeddes ḏayes aweqqar.
Maci aḏ tƹicem ḏi ccehweṯ n ddat nwem mammec teggen ȓegnus war issinen ca Arebbi.
Ƹlaḥsab manaya itxeṣṣa labud uȓa ḏ ijjen war iḍeǧem umas war ṯ itɣecci ca liʼanna ḏ Siḏiṯneɣ ig itxeǧasen x marra ṯimesȓayin-a mammec ḏawem ṯ nenna qbeȓ neƹȓem-awem xas.
Minzi Arebbi war ḏaneɣ d iȓaɣi ca bac a nƹic ḏi min ixenzen; Lla, iȓaɣa-yaneɣ-d a nƹic ḏi min iṣfan.
Falihaḏa wenni itagin aḏ iḏfar ȓuṣiyeṯ-a ṯanitan ataf maci itagi i bnaḏem, itagi i Arebbi wenni iy ḏawem d iticcen Arruḥ nnes iqeddsen.
Ȓexxu ƹlaḥsab ȓemḥibbeṯ jarawem war nteḥḏiji ca ƹaḏ aḏawem nari, mayemmi? Minzi iseȓmeḏ-ikenniw Arebbi s yixef nnes aḏ texsem ayawya.
Wah, ḏ ṣṣaḥ texsem marra ayṯmaṯwem iy kiḏwem itƹicen ḏi lʼiqlim n Masidunya. Walakin netweṣṣa-kenniw ay ayṯma aḏ tarnim ƹaḏ ktar.
Netweṣṣa ƹaweḏ aḏ tḥawȓem bac aḏ tƹicem ḏi ȓhudneṯ, aḏ taḏfem ḏi ccɣuȓaṯ nwem waha, aḏ txeḏmem s ifassen nwem. Amenni iy kenniw netweṣṣa qbeȓ.
Ḥima aḏ tuyurem s lmaƹqul ak yinni ɣar barra nwem war yuminen ca, war teḥḏijim walu zi ḥadd.
Fa ay ayṯma, war nexs ca aḏ tqefȓem i yixef nwem ƹlaḥsab yinni iṭṭṣen ḏeg imeḍȓan bac war txeyyiqem ca am yinni nneɣni war ḏi iǧi bu lʼamal.
Cuf, neccin ntamen belli Ƹisa immuṯ ikkar-d, ntamen ƹaweḏ belli Arebbi ƹaḏ aḏ iysi yinni iṭṭṣen ḏeg imeḍȓan iy yumnen zi Lmasih aḏ iȓin ak Ƹisa.
Ƹlaḥsab awaȓ n Siḏiṯneɣ neqqar-awem qa neccin iƹni yinni ƹaḏ iddaren iƹni yinni ƹaḏ iqqimen ḏi ddunect-a xmi d ɣa yas Siḏiṯneɣ qa neccin war netgaƹƹiḏ ca ḏ imezwura x yinni iṭṭṣen ḏeg imeḍȓan.

Liʼanna Siḏiṯneɣ aqa aḏ d ihwa s yixef nnes zeg ujenna s yijjen n ṯɣuyyeṯ ṯemɣar ḏ yijjen n ṯmijja n lmalak nni ameqqran ḏ zzammar nni itṣuḍen n Arebbi, ȓexddenni imettinen tuɣa yumnen zi Lmasiḥ aḏ d kkaren ḏ imezwura.
Ssenni neccin iƹni yinni ƹaḏ iddaren iƹni yinni ƹaḏ aqaneɣ ḏi ddunect-a ataf akiḏsen netwarfeƹ ɣar ujenna ḏeg iseynuṯen bac a nmeȓqa ak Siḏiṯneɣ ḏi lhawa. Wa amenni akiḏes niȓi i ȓebda.
Iḏen, cejjƹeṯ ayawya s wawaȓen-a.
Fa ay ayṯma, war nteḥḏiji ca aḏawem ntari x lʼawqat niɣ ḏ ttawarix.
Aqa ṯessnem mliḥ belli Yum n Siḏiṯneɣ aḏ d yas am d yusa ij uceffar s ǧiȓeṯ.
Ataf xmi ɣa yinin yiwḏan aqa ḏinni lʼaman ḏ ḍḍaman ȓexddenni axasen d ihwa ijjen n lxarab ḏeɣya amecnaw mamc d itas ȓeḥȓiq n ṯarwa i ṯemɣart itarwen. Ataf war zemmaren niṯni aḏ arewȓen.
Walakin kenniw ay ayṯma, war ṯeǧim ca ḏi ṯaǧest bac Yum nni axawem d ixḍeȓ am yij uceffar.
Lla, kenniw marra ḏ ṯarwa n ṯfawṯ ḏ iḥenjiren n nhar. War neǧi ca ḏ ṯarwa n ǧiȓeṯ niɣ n ṯaǧest.
Iḏen, war nteṭṭeṣ ca am yiwḏan nneɣni, itxeṣṣa a niȓi nfaq aɣarneɣ yiȓi ȓaƹqeȓ.
Cuf, yinni iteṭṭṣen, teṭṭṣen s ǧiȓeṯ. Yinni itɣellan s ccreb, tɣellan s ǧiȓeṯ.
Neccin lla, neccin ḏ ṯarwa n nhar, aɣarneɣ yiȓi ȓaƹqeȓ. A negg ṯjilit nni n ȓeḥḏiḏ iǧan nettaṯ n lʼiman ḏ ȓemḥibbeṯ. A negg lkask nneɣ iǧan netta ḏ lʼamal n ufekki.
Qa war ḏaneɣ ixḍar ca Arebbi bac axaneɣ ikk uɣḍab; Lla, qa ixḍar-aneɣ bac a nenjem s ufus n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Netta immuṯ xaneɣ bac a neddar akiḏes waxxa neccin nfaq niɣ neṭṭeṣ ḏeg unḍeȓ.
Falihaḏa tcejjaƹeṯ ayawya tƹawaneṯ ayawya mammec teggem ȓexxu.
Fa ay ayṯma, neqqar-awem weqqarem yinni ixeddmen jarawem ig iǧan xawem nehhan-kenniw.
Ucem-asen ijjen n lqima ṯemɣar s ȓemḥibbeṯ nwem ƹlaḥsab ȓxeḏmeṯ nsen. Iȓim ƹaweḏ ḏi ȓehna ak wayawya.
Ay ayṯma, nhaṯ yinni itbaƹen farq-ccɣeȓ, cejjƹeṯ yinni itefciȓen, ƹawneṯ yinni iteḍƹifen, ṣebbareṯ ak marra.
Arrem-d ȓbaȓ nwem, itxeṣṣa uȓa ḏ ijjen war itxeǧis ccarr s ccarr nneɣni; Lla, ȓebda rezzuṯ min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan jarawem ḏ jar yiwḏan marra.
Farḥem ȓebda,
tettarem i Arebbi bȓa ma aḏ tbeddem,
cekkarem-ṯ ḏi marra ṯimesȓayin. Liʼanna ḏ manaya ig itraja Arebbi zzaywem ḏi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
War tsexsayem ca Arruḥ iqeddsen.
War tseḥqarem ca awaȓen nni iy ƹeȓmen yiwḏan zi Arebbi qqaren-ṯen.
Lla, meyyzeṯ manayenni marra. Ṭṭfeṯ ḏi min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan;
Aggwjeṯ x marra min iǧan ḏ aƹeffan.
Arebbi nneɣ n ȓehna akenniw issiṣfa ḏeg yixef nwem qaƹ. Buḥbeȓ nwem ḏ ȓaƹmar nwem ḏ ddat nwem aḏ qqimen kemȓen bȓa ȓƹib aȓ d ɣa yas Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Wenni iy ḏawem d itȓaɣan ḏayes ttiqeṯ, ḏ netta iy kenniw ɣa issiwḍen ɣar manaya.
Ay ayṯma, ttarem i Arebbi xaneɣ.
Seǧmeṯ x marra awmaṯen s yijjen n sȓam iṣfa.
Tweṣṣiɣ-kenniw zzaṯ i Siḏiṯneɣ ḥima aḏ tɣarem ṯabrat-a i wawmaṯen marra.
Akiḏwem yiȓi arḍa n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Nec ḏ Bulus, akiḏi Silas ḏ Timutawus, nura ṯabrat-a ɣar jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin n Ayṯ-Salunik iy yumnen zi Arebbi Babaṯneɣ ḏ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ Siḏiṯneɣ.
Akiḏwem yiȓi arḍa ḏ ȓehna zi Arebbi Babaṯneɣ ḏ Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Ay ayṯma, itxeṣṣa u labud a ncekkar Arebbi xawem ȓebda. Qa manaya nican minzi lʼiman nwem itemɣur s waṭṭas, minzi ƹaweḏ ȓemḥibbeṯ nwem ṯarenni ak wayawya.
X manaya ḏ kenniw ig iǧan ḏ ccan nneɣ jar ṯjumaƹ n ȓmuminin, nessawaȓ x ṣṣbar nwem ḏ lʼiman nwem ḏi marra aƹeddeb nni ḏ marra ȓemḥayen nni iy xawem iy tekken.
Manaya ḏ ijjen n ddalil belli lḥukem n Arebbi iǧa nican, u s ddalil-a akenniw iḥseb ṯesḏaheǧem ȓmulk nnes iy xef ṯƹeddbem.
Arebbi netta ḏ Bab n ȓḥaqq, aḏ iƹeddeb s ȓemḥayen yinni iy kenniw itmeḥḥanen,
aḏawem yuc arraḥeṯ akiḏneɣ kenniw itwameḥḥanen. Manaya aḏ yiȓi xmi d ɣa imeḍhar Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa zeg ujenna ḏeg yijjen n ṯmessi ṯḥeddeq, akiḏes d meḍharent lmalaʼikaṯ nnes ijehḏen.
Aḏ intaqem zeg yinni war issinen ca Arebbi ḏ yinni war itṭiƹin ca i Lʼinjil n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa.
Aḏ twaƹaqben s yijjen n lxarab war ifennin ca, aḏ twaḥarrmen zeg uɣembub n Siḏiṯneɣ ḏ lƹaḍama n jjheḏ nnes.
Manaya aḏ iwqeƹ ḏi Yum nni iy d ɣa yas Siḏiṯneɣ bac aḏ itwasemɣar jar ṣṣaliḥin nnes, netta azzayes tƹejjben marra yinni yumnen, ḏaysen kenniw minzi ṯumnem zi min xas necheḏ.
X manaya ntettar i Arebbi xawem ȓebda bac akenniw yarr ṯesḏahǧem aȓaɣi nnes. U s jjheḏ nnes aḏawem yarew marra ȓxir iy ṯexsem aḏ teggem, aḏawem yarew kuȓ ȓxeḏmeṯ ƹaweḏ iy d tasen zi lʼiman nwem.
Ntettar-as manaya bac isem n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa aḏaywem itwasemɣar, aḏayes twamɣarem ƹaweḏ kenniw ƹlaḥsab arḍa n Arebbi nneɣ ḏ Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Amma Yum nni xmi d ɣa imeḍhar Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ neccin aɣares ngaƹƹeḏ. Ay ayṯma, neqqar-awem
war tenxȓiƹem ca ḏeɣya ḏi ȓaƹqeȓ nwem, war txeyyaqem ca ƹlaḥsab ca n arruḥ n lwaḥi niɣ ḏ ca n wawaȓ niɣ ḏ ca n ṯebrat zzayneɣ zaƹma iqqaren qa Yum n Siḏiṯneɣ aqa yuweḍ-d.
Lla, war tejjam ḥadd akenniw icmeṯ s walu. Ataf war izemmar Yum nni aḏ d yas qbeȓ ma aḏ semḥen aṭṭas aṭṭas n yiwḏan ḏ amezwaru ḏi Arebbi aḏ d imeḍhar lmesxuṭ mmis n ȓefna.
Netta itƹarraḍ i Arebbi isemɣar ixef nnes x marra minxef iǧa isem n Arebbi ḏ min ƹebbḏen yiwḏan ḥetta aḏ iqqim ḏi Ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant n Arebbi aḏ iƹeyyeḍ aḏ yini qa nec ḏ Arebbi.
Ma war ṯeƹqiȓem ca? Iwa wami tuɣayi akiḏwem qbeȓ qqareɣ-awem ṯimesȓayin-a.
Kenniw ṯessnem min ṯ iteṭṭfen ƹaḏ bac war d itmeḍhar ca aȓ d ɣa yaweḍ ȓweqt nnes nican.
Cuf, ijjen n jjheḏ inuffaren n ssayyiʼaṯ ixeddem ȓexxu, walakin ḏinni ijjen nneɣni ƹaḏ iteṭṭef-iṯ ḥetta wanita nneɣni aḏ itwakkes zi ȓwesṭ.
Ṯumma aḏ d imeḍhar lmesxuṭ, axas iṣuḍ Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa s uqemmum nnes aṯ ineɣ, aṯ isbeṭṭeȓ s lƹaḍama nnes iy zi d ɣa iƹqeb Ƹisa.
Lmesxuṭ-a wanita aḏ d imeḍhar ḏi ddunect-a ƹlaḥsab ȓexḏayem n Cciṭan s marra ṯizemmar ḏ lburhanaṯ ḏ ȓaƹjayeb isxarriqen
ḏ marra ibriḏen n ccarr iy zi twacemmaṯen yinni ifennan. Niṯni aḏ fnan minzi war qbiȓen ca aḏ texsen lḥaqiqa bac aṯen isenjem Arebbi.
X manaya aḏ issekk Arebbi aṯen istexiyyal bac aḏ amnen s uxarriq-a.
Ḥima aḏ twaḥasben marra yinni war yuminen ca s lḥaqiqa arḍan s ccarr.
Fa ay ayṯma iy xef iƹizz Siḏiṯneɣ, labud a ncekkar Arebbi xawem minzi ixḍar-ikenniw ḏ imezwura nni iƹni ḏ yinni iy twasnejmen s ȓxeḏmeṯ nni issiṣfan n Arruḥ iqeddsen ḏ yijjen ttiqeṯ nwem ḏi lḥaqiqa.
Aqa iȓaɣa-d xawem ƹlaḥsab i manaya s Lʼinjil iy netbeccar bac aḏ tcarcem ḏi lƹaḍama n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Iḏen ay ayṯma, beddem nican, ṭṭfem ḏi ttaƹalim nni iy kenniw nseȓmeḏ waxxa s wawaȓ nneɣ waxxa s ṯebrat nneɣ.
Amma ṯimesȓayin nneɣni ay ayṯma, ttareṯ xaneɣ i Arebbi bac awaȓ n Siḏiṯneɣ aḏ itentacar aḏ itwasemɣar mammec iy iweqƹen jarawem.
Ttareṯ ƹaweḏ a nefȓeṯ zeg yiwḏan war iḥȓin ḏ iƹeffanen minzi lʼiman war iǧi ca ḏi marra iwḏan.
Walakin Siḏiṯneɣ ḏayes ttiqeṯ, akenniw isejheḏ akenniw iḥḍa zi ccarr.
Neccin qa metʼakkedin ḏi Siḏi Arebbi aqa minzi kenniw nweṣṣa qa teggem-ṯ, aṯ teggem ƹaḏ.
Aḏ issiweḍ Siḏiṯneɣ uȓawen nwem ɣar ȓemḥibbeṯ n Arebbi, ƹaweḏ ɣar ṣṣbar n Lmasiḥ.
Fa ay ayṯma, netweṣṣa-kenniw ƹlaḥsab isem n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ aḏ tbeƹƹḏem zi mkuȓ ȓmumen itbaƹen farq-ccɣeȓ, netta war iḏeffar ca ttaƹlim iy ṯqebȓem zzayneɣ.
Kenniw s yixef nwem ṯessnem u labud aḏ tebƹem abriḏ nni iy negga jarawem. Neccin war netbiƹ ca farq-ccɣeȓ wami tuɣaneɣ akiḏwem.
War necci bu uɣrum ak ḥadd baṭeȓ. Lla, nxeddem ǧiȓeṯ ḏ nhar, neccaṯ tamara nrebbeȓ bac war netbessiȓ x ḥadd zzaywem.
Negga manayenni maci war ɣarneɣ bu ȓḥaqq aḏaneɣ ṯƹawnem; Lla, nseḍhar-awem-d abriḏ iy ɣa ṯeḏfarem.
Waxxa wami tuɣaneɣ akiḏwem nuca-awem ȓuṣiyeṯ-a ṯanita: Wenni itagin aḏ ixḏem war itett ca.
Liʼanna netsȓa belli ḏinni ȓebƹaḍ zzaywem tbaƹen farq-ccɣeȓ. War xeddmen ca ccɣuȓaṯ nsen, niṯni taḏfen ḏi ccɣuȓaṯ n midden waha.
Iwḏan-a netweṣṣa-ṯen neqqar-asen s yisem n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ aḏ xeḏmen s lmaƹqul aḏ ccen aɣrum iy iǧan nsen.
Amma kenniw ay ayṯma, ggeṯ ȓxir bȓa ma aḏ taḥȓem.
Wenni war itṭiƹin ca i wawaȓ nneɣ ḏi ṯebrat-a ggem-ṯ ḏi ȓbaȓ nwem, war kiḏes ggurem ca bac aḏ iseḏḥa.
Walakin war ṯ twaȓam ca am ȓaƹḏu nwem; Lla, nham-ṯ am yijjen zeg wuwmaṯwem.
Siḏiṯneɣ n ȓehna aḏawem yuc ijjen ȓehna ḏi aya ȓweqṯ u s marra ṯimesȓayin. Aḏ yiȓi Siḏi Arebbi akiḏwem marra.
Sȓam-a wanita uriɣ-ṯ nec s ufus inu Bulus, ḏ ṯanita ḏ lƹalama inu iǧan ḏi marra ṯibraṯin inu. Ammu iy tariɣ nec.
Arḍa n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ akiḏwem yiȓi marra.
Nec ḏ Bulus ḏ arrasul n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ s lʼamar n Arebbi wenni iy ḏaneɣ isenajmen ḏ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ netta ḏ lʼamal nneɣ.
Tariɣ ṯabrat-a i Timutawus wenni iy iǧan am memmi ḏ ṣṣaḥ ḏi lʼiman. Akiḏec yiȓi arḍa ḏ arraḥmeṯ ḏ ȓehna zi Arebbi Babaṯneɣ ḏ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ Siḏiṯneɣ.
Nec wami ruḥeɣ ɣar lʼiqlim n Masidunya weṣṣiɣ-cek aḏ teqqimeḏ ḏi ṯendint n Ufasus bac aḏ tenhiḏ can iryazen aḏasen ṯiniḏ war seȓmaḏem ca ṯimesȓayin ig itxalafen ḏi lʼiman.

Aḏasen ṯiniḏ war ḏeffarem ca ṯiḥuja niɣ ḏ ṯacejjarṯ nni war iqeṭṭin ca x ȓejḏuḏ nwem. Ṯimesȓayin-a am ṯina ɣir tsejjaƹent-aneɣ bac a nweddar ḏi lʼafkar ixwan, war ḏaneɣ ṯsiwwiḍent ca ɣar min itxeṭṭeṭ Arebbi minzi min ḏaneɣ isawwaḍen ɣar Arebbi netta ḏ lʼiman.
Min iƹna lɣaraḍ n ȓuṣiyeṯ-a? Lɣaraḍ nnes ḏ ijjen n ȓemḥibbeṯ iy d itasen zeg wuȓawen iṣfan ḏ yijjen n ḍḍamir ḏ aṣebḥan ḏ yijjen n lʼiman bȓa nnifaq.
Ȓebƹaḍ ffɣen zi ṯmesȓayin-a uḏfen ḏeg wawaȓen iy ixwan.
Rezzun aḏ dewȓen ḏ imseȓmaḏen n ccariƹa, walakin war fehhmen ca min qqaren uȓa ḏ minxef tʼakkaden aṭṭas.
Ccariƹa-ya meȓa isteƹmel-it bnaḏem nican, neccin nessen-it ḏ ṯaṣebḥant.

Nessen Ccariƹa-ya ƹaweḏ war d ṯexȓiq ca i yinni isemṣȓaḥen ak Arebbi. Lla, ṯexȓeq-d i yinni iǧan ḏ iƹeffanen ḏ yinni iy ḏi ṯeǧa ṯɣennant ḏ yinni war iḏeffiren ca Arebbi ḏ yinni iƹeṣṣan ḏ yinni war iṣfin ca ḏ yinni war ɣar iǧi bu ddin ḏ yinni ineqqen babaṯsen ḏ yemmaṯsen ḏ yinni ineqqen iwḏan

ḏ yinni iteggen lfasad ḏ iryazen ifessḏen ak wayawya ḏ yinni itacaren iwḏan ḥima aṯen arren ḏ isemɣan ḏ yinni iqqaren ixarriqen ḏ yinni icehhḏen ẓẓur niɣ ḏ yinni iteggen can n ṯmesȓayin nneɣni iǧan ḍed i ttaƹlim n lʼiman iǧan nican.
Ttaƹlim-a iǧan nican aṯ naf ḏi Lʼinjil n Arebbi lƹaḍim ig itwarbarken. Lʼinjil-a ikellef-ayi-d xas nec am yijjen n lʼamana.
Tcekkareɣ Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ wenni iy ḏayi yucin jjheḏ nnes yufa ḏayi ttiqeṯ isiḏef-ayi ɣar ȓxeḏmeṯ nnes.

Nec qbeȓ tuɣa qqareɣ awaȓen war iḥȓin x Arebbi tƹeddabeɣ ȓmuminin, nec ḏ ijjen bnaḏem iḍeǧmen. Waxxa tuɣa xeḏmeɣ manayenni iseḍhar-ayi-d Arebbi arraḥmeṯ nnes liʼanna xeḏmeɣ manayenni s ȓeqfaȓeṯ inu bȓa ma aḏ ssneɣ min iǧan nican, uȓ inu war ḏayes bu lʼiman.
Arḍa n Siḏiṯneɣ infeyyeḍ-d xafi s waṭṭas ḏ waṭṭas, akiḏes ijjen n lʼiman ḏ ijjen n ȓemḥibbeṯ ig iǧan ḏi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Aqa ijjen n wawaȓ ḏayes ttiqeṯ u labud aḏ itwaqbeȓ marra, iƹni Ƹisa Lmasiḥ yusa-d ɣar ddunect-a bac aḏ isenjem yinni iƹeṣṣan, zzaysen nec ig iǧan ḏ lƹaṣi ḏ ameqqran xasen marra.

Wami nec ḏ lƹaṣi ḏ ameqqran xasen marra iseḍhar-ayi-d Arebbi arraḥmeṯ nnes bac Ƹisa Lmasiḥ azzayi d ismeḍhar marra ṣṣbar nnes aḏ yiȓi manaya ḏ ijjen n lmiṯal i yinni iy zzayes ɣa yamnen aɣarsen ṯiȓi ṯuḏarṯ n ȓebda.
Azeǧiḏ nneɣ aɣares ṯiȓi lƹaḍama i ȓebda n ȓebdaṯ, wenni ƹemmarṣ aḏ ifna ƹemmarṣ aḏ immeṯ wenni war ṯ itwiȓi ḥadd wenni iǧan ḏ Arebbi waḥḏes. Amin.
A wulidi Timutawus, aḏac uceɣ lmasʼuliya-ya ṯanitan ƹlaḥsab awaȓen nni iy xac nnan lʼanbiya zi qbeȓ bac xmi xasen ɣa ṯƹeqȓeḏ ataf aḏ tmenɣeḏ mliḥ amenɣi-ya aṣebḥan,
ataf aɣarec yiȓi lʼiman nnec ḏ yijjen ḍḍamir ḏ aṣebḥan. Maci am ȓebƹaḍiṯ semḥen ḏi manaya uca lʼiman nsen iɣareq am yij uɣarrabu ḏi ȓebḥar.
Zzaysen Ḥimmit ḏ Iskander, jjiɣ-ṯen nec i Cciṭan ḥima aḏ twarebban war qqaren ca awaȓen nni war iḥȓin x Arebbi.
Ḏ amezwaru tweṣṣiɣ-kenniw aḏ tettarem i Arebbi aṯ tedƹim aṯ ṭelbem aṯ tcekkarem x marra iwḏan
ḏ izeǧiḏen ḏ marra yinni iḥekkmen bac a nƹiceṯ ḏeg yijjen n ȓehna bȓa ssdaƹ ḏeg yijjen n ṭṭaƹa n Arebbi ḏ yijjen n lmaƹqul.
Manaya ḏ aṣebḥan yarḍa xas Arebbi iy ḏaneɣ d isnejmen,
ixes marra iwḏan aḏ twasnejmen aḏ awḍen aḏ ssnen lḥaqiqa.
Liʼanna ḏinni ijjen n Arebbi waḥḏes ḏ yijjen lwasiṭ waḥḏes jar Arebbi ḏ yiwḏan iƹni aryaz-a ḏ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Netta iṣeddeq ṯuḏarṯ nnes ḏ ijjen n lfidya bac azzayes isenjem marra iwḏan, manaya aḏ itwacheḏ ḏi ȓweqṯ nnes.
X manayenni iy twaxḍareɣ nec bac aḏ ḥeddṯeɣ aḏ iȓiɣ ḏ arrasul aḏ iȓiɣ ḏ amseȓmaḏ ƹlaḥsab lʼiman ḏ ȓḥaqq jar yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil. Qqareɣ lmaƹqul maci ḏ ixarriqen.
Falihaḏa xseɣ iryazen ḏi marra imucan aḏ ẓẓaǧen aḏ ysin ifassen nsen iṣfan ɣar ujenna bȓa ma aḏ tƹeṣṣben bȓa ma aḏ tmenɣan.
Amenni ƹaweḏ xseɣ ṯimɣarin aḏaysent yiȓi lʼiḥtiram aḏaysent yiȓi ȓeḥya ḏ lmaƹqul, maci aḏ qqiment s ucewwaf iḍȓeq aṭṭas niɣ s ddheb ḏ jjuwhar ḏ warruḍ iy iɣȓan.
Lla, aḏ ṣarent ixef nsent s lḥasanaṯ ig iǧan labud ḏi ṯemɣarin nni iqqaren qa neccin nƹebbeḏ Arebbi.
Ṯamɣarṯ u labud aḏ teȓmeḏ s ṭṭaƹa ḏ ȓhudneṯ.
Nec war tejjiɣ ca ṯamɣarṯ aḏ tseȓmeḏ aryaz niɣ axas ṯeḥkem; Lla, labud aḏ tiȓi mhedna.
Mayemmi? Arebbi ixȓeq-d Adam ḏ amezwaru, ƹaḏ iy d ixȓeq Ḥawwa.
Ƹaweḏ Adam war ṯ icmiṯ ca Cciṭan, ḏ ṯamɣarṯ itwacemṯen ṯeƹṣa Arebbi.
Ṯamɣarṯ aḏ twasenjem ƹlaḥsab ṯarwa walakin itxeṣṣa wa labud aḏ qqiment niṯenti ḏi lʼiman ḏ ȓemḥibbeṯ ḏ ȓeṣfiyeṯ ƹlaḥsab lmaƹqul.
Aqa ijjen n wawaȓ ḏayes ttiqeṯ iƹni wenni irezzun aḏ yiȓi ḏ arrayes n jmaƹeṯ qa irezzu ijjen n ṯmesȓayṯ ḏ ṯaṣebḥant.

Fa arrayes n jmaƹeṯ maci am yijjen n bnaḏem iy tƹeyyaben yiwḏan. U labud aɣares ṯiȓi ijjen n ṯemɣarṯ waha. U labud aḏ iḥkem x yixef nnes aḏayes yiȓi lmaƹqul ḏ lʼiḥtiram aḏ itreḥḥab zeg inewjiwen aɣares ṯiȓi ṯzemmar aḏ iseȓmeḏ iwḏan.
Itxeṣṣa war itegg ca lmadla n ssekra, war icciṯ ca aḏ yiȓi trankiȓ. Itxeṣṣa war itmenɣi ca s wawaȓ, war iḍemmeƹ ca ḏi tmenyaṯ.
Aḏ yiȓi ḏ ijjen n bnaḏem ig iḥekkmen x ṯeddarṯ nnes mliḥ, tṭaƹan-as iḥenjiren nnes tseḏḥan-ṯ.
Iwa bnaḏem-a meȓa war issin ca aḏ iḥkem x ṯeddarṯ nnes, mammec iy ɣa igg aḏ itraya x jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin n Arebbi?
Arrayes-a, maci yallah iy isȓem aḏ yuff s ttakebbur x ȓxeḏmeṯ-a aḏ iwḍa ḏi lƹuquba nni n Ibȓis.
U labud ƹaweḏ aṯ weqqaren yinni iǧan n barra war iǧin ca ḏ ȓmuminin bac war xas tƹeyyiben ca yiwḏan war iweṭṭi ca ḏi ṯexcebṯ nni n Ibȓis.
Amenni ƹaweḏ imsexxaren u labud aḏ iȓin mweqqerin aɣarsen yiȓi wawaȓ, ataf war sessen ca aṭṭas n ccreb war ḍemmƹen ca ḏi ȓewsex n ddunect-a.
Imsexxaren-a itxeṣṣa u labud aḏ ṭṭfen ḏi ȓmaƹna inuffaren n lʼiman s yijjen n ḍḍamir iṣfa.
Ḏ amezwaru aḏ twajarrben. Meȓa war ḏinni can n ṯmesȓayṯ ḍed nsen, ataf aḏ ḏewȓen ḏ imsexxaren.
Amenni ƹaweḏ ṯimɣarin itxeṣṣa aḏ iȓint mweqqerint war ḏaysent tiȓi ca nnamima aḏ ḥekkment x yixef nsent aḏaysent ṯiȓi ttiqeṯ ḏi marra ṯimesȓayin.
Imsexxaren itxeṣṣa u labud aḏ iȓin ḏ iryazen n yijjen n ṯemɣarṯ waha, aḏ ḥekkmen x iḥenjiren ḏ ṯuḏrin nsen mliḥ.
Aqa imsexxaren ig ixeddmen mliḥ aḏ rebḥen i yixef nsen ijjen n ddaraja ḏ ṯaṣebḥant ḏ yijjen n ttiqeṯ ḏi lʼiman nsen ig iǧan ḏi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Ṯimesȓayin-a tariɣ-ṯent-id i cek, nec tmenniɣ aɣarec d aseɣ ḏeɣya.
Meȓa ṭewwleɣ aṭṭas war ḏinni d usiɣ ca, ataf aḏ tessneḏ cek mamc iy ɣa suguren yiwḏan ixef nsen ḏi ṯeddarṯ n Arebbi iƹni jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin n Arebbi iddaren ḏ nettaṯ iy iǧan ḏ apilar ḏ dsas n lḥaqiqa.

U bȓa ccekk mecḥaȓ ṯeǧa ḏ ṯameqqrant ȓmaƹna inuffaren n lʼiman: Netta, ḏ bnaḏem iy d imeḍharen, ḏ Arruḥ iy xas icehḏen. Netta, ḏ lmalaʼikaṯ iy ḏayes ixzaren, ḏ ȓegnus iy zzayes itwabeccaren. Netta, ḏi ddunect-a yinni iy zzayes yumnen, ḏ lƹaḍama n ujenna iy ṯ iqebȓen.
Fa iqqar Arruḥ iqeddsen nican bȓa ccekk ḏeg wussan-a ineggura aḏ semḥen ca n yiwḏan ḏi lʼiman nican aḏ ggen array i jnun iɣeddaren ḏ min seȓmaḏen ccayaṭin.
Aḏ yiȓi manaya s nnifaq n iryazen isxarriqen, ḍḍamir nsen ṣafi iḥareq mamc iy ṯ iḥareq ijjen n warcem n wuzzeȓ issecmaḍen.
Niṯni aḏ sbedden iwḏan bac war meǧcen ca, qqaren-asen ƹaweḏ qa ca n lmaklaṯ memnuƹ aṯent ccen. Walakin lmaklaṯ nni ixȓeq-iṯent-id Arebbi aṯent neqbeȓ neccin ig itamnen nessen lḥaqiqa.
Qa marra min d ixȓeq Arebbi ḏ aṣebḥan. Meȓa neqbeȓ-iṯ neccin s ccuker ataf war ḏayes min ɣa nƹiff.
Aqa manaya iḥeǧeȓ ḥalal ƹlaḥsab awaȓ n Arebbi ḏ ṯẓaǧiṯ.
Ṯimesȓayin-a meȓa ṯesbeyyaneḏ-ṯent-id i ayṯmaṯneɣ aḏ tiȓiḏ cek ḏ ijjen n uxeddam ḏ aṣebḥan n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ, aḏ tiȓiḏ twarebbiḏ s wawaȓen n lʼiman ḏ ttaƹlim nni aṣebḥan iy ṯḏeffareḏ cek.
Fa awggwej cek x ṯḥuja nni iǧan ḍed lʼiman iy tƹawaḏent ṯwessura waha, setrinar ixef nnec ƹlaḥsab lʼiman.

Meȓa ṯestrinareḏ ixef nnec s arriyaḍa, aḏ tawiḏ ijjen n arbaḥ ac ineffeƹ cwayt. Meȓa ṯestrinareḏ s lʼiman, aḏ tawiḏ ijjen n arbaḥ ac ineffeƹ i ṯmesȓayin marra. Lʼiman-a iwƹeḏ-ic ƹlaḥsab ṯuḏarṯ-a iǧan ȓexxu ḏ ṯenni iy d ɣa yasen.
Awaȓ-a ḏayes ttiqeṯ u labud aḏ itwaqbeȓ ikmaȓ.
X manaya neccin nxeddem nrebbeȓ liʼanna negga lʼamal nneɣ ḏi Arebbi iddaren wenni isenjamen marra iwḏan xaṣṣatan ḏ yinni itamnen.
Ṯimesȓayin-a tweṣṣa xasent cek seȓmaḏ-iṯent.
War tejja ḥadd ac iseḥqar ƹlaḥsab ṯemẓi nnec. Lla, cek labud aḏasen tiȓiḏ i ȓmuminin ḏ lmiṯal ƹlaḥsab awaȓen nnec ḏ ṯicri nnec ḏ ȓemḥibbeṯ nnec ḏ lʼiman ḏ ȓeṣfiyeṯ.
Ḥetta aȓ d ɣa yaseɣ nec sxeddam ixef nnec mliḥ s ṯɣuri n Lkutub ḏ uḥeddeṯ ḏ useȓmeḏ.
War tferraṭ ca ḏi lqudra nni iy ḏac immucen ƹlaḥsab awaȓ nni aṣebḥan iy xac nnan lʼanbiya wami ayraw n imeqqranen n jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin sersen xac ifassen nsen.
Ṭebbeq ṯimesȓayin-a, sellem-asent ixef nnec qaƹ bac aḏ ẓren marra iwḏan nnajaḥ nnec.
Xzar ḏi ṯuḏarṯ nnec ḏ ṯmesȓayin iy ṯseȓmaḏeḏ, arni ḏaysent. Liʼanna meȓa ṯeggiḏ manaya aḏ tesnejmeḏ ixef nnec ḏ yinni iy ḏac itsȓan.
War nehha ca ijjen n uwessar s ȓeqsaḥeṯ; Lla, siweȓ akiḏes am babac. Iḥenjiren egg-iṯen am ayṯmac.
Ṯiwessura egg-iṯent am yemmaṯac. Ṯiḥenjirin egg-iṯent am suyṯmac s yijjen n wuȓ iṣfa.
Weqqar ṯajjaȓin ig iǧan ḏ ṯajjaȓin ḏ ṣṣaḥ.

Cuf, ṯajjaȓṯ nni meȓa ɣares iḥenjiren niɣ ḏ ayyawen ataf ḏ niṯni iy t ɣa iƹawnen aḏ ȓemḏen ḏ amezwaru aḏ sxeddmen lʼiman nsen ak lƹaʼila nsen aḏ arren ȓxir i lwalidin nsen. Aqa manaya yarḍa xas Arebbi.
Qa ṯajjaȓṯ n ṣṣaḥ ṯenni war ɣar iǧi ḥadd aqa ḏ nettaṯ iteggen lʼamal nnes ḏi Arebbi tɣima tedƹa Arebbi tettar-as ǧiȓeṯ ḏ nhar.
Walakin ṯenni itƹicen ḏi ccehweṯ waha, qa nettaṯ ṯemmuṯ waxxa ṯeddar.
Ṯimesȓayin-a tweṣṣa-ṯent baƹda cek bac aḏ qqimen yiwḏan bȓa ȓƹib.
Cuf, wenni war itḏebbiren x ȓeḥbab nnes xaṣṣatan x lƹaʼila nnes ataf netta inkar lʼiman, wenni war yuminen qaƹ ataf ḥsen zzayes.
War tejja uȓa ḏ icten aḏ tsejjel ak ṯajjaȓin ɣar lmuƹawana illa meȓa ɣares zi settin iseggwusa aȓ ṯsawent, illa meȓa tuɣa ɣares ijjen n uryaz waha.
Labud aḏ tiȓi maƹrufa s lḥasanaṯ nnes iƹni meȓa ṯrebba ṯarwa nnes, treḥḥab s inewjiwen, ṯsiȓiḏ iḍaren n ṣṣaliḥin, tƹawan yinni itzeyyaren, ṯḏeffar marra ṯimesȓayin ṯiṣebḥanin.
Fa ṯajjaȓin ṯimezyanin war ṯent tsejjal ca ƹlaḥsab lmuƹawana. Niṯenti xmi ɣa ṯeḏfarent ccehawaṯ nsent ktar zi Lmasiḥ ataf rezzunt aḏ meȓcent.
Ammu aḏ twaḥekment minzi semḥent ḏi lwaƹeḏ nsent iy ggint ḏ amezwaru.
Ƹaweḏ aḏ dewȓent ḏ ṯimeƹgazin ggurent zi ṯaddarṯ ɣar ṯeddarṯ teggent farq-ccɣeȓ. Maci ḏ ṯimeƹgazin waha, tƹawaḏent ȓexburaṯ taḏfent ḏi ccɣuȓaṯ n midden qqarent ṯimesȓayin war itxeṣṣa ca aḏ twannant.
Iḏen, xseɣ ṯajjaȓin ṯimezyanin aḏ meȓcent aḏ d jjent iḥenjiren aḏ sugurent ṯaddarṯ nsent mliḥ war tejjint bu can lfurṣa i ȓaƹḏu axasent issiweȓ s ȓƹib.
Minzi ḏinni ȓebƹaḍ ṣafi ffɣent abriḏ ḏfarent Cciṭan.

Tamɣarṯ ḏ ȓmumna meȓa tiȓint akiḏes can ṯajjaȓin aḏaysent thilla u labud akiḏes qqiment axasent ṯḏebbar. Ṯina, maci ḏ jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin axasent tarbu; Lla, aḏ tarbu ɣir x ṯinni iǧan ḏ ṯajjaȓin ḥḏajent ḏ ṣṣaḥ.
Imeqqranen n jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin yinni iteḥkamen mliḥ u labud aṯen tweqqarem ḏ ḍubli, xaṣṣatan yinni ixeddmen aṭṭas ḏeg uḥeddeṯ ḏ useȓmeḏ.
Aqa Lkitab iqqar: War ḏas tegg bu ṯacmant i ufunas nni itṣarwaṯen. Aqa ƹaweḏ axeddam ɣares ȓḥaqq aḏ itxaȓes.
War qebbeȓ ca ttuhmeṯ ḍed i umeqqran n jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin illa meȓa ḏinni ṯnayen niɣ ṯȓaṯa n ȓechuḏ tahamen-ṯ.
Imeqqranen ig iƹeṣṣan nha-ṯen cek zzaṯ i marra iwḏan bac yinni inneɣni aḏ ggwḏen baƹda.
Aqa ƹeȓmeɣ-ac zzaṯ i Arebbi ḏ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ ḏ lmalaʼikaṯ itwaxḍaren qa labud aḏ teggeḏ ṯimesȓayin-a bȓa ma aḏ teggeḏ ȓfarz ak can ḥadd bȓa ma aḏ teggeḏ ƹaweḏ s wuḏemawen.
Ifassen nnec war tqeǧiq ca aṯen tserseḏ x can ḥadd, war carrec ca ḏi ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ n midden. Qqim cek ṯeṣfiḏ.
War sess ca aman waha, sew ƹaweḏ ḏrus n waman uḍiȓ ƹlaḥsab ṯakrict nnec ḏ ȓehracaṯ iy c iȓeqqfen.
Ca n ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ n iryazen twameḍharent-id tizwarent-id i lƹiqab nsen, walakin ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ n iryazen nneɣni axasen d xeḍȓent menbaƹd.
Ammu ƹaweḏ can n lḥasanaṯ twameḍharent-id, ƹaḏ can n lḥasanaṯ nneɣni war zemmarent ca aḏ qqiment twanuffarent.
Marra yinni iǧan ḏ isemɣan ṯḏeqqeȓ xasen ṯzayȓut nni wa labud aḏ fekkaren belli ayṯbab nsen sḏaheǧen marra min iǧan ḏ aweqqar bac iwḏan war tƹeyyiben ca isem n Arebbi ḏ ttaƹlim nneɣ.

Isemɣan umi ɣar iǧa ayṯbab nsen ḏ ȓmuminin wa labud aḏasen tṣennaṭen i ayṯbab nsen maci aḏasen agin aḏasen inin lla qa neccin ḏ awmaṯen. Lla, aḏasen xeḏmen ktar liʼanna ayṯbab nsen ḏ niṯni iy ɣa irebḥen zi ȓxeḏmeṯ nni u niṯni tamnen twaƹizzen. Ṯimesȓayin-a seȓmaḏ-iṯent cek, zeyyar xasent.
Meȓa can uryaz iseȓmeḏ can ȓḥajeṯ nneɣni war itifiq ca ak wawaȓen nican n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ ḏ ttaƹlim x lʼiman,
ataf netta yuff s ttakebbur war ifehhem walu qaƹ. Ihȓec irezzu ɣir amxarwaḍ ḏ umnaqar x wawaȓen iy zi d itas ȓeḥseḏ ḏ umenɣi ḏ ȓbaṭeȓ ḏ lʼafkar ḏ ṯiƹeffanin.
Iryazen-a thewwaȓen jarasen s ȓaƹquȓaṯ nsen iƹewwjen ṯweddar-asen lḥaqiqa. Tfekkaren belli lʼiman ḏ ijjen n ubriḏ bac aḏ rebḥen tmenyaṯ.
Fa lʼiman iy ḏi ṯeǧa ȓeqnaƹeṯ netta ḏ ijjen n arbaḥ ḏ ameqqran.
Ȓaḥeqqac neccin war d nuwi walu i ddunect-a, war nzemmar azzayes niysi walu.
Falihaḏa neccin nejjiwen s min ɣa necc ḏ min ɣa nareḍ ḏ arruḍ u ṣafi.
Yinni irezzun aḏ iȓin ḏ twajar ataf aḏ twaɣarran aḏ wḍan ḏeg yijjen n ṯexcebṯ ḏ waṭṭas n ccehawaṯ ig isbuhȓuyen ig isefcaḏen ig isɣerraqen iryazen ḏi arrwina ḏ ȓefna.
Liʼanna ȓemḥibbeṯ n tmenyaṯ netta ḏ lʼaṣel n waṭṭas n lʼanwaƹ n ccarr. Ȓebƹaḍ n yiwḏan ig itexsen tmenyaṯ aqa ffɣen abriḏ snuqquben ixef nsen s waṭṭas n ȓeḥriqaṯ.
Fa cek ay aryaz n Arebbi, arweȓ zi marra manaya ḏfar min iǧan nican ḏ min ḏas iteƹjiben i Arebbi ḏ lʼiman ḏ ȓemḥibbeṯ ḏ ttasiƹ n ȓxaḍar ḏ ttawaḍuƹ.
Mneɣ amenɣi nni aṣebḥan n lʼiman, ṭṭef ḏi ṯuḏarṯ nni war ifennin ca aȓ ḏac d iȓaɣa Arebbi wami ṯcehḏeḏ chaḏeṯ nni ṯaṣebḥant zzaṯ i waṭṭas n ȓechuḏ.
Tweṣṣiɣ-cek zzaṯ i Arebbi wenni iseddaren qaƹ ṯimesȓayin u zzaṯ i Ƹisa Lmasiḥ wenni icehḏen chaḏeṯ nni ṯaṣebḥant zzaṯ i lḥakem Bunṭus Bilaṭus.
Tegg s ȓuṣiyeṯ-a bȓa ȓƹib bȓa ca n uxciw aȓ d ɣa imeḍhar Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Aṯiḏ ismeḍhar Arebbi ḏi ȓweqṯ iy ḏi ixes netta iƹni Arebbi ḏ wenni ig itwabarken ḏ wenni ig iteḥkamen waḥḏes netta ḏ Azeǧiḏ n izeǧiḏen ḏ Mawlana n lmawlanaṯ.

Ḏ netta waḥḏes iy war itmettin ƹemmarṣ, izeddeɣ ḏeg yijjen n nnur iy war izemmar ḥadd aɣares d iqarreb iƹni wenni umi ƹemmarṣ war ṯ iẓri bnaḏem war izemmar aṯ iẓer. Ḏ netta iy ɣa yiȓi uweqqar ḏ jjheḏ i ȓebda. Amin.

Yinni ig iǧan ḏ twajar ḏi ddunect-a iy ḏi neǧa tweṣṣa-ṯen bac war ḏaysen itiȓi ca ttakebbur bac war teggen ca lʼamal nsen ḏeg wagȓa ḏi war ṯeǧi bu ttiqeṯ. Lla, aḏ yiȓi lʼamal nsen ḏi Arebbi wenni iy ḏaneɣ itḏebbaren marra ṯimesȓayin s ȓxir azzaysent nfareḥ.
Tweṣṣa-ṯen aḏ ggen ȓxir aḏ iȓin ḏ twajar ƹlaḥsab lḥasanaṯ aḏ iȓin ṣaxiyin aḏ iȓin wejḏen bac aḏ ṣeddqen aḏ ḏebbaren.
Amenni iy ɣa xemȓen agȓa i yixef nsen am yijjen n dsas ijehḏen i ṯuḏarṯ iy d ɣa yasen bac aḏ ṭṭfen mliḥ ḏi ṯuḏarṯ nni iy iǧan ḏ ṯuḏarṯ n ṣṣaḥ.
A Timutawus, ḥḍa minxef tkellafeḏ qbeȓ. Awggwej zi min tperpiren yinni war yuminen ca ḏ lʼafkar nni iy ḏaneɣ itƹarraḍen qqaren-as Lƹarfaniya walakin manayenni ḏ ixarriqen waha.
Ḏinni ȓebƹaḍ ḏfaren Lƹarfaniya-ya zaƹma menbaƹd ffɣen abriḏ n lʼiman. Aɣarwem yiȓi arḍa i kenniw.
Nec ḏ Bulus ḏ ijjen n arrasul n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ s ȓxaḍar n Arebbi ƹlaḥsab lwaƹeḏ nni iy ḏaneɣ iwƹeḏ x ṯuḏarṯ nni iǧan ḏi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Tariɣ ṯabrat-a i Timutawus wenni iy iǧan am memmi iƹizzen xafi. Akiḏec yiȓi arḍa ḏ ȓehna ḏ arraḥmeṯ zi Arebbi Babaṯneɣ ḏ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ Siḏiṯneɣ.
Tcekkareɣ Arebbi wenni ƹebbḏeɣ zi ȓejḏuḏ inu s yijjen n ḍḍamir iṣfan. Tettareɣ-as i Arebbi xac ǧiȓeṯ ḏ nhar bȓa ma aḏ beddeɣ.
Xmi tfekkareɣ ḏeg imeṭṭawen nnec iteṭṭef-ayi-d ijjen n mezȓi ac ẓreɣ ḥima aḏ ƹemmareɣ s ȓefraḥeṯ.
Ƹeqȓeɣ x lʼiman nnec bȓa nnifaq wenni iǧan ḏ amezwaru ḏi ḥennac Lwiza ḏ yemmac Anisa. Ȓexxu teyyqeɣ ḏ ṣṣaḥ belli aqaṯ ḏayec uȓa ḏ cek.
X manaya ac fekkareɣ bac aḏ tsenhezzeḏ lqudra nni iy ḏayec iǧan zi Arebbi ƹlaḥsab wami xac serseɣ ifassen inu.
Aqa Arebbi war ḏaneɣ yuci ca ijjen n arruḥ n ṯiggwḏi; Lla, qa yuca-aneɣ-d ijjen arruḥ n jjheḏ ḏ ȓemḥibbeṯ ḏ ȓeḥkam x yixef nneɣ s ȓaƹqeȓ.
Iḏen war tseḏḥa ca aḏ tcehḏeḏ x Siḏiṯneɣ niɣ xafi nec iy iǧan ḏ ameḥbus ƹlaḥsab netta; Lla, qebbeȓ aƹeddeb nni iǧan ƹlaḥsab Lʼinjil, s jjheḏ n Arebbi.

Isenjem-aneɣ iȓaɣa-yaneɣ-d s yijjen n uȓaɣi muqeddes. War ḏaneɣ d iȓaɣi ca ƹlaḥsab lḥasanaṯ nneɣ; Lla, iȓaɣa-yaneɣ-d ƹlaḥsab lɣaraḍ nnes netta ḏ arḍa nnes iy ḏaneɣ d yuca ḏi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ qbeȓ ma aḏ tebḏa ȓweqṯ n ddunect-a qaƹ.
Arḍa-ya qa imeḍhar-d ȓexxu wami d imeḍhar Ƹisa Lmasiḥ wenni iy ḏaneɣ isenjamen wenni isbeṭṭȓen ȓmewṯ. Ȓexxu s ufus n Lʼinjil yuwi-d ṯuḏarṯ ɣar nnur ḏ ṯenni war ifennin ca.
Ƹlaḥsab Lʼinjil-a twaxḍareɣ nec aḏ beccareɣ aḏ iȓiɣ ḏ arrasul ḏ ijjen n umseȓmaḏ.
X ssabab-a nec qa tƹeddabeɣ x marra ṯimesȓayin-a ṯina walakin war tseḏḥiɣ ca, nec ssneɣ wenni iy zi umneɣ. Teyyqeɣ netta izemmar aḏ iḥḍa lʼamana nni iy kiḏes jjiɣ ḥetta aȓ Nhar nni aneggaru.
Meṯṯel ttaƹlim nni nican iy ṯesȓiḏ zzayi, akiḏes iy ɣa yiȓi ijjen n lʼiman ḏ yijjen n ȓemḥibbeṯ iy iǧan ḏi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Ḥḍa ṯamesȓayṯ nni iy ḏac ijja ḏ lʼamana, ḥḍa-t s Arruḥ iqeddsen iy ḏayneɣ izeddɣen.
Cek ṯessneḏ belli marra yinni iǧan ḏi lʼiqlim n Asya semḥen ḏayi uȓa ḏ Fixulus ḏ Hirmujinus.
Aḏ ibarek Siḏi Arebbi ȓeḥbab n umaṯneɣ Wanisfur, aṭṭas n ṯwaȓaṯin isertaḥ-ayi war iseḏḥi ca x snaseȓ inu.
Lla, netta wami iǧa ḏi ṯendint n Ruma irezzu xafi aṭṭas aȓ wami iy ḏayi yufa.
Aṯ ijj Siḏiṯneɣ ḥima aḏ yaf arraḥmeṯ zi Siḏi Arebbi ḏi Nhar nni aneggaru. Cek ƹaweḏ ṯessneḏ mecḥaȓ n ṯwaȓaṯin iy ḏayi iƹawen ḏi ṯendint n Ufasus.
Iḏen fa cek a mmi, sjehheḏ ixef nnec ḏi arḍa nni iǧan ḏi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Ṯimesȓayin nni iy ṯesȓiḏ zzayi zzaṯ i waṭṭas n ȓechuḏ, ejj-iṯent am yijjen n lʼamana ak iryazen ataf ḏaysen ttiqeṯ, ƹaweḏ iryazen nni zemmaren aḏ sȓemḏen iwḏan nneɣni.
Iȓi akiḏi ḏeg uƹeddeb am uƹeskari aṣebḥan n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
War ḏinni bu can uƹeskari ig itemxumburen ḏi ddur nnes ḏi ṯmesȓayin n ddunect-a ȓaḥeqqac irezzu aḏ yarḍa x wenni iy ṯ yarrin ḏ aƹeskari.
Amenni ƹaweḏ wenni itemƹanaḏen ḏi lmelƹab; Meȓa war itemƹanaḏ ca ƹlaḥsab lqanun war irebbeḥ ca ljaʼiza.
Afeǧaḥ ig itamaren ḏi ȓxeḏmeṯ u labud aḏ iysi ȓḥaqq nnes netta ḏ amezwaru zi ṯfeǧaḥṯ nni.
Fekkar ḏi min ḏac qqareɣ, aqa ḏ Siḏi Arebbi netta iy c ɣa isefhamen ḏi marra ṯimesȓayin-a.
Fekkar ḏi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ wenni iy d isekkar Arebbi zi ȓmewṯ, netta lʼaṣel nnes zi Dawed. Ḏ manaya ig iǧan ḏi Lʼinjil iy tbeccareɣ nec.
X Lʼinjil-a iy twaƹeddabeɣ nec qennen-ayi s snaseȓ am yijjen n lmujrim. Walakin awaȓen n Arebbi lla, war zemmaren aṯen qennen s snaseȓ.
X manaya nec ṣebbareɣ x marra ṯimesȓayin ƹlaḥsab yinni itwaxḍaren ḥima uȓa ḏ yina aḏ nejjmen s ufus n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ, akiḏes ijjen lƹaḍama iy war ifennin ca.
Aqa ijjen wawaȓ ḏayes ttiqeṯ:
Sfekkar ȓmuminin x ṯmesȓayin-a. Ƹȓem-asen zzaṯ i Arebbi bac war tmenɣin ca x wawaȓen. Amenɣi nni war ḏayes walu, ɣir aḏ isufeɣ zeg ubriḏ yinni itsȓan.
Egg lmejhud nnec bac aḏ tseḥḍareḏ ixef nnec ɣar Arebbi am yijjen ɣares iǧan meqbul, iƹni am yijjen n uxeddam war ɣares minxef iy ɣa iseḏḥa itfessar nican awaȓ n lḥaqiqa.
Fa awggwej zeg wawaȓen nni ixwan n yiwḏan n ddunect-a minzi awaȓen nsen aḏ arnin ɣir ḏi ȓeqfaȓeṯ nsen x Arebbi.
Awaȓ nsen aḏ iɣezz ḏeg uysum am ȓehrac n ssaraṭan, zzaysen Ḥimmit ḏ Filitus.
Niṯni ffɣen abriḏ n lḥaqiqa qqaren qa ṣafi Yum Lqiyama iwqeƹ, tḍeyyaƹen lʼiman n ȓebƹaḍ n yiwḏan.

Walakin dsas ijehḏen n Arebbi war itenhezzi ca, xas iy neqcent ṯira-ya qqarent qa Siḏi Arebbi qa issen iwḏan iǧan nnes. Qqarent ƹaweḏ qa marra yinni icehhḏen s yisem n Siḏiṯneɣ itxeṣṣa u labud aḏ beƹƹḏen x ccarr.

Cuf, ijjen n ṯeddarṯ ṯaṣebḥant war ḏayes ca ɣir ȓeqcuƹ n ddheb niɣ ḏ nnuqarṯ waha; Lla, ḏayes uȓa ḏ ȓeqcuƹ n ukeccuḍ ḏ ucaȓ. Ȓebƹaḍiṯ twasteƹmalen i min iǧan ḏ ccan, ȓebƹaḍiṯ twasteƹmalen i min iǧan ƹadi waha.

Wenni issiṣfan ixef nnes zi marra ṯimesȓayin nni ṯiƹeffanin ataf aḏ yiȓi am ȓeqcuƹ nni iy twasteƹmalen i min iǧan ḏ ccan, netta aḏ yiȓi iṣfa aḏ yiȓi ineffeƹ i Bab nnes, aḏ yiȓi iwjeḏ i kuȓ ȓxeḏmeṯ ṯaṣebḥant.
Fa arweȓ zi ccahawaṯ nni ṯiƹeffanin n ṯemẓi, ḏeffar ṣṣulḥ ḏ lʼiman ḏ ȓemḥibbeṯ ḏ ȓehna ak yinni iy d iȓaɣan x Siḏiṯneɣ s yijjen n wuȓ iṣfa.
Awggwej zeg umnaqar nni iy ḏi iǧa ɣir ṯubuhȓiya ḏ ȓeqfaȓeṯ waha minzi ṯessneḏ belli itarew ɣir amenɣi u ṣafi.
Fa axeddam n Siḏiṯneɣ labud war itmenɣi ca s wawaȓ aṭṭas; Itxeṣṣa-as aḏ yiȓi ḍrif ak marra iwḏan, ataf issen aḏ iseȓmeḏ, ataf ɣares ttasiƹ n ȓxaḍar.
Aḏ iṣeḥḥaḥ s yijjen n wuȓ iṣebbaren i yinni iy ḏas itƹarraḍen; ḥima meȓa ixes Arebbi aṯen ijj aḏ tuben aḏ ssnen lḥaqiqa.
Uca aḏ d arren ȓbaȓ nsen aḏ arewȓen zi ṯexcebṯ n Ibȓis wenni iy ṯen iḥebbsen ḥima aḏ ggen ȓxaḍar nnes.
Fa labud itxeṣṣa aḏ tfehmeḏ belli ussan ineggura aḏ iȓin qeṣḥen.

Qa iwḏan aḏ texsen ixef nsen, aḏ texsen tmenyaṯ, aḏaysen yiȓi ttakebbur, aḏ semɣaren ixef nsen, aḏ ssiwȓen awaȓ war iḥȓin x Arebbi. War tṭiƹin ca i lwalidin nsen, war tcekkaren ḥadd, war tiȓin ca ṣfan,
war ḏaysen tiȓi ȓemḥibbeṯ, war semmḥen ca i yiwḏan, aḏ qqaren ȓbaṭeȓ, war ḥekkmen ca x yixef nsen, aḏ menɣen am ȓuḥuc, war tḥibbin ca min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan,
aḏ zzenzen ayṯmaṯsen, aḏ ggen ṯimesȓayin bȓa ȓaƹqeȓ, aḏ uffen s nfaxeṯ, aḏ ḥibben ccehweṯ nsen war tḥibbin ca Arebbi,
aḏ ggen ixef nsen ƹebbḏen Arebbi walakin nekkaren jjheḏ nnes. Iwḏan-a, awggwej xasen.
Iryazen-a ḏ yina iy d isnuquben ṯuḏrin am ibbuƹen taḏfen bac aḏ sayṭaren x ṯemɣarin iy ḏi ṯeǧa niyyeṯ tƹemmarent s ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ twacemmaṯent s waṭṭas n lʼanwaƹ n ccahawaṯ.
Ȓebda tesȓant ɣar ttaƹlim walakin ƹemmarṣ aḏ awḍent aḏ ssnent lḥaqiqa.
Mammec Yanis ḏ Yampris nni tƹarraḍen i Musa, amenni ƹaweḏ uȓa ḏ iryazen-a tƹarraḍen i lḥaqiqa. Ȓaƹquȓaṯ nsen ƹewwjen, lʼiman nsen ixwa.
Walakin iryazen-a war tiwḍen ca mani. Qa aḏasen ṯewqeƹ mamc ḏasen ṯewqeƹ i Yanis ḏ Yampris nni, ṯubuhȓiya n iryazen-a aḏ d tmeḍhar i marra iwḏan.
Walakin cek ṯessneḏ mliḥ ttaƹlim inu ḏ ubriḏ n ṯuḏarṯ inu ḏ lɣaraḍ inu ḏ lʼiman inu ḏ ttasiƹ n ȓxaḍar inu ḏ ȓemḥibbeṯ inu ḏ ṣṣbar inu
ḏ uƹeddeb inu ḏ tamara inu. Ṯessneḏ min ḏayi iweqƹen ḏi ṯendint n Wanṭakya ḏ Ikunya ḏ Listra ḏ min twaƹeddbeɣ ḏeg imucan nni. Innama, isefȓeṯ-ayi-d Siḏiṯneɣ zi marra manayenni.
Ḏ ṣṣaḥ, marra wenni iy irezzun aḏ iƹic s lʼiman iǧan ḏi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ qa aḏ itwaƹeddeb.
Amma iryazen iƹeffanen ḏ iryazen icemmaṯen niṯni aḏ arnin ḏi ṯuƹuffna waha, niṯni aḏ cemmṯen aḏ twacemmṯen.
Cek lla, arni ḏi min ḏac sȓemḏen ḏ min c iseqnaƹen minzi ṯessneḏ yinni iy ḏac isȓemḏen manayenni.
Aqa zi ṯemẓi nnec ṯessneḏ ƹaweḏ Ṯira iǧan Muqeddsin zemmarent ac d arrent ḏ miɣis ƹlaḥsab mamc iy ɣa ṯnejmeḏ s lʼiman nni iy iǧan ḏi Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Aqa marra Ṯira Muqeddsin usint-id zi Arruḥ n Arebbi, neffƹent ḥima azzaysent nseȓmeḏ azzaysent nenha azzaysent nṣeḥḥeḥ azzaysent nrebba ƹlaḥsab ṣṣulḥ.
Ḥima aryaz n Arebbi aḏ yiȓi iwjeḏ aḏ yaf iḏebbar-as s qaƹ ṯimesȓayin ƹlaḥsab kuȓ ȓxeḏmeṯ ḏ ṯaṣebḥant.
Acek weṣṣiɣ zzaṯ i Arebbi ḏ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ wenni iy ɣa iḥekmen x yinni iddaren ḏ yinni immuṯen, acek weṣṣiɣ ƹaweḏ ḏi ȓmulk nnes ḏ Nhar nni iy ḏi d ɣa imeḍhar:
Beccar awaȓ n Arebbi, sewjeḏ ixef nnec aḏ tbeccareḏ ḏi ȓweqṯ nni iy trajiḏ niɣ ḏi ȓweqṯ nni iy war trijiḏ ca. Ȓmuminin nha-ṯen, ƹȓem-asen, cejjeƹ-iṯen s marra ttasiƹ n ȓxaḍar ḏ useȓmeḏ.
Aqa aḏ d tas ȓweqṯ nni niṯni war tṣenniṭen ca ɣar ttaƹlim nican; aɣarsen d smunen ijjen n lƹadad n imseȓmaḏen ssawaȓen ɣir min ḏasen iƹejben i imejjan nsen waha.
Yina aḏ sbeƹƹḏen imejjan nsen zi lḥaqiqa aṯen awin aḏ sȓen i ṯḥuja waha.
Cek arr-d ȓbaȓ nnec ḏi marra ṯimesȓayin, ṣbar i tamara, egg ȓxeḏmeṯ am wenni itbeccaren, egg lwajib n ȓxeḏmeṯ nnec.
Cuf, nec tferraɣen-ayi-d am yijjen n ṣṣeḏqeṯ n iḏammen x dbiḥeṯ itwaqeddamen, aqa ṯuweḍ-d ȓweqṯ n ufuɣ inu zi ddunect-a.
Amenɣi-ya aṣebḥan menɣeɣ-ṯ, ṯazzȓa-ya kemmȓeɣ-t, lʼiman ḥḍiɣ-ṯ.

Ssa aȓ ṯsawent itraja-ayi ijjen n ttaj n ṣṣulḥ ag Arebbi wenni iy ḏayi ɣa yuc Siḏiṯneɣ iy iǧan ḏ lqaḍi nican; Aḏayi-ṯ yuc ḏi Nhar nni n Lḥisab. Maci aḏayi-ṯ yuc i nec waha; Lla, aṯ yuc i marra yinni itexsen Nhar nni iy ḏi d ɣa imeḍhar.
Egg lmejhud nnec bac aɣari d taseḏ ḏeɣya.
Minzi Dimas ismeḥ ḏayi ṯuwi-ṯ ȓemḥibbeṯ n ddunect-a iruḥ ɣar ṯendint n Salunik. Iruḥ Kriskus ɣar lʼiqlim n Galaṭya, iruḥ Titus ɣar jjiheṯ n Dalmasya.
Iqqim akiḏi ɣir Luqa waha. Awi-d akiḏec Marqus minzi ineffeƹ-ayi ḏi ȓxeḏmeṯ inu.
Ssekkeɣ Tuciq ɣar ṯendint n Ufasus.
Xmi d ɣa ṯaseḏ, awi-d akiḏec azeǧab inu wenni iy jjiɣ ak Karpus ḏi ṯendint n Traws uȓa ḏ lkutub inu xaṣṣatan yinni iǧan n iȓemawen.
Iskander wenni itṣennaƹen nneḥḥas iḍarr-ayi aṭṭas, aṯ ixeǧes Arebbi x ȓefƹayeȓ nnes.
Uȓa ḏ cek ḥḍa ixef nnec zzayes minzi netta itƹarraḍ aṭṭas i min netbeccar.
Wami ḏafƹeɣ x yixef inu ṯwaȓa ṯamezwarut ḏi lmaḥkama marra semḥen ḏayi uȓa ḏ ijjen ma ibedd akiḏi. War xasen t itḥisib ca Siḏi Arebbi.
Ḏ Siḏiṯneɣ iy kiḏi ibedden ɣar uɣezḏis inu yuca-ayi jjheḏ ḥima zzayi nec aḏ itwabeccar Lʼinjil ikmaȓ aṯ sȓen marra yinni war iǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil, ssenni nec feȓṯeɣ zeg uqemmum n ssbaƹ.
Aḏayi isefȓeṯ Siḏiṯneɣ zi mkuȓ ṯamesȓayṯ ḏ ṯaƹeffant aḏayi isenjem ɣar ȓmulk nnes iǧan ḏeg ujenna. Aɣares ṯiȓi lƹaḍama i ȓebda n ȓebdaṯ. Amin.
Siweḍ-as sȓam i Priskila ḏ Wakilas ḏ ṯedḏarṯ n Wanisfur.
Iqqim Arisṭus ḏi ṯendint n Kurinṯ, Trifumu jjiɣ-ṯ nec ḏi ṯendint n Militus ihȓec.
Egg lmejhud nnec bac aḏ d taseḏ qbeȓ i ȓmecta-ya. Isawwaḍ-ac-d sȓam Yubulus uȓa ḏ Buden ḏ Linus ḏ učmaṯneɣ Kludya ḏ marra ayṯmaṯneɣ.
Aḏ yiȓi Siḏiṯneɣ ak arruḥ nnec. Aḏ yiȓi arḍa akiḏwem marra.
Nec ḏ Bulus ḏ axeddam n Arebbi ḏ arrasul n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ xeddmeɣ ƹlaḥsab yinni ig ixḍar Arebbi bac aḏ amnen aḏ ssnen lḥaqiqa iy ṯen isegguren ɣar min iǧan nican ḏi lʼiman.
Lʼiman-a ḏ ṯusna-ya ṯbedda x lʼamal n ṯuḏarṯ nni war ifennin ƹemmarṣ, ṯenni iy zi iwƹeḏ Arebbi iƹni wenni war isxerriqen ca. Iwƹeḏ s ṯuḏarṯ nni qbeȓ ma aḏ bḏan zmanaṯ qaƹ.
U ḏi lweqṯ nni ig ixḍar netta ismeḍhar-d lwaƹed-a s ttebcir nni iy zi ḏayi itwakellef s lʼamar n Arebbi wenni iy ḏaneɣ isnejmen.
Tariɣ ṯabrat-a i Titus wenni iy iǧan am memmi ḏ ṣṣaḥ ḏi lʼiman-a iy ḏi ncarrec. Akiḏec yiȓi arḍa ḏ ȓehna zi Arebbi Babaṯneɣ ḏ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ wenni iy ḏaneɣ isnejmen.
X manayenni jjiɣ-cek ḏi ṯeyzirṯ n Krit, aḏ tƹeḏȓeḏ min tuɣa rezzuɣ nec aḏ ƹeḏȓeɣ war uwiḍeɣ ca u ƹaweḏ bac aḏ tixḍareḏ imeqqranen n jmaƹeṯ n ȓmuminin ḏi mkuȓ abilaj am mammec iy c weṣṣiɣ.
Ameqqran-a maci aḏ yiȓi ḏ ijjen n bnaḏem tƹeyyaben-ṯ yiwḏan. Aɣares ṯiȓi ijjen n ṯemɣarṯ waha aḏ iȓin iḥenjiren nnes ḏ ȓmuminin. Maci axasen inin yiwḏan teggen lmadella n ssekra niɣ war tseḏḥin ca.

Aqa arrayes n jmaƹeṯ itkellaf netta s lmesʼuliya zi Arebbi u labud aḏ yiȓi bȓa ȓƹib, war ḏayes itiȓi bu ttakebbur, war itƹeṣṣib ca ḏeɣya, war isekkar ca s ccreb, war icciṯ ca, war iḍemmeƹ ca ḏi tmenyaṯ.
Wah, itxeṣṣa aḏ itreḥḥab zeg inewjiwen, aḏas iteƹjib min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan, aḏ iḥkem x ṯnefsiyṯ nnes, aḏayes yiȓi lmaƹqul, aḏ yiȓi iṣfa, aḏ irebba ixef nnes.
Itxeṣṣa u labud aḏ iṭṭef mliḥ ḏeg wawaȓ nni iy ḏi ṯeǧa ttiqeṯ iy ḏas itwasȓemḏen ḥima aḏ icejjeƹ iwḏan s yijjen n ttaƹlim nican aḏ inha yinni itƹarraḍen i ttaƹlim-a.
Liʼanna yinni iy ḏi ṯeǧa ṯɣennant aqaṯen mujudin, ssawaȓen waha niṯni ḏ iɣeddaren xaṣṣatan ḏ yinni iticcen lhimma aṭṭas i ṭṭahareṯ.
Yina aqemmum nsen itxeṣṣa-yasen aḏasen itwaqqen. Niṯni mecḥaȓ n lƹaʼilaṯ kemȓent iy sparḏȓen wami ḏasen seȓmaḏen ṯimesȓayin itxeṣṣa-yasen war ḏasen ṯent seȓmiḏen ca, niṯni ḍemmƹen ḏi tmenyaṯ waha.
Ijjen zzaysen ḥessben-ṯ ḏ nnabi netta s yixef nnes inna: "Niṯni Ayṯ-Krit ȓebda ḏ ayṯ-buyixarriqen ḏ ȓuḥuc iwƹaren ḏ imaƹgazen ḏaysen aƹeddis waha."
Aqa chaḏeṯ nni iy inna nican iy ṯeǧa. Iḏen, nha-ṯen s ȓeqsaḥeṯ ḥima aḏ iȓin nican ḏi lʼiman.
Maci aḏ ggen array i ṯḥuja nni n Ayṯ-Israʼil niɣ aḏ ggen array i ȓuṣiyaṯ nni n yinni isbeƹƹaḏen ixef nsen zi lḥaqiqa.

Aqa yinni ig iǧan ṣfan ataf qaƹ ṯimesȓayin aḏaysen iȓint ṣfant. Walakin yinni ixenzen war uminen ca ataf war ḏaysen tiȓi uȓa ḏ ijjen n ṯmesȓayṯ ṯeṣfa. Ataf ȓƹaquȓaṯ nsen ḏ ḍḍamiraṯ nsen s ṯnayen texnizen.
Qqaren qa nessen Arebbi walakin nekkaren-ṯ s ȓefƹayeȓ nsen. Niṯni twaƹiffen, war tṭiƹin ca, war neffƹen ca uȓa ḏeg yijjen n ȓxeḏmeṯ ḏ ṯaṣebḥant.
Amma cek, seȓmaḏ min imunen ak ttaƹlim nican.
Yinni imɣaren aḏaysen yiȓi lmaƹqul, aḏ iȓin mweqqrin, aḏ ḥekmen x ṯnefsiyṯ nsen, aḏ iȓin nican ḏi lʼiman ḏ ȓemḥibbeṯ ḏ ṣṣbar.
Ṯinni imɣaren ƹaweḏ aḏ ƹiccent ƹlaḥsab lʼiman, war ḏaysent tiȓi bu nnamima, war tebliyint ca aṭṭas s binu. Aḏ sȓemḏent min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan.
Amenni aḏ rebbant ṯimɣarin ṯimezyanin ḥima aḏ texsent iryazen nsent ḏ ṯarwa nsent,
aḏ ḥekment x ṯnefsiyṯ nsent aḏ iȓint ṣfant, aḏ ggent ccɣeȓ ḏi ṯeddarṯ nsent, aɣarsent yiȓi wuȓ ḏ acemȓaȓ, aḏ ṭaƹent i iryazen nsent ḥima awaȓ n Arebbi war itwaƹeyyib ca.
Ammu ƹaweḏ in-asen i iḥenjiren aɣarsen yiȓi ȓaƹqeȓ nsen.
Ḏi marra ṯimesȓayin aɣarsen ṯiȓiḏ cek ḏ lmiṯal s lḥasanaṯ iy teggeḏ. Ttaƹlim nnec sexḏem-iṯ s ṣṣaraḥa ḏ lmaƹqul
ḏ yijjen n wawaȓ ḏ ṣṣaḥ war ḏayes bu ȓƹib. Ammu ac seḏḥan yinni ḏac itƹarraḍen minzi war ɣarsen min xaneɣ ɣa inin.
Isemɣan aḏ ṭaƹen i ayṯbab nsen ḏi kulci, axasen arḍan, war ḏasen teggen ca ṯaɣennant,
war tacaren ca ayṯbab nsen bac aḏ ssnen belli niṯni ḏaysen marra ttiqeṯ bac s marra ibriḏen aḏ zewwqen lʼiman n Arebbi iy ḏaneɣ isnejmen.
Cuf, arḍa n Arebbi itmeḍhar-asen-d i marra iwḏan itawi-ṯen ɣar mani ɣa twasnejmen.
Arḍa-ya itrebba-yaneɣ a nenkar ccarr ḏ ccehawaṯ n ddunect-a, a nƹic ḏi zman-a a neḥkam x ṯnefsiyṯ nneɣ aḏayneɣ yiȓi lmaƹqul ḏ lʼiman
u neccin ɣir netraja lʼamal nni itwabarken iƹni Nhar nni iy ḏayes d ɣa ṯmeḍhar lƹaḍama n Arebbi Ameqqran ḏ Umsenjem nneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Netta iṣeddeq xaneɣ ixef nnes ḏ ijjen n lfidya x marra ccarr nneɣ u ƹaweḏ bac aḏ issiṣfa ijjen n ccaƹb i yixef nnes ataf aḏ iȓin nnes mujudin aḏ ggen lḥasanaṯ.
Siweȓ x ṯmesȓayin-a, zeyyar x ȓmuminin nehha-ṯen s marra ssulṭa. War tejja ḥadd ac iseḥqar.
Sfekkar i ȓmuminin aḏ ggen array i ȓḥukkam ḏ ȓmexzen, aḏasen ṭaƹen aḏ iȓin wejḏen i kuȓ ȓxeḏmeṯ ḏ ṯaṣebḥant.
Sfekkar-aṯen ḥima war tƹeyyiben ḥadd, war tmenɣin ca s wawaȓen, aḏ iȓin trankiȓ, aḏ sxeḏmen ijjen n ttawaḍuƹ ak marra iwḏan.

Cuf, neccin ƹaweḏ tuɣa ḏayneɣ ijjen n ȓeqfaȓeṯ, war netṭiƹi ca, netwacemmeṯ, ḥekkment xaneɣ aṭṭas n lʼanwaƹ n ccehawaṯ ḏ zzhu. Tuɣa netƹic ḏeg yijjen n ȓeqbaḥeṯ ḏ ȓeḥseḏ, ƹiffen-aneɣ yiwḏan, netƹiffa ayawya.
Walakin wami d imeḍhar ȓxir ḏ lḥanana n Arebbi wenni iy ḏaneɣ isnejmen
ȓexddenni isenjem-aneɣ maci ƹlaḥsab lḥasanaṯ nni iy negga; Lla, tuɣa ƹlaḥsab arraḥmeṯ nnes netta. Issireḏ-aneɣ s waman n uxȓaq ḏ jḏiḏ, yarra-aneɣ ḏ jḏiḏ s ufus n Arruḥ iqeddsen.
Arruḥ-a ifareɣ-iṯ-iḏ xaneɣ Arebbi s yijjen n ȓxir imɣar s ufus n Ƹisa Lmasiḥ wenni iy ḏaneɣ isnejmen.
Ḥima a nwareṯ zzayes, aɣarneɣ yiȓi ijjen n lʼamal n ṯuḏarṯ ṯenni war ifennin ca liʼanna nmeṣȓaḥ ak Arebbi s arḍa nnes.

Awaȓ-a iy qqareɣ ḏayes ttiqeṯ. Nec xseɣ cek aḏ twekkḏeḏ x ṯmesȓayin-a i yinni iy yumnen zi Arebbi bac aḏ d arren ȓbaȓ nsen aḏ ṭewwƹen ixef nsen s lḥasanaṯ. Ṯimesȓayin-a ḏ ṯiṣebḥanin s waṭṭas neffƹent iwḏan.
Walakin siggwej ixef nnec zeg imnaqaren iy ḏi ṯeǧa ɣir ṯubuhȓiya u ƹaweḏ zi lbaḥt nni n ṯcejjura n ȓejḏuḏ ḏ imenɣiwen ḏ imxarwaḍen x ccariƹa liʼanna niṯni ḏ ȓbaṭeȓ waha war neffƹen ca qaƹ.
Wenni ismenɣan iwḏan ag wayawya cek ƹȓem-as ṯwaȓa ṯamezwarut ḏ wis ṯnayen ȓexddenni awggwej zzayes qaƹ.
Ṯessneḏ illa bnaḏem-a iƹeṣṣa ḏ amƹewwaj, lƹiqab nnes x yiȓi nnes.
Xmi ḏawem d ɣa ssekkeɣ umaṯneɣ Artimas niɣ ḏ Tuciq, egg lmejhud nnec aɣari d ṯaseḏ ɣar ṯendint n Nikupris minzi nec tuɣa fekkareɣ aḏ seƹḏuɣ ḏinni ȓmecta.
Ƹlaḥsab ayṯmaṯneɣ Apullus ḏ Zinnas wenni iy iǧan ḏ awkiȓ, egg lmejhud nnec bac aṯen ṯƹawneḏ ḏeg ubriḏ nsen; Xzar ma ɣarsen marra min teḥḏajan.
Iwḏan nneɣ itxeṣṣa war tƹicen ca bȓa nnfaƹ, itxeṣṣa aḏ ṭewwƹen ixef nsen s lḥasanaṯ ḥima aḏ debbaren i yina iteḥḏajan.
Sawwaḍen-ac-d sȓam marra yinni iǧan akiḏi. Siweḍ-asen sȓam i yinni iy ḏaneɣ itexsen ḏi lʼiman. Akiḏwem yiȓi arḍa i marra kenniw.
Nec ḏ Bulus aqayi ḏ ameḥbus ƹlaḥsab Ƹisa Lmasiḥ akiḏi umaṯneɣ Timutawus. Tariɣ ṯabrat-a i Filimun iǧan ḏ amƹacar nneɣ iy xaneɣ iƹizzen,
ḏ učmaṯneɣ Ƹabya ḏ umaṯneɣ Arkippus wenni iy kiḏneɣ itemƹacaren am yijjen n umjaheḏ, u ƹaweḏ ḏ jmaƹṯ n ȓmuminin itmunan ḏi ṯeddarṯ nnec.
Akiḏwem yiȓi arḍa ḏ ȓehna zi Arebbi Babaṯneɣ ḏ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ Siḏiṯneɣ.
Ȓebda tcekkareɣ Arebbi inu xmi tfekkareɣ ḏayec ḏi ṯẓaǧiṯ inu.
Qa nec tesȓiɣ x lʼiman nnec iy ḏayec zi Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa ḏ ȓemḥibbeṯ nnec ɣar marra ṣṣaliḥin.
Tettareɣ i Arebbi x ṯemƹacarṯ nneɣ ḏi lʼiman ac ṯawi ɣar yijjen n ȓefhameṯ ṯekmaȓ x kuȓ ṯamesȓayṯ ṯaṣebḥant ig iǧan ɣarneɣ ḏi Lmasiḥ.
Ay uma, ȓemḥibbeṯ iy ɣarec cek ticc-ayi-d ijjen n ȓefraḥeṯ ḏ ucejjaƹ ḏ ameqqran minzi cek ṯsiḥemmiḏ uȓawen n ṣṣaliḥin.
Iḏen, min itxeṣṣan aḏ teggeḏ zemmareɣ nec ac amareɣ s zƹameṯ ḏi Lmasiḥ aṯ teggeḏ,
walakin ḥsen ac ttareɣ manaya s ȓemḥibbeṯ. Iwa nec ḏ Bulus aqayi numɣareɣ, ȓexxu aqayi ƹaweḏ ḏi ȓeḥbes ƹlaḥsab Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa.
Tettareɣ-cek x Wanisamu wenni iǧan am memmi, arriɣ-ṯ nec ḏ mmi wami tuɣaṯ akiḏi ḏi ȓeḥbes.
Qbeȓ i manaya tuɣa netta war c ineffeƹ ca, ȓexxu iḏweȓ aḏaneɣ ineffeƹ nec ḏ cek.
Aqa nec tarriɣ-ac-ṯ-iḏ axmi ɣa c d ssekkeɣ uȓ inu.
Mecḥaȓ nec tuɣa rezzuɣ akiḏi iqqim ḏanita aḏayi iƹawen ḏeg umcan nnec zeg wami ǧiɣ ḏanita ḏi ȓeḥbes-a ƹlaḥsab Lʼinjil.
Walakin nec war xseɣ ca aḏ ggeɣ can n ȓḥajeṯ bȓa array nnec; Nec xseɣ ȓxir nnec aḏayi d yas s ȓxaḍar nnec maci s yijjen n bezzez zzayi lla.
Netta imken x ssabab-a iy xak ifareq ḏeg yijjen n lmudda bac aɣarec d iḏweȓ ȓexxu i ȓebda.
Walakin ȓexxu maci am ismeɣ, netta ḥsen zeg ismeɣ: Am umac iy xac iƹizzen. Netta iƹizz xafi, walakin cek iƹizz xac ktar: ḏi ȓxeḏmeṯ u ƹaweḏ am umac ḏi Siḏiṯneɣ.
Falihaḏa, meȓa ṯḥesbeḏ-ayi ḏ amƹacar nnec, qbeȓ-iṯ axmi ḏayi ṯqebȓeḏ nec.
Meȓa iḍȓem-ic ḏi ca n ṯamesȓayṯ niɣ meȓa ḏinni can n umarwas jarawem, ḥseb-iṯ xafi nec.
Qa nec ḏ Bulus tariɣ manaya s ufus inu: Aḏac ṯ xeǧseɣ nec. Bȓa ma aḏac iniɣ qa ttarseɣ-ac uȓa ḏ ṯuḏarṯ nnec.
Wah ay uma, xseɣ azzayek rebḥeɣ ijjen n nnfaƹ ḏi Siḏiṯneɣ, siḥma-ayi uȓ inu ḏi Lmasiḥ.
Nec tʼakkadeɣ s ṭṭaƹa nnec, s manaya tariɣ-ac-d ṯabrat-a ssneɣ cek aḏ teggeḏ ktar zi min ḏac tṭalabeɣ.
U ƹaweḏ sewjeḏ-ayi ijjen n ṯɣurfat, tmenniɣ aɣarwem d ƹeqbeɣ ƹlaḥsab ṯẓaǧiṯ nwem.
Isawwaḍ-ac-d sȓam Pafras wenni iy kiḏi iǧan ḏ ameḥbus ƹlaḥsab Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Sawwaḍen-ac-d sȓam ƹaweḏ Marqus ḏ Aristarxus ḏ Dimas ḏ Luqa iǧan marra ḏ imƹacaren inu.
Aḏ yiȓi ak arruḥ nwem arḍa n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa Lmasiḥ.
Ḏi zman issawaȓ Arebbi ak ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ s uqemmum n lʼanbiya s waṭṭas n ṯwaȓaṯin s waṭṭas n ibriḏen.
Walakin ḏi lʼayyam-a ineggura issawaȓ akiḏneɣ s uqemmum n Mmis iƹni wenni iy ixḍar aḏ iwareṯ marra ṯimesȓayin, zzayes iy d ixȓeq Arebbi ddunect.

Netta ḏ nnur n lƹaḍama n Arebbi ḏ ṣṣifeṯ n ṭṭabiƹa nnes bȓa axeṭṭi. S jjheḏ n wawaȓ nnes iy zi irebbu marra ṯimesȓayin. Wami iḥell ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ n bnaḏem issiṣfa-ṯent, ssenni iqqim x ufusi n Arebbi Subḥana wa Tƹala.
Fa Mmis iḏweȓ imɣar aṭṭas x lmalaʼikaṯ minzi isem nni iy ḏas iswareṯ Arebbi imɣar aṭṭas x yisemawen nsent.
Arebbi ƹemmarṣ war ḏas yinni i can n lmalak zi lmalaʼikaṯ aqa cek ḏ Mmi, nhara nec ḏewȓeɣ ḏ Babac. Ƹemmarṣ war yinni x can n lmalak qa nec aḏ iȓiɣ ḏ Babas, netta aḏ yiȓi ḏ Mmi.
U ƹaweḏ Arebbi wami d itawi Mmis amenzu ɣar ddunect-a iqqar: Aḏas sejjḏent marra lmalaʼikaṯ.
Xmi issawaȓ x lmalaʼikaṯ iqqar: <Ixeǧeq-d lmalaʼikaṯ nnes ḏ arriḥ, ḏ imsexxaren nnes ḏ aḥaḏuq n ṯmessi.>
Walakin x Mmis iqqar ḏi Lkitab: <Ay Arebbi, ȓƹarc nnec aḏ idum i ȓebda n ȓebdaṯ, ȓḥaqq aḏ yiȓi ḏ ṯaɣriṯ n ȓeḥkam nnec.
Tḥibbiḏ min iṣeȓḥen, tƹiffiḏ ccarr. S manaya Arebbi iƹni Arebbi nnec, iḏhen-ac s zzect n ȓefraḥeṯ, isiȓi-yic ḏeg ujenna x imƹacaren nnec.>
Iqqar ƹaweḏ: <Ay Arebbi, ḏeg umezwaru ṯserseḏ dsasaṯ n ddunect-a, ṯeggiḏ ijennaṯen s ufus nnec.
Yina aḏ fnan cek aḏ tdumeḏ, marra aḏ rcan am warruḍ.
Aṯen ṯḍefseḏ am uzeǧab ḏ axarṭiṭ, aḏ twabeddȓen am warruḍ. Cek lla, war tbeddiȓeḏ ca, iseggwusa nnec ƹemmarṣ aḏ fnan.>
Iwa ƹemmarṣ Arebbi war yinni i can n lmalak zi lmalaʼikaṯ: <Qqim-d x ufusi inu aȓ d ɣa ggeɣ ȓƹaḏyan nnec swadday iḍaren nnec.>
Lmalaʼikaṯ, niṯenti min ƹnant? Niṯenti ḏ arruḥaṯ twassekkent-id aḏ sexxarent i yinni iy ɣa iwarṯen asenjem.
X manaya labud a d narr ȓbaȓ nneɣ i min netsȓa bac war nteffeɣ ca abriḏ.
Cuf, Ccariƹa nni n Musa tuɣa uwint-tid lmalaʼikaṯ, tseyṭar xaneɣ tƹaqab-aneɣ iƹni meȓa neƹṣa niɣ meȓa war nṭiƹ ca.

Ȓexxu asenjem nneɣ imɣaren, mammec iy ɣa negg a nenjem zi lƹiqab iƹni meȓa neɣfeȓ x usenjem-a? Awaȓ n usenjem-a ibcar-iṯ-iḏ ḏ amezwaru Siḏiṯneɣ, ṯumma cehḏen xas yinni iy ḏas iṣennṭen ssiwḍen-ṯ-iḏ i neccin.
Icehheḏ xas uȓa ḏ Arebbi s lƹalamaṯ ḏ lburhanaṯ ḏ waṭṭas n lʼanwaƹ n lmuƹjizaṯ. S lʼiden nnes ƹaweḏ ifreq lqudraṯ ruḥiyaṯ n Arruḥ iqeddsen.
Ȓexxu neccin nessawaȓ x ddunect-a iy tuɣa netraja. Cuf, Arebbi maci i lmalaʼikaṯ umi yuca ȓeḥkam x ddunect-a lla.
Aqa ḏinni ijjen n umcan ḏi Lkitab mani icheḏ ijjen x manaya iqqar: Tfekkareḏ cek ḏeg iryazen, maca min swan? Mmis n bnaḏem, mayemmi iy ḏayes ɣa ithillan?
Ṯeggiḏ-ṯ ƹȓayen am lmexluqaṯ ujenna yuƹȓan, ṯuciḏ-as ttaj n ȓuweqqar ḏ waṭṭas n ccan,

ṯeggiḏ swadday iḍaren nnes marra min iǧan. Wami igga Arebbi marra swadday iḍaren nnes, war ṯeqqim uȓa ḏ ijjen n ṯmesȓayṯ war xas iḥekkim ca. Innama, ƹaḏ ḏi ȓweqṯ-a war netwiȓi ca marra swadday iḍaren n bnaḏem.

Walakin Ƹisa wah, netwaȓa-ṯ ȓexxu s ttaj nnes n ȓuweqqar ḏ waṭṭas n ccan. Mayemmi? Lʼianna Ƹisa ḏeg yijjen n ȓweqṯ tuɣa isehwa-ṯ-iḏ Arebbi cwayt swadday i lmalaʼikaṯ iƹni wami iṣbar i ȓaƹḏab n ȓmewṯ. Bac netta s arḍa n Arebbi aḏ iqqas ȓmewṯ, ȓmewṯ nni aḏ tiȓi n marra iwḏan.

Zi Arebbi iy tiȓint marra ṯimesȓayin-a u netta umi tiȓint. Ḏ Arebbi netta iy yarrin Ƹisa war ḏayes bu ȓƹib s ȓaƹḏab nni nnes ig xas iƹḏun ḥima Arebbi aḏ d yawi aṭṭas n ṯarwa ɣar lƹaḍama nnes. Ɣares ȓmaƹna manaya ȓaḥeqqac Ƹisa netta ḏ zzaƹim n usenjem n ṯarwa-ya.
Aqa wenni issiṣfan iwḏan zi ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nsen u ḏ yiwḏan nni itwassiṣfan, Babaṯsen ḏ ijjen. X manaya war xasen itƹeffar ca aḏasen yini ay ayṯma.
Lla, iqqar-as i Arebbi: <Aḏ ssiwȓeɣ x yisem nnec ak ayṯma, ḏi ȓwesṭ n jmaƹeṯ ac ḥemḏeɣ s iɣennijen.>
U ƹaweḏ iqqar: <Nec aḏ teyyqeɣ ḏi Arebbi.> Iqqar ƹaweḏ: <Aqayi nec ḏ ṯarwa inu iy ḏayi yuca Arebbi.>
Iḏen ṯarwa-ya niṯni ḏ iwḏan ḏaysen marra aysum ḏ iḏammen. X manaya Ƹisa uȓa ḏ netta ḏayes ṯimesȓayin-a. Ammu s ȓmewṯ nnes isbeṭṭeȓ zzaƹim n ȓmewṯ iƹni ḏ Ibȓis.
U ƹaweḏ Ƹisa aḏ d iḍȓeq i yinni iǧan ḏ isemɣan zi ȓexȓuq iƹni yinni xasen ṯḥekkem ṯiggwḏi zi ȓmewṯ uca aḏ iȓin ḥurr.
Cuf, nessen belli Ƹisa war itƹiwin ca lmalaʼikaṯ: Lla, itƹawan ṯarwa n Brahim.

X manaya tuɣa wa labud Arebbi aḏ yarr Ƹisa am ayṯmas ḏi marra bac aḏ yiȓi ḏ ȓefqi ameqqran ḏayes arraḥmeṯ ḏayes ttiqeṯ ixeddem i Arebbi. U ƹaweḏ ȓefqi-ya aḏ iqeddem lfidya ḥima aḏ twaɣfarent ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ n yiwḏan.
Wami netta s yixef nnes itwaƹeddeb ḏi ȓemḥayen, izemmar aḏ iƹawen yinni iǧan ḏi ȓemḥayen.
Ay ayṯma ṣṣaliḥin, ḏ kenniw iy iǧan ḏ imƹacaren ḏeg uȓaɣi nni iy d yusin zeg ujenna. Fekkareṯ mliḥ ḏi Ƹisa, netta ḏ arrasul netta ḏ ȓefqi ameqqran n lʼiman iy xas ncehheḏ neccin.
Ixḏem Ƹisa s lʼiḏen n wenni iy ṯid iƹeyynen mammec igga nnabi Musa uȓa ḏ netta ixḏem s lʼiḏen n Arebbi ḏi ayṯbab n ṯeddarṯ ṯekmaȓ n Arebbi.
Cuf, Ƹisa yufi-ṯ isḏaheǧ lƹaḍama ktar zi nnabi Musa mammec iǧa bab n ṯeddarṯ isḏaheɣ ccan ktar zi ayṯbab n ṯeddarṯ nni iy ḏinni d yurew.
Liʼanna kuȓ ṯaddarṯ ɣares wenni iy ṯen d yurwen u marra ijji-ṯen-d Arebbi.
Tuɣa nnabi Musa ixeddem nican ḏ amsexxar, itƹawan ayṯbab n ṯeddarṯ ṯekmaȓ n Arebbi, icehheḏ x ṯmesȓayin tuɣa ƹaḏ iy ɣa itwabeccaren ḏi lmustaqbel.
Walakin Lmasiḥ netta ḏ Mmis iḥekkem x ayṯbab n ṯeddarṯ n Arebbi, itkellaf zzaysen nican. U neccin ḏ ayṯbab-a n ṯeddarṯ nnes iƹni meȓa neṭṭef mliḥ ḏi zƹameṯ nneɣ u ḏi lʼamal nneɣ iy xef nteftaxar.
X manaya ammu iqqar Arruḥ iqeddsen: Nhara meȓa ṯesȓim i ṣṣut n Arebbi,
war seqsiḥeṯ ca uȓawen nwem mamc iy ggin Ayṯ-Israʼil wami ḏayi ƹṣan ḏi ȓweqṯ nni n ȓmiḥneṯ ḏi ȓexȓa.
Ḏeg umcan nni ȓejḏuḏ nwem zeƹƹmen-ayi s ṯɣennant aḏ ẓren nec min ƹenniɣ, waxxa uȓa ḏi arbeƹin iseggwusa ẓrin ȓexḏayem inu.
X manayenni sƹeṣṣben-ayi yiwḏan n zman nni. Nniɣ nec aqa ȓebda tbeƹƹaḏen xafi s wuȓawen nsen, ibriḏen inu war ṯen ssinen ca niṯni.
Ssenni jjuǧeɣ s uɣḍab inu nniɣ ƹemmarṣ aḏ aḏfen ḏi arraḥeṯ inu.
Ay ayṯma, ḥḍam ixef nwem bac uȓa ḏ ijjen zzaywem war ɣares itiȓi wuȓ ḏ abercan niɣ war ḏayes itiȓi bu lʼiman bac war itbeƹƹiḏ ca netta x Arebbi iddaren.
Lla, meȓa nzemmar a nini <nhara>, ataf aḏ tcejjƹem ayawya kuȓ nhar bac war ḏinni itiȓi ḥadd zzaywem aḏ iḏweȓ iqseḥ wuȓ nnes aṯ texḏeƹ ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ nnes.
Aqa neccin a niȓi ḏ imƹacaren ḏi Lmasiḥ iƹni meȓa neqqim neṭṭef mliḥ aȓ uneggaru ḏi ttiqeṯ nni iy tuɣa ɣarneɣ ḏ amezwaru.
Mammec iqqar Lkitab: <Nhara meȓa ṯesȓim i ṣṣut nnes, war seqsiḥeṯ ca uȓawen nwem mamc iy ggin Ayṯ-Israʼil wami ṯ ƹṣan.>
Cuf, min ƹnan yinni isȓin ugin aḏ ggen array i Arebbi? Yac ḏ iwḏan nni marra ig isufeɣ nnabi Musa zi Miṣra niɣ?
Min ƹnan yinni isƹeṣṣaben Arebbi ḏi arbeƹin iseggwusa nni? Yac ḏ yinni iƹṣan Arebbi menḍaren ḏinni ḏi ȓexȓa nni am immurḍas niɣ?
U min ƹnan yinni iy xef ijjuǧ Arebbi inna-asen ƹemmarṣ aḏ aḏfen ḏi arraḥeṯ inu? Yac ḏ yinni war itṭiƹin ca niɣ?
Iwa neccin netwaȓa belli tuɣa war zemmaren ca aḏ aḏfen ḏi arraḥeṯ n Siḏi Arebbi minzi ugin aḏ amnen.
Iḏen fa ƹaḏ nzemmar a naḏef ḏi arraḥeṯ n Siḏi Arebbi minzi ḏaneɣ iwƹeḏ. Wa labud a neggweḏ bac war itɣimi uȓa ḏ ijjen zzaywem war ḏinni d ixeṭṭeȓ.
Liʼanna ȓexbar-a n ȓxir iy ḏaneɣ d itwabeccaren i neccin, uȓa ḏ ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ twabeccaren zzayes. Walakin war stenfiƹen ca zzayes wami ugin azzayes amnen.

Cuf, arraḥeṯ nni mixef issawaȓ Arebbi ataf ntaḏef ḏayes neccin iy yumnen. Issiweȓ Arebbi x manaya wami inna: <Qa nec jjuǧeɣ s uɣḍab inu nniɣ ƹemmarṣ aḏ aḏfen ḏi arraḥeṯ inu.> Man arraḥeṯ? Iƹni ṯenni n Siḏi Arebbi wami ikemmeȓ ȓexḏayem nnes ixȓeq-d ddunect-a.
Iwa ḏeg yijjen n lʼaya amenni ig inna x nhar wis sebƹa: Inna: <Ḏi nhar wis sebƹa ig ireyyeḥ Arebbi zi marra ȓexḏayem nnes.>
U ƹaweḏ ḏi lʼaya nni nneɣni iy xef nessiweȓ qbeȓ inna: <Ƹemmarṣ aḏ aḏfen ḏi arraḥeṯ inu.>
Iḏen ƹaḏ qqimen ȓebƹaḍ n yiwḏan aḏ aḏfen ḏi arraḥeṯ-a n Siḏi Arebbi, yinni itwabeccaren zi qbeȓ war uḏifen ca ḏinni liʼanna war uminen ca.

S manaya tuɣa isejjel Arebbi ijjen n ȓweqṯ nneɣni bac a naḏef ḏi arraḥeṯ nnes, ȓweqṯ nni isemma-yas Arebbi <Nhara.> Menbaƹd i waṭṭas n lqurun ig issiweȓ Arebbi s nnabi Dawed wami inna mamc nenna qbeȓ: <Nhara meȓa ṯesȓim i ṣṣut n Arebbi, war seqsiḥeṯ ca uȓawen nwem.>
Cuf, maƹlik nnabi Yacuƹa tuɣa issiweḍ ȓejḏuḏ nneɣ ɣar yijjen n arraḥeṯ, ataf Arebbi war issiweȓ ca x yijjen n nhar nneɣni menbaƹd i waṭṭas n lqurun.
Falihaḏa ƹaḏ iqqim ijjen n ssebṯ, iƹni ḏ ijjen n ȓweqṯ n arraḥeṯ i ccaƹb n Arebbi.
Liʼanna wenni yuḏfen ḏi arraḥeṯ n Arebbi aqa itreyyaḥ zi ȓxeḏmeṯ nnes mammec ireyyeḥ Arebbi zi ȓxeḏmeṯ nni nnes.
Iḏen wa labud a negg lmejhud nneɣ bac a naḏef ḏi arraḥeṯ nni ḥima uȓa ḏ ijjen war iweṭṭi ḏi nnefs n ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ.
Aqa awaȓ n Arebbi iddar netta ifsus, iqḍeƹ aṭṭas ktar zi ssif n ṯnayen n jjihaṯ. Itaḏef aȓ ḏaxeȓ iferreq buḥbeȓ ḏ arruḥ ḏ mani tmunen ȓemfaseȓ, itaḏef ɣar waḏuf. Itmeyyaz jar lʼafkar ḏ lʼaɣraḍ n wuȓ.
War ḏinni uȓa ḏ ijjen n ṯmesȓayṯ zi min d itwaxeȓqen ṯnuffar zi Arebbi. Qaƹ ṯimesȓayin twafeḍḥent-id twaḍharent-id i ṯiṭṭawin n wenni umi ɣa nuc ȓeḥsab nneɣ.
Iḏen neccin a neṭṭef mliḥ ḏi lʼiman nneɣ iy xef ncehheḏ minzi ɣarneɣ ijjen n ȓefqi ameqqran imɣar yuḏef ḏeg ijennaṯen iƹḏu-ṯen, netta ḏ Ƹisa Mmis n Arebbi.
Cuf, war ɣarneɣ bu ijjen n ȓefqi ameqqran netta war izemmar ca aḏ iḥess zi ḍḍuƹef nneɣ. Wah, ɣarneɣ ijjen ȓefqi kkint xas marra ȓemḥayen; netta am neccin walakin war iggi bu ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ.
Falihaḏa a nqarreb s zƹameṯ ɣar ȓƹarc n Arebbi ḏayes arḍa bac a naf ḏinni arraḥmeṯ ḏ yijjen n arḍa iy ḏaneɣ ɣa iƹawnen ḏi ȓweqṯ n uḥḏaji nneɣ.
Cuf, kuȓ ȓefqi ameqqran tixḍaren-ṯ-iḏ zeg iryazen, ticcen-as ȓweqṯ n ȓxeḏmeṯ nnes bac aḏ ixḏem zzaṯ i Arebbi ƹlaḥsab iwḏan aḏ iqeddem ṣṣeḏqeṯ ḏ dbiḥaṯ x ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ.
Izemmar netta aḏ iḥinn x yinni war ifehhmen ca ḏ yinni iffɣen abriḏ minzi netta s yixef nnes ḏayes ḍḍuƹef.
X manaya wa labud aḏ iqeddem dbiḥaṯ x ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nnes nniṯ mammec iy ṯent itqeddam x yiwḏan.
Ƹaweḏ war ḏinni ḥadd iy ɣa isemɣaren ixef nnes aḏ ixḏem s ccan-a iƹni ḏ ȓefqi ameqqran; Lla, ḏ Arebbi iy ḏas iticcen ȓḥaqq nni mammec ḏas ṯ yuca i ȓefqi nni umi qqaren Harun.
Ammu uȓa ḏ Ƹisa war isemɣar ca ixef nnes aḏ ixḏem s lƹaḍama-ya iƹni ḏ ȓefqi ameqqran; Lla, inna-as Arebbi: <Aqa cek ḏ Mmi, nhara nec ḏewȓeɣ ḏ Babac.>
Ƹaweḏ iqqar Arebbi ḏeg yijjen n umcan nneɣni: <Cek ḏ ȓefqi i ȓebda amecnaw lfirqa nni n ȓefqi umi qqaren Malikiṣadiq.>
Ḏeg wussan nni iy ḏi tuɣa iddar Ƹisa ḏi ṯmurṯ-a, itẓaǧa itȓaɣa x Arebbi s jjheḏ u s imeṭṭawen itettar-as i wenni izemmaren aṯ isenjem zi ȓmewṯ. Arebbi itṣennaṭ-as wami Ƹisa iteggweḏ zzayes.
Waxxa netta ḏ Mmis n Arebbi iy iǧa, iȓmeḏ ṭṭaƹa s uƹeddeb nni iy xas ikkin.
Wami iƹḏu aƹeddeb nni bȓa ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ, iḏweȓ netta ḏ ȓƹunṣar n usenjem iƹni izemmar aḏ isenjem marra yinni iy ṯ itṭaƹan.
Ssenni yarri-ṯ Arebbi ḏ ȓefqi ameqqran amecnaw lfirqa nni n ȓefqi Malikiṣadiq.
Ƹaḏ nzemmar a nini aṭṭas x ṯmesȓayin-a walakin iqseḥ akenniw nsefhem. Mayemmi? Liʼanna kenniw ṯḏeqȓem aḏ tfehmem.
Cuf, wa labud kenniw ȓexxu aḏ tiȓim ḏ imseȓmaḏen walakin ƹaḏ itxeṣṣa-yawem ijjen akenniw isɣar s ṯɣuri nni ṯamezwarut zeg wawaȓ n Arebbi. Kenniw teḥḏajam aɣi waha, maci lmakla ḏ ṣṣaḥ.
Kuȓ ijjen ƹaḏ ḏ aseymi itƹic s uɣi waha, iƹni war ifehhem ca i useȓmeḏ x min iṣeȓḥen.

Walakin lmakla n ṣṣaḥ tetten-teṯ ɣir yinni war iǧin ca ḏ iseyman. Niṯni zemmaren i lmakla nni n ṣṣaḥ minzi ȓebda xeddmen i ṯɣuri nni iy qqaren tmeyyazen jar min iǧan ḏ aṣebḥan ḏ jar min iǧan ḏ aƹeffan.

X manaya war netɣimiṯ ca ḏi ttaƹlim-a amezwaru x Lmasiḥ, a nuyureṯ ɣar zzaṯ bac a nemɣar. War ntaƹqib ca ɣar dsas. Iƹni war nessawaȓ ca ƹaḏ x ttuba nni n ssayiʼaṯ, niɣ x mammec ɣa negg a namen zi Arebbi,
niɣ x ibriḏen bac aḏ twaṭehharen yiwḏan s waman, niɣ x mammec ɣa negg a nsers ifassen nneɣ x yiwḏan, niɣ x lqiyama n imettinen, niɣ x Lḥisab nni war ifennin ca.
Iwa, a nuyureṯ ɣar zzaṯ iƹni meȓa ixes Arebbi.
Amma yinni mixef iceƹceƹ nnur, qqasen lhadiya n ujenna, carrcen ḏi Arruḥ iqeddsen,
ḏuwqen ƹaweḏ zi lbaraka n wawaȓ n Arebbi ḏ lquduraṯ n zman iy d ɣa yasen.
Yina meȓa ffɣen abriḏ, war iǧi wi ṯen d ɣa yarren ɣar ttuba. Mayemmi? Liʼanna yina aḏ iȓin am tṣellaben Mmis n Arebbi ƹaweḏ x ṣṣalib tƹeyyaben-ṯ zzaṯ i yiwḏan.
Cuf, meȓa ṯamurṯ iccaṯ xas unẓar aṭṭas nettaṯ ṯsess ticc ṯafeǧaḥṯ, ataf aḏ tawi ijjen n lbaraka zi Arebbi.
Walakin meȓa ṯamurṯ nni ṯseɣmay-d ɣir isennanen ḏ ṯzeggwarṯ, ataf nettaṯ ḏ walu aqat ḏi lxaṭar aḏ twanƹeȓ, aȓ uneggaru at sḥarqen s ṯmessi.
Ay imƹizzen inu, waxxa nessawaȓ ammu neccin metʼakeddin zzaywem iƹni x ṯmesȓayin ṯiṣebḥanin iy zi ɣa ṯnejmem.
Iwa Arebbi, ma iticc ȓḥaqq ma lla? Wah, Arebbi war itettu ca ȓxeḏmeṯ nwem ḏ ȓemḥibbeṯ nni ḏas d ṯseḍharem wami ṯƹawnem ṣṣaliḥin. U ƹaḏ teggem manaya.
Nexs aḏ tḥawȓem kenniw s wuȓ kuȓ ijjen am qbeȓ bac aḏ tiȓim kenniw metʼakeddin ḏi lʼamal nwem aȓ uneggaru.
War nexs ca aḏ tƹegzem. Itxeṣṣa aḏ tiȓim am yinni itwaraṯen s ṣṣbar ḏ lʼiman nsen x ṯmesȓayin nni iy zi ṯen iwƹeḏ Arebbi.
Cuf, wami Arebbi iwƹeḏ Brahim x ȓƹaheḏ nni, ijjuǧ Arebbi aḏ icc ixef nnes. Mayemmi? Liʼanna war ḏinni ḥadd imɣar ktar zi Arebbi.
Inna-as: <Nec jjuǧeɣ qa ac barkeɣ s yijjen n lbaraka ṯemɣar, aḏ semɣareɣ ddurriṯ nnec.>
Iwa ammu wami iraja Brahim s yijjen n ṣṣbar yuweḍ-as-d min zi ṯ iwƹeḏ Arebbi.
Liʼanna iwḏan tjuǧen s yijjen ḏ ameqqran zzaysen. U s yijjen n ṯjaǧiṯ aḏ ḥaqqen marra lqadiyaṯ nsen aḏ kemmȓent.
X manaya iḍmen Arebbi manayenni s yijjen n ṯjaǧiṯ i yinni iy ɣa iwarṯen min zi ṯen iwƹeḏ. Iƹni ixes aḏasen d iseḍhar mliḥ ṭṭabiƹa n lɣaraḍ nnes ƹemmarṣ aḏ twabeddeȓ.

Ṯnayen n ṯmesȓayin-a war twabeddiȓent ca, Arebbi war izemmar axasent isxarreq. Zi ṯnayen n ṯmesȓayin-a azzaysent iy ɣa netwacejjeƹ neccin iy narweȓ bac aɣares nnuffar. Zzaysent iy ɣa neṭṭef s jjheḏ ḏi lʼamal iy ḏaneɣ itwabeccaren.
Lʼamal-a itiȓi ɣarneɣ am yijjen n uȓiyzim n uɣarrabu n ȓaƹmar nneɣ, irseq s jjheḏ war iḍeǧeq. Yuḏef lʼamal-a iƹḏu ɣar ḏeffar n arrwaq n Uxxam Amqeddes Aṭṭas.
Ḏeg umcan nni yuḏef Ƹisa ḏinni ḏ amezwaru ƹlaḥsab neccin, iḏweȓ ḏ ȓefqi ameqqran i ȓebda amecnaw lfirqa nni n ȓefqi umi qqaren Malikiṣadiq.
Cuf, Malikiṣadiq nni tuɣaṯ netta ḏ azeǧiḏ n ṯendint n Salim ḏ ȓefqi n Siḏi Arebbi Yuƹȓan. Iruḥ imeȓqa ak Brahim ibarek-iṯ. Manaya iwqeƹ wami d itrewwaḥ Brahim zi ȓḥarb nni iy ḏi iɣȓeb izeǧiḏen.
Yuca-as Brahim i Malikiṣadiq ȓaƹcur, ƹecra ḏi miyya zi marra. Ḏ amezwaru ȓmaƹna n yisem-a n Malikiṣadiq ixes aḏ yini <Azeǧiḏ n ṣṣulḥ.> U ƹaweḏ netta ḏ Lmalik n ṯendint n Salim iƹni ḏ azeǧiḏ n ȓehna.
War ɣares ntif lla babas lla yemmas lla ȓejḏuḏ nnes. War ɣares ntif amezwaru n ȓiyyam nnes uȓa ḏ aneggaru n ṯuḏarṯ nnes. Netta itcabbah ḏi Mmis n Arebbi, iddar am ȓefqi ameqqran i ȓebda.
Iwa fekkareṯ netta mecḥaȓ ḏ ameqqran, waxxa ḏ jeddiṯneɣ ameqqran Brahim yuca-as ȓaƹcur, ƹecra ḏi miyya zi marra agȓa nni ig irbeḥ zeg izeǧiḏen nni!
Ḏinni ƹaweḏ ijjen n ȓuṣiyeṯ ḏi Ccariƹa n Musa tweṣṣa yinni iǧan ḏ ȓfuqaha zi Ayṯ-Lawi aḏ ysin ȓaƹcur zeg yiwḏan iƹni zi ayṯmaṯsen, waxxa uȓa ḏ ayṯmaṯsen ijji-ṯen-d jeddiṯsen ameqqran Brahim.
Walakin aryaz-a Malikiṣadiq war iǧi ca zi Ayṯ-Lawi, iysi ȓaƹcur zi Brahim uca Malikiṣadiq ibarek Brahim wenni umi ɣar ǧan lwuƹud.
U bȓa ccekk wenni ameqqran aḏ yuc lbaraka i wenni amezyan.
Ayṯ-Lawi ig ikessin ȓaƹcur iƹni niṯni ḏ iwḏan ƹadi tmettan. Walakin Malikiṣadiq ig iysin ȓaƹcur nni icehheḏ xas Lkitab belli netta iddar.
Iwa nzemmar a nini Lawi netta s yixef nnes iy ikessi ȓaƹcur zeg yiwḏan, issekk-iṯ x ufus n Brahim ɣar Malikiṣadiq liʼanna Brahim netta ḏ jeddis ameqqran.
Mammec manaya? Wami Brahim imeȓqa ak Malikiṣadiq, tuɣa Lawi ƹaḏ ɣar ḏaxeȓ n ddat n Brahim iƹni jeddis ameqqran.

Iḏen, maƹlik ccɣeȓ nni iy xeddmen ȓfuqaha n Ayṯ-Lawi war ḏas inqis walu, mayemmi ƹaḏ tuɣa ɣa neḥḏaj aḏ d yas ijjen n ȓefqi nneɣni amecnaw lfirqa n Malikiṣadiq, maci zi lfirqa nni ƹadi n Harun n Ayṯ-Lawi?
U cuf, meȓa ibeddeȓ ccɣeȓ nni iy xeddmen ȓfuqaha n Ayṯ-Lawi ataf wa labud aḏ tbeddeȓ ƹaweḏ can ȓḥajeṯ ḏi ccariƹa.
Liʼanna wenni iy xef nessawaȓ iƹni Ƹisa netta yusa-d zi ṯeqbiȓṯ nneɣni maci zi ṯeqbiȓṯ n Ayṯ-Lawi. Zi ṯeqbiȓṯ nnes ƹemmarṣ war ixḏim can yijjen ḏ ȓefqi ɣar ȓmeḏbaḥ.
Liʼanna nessen Siḏiṯneɣ yusa-d zi ṯeqbiȓṯ n Ayṯ-Yahuḏa. Ƹemmarṣ ma inna Musa aḏ d ffɣen ȓfuqaha zi ṯeqbiȓṯ nni.
Ȓexxu marra manaya itwaḍhar-d mliḥ wami d imeḍhar ijjen n ȓefqi nneɣni, iƹni ḏ Ƹisa, amecnaw lfirqa n Malikiṣadiq.
Iƹni maci ƹlaḥsab ijjen n ȓuṣiyeṯ x ȓejḏuḏ nnes zi ccariƹa iy ṯ yarrin ḏ ȓefqi; Lla, netta ḏ ȓefqi ƹlaḥsab jjheḏ n ṯuḏarṯ nnes ƹemmarṣ aḏ tefna.
Aqa icehheḏ xas Lkitab: <Cek ḏ ȓefqi i ȓebda amecnaw lfirqa n Malikiṣadiq.>
Ȓuṣiyeṯ nni ḏ ṯaqḏint ṯetwabeddeȓ wami ṯetwaḥsab ṯeḍƹef bȓa nnfaƹ.
Iffeɣ-d ijjen lʼamal ḥsen zi ȓuṣiyeṯ nni, zzayes iy ɣa nqarreb ɣar Arebbi ȓaḥeqqac Ccariƹa n Musa war d tarri uȓa ḏ ijjen ȓḥajeṯ war ḏayes bu ȓƹib.
Lʼamal-a wanita maci waḥḏes, akiḏes ijjen n ṯjaǧiṯ. Yinni iḏewȓen qbeȓ ḏ ȓfuqaha arrin-ṯen ḏ ȓfuqaha bȓa ṯjaǧiṯ.
Walakin Ƹisa yarri-ṯ Arebbi ḏ ȓefqi s yijjen n ṯjaǧiṯ wami ḏas inna: <Aqa Siḏi Arebbi ijjuǧ u ƹemmarṣ aḏ ibeddeȓ array nnes, inna-as qa cek ḏ ȓefqi i ȓebda.>
Ṯjaǧiṯ nni n Arebbi ḏ nettaṯ ig yarrin Ƹisa aḏ iḍemmen ijjen n ȓƹaheḏ ḥsen zi ȓƹaheḏ nni aqḏim.
Ȓfuqaha nni n Ayṯ-Lawi niṯni aṭṭas iḏsen, mayemmi? Liʼanna ȓmewṯ war ṯen tejji ca aḏ dumen ḏi ȓxeḏmeṯ nsen.
Walakin Ƹisa ȓxeḏmeṯ nnes n ȓefqi aḏ teqqim war twakkis ca liʼanna netta itduma i ȓebda.
X manaya yinni zzayes itqarraben ɣar Arebbi izemmar Ƹisa aṯen isenjem i ȓebda. Mayemmi? Liʼanna netta iddar i ȓebda aḏaysen itcafaƹ.
Cuf, ijjen n ȓefqi ameqqran am wanita ḏ netta iy neḥḏaj. Netta ƹaḍim, bȓa ȓƹib, iṣfa, ineƹzeȓ zeg yiwḏan iy ggin ȓmuƹṣiyeṯ, itwasemɣar yuƹȓa x ijennaṯen.

Netta maci am ȓfuqaha nni nneɣni imeqqranen teḥḏajan niṯni aḏ qeddmen dbiḥaṯ kuȓ nhar iƹni x ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nsen u menbaƹd x ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ n yiwḏan. Mayemmi? Liʼanna igga manaya Ƹisa icten n ṯwaȓa i ȓebda qaƹ wami iqeddem ixef nnes ḏ lfidya x yiwḏan.

Liʼanna Ccariƹa n Musa tarra iryazen s ḍḍuƹef nsen aḏ iȓin ḏ ȓfuqaha imeqqranen. Walakin Arebbi s ṯjaǧiṯ nnes iy d yusin menbaƹd i Ccariƹa n Musa yarra Mmis ḏ ȓefqi ameqqran iḏweȓ netta bȓa ȓƹib qaƹ i ȓebda.
Iwa, min iǧan muhim ḏi min neqqar? Iƹni ijjen n ȓefqi ameqqran am wenni iy xef nessiweȓ aqaṯ ɣarneɣ neccin. Iqqim netta x ufusi n lƹarc n Arebbi Subḥana wa Tƹala ḏeg ujenna.
Netta ixeddem ḏi ṯemziḏa nni iƹni ḏ aqiḍun nni n ṣṣaḥ lƹaḍim iy igga Siḏi Arebbi maci bnaḏem.
Cuf, kuȓ ȓefqi ameqqran tixḍaren-ṯ bac aḏ iqeddem ṣṣeḏqeṯ ḏ dbiḥaṯ. X manaya wa labud ȓefqi wanita iƹni ḏ Ƹisa aḏ iqeddem can n ȓḥajeṯ.
Maƹlik iǧa netta ḏi ṯmurṯ-a, ataf war izemmar aḏ ixḏem ḏ ȓefqi liʼanna ḏanita ȓfuqaha n Ayṯ-Lawi itqeddamen ṣṣeḏqaṯ ƹlaḥsab Ccariƹa n Musa.

Yina xeddmen ccɣeȓ nsen ḏeg yijjen n ṯemziḏa nettaṯ am yijjen n ṯiȓi itemcabbahen ḏi min iǧan ḏeg ujenna. X manayenni Arebbi iƹȓem i Musa wami ibḏa isbedda Aqiḍun nni Ameqqran inna-as: <Fekkar bac aḏ teggeḏ marra min ḏac xaṭṭeɣ ḏi lxariṭa nni ḏeg uḏrar.>

Walakin ccɣeȓ nni n ȓefqi iy ḏas yuca i Ƹisa imɣar aṭṭas x ccɣeȓ nni aqḏim n ȓfuqaha nneɣni. U ȓƹaheḏ-a iy xef itcafaƹ netta imɣar aṭṭas x wenni aqḏim, liʼanna ibedd x yijjen n dsas n lwuƹud iy iǧan ḥsen.
Maƹlik ȓƹaheḏ nni amezwaru war ḏas inqis walu, ataf war rezzun ca x wis ṯnayen.
Liʼanna Arebbi yufa iwḏan nni ḏ ineqsiyen wami inna: Aqa tasen-d wussan, iqqar-iṯ Siḏi Arebbi, aḏaysen ggeɣ ijjen n ȓƹaheḏ ḏ jḏiḏ i Ayṯ-Israʼil ḏ Ayṯ-Yahuḏa.
Maci am ȓƹaheḏ nni iy ggiɣ ak ȓejḏuḏ nsen, wami ṯen ṭṭfeɣ zeg ifassen nsen, aṯen sufɣeɣ zi ṯmurṯ n Miṣra. Liʼanna niṯni war ṭṭifen ca ḏi ȓƹaheḏ inu, uca nec semḥeɣ ḏaysen, iqqar-iṯ Siḏi Arebbi.

Ḏ wanita ḏ ȓƹaheḏ iy ɣa ggeɣ ak Ayṯ-Israʼil menbaƹd i ȓweqṯ nni, iqqar-iṯ Siḏi Arebbi. Aḏasen siḏfeɣ ȓuṣiyaṯ inu ḏi ȓaƹquȓaṯ nsen, aɣarsen iȓint ḏ ṯira x wuȓawen nsen. Aḏ iȓiɣ ḏ Arebbi nsen aḏ iȓin ḏ ccaƹb inu.
Maci kur ijjen aḏas iseȓmeḏ i wajjar nnes, niɣ i wumas aḏas yini: Ssen Siḏi Arebbi. Lla, marra iḏsen aḏayi ssnen nec, s umezyan nsen aȓ umeqqran nsen.
Aqa nec aḏasen ɣfareɣ i ccarr nsen, ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nsen war ḏaysent tfekkareɣ ca ƹaḏ.
Wami issiweȓ Arebbi x yijjen n ȓƹaheḏ ḏ jḏiḏ, ṣafi wenni amezwaru isbeṭṭaȓ-iṯ. U wenni ig itwasbeṭṭaȓen ȓexxu iḏewweȓ ḏ aqḏim, ataf ḏeɣya aḏ itwakkes war itɣimi ca.
Ȓƹaheḏ nni amezwaru tuɣa ɣares can n lqawanin n lƹibada u ḏ ijjen n umcan amqeddes ḏi ddunect-a.
Iƹni sewjaḏen ijjen n Uqiḍun Ameqqran ḏayes ṯnayen n ixammen. Ḏeg uxxam amezwaru ggin ḏayes ȓqendiȓ ḏ ṭṭabȓa mani srusan aɣrum nni itqeddamen ḏ ṣṣeḏqeṯ i Arebbi. Axxam nni qqaren-as <Axxam Amqeddes.>
Ṯumma ḏinni ijjen n arrwaq, ɣar ḏeffar nnes ḏinni ijjen n uxxam wis ṯnayen qqaren-as <Axxam Amqeddes Aṭṭas.>

Ḏayes ȓmejmar n tbaxur icellel s ddheb, u ḏ tabut n ȓƹaheḏ marra iɣezḏisen nnes u ḏ ṯisi nnes celllen s ddheb. Ḏi tabut-a ḏayes aqnuc itwaṣenneƹ s ddheb, aqnuc nni ḏayes aɣrum umi qqaren lmanna. Tabut-a ƹaweḏ ḏayes ṯaɣȓiṯ n Harun ṯnewwar, ḏ ṯeȓwiḥin n ƹecra n ȓuṣiyaṯ.

Ṯaqebbarṯ n tabut-a xas ṯnayen n lmexluqaṯ n lƹaḍama ggin am munikuṯ ɣarsen afriwen. Ṯiȓi n wafriwen nsen ṯɣeṭṭa ṯaqebbarṯ-a ṯanita n arraḥmeṯ. Walakin neccin ḏi ȓweqṯ-a war nzemmar a nweṣṣef ṯimesȓayin-a ṯa s ṯa.
Wami swejḏen marra ṯimesȓayin-a ammu, tuɣa taḏfen ȓfuqaha ɣar uxxam amezwaru kuȓ nhar ḏi lʼawqat nnes, teggen ccɣeȓ nsen.
Walakin axxam nni wis ṯnayen itraḥ ḏinni ɣir ȓefqi ameqqran, ijjen n ṯwaȓa ḏi lƹam u ṣafi. Wa labud akiḏes yawi ca n iḏammen bac aṯen iqeddem x yixef nnes u x ddnub iy ggin ccaƹb bȓa ma ṯent ssnen.
Min ḏaneɣ d isbiyyen Arruḥ iqeddsen ḏi manaya? Isbiyyen-aneɣ-d meȓa ƹaḏ iqqim Uqiḍun nni Ameqqran, ataf war innurzem ca ubriḏ ɣar min iǧan ḏ amqeddes aṭṭas.
Marra manaya iticc ijjen lmiṯal i ȓweqṯ-a iy ḏi neǧa ȓexxu. Ccɣeȓ nni iy tuɣa teggen ḏinni xmi tqeddamen ṣṣeḏqeṯ ḏ dbiḥaṯ war izemmar ca aḏ issiṣfa ḍḍamir n wenni iƹebbḏen.
Manaya ɣir ḏayes can n lqawanin n ccariƹa x lmakla ḏ ṯsessi ḏ ȓuḍu. Lqawanin-a war ǧin ca x wuȓawen n bnaḏem, xeddmen ḥetta ȓweqṯ n ȓƹaheḏ ḏ jḏiḏ u ṣafi.
Fa Lmasiḥ wami d iḥḍar ḏ ȓefqi ameqqran n ṯmesȓayin-a iy d yusin, iƹni yuḏef aqiḍun nni iǧan ƹaḍim war ḏas inqis walu war ṯ bnin ca ifassen n bnaḏem, war iǧi ca zi min d itwaxeȓqen ḏi ddunect-a.
Yuḏef ijjen n ṯwaȓa u ṣafi ɣar Uxxam Amqeddes Aṭṭas. Netta war yuḏif ca s iḏammen n iɣayḏen niɣ ḏ iyenduzen; Lla, yuḏef s iḏammen nnes nniṯ ixeǧes xaneɣ lfidya bac a nenjem i ȓebda.
Cuf, iḏammen n iɣayḏen ḏ iyenduzen ḏ yiɣɣeḏ n ṯfunast truccan zzaysen yinni ixenzen issiṣfa-ṯen bac aḏ ḏewȓen ḏ imenqawiyen.

Meȓa amenni, mecḥaȓ iy ḏaneɣ ɣa ssiṣfan iḏammen n Lmasiḥ ktar! Netta iruḥ s Arruḥ nni itduman i ȓebda iqeddem ixef nnes bȓa ȓƹib i Arebbi, iḏammen nnes aḏaneɣ ssiṣfan ḍḍamir nneɣ zi ssayiʼaṯ bac a neƹbeḏ Arebbi iddaren.

Falihaḏa netta Lmasiḥ itcafaƹ jaraneɣ ḏ Arebbi s yijjen n ȓƹaheḏ ḏ jḏiḏ bac yinni umi d iȓaɣa Arebbi ataf aḏ awin lwareṯ iy zi ṯen iwƹeḏ itduman i ȓebda. Liʼanna Lmasiḥ immuṯ ḏ lfidya ḥima aḏasen iḍȓeq aḏ iȓin ḥurr zi ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ iy ggin swadday i ȓƹaheḏ nni amezwaru.
Cuf, ƹlaḥsab lwaṣiya labud aḏ d awin chada n lwafat n wenni iggin lwaṣiya.
Liʼanna lwaṣiya war ṯṣeǧeḥ ca illa meȓa immuṯ bab nnes. Meȓa ƹaḏ iddar bab nnes iƹni wenni iy t yurin ataf war ṯṣeǧeḥ ca.
X manaya tuɣa waxxa ḏ ȓƹaheḏ amezwaru war iṣeǧeḥ ca ḥetta wami uzzȓen iḏammen.
Aqa nnabi Musa wami iɣra kuȓ ȓuṣiyeṯ i marra ccaƹb, ṯumma iysi iḏammen n iyenduzen ḏ iɣayḏen ixelleṭ-iṯen ak waman, ṯumma irucc zzaysen Lkitab s yixef nnes ḏ marra ccaƹb s ṯaḍufṯ ṯazeggwaɣṯ ḏ uzuy.
Inna-asen qa yina ḏ iḏammen n ȓƹaheḏ iy ḏawem yumar Arebbi aḏ teggem.
Amenni ƹaweḏ irucc Aqiḍun Ameqqran s iḏammen-a ḏ marra ȓeqcuƹ iy ḏayes staƹmaȓen ḏi lƹibada.
U ḏ ṣṣaḥ ƹlaḥsab Ccariƹa n Musa ƹȓayen marra ṯimesȓayin aḏ twassiṣfant s iḏammen. U bȓa ma aḏ azzȓen iḏammen ataf ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ war twaɣfirent ca.

Iḏen, ṯimesȓayin-a itcabbahen ḏi ṯmesȓayin nni n ujenna tuɣa twassiṣfant s dbiḥaṯ. Walakin ṯimesȓayin nni s yixef nsent n ujenna lla; Twassiṣfant niṯenti s yijjen n nnuƹ n dbiḥaṯ ḥsen zi ṯinni nneɣni.
Cuf, Lmasiḥ war yuḏif ca Axxam nni Amqeddes Aṭṭas iy ibnan s ifassen n bnaḏem itcabbahen waha ḏeg wenni n ṣṣaḥ; Lla, netta yuḏef ḏeg ujenna nniṯ aḏ iḥḍar zzaṯ i Arebbi ƹlaḥsab neccin.
War yuḏif ca ḏeg ujenna bac aḏ itqeddam ixef nnes aṭṭas n ṯwaȓaṯin amecnaw mamc itegg ȓefqi nni ameqqran xmi itaḏef kuȓ lƹam ɣar Uxxam Amqeddes Aṭṭas s iḏammen maci nnes.
