War teggweḏ ca zi mammec iy ɣa twaƹeddbeḏ. Aqa Ibȓis aḏ isiḏef ȓebƹaḍ zzaywem ɣar ȓeḥbes ḥima aḏ twajarrbem. Aḏ tseƹḏum ȓemḥayen ḏi ƹecrayyam. Arni ḏi lʼiman nnec waxxa ac nɣen, nec aḏac uceɣ ttaj n ṯuḏarṯ.
Ṣenneṭ mliḥ a wenni itsȓan min iqqar Arruḥ n Arebbi i ṯjumaƹ n ȓmuminin. Wenni ɣa irebḥen, war ṯ tḍarri ca ȓmewṯ nni wis ṯnayen.
Ari-yas i lmalaʼika n jmaƹṯ n ȓmuminin iy iǧan ḏi ṯendint n Barɣamus, ini-yas qa wenni ɣar iǧa ssif iqḍeƹ x ṯnayen n jjihaṯ, iqqar-ac:

Nec ssneɣ mani ṯzeddɣeḏ, ḏinni lƹarc n Cciṭan. Cek teṭṭfeḏ ḏeg yisem inu. War ṯenkareḏ ca l'iman iy zzayi ṯeggiḏ, waxxa ḏeg wussan nni iy ḏi nɣin ijjen n ccahiḏ inu ḏayes ȓaman qqaren-as Antipas. Nɣin-ṯ zzaṯwem mani izeddeɣ Cciṭan.

Walakin ƹeyybeɣ xac can ṯmesȓayin wami akiḏec can iwḏan iy tbaƹen ttaƹlim n Balƹam. Netta tuɣa iseȓmaḏ-as i Barak mammec ɣa igg ṯaxcebṯ i Ayṯ-Israʼil bac aḏ ccen dbiḥeṯ itqeddamen i lʼaṣnam aḏ fesḏen.
Ƹaweḏ akiḏec can yiwḏan iy tbaƹen ttaƹlim n inikulaṯen.
Tub! Meȓa lla, aɣarek d aseɣ ḏeɣya war tƹeṭṭaȓeɣ ca, aḏ ḥarbeɣ iwḏan-a s ssif iy d iteffɣen zeg uqemmum inu.

Ṣenneṭ mliḥ a wenni itsȓan min iqqar Arruḥ n Arebbi i ṯjumaƹ n ȓmuminin. Wenni ɣa irebḥen, aḏas uceɣ aḏ icc aɣrum n lmanna wenni itwasnuffaren. Aḏas uceɣ azru ḏ acemȓaȓ yura ḏayes ijjen n yisem ḏ jḏiḏ war ṯ issin ḥadd illa wenni iy ṯ ɣa iqebȓen.
Ari-yas i lmalaʼika n jmaƹṯ n ȓmuminin iy iǧan ḏi ṯendint n Ṯiyatra, ini-yas qa wenni iǧan ḏ Mmis n Arebbi, ṯiṭṭawin nnes ggint am uḥaḏuq n ṯmessi, iḍaren nnes ggin am nneḥḥas iṣfan, iqqar-ac:
Nec ssneɣ ȓexḏayem nnec ḏ ȓemḥibbeṯ nnec ḏ lʼiman nnec ḏ ṣṣbar nnec qa ssneɣ ȓexḏayem nnec ṯineggura ktar zi ṯinni ṯimezwura.
Walakin ƹeyybeɣ xac wami ṯejjiḏ Izabil ṯamɣarṯ tarra ixef nnes ḏ nnabiya. Ṯxeddeƹ lƹibad inu, ṯseȓmaḏ-iṯen aḏ fesḏen, aḏ ccen zi dbiḥeṯ itqeddamen i l'aṣnam.
Uciɣ-as ȓweqṯ aḏ ttub zi lfasad nnes, walakin ṯugi aḏ ttub.
S manayenni at nḍareɣ ḏi ṯassuṯ n ȓeḥȓiq ḏ yinni akiḏes ɣa iznan meȓa war tuben ca zi ȓefƹayeȓ nsen ataf aṯen nḍareɣ ḏi ȓemḥayen.
Aḏ nɣeɣ ṯarwa nnes. Aḏ ssnen marra ṯijumaƹ n ȓmuminin belli ḏ nec ig itmeyyazen min ḏayes ḏi ȓaƹqeȓ ḏ wuȓ. Kuȓ ijjen zzaywem aḏas uceɣ ƹlaḥsab ȓexḏayem nnes.
Amma kenniw nneɣni iy iǧan ḏi Ṯiyatra war ṯeqbiȓem ca ttaƹlim nni, war ṯessinem ca manayenni umi qqaren yiwḏan <Lʼasrar n Cciṭan yuǧɣen.> Qqareɣ-awem nec war xawem teggeɣ bu ca n dqeȓ nneɣni.
Innama, lʼiman nwem ṭṭfem ḏayes mliḥ waha aȓ d ɣa aseɣ.
Aḏas uceɣ iṯri n ȓefjar.
Ṣenneṭ mliḥ a wenni itsȓan min iqqar Arruḥ n Arebbi i ṯjumaƹ n ȓmuminin.

Ari-yas i lmalaʼika n jmaƹṯ n ȓmuminin iy iǧan ḏi ṯendint n Sardis, ini-yas qa wenni ɣar ǧan sebƹa n arruḥaṯ n Arebbi ḏ sebƹa n yiṯran, iqqar-ac: Nec ssneɣ ȓexḏayem nnec. Qqaren qa cek ṯeddareḏ walakin lla cek ṯemmuṯeḏ.
Iȓi ƹlabal, egg jjheḏ nnec ḏi ȓexḏayem nnec iy ḏac iqqimen qbeȓ ma aḏ mmṯent qaƹ. Nec ufiɣ ȓexḏayem nnec war kemmȓent ca zzaṯ i Arebbi inu.
Ƹqeȓ x ttaƹlim iy ṯqebȓeḏ wami ḏas ṯesȓiḏ. Xḏem zzayes, tub. Meȓa war ṯeǧiḏ ca ƹlabal, nec aɣarek d aseɣ am yij uceffar war ṯessineḏ ca man ṯsaƹƹat iy d ɣa aseɣ.
Akiḏec ḏinni ȓebƹaḍ n yiwḏan ḏi Sardis war swesixen ca arruḍ nsen, akiḏi uyuren s warruḍ ḏ acemȓaȓ ȓaḥeqqac sḏaheǧen-t.
Wenni ɣa irebḥen aḏas ggen arruḍ ḏ acemȓaȓ. Nec ƹemmarṣ aḏ mesḥeɣ isem nnes zi Lkitab n Ṯuḏarṯ, axas cehḏeɣ zzaṯ i Baba ḏ lmalaʼikaṯ nnes.
Ṣenneṭ mliḥ a wenni itsȓan min iqqar Arruḥ n Arebbi i ṯjumaƹ n ȓmuminin.

Ari-yas i lmalaʼika n jmaƹṯ n ȓmuminin iy iǧan ḏi ṯendint n Filadalfya, ini-yas qa wenni imqeddsen ḏ ȓḥaqq, ɣares ȓmeftaḥ n Dawed; meȓa irzem ataf war ṯ itbelliƹ ḥadd; meȓa ibelleƹ ataf war ṯ irezzem ḥadd, iqqar-ac:
Nec ssneɣ ȓexḏayem nnec. Aqa ggiɣ zzaṯec ijjen n ṯewwarṯ ṯnurzem war izemmar ḥadd at ibelleƹ. Waxxa jjheḏ nnec ḏ uqlil, ṯeggiḏ array i wawaȓ inu war ṯenkareḏ ca isem inu.

Amma yinni zi jmaƹṯ iy iƹebbḏen Cciṭan ḥessben ixef nsen zi Ayṯ-Israʼil, walakin niṯni war ǧin ca zi Ayṯ-Israʼil sxerriqen waha. Aṯen d arreɣ s bezzez aḏ d asen aḏ sejjḏen ɣar iḍaren nnec aḏ ssnen nec tḥibbiɣ-cek.
Ṯeṣbareḏ x min c weṣṣiɣ, s manaya ataf nec ac ḥmiɣ zi ṯsaƹƹat nni n ȓemḥayen iy d ɣa ihwan x marra ddunect-a ḥima imezḏaɣ n ṯmurṯ azzayes twajarrben.
Aqa usiɣ-d, war tƹeṭṭaȓeɣ ca. Ṭṭef ḏi lʼiman nnec ḥima war d itis ḥadd ac iysi ttaj nnec.

Qa wenni ɣa irebḥen aṯ sbeddeɣ am yijjen n upilar ḏi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant n Arebbi inu aḏ iqqim ḏinni i ȓebda. Axas ariɣ isem n Arebbi inu ḏ yisem n ṯendint n Arebbi inu, iƹni Lquds n jḏiḏ iy d ɣa ihwan zeg ujenna zi Arebbi inu. Axas ariɣ isem inu ḏ jḏiḏ.
Ṣenneṭ mliḥ a wenni itsȓan min iqqar Arruḥ n Arebbi i ṯjumaƹ n ȓmuminin.
Ari-yas i lmalaʼika n jmaƹṯ n ȓmuminin iy iǧan ḏi ṯendint n Lawdukya, ini-yas qa wenni umi qqaren Amin, netta ḏ ccaheḏ ḏayes ȓaman ḏayes ȓḥaqq, zzayes iy d ixȓeq Arebbi marra, iqqar-ac:
Nec ssneɣ ȓexḏayem nnec, cek war ṯesmiḍeḏ war ṯeḥmiḏ. Tmenniɣ cek aḏ tsemḍeḏ niɣ aḏ teḥmiḏ!
Acek d ƹuqqeɣ zeg uqemmum inu, cek ṯemȓuḏiḏ waha war ṯeḥmiḏ ca war ṯesmiḍeḏ ca.
Cek ṯeqqareḏ zaƹma qa nec ḏ ijjen n ttajar ggiɣ aṭṭas n wagȓa war ḥḏijeɣ walu. Iwa war ṯessineḏ ca qa cek ḏ amqeṭṭaƹ ḏ ameɣbun, ḏ imesƹi, ḏ aḏarɣaȓ, ḏ aƹeryan.

Qa nec neṣṣḥeɣ-cek axafi ṯesɣeḏ ddheb itwaṣfan s ṯmessi ḥima aḏ tdewȓeḏ ḏ ttajar. Seɣ ƹaweḏ arruḍ ḏ acemȓaȓ ḥima aḏ tesarḍeḏ ixef nnec zi ṯuƹaryant nnec ƹaweḏ ḏ can ddwa ḥima aḏ tesgenfiḏ ṯiṭṭawin nnec ataf twaȓiḏ.
Nec trebbiɣ nehhiɣ marra wenni tḥibbiɣ. Cek lʼiman nnec sejheḏ-iṯ, tub.
Qa nec beddeɣ zzaṯ i ṯewwarṯ sqerqubeɣ. Meȓa isȓa can yijjen i ṯmijja inu qa aḏ irzem ṯawwarṯ, ataf aɣares aḏfeɣ akiḏes cceɣ akiḏi icc.
Wenni ɣa irebḥen aṯ jjeɣ akiḏi iqqim x lƹarc inu, am rebḥeɣ uȓa ḏ nec qqimeɣ ak Baba x lƹarc nnes.
Ṣenneṭ mliḥ, a wenni itsȓan min iqqar Arruḥ n Arebbi i ṯjumaƹ n ȓmuminin."

Menbaƹd i manaya ẓriɣ ijjen n ṯewwarṯ ṯnurzem ḏeg ujenna, sȓiɣ i ṯmijja nni iy ɣari d issiwȓen zi qbeȓ ṣṣut nnes igga am zzammar, ṯenna-ayi-d: "Gaƹƹeḏ-d ḏanita aḏac d smeḍhareɣ min labud ɣa iweqƹen menbaƹd i manaya."
Ȓexddenni ihwa-d xafi Arruḥ n Arebbi, imeḍhar-d ḏinni ijjen n lƹarc ḏeg ujenna iqqim xas ijjen.
Wenni xas iqqimen itcabbah ḏi ṯezrut n lyaceb ḏ lƹaqiq azeggwaɣ. Ijjen n ṯesȓiṯ n unẓar ṯenneḍ-as-d i lƹarc-a, tcabbah ḏi ṯezrut ṯazeyzawṯ n zzumurrud.
Nnḍen-as-d i lƹarc-a arbeƹa u ƹicrin n lƹarcaṯ, xasen arbeƹa u ƹicrin n imɣaren ggin arruḍ ḏ acemȓaȓ, kuȓ ijjen zzaysen ɣares ttaj n ddheb x uzeǧif nnes.
Iteffeɣ-d zi lƹarc wassam ḏ iɣuyan ḏ wajjaj. Zzaṯ i lƹarc ḏinni sebƹa n isfeḍawen n ṯmessi ceƹƹȓen, yina niṯni ḏ sebƹa n arruḥaṯ n Arebbi.
Zzaṯ i lƹarc ḏinni am ȓebḥar n jjaj iṣfa aṭṭas. Ḏinni arbeƹa n lmexluqaṯ iddaren ḏi ȓwesṭ, nnḍen-as-d i lƹarc ɣarsen ṯiṭṭawin ɣar zzaṯ ḏ ḏeffar.
Lmexluq amezwaru itcabbah ḏi ssbaƹ. Wis ṯnayen itcabbah ḏeg uyenduz. Wis ṯȓaṯa ɣares aɣembub am bnaḏem. Wis arbeƹa itcabbah ḏi nser iṭṭawen.

Kuȓ ijjen zi lmexluqaṯ-a ɣares setta n wafriwen, kuȓ afriw iccur s ṯiṭṭawin x jjihetayen. Qqaren ǧiȓeṯ ḏ nhar bȓa ma aḏ bedden: "Mecḥaȓ ƹaḍim, ƹaḍim, ƹaḍim, Siḏi Arebbi izemmaren i kuȓci. Netta ḏ wenni iy tuɣa iǧan, ḏ wenni iy iǧan, ḏ wenni ƹaḏ iy d ɣa yasen."
Lmexluqaṯ-a meȓmi ma semɣaren tweqqaren ḥemmḏen-as i wenni iqqimen x lƹarc ig iddaren i ȓebda n ȓebdaṯ,
ssenni ƹaweḏ arbeƹa u ƹicrin nni n imɣaren trekkaƹen-as i wenni iqqimen x lƹarc, tsejjaḏen-as i wenni iddaren i ȓebda n ȓebdaṯ. Kuȓ ijjen zzaysen ineṭṭar ttaj nnes zzaṯ i lƹarc iqqar:
"A Mawlana a Siḏi Arebbi nneɣ, ḏ cek iy isḏaheǧen lƹaḍama ḏ uweqqar ḏ jjheḏ, ȓaḥeqqac cek ṯxeȓqeḏ kuȓci, s ȓxaḍar nnec twaxeȓqen-d aqaṯen ǧan."
Ṯumma ẓriɣ ijjen n Lkitab ḏeg ufus afusi n wenni iqqimen x lƹarc yura ɣar ḏaxeȓ ḏ barra, icemmeƹ sebƹa n marraṯ.
Twaȓiɣ ijjen n lmalak ameqqran iȓaɣa s jjheḏ iqqar: "Wi ɣar iǧa ȓḥaqq aḏ irzem Lkitab-a aḏ ikkes icemmaƹen nnes?"
Uȓa ḏ ijjen deg ujenna niɣ ḏi ṯmurṯ niɣ swadday i ṯmurṯ war izemmar aḏ irzem Lkitab-a niɣ aḏ ixzar min ḏayes.
Truɣ aṭṭas ȓaḥeqqac war ufin ḥadd aḏ isḏaheǧ aḏ irzem Lkitab-a aḏayes ixzar.
Ȓexddenni indeq-d ijjen zeg imɣaren nni inna-ayi: "War tru ca! Aqa irbeḥ ssbaƹ nni ig iǧan zi Ayṯ-Yahuḏa lʼaṣel nnes zi Dawed, izemmar aḏ irzem Lkitab-a aḏ ikkes icemmaƹen nni s sebƹa."

Ṯumma ṭṭarf i lƹarc-a, ḏi ȓwesṭ n arbeƹa n lmexluqaṯ nni ḏ imɣaren nni, ẓriɣ ḏinni ijjen n Yizmar ibedd walakin itban-d axmi ṯ nɣin. Ɣares sebƹa n waccawen ḏ sebƹa n ṯiṭṭawin. Niṯni ḏ sebƹa n arruḥaṯ n Arebbi ig issekk ɣar marra ddunect-a.
Yusa-d iysi Lkitab-a zeg ufus afusi n wenni iqqimen x lƹarc.

Wami iysi Lkitab-a, lmexluqaṯ nni s arbeƹa ḏ arbeƹa u ƹicrin n imɣaren nni sejjḏen-as i Yizmar. Mkuȓ ijjen zzaysen ɣares ṯgambrit ɣares ṯimejmarin ggin-ṯent s ddheb ƹemmarent s tbaxur, iƹni ḏ ṯẓaǧiṯ n ȓmuminin ṣṣaliḥin.

Tɣennajen s yijjen n yizȓi ḏ jḏiḏ qqaren: "Ḏ cek iy isḏaheǧen aḏ teysiḏ Lkitab aḏ terzmeḏ icemmaƹen nnes, ȓaḥeqqac twaɣarṣeḏ, ṯesnejmeḏ iwḏan i Arebbi s iḏammen nnec zi mkuȓ ȓqum ḏ lluɣa ḏ ccaƹb ḏ ȓgens.
Ṯeggiḏ zzaysen ijjen n lmemlaka n ȓfuqaha i Arebbi nneɣ, aḏ ḥekkmen ḏi ṯmurṯ."
Ṯumma xzareɣ, sȓiɣ i ṯmijja n waȓaf n uȓufaṯ ḏ milyun n milyunaṯ n lmalaʼikaṯ tennḍent-as-d i lƹarc ḏ lmexluqaṯ ḏ imɣaren.
Qqarent s jjheḏ: "Izmar itwanɣen isḏaheǧ ṯizemmar ḏ wagȓa ḏ lḥikma ḏ jjheḏ ḏ uweqqar ḏ lƹaḍama ḏ lḥamed."

Ṯumma sȓiɣ i kuȓ lmexluq iǧan ḏeg ujenna ḏ ṯmurṯ ḏ swadday i ṯmurṯ ḏ ȓebḥar ḏ marra min ḏaysen qqaren-asen i wenni iqqimen x lƹarc uȓa ḏ Yizmar: "Aɣarwem yiȓi lḥamed ḏ uweqqar ḏ lƹaḍama ḏ ȓeḥkam i ȓebda n ȓebdaṯ!"
Lmexluqaṯ nni s arbeƹa qqaren: "Amin!" Rekƹen imɣaren nni aḏ sejjḏen.
Ṯumma ẓriɣ Izmar nni wami irzem ijjen zi sebƹa n icemmaƹen nni, sȓiɣ i yijjen zi arbeƹa nni n lmexluqaṯ iqqar s jjheḏ am wajjaj: "Araḥ-d!"
Wami xzareɣ, twaȓiɣ ijjen n uyis ḏ acemȓaȓ, wenni xas inyin ɣares ijjen n neccab n fȓiča. Ucin-as ijjen n ttaj, iffeɣ irebbeḥ ḏi ȓḥarb u ƹaḏ aḏ irbeḥ.
Izmar nni wami irzem acemmaƹ wis ṯnayen, sȓiɣ i lmexluq wis ṯnayen iqqar: "Araḥ-d!"
Ṯumma iffeɣ-d ijjen n uyis ḏ azeggwaɣ, wenni xas inyin ucin-as aḏ ikkes ssalam zi ṯmurṯ, aḏ nɣen yiwḏan ayawya. Ƹaweḏ ucin-as ijjen n ssif ḏ ameqqran.
Izmar nni wami irzem acemmaƹ wis ṯȓaṯa, sȓiɣ i lmexluq wis ṯȓaṯa iqqar: "Araḥ-d!" Wami xzareɣ, twaȓiɣ ijjen n uyis ḏ abercan, wenni xas inyin ɣares ȓmizan ḏeg ufus nnes.

Ṯumma sȓiɣ amecnaw ijjen n ṯmijja ṯusa-d zi jjiheṯ n arbeƹa n lmexluqaṯ nni ṯeqqar: "Kilu n yirḏan iseggwa nhar ufeǧaḥ. Ƹaweḏ ṯȓaṯa n kilu n imendi iseggwa nhar ufeǧaḥ. Walakin zzect ḏ waman uḍiȓ war ṯen tḍeyyaƹ ca."
Izmar nni wami irzem acemmaƹ wis arbeƹa, sȓiɣ i lmexluq wis arbeƹa iqqar: "Araḥ-d!"
Wami xzareɣ, twaȓiɣ ijjen n uyis ḏ awraɣ, wenni xas inyin semman-ṯ Ȓmewṯ, teḏfar-iṯ Lʼaxira. Ṯemmuc-asen ssulṭa aḏ nɣen arbaƹ n imezḏaɣ n ṯmurṯ s ssif ḏ jjuƹ ḏ ṭṭaƹun ḏ ȓuḥuc n ṯmurṯ.
Izmar nni wami irzem acemmaƹ wis xemsa, ẓriɣ swadday i ȓmeḏbaḥ buḥbeȓ n yinni itwanɣen ƹlaḥsab awaȓ n Arebbi ḏ chaḏeṯ iy cehḏen.
Snekkaren ṯɣuyyeṯ s jjheḏ nnan: "Ya Mawlana ya wenni ƹaḍim iǧan ḏ ȓḥaqq, mecḥaȓ ɣa ṯekkeḏ war tḥisibeḏ imezḏaɣ n ddunect-a, aṯen ṯƹaqbeḏ x iḏammen nneɣ?"
Ṯumma immuc-asen marra ij-ij, čammir ḏ acemȓaȓ itwanna-yasen ƹaḏ aḏ teṣbarem cwayt aȓ ɣa itwakemmeȓ lƹadad nican n ayṯmaṯwem iy ɣa itwanɣen amecnaw kenniw, iƹni yinni iy iƹebbḏen am kenniw.
Ẓriɣ Izmar nni wami irzem acemmaƹ wis setta, ȓexddenni iwqeƹ ijjen n zzinzal ḏ ameqqran. Ṯfuct ṯeḏweȓ ḏ ṯabercant am ȓefḥam, ṯaziri ṯeḏweȓ am iḏammen.
Iṯran n ujenna weṭṭan-d ɣar ṯmurṯ amecnaw ṯazarṯ xmi ṯweṭṭa zi ṯcejjarṯ xmi t isenhezza arriḥ ijehḏen.
Ajenna inejmeƹ am mammec itwabelleƹ ijjen n lkitab. Iḏurar ḏ ṯeyzirin marra nhezzent zeg umcan nsent.
Kkaren izeǧiḏen n ṯmurṯ ḏ imeqqranen nsen ḏ arruyas n ȓƹaskar ḏ twajar ḏ yinni ijehḏen ḏ yinni ɣarsen bab nsen ḏ yinni ɣarsen lḥurriya nsen, ruḥen marra tnuffaren ḏeg yifran ḏ jar yizra n iḏurar.
Niṯni qqaren i iḏurar ḏ yizra: "Wḍam-d xaneɣ, snuffarem-aneɣ zeg wuḏem n wenni iqqimen x lƹarc ḏ lƹiqab iy ɣa igg Yizmar.
Aqa yusa-d Lyawm ameqqran n lƹiqab nsen, ug izemmaren aḏ ibedd?"
Menbaƹd i manaya ẓriɣ arbeƹa n lmalaʼikaṯ beddent x arbeƹa n ṯɣemmura n ṯmurṯ, ṭṭfent arriḥ x arbeƹa n jjihaṯ n ṯmurṯ ḥima war itṣuḍ ca x ȓbarr uȓa x ȓebḥar uȓa x ȓcejjur.
Ẓriɣ ijjen n lmalak nneɣni itgaƹƹaḏ-d zi ccarq iysi-d ṭṭabaƹ n Arebbi iddaren, iȓaɣa s yijjen n ṯmijja ṯejheḏ i arbeƹa n lmalaʼikaṯ nni ṯinni umi immuc jjheḏ ḥima aḏ ḍeyyƹent ȓbarr ḏ ȓebḥar.
Inna-asent: "War tḍeyyaƹent ni ȓbarr ni ḏ ȓebḥar ni ḏ ȓcejjur ḥetta ɣa neḍbaƹ ṯanyarṯ n yinni iƹebbḏen Arebbi."
Sȓiɣ i mecḥaȓ itwaḍebƹen: Miyya u arbeƹa u arbeƹin aȓaf zi marra ṯiqebbaȓ n Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Ṯenƹacar aȓaf zi Ayṯ-Yahuḏa, ṯenƹacar aȓaf zi Ayṯ-Rabin, ṯenƹacar aȓaf zi Ayṯ-Jad,
ṯenƹacar aȓaf zi Ayṯ-Ƹacur, ṯenƹacar aȓaf zi Ayṯ-Naftali, ṯenƹacar aȓaf zi Ayṯ-Manasi,
ṯenƹacar aȓaf zi Ayṯ-Cimƹun, ṯenƹacar aȓaf zi Ayṯ-Lawi, ṯenƹacar aȓaf zi Ayṯ-Cakir,
ṯenƹacar aȓaf zi Ayṯ-Zafulun, ṯenƹacar aȓaf zi Ayṯ-Yusef, ṯenƹacar aȓaf zi Ayṯ-Benyamin.
Menbaƹd i manaya xzareɣ, twaȓiɣ aṭṭas n ȓɣaci bȓa ȓeḥsab zi mkuȓ ȓgens ḏ ȓqum ḏ ccaƹb ḏ lluɣa, bedden zzaṯ i lƹarc ḏ zzaṯ i Yizmar ggin čammir ḏ acemȓaȓ, ḏeg ifassen nsen ṯaseṭṭa n tmar.
Snekkaren ṯɣuyyeṯ s jjheḏ qqaren: "Arebbi nneɣ ig iqqimen x lƹarc netta ḏ Yizmar ɣarsen ṯizemmar aḏaneɣ snejmen."
Marra lmalaʼikaṯ beddent nnḍent-id i lƹarc ḏ imɣaren ḏ arbeƹa n lmexluqaṯ nni. Hwant x uɣembub nsent zzaṯ i lƹarc sejjḏent i Arebbi.
Qqarent: "Amin! Lḥamed ḏ lƹaḍama ḏ lḥikma ḏ ccuker ḏ uweqqar ḏ ṯzemmar ḏ jjheḏ i Arebbi nneɣ i ȓebda n ȓebdaṯ. Amin!"
Inna-ayi yijjen zeg imɣaren-a: "Ma ṯessneḏ yiwḏan-a iy ggin čammir ḏ acemȓaȓ min ƹnan ḏ manis d usin?"
Jawbeɣ-ṯ nniɣ-as: "Ḏ cek iy issnen a Siḏi." Inna-ayi: "Yina ḏ yinni inejmen zi ȓmiḥneṯ ṯameqqrant, ṣebbnen ičammiren nsen s iḏammen n Yizmar arrin-ṯen ḏ icemȓaȓen.
S manaya aqaṯen zzaṯ i lƹarc n Arebbi, ƹebbḏen-ṯ ǧiȓeṯ ḏ nhar ḏi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant nnes. Wenni iqqimen x lƹarc aṯen iḥḍa.
War tȓizin war tfiḏin, war ṯen tsecmiḍ ṯfuct uȓa ḏ ȓeḥmu.
Ȓaḥeqqac Izmar iy iǧan ḏi ȓwesṭ n lƹarc aṯen yarwes, aṯen yawi akiḏes ɣar mani ǧan ȓaƹnaṣer n waman n ṯuḏarṯ. Arebbi aḏ imseḥ kuȓ ameṭṭaw zi ṯiṭṭawin nsen."
Izmar wami irzem acemmaƹ wis sebƹa, ineqḍeƹ ȓḥess ḏeg ujenna can uzyen n ṯsaƹƹat.
Ẓriɣ sebƹa n lmalaʼikaṯ iy itbeddan zzaṯ i Arebbi, immuc-asent sebƹa n zzwammar.

Yusa-d ijjen n lmalak nneɣni ibedd ɣar ȓmeḏbaḥ, iysi-d ṯimejmarṯ nni itwaṣenƹen s ddheb. Immuc-as aṭṭas n tbaxur ḥima aḏ iqeddem tbaxur nni ak ṯẓaǧiṯ n ȓmuminin ṣṣaliḥin x ȓmeḏbaḥ n ddheb iǧan zzaṯ i lƹarc.
Ddexxan n tbaxur-a ak ṯẓaǧiṯ n ȓmuminin ṣṣaliḥin igaƹƹeḏ zeg ufus n lmalak-a wanita ɣar ujenna zzaṯ i Arebbi.
Iysi lmalak-a ṯimejmarṯ nni n tbaxur, iƹemmar-it s ṯmessi n ȓmeḏbaḥ, izeǧeƹ-it ɣar ṯmurṯ. Iwqeƹ wajjaj ḏ iɣuyan ḏ wassam ḏ zzinzal.
Sebƹa n lmalaʼikaṯ nni iy ɣar ǧant sebƹa n zzwammar sewjaḏent ixef nsent ḥima aḏaysen ṣuḍent.
Ṯekkar lmalaʼika ṯamezwarut ṯṣuḍ ḏi zzammar nnes uca yusa-d icarra ḏ ṯmessi mxellṭen ak iḏammen menḍaren ɣar ṯmurṯ. Ṯecmeḍ tuluṯ n ṯmurṯ ḏ tuluṯ n ȓcejjur ḏ marra arbiƹ azeyza.
Ṯekkar lmalaʼika wis ṯnayen ṯṣuḍ ḏi zzammar nnes uca ṯmenḍar-d can ȓḥajeṯ ḏi ȓebḥar amecnaw can uḏrar ḏ ameqqran itceƹƹaȓ s ṯmessi. Tuluṯ n ȓebḥar iḏweȓ ḏ iḏammen.
Tuluṯ n lmexluqaṯ ig itƹican ḏi ȓebḥar mmuṯen, tuluṯ n iɣarruba twarzen.
Ṯekkar lmalaʼika wis tȓaṯa ṯṣuḍ ḏi zzammar nnes uca iwḍa-d ijjen n yiṯri ḏ ameqqran zeg ujenna itceƹƹaȓ amecnaw asfeḍ. Iwḍa-d x tuluṯ n yiɣzran ḏ ȓaƹnaṣer n waman.
Iṯri nni qqaren-as Cciḥ. Tuluṯ n waman nni ḏewȓen ḏ imerzagen. Aṭṭas zeg yinni iswin zzaysen mmuṯen minzi aman nni ḏ imarzagen.
Ṯekkar lmalaʼika wis arbeƹa ṯṣuḍ ḏi zzammar nnes uca tuluṯ n ṯfucṯ ḏ ṯziri ḏ yiṯran twasenhezzen ḥima tuluṯ nni aḏ tiȓi ḏ ṯaǧesṯ, aḏ tenqes ijjen n tuluṯ n ṯfawṯ ḏi nhar uȓa ḏ ǧiȓeṯ.

Xzareɣ, sȓiɣ i yijjen n nser iṭṭaw ḏi ȓwesṭ n ujenna iȓaɣa s jjheḏ inna: "Ya tamara, ya tamara, ya tamara x imezḏaɣ n ṯmurṯ ƹlaḥsab ṯȓaṯa n lmalaʼikaṯ nni ig iqqimen ƹaḏ war ṣuḍent ca ḏi zzwammar nsent."
Ṯekkar lmalaʼika wis xemsa ṯṣuḍ ḏi zzammar nnes uca ẓriɣ ijjen n yiṯri tuɣa iwḍa-d zeg ujenna x ṯmurṯ. Immuc-as i yiṯri nni ȓmeftaḥ n wanu nni itawin ɣar ȓaǧeɣ bȓa ȓaḥedd.
Irzem anu nni itawin ɣar ȓaǧeɣ bȓa ȓaḥedd, yuȓi-d zzayes ddexxan amecnaw ddexxan n yijjen n ȓkuceṯ ḏ ṯameqqrant. Ddexxan n ȓaǧeɣ nni iɣeṭṭa ṯfucṯ ḏ ljuw.
Zi ddexxan-a ṯeffeɣ-d ssenni ṯmurɣi ɣar ṯmurṯ, immuc-asent jjheḏ am ṯɣirḏemiwin n ṯmurṯ.
Nnan-asent war tḍeyyaƹent arbiƹ n ṯmurṯ uȓa ḏ min iǧan ḏ azeyza uȓa ḏ ȓcejjur, ɣir iwḏan nni iy war ɣar iǧi ca ṭṭabaƹ n Arebbi x ṯenyarṯ nsen.
Maci mesmuḥ aṯen nɣent, walakin aṯen ƹeddbent xems chur. Ȓaƹḏab-a iy teggent amecnaw ṯiɣirḏemiwin xmi teqqsent i bnaḏem.
Ḏi ȓweqṯ nni aḏ arzun yiwḏan x ȓmewṯ war t tifen ca, aḏ ttaren ȓmewṯ azzaysen ṯarweȓ.
Ṯmurɣi-ya tcabbah ḏeg yiysan nni iy wejḏen aḏ ḥarben. Ɣarsent x izeǧifen nsent am ttaj n ddheb, aɣembub nsent am uɣembub n bnaḏem.
Ɣarsent acewwaf amecnaw acewwaf n ṯemɣarin. Ṯiɣmas nsent amecnaw ṯiɣmas n ssbaƹ.
Ṯijiliṯin nsent ggint am ṯjiliṯin n ȓeḥḏiḏ. Ssdaƹ n wafriwen nsent igga am ssdaƹ n waṭṭas n ikarruṯen n yiysan iy tazzȓen ɣar ȓḥarb.
Ɣarsent ṯicceṭ am ṯenni n ṯɣirḏent, teqqsent zzayes. Ɣarsent jjheḏ aḏ ḍarrent iwḏan xems chur s ṯicceṭ nni.
Azeǧiḏ nsent netta ḏ lmalak n ȓaǧeɣ bȓa ȓaḥedd, s lƹibriya qqaren-as Abaddun, s ṯyunaniṯ qqaren-as Abulyun.
Ṯeƹḏu tamara ṯamezwarut, ƹaḏ aḏ d asent ṯnayen nneɣni.
Ṯekkar lmalaʼika wis setta ṯṣuḍ ḏi zzammar nnes uca sȓiɣ i yijjen n ṯmijja ṯendeq-d zi arbeƹa nni n waccawen n ȓmeḏbaḥ n ddheb iy iǧan zzaṯ i Arebbi.
Ṯenna-as ṯmijja nni i lmalaʼika wis setta iy ɣar ṯeǧa zzammar: "Ḍȓeq-d i arbeƹa n lmalaʼikaṯ itwacedden ḏeg yiɣzar n Lfurat ameqqran."
Uca twaḍeȓqent-id arbeƹa-ya n lmalaʼikaṯ iy tuɣa twassewjḏent i ṯsaƹƹat-a ḏ nhar-a ḏ char-a ḏ useggwas-a ḥima aḏ nɣent tuluṯ n yiwḏan.
Sȓiɣ x lƹadad n ȓƹaskar iy inyin x yiysan: lƹadad nsen miyyatayen milyun.

Ẓriɣ ḏi lwaḥi-ya inu iysan ḏ yinni xasen inyin, ɣarsen ṯijiliṯin n ȓeḥḏiḏ ḏ ṯizeggwaɣin am ṯmessi, ḏ ṯizeyzawin am lyaqut, ḏ ṯiwraɣin am ȓekbriyeṯ. Izeǧifen n yiysan-a am uzeǧif n ssbaƹ, teffeɣ-d zeg uqemmum nsen ṯmessi ḏ ddexxan ḏ ȓekbriyeṯ.
Mmuṯen tuluṯ n yiwḏan s ṯraṯa n lmuṣibaṯ-a iƹni s ṯmessi ḏ ddexxan ḏ ȓekbriyeṯ iy d iteffɣen zeg uqemmum nsen.
Jjheḏ n yiysan-a aqaṯ ḏeg uqemmum nsen ḏ iƹennaben nsen. Iƹennaben nsen tcabbahen ḏeg ifiɣeran, tḍarran s izeǧifen nsen.

Walakin iwḏan ig inejmen zi lmuṣibaṯ-a war tuben ca s min ggin s ifassen nsen. Qqimen ƹaḏ ƹebbḏen ccayaṭin ḏ lʼaṣnam n ddheb ḏ nnuqarṯ ḏ nneḥḥas ḏ uzru ḏ ukeccuḍ iy war itwiȓin ca iy war itsȓin ca iy war igguren ca.
War tuben ca wami nɣin iwḏan niɣ wami ggin ssḥur ḏ lfasad ḏ ṯukkarda.
Ẓriɣ ijjen n lmalak nneɣni ijheḏ ihwa-d zeg ujenna, inneḍ-as-d useynu. X uzeǧif nnes ijjen n ṯesȓiṯ n unẓar, aɣembub nnes igga am ṯfuct, iḍaren nnes ggin am ipilaren n ṯmessi.
Iysi ḏeg ufus nnes ijjen n lkitab ḏ amezyan irzem. Isers ḍar nnes afusi x ȓebḥar, ƹaweḏ ḏ ḍar nnes aẓeȓmaḍ x ȓbarr.
Isɣuy s jjheḏ axmi ihirriw ijjen n ssbaƹ. Wami isɣuy, arrin-d xas sebƹa n wajjajen s ṣṣut nsen.
Wami d arrin sebƹa nni n wajjajen, nec xseɣ aḏ ariɣ manayenni walakin sȓiɣ i yijjen n ṯmijja zeg ujenna ṯenna-ayi-d: "Lla, min nnan sebƹa-ya n wajjajen ejj-iṯ ɣarek ḏ ssirr, war ṯ tari ca."
Ẓriɣ lmalak nni ibedden x ȓebḥar ḏ ȓbarr iysi fus nnes afusi ɣar ujenna.
Ijjuǧ s wenni iddaren i ȓebda n ȓebdaṯ iƹni wenni iy d ixeȓqen ajenna ḏ min ḏayes ḏ ȓbarr ḏ ȓebḥar ḏ min ḏaysen. Uca inna: "Ṣafi, war ṯeqqim bu ȓweqṯ ƹaḏ ktar.
Aqa ḏi nhuraṯ nni xmi ɣa ṯṣuḍ lmalaʼika wis sebƹa ḏi zzammar nnes qa ṣafi ssirr n Arebbi ikemmeȓ mammec ḏasen ṯ iƹaweḏ i lƹibad nnes lʼanbiya."
Ṯmijja nni umi sȓiɣ zeg ujenna zi qbeȓ ṯendeq-d ƹaweḏ ṯessiweȓ-d akiḏi wis marrṯayen ṯenna-ayi-d: "Ruḥ, ysi lkitab nni irezmen ḏeg ufus n lmalak ig ibedden x ȓebḥar ḏ ȓbarr."
Ruḥeɣ ɣar lmalak nni nniɣ-as: "Uc-ayi-d Lkitab nni amezyan!" Inna-ayi: "Aqaṯ, ecc-iṯ. Aḏ yiȓi ḏeg uƹeddis nnec ḏ amerzag, walakin ḏeg uqemmum nnec netta ḏ miziḍ am ṯamment."
Ysiɣ Lkitab nni amezyan zeg ufus nnes, cciɣ-ṯ. Ufiɣ-ṯ ḏeg uqemmum inu ḏ miziḍ am ṯamment. Walakin wami ṯ seɣȓiɣ iḏweȓ ḏ amerzag ḏeg uƹeddis inu.
Ȓexddenni itwanna-ayi: "U labud aḏ tessiwȓeḏ ƹaweḏ s min iwḥa Arebbi x waṭṭas n ccuƹub ḏ ȓegnus ḏ lluɣaṯ ḏ izeǧiḏen."
Immuc-ayi ijjen n uɣanim am ḏ ȓaƹbar inna-ayi yijjen: "Kkar, ƹbar ṯamziḏa ṯameqqrant n Arebbi ḏ ȓmeḏbaḥ, ḥseb mecḥaȓ iy ƹebbḏen ḏinni.
Walakin ȓemraḥ iǧan ɣar barra i ṯemziḏa ejj-iṯ waḥḏes, war ṯ teƹbar ca ȓaḥeqqac immuc-asen i ȓegnus. Aḏ ƹeffsen ṯandint iqeddsen ḏi ṯnayen u arbeƹin n churaṯ.
Aḏ ssekkeɣ ṯnayen n ȓechuḏ inu aḏ ggen arruḍ n lḥuzen aḏ xbaren iwḏan s min ƹeȓmen zi Arebbi aȓaf u miyyatayen u settin yum."
Ȓechuḏ nni niṯni ḏ ṯnayen n ȓcejjur n zzitun, u ƹaweḏ niṯni ḏ ṯnayen n ȓeqnaḏeȓ ig ibedden zzaṯ i Siḏi Arebbi n ddunect-a.
Meȓa can yijjen irzu aḏ iḍarr ȓechuḏ nni, ataf aḏ teffeɣ ṯmessi zeg uqemmum nsen aḏ tecc ȓƹaḏyan nsen. Meȓa can yijjen irzu aṯen iḍarr, amenni iy ɣa immeṯ.

Ḏi ȓiyamaṯ nni iy ḏi ɣa xbaren ȓechuḏ-a s min ƹeȓmen zi Arebbi ataf aɣarsen ṯiȓi ssulṭa zi ɣa bellƹen ajenna war d icciṯ bu unẓar qaƹ. Ataf ƹaweḏ aɣarsen ṯiȓi ssulṭa aḏ arren aman ḏ iḏammen aḏ ḍeȓqen i marra lmuṣibaṯ x ṯmurṯ meȓmi ma xsen.
Xmi ɣa kemmȓen ȓexbar nsen iy zi ɣa cehḏen, aḏ d igaƹƹeḏ ȓwaḥc zi ȓaǧeɣ bȓa ȓaḥedd aṯen iḥareb, aṯen iɣȓeb, aḏ ineɣ ȓechuḏ nni.
Aḏ teqqim ddat nsen ḏi ccariƹ n ṯendint ṯameqqrant umi qqaren s ȓmaƹna Sadum niɣ Miṣra iƹni mani itwaṣelleb Siḏiṯsen.
Iwḏan zi mkuȓ ccaƹb ḏ ȓqum ḏ lluɣa ḏ ȓgens aḏaysen xzaren ḏi ddat nsen ṯeȓtiyyam ḏ uzyen, war tejjin ḥadd aḏ inḍeȓ ȓechuḏ-a.
Imezḏaɣ n ṯmurṯ aḏ farḥen aḏ zhun s ȓmewṯ nsen. Aḏ ucen ikaduṯen i wayawya ȓaḥeqqac lʼanbiya nni s ṯnayen, iƹni ȓechuḏ nni, ƹeddben aṭṭas imezḏaɣ n ṯmurṯ.
Wami ṯeƹḏu ṯeȓtiyyam ḏ uzyen nni, yuḏef ḏaysen ijjen n buḥbeȓ zi Arebbi ḏi ȓechuḏ-a, kkaren bedden x iḍaren nsen. Yinni ṯen iẓrin ṯuḏef ḏaysen ṯiggwḏi ḏ ṯameqqrant.
Sȓin i yijjen n ṯmijja ṯejheḏ tȓaɣa-d xasen zeg ujenna ṯeqqar-asen: "Gaƹƹḏem-d ḏanita!" Ȓechuḏ nni gaƹƹḏen ɣar ujenna ḏeg useynu, ȓƹaḏyan nsen xzaren ḏaysen.
Ḏi ȓweqṯ nni iwqeƹ ijjen n zzinzal ḏ ameqqran, ṯnehḏem ƹecra ḏi miyya zi ṯendint. Mmuṯen ḏi zzinzal-a sebƹaȓaf n yiwḏan. Yinni iqqimen ggwḏen, bḏan semɣaren Arebbi ig iǧan ḏeg ujenna.
Ṯeƹḏu tamara wis ṯnayen, ṯenni wis ṯȓaṯa ƹȓayen aḏ d tas.
Ṯekkar lmalaʼika wis sebƹa ṯṣuḍ ḏi zzammar nnes, uca ṯimijjawin ḏeg ujenna qqarent s jjheḏ: "Iḏweȓ ȓeḥkam n ddunect-a ḏeg ifassen n Siḏi Arebbi nneɣ ḏ Lmasiḥ nnes, aḏ iḥkem i ȓebda n ȓebdaṯ."
Kkaren arbeƹa u ƹicrin nni imɣaren iy qqimen x lƹarcaṯ nsen zzaṯ i Arebbi, hwan x uɣembub nsen sejjḏen-as i Arebbi,
qqaren: "Netcekkar-icek a Siḏi Arebbi ig izemmaren i kuȓci, cek ig iǧan, cek iy tuɣa iǧan, ȓaḥeqqac ṯesxeḏmeḏ jjheḏ nnec, ṯebḏiḏ tḥekkmeḏ.

Ȓegnus ɣeḍben, yuweḍ-d uɣḍab nnec. Yuweḍ-d Nhar n Lḥisab ḏ Lƹiqab n yinni immuṯen. Aḏ tjaziḏ yinni ḏac ixeddmen iƹni lʼanbiya ḏ ȓmuminin nnec ṣṣaliḥin, ḏ yinni itweqqaren isem nnec s imezyanen ḏ imeqqranen. Aḏ teqḍiḏ x yinni isefsaḏen ṯamurṯ."
Ṯnurzem ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant n Arebbi ḏeg ujenna, imeḍhar-d tabut n ȓƹaheḏ n Arebbi ḏi ṯemziḏa nni. Iwqeƹ wassam ḏ iɣuyan ḏ wajjaj ḏ zzinzal ḏ icarra aṭṭas.
Ṯmeḍhar-d ijjen n lƹalama ḏeg ujenna ḏ ṯameqqrant, iƹni ṯamɣarṯ ṯenneḍ-as-d ṯfuct, swadday iḍaren nnes ṯaziri, x uzeǧif nnes ijjen n ttaj ḏayes ṯenƹac n yiṯran.
Aqat s uƹeddis ṯesɣuyiw s ȓeḥriq n ṯarwa, tƹeddab u nettaṯ tarew.
Ṯmeḍhar-d ḏeg ujenna ijjen n lƹalama nneɣni ṯegga am ddaynaṣur ḏ ameqqran ḏ azeggwaɣ ɣares sebƹa n izeǧifen ḏ ƹecra n waccawen, ḏ sebƹa n ttajaṯ x izeǧifen nnes.
Ijarr s uƹennab nnes tuluṯ n yiṯran ujenna, inḍar-iṯen ɣar ṯmurṯ. Ibedd bu-sebƹa-ya izeǧifen zzaṯ i ṯemɣarṯ nni u nettaṯ tarew ḥima xmi ṯ ɣa ṯarew aḏas icc mmis.
Ṯurew-d aḥenjir ḏ awṯem u ḏ netta iy ɣa yarewsen marra ȓegnus s uƹekkaz n ȓeḥḏiḏ. Ssenni itwarfaƹ ɣar Arebbi ɣar lƹarc nnes.
Ṯamɣarṯ-a ṯarweȓ ɣar ȓexȓa mani ḏas isewjeḏ Arebbi amcan at seccen ḏinni aȓaf u miyyatayen u settin yum.
Iwqeƹ ȓḥarb ḏeg ujenna. Mikaʼil ḏ lmalaʼikaṯ nnes ḥarben bu-sebƹa izeǧifen. Bu-sebƹa-ya izeǧifen ḏ ccayaṭin nnes ḥarben ƹaweḏ uȓa ḏ niṯni.
War ḏasent zemmaren i lmalaʼikaṯ nni, bu-sebƹa-ya izeǧifen ḏ ccayaṭin nnes ḍeyyƹen amcan nsen ḏeg ujenna.
Imenḍar-d zeg ujenna bu-sebƹa-ya izeǧifen ameqqran, iƹni fiɣer nni ḏi zman wenni umi qqaren Ibȓis niɣ ḏ Cciṭan iƹni wenni ixeddƹen marra ddunect. Imenḍar-d ɣar ṯmurṯ, menḍaren-d akiḏes ccayaṭin nnes.

Sȓiɣ i yijjen n ṯmijja ḏeg ujenna ṯeqqar s jjheḏ: "Ȓexxu Arebbi nneɣ isenjam, imeḍhar-d jjheḏ ḏ ȓmulk nnes, ḏ ssulṭa n Lmasiḥ nnes. Ȓaḥeqqac wenni iceṯcan zeg ayṯmaṯneɣ imenḍar-d ɣar ṯmurṯ, ḏ netta ig iceṯcan zzaysen ǧiȓeṯ ḏ nhar ɣar Arebbi nneɣ.
Ɣeȓben-ṯ ayṯmaṯneɣ s iḏammen n Yizmar ḏ chaḏeṯ nsen. Ṯuḏarṯ nsen war xasen ṯƹizz ca, wejḏen aḏ mmṯen.
X manaya, fareḥ ay Ajenna, ḏ yinni ḏayes izeddɣen! Walakin ya tamara x imezḏaɣ n ȓbarr ḏ ȓebḥar! Ibȓis ihwa-d ɣarwem iɣḍeb aṭṭas, minzi issen ṯeqqim-as ḏrus n ȓweqṯ."
Wami bu-sebƹa izeǧifen yufa ixef nnes imenḍar-d ɣar ṯmurṯ, ikkar yuzzeȓ x ṯemɣarṯ nni iy d ijjin awṯem.
Ṯamɣarṯ nni mmucen-as ṯnayen n wafriwen n nser ameqqran ḥima azzaysen ṯḍew ɣar ȓexȓa ɣar umcan nnes, mani ɣa twaƹṯeq ṯeȓt-snin ḏ uzyen ḏi ȓaman zeg ufiɣer nni.
Isufeɣ-d ufiɣer zeg uqemmum nnes aman amecnaw iɣzar tazzȓen x ṯemɣarṯ ḥima at awin waman nni.
Walakin ṯamurṯ ṯsenjem ṯamɣarṯ nni, ṯerzem aqemmum nnes ṯseɣȓi iɣzar iy d isufeɣ bu-sebƹa izeǧifen zeg uqemmum nnes.
Iɣḍeb bu-sebƹa izeǧifen x ṯemɣarṯ nni iruḥ aḏ iḥareb s min iqqimen zi ddurriṯ nnes, iƹni yinni iteggen array s ȓuṣiyaṯ n Arebbi teṭṭfen x minxef icheḏ Ƹisa.
Ṯumma ibedd x yijḏi n ȓebḥar.
Ẓriɣ ijjen n ȓwaḥc iffeɣ-d zi ȓebḥar, ɣares sebƹa n iqeyyuƹen ḏ ƹecra n waccawen, x waccawen nnes ƹecra n ttajaṯ. Urin x iqeyyuƹen nnes isemawen war iḥȓin x Arebbi.

Ȓwaḥc-a iy ẓriɣ itcabbah ḏeg uɣiȓas, iḍaren nnes ggin am iḍaren n ddub, aqemmum nnes igga am uqemmum n ssbaƹ. Wenni iǧan am ddaynaṣur yuca-as i ȓwaḥc-a jjheḏ nnes ḏ lƹarc nnes ḏ ijjen n ssulṭa ṯemɣar.
Ijjen zeg iqeyyuƹen nnes iḍhar-d ḏayes ij ujarriḥ axmi immuṯ, walakin igenfa zeg ujarriḥ nni n ȓmewṯ. U marra imezḏaɣ n ṯmurṯ tƹejjben, ḏeffaren ȓwaḥc-a.
Sejjḏen-as yiwḏan i wenni iggin am ddaynaṣur ȓaḥeqqac yuca-as i ȓwaḥc-a ssulṭa nnes. Ƹaweḏ sejjḏen-as i ȓwaḥc-a nnan: "Uw ɣa yiȓin am ȓwaḥc-a? Ug izemmaren aṯ iḥareb?"
Immuc-as uqemmum i ȓwaḥc-a iy zi ɣa issiweȓ s ttakebbur ḏ wawaȓ war iḥȓin x Arebbi. Ṯemmuc-as ssulṭa iy zi ɣa ixḏem ṯnayen u arbeƹin n churaṯ.
Ibḏa issawaȓ s wawaȓ war iḥȓin x Arebbi, iƹni s wawaȓ war iḥȓin x yisem nnes ḏ ṯzeddiɣṯ nnes ḏ imezḏaɣ ujenna.
Itwasmeḥ-as aḏ iḥareb ȓmuminin ṣṣaliḥin, aṯen iɣȓeb. Ṯemmuc-as ssulṭa x kuȓ ȓqum ḏ ccaƹb ḏ lluɣa ḏ ȓgens.
Marra imezḏaɣ n ṯmurṯ aḏas sejjḏen i ȓwaḥc-a, iƹni kuȓ ijjen zzaysen isem nnes war izemmem ca ḏi Lkitab n Ṯuḏarṯ zeg wami ṯeǧa ddunect-a, iƹni ḏi Lkitab n Yizmar itwanɣen.
Ṣenneṭ mliḥ a wenni itsȓan.
Wenni minxef yura aḏ itwaḥebbes, ataf aḏ itwaḥebbes. Wenni minxef yura aḏ itwaneɣ s ssif, ataf aḏ itwaneɣ s ssif. Ḏi lḥala nni itxeṣṣa ȓmuminin ṣṣaliḥin aḏ ṣbaren aḏ amnen.
Ẓriɣ ijjen n ȓwaḥc nneɣni iffeɣ-d zi ṯmurṯ, ɣares ṯnayen n waccawen am waccawen n yizmar walakin netta issaweȓ am ddaynaṣur.
Isexḏem marra ssulṭa n ȓwaḥc amezwaru u netta aqaṯ zzaṯes. Yarra marra ṯamurṯ ḏ imezḏaɣ nnes aḏas sejjḏen i ȓwaḥc nni amezwaru iy igenfan zeg ujarriḥ nni n ȓmewṯ.
Igga lmuƹjizaṯ ḏ ṯimeqqranin, ishewwa-d ṯimessi zeg ujenna ɣar ṯmurṯ zzaṯ i yiwḏan.
Ixeddeƹ imezḏaɣ n ṯmurṯ s lmuƹjizaṯ nni iy ḏas itwasemḥen aṯent igg zzaṯ i ȓwaḥc amezwaru. Yumar imezḏaɣ n ṯmurṯ aḏ ṣenƹen ijjen n lʼaṣnam am ȓwaḥc nni iy ḏi iǧa ujarriḥ n ssif walakin netta iddar.
Itwasmeḥ-as aḏ igg buḥbeȓ ḏi lʼaṣnam-a itwaṣenƹen x ṣṣifeṯ n ȓwaḥc amezwaru ḥima aḏ issiweȓ aḏ ineɣ marra yinni war isejjḏen ca i lʼaṣnam-a am ȓwaḥc nni.
Igga bezzez x marra iwḏan s imeqqranen ḏ imezyanen, ḏ twajar ḏ imesƹan, ḏ yinni ɣarsen bab nsen ḏ yinni ɣarsen lḥurriya nsen aḏ ggen ijjen n ṭṭabaƹ x ufus afusi nsen niɣ x ṯenyarṯ nsen.
Uȓa ḏ ijjen war izemmar aḏ iseɣ niɣ aḏ izzenz illa wenni ɣar iǧa ṭṭabaƹ nni, iƹni isem n ȓwaḥc nni niɣ ḏ rraqem n yisem nnes.
Ḏi manaya txeṣṣa ȓefhameṯ. Wenni ɣar iǧa ȓaƹqeȓ aḏ irzu x ȓmaƹna n rraqem n ȓwaḥc-a ȓaḥeqqac netta ḏ rraqem n yijjen n bnaḏem. Rraqem nni netta ḏ settmiyya u setta u settin.
Wami xzareɣ, twaȓiɣ Izmar ibedd x uḏrar n Lquds akiḏes miyya u arbeƹa u arbeƹin aȓaf. Yura x ṯenyarṯ nsen isem n Yizmar ḏ yisem n Babas.
Sȓiɣ i yijjen n ṯmijja zeg ujenna ṯegga am ṣṣut n waṭṭas n waman niɣ am wajjaj ijehḏen. Ƹaweḏ ṯmijja nni umi sȓiɣ ṯegga am ṣṣut n yinni iccaṯen ḏi ṯgambrit.
Tɣennajen ijjen n yizȓi ḏ jḏiḏ zzaṯ i lƹarc ḏ arbeƹa nni n lmexluqaṯ ḏ imɣaren. War izemmar uȓa ḏ ijjen aḏ iȓmeḏ izȓi nni illa ḏ miyya u arbeƹa u arbeƹin aȓaf nni iy itwasnejmen zi ddunect-a.
Yina ḏ yinni war iẓrin ƹemmarṣ ṯimɣarin qqimen ḏ iƹzriyen. Yina ḏ yinni iḏeffaren Izmar mani ma iruḥ. Twasnejmen niṯni zi ȓwesṭ n yiwḏan ḥima aḏ twaqeddmen ḏ imezwura i Arebbi ḏ Yizmar.
Ƹemmarṣ war sxerriqen, niṯni aqaṯen bȓa ȓƹib.
Ẓriɣ ijjen n lmalaʼika nneɣni ṯeṭṭaw ḏi ȓwesṭ n ujenna. Ɣares Lʼinjil war ifennin aḏ tbeccar zzayes imezḏaɣ n ṯmurṯ zi mkuȓ ȓgens ḏ ȓqum ḏ lluɣa ḏ ccaƹb.
Ṯeqqar s jjheḏ: "Ggwḏem Arebbi semɣarem-ṯ, aqa ṯuweḍ-d ṯsaƹƹat nnes aḏ igg lḥisab ḏ lƹiqab. Sejjḏeṯ i wenni iy d ixeȓqen ajenna ḏ ṯmurṯ ḏ ȓebḥar ḏ ȓaƹnaṣer."
Ṯekkar ṯeḏfar-it ijjen n lmalaʼika nneɣni wis ṯnayen ṯeqqar: "Qa ṯewḍa qa ṯewḍa ṯendint n Babil ṯameqqrant ṯenni ig isesswen marra ȓegnus s waman nnes n uḍiȓ, iƹni lfasad nnes ameqqran."
Ṯekkar ṯeḏfar-iṯent ijjen n lmalaʼika nneɣni wis ṯȓaṯa ṯeqqar s jjheḏ: "Wenni ɣa isejjḏen i ȓwaḥc ḏ lʼaṣnam nnes, iqbeȓ ƹaweḏ ṭṭabaƹ x ṯenyarṯ nnes niɣ x ufus nnes,
ataf aḏ isew zeg waman uḍiȓ iqesḥen ig iǧan ḏ aɣḍab n Arebbi iƹni ḏ ȓkas n lƹiqab nnes. Aḏ iƹeddeb s ṯmessi ḏ ȓekbriyeṯ zzaṯ i lmalaʼikaṯ iṣfan ḏ Yizmar.
Ddexxan n ȓaƹḏab nsen itgaƹƹaḏ i ȓebda n ȓebdaṯ. Yinni isejjḏen i ȓwaḥc ḏ lʼaṣnam nnes qebȓen ƹaweḏ ṭṭabaƹ n yisem nnes ataf war ɣarsen itiȓi bu arraḥeṯ s ǧiȓeṯ niɣ ḏ nhar."
Ḏi lḥala nni itxeṣṣa-yasen i ȓmuminin ṣṣaliḥin aḏ ṣbaren aḏ ggen array s ȓuṣiyaṯ n Arebbi aḏ amnen zi Ƹisa.

Sȓiɣ i yijjen n ṯmijja zeg ujenna ṯeqqar: "Ari manaya: Ssaƹḏ n imettinen iy ɣa immṯen ssa aȓ ṯsawent umnen zi Siḏiṯneɣ." Arruḥ n Arebbi iqqar: "Wah, ḥima aḏ reyyḥen zi tamara nsen ȓaḥeqqac ḏeffarent-ṯen lḥasanaṯ nsen."
Wami xzareɣ, twaȓiɣ ijjen n useynu ḏ acemȓaȓ, wenni xas iqqimen itcabbah ḏi mmis n bnaḏem, x uzeǧif nnes ijjen n ttaj n ddheb, ḏeg ufus nnes ijjen n umjar iqḍeƹ.
Ikkar iffeɣ-d ijjen n lmalak nneɣni zi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant, iqqar-as s jjheḏ i wenni iqqimen x useynu: "Ysi amjar nnec, mjar. Aqa ṯsaƹƹat n umjar ṯuweḍ-d, ṯafeǧaḥṯ n ṯmurṯ qa ṯewjeḏ."
Wenni iqqimen x useynu yuwṯa s umjar x ṯmurṯ, ṯemjar ṯfeǧaḥṯ nnes.
Ikkar iffeɣ-d ijjen n lmalak nneɣni zi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant iǧan ḏeg ujenna, uȓa ḏ netta ɣares ijjen n umjar iqḍeƹ.

Ikkar iffeɣ-d ijjen n lmalak nneɣni zi ȓmeḏbaḥ n ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant ɣares ssulṭa x ṯmessi, iȓaɣa s jjheḏ inna-as i lmalak nni ɣar iǧa umjar iqḍeƹ: "Ysi amjar nnec, jmeƹ-d zzayes izekkunen n ṯzayarṯ n ṯmurṯ ȓaḥeqqac aḍiȓ ṯuweḍ-d ȓweqṯ nnes."
Lmalak nni yuwṯa s umjar nnes x ṯmurṯ, ijmeƹ-d izekkunen n uḍiȓ n ṯmurṯ inḍar-iṯen ḏi ṯsirṯ ṯameqqrant iy iǧan n uɣḍab n Arebbi.
Ƹeffsent ḏi ṯsirṯ n uḍiȓ barra i ṯendint. Ḥemȓen-d zzayes iḏammen ar wami d yuwḍen ɣar sȓimeṯ n uyis, uyuren iḏammen nni can ṯeȓtmiyyat kilumit.
Ẓriɣ ijjen n lƹalama nneɣni ḏ ṯameqqrant ḏeg ujenna isḏehhacen, iƹni sebƹa n lmalaʼikaṯ ɣarsent sebƹa n lmuṣibaṯ ṯineggura, zzaysent iy ɣa itwakemmeȓ uɣḍab n Arebbi.
Ẓriɣ ƹaweḏ amecnaw ȓebḥar n jjaj ixelleṭ ak ṯmessi, bedden xas yinni iɣeȓben ȓwaḥc ḏ lʼaṣnam nnes ḏ rraqem n yisem nnes. Kuȓ ijjen zzaysen ikessi ijjen n ṯgambrit n Arebbi.

Tɣennajen s yizȓi n Musa ȓƹabḏ n Arebbi ḏ yizȓi n Yizmar qqaren: "Ȓexḏayem nnec ḏ ṯimeqqranin isḏehhacen, A Siḏi Arebbi nneɣ i kuȓci iy izemmaren. Ibriḏen nnec ḏ ȓḥaqq ḏ nican ig iǧan, Ay azeǧiḏ n ȓegnus n yiwḏan.
A Siḏi, min ƹnan yinni war c iteggwḏen? Min ƹnan yinni isem nnec war ṯ isemɣaren? Aqa cek waḥḏec ig iṣfan. Marra ȓegnus aḏ d asen aḏac sejjḏen, minzi ȓexḏayem nnec banent-id nican."
Menbaƹd i manaya ẓriɣ ṯamziḏa ṯameqqrant iƹni aqiḍun n chaḏeṯ inurzem ḏeg ujenna.
Ffɣent-id zzayes sebƹa-ya n lmalaʼikaṯ ɣarsent lmuṣibaṯ nni s sebƹa. Ggint arruḍ n ȓkettan n lulan iṣfan iȓeqqen, kuȓ icten zzaysent ɣares aḥezzam n ddheb iqḍeƹ-d zeg uɣiȓ ɣar nneṣṣ.
Ijjen zi arbeƹa n lmexluqaṯ yuca-asent i sebƹa nni n lmalaʼikaṯ sebƹa n ṯmejmarin ggin-ṯent s ddheb, ƹemmarent s uɣḍab n Arebbi iddaren i ȓebda n ȓebdaṯ.

Uca ṯamziḏa ṯameqqrant ṯƹemmar s ddexxan n lƹaḍama n Arebbi ḏ jjheḏ nnes. War izemmar ḥadd aḏ yaḏef ɣar ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant ḥetta aȓ ɣa kemmȓent sebƹa-ya n lmuṣibaṯ iy d ɣa sehwant sebƹa n lmalaʼikaṯ nni.
Sȓiɣ i yijjen n ṯmijja ṯendeq-d zi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant ṯeqqar-asent i sebƹa nni n lmalaʼikaṯ s jjheḏ: "Ruḥent zeǧƹent sebƹa n ṯmejmarin n uɣḍab n Arebbi x ṯmurṯ."
Ṯekkar ṯeffeɣ-d lmalaʼika ṯamezwarut ṯzeǧeƹ ṯimejmarṯ nnes x ṯmurṯ ffɣent-id ṯḥebba ḏ ṯiƹeffanin ṯinni iy teggent ȓeḥriq ȓeqfent iwḏan nni iy ḏi iǧa ṭṭabaƹ n ȓwaḥc tsejjaḏen i lʼaṣnam nnes.
Ṯekkar lmalaʼika wis ṯnayen ṯzeǧeƹ ṯimejmarṯ nnes ḏi ȓebḥar, ȓebḥar iḏweȓ ḏ iḏammen am iḏammen n wenni immuṯen, min iddaren ḏi ȓebḥar qaƹ immuṯ.
Ṯekkar lmalaʼika wis tȓaṯa ṯzeǧeƹ ṯimejmarṯ nnes x iɣezran ḏ ȓaƹnaṣer n waman ḏewȓen ḏ iḏammen.
Sȓiɣ i lmalaʼika n waman ṯeqqar: "Cek aqac nican ḏi ȓeḥkamaṯ nnec ḏ cek ḏ Lƹaḍim. Ḏ cek ḏ wenni ig iǧan, tuɣa ṯeǧiḏ.
Aqa wami sizzȓen iḏammen n ȓmuminin ṣṣaliḥin ḏ lʼanbiya, ṯuciḏ-asen aḏ swen iḏammen uȓa ḏ niṯni ȓaḥeqqac sḏaheǧen manayenni."
Sȓiɣ i yijjen n ṣṣut iqqar-d zi ȓmeḏbaḥ: "Wah a Siḏi Arebbi nneɣ ig izemmaren i kuȓci, ȓeḥkamaṯ nnec ḏ ȓḥaqq, aqaṯent nican."
Ṯekkar lmalaʼika wis arbeƹa ṯzeǧeƹ ṯimejmarṯ nnes x ṯfuct itwasmeḥ-as i ṯfuct aḏ tsecmeḍ iwḏan s ṯmessi.
Cemḍen yiwḏan s lḥarara ijehḏen. Waxxa amenni qqaren awaȓen war iḥȓin ḏeg yisem n Arebbi wenni ɣar ṯeǧa ssulṭa x lmuṣibaṯ-a. War tuben ca, war ṯ semɣaren ca.
Ṯekkar lmalaʼika wis xemsa ṯzeǧeƹ ṯimejmarṯ nnes x lƹarc n ȓwaḥc ṯehwa-d ṯaǧesṯ x lmemlaka nnes. Iwḏan tɣeẓẓaẓen iȓesawen nsen s ȓeḥriq.
Ƹlaḥsab ȓeḥriq ḏ ṯḥebba iy ḏaysen niṯni qqaren awaȓen war iḥȓin x Arebbi iǧan ḏeg ujenna, war tuben ca zi ȓefƹayeȓ nsen.
Ṯekkar lmalaʼika wis setta ṯzeǧeƹ ṯimejmarṯ nnes x yiɣzar n Lfurat ameqqran uzɣen waman iy ḏayes, ḥima aḏ itwassewjeḏ ubriḏ i izeǧiḏen n ccarq.
Ẓriɣ ṯȓaṯa n jnun iƹeffanen ggin am ijerwan: ijjen iteffeɣ-d zeg uqemmum n wenni am ddaynaṣur; ijjen iteffeɣ-d zeg uqemmum n ȓwaḥc; ijjen iteffeɣ-d zeg uqemmum n wenni itarran ixef nnes ḏ nnabi.
Yina ḏ arruḥaṯ n ccayaṭin teggen lmuƹjizaṯ zaƹma. Traḥen ɣar izeǧiḏen n ṯmurṯ marra ḥima aṯen smunen i ȓḥarb ḏi Nhar nni ameqqran n Arebbi ig izemmaren i kuȓci.
("Ṣennṭeṯ, qa nec aḏ d aseɣ am d yusa ij uceffar. Ssaƹḏ n wenni iy ɣa yiȓin ƹlabal aḏ iḥḍa arruḍ nnes ḥima war iggur ca ḏ aƹeryan aḏ ẓren yiwḏan ṯuƹaryant nnes.")
Smunen-ṯen ɣar yijjen n umcan s lƹibriya qqaren-as <Harmagidun.>
Ṯekkar lmalaʼika wis sebƹa ṯzeǧeƹ ṯimejmarṯ nnes ḏi lhawa sȓiɣ i yijjen n ṯmijja zi ṯemziḏa ṯameqqrant iy d ikkin zi lƹarc ṯeqqar s jjheḏ: "Ṣafi, itwakemmeȓ!"
Iwqeƹ wassam ḏ iɣuyan ḏ wajjaj ḏ zzinzal ijheḏ. Ƹemmarṣ war iwqiƹ am zzinzal-a ijehḏen zeg wami iǧa bnaḏem x ṯmurṯ.
Ṯceqq ṯendint ṯameqqrant x tȓaṯa, nheḏment ṯneddam n ȓegnus. War ittu ca Arebbi ṯandint n Babil ṯameqqrant, fa innama yuca-as aḏ tsew zi ȓkas n waman uḍiȓ iƹni lƹiqab nnes ameqqran.
Kuȓ ṯayzirṯ ṯenhezz, fsin iḏurar.
Iwḍa-d icarra ḏ ameqqran zeg ujenna x yiwḏan, kuȓ abquq iwezzen azyen uqendar. Iwḏan qqaren awaȓen war iḥȓin x Arebbi x ssabab n lmuṣiba-ya n icarra ȓaḥeqqac lmuṣiba-ya ḏ ṯameqqrant aṭṭas.
Yusa-d ɣari ijjen zi sebƹa n lmalaʼikaṯ nni iy ɣar ǧant sebƹa n ṯmejmarin inna-ayi: "Araḥ-d, aḏac d smeḍhareɣ lḥisab ḏ lƹiqab n lfasda ṯameqqrant ig iqqimen x waṭṭas n waman.
Fesḏen akiḏes izeǧiḏen n ṯmurṯ u ƹaweḏ imezḏaɣ n ṯmurṯ skaren s waman uḍiȓ iƹni lfasad nnes."
Lmalak nni iysi-ayi arruḥ ɣar ȓexȓa, ẓriɣ ijjen n ṯemɣarṯ ṯenya x yijjen n ȓwaḥc ḏ azeggwaɣ iḥeḏqen iƹemmar s yisemawen war iḥȓin x Arebbi. Ɣares sebƹa n iqeyyuƹen ḏ ƹecra n waccawen.
Ṯamɣarṯ-a ṯegga arruḍ ḏ gruna ḏ uzeggwaɣ iḥeḏqen. Ṯzewweq s ddheb ṯegga ṯiƹeqqayin iy iɣȓan ḏ jjuwhar. Ḏeg ufus nnes ijjen n ȓkas n ddheb iƹemmar s ṯuƹuffna ḏ min iǧan ḥram n lfasad nnes.
X ṯenyarṯ nnes yura ḏinni ijjen n yisem: Babil Ṯameqqrant, ḏ yemmaṯsent n lfasdaṯ ḏ ṯuƹuffna n ṯmurṯ. Walakin ȓmaƹna nnes war ṯ ifehhem ḥadd.
Ẓriɣ ṯamɣarṯ nni ṯsekkar s iḏammen n ȓmuminin ṣṣaliḥin ḏ iḏammen n yinni icehhḏen x Ƹisa. Wami t ẓriɣ ḏehceɣ aṭṭas.
Inna-ayi lmalak nni: "Mayemmi ṯḏehhaceḏ ammu? Aḏac cerrḥeɣ ȓmaƹna inuffaren n ṯemɣarṯ nni ḏ ȓmaƹna inuffaren n ȓwaḥc nni wenni ɣar iǧa sebƹa n iqeyyuƹen ḏ ƹecra n waccawen iy xef ṯenya.

Ȓwaḥc nni iy ṯeẓriḏ tuɣa iǧa, ȓexxu war iǧi ca, ƹȓayen aḏ d igaƹƹeḏ zi ȓaǧeɣ bȓa ȓaḥedd aḏ itwahḏem. Imezḏaɣ n ṯmurṯ xmi ɣa ẓren ȓwaḥc nni ataf aḏ dehcen iƹni kuȓ ijjen isem nnes war izemmem ca zeg wami ṯeǧa ddunect ḏi Lkitab n Ṯuḏarṯ. Ȓaḥeqqac ȓwaḥc nni tuɣa iǧa, ȓexxu war iǧi ca, ƹaḏ aḏ d yas.
Ḏi manaya labud ȓefhameṯ: Sebƹa n iqeyyuƹen niṯni ḏ sebƹa n iḏurar iy xef ṯeqqim ṯemɣarṯ-a, u ƹaweḏ niṯni ḏ sebƹa n izeǧiḏen.
Xemsa zzaysen wḍan, ijjen iǧa, ijjen ƹaḏ war d yusi ca. Xmi d ɣa yas ataf aḏ iqqim ɣir cwayt n ȓweqṯ waha.
Ȓwaḥc nni iy tuɣa iǧan, ȓexxu war iǧi ca, netta ḏ wis ṯmenya netta ƹaweḏ ḏ ijjen zi sebƹa nni qa iggur aḏ itwahḏem.
Ƹecra nni n waccawen iy ṯeẓriḏ niṯni ḏ ƹecra n izeǧiḏen ƹaḏ war ḏasen ṯemmuc ca ssulṭa aḏ ḥekmen. Aḏasen ṯemmuc ssulṭa aḏ ḥekmen ijjen n ȓweqṯ ḏ ṯamezyant waha ak ȓwaḥc.
Yina tafaqen aḏas ucen i ȓwaḥc jjheḏ nsen ḏ ssulṭa nsen.
Niṯni aḏ ḥarben Izmar walakin netta aṯen iɣȓeb; Qa netta ḏ Mawlana n mawlanaṯ ḏ Azeǧiḏ n izeǧiḏen, yinni iy kiḏes iǧan iȓaɣa-yasen-d Arebbi ixḍar-iṯen, ḏaysen iǧa ȓaman."
Inna-ayi lmalak nni: "Aman nni iy ṯeẓriḏ mani ṯeqqim lfasda nni, niṯni min ƹnan? Niṯni ḏ iwḏan zi mkuȓ ccaƹb ḏ ȓɣaci ḏ ȓgens ḏ lluɣa.
Ƹecra n waccawen nni iy ṯeẓriḏ u ḏ ȓwaḥc nni aḏ ƹiffen lfasda, aḏas kksen marra min ɣares at jjen ḏ ṯaƹeryant. Aḏ ccen aysum nnes, at sḥerqen s ṯmessi.
Ȓaḥeqqac ḏ Arebbi ig ismunen uȓawen nsen ḥima aḏas ggen ȓxaḍar i Arebbi, iƹni aḏ tafqen aḏas ucen i ȓwaḥc ȓeḥkam nsen ḥetta aȓ iy ɣa twakemmȓen wawaȓen n Arebbi.
Ṯamɣarṯ nni iy ṯeẓriḏ nettaṯ ḏ ṯandint ṯameqqrant ig iteḥkamen x izeǧiḏen n ṯmurṯ."
Menbaƹd i manaya ẓriɣ ijjen n lmalak nneɣni ihwa-d zeg ujenna ɣares ssulṭa ḏ ṯameqqrant. Ṯceƹceƹ ṯmurṯ s nnur n lƹaḍama n lmalak nni.
Isnekkar ṯɣuyyeṯ s jjheḏ inna: "Qa ṯewḍa qa ṯewḍa Babil ṯameqqrant! Ṯeḏweȓ ḏ ṯazeddiɣṯ n ccayaṭin, ḏ ṯanwaȓṯ i mkuȓ jjenn aƹeffan, ḏ axbuc i mkuȓ ajḍiḍ ig iǧan ḥram ig iƹiffen.
Ȓaḥeqqac marra ȓegnus swin zeg waman n uḍiȓ n lfasad nnes war iḥȓi, fesḏen akiḏes izeǧiḏen n ṯmurṯ. Isebbaben n ṯmurṯ uwin-d aṭṭas n wagȓa zeg ufelles nnes ameqqran."
Sȓiɣ i yijjen n ṯmijja nneɣni zeg ujenna ṯeqqar: "Ffɣem zi ṯendint nni ya ccaƹb inu ḥima war ṯcarrcem ca ḏi ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nnes, ḥima war kenniw teȓqifent ca lmuṣibaṯ nnes.
Ȓmuƹṣiyaṯ nnes arnint ḥetta aȓ wami uwḍent ɣar ujenna, Arebbi war ittu ca ccarr nnes.
Arrem-as min ḏawem ṯegga nettaṯ, dublam-as ṯnayen n ṯwaȓaṯin ȓefƹayeȓ nnes. Ȓkas nni iy zi ṯsessew i yiwḏan, sesswem-as-ṯ marrṯayen.

Mecḥaȓ ma ṯsemɣer ixef nnes, mecḥaȓ ma ṯƹic ḏi ccehweṯ nnes, anectenni iy t ɣa ṯƹeddbem, anectenni iy t ɣa ṯesxeyyqem. Liʼanna nettaṯ ṯeqqar ḏeg wuȓ nnes: Aqa qqimeɣ ḏa am lmalika, nec war ǧiɣ ca ḏ ṯajjaȓṯ, ƹemmarṣ aḏ ḥezneɣ.
X manaya axas d munent ȓmuṣibaṯ ḏeg yijjen n nhar, iƹni ȓmewṯ ḏ lḥuzen ḏ buheyyuf. Aḏ teḥreq s ṯmessi ȓaḥeqqac Siḏi Arebbi iy xas ɣa iḥekmen netta ijheḏ.
Izeǧiḏen n ṯmurṯ iy kiḏes ifessḏen iy kiḏes itƹicen ḏi ccehweṯ nnes, axas run axas ḥeznen xmi ɣa ẓren ddexxan n ṯmessi nnes.
Aḏ bedden ɣar ȓeggwaj s ṯiggwḏi n ȓaƹḏab nnes niṯni qqaren: Ya Laṭif, ya Laṭif! Ya ṯandint ṯameqqrant, ya Babil ṯandint ijehḏen! Ḏeg yijjen n ṯsaƹƹat ihwa-d xam lḥisab ḏ lƹiqab!
Isebbaben n ṯmurṯ axas run axas ḥeznen ȓaḥeqqac sseȓƹaṯ nsen war tifen wi t ɣa isɣen.

Sseȓƹaṯ nni n ddheb, ḏ nnuqarṯ, ḏ lwiz, ḏ jjuwhar, ḏ ȓkettan n lulan aṣebḥan, ḏ ȓkettan gruna, ḏ ȓeḥrir, ḏ ȓkettan azeggwaɣ iḥeḏqen, ḏ marra min itwaṣennƹen s ukeccuḍ n umeḍzi, ḏ marra min itwaṣennƹen s iɣemmuzen n lfil, ḏ marra min itwaṣennƹen s ukeccuḍ iɣran, ḏ nneḥḥas, ḏ ȓeḥḏiḏ, ḏ marmu,
ḏ ȓqarfa, ḏ lƹiṭar, ḏ tbaxur, ḏ murr, ḏ tbaxur lluban, ḏ waman n uḍiȓ, ḏ zzect, ḏ waren lfurs, ḏ yirḏan, ḏ ifunasen, ḏ iḥuȓiyen, ḏ yiysan, ḏ ikarruṯen, ḏ isemɣan iƹni yiwḏan.
Aḏas inin isebbaben: Min ṯƹecceq ccehweṯ nnem war ṯ tifeḏ ca. Marra agȓa ḏ ȓxir nnem aḏ iqḍa, ƹemmarṣ aḏ d iḏweȓ.
Isebbaben nni iy kiḏes ggin agȓa s sseȓƹaṯ nni aḏ bedden ɣar ȓeggwaj s ṯiggwḏi zi ȓaƹḏab nni, aḏ run aḏ ḥeznen.
Aḏ inin: Ya Laṭif, ya Laṭif! Qa ṯandint-a ṯameqqrant, tuɣa xas ȓkettan n lulan aṣebḥan ḏ ȓkettan gruna ḏ ȓkettan azeggwaɣ iḥeḏqen, ṯzewweq ixef nnes s ddheb ṯegga lwiz ḏ jjuwhar!
Iruḥ marra manayenni ḏeg yijjen n ṯsaƹƹat waha! Arruyas n iɣarruba ḏ yinni itsafaren ḏeg uɣarrabu ḏ ibeḥriyen ḏ marra yinni itƹicen zi ȓebḥar bedden ɣar ȓeggwaj,
xzaren ɣar ddexxan n uḥraq nnes. Qqaren s jjheḏ: Man ṯandint ig iǧan nettaṯ am ṯendint-a ṯameqqrant?

Neṭṭaren caȓ x izeǧifen nsen, sɣuyiwen, trun, ḥezznen, qqaren: Ya Laṭif, ya Laṭif n ṯendint ṯameqqrant! Ayṯbab n iɣarruba ḏi ȓebḥar tuɣa ḏewȓen ḏ twajar liʼanna ṯandint ḏayes agȓa aṭṭas! Ḏeg yijjen n ṯsaƹƹat kuȓci iruḥ!
Ay ajenna, fareḥ x uhḏam nnes. Farḥem a ȓmuminin ṣṣaliḥin ḏ arrusul ḏ lʼanbiya! Aqa iḥaseb-it Arebbi x min ḏawem ṯegga."
Ijjen n lmalak ijheḏ iysi-d ijjen n uzru igga am uzru n ṯsirṯ ṯameqqrant, inḍar-iṯ ḏi ȓebḥar inna: "Ammu s jjheḏ iy ɣa ṯmenḍar Babil ṯandint ṯameqqrant, war itiȓi ca ƹemmarṣ.

Zi ssa aȓ ṯsawent ƹemmarṣ aḏayem tesȓan i ṣṣut n imeḏyazen ḏ yinni iccaṯen ḏi ṯgambrit ḏ yinni itṣuḍen ḏi zzammar ḏ ṯemja. Ƹemmarṣ aḏayem yiȓin yinni itṣennaƹen mammec ma ṯegga ṣṣenƹaṯ nsen. Ƹemmarṣ aḏayem tesȓan i ṣṣut n ṯsirṯ.
Ƹemmarṣ aḏayem ṯceƹƹeȓ ṯfawṯ n ȓqendiȓ. Ƹemmarṣ aḏayem tesȓan i ṣṣut n muȓay ḏ ṯsȓiṯ. Aqa isebbaben nnem tuɣa ǧan ḏ imeqqranen n ṯmurṯ, s ssiḥer nnem ṯxeḏƹeḏ marra ȓegnus.
Iwa ḏi ṯendint-a ig ufin iḏammen n lʼanbiya ḏ ȓmuminin ṣṣaliḥin ḏ marra yinni itwanɣen ḏi ṯmurṯ."
Menbaƹd i manaya sȓiɣ i yijjen n ṯmijja amecnaw ṣṣut n waṭṭas n yiwḏan iǧan ḏeg ujenna, ṯeqqar s jjheḏ: "Ḥemḏeṯ Arebbi! Asenjem ḏ lƹaḍama ḏ jjheḏ i Arebbi nneɣ.
Ȓeḥkam nnes ḏ ȓḥaqq iǧa nican. Iḥaseb lfasda ṯameqqrant ig isefsaḏen ṯamurṯ s lfasad nnes, intaqem zzayes ƹlaḥsab iḏammen n yinni iƹebbḏen Arebbi."
Nnan ṯwara wis ṯnayen: "Ḥemḏeṯ Arebbi! Ddexxan nnes itgaƹƹaḏ i ȓebda n ȓebdaṯ."
Arbeƹa u ƹicrin n imɣaren ḏ arbeƹa n lmexluqaṯ sejjḏen i Arebbi iqqimen x lƹarc, qqaren: "Amin! Ḥemḏeṯ Arebbi!"
Ṯusa-d ijjen n ṯmijja zi lƹarc ṯeqqar: "Ḥemḏeṯ Arebbi ya lƹibad nnes marra, a yinni ṯ iteggwḏen s umezyan ḏ umeqqran!"
Sȓiɣ i yijjen n ṣṣut am ṣṣut n waṭṭas n ȓɣaci niɣ am ṣṣut n waṭṭas n waman niɣ am ṣṣut n wajjaj ijehḏen, iqqar: "Ḥemḏeṯ Arebbi! Siḏi Arebbi nneɣ ig izemmaren i kuȓci qa iḥekkem.
Yallahem a nfarḥeṯ, a nezhuṯ, aṯ nsemɣareṯ! Ȓfarḥ n Yizmar aqa yuweḍ-d, ṯasȓiṯ nnes qa ṯsewjeḏ ixef nnes.
Immuc-as axas ṯegg ȓkettan n lulan aṣebḥan, ireqq, iṣfa." (Ȓkettan n lulan aṣebḥan iƹni netta ḏ ȓexḏayem ig iǧan nican n ȓmuminin ṣṣaliḥin.)
Inna-ayi lmalak wenni: "Ari manaya: Ssaƹḏ n yinni itwaƹarḍen ɣar umensi n ȓfarḥ n Yizmar!" Inna-ayi ƹaweḏ: "Awaȓen-a ǧan ḏ ṣṣaḥ zi Arebbi."

Uḍiɣ-as ɣar iḍaren nnes ḥima aḏas sejjḏeɣ. Indeq-d inna-ayi: "Lla! Qa nec ḏ ȓƹabḏ am nec am cek am ayṯmac iy ṭṭfen x minxef icheḏ Ƹisa. Sejjeḏ-as i Arebbi! Ȓaḥeqqac minxef icheḏ Ƹisa netta ḏ arruḥ n l'anbiya."
Ẓriɣ ajenna inurzem ḏinni ijjen n uyis ḏ acemȓaȓ, wenni xas inyin qqaren-as Ȓaman ḏ ȓḥaqq. Itḥasab itḥarab s ȓḥaqq.
Ṯiṭṭawin nnes am uḥaḏuq n ṯmessi, x uzeǧif nnes aṭṭas n ttajaṯ. Yura xas ijjen n yisem war ṯ issin ḥadd illa netta.
Igga xas ijjen n čammir iɣeḍsen ḏeg iḏammen, s yisem tȓaɣan-as Awaȓ n Arebbi.
Ȓƹaskar n ujenna ḏeffaren-ṯ nyin x yiysan ḏ icemȓaȓen, ggin arruḍ n ȓkettan n lulan aṣebḥan ḏ acemȓaȓ inqa.
Iteffeɣ-d zeg uqemmum nnes ijjen n ssif iqḍeƹ, azzayes yuweṯ ȓegnus. Netta aṯen yarwes s uƹekkaz n ȓeḥḏiḏ, axasen iƹeffes ḏi ṯsirṯ n waman n uḍiȓ iƹni ḏ lƹiqab ameqqran n Arebbi ig izemmaren i kuȓci.
Yura x učammir ḏ umeṣṣaḍ nnes ijjen n yisem iƹni ḏ Azeǧiḏ n izeǧiḏen ḏ Mawlana n mawlanaṯ.
Ẓriɣ ijjen n lmalak ibedd x ṯfucṯ, isnekkar ṯɣuyyeṯ s jjheḏ iqqar-asen i marra ijḍaḍ iṭṭawen ḏi ȓwesṭ n ujenna: "Araḥem-d, muneṯ ɣar umensi ameqqran n Arebbi

ḥima aḏ teccem aysum n izeǧiḏen ḏ uysum n arruyas n ȓƹaskar ḏ uysum n yinni ijehḏen ḏ uysum n yiysan ḏ yinni xasen inyin ḏ uysum n marra iwḏan iƹni ḏ yinni ɣar iǧa bab nsen ḏ yinni ɣar ṯeǧa lḥurriya nsen, s umezyan ḏ umeqqran."
Ẓriɣ ȓwaḥc ḏ izeǧiḏen n ṯmurṯ ḏ ȓƹaskar nsen njemƹen ḥima aḏ ḥarben wenni inyin x uyis ḏ ȓƹaskar nnes.

Itwaṭṭef ȓwaḥc ḏ ameḥbus, akiḏes wenni itarran ixef nnes ḏ nnabi iy tuɣa iteggen lmuƹjizaṯ zzaṯ i ȓwaḥc. S lmuƹjizaṯ nni ixḏeƹ yinni iy ḏi iǧa ṭṭabaƹ n ȓwaḥc tsejjaḏen-as i lʼaṣnam nnes. Ȓwaḥc ḏ wenni itarran ixef nnes ḏ nnabi menḍaren s ṯnayen iḏsen ḏi ȓebḥar n ṯmessi ireqqen s ȓekbriyeṯ u niṯni aqaṯen ƹaḏ s buḥbeȓ nsen.
Ssif nni iy d iffɣen zeg uqemmum n wenni inyin x uyis inɣa marra yinni iqqimen, usin-d yijḍaḍ jjiwnen marra zeg uysum nsen.
Ẓriɣ ijjen n lmalak ihwa-d zeg ujenna ɣares ḏeg ufus nnes ȓmeftaḥ n ȓaǧeɣ bȓa ȓaḥedd ḏ yijjen n ssensȓeṯ ḏ ṯameqqrant.
Iṭṭef wenni iggin am ddaynaṣur netta ḏ fiɣer nni n zman iƹni Ibȓis niɣ ḏ Cciṭan, iqqen-iṯ iḥbes-iṯ aȓaf n iseggwusa.
Inḍar-iṯ ḏi ȓaǧeɣ bȓa ȓaḥedd, ibelleƹ xas ṯawwarṯ icemmeƹ-it bac ssenni aȓ ṯsawent war ixeddeƹ ca ȓegnus aȓ ɣa kemmȓen aȓaf n iseggwusa nni. Menbaƹd i manayenni labud aḏ itwaḍȓeq cwayt n ȓweqṯ.

Ẓriɣ lƹarcaṯ ḏ yinni xasen iqqimen ṯemmuc-asen ssulṭa aḏ ḥekmen. Ẓriɣ buḥbeȓ n yinni umi itwaqessen izeǧifen liʼanna ḏeffaren minxef icheḏ Ƹisa ḏ wawaȓ n Arebbi. Niṯni tuɣaṯen war sejjḏen ca i ȓwaḥc niɣ i lʼaṣnam nnes, tuɣa war qbiȓen ca ṭṭabaƹ nnes x ṯenyarṯ nsen niɣ x ufus nsen. Kkaren-d zi ȓmewṯ ḥekmen ak Ƹisa aȓaf n iseggwusa.
Manayenni ḏ lqiyama ṯamezwarut. Imettinen nneɣni war d tekkaren ca zi ȓmewṯ ḥetta aȓ ɣa kemmȓen aȓaf n iseggwusa.
Yinni d ɣa ikkaren ḏi lqiyama ṯamezwarut ssaƹḏ nsen, aqaṯen ṣfan. Ȓmewṯ wis ṯnayen war ɣares tiȓi ca ssulṭa xasen. Aḏ iȓin ḏ ȓfuqaha n Arebbi ḏ Lmasiḥ, akiḏes ḥekmen aȓaf n iseggwusa.
Xmi ɣa kemmȓen aȓaf n iseggwusa nni, aḏ d itwaḍȓeq Cciṭan zi ȓeḥbes nnes.
Aḏ d iffeɣ aḏ ixḏeƹ ȓegnus x arbeƹa n jwayeh n ṯmurṯ, iƹni Hajuj u Majuj. Aṯen ismun aḏ ḥarben, lƹadad nsen igga am yijḏi n ȓebḥar.
Nfeyyḍen-d Hajuj u Majuj x ṯmurṯ amen-ṯekmaȓ, nnḍen mani ƹezzben ȓmuminin ṣṣaliḥin iƹni ṯandint nni iƹizzen. Ȓexddenni ṯehwa-d xasen ṯmessi zeg ujenna ṯecc-iṯen.
Ibȓis nni iy ṯen ixeḏƹen imenḍar-d ḏi ȓebḥar nni n ṯmessi ḏ ȓekbriyeṯ mani iǧa ȓwaḥc nni ḏ wenni itarran ixef nnes ḏ nnabi. Aḏ twaƹeddben ḏinni nhar ḏ ǧiȓeṯ i ȓebda n ȓebdaṯ.
Ẓriɣ ijjen n lƹarc ḏ acemȓaȓ ḏ ameqqran. Wenni xas iqqimen ṯarweȓ zzayes ṯmurṯ ḏ ujenna war ḏasen iqqim bu umcan.
Ẓriɣ imettinen bedden zzaṯ i lƹarc nni am umezyan am umeqqran. Nurzmen Lkutub, inurzem ijjen n Lkitab nneɣni netta ḏ Lkitab n Ṯuḏarṯ. Twaḥasben imettinen s min yurin ḏi Lkutub ƹlaḥsab ȓexḏayem nsen.
Ȓebḥar isellem imettinen ig icca. Ȓmewṯ ḏ Lʼaxira sellment imettinen nsent. Uca kuȓ ijjen aḏ itwaḥaseb ƹlaḥsab ȓexḏayem nnes.
Ṯmenḍar-d ȓmewṯ ḏ Lʼaxira ḏi ȓebḥar n ṯmessi. Qa ȓebḥar nni n ṯmessi netta ig iǧan ḏ ȓmewṯ wis ṯnayen.
Wenni war ɣar ufin ca isem nnes izemmem ḏi Lkitab n Ṯuḏarṯ qa imenḍar-d ḏi ȓebḥar n ṯmessi.
Ẓriɣ ijjen n ujenna ḏ jḏiḏ ḏ ijjen n ṯmurṯ ḏ jḏiḏ, ȓaḥeqqac ajenna amezwaru ḏ ṯmurṯ ṯamezwarut ṣafi twakksen, ȓebḥar war iqqim ca.
Ẓriɣ ṯandint iqeddsen nettaṯ ḏ Lquds ḏ jḏiḏ. Ṯehwa-d zeg ujenna zi Arebbi ṯegga am ṯsȓiṯ ṯeƹḏeȓ ixef nnes bac aḏ teȓqa muȓay.
Sȓiɣ i yijjen n ṯmijja zi lƹarc ṯeqqar s jjheḏ: "Aqa ṯazeddiɣṯ n Arebbi ak yiwḏan, aḏ izḏeɣ jarasen aḏ iȓin ḏ ccaƹb nnes. Arebbi s yixef nnes akiḏsen yiȓi, u ƹaweḏ aḏ yiȓi ḏ Arebbi nsen.
Aḏ imseḥ kuȓ ameṭṭaw zi ṯiṭṭawin nsen. War tɣimi ca ƹaḏ ȓmewṯ niɣ ḏ lḥuzen niɣ ḏ imeṭṭawen niɣ ḏ ȓeḥriq. Aqa ṯimesȓayin nni ṯimezwura ṣafi twakksent."
Inna-ayi wenni iqqimen x lƹarc: "Aḏ ggeɣ kuȓci ḏ jḏiḏ!" Uca inna: "Ari manaya qa awaȓen-a ḏaysen ȓaman ḏaysen ȓḥaqq."
Inna-ayi: "Ṣafi, itwakemmeȓ. Nec ḏ lʼalif nec ḏ lyaʼ. Nec kuȓci zzayi ig ibḏa, nec kuȓci zzayi iy ɣa ikemmeȓ. Aḏ uceɣ i wenni iffuḏen zi ȓƹunṣar n waman n ṯuḏarṯ baṭeȓ.
Wenni ɣa irebḥen aḏ iwareṯ ḏi ṯmesȓayin-a. Nec aḏ iȓiɣ ḏ Arebbi nnes, netta aḏ yiȓi ḏ mmi.

Walakin ccmayeṯ ḏ yinni war yuminen ca ḏ yinni iǧan ḏ iƹeffanen ḏ yinni ineqqen iwḏan ḏ yinni ifessḏen ḏ iseḥḥaren ḏ yinni iƹebbḏen lʼaṣnam ḏ marra yinni isxerriqen aqa amcan nsen aḏ yiȓi ḏi ȓebḥar ireqqen s ṯmessi ḏ ȓekbriyeṯ. Qa ṯenni ḏ ȓmewṯ wis ṯnayen."
Yusa-d ɣari ijjen zi sebƹa n lmalaʼikaṯ nni iy ɣar ǧant sebƹa n ṯmejmarin ig iƹemmaren s sebƹa n lmuṣibaṯ nni ṯineggura, inna-ayi: "Araḥ-d, aḏac d smeḍhareɣ ṯasȓiṯ, iƹni ṯenni ɣa yawin Izmar."
Iysi-ayi arruḥ ɣar yijjen n uḏrar ḏ ameqqran yuƹȓa, ismeḍhar-ayi-d ṯandint iqeddsen iƹni Lquds, ṯehwa-d zeg ujenna zi Arebbi.
Ḏayes lƹaḍama n Arebbi, nnur nnes amecnaw ṯazrut ṯaṣebḥant, amecnaw ṯazrut n lyaceb ṯeṣfa aṭṭas.
Ɣares ijjen n ȓḥiḍ ḏ ameqqran yuƹȓa ɣares ṯenƹac n ṯewwura, ṯenƹac n ṯewwura nni xasent ṯenƹac n lmalaʼikaṯ. Yura x ṯewwura nni isemawen n ṯenƹac n ṯqebbaȓ n Ayṯ-Israʼil.
Ḏi ccarq ṯȓaṯa n ṯewwura, ḏi ccamal ṯȓaṯa n ṯewwura, ḏi ljanub ṯȓaṯa n ṯewwura, ḏi ȓɣarb ṯȓaṯa n ṯewwura.
Ȓḥiḍ n ṯendint ibedd x ṯenƹac n dsasaṯ, yura xasen isemawen n ṯenƹac n arrusul n Yizmar.
Lmalak nni wenni iy ɣari d issiwȓen ɣares ḏeg ufus nnes ijjen n ȓaƹbar n uɣanim n ddheb iƹebbar zzayes ṯandint ḏ ṯiwwura nnes ḏ ȓḥiḍ nnes.
Ṯandint murebbaƹ, am ṯuzeggarṯ nnes am ṯiriwṯ nnes. Iƹbar ṯandint s uɣanim nni yufa ḏayes aȓefayen u arbeƹmiyyat n kilumit, am ṯuzeggarṯ nnes am ṯiriwṯ nnes am ṯuƹȓat nnes.
Iƹbar ȓḥiḍ nnes yufa ḏayes miyya u arbeƹa u arbeƹin n ḏerraƹ, iƹni ȓaƹbar n lmalak nni am ȓaƹbar n bnaḏem.
Ȓḥiḍ nnes ibna s ṯezra n lyaceb, ṯandint ṯebna s ddheb iṣfan amecnaw jjaj iṣfan.

Dsasaṯ n ȓḥiḍ n ṯendint zewwqen s mkuȓ nnuƹ n ṯezra ṯiṣebḥanin. Dsas amezwaru netta ḏ ṯazrut n lyaceb, dsas wis ṯnayen ḏ lyaqut azeyza, dsas wis ṯȓaṯa ḏ lƹaqiq acemȓaȓ, dsas wis arbeƹa ḏ ṯazrut ṯazeyzawṯ n zzumurrud,

dsas wis xemsa ḏ jjazeƹ azeggwaɣ, dsas wis setta ḏ lƹaqiq azeggwaɣ, dsas wis sebƹa ḏ ṯazrut n zzabarjad, dsas wis ṯmenya ḏ ṯazrut n birril, dsas wis tesƹa ḏ lyaqut awraɣ, dsas wis ƹecra ḏ lƹaqiq amerbiƹ, dsas wis ḥiṭac ḏ ṯazrut n fayruz, dsas wis ṯenƹac ḏ ṯazrut n jjamact.
Ṯenƹac nni n ṯewwura niṯenti ḏ ṯenƹac n jjuwharaṯ, kuȓ ṯawwarṯ nettaṯ ḏ jjuwhar. Ccariƹ n ṯendint netta ḏ ddheb iṣfan amecnaw jjaj iṣfan.
War ẓriɣ ca Ṯamziḏa ṯameqqrant ḏi ṯendint nni, mayemmi? Liʼanna Siḏi Arebbi ig izemmaren i kuȓci ak Yizmar niṯni ig iǧan ḏ Ṯamziḏa-ya ṯameqqrant.
Ṯandint-a war teḥḏiji ca ṯfawṯ n ṯfucṯ niɣ n ṯziri ȓaḥeqqac lƹaḍama n Arebbi nettaṯ iy iteggen ḏinni ṯfawṯ, Izmar ḏ netta ḏ ȓefnar nnes.
Aḏ uyuren ȓegnus ḏi ṯfawṯ nnes, qa izeǧiḏen n ṯmurṯ aḏ siḏfen lhimma nsen ḏi ṯendint-a.
Ṯiwwura nnes war tbelliƹent ca nhar ikmaȓ qaƹ ȓaḥeqqac war ḏinni bu ǧiȓeṯ.
Ḏinni aḏ siḏfen lhimma ḏ uweqqar n ȓegnus.
War ḏinni taḏef uȓa ḏ ijjen n ṯmesȓayṯ ṯwessex niɣ ḏ ikrucaren niɣ ḏ yinni iqqaren ixerriqen. Aḏ aḏfen ḏinni ɣir yinni ɣar ǧan isemawen nsen zemmmen ḏi Lkitab n Ṯuḏarṯ n Yizmar.
Ismeḍhar-ayi-d lmalak nni iɣzar n waman n ṯuḏarṯ ṣfan am jjaj, iteffeɣ-d zi lƹarc n Arebbi ḏ Yizmar
itazzeȓ ḏi ȓwesṭ n ccariƹ n ṯendint. X ṯnayen n iɣezḏisen n yiɣzar-a ḏinni ṯacejjarṯ n ṯuḏarṯ. Tarew ṯenƹac n ṯwaȓaṯin kuȓ char ijjen n ṯwaȓa, afar nnes isgenfa ȓegnus.
Zi ssenni aȓ ṯsawent war ḏinni tiȓi bu nnaƹȓeṯ. Lƹarc n Arebbi ḏ Yizmar aḏ yiȓi ḏi ṯendint-a, aṯ ƹebḏen lƹibad nnes.
Aḏ ẓren aɣembub nnes, isem nnes aqaṯ x ṯenyarṯ nsen.
Zi ssenni aȓ ṯsawent war ḏinni tiȓi bu ǧiȓeṯ, war teḥḏijin ca ṯfawṯ n ȓefnar niɣ ḏ ṯfawṯ n ṯfuct ȓaḥeqqac Siḏi Arebbi netta axasen igg ṯfawṯ nnes. Aḏ ḥekmen i ȓebda n ȓebdaṯ.

Inna-ayi lmalak wenni: "Awaȓen-a ḏaysen ȓaman ḏaysen ȓḥaqq. Arebbi netta ḏ Mawlana iy d isehwan lwaḥi x lʼanbiya, issekk-d lmalak nnes ḥima aḏ d ismeḍhar i yinni iy ṯ iƹebbḏen min labud ɣa iweqƹen ƹȓayen."
"Nec aqa usiɣ-d war tƹeṭṭaȓeɣ ca! Ssaƹḏ n yinni iteggen array i wawaȓen n lwaḥi iǧan ḏi Lkitab-a."
Ḏ nec Yuḥanna iy sȓiɣ, ẓriɣ ṯimesȓayin-a. Wami sȓiɣ, ẓriɣ manaya, hwiɣ aḏ sejjḏeɣ ɣar iḍaren n lmalak nni iy ḏayi d ismeḍharen ṯimesȓayin-a.
Inna-ayi: "Lla! Qa nec ḏ ȓƹabḏ, am nec am cek am ayṯmac lʼanbiya ḏ marra yinni iteggen array i wawaȓen n Lkitab-a. Sejjeḏ-as i Arebbi."
Inna-ayi: "War snuffar ca awaȓen-a n lwaḥi ḏi Lkitab-a ȓaḥeqqac ȓweqṯ ṯuḏes-d.
Wenni iteggen ccarr aḏ iqqim itegg ccarr. Wenni ixenzen aḏ iqqim itexniz. Wenni iǧan nican aḏ iqqim nican. Wenni iǧan ḏ amqeddes aḏ iqqim ḏ amqeddes."
Inna Ƹisa: "Nec aqa usiɣ-d war tƹeṭṭaȓeɣ ca! Aḏ d awiɣ texȓiseṯ, aḏ jaziɣ kuȓ ijjen ƹlaḥsab ȓexḏayem nnes.
Nec ḏ lʼalif nec ḏ lyaʼ, nec ḏ amezwaru ḏ aneggaru. Nec kuȓci zzayi ig ibḏa, kuȓci zzayi iy ɣa ikemmeȓ.
Ssaƹḏ n yinni itṣebbanen ičammiren nsen, ḥima aɣarsen yiȓi ȓḥaqq ḏi ṯcejjarṯ n ṯuḏarṯ aḏ aḏfen ṯandint zi ṯewwura nnes.
Ɣar barra n ṯendint ǧan ḏinni iqzinen ḏ iseḥḥaren ḏ yinni ifessḏen ḏ yinni ineqqen iwḏan ḏ yinni iƹebbḏen lʼaṣnam ḏ marra yinni isxerriqen iy tḥibban ixarriqen.
Ḏ nec Ƹisa ssekkeɣ-d lmalak inu ḥima aḏawem icheḏ x ṯmesȓayin-a ḏi ṯjumaƹ n ȓmuminin. Nec ḏ lʼaṣel n Dawed u zi ddurriṯ nnes. Nec ḏ iṯri n ȓefjar itceƹciƹen."
Arruḥ ḏ ṯsȓiṯ qqaren: "Araḥ-d!" Wenni itsȓan aḏ yini: "Araḥ-d!" Wenni ifuḏen aḏ d yas, wenni irezzun aman n ṯuḏarṯ aḏ isew baṭeȓ!
Cehhḏeɣ nec x marra yinni itsȓan i wawaȓen-a n lwaḥi ḏi Lkitab-a: Wenni xasen ɣa yarnin, ataf Arebbi as yarni lmuṣibaṯ iy d yusin ḏi Lkitab-a.
Wenni ɣa ikksen zeg wawaȓen-a n lwaḥi ḏi Lkitab-a, ataf Arebbi as ikkes ȓḥaqq nnes zi ṯmesȓayin ig yurin ḏi Lkitab-a, iƹni ȓḥaqq nnes n ṯcejjarṯ n ṯuḏarṯ ḏ ȓḥaqq nnes n ṯendint iqeddsen.
Iqqar Ƹisa iƹni wenni ixebbaren x ṯmesȓayin-a: "Wah, nec aqa usiɣ-d war tƹeṭṭaȓeɣ ca!" Amin, araḥ-d a Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa.
Aḏ yiȓi arḍa n Siḏiṯneɣ Ƹisa ak kuȓ ijjen. Amin.
